# language_name:        Dholuo
# closest ISO 639-3:    luo
# ISO_15924:            Latn
# year_short:           1953
# year_long:            Part of the Bible was published for the first time in 1911. The New Testament was first published in 1926. The complete Bible was first published in 1953.
# vernacular_title:     
# english_title:        The Bible in Dholuo
# URL:                  http://jesusforafrica.net/luo/matthew.htm<br>http://www.worldscriptures.org/pages/dholuo.html

# copyright_long:       
# notes:                
19001001	Ogwedh ng’at maok lu pach joma richo kata chung’ e yor joricho kata bedo e kom joma jaro ji .
19001002	Tochik Jehova ema more , kendo osiko oparo kuom chikene odiechieng’ gotieno .
19001003	Ochalo gi yien mopidhi e bath aora , manyago olembe e kinde molemo chieke kendo ma pote ok ner . Gimoro amora motimo dhi maber .
19001004	Joma timbegi richo to ok chal kamano kata matin ! Gin gichalo gi mihudhi ma yamo tero .
19001005	Kuom mano joma timbegi richo ok nolo bura , adier , joricho ok nobedi e kanyakla mar joma kare ,
19001006	nikech Jehova rango yor joma kare maber , to yor joma richo to biro kethore .
19002001	Ang’o momiyo ogendini chano timo marach kendo ji chano timo gik manono ?
19002002	Ruodhi mag piny onyono piny matek kendo joloch pimo wach kaachiel mondo giked gi Jehova kendo gi ked gi ng’ate mowir .
19002003	" Giwacho ni , wachoduru nyorochegi ; kendo wawit ratekegi kucha . "
19002004	To jal mobetekom lo ch e polo to nyierogi anyiera , Ruoth goyonegi siboi .
19002005	Eka okwerogi kokecho kendo obwogogi kopong’ gi mirima mager , kowacho ni ,
19002006	" Aseketo ruoth ma adwaro e Zayun , goda maler . "
19002007	Abiro hulo chenro maok lokre mag Jehova : Nowachona ni , " In wuoda ; kawuono asedoko wuoru .
19002008	Omiyo kwaya gima idwaro mondo aket ogendini duto obed girkeni mari , mondo piny ngima obed mwanduni .
19002009	Iniritgi gi ludh nyinyo ; initogi matindo tindo ka agulu . "
19002010	Kuom mano , un ruodhi , beduru mariek ; tang’uru un joloch mag piny .
19002011	Tiuru ne Jehova gi luoro kendo moruru e nyime gi luoro .
19002012	Bolreuru e nyim Wuowi , nono to dipo kokecho kodu mi dong’ad ndalou , motieku , nimar iye nyalo wang’ kodu kadiemo wang’ . Ji duto mogeno kuome gin joma ogwedhi .
19003001	YAYE JEHOVA , mano kaka wasika thoth ! Mano kaka joma lawa ng’eny asasa !
19003002	
19003003	Ji mang’eny wuoyo kuoma , ka giwacho ni , " Nyasaye ok bi rese . " Sela
19003004	To In e okumba mogeng’a , YAYE JEHOVA ; In e duong’na , kendo iseting’o wiya malo .
19003005	Aywak matek ne Jehova , kendo odwoka gie gode maler . Sela
19003006	Ariera piny mondo anindi ; kendo achiew achako achiew , nikech Jehova orita .
19003007	Ok abi luoro ji gana gi gana mochokorena molwora mondo otimna marach .
19003008	Aa malo , YAYE JEHOVA ! Resa , Yaye Nyasacha ! Thal lemb wasika duto ; Muk leke joma timbegi richo
19003009	Wa rruok aa kuom Jehova . Mad gwethni obed kuom jogi . Sela
19004001	Ka alwongi to yie idwoka , Yaye Nyasacha makare . Konya e lit momako chunya ; yie ikecha kendo iwinj lamona .
19004002	
19004003	Yaye ji , ubiro chayo duong’na kukuodo wiya nyaka karang’o ? Ubiro hero gik manono kendo ubiro luwo nyiseche manono nyaka karang’o ?
19004004	Ng’euru ni Jehova oseketo joma oluore tenge ne en owuon ; omiyo Jehova biro dwoka ka aluonge .
19004005	Ka iu owang’ to kik utim richo ; seche ma uyueyo mos e otendiniu , to paruru matut kuom wachno , kuketo chunyu mos .
19004006	Chiwuru misengini mow injore kendo genuru kuom Jehova .
19004007	Ji mang’eny penjo ni , " En ng’a manyalo timonwa gimoro maber ? " Mad ler moa e lela wang’i rieny kuomwa , YAYE JEHOVA .
19004008	Isepong’o chunya gi mor maduong’ moloyo mor ma gin-go kinde ma gin-gi cham kod divai mang’eny .
19004009	Abiro riera piny mi anind gi kuwe , nikech in kendi , YAYE JEHOVA ema imiyo adak gi kuwe .
19005001	Chik iti iwinj wechena , Yaye Jehova , para kuom pek manie chunya .
19005002	
19005003	Winj ywakna mar dwaro kony , Yaye Ruodha kendo Nyasacha , nikech in ema alami
19005004	Yie iwinj duonda gokinyi , Yaye Jehova ; aketo kwayoga e nyimi gokinyi kendo arito dwoko ka an gi geno .
19005005	Ok in Nyasaye mamor gi timbe maricho . Joma richo ok nyal dak kodi kanyachiel .
19005006	Josunga ok nyal chung’ e nyimi ; imon gi ji duto matimo gik maricho .
19005007	Itieko joma wacho miriambo ; Jehova ok mor gi joma rich chwero remo omako kod jomiriambo .
19005008	Anto , nikech kechni maduong’ , abiro donjo e odi ; abiro kulora gi luor ka achomo hekalu mari maler .
19005009	Telna , Yaye Jehova , kuom adiera mari , nikech wasika-riena yori tir e nyima .
19005010	Kata wach achiel mowuok e dho jogi ok nyal gen ; chunygi opong’ gi kethruok . Dwondgi chalo gi liel mapok oum ; gipiago lewgi ne wacho miriambo .
19005011	Kwan-gi kaka joketho , Yaye Nyasaye ! Ket obadho ma giketo ne ji ogajgi gin giwegi . Riembgi nikech richogi mathoth , nimar giseng’aanyoni .
19005012	We ji duto moketi kar pondo margi obed mamor ; we gisik ka giwer gimor . Umgi gi rit mari , mondo joma ohero nyingi omor kodi .
19005013	Nikech igwedho joma kare adier , Yaye Jehova ; igeng’ogi gi hapi mana ka okumba .
19006001	Kik ikwe ra , Yaye Jehova , ka iyi owang’ kata kum kik ikuma ka mirima omaki .
19006002	
19006003	Kecha , Yaye Jehova , nikech aol ; changa , Yaye Jehova , nikech chokena rama malit .
19006004	Chunya winjo malit . Nyaka karang’o , Yaye Jehova , nyaka karang’o ?
19006005	Wichri , Yaye Jehova , mondo iresa ; wara nikech herani maok rem .
19006006	Onge ng’ama nyalo pari ka osetho . En ng’a madi paki gie i liel ?
19006007	Chur ma achurgo ojonya otieno duto , abudo otandana gi ywak kendo pi wang’a olwoko piendena .
19006008	Wengena ool nikech lit ma an-go ; ok ginen maber nikech wasika duto .
19006009	Ayiuru buta , un duto mutimo richo , nikech Jehova osewinjo ywakna .
19006010	Jehova osewinjo ywak mar kwayo kech ; Jehova orwako lamo mara .
19006011	Wasika duto wigi biro kuot kendo biro hum nono ; gibiro dok chien apoya nono gi wichkuot .
19007001	Yaye Jehova Nyasacha , in e kar pondona ; Resa kendo igola e lwet joma lawa duto ,
19007002	
19007003	nono to gibiro kidha kaka sibuor kidho gik moko . Kendo gibiro yiecha matindo tindo maonge ng’ama diresa e lwetgi .
19007004	Yaye Jehova Nyasacha , kaponi asetimo ma adier kendo lwetena osetimo gima rach -
19007005	Kaponi asetimo marach ne ng’ama onge koda gi wach kata kapo ni asemayo jasika ka onge gima omiyo -
19007006	to yiene jasika olawa mi ojuka ; wegi ginyon ngimana piny e lo mi gimi anind ei lo piny . Sela
19007007	Aa malo , Yaye Jehova , ka iyi owang’ aa malo irad gi gero mar wasika . Chiew , Nyasacha ; chiew inyis adiera makora .
19007008	We chokruoge mag ogendini olwori koni gi koni . Ng’ad negi bura gie kom loch mari man malo ;
19007009	Jehova mondo ong’ad bura ne ogendini . Yala , Yaye Jehova , kaluwore gi ngimana makare , kaluwore gi ngimana moriere tir , Yaye Jal man malo mogik .
19007010	Yaye Nyasaye makare , manono pach ji gi chunje ji , tiek timbe mamono mag joma richo mondo imi joma kare odag gi kuwe .
19007011	Okumbana en Nyasaye Man Malo Mogik , ma waro joma chunygi oriere tir .
19007012	Nyasaye en jang’ad bura makare ; en Nyasaye ma toyo mirimbe pile ka pile .
19007013	Ka ok oloko pache to obiro piago liganglane ; obiro dolo okumbane mi otwe tondege .
19007014	Oseiko gige mag lweny mager ; oiko asernige makakni ka mach .
19007015	Ng’ama iye okuot gi gik maricho kendo mayach gi chandruok nyuolo yamo nono .
19007016	Ng’ama loso bur kendo kunye maber podho e bure mokunyono .
19007017	Chandruok mokelo gaje en owuon ; maundu mare duogo ne wiye owuon .
19007018	Abiro goyo erokamano ne Jehova nikech en ng’ama kare kendo abiro wero wend pak ne nying Jehova man malo mogik .
19008001	Yaye Jehova Nyasachwa mano kaka nyingi nigi duong’ e piny duto ! Iseguro duong’ni moyombo polo .
19008002	
19008003	Dho rawere matindo gi nyithindo mayom pod paki nikech wasiki mondo imi jasigu kod jachul kuor ling’ kik wuo .
19008004	Kaparo polo magi ma gin tich lweti , kaparo dwe gi sulwe miseketo keregi ,
19008005	to awuoro ni dhano adhana to en ang’o momiyo isiko ipare , Wuod dhano to en ang’o momiyo iketo pachi kuome ?
19008006	Ne ichwe ye gi duong’ machiegni rom gi duong’ Mar chwech mag polo kendo isesidhone duong’ gi luor .
19008007	Isekete jatelo ewi tich lweti duto ; iseketo gik moko duto e bwo tiende :
19008008	Jamni gi kweth duto kod le mager mag bungu ,
19008009	Winy duto mahuyo e kor yamo , kod rech manie nam , le duto mamol kaluwo yore manie nembe .
19008010	Yaye Jehova , Ruodhwa , mano kaka nyingi nigi duong’ e piny duto !
19009001	Abiro paki gi chunya duto , Yaye Jehova ; abiro nyiso timbegi madongo duto .
19009002	
19009003	Abiro bedo mamor kendo abiro il kodi ; abiro pako nyingi gi wer , Yaye Jal Mamalo Mogik .
19009004	Wasika ogomo dok ; gichwanyore kendo gilal e nyimi .
19009005	Nikech isechung’na matek ka ichwaka isebetekom duong’ mari , kiyalo bura kare .
19009006	Isekwero ogendini kendo isetieko joma richo ; iserucho nyinggi oko nyaka chieng’ kendo nyaka chieng’ .
19009007	Kethruok mosiko osejuko jasigu , isemuko miechgi madongo ; mi kodaka kitgi oselal e pach ji .
19009008	Jehova olocho nyaka chieng’ , oseguro kom loch mare mar ng’ado bura .
19009009	Obiro rito ogendini gi adiera
19009010	Jehova en kar pondo ne joma idiyo , en e kar pondo e kinde mag chandruok .
19009011	Joma ong’eyo nyingi biro geno kuomi , nikech in , Yaye Jehova , ne pok ijwang’o joma manyi .
19009012	Wer wende pak ne Jehova , mobet e kom lochne e Zayun ; hulne ogendini gik mosetimo .
19009013	Nikech ng’at machulo kuor kuom remo mochwer siko kaparo ; ok owe mak odewo ywak joma hinyore .
19009014	Neye kaka wasika sanda , Yaye Jehova ! Kecha kendo ting’a igola e dhorangeye mag tho ,
19009015	mondo anyis pakni e dhorangeye mag nyi Jerusalem kendo abed mamor kuno nikech warruokni .
19009016	Ogendini oselutore e buche ma gikunyo ; tiendegi ogajore e tondegi ma gichokogo ji .
19009017	Jehova ong’ere nikech adierane ; joma timbegi richo omoko e gik ma giloso gi lwetgi . Higgain . Sela
19009018	Joma timbegi richo dok e bur matut , nyaka ogendini duto ma wigi wil gi Nyasaye .
19009019	To jochan wi ji ok sik kowilgo kendo geno mar joma hinyore ok rum .
19009020	Aa malo , Yaye Jehova , kik iyie mondo dhano olochi ; ne ni ogendini ong’ad negi bura e nyimi .
19009021	Gogi gi luoro , Yaye Jehova ; mi ogendini ong’e ni gin mana dhano . Sela .
19010001	Ang’o momiyo ichung’ gichien , Yaye Jehova ? Ang’o momiyo ipondo ne ji kinde mag chandruok ?
19010002	Ng’at ma timbene richo pedho joma onge nyalo kendo omakogi e otego mage mosechiko .
19010003	Dwache maricho mopando e chunye omiyo osungore ; jowuoche ema ogwedho to Jehova to ochayo .
19010004	Sunga omake maok onyal manye ; onge thuolo kata matin moweyone Nyasaye e pache
19010005	Yorene dhi maber kinde duto , okawore omiyo chikeni ni mabor moyombe ; ojaro wasike duto .
19010006	Owacho ne en owuon ni , " Onge gima nyalo yienga ; abiro dak gi kuwe kinde duto ka onge gima thaga . "
19010007	Dhoge opong’ gi miriambo kod weche mabw ogo ji ; chandruokgi gi chenro maricho nie bwo lewe .
19010008	Okiyo ji e bath yore mag gweng’ , onego ji apoya koa kuonde moponde , osiko ong’icho mondo wang’e omaki joma onge ketho mondo ohiny .
19010009	Okiyo ji kokichore ka sibuor mopondo ; okichore mar mako joma ok nyal mondo ohinygi , omako joma ok nyal kendo oywayogi oko gi tonde mar meko .
19010010	Joma hapgi rach momako otieko kendo podho chuth , gipodho e bwo tekone .
19010011	Owachone en owuon ni , " Nyasaye wiye osewil ; opando wang’e kendo onge gima oneno . "
19010012	Aa malo Yaye Jehova ! Ting’ badi malo , Yaye Nyasaye . Kik wiyi wil gi joma ok nyal .
19010013	Ang’o momiyo ng’ama timbe g e richo jaro Nyasaye ? Ang’o momiyo owacho e chunye ni , " Ok obi keta piny mopenja gima asetimo ? "
19010014	To in , Yaye Nyasaye , ineno chand ruok gi kuyo , ikaw ogi kaka mari kendo iting’ogi e lweti . Ng’at maok nya ; chiwore ne in ; In e jakony mar joma onge wuonegi .
19010015	Tur bad ng’ama rach ma timbene richo ; luonge mondo onyis ji gik maricho mosetimo ling’ling’ ma ji ok nyal fwenyo mi ng’e .
19010016	Jehova en Ruoth nyaka chieng’ ma nyaka chieng’ ; ogendini biro lal nono e pinye .
19010017	Yaye Ruoth Nyasaye , in iwinjo kwayo mar joma chandore ; ijiwogi , kendo ichiko iti ne ywakgi ,
19010018	Ichwako joma onge gi wuonegi kod joma isando , mondo eka dhano , ma ochwe gi lo , kik dhi nyime gi bwogo ji .
19011001	Jehova ema ageno kuome . Koro ere kaka duwachna ni : " Hu kaka winyo nyaka wi got mari .
19011002	Nikech joma timbegi richo osechako ywayo atungegi ; gisechano asernigi e tonde mag atung’ mondo gichielgo joma oriere gie chunygi ; e mudho .
19011003	Ka mise mar ngima osekethi , to en ang’o ma ng’at makare ditim ? "
19011004	Jehova nie Hekalu mare maler ; Jehova nie kom duong’ mare manie polo . Orango timbe yawuot ji ; wengene nonogi matut .
19011005	Jehova nono joma kare , to joma timbegi richo kod joma ohero maundu to chunye ochayo .
19011006	Obiro chwero makaa maliel mager kod salfa kuom joma timbegi richo ; yamo maliet ha matwoyo gik moko , biro kudhogi .
19011007	Nikech Jehova en Ng’ama Kare , kendo ohero adiera ; joma timbegi oriere biro neno wang’e .
19012001	Kony ji Yaye Jehova , nikech joma oluoro Nyasaye koro onge ; joma jo adiera oserumo pep e dier ji .
19012002	
19012003	Ng’ato ka ng’ato riambo ne nyawadgi ; dhogi mohero charo ji wuoyo gi wuond .
19012004	Mad Jehova ng’ad oko dhok duto macharo ji kod lep duto masungore ;
19012005	ma wacho ni , " Wabiro locho gi lewwa ; lew-wa e rapurwa ma wapurogo koso en ng’a ma disindwa timo kamano ? "
19012006	" Nikech dich modigo joma ok nyal kod chur ma joma ochando churgo , koro abiro aa malo , " Jehova owacho . " Abiro ritogi e lwet joma sandogi . "
19012007	Weche Jehova liw , giliw ka fedha moleny e lo mowang’ maliet ha , mopwodhi ndalo abiriyo
19012008	Yaye Jehova , yie iritwa maber kik gimoro ohinywa kendo reswa e lwet joma kamago nyaka chieng’ .
19012009	Joma timbegi richo wuotho koni gi koni ka ng’anjo e kinde ma ipako rach e dier ji .
19013001	Nyaka karang’o , Yaye Jehova ? Wiyi biro wil koda nyaka chieng’ koso ? Ibiro pandona wang’i nyaka karang’o ?
19013002	
19013003	Abiro dhi nyime ka ai gi pek manie pacha kod kuyo manie chunya odiechieng’ kodiechieng’ nyaka karang’o ?
19013004	Para kendo idwoka , Yaye Jehova Nyasacha . Chiw ler ne wengena , nono to dipo ka nindo otera mi atho ;
19013005	nikech mano nyalo miyo jasika wach ni , " Aseloye , " kendo wasika biro bedo mamor ka apodho .
19013006	Anto ageno kuom herani mosiko ; chunya oil kuom warruok mari .
19013007	Abiro wer ne Jehova , nikech osebedo ka otimona maber .
19014001	Ng’ama ofuwo wacho e chunye ni , " Nyasaye onge . " Gin joma okethore . Timbegi richo mokalo tong’ , onge kata ng’ato achiel matimo maber .
19014002	Jehova ng’iyo piny mwalo gie polo , ong’iyo yawuot ji mondo oneye ka be nitie kata ng’at achiel kuomgi ma nigi winjo , ng’ato kata achiel ma manyo Nyasaye .
19014003	Giduto giseleng’ore giweyo , giduto kaachiel gisebedo joma okethore ; onge kata achiel .
19014004	Be joma timo gik maricho biro puonjore adier-joma ngamo joga kaka ji chamo makati kendo maok lam Jehova ?
19014005	N egie kaka luoro dwa negog i , nikech Nyasaye nitie e chokruok mar joma kare .
19014006	Un joma timo gik maricho , uketho chenro joma odhier , to Jehova e kar bwok margi .
19014007	Yaye , mad warruok mar Israel wuog Sayun ! Kinde ma Jehova duogo ne joge mwandugi , onego Jakobo obed moil kendo Israel obed mamor !
19015001	Jehova , EN NG’A manyalo siko kari maler milamie ? En ng’a manyalo dak e godi maler ?
19015002	En ng’at ma wuodhe obidhore kendo matimo gima kare , ng’at ma wacho adiera gie chunye
19015003	kendo maok tim ne wadgi gimoro amora marach kendo ok dir weche makuodo wi dhano wadgi ,
19015004	Ng’at machayo ng’ama timbene richo mokalo tong’ , to miyo joma oluoro Jehova duong’ , Ng’at ma rito singruok motimo kata bed ni timo kamano hinye ,
19015005	Ng’at ma holo ji pesane maok odwaro ni oduokne gi gimoro e wiye kendo maok yie kaw asoya kuom joma onge ketho . Ng’at ma timo gigi eki ok gimoro nyal yiengo .
19016001	RITA MABER , Yaye Nyasaye nikech in e kar pondona .
19016002	Ne awacho ne Jehova ni , " In e Ruodha ; onge gima ber machielo ma an go makmana in . "
19016003	To jomaler manie piny , to gin kaka joma nigi duong’ ma ahero gi chunya duto .
19016004	Joma lawo nyiseche mamoko kuyo margi biro medore . Misengini magi mag remo ok abi olo oko kendo kata nyinggi ok abi hulo gi dhoga .
19016005	Jehova , isemiya pok mako ra kod okombena ; iserita maber gi giga duto .
19016006	Kiepe mag tong’ maga moro okwako kuonde mabeyo beyo ; adier , girkeni maga moro wang’ adier .
19016007	Abiro pako Jehova ma ng’adona rieko ; kata gotieno chunya puonja .
19016008	Asiko aketo Jehova e nyima ndalo duto . Nikech entie e lweta korachwich , onge gima nyalo buoga .
19016009	Emomiyo chunya mor kendo lewa yot ; ringra bende biro yweyo gi kuwe ,
19016010	nikech ok ibi jwang’a ei liel , kendo ok ibi yie mondo Ng’ati Maler otow .
19016011	Isenyisa yor ngima ; ibiro pong’a gi ilo e nyimi , kendo gi mor mosiko e badi korachwich .
19017001	Yaye Jehova , yie iwinj kwayo n a makare ; chik iti ne ywakna , chik iti ne lemona-lamona ok aa e dhok mawuondo ji .
19017002	Mad chwak michwakago oa kuomi ; mad wengeni ne gima kare .
19017003	Kata obedo ni inono chunya kendo itema gotieno , kata ka itema to ok ibi yudo gimoro kuoma ; aseng’ado pacha mogik ni dhoga ok bi timo richo .
19017004	To kuom gik ma joma moko timo , kaluwore gi wach mowuok e dhogi , an awuon asepogora gi yore jomaundu .
19017005	Okengega osesiko e yoreni ; tiendena pok okier .
19017006	Aluongi , Yaye Nyasaye , nikech ibiro dwoka ; chikna iti kendo winj lamona .
19017007	Nyisie teko mar herani maduong’ , in ma ireso ji gi lweti ma korachwich , joma pondo ne wasikgi kuomi .
19017008	Rita adimba kaka tong wang’i , panda e bwo tipo mar bwombi ,
19017009	mondo atony e lwet joma richo ma lawa , mondo atony e lwet wasika ma dhano molwora .
19017010	Gidino chunjegi matek ta , kendo dhogi wuoyo gi wich teko .
19017011	Giselawa kuonde duto , mi koro gilwora , ka wengegi ochiek , mondo gidira piny .
19017012	Gichalo sibuor ma nigi kech mar mako le , mana ka sibuor maduong’ mopondo kokichore .
19017013	Aa malo , Yaye Jehova , chomgi tir , mi igogi piny ; resa e lwet joma richo gi liganglani .
19017014	Yaye Jehova , resa e lwet joma kamago gi lweti , resa e lwet jopinyni ma pokgi nie pinyni . Itieko kech ma joma ihero nigo ; yawuotgi nigi chiemo mang’eny kendo gikano mwandu ne nyithindgi .
19017015	To an , anane wang’i ka ngimana nikare ; ka anachiew , abiro romo ka anane kiti kaka ichal .
19018001	Aheri , Yaye Jehova , in e tekra .
19018002	
19018003	Jehova en lwandana , en kar pondo mara kendo en jawarna ; Nyasacha en lwandana ma apondo kuome . En okumbana , en tung’ mar warruokna , kendo en ohingana .
19018004	Aluongo Jehova , en mowinjore gi pak , kendo oresa e lwet wasika .
19018005	Tonde mag tho ne orida matek ; kendo ohula mang’ongo mar tho nouma .
19018006	Tonde mag liel ne orida kendo odhoga matek ; gogni mag tho ne ochoma tir .
19018007	E chandruok ne aluongo Jehova ; ne aywak ne Nyasaye mondo okonya . Ne owinjo duonda gie Hekalu mare ; ywakna nochopo e nyime , modonjo e ite .
19018008	Piny notetni kendo oyiengni ; kendo mise mag gode noyukni ; ne gikirni nikech ne okecho .
19018009	Iro nodum koa e otuchi mag ume ; mach mang’ang’ni nodhuolore kawuok e dhoge , kendo makaa maliel mager nobebni kaa kuome .
19018010	Notiaro kor polo molor piny ; rumbi molil ti ne nie bwo pat tiende .
19018011	Noidho kerubi eka ofuyo ; ne ofuyo matek komoko e bwomb yamo .
19018012	Noloko mudho raum mare , moume koni gi koni-boche molil ti mag koth manie kor polo .
19018013	Boche nowuok e ler marieny mane aa kuome , kaachiel gi pe madongo dongo kod mil polo ma piatore .
19018014	Jehova nomor gie polo ; dwond Jal Mamalo Mogik nowinjore .
19018015	Nochielo asernige mi okeyo wasike mel , nojukogi gi mil polo madongo ma piatore .
19018016	Holni manie bwo nembe noelore kendo mise mag piny nowe nono kane ikwerogi , Yaye JEHOVA , kane teko mar muya mowuok e otuchi mag umi ogoyogi .
19018017	Nochopo ira piny koa malo mi okawa ; ne ogola oko e kude mag pi matut .
19018018	Ne oresa e lwet wasika ma roteke , kuom joma ok dwara , mane ohinga gi teko .
19018019	Ne gimonja e kinde mane an gi masira to JEHOVA nobedo siro mara .
19018020	Ne okela moketa kama lach ; ne oresa nikech chunye ne mor koda .
19018021	JEHOVA osetimona maber ka oluwore gi timna makare ; osechiwona ka oluwore gi ler mar lwetena .
19018022	Nikech aserito yore JEHOVA ; pok atimo marach kuom loko ra weyo Nyasacha .
19018023	Chikene duto nie nyima ; pok alokora aweyo buchene .
19018024	Asebedo ka aonge ketho e nyime kendo aseritora mondo kik atim richo .
19018025	JEHOVA osechiwona kaluwore gi timna makare , osechiwona kaluwore gi ler mar lwetena e nyime .
19018026	Ne joma jo adiera , inyisori kaka jaadiera , kendo ne joma long’o , inyisori kaka ng’ama long’o ,
19018027	ne joma ler , inyisori kaka ng’ama ler , to ne joma yoregi obam , inyisori kaka ng’ama rach .
19018028	Ireso joma muol to joma wengegi tek idwoko piny .
19018029	In ema imiyo tacha siko ka liel , Yaye JEHOVA ; Nyasacha loko mudho mouma doko ler .
19018030	Ka ikonya to anyalo monjo mony mar jokedo ; ka an gi Nyasacha to anyalo lwenyo ohinga .
19018031	Nyasaye to yore long’o chuth ; wach JEHOVA onge rem moro amora . En okumba ne ji duto ma pondo kuome .
19018032	Nikech en Nyasaye mane minyalo pimo gi JEHOVA ? Koso en ng’a ma en Lwanda , ka ok Nyasachwa ?
19018033	Nyasaye mane osira gi teko kendo oloso yora obedo mokuwe .
19018034	Nomiyo tiendena ochalo gi tiende mwanda kendo nochunga gi kuwe ewi gode kuonde moting’ore .
19018035	Otiego lwetena ne lweny ; momiyo bedena nyalo dolo atung nyinyo .
19018036	Isemiya okumba mar warruokni , kendo lweti korachwich osesira ; kony mari osemiyo abedo gi duong’ .
19018037	Ne imiya lach ne okangega ma agoyo kendo tiendena ok okier .
19018038	Ne alawo wasika mi ajukogi ; kendo ne ok aloko ra aweyogo nyaka ne atiekogi pep .
19018039	Ne agoyogi piny maok ne ginyal chung’ aa malo ; ne gipodho e bwo tiendena .
19018040	Nikech ne isira gi teko mar kedo lweny ; ne imiyo joma goya onimo e bwoya .
19018041	Ne imiyo wasika oloko dieng’egi ne an , kendo joma ne ochaya ne atieko .
19018042	Ne giywak mondo okonygi to onge ng’ama ne nyalo konyogi ; ne giywak ne Jehova to ne ok odwokogi .
19018043	Ne agoyogi adunya kaburu ma yamo tero , ne achodhogi oko ka chuodho mag yore mag dala .
19018044	Ne iresa e ywaruok gi ji . Ne iketa jatend ogendini ; joma ne ok ang’eyo chon notiyona .
19018045	Sanosano mane giwinjoe humba , ne giwinja ; jo pinje maoko nobiro motwere kuoma .
19018046	Jo pinje maoko chunygi noa kendo ne gibiro ka gitetni ka gia kuonde pondo mag-gi .
19018047	JEHOVA ngima ! Lwandana mondo og wedhi . Kendo Nyasaye mar Warruokna mondo oting’ malo !
19018048	Nyasaye mane ochulo kuor kara kendo oloyo-ogendini e bwoya ;
19018049	mane oresa e lwet wasika ; ne iresa e lwet joma rori .
19018050	Nikech mano , abiro dendi e dier ogendini YAYE JEHOVA , kendo abiro wero wende pak ne nyingi .
19018051	Loch maduong’ omiyo ruoth mare , kendo onyiso hera mosiko ne ng’at mowir , ne Daudi kod kothe nyaka chieng’ .
19019001	Polo hulo duong’ mar Nyasaye ; kor polo nyiso tich mar lwete .
19019002	
19019003	Odiechieng’ kodiechieng’ gikeyo wach ; otieno kotieno ginyiso rieko
19019004	Gionge dhok kata weche kata dwondgi ok winji .
19019005	Kata kamano dwondgi dhi kuonde duto e piny , wechegi osechopo nyaka e giko piny . Osechungo hema e kor polo ne wang’ chieng’ ,
19019006	machalo gi wuon kisera mothinyore oko kawuok e kiwanja kendo mana ka jang’wech mongirore moil moikore ni chako ng’wech .
19019007	Owuok gie tung’ polo konchiel , kendo olworore nyaka koma chielo ; onge gima opondo ne liet mare .
19019008	Chik Jehova long’o chuth , oduogo chuny ; buche mag Jehova inyalo geno , gimiyo joma riekogi tin bedo mariek .
19019009	Chike mag Jehova nikare , gichiwo mor ne chuny . Chike mag Jehova rieny , gichiwo ler ne wang’ .
19019010	Luoro Jehova liw osiko nyaka chieng’ . Buche mag Jehova gin adier kendo gin kare kargi gi duto .
19019011	Gibeyo moloyo dhahabu , moloyo dhahabu malerie moloyo ; gimit moloyo mor kich moa e pedni .
19019012	Gin ema ritogi kelo pok maduong’ .
19019013	En ng’a manyalo ng’eyo kethoge mopondo ? Wena kethoga mopondo .
19019014	Bende geng’ jatichni kuom richo mag wich teko ; mad kik gibed gi loch kuoma . Eka anabed maonge ketho , anabed ka aonge gi ketho chik moro maduong’ .
19019015	Mad weche mawuok e dhoga , kod paro manie chunya , obed malong’o e nyimi , Yaye Jehova , Lwandana kendo Jawarna .
19020001	Mad Nyasaye duoki ka inie chandruok ; mad nying Nyasach Jakobo riti .
19020002	
19020003	Mad oorni kony moa kare maler kendo omiyi kony moa Sayun .
19020004	Mad opar misengni magi duto kendo oyie gi chiwo magi miwang’o pep .
19020005	Mad omiyi gima chunyi go mbo kendo omi chenro magi duto dhi maber .
19020006	Wabiro kok gimor ka ilocho kendo wabiro ting’o bendechwa malo e nying Nyasachwa . Mad Jehova chiw gik moko duto mikwaye .
19020007	Koro ang’eyo ni Jehova reso ng’ate mowir ; odwoke gie polo mare maler gi teko ma waro ji mar lwete korachwich .
19020008	Jomoko ogeno kuom gechegi to jomoko kuom faresegi , to wanto wageno kuom nying Jehova Nysachwa .
19020009	Gibiro lwar e chonggi mi gipodhi , to wan wabiro aa malo mi wachung’ motegno .
19020010	Yaye Jehova , res ruoth ! Dwokwa ka waluongi !
19021001	Yaye Jehova , ruoth oil nikech teko mimiye . Mano kaka en gi mor maduong’ nikech isemiyo olocho !
19021002	
19021003	Isemiye gima chunye gombo kendo pok idagi timone kwayo moa e dhoge . Sela
19021004	Ne irwake gi gweth momew kendo nisidho osimbo mar dhahabu maliw e wiye .
19021005	Ne okwayi ngima kendo ne imiyegone imede ndalo nyaka chieng’ manyaka chieng’ .
19021006	Kuom loch mane ichiwo , duong’ mare duong’ ; isemiye huma gi luor .
19021007	Adier , isemiye gweth mochwere kendo isemiyo obedo mamor gi mor moa e nyimi .
19021008	Nikech ruoth ogeno kuom Jehova ; kuom hera maok rum mar Jal Mamalo Mogik , ok obi yiengni .
19021009	Lweteni biro mako wasiki duto ; lweti ma korachwich biro ndhiyo joma kedo kodi .
19021010	E sama ibiro thinyorie nii to ibiro miyo gichal gi kendo ma mach lielie mager . Jehova biro mwonyogi ngili kuom mirimbe mager , kendo mach mare biro tiekogi .
19021011	Ibiro tieko kothgi mi rum e piny , kendo nyithindgi biro rumo edier ji .
19021012	Kata obedo ni gichano timoni marach kendo giloso chenro maricho , to ok ginyal loyo ;
19021013	nikech ibiro miyo gilok dierng’egi ka ibiro dimbogi gi atung’ moywa .
19021014	Yud duong’ , Yaye Jehova , kuom tekoni maduong’ ! Wabiro wer kendo pako nyalo mari .
19022001	Nyasacha , Nyasacha , iweya nang’o ? Ang’o momiyo in mabor koda maok inyal resa ? In mabor ma ok inyal winjo weche mag churna ?
19022002	
19022003	Yaye Nyasacha , aywagora odiechieng’ duto to ok idwoka , aywagora gotieno bende maok aling’ .
19022004	To eka ibetekom duong’ kaka Ng’ama Ler ; in e pak mar jo-Israel .
19022005	Kuomi ema wuonewa noketoe genogi ; ne gigeni kendo ne iresogi .
19022006	Ne giywakni kendo ne iwarogi ; ne gigeno kuomi mi ne ok gineno wichkuot .
19022007	An to an mana kudni maok dhano , ng’ama ji duto jaro kendo ma ji ochayo .
19022008	Ji duto monena jara ; gidiro ayany ka gikino wigi .
19022009	" Ogeno kuom Jehova ; koro mondo Jehova okonye ane . Koro mondo orese ane , nikech chunye mor kode . "
19022010	To eka in ema ne igola e ich ; ne ichweya mondo agen kuomi kata kane pod adhodho thund mama .
19022011	Ne oriwa kodi chakre chieng’ mane onyuolae ; isebedo Nyasacha aa kinde mane an ei mama .
19022012	Kik ibed mabor koda , nikech chandruok ni koda machiegni kendo onge ng’ama nyalo konya .
19022013	Ruodhi mang’eny olwora ; ruodhi maroteke moa Bashan olwora koni gi koni .
19022014	Sibuoche maruto makidho le ma gisemako ong’amo dhogi malach kadwaro ngama .
19022015	Ipuka oko kaka pi , kendo chokega duto osewil . Chunya olokore odok ; oseleny morumo e iya .
19022016	Tekona osetwo ka balatago , kendo lewa omoko e danda ; isepiela e lop tho .
19022017	Guogi oselwora ; oganda mar joma richo oseketa diere , gisetucho lwetena gi tiendena .
19022018	A n yalo kwano chokena duto ; ji ranga aming’a kendo jara .
19022019	Gipogore lepa e kindgi giwegi kendo gigoyo ombulu ne nangana .
19022020	To in , Yaye Jehova , kik ibed mabor koda ; Yaye , tekra , bi piyo mondo ikonya .
19022021	Res ngimana kuom ligangla , res ngimana e teko guogi .
19022022	Resa e dho sibuoche ; resa e tunge ruedhi mager .
19022023	Abiro hulo nyingi ne owetena ; abiro paki e nyim chokruok .
19022024	Un muluoro Jehova , pakeuru ! Un nyikwa Jakobo duto , miyeuru duong’ . Luoreuru , un koth jo-Israel duto !
19022025	Nikech pok ochayo kata ojaro sandruok mar joma winjo malit ; pok opandone wang’e to osewinjo ywakne mar dwaro kony .
19022026	Kuomi ema thorro mara mar pak e chokruok maduong’ aye ; abiro chopo singruok maga e nyim joma oluori .
19022027	Joma odhier biro chiemo mi yieng’ ; joma manyo Jehova biro pake-mad chunjeu bed mangima nyaka chieng’ !
19022028	Tunge piny duto biro paro miduog ir Jehova , kendo dhout ogendini duto biro kulore e nyime ,
19022029	Nikech loch en mar Jehova kendo en ema olocho ewi ogendini .
19022030	Jomwandu duto manie piny biro chiemo kendo lemo ; ji duto madhi piny e lowo biro kulore e nyime-jogo maok nyal siko kangima .
19022031	Pon mabiro ibiro nyis kuom Ruoth .
19022032	Gibiro hulo timne makare ne ji mapok onyuol-nikech osetime .
19023001	Jehova e jakwadha , ok anachand gimoro .
19023002	Omiyo anindo e lum mang’ich , otelona e geng pige mokuwe ,
19023003	oduogo chunya . Otaya e yore mag tim makare mondo nyinge oyud duong’ .
19023004	Kata bed ni awuotho e holo mar tipo mar tho , to ok analuor gimoro marach , nimar in koda ; ludhi gi mikwachi-gin ema gihoya .
19023005	Iiko mesa e nyima ka wasika neno . Iwiro wiya gi mo ; okombena opong’ moo oko .
19023006	Adier , ber gi hera biro siko ka luwo bang’a ndalo duto mag ngimana , kendo abiro dak e od Jehova nyaka chieng’ .
19024001	Piny en mar Jehova , kaachiel gi gik moko duto manie iye , piny kod ji duto modakie ;
19024002	nikech ne omiye obetie ewi nembe kendo nogure ewi pige .
19024003	En ng’a manyalo idho god Jehova ? En ng’a manyalo chung’ kare maler ?
19024004	Ng’at man gi lwedo maler gi chuny maler , maok ting’ chunye ne nyasaye ma dhano oloso kata kuong’re gi miriambo .
19024005	Obiro yudo gweth kuom Jehova kod ber moa kuom Nyasaye ma Jawarne .
19024006	Kamano e kaka tieng’ mar joma dware chalo , ma manyo wang’i , Yaye Nyasach Jakobo .
19024007	Ting’uru wiyeu malo , Yaye un dhorangeye ; ting’reuru malo , Yaye dhoudi machon , mondo Ruodh duong’ odonji .
19024008	Ruodh Duong’ni to en ng’a ? Jehova Maratego kendo manyalo , Jehova maloyo lweny .
19024009	Ting’uru wiyeu malo , Yaye un dhora ngeye ; ting’giuru malo , un dhoudi machon , mondo Ruodh duong’ odonji .
19024010	Ruodh duong’ni en ng’a ? Jehova Manyalo Gik Moko Duto-En e Ruodh Duong’ .
19025001	Ating’o chunya malo ne in , Yaye Jehova ;
19025002	In ema ageno kuomi , Yaye Nyasacha . Kik iwe ane wichkuot , kata iyie wasika loya .
19025003	Onge ng’ama genone nikuomi manyalo neno wichkuot , to joma timo timbe ma achach kayiem ema biro neno wichkuot .
19025004	Nyisa yoreni , Yaye Jehova , puonja rodegi ;
19025005	taya e adierani , kendo puonja , nikech in Nyasaye ma Jawarna , kendo genona nikuomi odiechieng’ duto .
19025006	Par , Yaye Jehova , kechni maduong’ gi herani , nikech gisebedo ka gintie nyaka aa chon .
19025007	Kik ipar richo mane atimo kapod atin kod yorega mag ng’anyo ; para kaluwore gi herani , nikech iber , Yaye Jehova .
19025008	Jehova ber kendo yorege oriere tir ; mano emomiyo opuonjo joricho e yorege .
19025009	Otayo joma muol e gima nikare kendo opuonjogi yore .
19025010	Yore duto mag Jehova opong’ gi hera kod adiera ne joma rito dwaro duto mag singruokne .
19025011	Nikech nyingi , Yaye Jehova , wena kethona kata obedo ni oduong’ ahinya .
19025012	Koro en ng’a moluoro Jehova ? Obiro puonje luwo yo moyierne .
19025013	Obiro dak e nyima momew , kendo nyikwaye nokaw piny kaka girkeni margi .
19025014	Jehova en osiep joma oluore ; omiyo singruok mare ng’ere negi .
19025015	Wengena osiko kuom Jehova , nikech en kende ema obiro golo tiendena mamoko e obadho .
19025016	Lokri ira kendo bedna mang’won , nikech adong’ kenda kendo awinjo marach .
19025017	Chandruok manie chunya osemedore ; resa kuom rem ma an go .
19025018	Rang pek manie chunya kod rem ma an go , kendo gol richona duto .
19025019	Neye kaka wasika osemedore kendo kaka gichaya gi gero !
19025020	Rit ngimana kendo iresa ; kik iwe ane wichkuot , nikech in ema apondo kuomi .
19025021	Mad bidhruok gi ngima moriere rita nikech genona nikuomi .
19025022	War Israel , Yaye Nyasaye kuom chandruok mage duto !
19026001	Ng’adna bura kare , Yaye Jehova , nikech e ngimana duto asedak ka aonge ketho ; asedak ka ageno kuom Jehova maok adigni .
19026002	Nona , Yaye Jehova , tema , non chunya gi pacha ;
19026003	nikech herani osiko kanie nyima seche duto , kendo asiko awuotho e adierani .
19026004	Ok abed piny gi joma wuondore bende ok ariwra gi joma ketore .
19026005	Achayo chokruok mar joma timo gik maricho kendo atamora mar bet piny gi joricho .
19026006	Aluoko lwetena kaka ng’ama onge ketho , eka amulo tijegi e hekalu mari , Yaye Jehova ,
19026007	ka alando pakni gi duol maduong’ , kendo anyiso timbeni duto miwuoro .
19026008	Ahero ot kama idakie , Yaye Jehova , kama duong’ni nitie .
19026009	Kik ikaw chunya kaachiel gi joricho , kik ikaw ngimana kod joma rich chwero remo omako ,
19026010	joma lwetegi oting’o chenro maricho ma lwetegi makorachwich asoya opong’o .
19026011	To an adak e ngima maonge ketho ; yie iwara kendo ikecha .
19026012	Tiendena onyono kama opie ; e chokruok mang’ongo abiro pako Jehova .
19027001	Jehova e lerna kendo en e warruokna ; en ng’a ma daluor ? Jehova e kama ngimana oponde . En ng’a ma dibuoga ?
19027002	Ka joma richo lawa mondo gingam ringra , ka wasika kod joma kedo koda monja , to gibiro kier mi gipodhi .
19027003	Kata ka jolweny ogoyona ageng’a , to chunya ok bi luor ; kata ka lweny otu-gorena , to pod abiro mana bedo gi chir .
19027004	Gimoro achiel ema akwayo Jehova , ma e gima adwaro moloyo ; ni mondo adag e od Jehova ndalo duto mag ngimana , mondo achom wang’a kuom ber mar Jehova kendo amanye e hekalu mare .
19027005	Nikech chieng’ ma chandruok omaka obiro kana maber e kar dakne ; obiro panda e kar pondo mar hembe maler kendo obiro keta piny malo ewi lwanda .
19027006	Eka wiya biro bedo matin ka ayombo wasigu duto molwora ; abiro timo misango mar pak ka akok gimor e hembe maler . Abiro wer kendo abiro loso wende mamit ne Jehova .
19027007	Winj duonda ka aluongo , Yaye Jehova ; kecha kendo idwoka .
19027008	Chunya wuoyo kuomi kawacho ni , " Many wang’e ! " Wang’i , Yaye Jehova , ema abiro manyo .
19027009	Kik ipandna wang’i , kik iriemb jatichni ka mirima omaki , in ema isebedo jakonyna . Kik idaga kata ijwang’a , Yaye Nyasaye Jawarna .
19027010	Kata obedo ni wuonwa gi minwa ojwang’a to Jehova biro rwaka .
19027011	Puonja yori , Yaye Jehova ; telna eyo moriere tir nikech joma sanda .
19027012	Kik ijwang’a ne dwach wasika , nikech joneno mag miriambo oramona matek , ka giyueyona hinyruok .
19027013	To pod aramo e wachni : pod abiro neno ber Jehova e piny joma ngima .
19027014	Rit Jehova ; bed motegno kendo jiw chunyi kendo rit Jehova .
19028001	In ema aluongi , Yaye Jehova Lwandana ; kik idinna iti . Nikech ka isiko iling’ aling’a , to abiro chalo gi joma osedhi e bur .
19028002	Winj ywakna mondo ikecha e sama aluongi modo ikonya , e sama ating’o bedena malo kochomo kari Maler Mogik .
19028003	Kik iywaya oko gi joma richo , gi joma timo gik maricho , ma wuoyo gi kuwe gi jowetegi to opando sigu e chunygi .
19028004	Chulgi kuom timbegi maricho kendo kuom tijegi maricho ; chulgi kuom gik ma lwetegi osetimo kendo dwok kuomgi gik mowinjore gi timbegi .
19028005	Nikech ok gidew tije mag Jehova kod gik ma lwetene osetimo , obiro mukogi mi ogogi piny kendo ok nochak ogergi mi gichung’ kendo .
19028006	Jehova mondo opaki nikech osewinjo ywakna ma akwayogo kony .
19028007	Jehova e tekra kendo en e okumbana ; chunya ogeno kuome kendo ayudo kony kuome . Chunya gwecho gi mor kendo abiro goyone erokamano gi wer .
19028008	Jehova e tekre joge , en ohinga mar resruok ne ng’ate mowir .
19028009	Res jogi kendo gwedh girkeni mari ; bed jakwadhgi kendo ting’gi malo nyaka chieng’ .
19029001	Chiwneuru Jehova , Yaye un joroteke , chiwneuru Jehova duong’ gi teko .
19029002	Chiwneuru Jehova duong’ mowinjore gi nyinge ; lamuru Jehova e dier lerne mang’ang’ni .
19029003	Dwond Jehova nie wi pige ; Nyasaye mar duong’ mor kaka mor polo , Jehova mor ewi pige madongo .
19029004	Dwond Jehova nigi teko , dwond Jehova nigi duong’ .
19029005	Dwond Jehova muko bepe mag sida , Jehova chodo bepe mag sida mag Lebanon matindo tindo .
19029006	Omiyo Lebanon chikore ka nyaroya , Got Hemon leng’ore ka rwadh bungu mapod tin .
19029007	Dwond Jehova chweto , ochweto gi ler mager mar mil polo
19029008	Dwond Jehova yiengo piny motimo ongoro ; Jehova yiengo ongoro mar Kadesh .
19029009	Dwond Jehova dolo bepe mag dubu kendo pielo bungu piny mi dong’ nono kendo ei hekalu mare ji duto kok ni , " Duong’ ! "
19029010	Jehova obetekom loch mare ewi ataro ; Jehova obetekom loch kaka Ruoth nyaka chieng’ .
19029011	Jehova miyo joge teko ; Jehova gwedho joge gi kuwe .
19030001	Abiro dhiali , Yaye Jehova , nikech ne igola oko e bur matut kendo ne ok iyiene wasika mondo obed mamor kuoma .
19030002	
19030003	Yaye Jehova Nyasacha , ne aluongi mondo ikonya kendo ne ichanga .
19030004	Yaye Jehova , ne igola oko e liel , ne iresa ka noyudo aridora piny e bur matut .
19030005	Werneuru Jehova , un joge maler ; pakuru nyinge maler .
19030006	Nikech mirimbe bedo mana kuom kinde matin kende , to ng’wonone to siko nyaka chieng’ .
19030007	Kane agalo ni adhi maber , ne awacho ni , " Onge gima biro bwoga . "
19030008	Yaye Jehova , kane itimona ng’wono , ne imiyo goda ochung’ motegno ; to kane ipando wang’i , to piny nochama .
19030009	In emane aluongi , Yaye Jehova ; Jehova emane aywakne mondo okecha .
19030010	" Ohala mane ma thona biro kelo , dhi mara e liel biro konyi gang’o ? Lo bende nyalo paki adier ? Be dohul adierani adier ?
19030011	Winja , Yaye Jehova , kendo kecha ; Yaye Jehova bed konyruok mara . "
19030012	Ne iloko nduru mane agoyo olokore miel ; ne igolo lawa mar kuyo mi irwakona mor ,
19030013	mondo chunya owerni kendo kik oling’ . Yaye Jehova Nyasacha , abiro goyoni erokamano nyaka chieng’ .
19031001	Kuomi , Yaye Jehova , ema aponde , kik iwe mondo ane wichkuot ; resa kuom tim makare mari .
19031002	
19031003	Lok iti ira , bi piyo mondo ikonya ; bed lwandana ma aponde , ohinga motegno manyalo resa .
19031004	Kaka in lwandana kendo ohingana , telna kendo itaya nikech nyingi .
19031005	Gola oko e obadho mochikna nikech in e kar pondona .
19031006	Achiwo chunya e lweti ; resa , Yaye Jehova , Nyasaye mar adiera .
19031007	Asin gi joma otwere gi nyiseche manono ma dhano oloso ; ageno kuom Jehova .
19031008	Abiro bedo mamor kendo moil kuom herani , nikech ne ineno chandruokna , kendo ne ing’eyo lit mar chunya .
19031009	Ok iseketa e lwet jasigu to iseguro tiendena kama lach .
19031010	Kecha , Yaye Jehova , nikech chunya winjo marach ; wengena kuyo kendo chunya gi ringra bende nigi lit .
19031011	Ngimana rem chamo kendo higni maga opong’ gi chur ; tekona rumo nikech pek ma an go kendo chokena doko mayomyom .
19031012	Nikech wasigu olwora mang’eny , jobuta koro ochaya gi chunygi ; alich koda ka ne osiepena kendo joma onena e wang’ yo ringa .
19031013	Wigi owil koda mana kagima ne asetho chon koro achalo mana gi agulu motore .
19031014	Nikech awinjo ayany mang’eny ma ji yanyago , nitie bwok e alworana koni gi koni ; gikuodho kaka digitimna marach kendo gichano mar kawo ngimana .
19031015	To ageno kuomi , Yaye Jehova ; awacho ni , " In e Nyasacha . "
19031016	Ndalona nie lweti ; resa e lwet wasika kendo kuom joma lawa .
19031017	Mad wang’i rieny kuom jatichni ; resa gi herani maok rem .
19031018	Kik iwe wiya kuodi , Yaye Jehova , nikech aywagorani ; to we joma timbegi richo one wichkuot kendo ginindi ka giling’ thi ei liel .
19031019	Mi dhogi mariambo mondo oling’ ; nikech sungagi kod chuny marach ma gin go omiyo giwuoyo gi wichteko kuom joma kare .
19031020	Mano kaka berni duong’ , ber mikano ne joma oluori , mimiyo joma opondo kuomi ka ji duto neno .
19031021	Ipandogi ne chenro maricho mag ji ka in iwuon ibedo butgi kaka kar pondo margi ; iritogi maber e kar dak mari kuom lep mahangogi .
19031022	Pak odog ne Jehova , nikech ne onyisa herane maduong’ kane an e dala ma wasigu ogoyona ageng’a .
19031023	Kane achiedhnade omaka to ne awacho ni , " Opoga kodi ! " Kata kamano ne iwinja ka ayuakni mondo ikecha kane aluongi mondo ikonya .
19031024	Heruru Jehova un joge maler duto ! Jehova rito ngima joma jo adiera , to josunga to ochulo moromo chuth .
19031025	Beduru motegno kendo jiwuru chunyu , un duto mugeno kuom Jehova .
19032001	Ogwedh ng’at ma kethone owene , ma richone oum .
19032002	Ogwedh ng’at ma richone Jehova ok kwan ni mage kendo ma wuondruok onge chunye .
19032003	Kane aling’ to chokena ne ochiyore kane achur odiechieng’ duto ma ok ayue .
19032004	Nikech odiechieng’ gotieno lweti ne pek kuoma ; tekrena ne oduono mana kaka timorega e liet mar ndalo oro . Sela
19032005	Eka ne anyisi richona kendo ne ok apando ketho chik maga . Ne awacho ni , " Abiro hulo ketho chik maga ne Jehova-kendo " ne iweyona ketho mane richona okelo . Sela
19032006	Kuom mano , owinjore ji duto moluoro Nyasaye olami kapod inyalo yudi ; adier , ka pige madongo otugore , to ok gibi chopo ire ,
19032007	In e kar pondona ; ibiro rita e chandruok kendo ibiro lwora gi wende mag loch . Sela
19032008	Abiro tiegi kendo puonji e yo mon-ego ilu ; abiro ng’adoni rieko kendo abiro rangi maber .
19032009	Kik ichal gi farese kata gi nyumbu , maonge gi rieko manyaka chiki mana ka otwe dhoge kendo iywayo gi kamba , nono to ok gibi buti .
19032010	Lit mochomo joma timbegi richo ng’eny , to hera maok rem mar Jehova olworo ng’at mogeno kuome .
19032011	Beduru moil kuom Jehova , kendo beduru mamor , un joma kare ; weruru , un duto ma urieru tir gie chunyu !
19033001	Weruru gimor ne Jehova , un joma kare ; en gima owinjore mondo joma oriere tir opake .
19033002	Pakuru Jehova gi nyatiti ; losneuru wer mamit e gir wer man gi tonde apar .
19033003	Werneuru wer manyien ; nditneuru wer kugoyone gig wer mong’ith kendo gouru koko nikech umor .
19033004	Nikech wach Jehova nikare kendo en adier ; en jaadiera e gik moko duto motimo .
19033005	Jehova ohero tim makare kod ratiro ; piny duto opong’ gi herane ma ok rem .
19033006	Polo ne olosi gi wach Jehova , chwech mang’ang’ni mathoth mokalo akwana manie igi much dhoge ema noloso .
19033007	Ochoko pige mag nembe madongo e tawo ; oketo kut e dere .
19033008	Piny duto mondo oluor Jehova ; ji duto manie e piny mondo okulrene
19033009	Nikech ne owuoyo mipiny obetie , nogolo chik mi ochung’ mongirore .
19033010	Jehova miyo chenro mag pinje bedo nono ; othiro thorro ma ogendini nigo .
19033011	To chenro mag Jehova to siko kochung’ nyaka chieng’ ; ochopo thorro duto manie chunye e tienge duto .
19033012	Ogwedh piny ma Nyasache en Jehova , oganda mane oyiero kaka girkeni mare .
19033013	Jehova ng’iyo piny gie polo kendo oneno dhano duto ;
19033014	ong’iyo ji duto modak e piny gie kar dakne e polo -
19033015	en magero chunje ji duto , kendo manono gik moko duto ma gitimo .
19033016	Onge ker minyalo reso nikech en gi jolweny mang’eny ; bende onge jakedo manyalo tony nikech tekone ng’eny .
19033017	Geno yudo resruok kuom faras en gima nono kata obedo ni en giteko mang’eny to ok onyal reso ng’ato .
19033018	To wenge Jehova nikuom joma oluore , kuom joma geno margi ni kuom herane maok rem ,
19033019	mondo oresgi e tho kendo oritgi gibed mangima e kech .
19033020	Warito Jehova gi geno ; en e konyruokwa kendo okumbawa .
19033021	Chunywa mor kuome , nikech wageno kuom nyinge maler .
19033022	Mad herani maok rem bed kuomwa , Yaye Jehova , mana kaka waketo genowa kuomi .
19034001	Abiro dhialo Jehova kinde duto ; pakne biro siko e dhoga .
19034002	
19034003	Chunya biro sungore kuom Jehova , joma winjo marach mondo owinji kendo obed mamor .
19034004	Miuru Nyasaye duong’ kaachiel koda ; wating’uru nyinge malo kaachiel .
19034005	Ne amanyo Jehova , kendo nodwoka ; ne oresa e luoro maga duto .
19034006	Joma oketo genogi kuome rieny ; onge sa moro amora ma lela wengegi nyiso ni wigi okuot .
19034007	Ng’at ma jadhierni noluong o , kendo Jehova nowinje ; ne orese mogole e chandruok mage duto .
19034008	Malaika mar Jehova oumo alwora mar joma oluore kendo oresogi .
19034009	Bil mi ine ni Jehova ber ; ng’at mapondo kuome ogwedhi .
19034010	Luor Jehova , un joge maler , nikech joma oluore ok chand gimoro amora .
19034011	Sibuoche nyalo ol kendo kech nyalo kayogi , to joma manyo Jehova ok ochando gima ber moro amora .
19034012	Biuru nyithinda winjauru . Abiro puonjou luoro Jehova .
19034013	Ng’ato ang’ata kuomu mohero ngima kendo magombo neno ndalo mang’eny mabeyo ,
19034014	mondo ogeng’ lewe kik tim gima rach kendo otam dhoge kik wach miriambo .
19034015	Lokri iwe richo kendo itim maber ; many kuwe kendo ilawe matek .
19034016	Wenge Jehova ni kuom joma kare kendo itene winjo ywakgi ;
19034017	wang’ Jehova ger gi joma timo gima rach , kendo omiyo wich wil kodgi e piny .
19034018	Joma kare ywagore kendo Nyasaye winjogi ; oresogi e chandruokgi duto .
19034019	Jehova ni machiegni gi joma chunygi otur kendo owaro joma chunygi muol .
19034020	Ng’at makare nyalo bedo gi chandruok mang’eny , to Jehova rese kuom-gi duto ;
19034021	orito chokene duto , ma kata achiel kuomgi ok notur .
19034022	Timbe maricho biro nego ng’ama timbene richo , to joma kedo gi joma kare bura biro loyo .
19034023	Jehova reso jotichne ; onge ng’ato kata achiel mopondo kuome ma bura biro loyo .
19035001	Kedi , Yaye Jehova , gi joma kedo koda ; gori gi joma goya .
19035002	Kaw kuot gi okumba ; aa malo mondo ibi ikonya .
19035003	Mil tong’ gi chuma madhoge bith mar kedo ibuoggo joma lawa . Wach ne chunya ni , " An e warruokni . "
19035004	Mad joma dwaro kawo ngimana ne wichkuot gi achaya . Mad joma chanona hinyruok , chunygi aa mi gigom gidogi .
19035005	Mad gichal gi mihudhwe ma yamo tero , ka malaika mar Jehova riembogi mabor ;
19035006	mad yore ma giluwo lil ti kendo bed makier-kier ka malaika mar Jehova lawogi .
19035007	Nikech gichikona gogo margi kayiem kendo gikunyona bur kayiem ;
19035008	mad kethruok jukgi apoya ka gikiamad gogo ma gisechiko gajgi ; mad gilwar ei bur ma kargi lal nono .
19035009	Eka chunya noil kuom Jehova kendo nomor kuom warruokne .
19035010	An duto , ringra gi chunya , anahul ni , " En ng’a machalo kodi , Yaye Jehova . " Ireso jodhier e lwet joma nigi teko moloyogi , Adier , ikonyo jodhier gi jochan kuom joma mayogi .
19035011	Joneno ma wengegi tek sudo nyime ; gipenja kuom gik ma akiya gimoro amora kuomgi .
19035012	Gichula rach kar ber , kendo giweyo chunya kochwanyore .
19035013	To eka ginto kane gituo gihewore to ne arwako law ywak kendo ne abolora atweyo chiemo . Ka lamona noduogona maok oduoki ,
19035014	ne awuotho koni gi koni ka chunya lit mana kagima aywago osiepna kata owadwa .
19035015	To kane achwanyora , ne gichokore kaachiel gi mor ; jomonjo nochokorena sama akiya ne gisiko ka giketho nyinga .
19035016	Kaka ne ok giluoro Nyasaye , ne gijara ka gichano timona marach , ne gikayona lekegi .
19035017	Yaye Ruoth , ibiro siko kineno gigi nyaka karang’o ? Res ngimana kuom kethruok duto mag-gi . Akwayi ni ires ngimana ma nengone tek e lwet sibuochegi .
19035018	Abiro goyoni erokamano e chokruok maduong’ ; abiro paki e dier oganda maduong’mochokore kaachiel .
19035019	Kik iyiene jogo osungre ni gisenyala , joma obedo wasika maonge gima omiyo ; kik iyie joma ochaya maonge gimoro sigre gi wengegi mar timona marach .
19035020	Ok giwuo gi kuwe , to gichano neno mag miriambo kuom joma odak mos e piny .
19035021	Giyawona dhogi maduong’ kendo giwacho ni , " Haa ! Haa ! Wasenene gi wengewa wawegi . "
19035022	Yaye Jehova , iseneno gini ; kik iling’ . Kik ibed koda mabor , Yaye Jehova .
19035023	Aa malo , kendo chungi mondo ikonya ! Kedna , Yaye Nyasacha kendo Ruodha .
19035024	Yala kichwaka kuom timni makare , Yaye Jehova Nyasacha ; kik iyienegi gisungre ni gisenyala .
19035025	Kik iwe giwach e chunygi ni , " Ero , otimorene mana kaka ne wadwaro . " Kata giwach ni , " koro wasemuonye ngili . "
19035026	Mad ji duto mamor nikech chandruokna one wichkuot kendo pachgi olal ; mad joma kaworena orwaknegi wichkuot gi achaya .
19035027	Mad joma mor kuom chwak michwakago okog gi ilo kod mor ; mad gisik ka giwacho kinde duto ni , " Jehova mondo oting’ malo en ma omor gi dhi maber mar jatichne . "
19035028	Lewa biro loso kuom timni makare kendo kuom pakni duto odiechieng’ duto .
19036001	Ote moro nie chunya kuom richo ma ng’ama timbene richo timo : Ok oluoro Nyasaye ; wang’e tek .
19036002	
19036003	Nikech chunye wuonde kendo owuondore kende , chunye wuonde asasa maok onyal neno kata chayo richone .
19036004	Weche mawuok e dhoge richo kendo gin wuond ; oseweyo bedo mariek kod timo maber .
19036005	Kata e otandane ochano timo gima rach ; oketore mar luwo yor richo kendo ok otamre gima rach .
19036006	Herani chopo e polo , Yaye Nyasaye ; adierani chopo nyaka ewi lwasi
19036007	Timni makare chalo gi gode madongo , ratiro mari chalo gi kut mang’ongo . Yaye Jehova , in ema irito ngima dhano gi le
19036008	Mano kaka herani maok rem nengone duong’ ! Joma idewo kaachiel gi ji ajia yudo kar pondo margi e bwo tipo mar buombeni .
19036009	Gichamo chiemo modhur e udi ka gimor ; imiyogi math moa e aochi mar mor .
19036010	Nimar in ema in gi soko mar ngima ; e lerni ema wanenoe ler .
19036011	Med hero joma ong’eyi , med nyiso timni makare ne joma oriere tir gie chunygi .
19036012	Mad tiend joma sungore kik nyona , kata lwet joma timbegi richo gola kama antie .
19036013	Neye kaka joma timo gik maricho oriere piny kopodho osebogi piny maok ginyal aa malo !
19037001	Kik chunyi chandre nikech joma richo kata chunyi gomb joma timo gik mariccho ;
19037002	nikech gibiro ner mapiyo mana kaka lum ; gibiro tho mi gilal nono mapiyo mana kaka yiende mang’ich .
19037003	Gen kuom Jehova kendo tim maber . Eka inidag e piny kendo inichiem gi mor e lek maber .
19037004	Bed mamor asasa kuom Jehova eka obiro miyi gik moko duto ma chunyi gombo .
19037005	Ket yori ne Jehova ; gene eka obiro timo kama .
19037006	Obiro miyo timni makare rieny ka ler mar okinyi , ratiro makori bende biro chalo gi wang’ chieng’ ma rieny odiechieng’ tir .
19037007	Bed mos e nyim Jehova , kendo rite kihori mos ; kik chunyi chandre ka ji dhi maber , ka gichopo chenrogi maricho .
19037008	Geng’ mirima kendo lokri iwe ich wang’ kik chunyi chandre-okelo mana rach .
19037009	Nikech joma richo ibiro ng’ad kargi oko , to joma ogeno kuom Jehova piny biro bedo margi .
19037010	Kinde matin nono to joma timbegi richo ok bi betie ; kata ibi imanygi to ok ibi yudogi .
19037011	To joma muol piny biro bedo margi kendo gibiro winjo maber ka gin gi kuwe maduong’ .
19037012	Joma timbegi richo chano timo marach ni joma kare kendo gikayo negi lekegi ;
19037013	to Ruoth nyiero joma timbegi richo , nimar ong’eyo ni odiechieng’-gi biro .
19037014	Joma timbegi richo wuodho liganglagi kendo gidolo atungegi mondo gichiel jodhier gi jochan piny , mondo gineg joma yoregi oriere tir .
19037015	To ligengnigi biro chwoyo adundogi giwegi , kendo atungegi biro tur .
19037016	Gima tin ma ng’at makare nigo ber moloyo mwandu mathoth mag joma timbegi richo ;
19037017	nikech teko mar joma timbegi richo ibiro kethi , to Jehova ting’o ng’at makare malo .
19037018	Ndalo mag joma onge ketho ong’ere ne Jehova , kendo gir keni margi biro siko nyaka chieng’ .
19037019	E kinde mag masira mopore ok gibi ne r , kendo gibiro bedo gi chiemo mathoth ndalo kech .
19037020	To joma timbegi richo biro lal nono : Wasik Jehova biro chalo gi ber mar thiepee manie pap , gibiro lal nono gibiro lal nono kaka iro .
19037021	Joma timbegi richo holo ji gik moko to ok chul , to joma kare to chiwo gi ng’wono ;
19037022	joma Jehova og wedho piny biro bedo margi , to joma okuong’o ibiro ng’ad kargi oko .
19037023	Ka Jehova mor gi yor ng’ato , to omiyo okangege bedo mojing’ ;
19037024	Kata ka ochwanyore to ok obi podho nikech Jehova ting’e malo gi lwete .
19037025	Nyaka aa e tin-na mi koro adoko ng’ama duong’ pok aneno ka joma kare ojwang’ kata ka nyithindgi kwayo ji kuon .
19037026	Kinde duto ging’won kendo giholo ji gigegi nono ; nyithindgi ibiro gwedhi .
19037027	Lokri iwe rach mondo itim maber ; eka inidag e piny nyaka chieng’ .
19037028	Nikech Jehova ohero joma jo ratiro , kendo ok obi jwang’o joge ma jo adiera . Ibiro ritgi maber nyaka chieng’ , to koth joma timbegi richo ibiro ng’ad kargi oko ;
19037029	joma kaare piny biro bedo margi kendo gibiro dak e iye nyaka chieng’ .
19037030	Dho ng’at makare hulo rieko kendo lewe wacho gima ratiro .
19037031	Chik mar Nyasaye nie chunye ; omiyo tiendene ok kier .
19037032	Joma timbegi richo nindo piny karito joma kare ka gidwa tieko ngimagi ;
19037033	to Jehova ok bi weyogi e lwetgi kata yie bura logi sama iyalogi .
19037034	Rit Jehova kendo lu yore . Obiro ting’i malo mi omi piny bed mari ; ka joma richo ong’ad kargi oko to ibiro neno gi wang’i .
19037035	Aseneno ng’ama timbene richo kendo ma kwiny kadhi maber mana ka yien mang’ich moti e lo mowinjore kode .
19037036	To ne okalo kamano piyo piyo nono kendo ne ok ochak onene , kata ne omanye to ne ok nyal yude .
19037037	Par kit ngima joma onge ketho , som chal joma ngimagi oriere , ng’ama ohero kuwe nigi geno mar dak aming’a .
19037038	To joricho duto ibiro tieki , joma timbegi richo ibiro ng’ad ndalog i mabiro .
19037039	Warruok mar joma kare aa kuom Jehova ; en e kar pondo margi e ndalo mar chandruok .
19037040	Jehova konyogi kendo resogi oresogi e lwet joma timbegi richo kendo owarogi , nikech gipondo kuome .
19038001	Yaye Jehova , kik ikwe ra ka iyi owang’ kata ikuma ka mirima mager omaki .
19038002	
19038003	Nikech aserni magi osechwoy a , kendo lweti oselwar kuoma .
19038004	Mirimbi mager osemiyo ringra obedo maonge ngima maber ; chokena ok winj maber nikech richona .
19038005	Ketho ma asekethogo obara ndas mana ka misigo mapek mohinga ting’o .
19038006	Adhondena otimo tutu kendo dung’ marach nikech fupa mar timo richo .
19038007	Adolora kendo adwokora piny chuth odiechieng’ duto , awuotho koni gi koni , ka akuyo .
19038008	Onding’a rama gi rem machicho ; ringra onge gi ngima maber .
19038009	Denda ool kendo tekra orumo chuth ; achur nikech chunya lit .
19038010	Gik ma chunya gombo duto ong’ereni maber , Yaye Jehova ; chur ma achurgo ok opondoni .
19038011	Chunya gwecho , tekra orumo ; wengena otimo mudho .
19038012	Osiepena gi anyuolana badhorena nikech adhondena ; jobuta otang’ koda .
19038013	Joma dwa kawo ngimana ochiko otegogi , joma dwa hinya chano kaka ginyalo tieka chuth . Gichano miriambo odiechieng’ duto .
19038014	Achalo ng’ama ite odino , maok nyal winjo wach , mana ka momo ma ok nyal yawo dhoge ;
19038015	Aselokora koro achalo ng’at ma ok winj wach , ma dhoge ok nyal dwoko wach .
19038016	To in ema ariti , Yaye Jehova , kendo ang’eyo ni ibiro dwoko , Yaye Ruoth Nyasacha .
19038017	Nimar ne awacho ni , " Kik iyienegi gisungre ni gisenyala kata gikawrena ka tienda okier . "
19038018	Nimar achiegni podho , kendo rem ma an-go osiko koda .
19038019	Ahulo kethona ; richona chando chunya
19038020	Wasika moramona ng’eny ndi ; joma ochaya maonge gima omiyo thoth mokalo akwana .
19038021	Joma chulo rach kuom ber ma asetimonegi ketho nyinga ka an to alawo gima ber .
19038022	Yaye Jehova , kik ijwang’a ; kik ibed mabor koda , Yaye Nyasacha .
19038023	Bi piyo mondo ikonya , Yaye Ruoth Jawarna .
19039001	NE AWACHO ni , " Abiro ritora e yorena , kendo abiro rito lewa kik otim richo ; abiro tweyo dhoga gi waya seche duto ma joma timbegi richo ni buta . "
19039002	
19039003	To e seche mane ok awuo kendo aling’ mos , kane ok awach gimoro amora maber , pek manie chunya nomedore .
19039004	Chunya nodoko maliet e iya kendo kane amedo paro , mach noliel ; eka ne ating’o dhoga mi awuoyo :
19039005	" Yaye Jehova , nyisa giko mar ngimana kod kar romb ndalona ; mi ang’e kaka ngimana rumo piyo .
19039006	Iseketo ndalona obedo machiek ka bad dhano ; kar romb higni maga ok gimoro e nyimi , ngima dhano ka dhano en mana muya nono .
19039007	Dhano odich ka wuotho koni gi koni to en mana tipo nono , orikni gi tijene mapile kayiem ; ochoko mwandu mathoth ka ok ong’eyo ng’ama obiro weyonegi .
19039008	" To koro , Yaye Ruoth , en ang’o ma amanyo ? Genona ni kuomi .
19039009	Resa kuom ketho maga duto ; kik imi abedi ng’ama joma ofuwo jaro .
19039010	Ne aling’ thi , kendo ne ok anyal yawo dhoga , nikech in ema isetimo ma .
19039011	Gol chwatni kuoma ; goch ma lweti goyago ohinga .
19039012	Ikwero kendo ikumo ji nikech richogi ; itieko mwandugi mana ka thuth-dhano ka dhano en mana muya nono .
19039013	" Winj lamona , Yaye Jehova , chik iti ne lamona ma adwarogo kony ; kik idin iti ne ywakna , nikech adak kodi mana ka jadak , an mana wendo kaka kwerena duto ne gin .
19039014	We ng’iya , mondo achak abed moil kendo kapok adar aweyo pinyni mi alal e wang’ ji .
19040001	Ne arito Jehova ka ahora mos ; ne olokore ira mi owinjo ywakna .
19040002	
19040003	Ne oywaya oko e bur motimo otodo , ne ogola e chuodho gi thidhya . Ne oguro tiendena e lwanda kendo nomiya kama otegno mondo achungie .
19040004	Ne oketo wer manyien e dhoga , wer mipakogo Nyasachwa . Ji mang’eny biro neno mi bed maluor kendo gibiro keto genogi kuom Jehova .
19040005	Ng’at moketo Jehova geno mare en ng’at mog wedhi , ng’at maok many kony kuom josunga , kata kuom joma lokore mondo olam nyiseche mag miriambo
19040006	Ranyisi misetimo thoth , Yaye Jehova Nyasacha .
19040007	Misengni gi chiwo ne ok ihero to ita ema iseyawo ; misengni miwang’o pep kod chiwo migo l ogo richo ne ok idwaro .
19040008	Eka ne awacho ni , " Era e , asebiroondiki kuoma e Ndiko modol .
19040009	A gombo timo dwarono , Yaye Nyasacha ; chikni ni ei chunya . "
19040010	Alando tim makare e chokru o k maduong’ , ok aumo dhoga , mana kaka ing’eyo , Yaye JEHOVA .
19040011	Ok apando timni makare e chunya ; awuoyo kuom adierani gi warruokni . Ok apando herani gi adierani ne chokruok maduong’ .
19040012	Kik itamri kecha , Yaye Jehova ; mad herani gi adierani osik ka rita .
19040013	Nikech chandruok mokalo akwana olwora ; richoga osejuka kendo ok anyal neno . Ging’eny moloyo yie wiya , kendo chunya onyosore gie iya .
19040014	Bed mamor , Yaye Jehova , mondo iwara . Bi piyo , Yaye Jehova , mondo ikonya .
19040015	Mad ji duto madwaro kawo ngimana wigi okuodi kendo pachgi olal ; mad ji duto ma chunygi gombona tho oriemb odogi ka wigi okuot .
19040016	Mad joma nyiera ni , " Haa ! Haa ! " ng’eng’ ka gineno wichkuot .
19040017	To mad ji duto ma manyi bed moil kendo mamor kuomi ; mad joma ohero warruok mari sik kawacho ni , " Jehova mondo oting’ malo ! "
19040018	Anto adhier kendo achando , mad Ruoth para e . In e jakonyna kendo jawarna ; Yaye Nyasacha , kik ideki .
19041001	Ng’ama paro joma ok nyal en jahawi ; Jehova rese ka chandruok omake .
19041002	
19041003	Jehova biro rite kendo biro miyo obed mangima ; obiro gwedhe e piny kendo ok obi jwang’e e lwet wasike .
19041004	Jehova biro rite e otandane mar tuo kendo obiro miyo oa malo e kitandane ka ohewore .
19041005	Ne awacho ni , " Yaye Jehova , kecha ; changa , nikech asekethoni . "
19041006	Wasika wuoyo kuoma ka chunygi rach koda , ka giwacho ni , " Obiro tho karang’o mondo nyinge olal chuth ? "
19041007	Saa asaya ma ng’ato obiro nena , to owuondore ni owuoyo kuoma maber , to ei chunye to ofwambo weche mondo okethgo nyinga eka oa odhi kendo okeyo wechego ne ji .
19041008	Wasika duto kuotho kaachiel kaka digihinya , chunygi paro gik maricho mogik mondo ohinya , ka giwacho ni ,
19041009	" Tuo marach osekete piny ; ok obi aa malo kendo koa kama oninde . "
19041010	Koda ka osiepna mangita gi del , mane ageno kuome , en mane apogone kuona bende osethirona .
19041011	To in , Yaye Jehova , yie ikecha ; chunga malo , mondo achulgi .
19041012	Ang’eyo ni chunyi mor koda , nimar jasika ok loya .
19041013	Iting’a malo nikech timna makare kendo ichunga e nyimi nyaka chieng’ .
19041014	Opak Jehova , Nyasach Israel , nyaka chieng’ kendo nyaka chieng’ . Amin kendo Amin .
19042001	Mana kaka mwanda gamo yueyo kamanyo kuonde ma pi nitie , e kaka chunya gami , Yaye Nyasaye .
19042002	
19042003	Chunya riyo oloyo mar dwaro Nyasaye . Riyo mar dwaro Nyasaye mangima . Sa mane ma anyalo wuok adhi arom gi Nyasaye ?
19042004	Aseywak mi pi wang’a ochalo chiemba odiechieng’ gotieno , ka ji to wachona odiechieng’ duto ni , " Ere Nyasachi ? "
19042005	Aparo gigi duto sama chunya gombi : kaka ne ajadhiga gi oganda maduong’ ka atelone ji moruowo kadhi e od Nyasaye . Ka akok gimor kendo agoyo erokamano E dier oganda maduong’ matimo nyasi gi mor .
19042006	Ang’o momiyo inyosori , Yaye chunya ? Ang’o momiyo ibuok gie iya ? Ket geno mari kuom Nyasaye , Nikech pod abiro pake , kaka Jaw a rna kendo Nyasacha .
19042007	Chunya onyosore gie iya ; Omiyo abiro pari gie piny mar Jordan , gie kuonde moting’ore mar Harmon , gie wi got Mizar .
19042008	Kut luongore gi kut ei aburu ru mamor ; apaka magi duto gi ahiti mager oseywera motera .
19042009	Nyasaye chiko herane godiechieng’ to gotieno to wende nie iya ; lamo ma alamogo Nyasach ngimana .
19042010	Awacho ne Nyasaye ma lwandana ni , " Ang’o momiyowiyi osewil koda Ang’o momiyo asiko gi kuyo Ka jasigu sanda ? "
19042011	Chokena tho omako kendo rama malit seche ma joma kedo koda yanya kochaya , ka giwachona odiechieng’ duto ni , " Ere Nyasachi ? "
19042012	Ang’o momiyo inyosori , Yaye chunya ? Ang’o momiyo ibuok gie iya ? Ket genoni kuom Nyasaye , nikech pod abiro pake , ni Jawarna kendo Nyasacha .
19043001	Ng’adna bura kare , Yaye Nyasaye , kendo chwaka e piny mokia Nyasaye ; resa e lwet joma wuondore kod joma timbegi richo .
19043002	In Nyasaye ma apondo kuome . Koro to ijwang’a nang’o ? Ang’o momiyo nyaka asik ka akuyo , ka jasigu sanda ?
19043003	Or ler mari kod adierani , ornagi mondo gitaya ; yie mondo gikela nyaka godi maler , nyaka kama idakie .
19043004	Eka anadhi kama ler mar Nyasaye , nyaka ir Nyasaye , ma en ilo mara kendo mor mara . Abiro paki gi nyatiti , Yaye Nyasaye kendo Nyasacha .
19043005	Ang’o momiyo inyosori , Yaye chunya ? Ang’o momiyo ibuok gie iya ? Ket geno mari kuom Nyasaye , nikech pod abiro pake ni Jawarna kendo Nyasacha .
19044001	Yaye Nyasaye , wasewinjo gi itwa ; kendo wuonewa osenyisowa gik mane itimo e ndalogi , ndalo machon gilala .
19044002	
19044003	Ne iriembo ogendini gi lweti iwuon kendo ne iguro kwe r ewa kargi ; ne itieko ogendini mi imiyo kwerewa okar .
19044004	Ne ok giloyo piny gi liganglagi kendo kata bedegi bende ne ok okelo negi loch ; to lweti makorachwich , badi iwuon , kod ler mar wang’i ema nomiyo gilocho nimar ne iherogi .
19044005	In e Ruodha kendo Nyasacha , magolo chik mondo Jakobo olochi .
19044006	Wasiro wasikwa nikech in , wanyono joma kedo kodwa kuom nyingi .
19044007	Atung’ mara ok ageno kuome , liganglana be ok mi alochi ;
19044008	to in ema imiyowa loch ewi wasikwa , imiyo joma kedo ko dwa neno wichkuot .
19044009	Sungawa ni kuom Nyasaye odiechieng’ duto kendo wabiro pako nyingi nyaka chieng’ . Sela
19044010	To koro isedagiwa kendo isedwokowa piny ; tinde ok idhi e kedo gi jolwenjwa .
19044011	Ne imiyo wang’wel e nyim wasigu kendo joma kedo kodwa oseyakowa .
19044012	Ne ijwang’owa mondo ongamwa ka rombe kendo isekeyowa e dier pinje .
19044013	Ne iuso jogi nono li , maonge ohala mane iyudo kuom usogi .
19044014	Isemiyo wadoko joma iyanyo e dier joma odak butwa , wan joma inyiero kendo ma ocha gi joma olworowa
19044015	Isemiyo olokwa ngero e dier ogendini , kendo ogendini kino wigi konenowa .
19044016	Wichkuot mara osiko neno e wang’a odiechieng’ duto , kendo lela wang’a wichkuot oumo .
19044017	Seche ma joma ochaya kendo yanya dirona weche , nikech jasigu oramo ni nyaka ochul kuor .
19044018	Magi duto notimorena , kata obedo ni wiwa ne pok owil kodi , kata riambo ne singruok mari .
19044019	Chunywa ne pok oa moweyi ; kendo tiendewa ne pok okier moweyo yori .
19044020	To podne igoyowa agoya mimiyo o n d i eg bungu olaw owa kendo ne iumowa gi mudho mandiwa .
19044021	Ka dipo ni wiwa nosewil gi Nyasachwa kata ni ne waseyaro lwetwa ne nyasaye moro mawendo ,
19044022	donge Nyasaye dine ofwenyo wachn o , nikech ong’eyo gik maling’ling’ manie chuny ?
19044023	To eka tho ochomowa tir odiechieng’ duto nikech in ; kendo ikwanowa kaka rombo midwa yang’o .
19044024	Chiew , Yaye Ruoth ! Inindo nang’o ? Yaw wang’i inen ! Kik ikwedwa nyaka chieng’
19044025	Ipando wang’i nang’o koso wiyi owil gi pekwa kod dich modiwago nang’o ?
19044026	Osedwokwa piny nyaka e buru , dendwa omoko piny e lo .
19044027	Aa malo mondo ikonywa ; reswa nikech herani maok rem .
19045001	CHUNYA thoro bedo mamor gi thorro ma jaber gido sama aolo Zabur maga ne Ruoth ; lewa chalo kalamb jandiko mong’ith .
19045002	
19045003	In ema iber mogik e dier chwo kendo dhogi owir gi ng’wono , nikech Nyasaye osegwedhi nyaka chieng’
19045004	Twe liganglani e bathi , Yaye ng’at maratego ; rwakri gi ler kod duong’ .
19045005	E duong’ni nyisri aya n ga kaka jaloyo mochung’ ne adiera gi muolo kod tim makare ; we lweti makorachwich onyis timbeni miwuoro .
19045006	Atungegi mabitho mondo ochwo chunje mag wasik ruoth ; ogendini mondo opodh piny e bwoyi .
19045007	Yaye Nyasaye , kom duong’ni biro siko nyaka chieng’ ; manyaka chieng’ osimbo mar adiera ema biro bedo osimbo mar pinyruodhi .
19045008	Ihero tim makare kendo ok idwar timbe maricho ; emomiyo Nyasaye , ma Nyasachi , oseketi malo moyo mbo joweteni kuom wiri gi mo mar mor .
19045009	Lepi maboyo duto dung’ tik manemane gi poda kod dalasini ; moa e ute ruodhi molichi gi lak liech . Wende mindito gi gig wer miyi mor .
19045010	Nyi ruodhi nie kanyakla mag mondi moluor ; mikach ruoth nie bathi ko rachich korwa kore gi dhahabu mogol Ofir .
19045011	Winji nyar wegi , bed mos , kendo chik iti : Gol pachi kuom jou kaachiel gi jood wuoru monywoli .
19045012	Berni otoyo ruoth ; miye duong’ , nikech en ruodhi .
19045013	Nyar Turo biro biro gi mich , joma nigi mwandu biro dwaro kony kuomi .
19045014	Duong’ olworo ruoth madhako koni gi koni e kar dakne ; law abola mare oton-oton gi dhahabu .
19045015	Omake itere ne ruoth gi law mochue gi usi ; nyiri masilili man kode luwo bang’e kendo ikelonigi .
19045016	Irwakogi e ot gi ilo kod mor maduong’ ; gidonjo e dala ruoth .
19045017	Yawuoti biro kawo kar wuonegi ; ibiro ketogi ruodhi e piny duto koni gi koni .
19045018	Abiro miyo ji pari e tienge duto nyaka chieng’ ; kuom mano ogendini biro paki nyaka chieng’ ma nyaka chieng’ .
19046001	Nyasaye e kar opondowa kod tekowa , en konyruok man kodwa seche tee .
19046002	
19046003	Emomiyo ok wabi luor , kata bed ni piny okethore kendo gode mukore e chuny nam ,
19046004	Kata bed ni pige manie nam wuo kendo golo buoyo kendo gode yiengni kendo dhuolore . Sela
19046005	Nitie aora moro mapigege kelo mor e dala Nyasaye , e dala maler kama En Man Malo Mogik odakie .
19046006	Nyasaye odak e iye omiyo ok obi podho ; Nyasaye biro konye ka piny oyawore .
19046007	Ogendini nigi chandruok , kendo pinje ruodhi podho ; oting’o duonde mi piny leny nono .
19046008	Jehova Manyalo Gik Moko Duto ni kodwa ; Nyasach Jakobo e ohingawa .
19046009	Biuru uneye tije Jehova , bi uneye kethruok mosekelo e piny .
19046010	Omiyo lwenje rumo e tung’ piny koni gi koni ; oturo atung’ kendo ochodo tong’ matindo-tindo , bende owang’o kuodi gi mach .
19046011	" Bed mos , kendo ng’e ni an Nyasaye ; ogendini biro miya duong’ ; piny duto biro miya duong’ . "
19046012	Jehova Manyalo Gik Moko Duto ni kodwa ; Nyasach Jakobo e ohingawa .
19047001	Pamuru lweteu , un ogendini duto gouru koko ne Nyasaye gi ywagruok manyiso ni umor
19047002	
19047003	Mano kaka Jehova Man Malo Mogik lich en Ruoth Maduong’ man gi loch e piny duto !
19047004	Ne oloyonwa ogendini mi gibet e bwowa , ji nopodho piny e tiendewa .
19047005	Ne oyieronwa girkeni marwa , gik mabeyo mogik ne Jakobo mane ohero . Sela
19047006	Nyasaye oseidho malo ka ji kokne gi mor . Jehova oseting’ malo ka dwond turumbete ywak .
19047007	Weruru wende pak ne Nyasaye , weruru wende pak ; weruru wende pak ne Ruodhwa , weruru wende pak .
19047008	Nikech Nyasaye en Ruodh piny duto , werneuru zaburi mar pak .
19047009	Nyasaye nigi loch ewi ogendini ; Nyasaye obet piny e kom lochne maler .
19047010	Jotend ogendini ochokore kaachiel kaka jo Nyasach Ibrahim , nikech ruodhi mag piny gin mag Nyasaye ;
19048001	Jehova duong’ adier , kendo owinjore chuth gi pak , e dala maduong’ mar Nyasachwa , ma en gode maler .
19048002	
19048003	Oting’ore malo kendo ober neno omiyo piny duto bedo mamor . Got Sayun chalo gi kama oting’ore malo mar Zafon , ma en dala maduong’ mar Ruoth Maduong’ .
19048004	Nyasaye nitiere e dalane mochiel motegno kendo osenyisore ni en e ohingane .
19048005	Ka ruodhi noriwo tekregi kanyakla , kane giwuokne oko kaachiel ,
19048006	ne gineno mi gibuok ; kendo ne giringo gia ka luoro omakogi
19048007	Dendgi nochako tetni kanyo kendo ne gibedo gi rem machalo gi muoch ma kayo dhako .
19048008	Ne iturogi matindo tindo ka mende mag Tarsis ma yamb ugwe ong’injo .
19048009	Mana kaka wasewinjo e kaka waseneno gi wengewa e dala maduong’ mar Jehova Manyalo Duto , e dala mar Nyasachwa : Nyasaye oselose kama dak berie nyaka chieng’ .
19048010	Ei hekalu mari , Yaye Nyasaye , ema wabetie ka waparo kuom herani ma ok rem .
19048011	Mana kaka nyingi , Yaye Nyasaye , e kaka pakni bende chopo nyaka tung’ piny ; lweti makorachwich opong’ gi tim makare .
19048012	Got Sayun oil , kendo mier mag Juda nigi mor nikech iyalo ji maber .
19048013	Wuothi ei Sayun , luorri e iye koni gi koni , kwan osuche duto ,
19048014	par maber kuom ohinga mage , ng’i ute ruodhi mage aming’a , mondo ibi inyis tienge mabiro kuomgi .
19048015	Nikech Nyasaye en Nyasachwa nyaka chieng’ ma nyaka chieng’ obiro bedo jatichwa nyaka chop giko ndalowa e piny .
19049001	Winjuru wachni , un ji duto : chikuru itu , un duto mudak e pinyni ,
19049002	
19049003	un ji ajia kod joma idew , jomwandu gi jodhier machalre :
19049004	Dhoga biro wacho weche mag rieko , weche moa e chunya biro miyo ji winjo tiend weche .
19049005	Abiro chiko ita ne ngero moro ; abiro nyiso tiend midhiero mara ka andito nyatitina :
19049006	En ng’a monego aluor ka ndalo mag richo obiro , ka jo miriambo ma timbegi richo olwora -
19049007	Joma ogeno mwandugi kendo masungore kuom mwandugi mathoth ?
19049008	Onge ng’ama nyalo waro ngima nyawadgi kata manyalo chulo Nyasaye nengo moromo ware .
19049009	Nikech yor waro dhano tek sidang’ , ma onge nengo madichul marom -
19049010	ma dimi odag nyaka chieng’ kendo kik odhi e liel .
19049011	Nikech ong’ere ne ji duto ni joma riek tho , mana kaka joma ofuwo gi joma oming’ bende tho mi giwe mwandugi ne joma moko .
19049012	Lietegi ema biro siko kaka utegi nyaka chieng’ kendo ema gibiro dakie higni gi higni maok rum , kata obedo ni ne gimako lope mathoth koni gi koni .
19049013	To ong’ere ni dhano ok siki e piny , kata obed gi mwandu mathoth machal nade , to otho mana kaka le bende tho .
19049014	Mano e gima biro timore ne joma ogenore kendgi giwegi , kendo ne joma luwogi , moluwo wechegi .
19049015	Gichomo liete mokunynegi ka rombe kendo tho biro lokogi chiembe . Joma ngimagi oriere tir biro loyogi ka piny oru , to dendgi biro top e liel , ka gin mabor gi utegi madongo machalo ute ruodhi .
19049016	Anto Nyasaye biro reso chunya mi ogola e liel adier , obiro kawa mi odhi koda ire .
19049017	Kik chunyi thagre ka ng’ato mwandune medore , kata ka duong’ mar ode medore ;
19049018	nikech onge gima obiro kawo odhigo ka otho , duong’ ma en go ok bi dhi kode e liel ,
19049019	kata obedo ni ne okawore kaka ng’ama og wedhi kane pod ongima-nikech ji nyaka paki ka mwanduni medore -
19049020	to obiro dhi mi oriwre gi tieng’ machon mar kwerene , maok nyal neno ler mar wang’ chieng’ kendo .
19049021	Ng’at man-gi mwandu mathoth to onge winjo , chalo gi le matho .
19050001	Jal Manyalo Duto , Nyasaye ma en Jehova , wuoyo kendo luongo ji duto modak e piny mondo ochokrene kaachiel , chakre koma chieng’ wuokie nyaka kuma opodhoe .
19050002	Nyasaye rieny gie Sayun , dala ma berne long’o chuth .
19050003	Nyasachwa owuok biro kendo ok obi ling’ mach nie nyime mawang’o gik moko pep , kendo ahiti mager olwore .
19050004	Oluongo joma odak e polo malo kaachiel kod joma odak e piny , mondo oyal joge :
19050005	" Choknauru joga maler , mane otimo koda singruok e yor misango . "
19050006	Kendo polo hulo timne makare , nikech Nyasaye owuon e jang’ad bura . Sela
19050007	" Winjuru , Yaye joga , mondo awuo kodu , Yaye jo Israel , chiknauru itu mondo atim neno ma akwedougo : An Nyasaye ma Nyasachu .
19050008	Ok akweru nikech wach misengni mutimona , kata nikech chiwo miwang’o , mosiko ka nitie e nyima .
19050009	Ok agomb ruath moro amora moa e kundeu kata diek moa e abilniu ,
19050010	nikech le moro amora manie bungu en mara , kaachiel gi jamni makwayo e wi thuche gana achiel .
19050011	Ang’eyo nying winyo ka winyo manie wi gode , kendo gik mochwe duto manie pewe gin maga .
19050012	Ka da bed ni kech kaya to ok dak anyisu , nikech piny en mara , kaachiel gi gik moko duto manie iye .
19050013	Uparo ni achamo ring ruedhi kata amadho remb diek ?
19050014	Chiwuru misango mar goyo erokamano ne Nyasaye , chopuru singruok mau ne Jal Man Malo Mogik .
19050015	kendo luongauru sama un e chandruok ; to abiro golou e chandruogno , kendo ubiro miya duong’ .
19050016	Joma timbegi richo to Nyasaye wacho negi ni : " Ng’a momiyou thuolo mar olo chikena kata mondo ukaw singruok maga kaka mau ?
19050017	Ere kaka dutim kamano to uchayo puonjna kendo udiro wechena katoku !
19050018	Ka uneno jakuo to uriworu kode kendo uchodo mana kaka joma moko timo .
19050019	Utiyo gi dhou kuom timo richo kendo lewu oikore ne wuond .
19050020	Usiko uwuoyo marach kuom joweteu kendo ukuodho koda ka oweteu mahie ma uago e ich achiel .
19050021	Gigi duto usetimo ka an to aling’ ; useparo ni an bende achalo kodu . To koro akwerou kendo anyisou e wang’u ni useketho kuom timo gigo duto .
19050022	Paruru matut kuom wachni , un joma wigi wil gi Nyasaye , nono to abiro kidhou matindo tindo , ma onge nga’ma diresu :
19050023	Ng’at ma timona misango mar erokamano miya duong’ kendo obedo moikore mondo anyise kaka warruok mar Nyasaye chalo . "
19051001	Kecha , Yaye Nyasaye , kaluwore gi herani maok rem ; ruch kethona duto oko kuom ng’wononi maduong’ .
19051002	
19051003	
19051004	Lwok rochruokna duto oko kendo puodha kuom richona .
19051005	Nikech ang’eyo ketho maga kendo richona osiko ka neno e wang’a
19051006	In iwuon ema asekethoni kendo asetimo gima rach e nyim wang’i , mano omiyo in kare ka iwuoyo kuoma kendo iwacho adiera kiyala .
19051007	En adier chuth nine onyuola e richo asebedo ka an jaricho chakre chieng’ mane mama omake ichna .
19051008	Adier , idwaro ni dhano obed ja adiera gie chunye iye emomiyo ipuonja rieko gie chunya maiye mogik .
19051009	Rudha maler gi sabun eka abiro bedo maler ; lwoka mondo abed rachar moloyo pe .
19051010	We awinjie ilo kod mor ; mi choke misetoyo ochak obedie mamor .
19051011	Pand wang’i ne richoga kendo ruch rochruokna duto oko .
19051012	Chwe chuny maler e iya , Yaye Nyasaye , kendo los chuny motegno mosiko koluori iket e iya .
19051013	Kik iriemba buti kata igol Roho Maler mari kuoma .
19051014	Duogna mor ma warruokni kelo kendo mi abed gi chuny mohero timo dwaroni , mondo chuny makamano orita .
19051015	Kisetimo kamano eka abiro puonjo joketho yoreni kendo joricho biro lokore duogo iri .
19051016	Resa e ketho mar chwero remo , Yaye Nyasaye , tim kamano , Yaye Nyasaye ma wara , eka lewa biro wer kuom timni makare .
19051017	Yaye Ruoth yaw pien dhoga , eka dhoga biro hulo pakni .
19051018	Ok imor gi misango mitimoni , nikech da achiwonigo ; chiwo miwang’o pep ok miyi mor .
19051019	Misango mar Nyasaye en chuny motur , adundo motur kendo mamuol , ok itamri , Yaye Nyasaye .
19051020	Mi Sayun odhi maber kuom herani ; chak iger ohinga mag Jerusalem kendo .
19051021	Eka misengni makare biro betie kendo , mana chiwo miwang’o duto mondo omiyi mor , eka ibiro chiw ruedhi e kendoni mar misango .
19052001	ANG’O MOMIYO isungori kuom tim marach , Yaye ng’at maratego ? Ang’o momiyo isungori odiechieng’ duto , in ma in gir wichkuot e nyim Nyasaye ?
19052002	
19052003	
19052004	Lewi chano kelo kethruok ; ochalo gi wembe mabith , in michano yor wuondo ji ni .
19052005	Ihero rach moloyo ber , miriambo mitni moloyo wacho adiera . Sela
19052006	Ihero weche duto machwanyo ji , Yaye in lep mohero wuondni !
19052007	To Nyasaye biro tieli piny motieki chuth nyaka chieng’ ; obiro yudhi mi oyiechi oko e hembi ; obiro pudhi mi ogoli e piny joma ngima . Sela
19052008	Joma kare biro neno mano mi gibed maluor ; gibiro nyiere ka giwacho ni ,
19052009	" Koro neye uru ng’atno , mane ok okawo Nyasaye obedo kar pondo mare to nogeno mana kuom mwandune mathoth kendo notieko joma moko mondo eka omed bedo gi teko ! "
19052010	An to achalo yiend mzabibu madongo kodhukno maber e od Nyasaye ; ageno kuom hera maok rem mar Nyasaye nyaka chieng’ kendo nyaka chieng’ .
19052011	Abiro paki nyaka chieng’ kuom gima isetimo ; nyingi ema abiro ketoe geno mara , nikech nyingi ber . Abiro paki e nyim jogi maler .
19053001	Ng’at mofuwo wacho e chunye ni , " Nyasaye ongee . " Gin joma okethore , kendo yoregi obam ; onge kata ng’ato achiel matimo maber .
19053002	
19053003	Nyasaye ng’iyo piny gie polo ; orango yawuot ji mondo oneye ka be nitie moro kuomgi ma wachi donjone , ka be nitie moro kuomgi mamanyo Nyasaye .
19053004	Giduto gisebaro giweyo yo ; giduto gisekethore ; onge kata ng’ato achiel matimo maber , onge kata achiel .
19053005	Joma timo gik maricho donge dipuonjree-jogo ma ngamo joga kaka ji chamo kuon kendo maok luong Nyasaye mondo okonygi ?
19053006	To ero , koro kihondko maduong’ omakogi , kihondko omakogi kama onge gima onego giluor . Nyasaye osekeyo choke joma nomonji ; isemiyogi wichkuot , nikech Nyasaye nodagigi .
19053007	Yaye , mad warruok mar Israel obi koa Sayun ! Ka Nyasaye duogo ne joge mwandugi , to joka Jakobo mondo obed moil kendo Israel obed mamor !
19054001	Resa gi nyingi , Yaye Nyasaye ; ng’adna bura kare gi tekoni .
19054002	
19054003	
19054004	Winj lamona , Yaye Nyasaye ; chik iti ne weche mawuok e dhoga .
19054005	Mwache monja ; acheje dwa kawo ngimana-joma ok dew Nyasaye .
19054006	Adier , Nyasaye e jakonyna ; Ruoth owuon ema rita .
19054007	Mad chandruok lwor joma ketho nyinga mi ketgi diere ; tiekgi , nikech in jaadiera .
19054008	Abiro timoni misango gi chiwo ma achiwo kuom herona ; abiro pako nyingi , Yaye Jehova , nikech nyingi ber .
19054009	Nikech oseresa kuom gik mathaga duto , mi omiyo wengena ong’iyo wasi-ka tir bang’ loyogi .
19055001	Winj lamona , Yaye Nyasaye , kik itamri winjo ywakna ;
19055002	
19055003	Winja kendo iduoka . Pacha chanda kendo chunya onge gi kuwe
19055004	Ka awinjo duond wasika , kendo ka joma timbegi richo okwarona wengegi nikech gimiyo abedo gi thagruok kendo giyanya ka gin gi mirima .
19055005	Chunya winjo malit e iya kendo luoro mar tho osemaka .
19055006	Aluor kendo denda tetni ; kibaji ogoya matek .
19055007	Ne awacho ni , " yaye mad ne bed ni an gi buombe akuru ! dine afuyo aa ka mi ayudo yweyo -
19055008	Dine aringo adhi mabor mi adhi adak e piny ongoro ;
19055009	dine areto adhi nyaka kara mar pondo , kuma ni mabor gi apaka kod ahiti . "
19055010	Lal pach joma timbegi richo , Yaye Ruoth , mi lewgi moki e dandgi , nikech aneno ka maundu gi dhaw opong’o dala maduong’ .
19055011	Odiechieng’ gotieno gilwenyo kor ohinga mare ; himruok gi ayany ni e iye .
19055012	Teko mar kethruok chopo tijgi ei dala maduong’ , mecho gi wound osiko e yorege .
