19055013	Ka dine ok obedo malichna ka dine ng’at ma ok dwara ema ogarna , to dine apondone .
19055014	To en mana in , dichwo kaka an in jawuodhakendo osiepna mangita gi del ,
19055015	mane wan-go gi lalruok matut chon kane wawuotho e dier oganda maduong’ e od Nyasaye .
19055016	Mad tho neg wasika apoya , mad liel mwonygi ngili kapod gingima , nikech richo olokogi kar dakne .
19055017	Anto aluongo Nyasaye , kendo Jehova resa .
19055018	Odhiambo gi okinyi kod odiechieng’ ayuagora ka chunya lit , kendo owinjo duonda .
19055019	Owara kapok gimoro ohinya kuom lweny ma ji goyago , kata obedo ni ji mang’eny kweda .
19055020	Nyasaye mobetekom loch nyaka chieng’ , biro winjogi kendo biro goyogi-Sela jogo motamore loko yoregi kendo maok mi Nyasaye luor .
19055021	Jawuodha monjo osiepene ; oseweyo rito singruokne mane otimo kodgi .
19055022	Weche mowacho to yom ka mo mabuo , to lweny to nie chunye ; wechege yomo del moloyo mor wirruok , to kara gin mana ligangla mosewuodh oko .
19055023	Ket pek manie chunyi ne Jehova to obiro riti ; ok obi weyo ng’at makare podhi .
19055024	To in , Yaye Nyasaye , ibiro dwoko joma timbegi richo piny nyaka ei bur mar top ; joma rich chwero remo omako gi joma wuondo ji ok bi bet mangima kata moromo nus ndalogi . An to ageno kuomi .
19056001	Kecha , Yaye Nyasaye , nikech ji lawa dwa mwonya ; odiechieng’ duto gidiya ti maok ayue .
19056002	
19056003	Joketh nyinga lawa odiechieng’ duto ; ji mang’eny monja ka sunga omakogi .
19056004	Ka luoro omaka to abiro geno kuomi .
19056005	Kuom Nyasaye ma apako wachne , kuom Nyasaye ema agenoe omiyo ok abi bedo maluor . Dhano adhana to nyalo timona ang’o ?
19056006	Odiechieng’ duto gimino koda wach ; kinde duto gichano kaka digihinya .
19056007	Gikuotho kendo gijimbo wach , ginono okang’ ka okang’ ma agoyo ka gidwa kawo ngimana .
19056008	Kik iyie gitony kata matin , dwok ogendini piny , Yaye Nyasaye , gi mirimbi ;
19056009	Ndik piny ywak ma aywakgo kwan pi wang’a machwer e ndikoni modoldonge iketogi e rekod mari ?
19056010	Eka wasika biro gomo dok ka aluongo kony moa kuomi . Mano ema abiro ng’eyogo ni Nyasaye en jakora .
19056011	Kuom Nyasaye ma apako wachne , kuom Jehova ma apako wachne -
19056012	kuom Nyasaye ema agenoe ; omiyo ok abi bedo maluor . Dhano adhana to nyalo timona ang’o .
19056013	Asetimo kodi muma , Yaye Nyasaye ; abiro chiwoni chiwo maga mag erokamano
19056014	Nikech iseresa e tho kendo isegeng’o tienda mi ok ochwanyore , mondo mi awuothi e nyim Nyasaye ma en e ler mar ngima .
19057001	Kecha , Yaye Nyasaye , yie ikecha nikech kuomi ema chunya yudoe kar pondo . Abiro pondo e bwo tipo mar bwombeni nyaka chop apaka mager rum .
19057002	
19057003	Aywagora ne Nyasaye Man Malo Mogik , Nyasaye machopona chenroge ema ayuakne .
19057004	Ooro wach gie polo kendo oresa , kokwero joma lawa gi tekregi duto ; sela Nyasaye oro herane gi adiera mare .
19057005	An e dier sibuoche ; anindo e dier le mager mangemo-joma lekegi chalo tonge gi aserni , ma lewgi chalo ligangla mabitho .
19057006	Nyingi mondo oting’ malo moyombo polo , Yaye Nyasaye ; mad duong’ mari pong’ piny duto .
19057007	Ne giyaro jogo mondo omak tiendena-kane chuny lit odola . Ne gikunyo bugo e yora-to kata kamano gin giwegi ema giselutore e iye . Sela
19057008	Chunya otegno , Yaye Nyasaye , chunya otegno ; abiro wer kendo abiro loso wer mamit .
19057009	Chiew , in chunya ! Chiew u ru un orutu gi nyatiti Abiro chiewo osirawende
19057010	Abiro paki e dier ogendni , Yaye Ruoth . Abiro weri e dier ji .
19057011	Nikech herani duong’ kendo chopo nyaka polo ; adiera mari ochop nyaka ewi lwasi .
19057012	Nyingi mondo oting’ malo moyombo polo , Yaye Nyasaye ; mad duong’ mari pong’ piny duto .
19058001	Un jotelo , be uwuoyo gi adiera ? Be ung’ado bura moriere tir e dier ji ?
19058002	
19058003	Ooyo , uchano mayo ji ratiro magi e chunyu , kendo lweteu chano tulu e piny .
19058004	Joma timbegi richo chako lal aa nyuolgi ; gin jendeke kendo gin jomriambo aa nyuolggi
19058005	Kwiri margi chalo gi kwich thuol , chalo gi kwich thuond rachier ma tege oyienyo ,
19058006	ma kata jabochne wuone to ok winji , kata bed ni jabochneno olony machal nadi .
19058007	Muk lekegi ei dhogi , Yaye Nyasaye , yiech kwiri mag sibuoche oko , Yaye Jehova !
19058008	Mi gilal nono ka pi mamol dhi ; ka giywayo atungegi to mi asernigi obed madik .
19058009	Mana kaka ndach kamnie ma leny nono , kendo mana kaka nyath i monyuol kosetho , mad kik gine wang’ chieng’ .
19058010	Kapok agulni magi ochako winjo liet mach , bed ni en mach mabebni kata maliel mos , to joma timbegi richo ibiro ywe oko .
19058011	Joma kare biro bedo mamor kichulo negi kuor , ka giniluok tiendegi e remb joma timbegi richo .
19058012	Eka ji nowach ni , " Kara en adier ni joma kare pod yudo pok ; kara nitie Nyasaye mang’ado bura ne piny . "
19059001	Resa e lwet wasika , Yaye Nyasaye ; Rit ngimana kuom joma ogar koda
19059002	
19059003	Gola e lwet joma timo gik maricho kendo resa kuom joma rich chwero remo omako .
19059004	Neye kaka gibutona ka girita e yo ! Joma kwiny chano kaka digihinya , to an onge gima rach kata richo masetimo , Yaye Jehova .
19059005	Onge gima asetimo marach , to kata kamano gin to giikore monja . Aa malo ikonya ; ne chandruokna .
19059006	Yaye Jehova Nyasaye Manyalo Duto , Nyasach Israel , aa malo ikum ogendini duto ; kik ikech andhoke ma timbegi richo . Sela
19059007	Giduogo ka piny chiegni imore , ka ging’ur ka guogi kendo giwuotho koni gi koni e dala ka ging’anjo .
19059008	Neye gik ma ging’udho koa e dhogi , ging’udho ligengni gi dhogi , kendo giwacho ni , " En ng’a manyalo winjowa ? "
19059009	To in nyiergi , Yaye Jehova , go siboyi ne ogandanigo duto .
19059010	Yaye tekrena , in ema ang’iyi , in e kar pondona , Yaye Nyasaye ,
19059011	Yaye Nyasacha ma jahera . Nyasaye biro telona kendo obiro miyo asungra ne joma ketho nyinga .
19059012	To kik uneggi , Yaye Ruoth ma okumbana nikech joga dipoka wigi owil . Mi giba abaya koni gi koni gi tekoni , kendo mi gidog piny .
19059013	Nikech richo ma gitimo gi dhogi , nikech weche mawuok e dhogi , wegi mondo sungagi ogajgi . Nikech gikuong’o ji kendo gi wuondo ji ,
19059014	tiekgi gi mirimbi mager tiekgi mi kargi lal nono eka biro ng’ere e tung’ piny koni gi koni ni Nyasaye nigi loch kuom joka Jakobo . Sela
19059015	Giduogo ka piny chiegni imore ka ging’ur ka guogi , kendo giwuotho koni gi koni e dala ka ging’anjo .
19059016	Gibayo koni gi koni ka gidwaro chiemo kendo ka ok giyieng’ to ging’ur .
19059017	Anto abiro wero tekreni abiro wero herani gokinyi ; nikech in e ohingana , in e kar pondona e kinde mag tha gruok .
19059018	Yaye Tekrena , abiro weroni wend pak ; in e ohingana , Yaye Nyasaye , Nyasacha majahera .
19060001	Yaye Nyasaye , isedagiwa mi imuomori kuomwa ; isebedo ka ikecho kodwa , to koro loswa !
19060002	
19060003	
19060004	Iseyiengo piny mi ibare diere ariyo , Los kuondege mosebarore , nikech oyiengni .
19060005	Isenyiso jogi kinde mag chandruok ; isemiywa kong’o mamiyo wakwang’ .
19060006	To isechungo bandech loch ne joma oluori mondo oumgi ka oywanegi atung’ . Sela
19060007	Re swa kendo ikonywa gi lweti makor achich mondo joma ihero ogol e chandruo .
19060008	Nyasaye osewuoyo gi e kare maler : " Abiro pogo ji shekem kendo abiro pimo ne ji Holo mar Sukoth .
19060009	Gilead en mara , kendo Manase bende mara ; Efraim en oguta mar lweny , to Juda to en osimbona mar loch .
19060010	Moab en besen mara mar luok to Edom ema ang’we okanda ; kendo e piny Filistia ema akoke ka aselocho . "
19060011	En ng’a mabiro kela e dala maduong’ mochiel ? Ng’a mabiro telona katera Edom ?
19060012	Donge en ema isedagiwa , Yaye Nyasaye , kendo tinde ok idhi gi jolwenjwa e lweny ?
19060013	Miwa kony mondo walo wasikwa , nikech kony mar dhano onge tich .
19060014	Ka wan-gi Nyasaye to wabiro yudo loch , kendo obiro nyono wasikwa piny .
19061001	Winj ywakna , Yaye Nyasaye ; chik iti ne lamona .
19061002	
19061003	Aluongi gie tung’ piny , aluongi ka chunya ool ; telna nyaka lwanda mohinga gi bor .
19061004	Nikech in ema isebedo kar pondona , isebedona ohinga motegno maponde ne jasigu .
19061005	Agombo dak e hembi nyaka chieng’ mondo apondie e raum mar bwombeni . Sela
19061006	Nikech isewinjo singruokna kodi , Yaye Nyasaye ; isemiya gweth mikano ne joma oluoro nyingi .
19061007	Med ndalo mar ngima ruoth , mede higni e tienge mang’eny .
19061008	Mi obed e kom loch e nyim Nyasaye nyaka chieng’ ; ket herani kod adierani mondo orite .
19061009	Eka anasik ka apako nyingi gi wer kendo abiro chopo singruokna kodi odiechieng’ kodiechieng’ .
19062001	CHUNYA yudo yweyo kuom Nyasaye kende ; warruokna aa kuome .
19062002	
19062003	En kende ema en lwandana kendo warruokna ; en e ohingana , onge gima biro buoga .
19062004	Ubiro siko kugoyo ng’atni nang’o ? Ang’o momiyo unywakone ugoye piny-Ng’at machalo chiel momukore mayiengnini ?
19062005	Giramo ni nyaka to gigole kama entie e duong’ne ; miriambo ema morogi . Dhogi gigwedhogo ji , to gie i chunygi to gikuong’o ji . Sela
19062006	Yud yueyo , Yaye chunya , kuom Nyasaye kende ; genona aa kuome .
19062007	En kende ema en lwandana kendo warruokna ; en e ohingana ; onge gima biro buoga .
19062008	Warruok mara gi luor ma ayudo aa kuom Nyasaye ; en e lwandana manyalo duto , en e kar pondona .
19062009	Un ji , genuru kuome kinde duto ; olneuru oko gik manie chunyu , nikech Nyasaye e kar pondo marwa . Sela
19062010	Joma nipiny gin mana muya nono ; joma ni malo gin mana miriambo ; ka opimgi e ratil , to gin nono ; gin duto gin mana muya nono .
19062011	Kik igen kuom gik moma ji kata isungri kuom gik mokwal ; kata bed ni mwandugi medore to kik iket chunyi kuomgi .
19062012	Nitie gimoro achiel ma Nyasaye osewacho , chutho nitie gik moko ariyo ma asewinjo gi ita : ni in , Yaye Nyasaye , in ratego , kendo ni in , Yaye Ruoth , ihero ji .
19062013	Kuom adier , ibiro chiwo pok ne ng’ato ka ng’ato kaluwore gi gima osetimo .
19063001	YAYE NYASAYE , in e Nyasacha , adwari gi tekra duto ; chunya riyo mar neni oloyo denda duto gombi , e piny motwo kendo maliet ,
19063002	
19063003	Aseneni ei kari maler kendo aseng’eyo tekoni gi duong’ni .
19063004	Nikech herani ber moloyo ngima , dhoga biro miyi duong’ .
19063005	Abiro paki kapod angima , kendo abiro ting’o bedena malo e nyingi .
19063006	Chunya biro romo mana ka ng’ama oromo gi chiemo mabeyo mogik ; abiro yawo dhoga ka apaki gi wer .
19063007	Ka an e kitandana to apari ; pacha osiko pari seche duto mag otieno .
19063008	Nikech in e konyruokna , awer ka an e bwo tipo mar bwombeni .
19063009	Chunya omoko kuomi ; lweti makorachwich orita .
19063010	Joma dwa kawo ngimana ibiro tieki ; gibiro dhi piny nyaka ei bur kama tut .
19063011	Ibiro chiwgi ne ligangla kendo gibiro doko chiemb ondiegi mag bungu .
19063012	To ruoth to biro bedo moil kuom Nyasaye ; ji duto ma singore e nying Nyasaye biro pake , to dho jomiriambo ibiro um mi ling’ .
19064001	WINJA , Yaye Nyasaye sama ating’o duonda ka anyisi chandruokna ; rit ngimana kuom jasigu ma bwoga .
19064002	
19064003	Panda ne chenro maricho mag joma richo , panda ne koko ma oganda ma timo marach goyo .
19064004	Gipiago lewgi ka ligangla kendo gilingo wechegi ka asere motimo sum .
19064005	Gidiro asere kama giponde mondo gichwogo ng’ama onge ketho ; gibaye gi asere apoya ka gionge luoro .
19064006	Gijiwore ng’ato gi ng’ato kuom chenrogi maricho , giloso wach kaka digipand obadhogi ka giwacho ni , " En ng’a mabiro nenogi ? "
19064007	Gichano timo ne ji marach ka giwacho ni , " Waseloso chenro malong’o chuth ! " Kuom adier , pach dhano gi chunye opando riekni maricho miwuoro .
19064008	To Nyasaye biro bayogi gi aserni ; apoya nono , ibiro puodgi piny .
19064009	Obiro loko lewgi mi gogi gin giwegi mi otiekgi chuth ; ji duto monenogi biro kino wigi gi wuoro .
19064010	Ji duto biro bedo maluor , gibiro hulo tije Nyasaye kendo gibiro paro mos kuom gima osetimo .
19064011	Joma kare mondo obed moil kuom Jehova kendo mondo gipond kuome ; ji duto moriere tir gie chunygi mondo opake !
19065001	PAK ORITI e Sayun , Yaye Nyasaye Wabiro choponi singruokwa duto .
19065002	
19065003	Yaye in miwinjo lamo , in ema ji duto biro biro iri .
19065004	Kane richowa obarowa ndas ne iweyonwa kethowa .
19065005	Joma iyiero gin joma ogwedhi , jogo ma ikelo machiegni mondo odag e agolni magi ! Gik mabeyo mowuok e odi oromowa chuth , mana gigo moa e hekalu mari maler .
19065006	Idwokowa gi timbe madongo makare , Yaye Nyasaye ma Jawarwa , Yaye geno mar piny koni gi koni kendo mar nembe man maboyo mogik ,
19065007	in mane iloso gode gi tekoni iwuon kane imanori gi teko ,
19065008	in mane imiyo nembe oling’ oweyo wuo , wuo mar apaka margi , kod koko mag ogendini .
19065009	Joma odak kuonde maboyo oluoro timbeni miwuoro , kuma okinyi yaworee kendo odhiambo rumoe imiyo ji wernie gimor .
19065010	Irito piny kendo iolone pi , imiyo obedo momew moromo chuth . Aoche Nyasaye opong’ gi pi mamiyo ji bedo gi cham , nimar kamano e kaka ne ichano chon .
19065011	Imiyo parage bedo mang’ich kendo igwedhe gi cham .
19065012	Igwedho higa gi cham mogundho , kendo gechegi mwandu opong’o thich .
19065013	Pewe motimo lum mag piny ongoro ng’ich oromo ; kendo gode opong’ gi mor .
19065014	Lek duto jamni kwae ka giwinjo maber kendo holni cham mochiek odhure ; gikok gimor kendo giwer .
19066001	Go koko gi mor ne Nyasaye , in piny duto !
19066002	Wer kipako duong’ mar nyinge ; mi pakne obed gi duong’ !
19066003	Wachne Nyasaye ni , " Mano kaka timbe mitimo dongo ! Tekoni duong’ manade momiyo wasiki duto leny nono koneni .
19066004	Piny duto kuloreni ; giweroni wende pak ; giwero wende pak ka gipako nyingi . " Sela
19066005	Biuru uneye gik ma Nyasaye osetimo ; bi uneye kaka gik motimo ne dhano dongo !
19066006	Ne oloko nam lo motwo , mi ne gikalo pige ka giwuotho gi tiendegi-biuru mondo wabed moil kuome .
19066007	Olocho nyaka chieng’ gi teko ne , wengene ema rito ogendini-omiyo kik jong’ang’o hedhre mar kedo kode . Sela
19066008	Pakuru Nyasachwa , Yaye ogendini , neuru ni pak mipakego ji duto owinjo ;
19066009	oserito ngimawa kendo osegeng’o tiendewa ni kik kier .
19066010	Nikech in , Yaye Nyasaye , ne itemowa ; ne ipuodhowa ka dhahabu .
19066011	Ne iterowa e jela kendo ne iketo misigo mapek e dier ng’ewa .
19066012	Ne imiyo ji onyono wiyewa ; kendo ne wakadho mach gi pi , kata kamano ne ikelowa nyaka kama omew .
19066013	Abiro biro e hekalu mari gi chiwo miwang’o kendo abiro chopo kuong’ruok masetimo kodi -
19066014	Kuong’ruok mane asingoni e chunya kendo awacho gi dhoga . Kane an e thagruok .
19066015	Abiro timoni misango gi jamni machwe kendo abiro miyi chiwo mar imbe ; bende abiro chiwoni ruedhi gi diek . Sela
19066016	Biuru uchik itu , un duto muluoro Nyasaye ; we anyisue gik mosetimona .
19066017	Ne aywakne gi dhoga ; pakne ne nie lewa .
19066018	Ka dine bed ni amor gi richo manie chunya , to Ruoth dine ok ochikona ite ,
19066019	to kuom adier , Nyasaye osechikona ite kendo osewinjo duonda ka alame .
19066020	Pak obed ne Nyasaye , maok osedagi lamona kata golo herane kuoma .
19067001	Mad Nyasaye timnwa ng’wono kendo owinjwa ; mad omi wang’e rienynwa maber , Sela
19067002	
19067003	mondo yoregi ong’ere e piny , kendo ogendini duto oyud warruokne .
19067004	Mad ji paki , Yaye Nyasaye ; mad ji duto opaki .
19067005	Mad ogendini obed mamor kendo ower gi ilo , nikech irito ji gi ratiro kendo itayo ogendini mag piny . Sela
19067006	Mad ji paki , Yaye Nyasaye ; mad ji duto opaki .
19067007	Eka piny biro chiego cham kaka owinjore kendo Nyasaye , ma Nyasachwa , biro gwedhowa .
19067008	Nyasaye biro gwedhowa , kendo piny duto koni gi koni biro luore .
19068001	Mad Nyasaye aa malo , mad wasike ke ; mad joma kedo kode ring konene .
19068002	
19068003	Mad iriembgi gi dhi mabor , mana kaka yamo riembo iro tero mabor ; mad joma timbegi richo lal nono e nyim Nyasaye mana kaka odok leny kowinjo mach .
19068004	To jomakare to mad bed mamor kendo moil e nyim Nyasaye ; mad gibed mamor kendo gibed mamor chuth .
19068005	Weruru ne Nyasaye , weruru wende pak ne nyinge , miyeuru duong’ , En moriembo gechene e boche polonyinge en Jehova-beduru moil e nyime .
19068006	Nyasaye modak kare kama ler . En wuoro ne joma onge gi wuonegi kendo en jachwak mond liete .
19068007	Nyasaye keto joma odong’ kendgi hach e udi kendo otelone joma otue kower ; to joma ohero ng’anyo to dak e piny ma chieng’ otwoyo kururu .
19068008	Kane iwuok idhi kitelo ne jogi , Yaye Nyasaye , kane iwuotho e piny mokethore maonge tich , Sela
19068009	piny noyiengni kendo polo noolo koth e piny , e nyim Nyasaye , Jal man Sinai , e nyim Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel .
19068010	Ne ichiwo koth mogundho , Yaye Nyasaye ; ne iduogo chuny girkeni mari mane ojony .
19068011	Jogi nokawo pinyno modakie kendo nichiwo ne joma odhier gik ma gilando , kigolo kuom mwanduni mogundho , Yaye Nyasaye .
19068012	Ruoth nolando wach kendo oganda mane okawo wachno mi oke ye ne duong’ mokalo :
19068013	" Ruodhi gi jolweny dar gi ng’wech ; ji pogo gik moyaki e kambi .
19068014	Kata mana sama inindo but mach kama liet , to buombe mag akuchega oum gi dhahabu , kendo yierege oum gi fedha maleny . "
19068015	Kane Jal Manyalo Duto okeyo ruodhi manie piny , to ne ochal mana gi pee molwar koa e kama oting’ore gi malo mar Zalmon .
19068016	Gode mag Bashan gin gode madongo miwuoro ; go d ego mag Bashan ojuothore adier .
19068017	Ang’o momiyo ung’icho gi nyiego , Yaye gode mojuothore , ang’o momiyo nyiego omakou gi got kama Nyasaye oyiero mondo ogurie lochne , kama Jehova owuon biro dakie nyaka chieng’ ?
19068018	Geche mag lweny mag Nyasaye gin tara gi tara ; ging’eny mokalo akwana ; Ruoth osebiro koa Sinai mondo odonji kare maler .
19068019	Kane iidho idhi malo to ne itelone joma imako motue ; kendo ne ikawo mich mane ji omiyi , koda ka mich mane jong’anyo omiyi-mondo in Jehova Nyasaye , idag kanyo .
19068020	Pak odog ne Ruoth , ma en Nyasaye ma Jawarwa , Nyasaye mating’onwa pekwa ndalo duto . Sela
19068021	Nyasachwa en Nyasaye mawaro ji ; tony e tho aa kuom Jehova ma Wuon Loch .
19068022	Kuom adier , Nyasaye biro toyo wiye wasike , obiro mayo joma dhi nyime gi timo richo osimbo motimo yier ma girwako .
19068023	Ruoth wacho ni , " Abiro gologi oko Bashan ; abiro gologi oko kama tut mar nam ,
19068024	mondo unyum tiendeu e remb joma kedo kodu , seche ma guogiu olodho lewgi ka gichamo makorgi . "
19068025	Wuodhi koro nenore maler , Yaye Nyasaye , wuodh Nyasacha kendo Ruodha nenore maler kodonjo kare maler .
19068026	Joma wer gi dhogi otelo eka joma wer kagoyo thumbe luwogi , nyiri magoyo oyieke be nikodgi machiegni .
19068027	Pakuru Nyasaye e dier chokruok maduong’ ; pakuru Jehova e dier chokruok mar jo Isarael .
19068028	Dhoot matin mar joka Benjamin otelonegi , oganda maduong’ mar ruoddhi moa e dhood Juda be ni kodgi eka nitie bende ruodhi moa e dhout Zebulun gi Naftali .
19068029	Chok tekoni kaachiel , Yaye Nyasaye ; nyiswa tekoni , Yaye Nyasaye ; kaka isebedo kitimo nyaka aa chon .
19068030	Nikech hekalu mari man Jerusalem ruodhi biro keloni mich .
19068031	Kwer ondiek manie dier togo , kwer kweth mag ruedhi manie dier nyiroye mag ogendini . Mi okel miti mang’eny mag dhahabu ka wiye okuot . Ke ogendini mohero lweny .
19068032	Joote biro biro koa Misiri ; Kus bende biro bolore ne Nyasaye .
19068033	Weruru ne Nyasaye , Yaye pinjeruodhi mag piny , weruru wende pak ne Ruoth , Sela
19068034	Werneuru Jal mariembo gechege e kor polo malo manyaka nene , Jal ma mor gi duol maduong’ .
19068035	Landuru teko mar Nyasaye ma nigi duong’ kuom Israel kendo ma nigi teko e kor polo .
19068036	Ilich miwuoro ka in kari maler , Yaye Nyasaye , Nyasach Israel chiwo teko gi nyalo ne joge . Pak mondo obed ne Nyasaye !
19069001	Resa , Yaye Nyasaye , nikech pi oseima nyaka e ng’uta .
19069002	
19069003	Asechako nimo e chuodho matut , kama onge lowo motegno ma ng’ato nyalo chung’ie . Asechopo e chuny pi kama tut , kendo apaka olwora oketa diere .
19069004	Koro aseywak mondo okonya mi aol ; dwonda rewni . Wengena oore , ka amanyo Nyasacha .
19069005	Joma ochaya maonge gima omiyo ng’eny moloyo yie wiya ; joma olokore wasika kayiem thoth adier , jogogo madwaro mondo otieka . Ichuna mondo adwok gima ne ok akwalo .
19069006	Ing’eyo fupa , Yaye Nyasaye ; kethona ok opondoni .
19069007	Mad joma ogeno kuomi kik ne wichkuot nikech an , Yaye Ruoth , Jehova Manyalo Gik Moko Duto ; mad joma manyi kik ne wichkuot nikech an , Yaye Nyasach Israel .
19069008	Nimar ji ya n ya to aling’ aling’a nikech in , kendo wichkuot obako lela wang’a .
19069009	Achalo wendo ne owetena an kaka jamwa ne yawuot minwa ;
19069010	nikech hera matut ma aherogo odi tieka , kendo ayenje mag joma yanyi lwar kuoma .
19069011	Ka aywak kendo atweyo chiemo to pod nyaka ayud ayany ;
19069012	ka arwako law ywak , to ji oloka ngero .
19069013	Joma obet e rangach jara , kendo alokora wer ma jokong’o wero .
19069014	To alami , Yaye Jehova , e sama iikori mar konya ; kuom herani maduong’ , Yaye Nyasaye , dwoka gi resruok mari mar adier .
19069015	Gola oko e chuodho , kik iyie anim ; resa e lwet joma ochaya , gola e chuny pi kama tut .
19069016	Kik iwe ohula ywera mi tera kata kut mwonya duto kata bur matut um dhoge ka an e iye .
19069017	Dwoka , Yaye Jehova , dwoka , nikech he rani ber ; lokri ira kuom kechni maduong’ .
19069018	Kik ipand wang’i ne jatichni ; dwoka piyo , nikech anie chandruok .
19069019	Bi machiegni mondo ikonya , resa nikech joma kedo koda .
19069020	Ing’eyo kaka ijara , kaka ikuodo wiya kendo kaka aneno wichkuot ; wasika duto ochoma tir .
19069021	Ajara osechodo chunya kendo oweya ka aonge teko ; ne agombo yudo kech , to ne ok ayudo , kendo ne amanyo joma hoya , to ne ok ayudo kata achiel .
19069022	Ne giketo kedhno e chiemba kendo ne gimiya kong andwayo mondo otiekna riyo .
19069023	Mad mesa mochan e nyimgi lokre obadho ; kendo mad olokrenegi gir chulo kuor kod otegu .
19069024	Mad wengegi lokre mudho mondo kik ginen kendo oguchgi odolre nyaka chieng’ .
19069025	Ol mirimbi kuomgi ; we mirimbi mager omakgi .
19069026	Mad miechgi olokre gundni ; kendo kik iyiene ng’ato ang’ata dag e hembgi
19069027	Nimar gisando joma ihinyo kendo giwuoyo kuom lit mag joma ihinyo .
19069028	Ket ketho e wigi kuom ketho ka ketho ma gitimo ; kendo kik iyie giyud warruok mari .
19069029	Mad ruch kargi oko e bug joma ngima kendo kik kwan-gi kaachiel gi joma kare .
19069030	An-gi rem kendo awinjo marach e chuyna ; mad warruokni rita , Yaye Nyasaye .
19069031	Abiro pako nying Nyasaye gi wer kendo abiro miyo nyinge duong’ gi erokamano .
19069032	Mano biro miyo Jehova mor moloyo ruadh pur , moloyo ruath mabuoch man-gi tungene kod ombong’-ge
19069033	Joma odhier biro neno mi gibed mamor , un ma udwaro Nyasaye mad chunyu bed mangima !
19069034	Jehova winjo joma ochando kendo ok olok ng’eye ne joge motue .
19069035	Piny gi polo mondo opake , kaachiel kod nembe kod gik moko duto mawuothoe igi ,
19069036	nikech Nyasaye biro reso Sayun kendo obiro gero taonde mag Juda kendo . Eka ji nodag kanyo kendo gini kawe kaka margi ;
19069037	enobed girkeni mar koth jotichne , kendo joma ohero nyinge nodag kanyo .
19070001	Ret piyo mondo iresa , Yaye Nyasaye ; bi piyo mondo ikonya , Yaye Jehova .
19070002	
19070003	Mad joma dwaro ngimana yud wichkuot kendo pachgi lal ; mad ji duto ma gombona hinyruok gom dog kuma giaye ka giyudo achaya .
19070004	Mad joma wachona ni , " Haa ! Haa ! " dog kuma giaye ka wichkuot omakogi .
19070005	To mad ji duto ma manyi il kendo bed mamor kuomi ; mad joma ohero wa rruok mari wach kinde duto ni , " Nyasaye mondo oyud duong’ ! "
19070006	Anto adhier kendo achando ; bi ira piyo , Yaye Nyasaye . In e konyruokna kendo jaresna ; kik ideki , Yaye Jehova .
19071001	E iyi ema aponde , Yaye Jehova ; kik iwe ane wichkuot .
19071002	Ko n ya kendo gola e chandruok , nikech timni makare ; chikna iti mondo iwara .
19071003	Bedna lwanda mar pondo , ma anyalo ringo adhiye seche duto ; gol chik mondo iwara , nimar in e lwandana kendo ohingana .
19071004	Resa e lwet joma timbegi richo , Yaye Nyasacha , yudha kuom richo gi joma kwiny momaka matek .
19071005	Nimar in ema isebedo genona , Yaye Ruoth Nyasaye , in ema isebedo kimiya chir nyaka ae tinna .
19071006	Asebedo ka ayiengora kuomi nyaka ne nyuola ; in ema ne igola ei minwa . Abiro siko ka apaki nyaka chieng’ .
19071007	Alokora gima buogo ji mang’eny to kata kamano in e kar pondo mara motegno .
19071008	Dhoga opong’ gi pakni , kendo asiko ahulo duong’ni maler odiechieng’ duto .
19071009	Kik ijog koda ka koro ati ; kikijwang’a ka tekra orumo .
19071010	Nimar wasika wuoyo marach kuoma ; jogo marita mondo onega loso wach kaachiel .
19071011	Giwacho ni , " Nyasaye osewe ye , " omiyo laweuru umake , nimar onge ng’ama biro konye . "
19071012	Kik ibed mabor koda , Yaye Nyasaye ; bi piyo mondo ikonya , Yaye Nyasacha .
19071013	Mad joma donjona lal nono ka wigi okuot ; mad joma dwa hinya olwor gi achaya kod wichkuot koni gi koni .
19071014	An-to abiro siko ka an gi geno ; abiro paki kendo abiro medo paki .
19071015	Dhoga biro hulo timni makare , kod warruokni odiechieng’ duto , kata obedo ni ging’eny mohinga ng’eyo .
19071016	Abiro biro mondo anyis ji timbeni madongo , Yaye Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto ; abiro nyiso ji timni makare , timni makare in kendi .
19071017	Isepuonja nyaka aa e nyathi , Yaye Nyasaye , kendo nyaka kawuono pod ahulo timbegi miwuoro .
19071018	Kata ka ochopo kinde ma ati kendo wiya oti lwar , to kik iwe ya , Yaye Nyasaye .
19071019	Timni makare ochopo nyaka ei kor polo , Yaye Nyasaye , in misetimo gik madongo . En ng’a ma dipim kodi , Yaye Nyasaye ?
19071020	Kata obedo ni isemiyo aneno chandruok mathoth kendo malit , to pod ibiro miyo abed mangima kendo .
19071021	Ibiro miyo duong’ ma an-go medore kendo ibiro chako ihoya kendo .
19071022	Abiro paki gi nyatiti nikech adiera mari , Yaye Nyasaye ; abiro weroni wend pak gi orutu , Yaye Jaler mar Israel .
19071023	Dhoga biro kok gi mor ka aweroni wend pak-An ng’at misewaro .
19071024	Lewa biro nyiso ji kuom timbegi makare odiechieng’ duto , nimar joma ne dwaro hinya oseneno wichkuot kendo oseng’eng’ .
19072001	Sidh ne ruoth adiera mari , Yaye Nyasaye , sidh ne wuod loch timni makare .
19072002	Obiro ng’ado ne jou bura makare . Obiro kelo adiera ne jou masandore .
19072003	Gode biro kelo mwandu ne ji , kendo thuche biro kelo olemb tim makare .
19072004	Obiro chwako joma odhier manie dier ji kendo obiro reso nyithind joma ochando , to jadi ji to obiro tieko pe p .
19072005	Obiro siko ka wang’ chieng’ , obiro siko ka dwe e tienge duto .
19072006	Obiro chalo gi koth machue e lum mong’adi maber kendo gi kodh ajiki mamiyo piny ng’ich .
19072007	E ndalone joma kare biro dhi maber , kendo kuwe biro bedo mogundho nyaka chop dwe lal nono .
19072008	Obiro bedo gi loch chakre nam nyaka nam kendo kochakore Aora maduong’ nyaka kuma piny ogikie .
19072009	Ogendini modak e piny ongoro biro kulorene kendo wasike biro nang’o lowo gi dhogi .
19072010	Ruodhi mag Tarshish kod mag dho nembe man mab oyo biro miye gik moko kendo ruodhi mag Sheba gi mag Seba biro kelone mich .
19072011	Ruodhi duto biro kulorene kendo ogendini duto biro tiyone .
19072012	Nimar obiro konyo joma ochando maywagore , jogo modhier ma onge gi jakony .
19072013	Obiro kecho joma ok nyal gi joma ochando kendo obiro reso ngima joma ochando .
19072014	Obiro gologi e dich modigigo kendo e timbe mahundu , nimar okwano rembgi ka gima nengone tek .
19072015	Mad odag aming’a ! Mad kelne dhahabu moa Sheba . Mad ji duto sik ka lamone kendo ka gwedhe odiechieng’ duto .
19072016	Mad cham bed mang’eny kuonde duto e piny , kendo gikwak koda ka kuonde moting’ore gi malo mag thuche . Mad olembene ol mathoth ka Lebanon , kendo mad onyagi ka lum manie pap .
19072017	Mad nyinge sik nyaka chieng’ kendo mad odhi nyime ka wang’ chieng’ . Ogendini duto ibiro gwedhi gi nyinge , kendo gibiro luonge ni ng’ama ogwedhi .

19073001	Nyasaye timo maber adier ne jo Israel , otimo maber ne jogo maler gie i chunygi .
19073002	An to tiendena nodwa kier . Ne achiegni aa kama ne anyono .
19073003	Nimar ne agombo timbe joma ochayo ji kane aneno kaka joma timbegi richo dhi maber .
19073004	Gionge pek moro amora kendo dendgi ber kendo otegno .
19073005	Chandruok ma mako ji gin ok yudgi kendo ok githagre kaka ji mamoko thagore .
19073006	Emomiyo sunga chalonegi thiwni mar ng’ut , kendo girwako maundu ka law .

19073009	Giwacho weche polo gi dhogi to lewgi to gimakogo mwandu mag piny .
19073010	Emomiyo jog egi doknegi kendo pa kogi kendo ok giyud rach moro amora kuomgi .
19073011	Giwacho ni , " Ere kaka Nyasaye nyalo ng’eyo ? Nyasaye Mamalo Mogik to ong’eyo ang’o ? "
19073012	Kama e kaka joma timbegi richo chalo : ok gidew gimoro amora kendo mwandugi osiko medore ameda .
19073013	Kare asetemo ritora mondo chunya osik kaler kayiem , kendo asetemo geng’o lwetena ni kik omul richo kayiem .
19073014	Nimar asiko achandora seche te , kendo ayudo kum okinyi kokinyi .
19073015	Ka dine bed ni awacho ni , " Abiro wacho kama , " to dine andhogo nyithindi .

19073017	nyaka ne adonjo kama ler mar Nyasaye ; eka nawinjo kaka gikog i nobedi .
19073018	Chutho iket ogi kama pothpoth , kendo ibologi piny mi githo .

19073021	Kane iya owang’ , kendo chunya winjo lit ,
19073022	to pacha nolal kendo ne ab e d o mofuwo , ne achalo le maonge rieko e nyimi .

19073024	Itaya gi rieko ming’adona kendo bang’e ibiro tera kar duong’ .

19073026	R i n gra gi chunya nyalo doko manyap , to Nyasaye ema miyo chunya teko , kendo en e girkeni mara nyaka chieng’ .

19073028	An to berna ka an but Nyasaye . Aseketo Ruoth Nyasaye kar pondona , kendo abiro lando gima moko duto mitimo .
19074001	Ang’o momiyo isedagiwa nyaka chieng’ , Yaye Nyasaye ? Ang’o momiyo mirimbi dhuolore ka iro ko c h o m o rombe mag lek mari iwuon ?
19074002	Par jogi mane ing’iewo chon gi lala , oganda ma gin girkeni mari , kendo mane iwaro-Got Sayun , kama in iwuon idakie .
19074003	Chak goyo okangegi ichom kuonde mosebedo ko kethore nyaka nenegi , lokri ichom kethruok maduong’ ma jasigu osekelo e kari maler .
19074004	Wasiki noruto kamane ijaromega kodwa ; kendo ne gichungo bendechegi mochung’ kar timbegi maricho .
19074005	Ne gitimore marach mana ka ji mang’awo leyegi malo ka gidwaro tong’o yiende madongo dongo modongo modhigore .
19074006	Ne gituro chumbe modol odol gi tindogi kod nyundogi .
19074007	Ne giwang’o kari maler molokore buru , kendo ne gidwanyo kama nyingi dakie .
19074008	Ne giwacho e chunygi ni , " Wabiro tiekogi chuth ! " Ne giwang’o kuonde duto e piny mane ilame Nyasaye .
19074009	Tinde ok miwa honni kaka ranyisi , kendo onge jonabi modong’ kata achiel , to onge kata ng’ato achiel kuomwa mong’eyo , ni mano biro bedo kamano nyaka karang’o .
19074010	N yaka karang’o ma jasigu biro jarie , Yaye Nyasaye ? Ibiro yiene jasigu mondo oyany nyingi nyaka chieng’ koso ?
19074011	Ang’o momiyo itamo lweti tiyo tichne , mana lweti mako rachwich ? Gole oko kama isoye ei lepi mondo itiekgi !
19074012	To in e Ruodha nyaka chakre chon , Yaye Nyasaye , kendo isebedo kikelo resruok e piny .
19074013	In emane ipogo nam diere ariyo gi tekoni , kendo ne itoyo wiye ondiek marach ei pi .
19074014	In emane itoyo wiye Leviathan , mi ichiwe kaka chiemo ne le modak e thim .
19074015	In emane iyawo sokni gi aoche , kendo ne imiyo aoche madongo ma ok duon otwo
19074016	Odiechieng’ en mari , kendo otieno bende mari , bende ne iguro wang’ chieng’ gi dwe keregi .
19074017	In emane iketo tong’ duto mag piny kende ne iguro chwiri gi opon .
19074018	Parie kaka jasigu osejari , Yaye Jehova . Parie kaka joma onge rieko osechayo nyingi .
19074019	Kik iyie ichiw ngima mar akuchi ne le mager mag bungu ; kik wiyi wil gi ngima jogi mathagore nyaka chieng’ .
19074020	Par singruok mari nikech timbe maundu opong’o kuonde luto motimo mudho e piny .
19074021	Kik iyie mondo joma idiyo ringa ka wigi okuot , to mad joma odhier gi joma ochando opak nyingi .
19074022	Aa malo mondo isir tichni , Yaye Nyasaye ; parie kaka joma ofuwo jari odiechieng’ duto .
19074023	Kik wiyi wil gi sibuoch wasiki , chom tir sigich wasiki mosiko medore ameda .
19075001	Wagoyoni erokamano , Yaye Nyasaye , wagoyoni erokamano nimar Nyingi ni machiegni , kendo ji lando timbeni miwuoro .
19075002	
19075003	Iwacho ni , " An ema ayiero ndalo mowinjore , kendo an ema ang’ado bura kare .
19075004	Ka piny kaachiel gi ji duto modakie yiengni , to an ema amako sirnige motegno . Sela
19075005	Joma ochecho akwero ni , " Weuru sungoru ; to joma timbegi richo to okwero ni , " Weuru ting’o tungeu malo . "
19075006	Weuru bwogo polo gi tungeu , kendo kikuwuo ka ududo ng’uteu . ’ "
19075007	Nimar duong’ ok nyal medore ne ng’ato koa wuok chieng’ kata podho chieng’ kata e thim .
19075008	To Nyasaye ma jang’ad bura ema dwoko ng’ato piny , kendo ting’o ng’at machielo malo .
19075009	E lwet Jehova nitiere okombe moro mopong’ gi divai mochiek moriw gi gik makech-kech ka oole oko , to joma timbegi richo duto manie piny madhe duto pep nyaka ng’iende .
19075010	An to abiro siko ka alando wachni nyaka chieng’ kendo abiro wero wende pak ne Nyasach Jakobo .
19075011	Abiro ng’ado oko tunge joma timbegi richo duto , to tunge joma kare to ibiro ting’ malo .
19076001	Nyasaye en rahuma e piny Juda , kendo nyinge duong’ e piny Israel .
19076002	
19076003	Hembe nitie Salem kar dakni ni Sayun .
19076004	Kanyo ema nature aserni makakni , kaachiel gi okumbni gi ligengni , ma gin gig lweny
19076005	Duong’ mari ler okwako kendo iyombo gode momew gi kit le mayoreyore .
19076006	Yawuowi madongo mojing’ osema gik mane giyako koro ginindo nindogi mogik ; kendo onge jokedogo kata achiel , manyalo ting’o kata mana bade .
19076007	Nikech kwer misekwerogigo , Yaye Nyasach Jakobo omiyo faras gi gari moywayo ochung’ kar tiendegi .
19076008	In kendi ema onego oluori . Koso en ng’a manyalo chung’ e nyimi ka mirima omaki ?
19076009	Ne ing’ado bura gie polo , mi piny ne luoro omako moling’ thi -
19076010	Kane ia malo mondo ing’ad bura , Yaye Nyasaye , mondo ikony ji duto ma winjo marach e piny . Sela
19076011	Kuom adier , mirima ma in-go gi ji , keloni pak , kendo miyo joma otony ne mirimbi ritore .
19076012	Singri ne Jehova Nyasachi , kendo ne ni ichopogi ; bende ne ni pinje duto man machiegni kelo mich ne Jal monego ji luor .
19076013	Ochodo chuny jotelo , kendo ruodhi duto mag piny oluore .
19077001	Ne aywakne Nyasaye mondo okonya , kendo ne aywakne Nyasaye mondo owinja .
19077002	
19077003	Kane an e chandruok , ne amanyo Ruoth ; otieno duto ne arieyo bedena malo maok aol , kendo chunya nodagi hoch .
19077004	Ne apari mine ahum , Yaye Nyasaye , ne aol kendo chunya nonyosore .
19077005	Ne imako wengena mi ok oimore , kendo ne an gi pek maok anyal wuoyo .
19077006	Ne aparo kuom ndalo machon , higni machon gi lala ;
19077007	ne aparo wendega mag otieno . Ne aloso gi pacha awuon , kendo chunya nopenjo kama :
19077008	" Be Ruoth nyalo dagi ng’ato chuth ? Be en adier ni ok obi ochak ong’uon kendo ?
19077009	Be herane maok rem dirum chuth adier ? Singruokne be nyalo bare mak ochopo nyaka chieng’ ?
19077010	Mitki Nyasaye wiye osewil gi kecho ji ? " Sela
19077011	Eka naparo ni , " Ma e kama abiro kwayoe kony : higni ma lwet Jal Mamalo Mogik mako rachwich osetieko . "
19077012	Abiro siko kaparo timbe Jehova ; ee , abiro paro kuom honni magi machon gilala .
19077013	Abiro paro mos kuom tijegi duto , kendo abiro paro matut kuom timbegi madongo duto .
19077014	Yoreni ler , Yaye Nyasaye . En nyasaye mane maduong’ kaka Nyasachwa ?
19077015	In e Nyasaye matimo honni , kendo inyiso tekoni e dier ji mopogore opogore .
19077016	Ne iwaro jogi gi badi maratego , jogi ma nyikwa Jakobo gi Josef . Sela
19077017	Pige noneni , Yaye Nyasaye , pige noneni mi luoro omakogi , kendo kude matut notetni .
19077018	Boche polo ne oolo pi piny , kendo polo nomor e kor polo , ka asernigi mil koni gi koni .
19077019	Mor polo mari nowinji ei yamo mager , mil polo mari nomenyo piny duto , kendo piny notetni kendo oyiengni .
19077020	Yori nong’ado dier nam , yo miluwo nokadho e dier pige maringo matek , kata obedo ni kuonde mane tiendeni onyono ne ok nyal ne gi wang’ .
19077021	Ne itelo ne jogi ka jakwath ka gin e lwet Musa gi Harun .
19078001	Chiknauru itu , Yaye un joga , winjuru weche mawuok e dhoga .
19078002	Abiro yawo dhoga ka agoyo ngeche , ee , abiro wacho weche mopondo mawuoyo kuom gik mane otimore chon gilala -
19078003	Gik ma wasewinjo kendo ma wang’eyo , mane wuonewa onyisowa .
19078004	Ok wabi pandogi ne nyithindgi ; to wabiro hulogi ne tieng’ mabiro timbe mipako mag Jehova gi tekone kod gik miwuoro mosetimo .
19078005	Ne ogolo chike ne joka Jakobo kendo noguro chik e piny Israel , chike mane omiyo kwe r ewa mondo opuonj nyithindgi ,
19078006	mondo tieng’ mabiro ong’egi , koda ka nyithindo mapok onyuol , kendo gin bende ginyis nyithindgi .
19078007	Eka mondo mi giket genogi kuom Nyasaye kendo kik wigi wil gi gik mosetimo to ni mondo girit chikene .
19078008	Bende mondo kik ne gichal gi kweregi-mane gin tieng’ ma tokgi tek kendo ma jong’anyo , ma chunjegi ne ok ochiwore ne Nyasaye kendo ne ok luwe gi adiera .
19078009	Jo Efraim nogomo odok chieng’ kedo , kata obedo ni negimanore gi atunge .
19078010	Ne ok girito singruok mar Nyasaye kendo ne gidagi dak ka giluwo chik Nyasaye .
19078011	Wigi nowil gi gik mane osetimo , ranyisi mane osenyisogi .
19078012	Ne otimo honni ka wuonegi neno e gweng’ mar Zoan , e piny Misiri .
19078013	Ne omiyo nam opogore diere ariy o mi nomiyo gikadho kendo nomiyo pi ochung’ moling’ thi ka ohinga .
19078014	Ne otayogi kod bor polo godiechieng’ kendo giler moa e mach otieno duto .
19078015	Ne otucho lwanda e thim kendo nomiyogi pi mogundho ka nembe ;
19078016	bende nomiyo aoche obu b n i kawuok e lwanda kama obarore mi pi nomol piny mana ka aora .
19078017	To eka pod ne gidhi mana nyime ka gitimo richo e nyime ka ging’anyo e thim ne Jal Mamalo Mogik .
19078018	Ne gitemo Nyasaye ka ging’eyo , kuom kete mondo omigi chiemo mane gigombo .
19078019	Ne giwuoyo marach kuom Nyasaye ka giwacho ni , " Nyasaye be nyalo chano mesa e nyimwa e thim ka ?
19078020	Kane ogoyo lwanda to pi nothinyore oko kendo aoche nochako mol mogundho . To chiemo be domiwa adier ? Ring’o be onyalo kelo mi opog ne joge adier ? "
19078021	Kane Jehova owinjo gi ite , iye nowang’ ahinya , mi mach mare notuk kuom joka Jakobo , kendo mirimbe mager nobiro kuom jo Israel ,
19078022	nimar ne ok giyie kuom Nyasaye kata geno kuom resruok mare .
19078023	To eka pod nogolo chik ne kor polo malo kendo noyawo dhoudi mag polo ;
19078024	ne oolo mana piny ka koth mondo ji ocham , adier , nomiyogi chamb polo .
19078025	Ji nochamo makati mar malaike , kendo nooro negi kit chiemo duto mane ginyalo chamo .
19078026	Ne ogonyo yamb ugwe moa e polo , kendo nogolo yamb milambo gi tekone .
19078027	Nolwaro ring’o piny kuomgi ka buru , adier , winy mahuyo nolwar kuomgi ka kwoyo manie dho nam .
19078028	Nomiyo winjego olwar piny nyaka ei kambi mi ne gilworo hembegi duto koni gi koni .
19078029	Ne gichiemo mi chiemo otamogi tieko , nimar nomiyogi gima ne chunygi gombo .
19078030	To kane pok gitieko chiembgi mar gombono , chutho , ka chiemo ne pod opong’o dhogi ,
19078031	mirima mager mar Nyasaye nogore kuomgi , mi nomiyo jogegi maroteke otho , kendo nopielo yawuot Israel mapod tindo piny .
19078032	To kata obedo ni magi duto nosetimore , pod ne gidhi mana nyime gitimo richo ; pod ne ok giyie kuome , kata obedo ni ne osetimo ranyisi mathoth e diergi .
19078033	Omiyo nomiyo ngimagi orumo ka onge ber kendo higni mag-gi nopong’ gi masiche ma bwogo ji .
19078034	E kinde moro amora mane Nyasaye okumogie , to ne gimanye kendo ne gilokore mi gichak gidware gi siso .
19078035	Ne giparo ni Nyasaye ema ne en lwanda margi , kendo ni Nyasaye Mamalo Mogik ema ne en Jawargi .
19078036	To kata kamano ne gichare achara gi dhogi , ka giwuonde gi lewgi .
19078037	nimar chunygi ne ok omoko kuome , kendo ne ok gilu singruokne kuom adier .
19078038	To en , kaka en ng’ama kecho ji , noweyo negi kethogi , kendo ne ok otiekogi . Kinde ka kinde nogeng’o mirimbe kendo ne ok otoyo mirimbe duto kuomgi .
19078039	Noparo kaka ne gin mana dhano adhana machalo yamo makalo kendo ok chak duogi .
19078040	Mano kaka ne ging’anyone e thim di mang’eny kendo ne gimiye chuny lit e piny motwo !
19078041	Ne gitemo Nyasaye anuoya anuoya , kendo ne gisindo Jal Maler mar Israel .
19078042	Ne ok giparo tekone-ne ok giparo odiechieng’ mane owarogi e lwet jasigu ,
19078043	odiechieng’ mane onyiso e lela honni mage e piny Misri kane otimo ranyisige e gweng’ mar Zoan .
19078044	Noloko aochegi remo mi koro ne ok ginyal modho pi moa e aochegi .
19078045	Ne ooro pumbi mag lwang’ni mane omwonyogi , gi ogwende mane oketho pinygi .
19078046	Ne ochiwo chambgi ne ongogo , chambgi mosechiek ne bonyo .
19078047	Ne oketho olembegi mag mzabibu gi pe , kod yiendegi mag ng’owu gi yamo mang’ich .
19078048	Ne ochiwo jambgi ne pe , kendo nomiyo dhogegi polo ogoyo .
19078049	Ne oolo kuomgi mirimbe maliet , kokecho kendo iye owang’ kendo ogeroganda malaike ma jonek .
19078050	Ne olosone mirimbe yo maluwo , kendo ne ok okechogi e tho to ne ojwang’ogi mondo tho otiekgi .
19078051	Ne onego kach jo Misri duto , mana olemo mokuongo chiek mag dhano e hembe mag Ham .
19078052	To joge to nogolo oko mana ka kweth , kendo notelo negi ka rombe koyoro kodgi thim .
19078053	Ne otayogi maber omiyo ne gionge gi luoro , to wasikgi to ne nam omwonyo .
19078054	Kamano e kaka ne okelogi nyaka e tong’ mar pinje maler , nyaka ne gitundo e piny motimo thuche , ma lwete makorachwich nosekawo .
19078055	Ne oriembo ogendini e nyimgi kendo nomiyogi lopgi kaka girkeni margi , mi nomiyo dhout Israel odak e miechgi giwegi .
19078056	To kata kamano ne gitemo Nyasaye , kendo ne ging’anyone En Mamalo Mogik ; ka gidagi rito chikene .
19078057	Mana kaka wuonegi ne ok giwinje kendo ne ok gin jo adiera kendo ne gichalo atung’ mobam ma ok nyal gen .
19078058	Ne giwang’o iye gi kuondegi moting’ore malo , kendo ne gichiewo nyieke gi nyisechegi mane giloso .
19078059	Kane Nyasaye owinjogi , iye nowang’ ahinya , kendo nodagi jo Israel chuth .
19078060	Ne ojwang’o hemb romo mane ni Shilo , mane en hema mane oguro owuon e dier ji .
19078061	Nooro Sandug Muma e twech , mi duong’ne maler nodhi e lwet wasigu .
19078062	Nochiwo joge ne ligangla , kendo nokecho ahinya gi girkeni mare .
19078063	Mach notieko yawuotgi matindo , kendo nyigi ne ok ower negi wende arus ;
19078064	jodologi ne onegi , kendo mondegi ne ywak otamo .
19078065	Eka Ruoth nochiew ka gima oa e nindo , mana kaka ng’ato chiewo , bang’ madho divai mang’eny .
19078066	Ne oriembo wasike gi goch , kendo nomiyo giyudo wichkuot mosiko .
19078067	Ne odagi hembe mag Josef , bende ne ok oyiero dhood joka Efraim ,
19078068	to dhood joka Juda emane oyiero , ee , noyiero mana Got Sayun , mane ohero .
19078069	Ne ogero kare maler , ka go d e maboyo , kendo mana ka piny mane oguro nyaka chieng’ .
19078070	Ne oyiero Daudi jatichne , kendo nogole e abich rombe ;
19078071	nogole e tij rito rombe moke l e mondo okwa joge ma Jakobo mondo okwa Israel girkeni mare .
19078072	Kuom mano Daudi nokwayogi gi chuny makare kendo notelo negi , gi lwedo mong’ith .
19079001	Yaye Nyasaye , Ogendini osemonjo girkeni mari ; gisedwanyo Hekalu mari maler , kendo giseketho Jerusalem modong’ pidhe-pidhe .
19079002	Gisechiwo ringre jogi motho mondo obed chiemb winy manie kor polo , ring jogi maler gisechiwo ne ondiegi mag piny .
19079003	Giseolo remo e alwora mar Jerusam ka pi , kendo koro onge ng’ama nyalo iko joma otho .
19079004	Waselo kore gima kuodo wich ne jobutwa , joma ijaro kendo inyiero gi joma olworowa .
19079005	Nyaka karang’o , Yaye Jehova ? Ibiro kecho nyaka chieng’ koso ? Nyaka karang’o ma nyiego mari biro lielie ka mach ?
19079006	Ol mirimbi kuom pinje ruodhi , maok luong nyingi ;
19079007	nimar gisengamo Jakobo mi giketho gweng’e .
19079008	Kik ikwanwa kaka joketho , nikech richo mag wuonewa ; mad kechni bi romnwa piyo , nimar osedwokwa piny marach .
19079009	Konywa , Yaye Nyasaye ma Jawarwa , nikech duong’ mar nyingi ; reswa kendo wenwa richowa , mondo nyingi oyud duong’ .
19079010	Ang’o momiyo ogendini onego owach ni , " Nyasachgino to ere ? " Mi ogendini ong’e , ka waneno gi wang’wa , ni ichulo kuor nikech remb jog i mosechwer .
19079011	Mad chur ma joma otwe churgo chopi e nyimi ; rit ngima joma oseng’adnegi buch tho gi teko mar badi .
19079012	Chul kuor ne jobutwa nyadibiriyo ki goyo bembegi . Kuom ayany ma gisediro kuomi , Yaye Jehova .
19079013	Eka jogi , ma gin rombegi mikwayo , biro paki nyaka chieng’ , kendo wabiro nyiso pakni , koa e tieng’ moro nyaka tieng’ machielo .
19080001	Chiknwa iti , Yaye Jakwadh jo Israel , in mitelo ne Josef ka kweth mar dhok ; in mibetekom loch e kind kerubi , koro rieny ane
19080002	
19080003	e nyim Efraim , gi Benjamin gi Manase . Nyis tekri kendo bi mondo ireswa .
19080004	Dwogwa iri , Yaye Nyasaye ; mi wang’i orienynwa , eka mondo wayud warruok
19080005	Yaye Jehova Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto , mirimbi biro siko koyienyo gi lamo mar jogi nyaka karang’o ?
19080006	Isemiyo gichamo pi wang’ ka kuon kendo isemiyo gimodho pi wang’ agwetni modhuro .
19080007	Isemiyo wadoko rachwany ne jobutwa , kendo wasikwa jarowa .
19080008	Dwogwa iri , Yaye Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto ; mi wang’i orienynwa , eka mondo wayud warruok .
19080009	Ne igolo mzabibu moro e piny Misri , kendo ne iriembo ogendini mi ipidhe kargi .
19080010	Ne ilosone lowo maber , kendo nochwoyo tiendene piny mi opong’o piny .
19080011	Tipone noimo gode duto , mana ka yiende sida ma odonge ma bedene olak .
19080012	Noyaro bedene madongo nyaka e nam kendo noloth mochweyo nyaka e aora .
19080013	Koro ang’o momiyo isemuko ohinga mag e , momiyo ji duto makadho pone ka olemo .
19080014	Mbithe moa e bungu kethe , kendo le mag bungu chame .
19080015	Duog irwa , Yaye Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto ! Ng’i piny gie polo mondo ine ! Ng’i mzabibu maber ,
19080016	yien ma lweti makorachwich ema nopidho gi tiende ma en wuodi misepidho in iwuon .
19080017	Mzabibu mari osetong’ mi owang’ gi mach , jogi lal nono nikech isekwerogi .
19080018	Mad lweti bed kuom Jal mobet e bathi korachwich , ma en Wuod Dhano misechungo ne in iwuon .
19080019	Eka ok wanachak walokre waweyi ; dwogwa iri eka wanaluong nyingi .
19080020	Duogwa iri , Yaye Jehova Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto mi wang’ orienynwa , eka mondo wayud warruok .
19081001	Weruru matek gi mor ne Nyasaye ma miyowa teko , gouru koko matek ne Nyasach Jakobo !
19081002	
19081003	Chakuru wer , yiekuru oyie ke ; gweluru nyatiti gi asili mamit .
19081004	Gouru tung im ka Dwe Manyien ochakore , ma en ka dwe osetegno , e odiechieng’ mar Nyasiwa mogen .
19081005	Ma en gima ochuno jo Israel ; chik ma Nyasach Jakobo nogolo .
19081006	Ne ogure kaka chik ne Josef , kane owuok gi mirima koa Misri , kuma ne wawinje dhok mane wakia .
19081007	Owacho ni , " Ne agolo misigo mapek e gokgi , mi lwetgi nogony e ting’o atonge .
19081008	Ne iluongo ka in e chandruok mi akonyi , ne aduoki gie ii boche polo , kendo ne atemi e tie pige mag Meriba . Sela
19081009	Winjuru wach , Yaye joga , to abiro siemou , abiro siemou ka uikoru mar winja , Yaye Israel .
19081010	Kik ubed gi nyasaye ma wendo e dieru , kendo kik ukulru ne nyasaye ma ukia .
19081011	An Jehova Nyasachu , mane ogolou Misri . Ng’amuru dhou malach mondo apong’e .
19081012	" To joga nodagi winjo duonda kendo Israel nodagi timo kaka achikogi .
19081013	Omiyo ne aweyogi nikech chunygi ne tek , kendo negiluwo yoregi giwegi .
19081014	" Ka dine joga yie winja , ka dine Israel yie lu yorena ,
19081015	mano kaka dine atieko wasikgi piyo piyo kendo dine agoyo joma kedo kodgi gi lweta !
19081016	Joma ochayo Jehova dine okulorene gi luoro , kendo kum margi dosiko nyaka chieng’ .
19081017	To un dine apidhou gi ngano maber mogik , kendo dine aromou gi mor kich ma athodho e lwanda .
19082001	Nyasaye osekawo kare e dier chokruok maduong’ , koro ong’ado bura e kind " nyiseche . "
19082002	" Nyaka karang’o ma ubiro dhi nyime ka udewo wang’ joma ok timbegi nikare kendo kudewo wang’ joma timbegi richo ? Sela
19082003	Siruru joma ok nyal kod mago manyithi kiye , rituru ratiro mago ma jodhier kod joma idiyo .
19082004	Resuru joma ok nyal kod joma ochando ; golgiuru e lwet joma timbegi richo .
19082005	" To gisesiko ka gimemore kendo onge gima ging’eyo . Giwuotho koni gi koni e mudho ; kendo gimiyo mise duto mag piny yiengni .
19082006	" Asenyisou ni , ‘ un nyiseche , " kendo ni un duto un yawuot Jal Mamalo Mogik . ’
19082007	To ubiro tho ka ji ajia ; adier ubiro podho mana kaka jatelo moro amora maok otang’ .
19082008	Aa malo , Yaye Nyasaye , ng’adne piny bura , nimar ogendini duto gin girkeni magi .
19083001	Kik iling’ , Yaye Nyasaye ; kik iywe , Yaye Nyasaye , bende kik ibed mos .
19083002	
19083003	Neye kaka wasiki piem kodi gi koko maduong’ . Neye kaka joma kedo kodi ng’anyoni .
19083004	Gichano timo ne jogi marach ling’ling’ ; giloso chenro maricho ne joma chunyi ohero .
19083005	Giwacho ni , " Biuru watiekgi mi girum pep kaka oganda , mondo nying mar Israel kik chak par kendo . "
19083006	Giloso chenro ka giriwo pachgi bedo achiel , gilosoni riwruok mondo gibed kodi .
19083007	Gin hembe jo Edom gi jo Ishmael , jo Moab gi jo Hagri ,
19083008	Jo Gebal , jo Amon kod jo Amalek , jo Filistia kaachiel gi joma odak Turo .
19083009	Koda ka jo Asuria be oseriwore kodgi mondo oriw lwetgi ne nyikwa Lut . Sela
19083010	Timnegi kaka ne itimo ne Midian , mana kaka nitimo ne Sisera gi Jabin e Aora Kishon ,
19083011	mane jotho Endor modoko manyiwa e lo .
19083012	Mi jogi momew ochal gi Oreb kod Zeab mi ruodhigi duto chal gi Zeba kod Zalmuna ,
19083013	mane jowacho ni , " Wakawuru pewe mag kwath mag Nyasaye mondo obed marwa . "
19083014	Mi gichal gi buya mayot-yot , Yaye Nyasacha , mi gichal gi mihudhwe ma yamo tero .
19083015	Mana kaka mach wang’o bungu maduong’ kata kaka mach wang’o wi got ,
19083016	e kaka in bende ilawgi gi ahiti maduong’ kendo ibu oggi gi yambi makudho matek .
19083017	Pong’ wengegi gi wichkuot mondo ji omany nyingi , Yaye Jehova .
19083018	Mad wigi kuodi nyaka chieng’ kendo gisik ka luoro omakogi ; mad gilal nono ka gin gi wichkuot .
19083019	Mi ging’e ni in , ma nyingi Jehovani in kendi e Jal Man Malo Mogik kendo ni iloyo piny duto .
19084001	Mano kaka kar dakni ber miwuoro , Yaye Jehova Manyalo Gik Moko Duto !
19084002	
19084003	Chunya gombo kendo nyawni ka agombo laro mag Jehova ; adundona gi denda duto wer gimor ne Nyasaye mangima .
19084004	Nyaka winj abang’ chieth oseloso kar dakne , kendo opija bende osegero ode , kama onyalo nyuole nyithindebut kendoni mar misango , Yaye Jehova Manyalo Gik Moko Duto , ma Ruodha kendo Nyasacha .
19084005	Ogwedh joma odak e odi ; mosiko ka paki . Sela
19084006	Ogwedh joma tekregi ni kuomi jogo moketo chunygi e luwo yori maler .
19084007	Ka gikadho e Holo mar Beka to gimiyo obedo kama opong’ gi sokni ; kendo kodh opon bende pong’e gi yewni .
19084008	Tekregi osiko medore ameda , nyaka chop moro ka moro kuomgi chop Sayun e nyim Nyasaye .
19084009	Yie iwinj lemona , Yaye Jehova Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto ; chikna iti , Yaye Nyasach Jakobo .
19084010	Chom wang’i ine kuodwa , Yaye Nyasaye ; rang ng’ati miwiro gi ng’-wono .
19084011	Bet e laru magi kuom odiechieng’ achiel ber moloyo bet kama chielo kuom higni alufu achiel ; daher bedo jarit dhoot e od Nyasacha , moloyo dak e hembe joma timbegi richo .
19084012	Nimar Jehova Nyasaye en chieng’ kendo en okumba ; Jehova chiwo ng’uono gi luor ; ok otuon joma wuodhgi oriere tir gimoro amora maber .
19084013	Yaye Jehova Manyalo Gik Moko Duto , ng’ama ogeno kuomi oguedhi .
19085001	Ne itimo maber ne piny , Yaye Jehova ; ne iduogone Jakobo mwandune .
19085002	
19085003	Ne iweyone jogi kethogi kendo ne iumo richogi duto . Sela
19085004	Mirimbi duto ne iketo tenge , kendo ne ilokori iweyo mirimbi mager .
19085005	Duogwa iri kendo , Yaye Nyasaye Jawarwa , kendo gol kecho mikechogo kodwa iter mabor .
19085006	Ibiro kecho ko dwa nyaka chieng’ koso ? Koso ibiro choro mirimbi e tienge duto ?
19085007	Ang’o mamoni duogowa iri kendo , mondo eka jogi obed mamor kuomi ?
19085008	Nyiswa herani maok rem , Yaye Jehova , kendo mi wayud resruok mari .
19085009	Abiro chiko ita ne gima Nyasaye ma Jehova biro wacho ; osingo kuwe ne joge maler , to nyaka gine ni ok gidok e timbe mofuwo .
19085010	Adier , resruokne ni machiegni gi joma oluore , kendo duong’ne biro bet e pinywa .
19085011	Hera gi adiera biro riwore kanyakla , kendo tim makare gi kuwe biro nyodhore .
19085012	Adiera biro aa piny kochomo malo , kendo tim makare biro ng’iyo piny gie polo .
19085013	Jehova biro miyowa gima ber adier kendo pinywa biro chiego chambe .
19085014	Tim makare biro telo nyime kendo biro loso yo ne okangege .
19086001	Winj lamona , Yaye Jehova , kendo duoka , nimar adhier kendo achando .
19086002	Rit ngimana , nikech achiworani . In e Nyasacha , omiyo res ngima jatichni mogeno kuomi .
19086003	Kecha , Yaye Ruoth , nimar aywakni odiechieng’ duto .
19086004	Mi jatichni obed mamor nimar in ema arangi gi geno .
19086005	Nikech in iber kendo iweyone ji richogi , Yaye Jehova , ichiwo hera mogundho ne ji duto ma luongi mondo ikonygi .
19086006	Winj lamona , Yaye Jehova ; chik iti ne ywakna ma akwayigo kech .
19086007	Chieng’ ma chandruok omaka to abiro luongi mondo ikonya , nimar ibiro duoka .
19086008	Onge nyasaye moro amora e dier nyiseche machalo kodi , Yaye Ruoth . onge timbe minyalo pimo gi magi .
19086009	Ogendini duto misechueyo biro biro mi podhi e nyimi kalami , Yaye Ruoth , adier , gibiro miyo nyingi duong’ .
19086010	Nimar iduong’ kendo itimo timbe miwuoro ; in e Nyasaye kende .
19086011	Puonja yoreni , Yaye Jehova , mondo eka awuothi e adierani ; miya chuny maonge hubagabaga , mondo eka aluor nyingi .
19086012	Abiro paki gi chunya duto , Yaye Ruoth Nyasacha , abiro miyo nyingi duong’ nyaka chieng’ .
19086013	Nimar hera ma iherago duong’ , kendo isegola ei chuny bur matut .
19086014	Josunga ma wengegi tek monja , Yaye Nyasaye ; kidieny mar joma ok kech ng’ato dwa tieko ngimana-joma ok dew kata in .
19086015	Into in Nyasaye ma kecho kendo ng’won , Yaye Jehova , iyi ok wang’ piyo , ipong’ gi hera kendo in ja adiera .
19086016	Duog ira mondo ikecha ; med jatichni tekoni kendo res jatichni mogeni .
19086017	Miyae ranyisi mar berni , mondo wasika one mi wigi okuodi , nimar in ema isebedo ka ikonya kendo ihoya , Yaye Jehova .
19087001	Oseguro mise mare ewi got maler ;
19087002	Jehova ohero rangeye mag Sayun moloyo kuonde dak duto mag Jakobo .
19087003	Ji wacho gik madongo kuomi , Yaye dala maduong’ mar Nyasaye : Sela
19087004	" Abiro kwano Rahab gi Bablon e kanyakla mar joma ong’eya-koda ka Filistia bende , kod Turo , kaachiel gi Kush-kendo abiro wacho ni , ‘ Jali nonyuol ei Sayun . ’ "
19087005	Adier , nowachi kuom Sayun ni , " Jali gi jalcha bende nonyuol kuome , kendo Jal Mamalo Mogik owuon biro chunge . "
19087006	Jehova biro ndiko e kitabu mindikoe nying ogendini kama : " Jali nonyuol ei Sayun . " Sela
19087007	Sama gihugo wer to giniwer ni , " Sokoga duto nie iyi . "
19088001	Yaye Jehova Nyasaye ma resa , ayuagora e nyimi odiechieng’ gotieno .
19088002	
19088003	Mad lamona chop e nyimi ; yie ilok iti ne kwayona .
19088004	Nimar chandruok opong’o chunya kendo ngimana sudo machiegni gi liel .
19088005	Ikwana kaachiel gi joma ridore piny ei bur matut ; achalo ng’ama onge teko .
19088006	Ojwang’a kaachiel gi joma otho , mana kaka joma onegi monindo e bur , ma koro ok ipar kuomgi kendo , joma ong’ad kargi oko e ritni .
19088007	Iseketa ei bur matut mogik , e iye piny mogik , kama olil ti .
19088008	Mirimbi mager ogore kuoma mapek ; isebara ndas gi apaka magi duto .
19088009	Isemiyo osiepena mane nimachiegni koda mogik oringa , kendo isemiyo koro achalonegi koko . Odinna maok anyal tony ;
19088010	wengena ok nen maber nikech kuyo ma an-go . Aluongi odiechieng’ kodiechieng’ , Yaye Jehova ; achiko n i lwetena .
19088011	Be itimo honni magi ne joma otho ? Joma otho be nyalo chier kendo mi paki ? Sela
19088012	Herani be inyiso joma nie i liel ; adier , koso adierani be yudore e Abadon ?
19088013	Timbeni miwuoro be ong’ere kama otimo mudhono , kata timbeni makare e piny ma ilalieno ?
19088014	Anto aywakni mondo ikonya , Yaye Jehova ; lamona chopo e nyimi gokinyi .
19088015	Yaye Jehova , idaga nang’o momiyo ipandona wang’i ?
19088016	Aseneno chandruok chakre tinna mi adwatho ; asewinjo malit ndi nikech thagruok misekelona , kendo chunya oseol .
19088017	Mirimbi mager oseywaya ; thagruok mimiya osetieka .
19088018	Gilwora ka ataro odiechieng’ duto ; gisedinona chuth koni gi koni .
19088019	Isemaya osiepena gi joherana ; mudho mandiwa ema koro odong’ machiegni koda kaka osiepna .
19089001	Abiro wer nyaka chieng’ kuom hera maduong’ mar Jehova ; abiro nyiso ji gi dhoga mi ging’e kuom adierani e tienge duto .
19089002	
19089003	Abiro nyiso ratiro ni herani ogurore motegno nyaka chieng’ ; kendo ni ne iguro adierani e polo owuon .
19089004	Ne iwacho ni , " Asetimo muma gi ng’ata ma ayiero , asesingora ne Daudi jatichna , ni ,
19089005	‘ Anachung’ kothi nyaka chieng’ kendo anagur lochni motegno e tienge duto . ’ " Sela
19089006	Polo pako timbeni miwuoro kod adierani , Yaye Jehova , e dier chokruok mar joma ler .
19089007	Koso en ng’a e kor polo minyalo pimo gi Jehova ? En ng’a e dier chuech mag polo machalo gi Jehova ?
19089008	E buch joma ler Nyasaye oluor gi luor maduong’ ; olich moloyo chuech duto molwore .
19089009	Yaye Jehova Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto en ng’a machalo kodi ? In ratego kendo adierani olwori , Yaye Jehova .
19089010	In-gi teko e wi nam magingore ; ka apakage dhuolore malo , to ikueyogi .
19089011	Ne ing’inyo Rahab mana ka kitundu , kendo ne ikeyo wasiki gi badi maratego .
19089012	Polo gin magi , kendo piny bende en mari . In ema ne imiyo piny obetie kaachiel gi gik moko duto manie iye .
19089013	Ne ichueyo nyandwat gi milambo ; Tabor gi Hermon pako nyingi gi wer gi mor .
19089014	In-gi bat maratego , lweti bende otegno , kendo lweti makorachwich nigi duong’ .
19089015	Tim makare gi adiera e mise mag lochni ; hera gi ber otelo e nyimi .
19089016	Oguedh joma osepuonjore goyoni sigio mar mor , jogo ma wuotho buti e lerni , Yaye Jehova .
19089017	Giil odiechieng’ duto nikech nyingi ; gidhialo timni makare .
19089018	Nimar in e duong’gi gi tekog i , kendo isedhialo tungwa kuom ng’uononi .
19089019	Adier , kuodwa en mar Jehova , ruodhwa en mar Jal Maler mar Israel
19089020	Kinde moko ne iwuoyo e yor fweny , mine iwacho ne jogi ma jo adiera ni , ‘ Asesidho teko kuom jalweny , asemiyo wuowi moro matin duong’ e dier ji .
19089021	Aseyudo Daudi jatichna ; asewire gi mora maler .
19089022	Lweta biro sire , adier , bada biro miye teko .
19089023	Onge ng’ama timbene richo moro amora mane ochune mondo ogolne osuru ; onge ng’ama timbene richo moro amora ma nosande .
19089024	Abiro tieko chuth joma kedo kode koneno gi wang’e , kendo abiro goyo wasike duto piny .
19089025	Herana mar adier nobed kode , kendo tungene nomi duong’ nikech nyinga .
19089026	Abiro keyo lwete mi kwak nam , kendo lwete makorachwich biro kwako aore .
19089027	Obiro luonga ni , ‘ In Wuonwa kendo in Nyasacha , lwandana ma Jawarna . ’
19089028	Bende abiro ketone nyathina makayo , ma en Jal moting’ malo moloyo ruodhi duto mag piny .
19089029	Abiro siko ka ahere nyaka chieng’ , kendo winjruok ma atimo kode ok norem mak ochopo ngang’ .
19089030	Abiro guro kothe nyaka chieng’ , kendo lochne nosiki mana kaka polo siko .
19089031	" Kata ka yawuote nowe chikna maok giluwo yorena ,
19089032	ka ok girito buchena kendo ka chikena otamogi luwo ,
19089033	to anakum richogi gi luth , kendo anago kethogi gi chwat .
19089034	Kata kamano ok anagol herana kuome , bende ok anatimne gima opogore gi adierana .
19089035	Ok anawe mak achopo winjruokna kode kata loko gima asewacho gi dhoga .
19089036	Asesingo ra dichiel kendo mogik kuom ler mara , kendo ok abi riambo ne Daudi ,
19089037	ni kothe nodhi nyime nyaka chieng’ kendo lochne nosiki e nyima ka wang’ chieng’ ;
19089038	nogure mi osiki nyaka chieng’ kaka dwe , ma en ranyisi madier e kor polo . " Sela
19089039	To in isekwedo , kendo isechayo , iyi osewang’ matek gi ng’ati mowir .
19089040	Iselokori iweyo muma mane itimo gi jatichni , kendo isechido osimbone ei buru .
19089041	Isegoyo ohingage duto piny kendo isemuko kuondege mochiel motegno mi olokore gunda .
19089042	Ji duto makalo bute oseyake ; osedoko ng’ama jobute nyiero .
19089043	Iseting’o lwedo makorachwich mar wasike malo ; isemiyo wasike duto oil .
19089044	Bende isemiyo dho liganglane obedo madik kendo ok isekonye e kedo .
19089045	Isemiyo duong’ne orumo kendo isewito lochne piny .
19089046	Iseng’ado ndalo mag tinne odoko machiek ; isemiyo oneno wichkuot maduong’ .
19089047	Nyaka karang’o , Yaye Jehova ? Ibiro pando wang’i nyaka chieng’ koso ? Mirimbi biro liel ka mach nyaka karang’o ?
19089048	Parie kaka ngimana rumo piyo . Neye kaka ne ichueyo dhano duto kayiem !
19089049	En ng’a manyalo bedo mangima nyakachieng’ mak oneno tho ? Koso en ng’a manyalo resore owuon e teko mar liel ? Sela
19089050	Yaye Jehova , tinde ere hera n i maduong’ machon , hera mane isingori kuom adierani , ni initim ne Daudi ?
19089051	Ruoth , parie kaka ji osechayo jatichni , parie kaka ating’o e chunya ayenje mag ogendini duto ,
19089052	ayenje ma wasiki osejerogo , Yaye Jehova , ayenje ma gisejarogo okang’ kokang’ mar jatichni mowir .
19089053	Opak Jehova nyaka chieng’ ! Amin kendo Amin .
19090001	Yaye Jehova , isebedo kar dak marwa nyaka nene e tienge duto .
19090002	Kane pok gode obetie kata kane pok ichueyo piny gi ji modak e iye , to isebedo ka in Nyasaye nyaka nene kendo manyaka chieng’ .
19090003	Idwoko dhano e lo , kiwacho ni , " Doguru e lo un koth dhano . "
19090004	Nimar higni alufu achiel e nyimi chalo gi odiechieng’ manyoro mosekalo , kata gi saa mar otieno .
19090005	Iywoyo dhano ilalgo nono ka nindo mar tho terogi ; gichalo gi lum mang’ich mar okinyi -
19090006	ma kata obedo ni loth ka ng’ich gokinyi to godhiambo to ner kendo two .
19090007	Mirimbi tiekowa kendo kecho mikechogo kodwa bwogowa .
19090008	Iseketo richowa e nyimi , ee , richowa mwatimo ling’ling’ ineno seche tee .
19090009	Ndalowa kadho piyo nikech mirimbi ; hikwa rumo piyo gi chir .
19090010	Ndalowa en piero abiriyo kata piero aboro , ka ringrewa otegno ; to kata kamano ndalogo duto opong’ gi chandruok kod kuyo , nimar gikalo piyo , kendo gilal nono .
19090011	En ng’a mong’eyo teko mar mirimbi ? Nimar gero mari nigi teko machalo gi teko ma luori kelo .
19090012	Omiyo puonjwa kwano ndalow a kare , mondo wabed gi chuny mariek .
19090013	Ibiro siko kikecho nyaka karang’o , Yaye Jehova ? Lokri , kech jatichni .
19090014	Romwa gokinyi gi herani maok rem , mondo wawer gi ilo kendo wabed mamor ndalowa duto .
19090015	Mi wabed mamor aming’a mana kaka isemiyo waneno malit , marom gi higni ma wasenene chandruok .
19090016	Mad tijeni nere gi jotichni , mad duong’ni nyisre ne nyithindi .
19090017	Mad ng’wono mar Ruoth Nyasachwa obed kodwa ; yie igurnwa tich mar lwetwa-ee gurnwa tich mar lwetwa .
19091001	Ng’at modak ei kar pondo mar Jal Man Malo Mogik biro yudo yueyo e bwo tipo mar Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto .
19091002	Ng’at ma kamano nyalo wacho kuom Jehova ni , " En e kar pondona kendo en e ohingana , en e Nyasacha ma ageno kuome . "
19091003	Jehova biro resi adier kuom gik mochikigo mondo ohinyi kendo kuom tuoche maricho maneko .
19091004	Obiro umi gi buombene , kendo ibiro yudo konyruok e bwo buombene ; adierane biro bedoni ka okumba kendo ka siro .
19091005	Ok iniluor masira mar otieno , kata asere machielore godiechieng’ ,
19091006	kata tuoche maricho maneko mang’anjo e mudho , kata tho matieko ngima ji e dier odiechieng’ tir .
19091007	Ji alufu achiel nyalo podho e bathi , ee , ji alufu apar nyalo riere e badi ko rachwich to in onge moro ma nochop buti .
19091008	Ining’igi ang’iya gi wengeni kendo inine kikumo joma timbegi richo .
19091009	Ka iketo Jal Man malo Mogik kar dakni , adier , kiketo Jehova ma en kar pondowa obedo kar konyruok mari ,
19091010	to onge gimoro amora marach ma notimreni , onge masira ma nosud machiegni gi odi .
19091011	Nimar enochik malaikege konyisogi wachni mondo giriti e yoreni duto ;
19091012	giniting’i malo e lwetgi , mondo kik ichwany tiendi e kidi .
19091013	Ininyon sibuor gi thuond fu ; adier i n i n yon sibuor maratego gi thuol maduong’ man-gi kwiri marach .
19091014	Jehova wacho ni , " Abiro rese nikech ohera ; abiro rite nikech ohulo nyinga .
19091015	E n o l u o n ga , kendo anaduoke ; a n abed kode e chandruok , adier , anakonye kendo anamiye duong’ .
19091016	Anami odag aming’a kendo ananyise warruokna . "
19092001	Pako Jehova en gima ber kendo wero wende mapako nyingi bende ber , Yaye Jal Man Malo Mogik ,
19092002	
19092003	hulo herani gokinyi kod adierani gotieno ,
19092004	kindito wer gi nyatiti matin ma tondege aboro ka wer ridore gi nyatiti maduong’ ber adier .
19092005	Nimar timbeni miya mor , Yaye Jehova ; awer gi mor nikech tije ma lweteni otimo .
19092006	Mano kaka tijeni dongo , Yaye Jehova , mano kaka pachi tut miwuoro !
19092007	Ng’ama oming’ ok nyal ng’eyo , joma ofuwo ok winj tiend wachno ,
19092008	ni kata obedo ni joma timbegi richo nyalo loth kaka lum kendo joma timo richo nyalo dhi maber , to ibiro tiekgi chuth nyaka chieng’ .
19092009	To in , Yaye Jehova , ibiro siko kimiyi duong’ nyaka chieng’ .
19092010	Nikech ka kuom adier , Yaye Jehova , ka kuom adier to wasiki duto biro lal nono ; joma timo richo duto ibiro ke mel .
19092011	Isemiyo tungena odoko ma roboche ka tunge ruadh bungu ; oseol kuoma modhi maliw .
19092012	Aseneno gi wengena ka iloyo wasika kendo asewinjo gi itena ka joma oramona ma timbegi richo itieko .
19092013	Joma kare biro loth maber ka yiend othith , gibiro dongo ka yiend sida mar Lebanon ;
19092014	nikech opidhgi e od Jehova , gibiro loth e agolni mag Nyasachwa .
19092015	Kata hikgi oniang’ to pod gininyag mana olemo , kendo ginisik ka ginyien kendo ging’ich ,
19092016	ka gilando ni , " Jehova oriere tir ; en e lwandana , kendo onge richo moro amora kuome .
19093001	Jehova olocho kendo orwakore gi duong’ , Jehova orwakore gi duong’ kendo omanore gi teko . Piny ochung’ mongirore ; onge ng’ama nyalo yienge .
19093002	Lochni nogur chon gi lala ; ionge chakruokni kata gikoni .
19093003	Nembe ting’ore malo , Yaye Jehova , nembe dhuolore malo ka giwuo ; nembe ting’ore ka apaka gore matek .
19093004	Jehova nigi teko maduong’ moloyo mor mar pige maroteke , en gi teko maduong’ moloyo apaka ma tekregi ng’eny , adier Jehova man malo nigi teko maduong’ .
19093005	Bucheni ochung’ mongirore ; kendo ler opong’o odi nyaka chieng’ , Yaye Jehova .
19094001	Yaye Jehova Nyasaye ma jachul kuor , Yaye Nyasaye ma jachul kuor , nyis lerni .
19094002	Aa malo , Yaye Jang’ad bura mar piny ; chul josunga gima owinjore kodgi .
19094003	Yaye Jehova , nyaka karang’o ma joma timbegi richo , nyaka karang’o ma joma timbegi richo biro goyo siboi ?
19094004	Gidiro weche mag wichteko ; joma timbegi richo duto opong’ gi sunga .
19094005	Gikidho jogi , Yaye Jehova ; gidiyo girkeni mari .
19094006	Ginego chi liel gi jadak ; gideyo ng’ama onge gi wuon .
19094007	Giwacho ni , " Jehova ok ne ; Nyasach Jakobo ok dew gik mwatimo . "
19094008	To winjuru , un joma oming’ e dier ji ; un joma ofuwogi , ubiro bedo mariek karang’o ?
19094009	Donge ng’ama nochomo it winjo wach ? Donge ng’at ma noloso wang’ neno ?
19094010	Donge ng’at ma rieyo ogendini kumo ji ? Be ng’at ma puonjo dhano dibed maonge rieko ?
19094011	Jehova ong’eyo gik ma dhano paro ; ong’eyo ni gin nono .
19094012	Oguedh ng’at mikumo , Yaye Jehova , ma en ng’ama ipuonjo koa e chikeni ;
19094013	imiyo ng’ama kamano resruok e ndalo chandruok , nyaka chop kuny bur ne joma richo .
19094014	Nimar Jehova ok bi dagi joge ; ok obi jwang’o girkeni mare .
19094015	Yor adiera biro yudore kendo ne joma kare , kendo joma oriere gie chunygi biro luwe .
19094016	En ng’a mabiro radona gi joma timb egi richo ? Ng’ano mabiro chwaka kakedo gi joma timo richo ?
19094017	Ka dine Jehova ok omiya kony , to dikoro asedhi dak e piny ma ji oling’e thi .
19094018	Kane awacho ni , " Tienda kier " to herani nojola , Yaye Jehova .
19094019	Ka achiedh nade nopong’o chunya , to hochni noduogo mor e ngimana .
19094020	Sirkal marach be inyalo riworigo adier , loch mamiyo ji chandore malit nikech chikene maricho ?
19094021	Ginywako ne joma kare kendo ging’adone joma onge ketho buch tho .
19094022	To Jehova osebedo ohingana , kendo Nyasacha en lwanda ma aponde .
19094023	Obiro chulogi nikech richogi kendo obiro tiekogi nikech timbegi maricho ; Jehova Nyasachwa biro tiekogi .
19095001	Biuru wawer gimor ne Jehova ; wagouru koko matek ne lwanda mar warruokwa .
19095002	Wabiuru e nyime gi erokamano kendo wami nyinge duong’ ka wawer kendo wakok gi mor .
19095003	Nimar Jehova e Nyasaye maduong’ , en e Ruoth maduong’ moloyo nyiseche duto .
19095004	Oting’o kuonde matut duto mag piny e lwete , kendo wi gode maroboche bende mage .
19095005	Nam mare , nimar en ema nolose , kendo lwetene ema noloso lo motuo .
19095006	Biuru wakulrene ka walame , biuru wago chongwa e nyim Jehova ma Jachwechwa ;
19095007	nimar en e Nyasachwa kendo wan e joge mokwayo , wan e jambe morito . Kawuono ka uwinjo dwonde ,
19095008	to kik chunyu dok matek kaka ne utimo Meriba , kata kaka ne utimo chieng’ cha Massa manie thim ,
19095009	kama wuoneu notemoae kendo oyaloe , kata obedo ni ne giseneno gima ne atimo .
19095010	Kuom higni piero ang’wen iya nowang’ gi tieng’no ; kendo nawacho ni , " Gin joma chunygi ohero ruenyo , kendo pok ging’eyo yorena . "
19095011	Emomiyo mirima nomaka kodgi mine akuong’ora ka aramo ni , " Ok ginidonji e yueyona ngang’ . "
19096001	Weruru wer manyien ne Jehova ; piny duto mondo ower ne Jehova .
19096002	Weruru ne Jehova , pakuru nyinge ; nyisuru ji kuom warruokne odiechieng’ kodiechieng’ .
19096003	Huluru duong’ne e dier ogendini , landuru tijene miwuoro ne ji duto .
19096004	Nimar Jehova duong’ kendo owinjore gi pak ; onego oluore moloyo nyiseche duto .
19096005	Nikech nysiseche duto mag ogendini gin mana gik ma dhano oloso to Jehova ema nochueyo polo gi piny .
19096006	Luor gi duong’ oume ; nyalo gi long’o nie ode maler .
19096007	Un dhoudi mag ogendni , miuru Jehova , miuru Jehova duong’ gi teko .
19096008	Miuru Jehova duong’ mowinjore gi nyinge ; kelneuru mich kendo biuru e laru mage .
19096009	Lamuru Jehova kaka Ng’ama Ler man-gi duong’ mang’ongo ; beduru maluor ahinya e nyime , un piny duto .
19096010	Wachuru e dier ogendini ni , " Jehova olocho . " Piny ochung’ mongirore , ok nyal yienge ; obiro ng’ado ne ji bura maonge dewo wang’ .
19096011	Polo mondo obed moil , piny mondo obed mamor ; nam mondo owuo kaachiel gi gik moko duto manie iye ;
19096012	pewe mondo okog gi mor , kod gik moko duto manie igi . Eka yiende duto manie bungu nower gi mor ;
19096013	giniwer e nyim Jehova , nimar obiro , obiro mondo ong’ad ne piny bura . Obiro ng’ado ne piny bura e yo makare , ee , obiro yalo ji gi adierane .
19097001	Jehova olocho piny mondo obed mamor ; dho nembe man mabor mondo obed moil .
19097002	Boche polo gi mudho mandiwa oume ; tim makare gi adiera e mise mar lochne .
19097003	Mach liel e nyime kendo wang’o wasike e alworane duto .
19097004	Mil polo mare menyo piny ; piny neno kendo yiengni .
19097005	Gode leny nono ka odok e nyim Jehova , gileny nono e nyim Ruoth piny duto .
19097006	Polo hulo timne makare , kendo ji duto neno duong’ne .
19097007	Ji duto ma lamo gik mokedi wigi okuot ; jogo gin joma sungore kuom nyiseche mopa-nyiseche duto mondo olame !
19097008	Sayun nowinjo wachno mi obedo moil , miech Juda bende nobedo mamor nikech bucheni , Yaye Jehova .
19097009	Nimar in e Jal Man Malo Mogik moloyo piny duto , Yaye Jehova ; iduong’ kendo iyombo nyiseche mamoko duto mabor .
19097010	Joma ohero Nyasaye mondo osin gi gik maricho nimar orito ngima joge ma joadiera kendo oresogi e lwet joma richo .
19097011	Joma kare imenyonegi ler ; joma oriere gie chunygi imiyo mor .
19097012	Moruru kuom Jehova un joma kare , kendo pakuru nyinge maler .
19098001	Weruru ne Jehova wer manyien , nimar osetimo gik miwuoro ; lwet e korachwich gi bade maler osekelone warruok .
19098002	Jehova osemiyo warruokne ong’ere kendo osefwe n yone ogendiini timne makare .
19098003	Oseparo herane kod adierane ne dhood Israel ; kuonde duto ma piny ogikie oseneno warruok mar jawarwa .
19098004	Gouru koko gi mor , un piny duto , bukreuru gi wer mamor kuwer gi duol mamit ;
19098005	weruru mamit ne Jehova kugoyo nyatiti ; werneuru mamit kugoyo nyatiti gi dwond wer molungi ,
19098006	werneuru gi turumbete kod tung im maywak matek-koguru gi mor e nyim Jehova ma Ruoth .
19098007	Nam mondo owuo , kaachiel gi gik moko duto manie iye , kod piny duto , gi ji duto modak e iye .
19098008	Aoche mondo opam lwetgi , gode mondo ower kaachiel ka gimor ;
19098009	onego giwer e nyim Jehova , nimar obiro mondo ong’ad bura ne piny . Obiro ng’ado bura ne piny e yo makare kendo obiro yalo ji maonge dew o wang’ .
19099001	Jehova olocho , ogendini mondo okirni ; obetekom lochne e kind kerubi , piny mondo oyiengni .
19099002	Jehova duong’ miwuoro e Sayun ; oting’e malo moyombo ogendini duto .
19099003	Owinjore gipak nyingi maduong’ kendo miwuoro-nyinge ler .
19099004	Ruoth nyalo , ohero bura makarei sechungo adiera ; isetimo ne joka Jakobo gima adier kendo makare .
19099005	Dhialuru Jehova Nyasachwa kendo lameuru e tie kome mobetie nikech oler .
19099006	Musa gi Harun ne gin jodolo mage e dier jodolo mamoko , Samuel ne en achiel kuom joma ne luongo nyinge ; ne giluongo Jehova kendo noduokogi .
19099007	Ne owuoyo kodgi e siro mar bor polo ; ne girito chikene gi buche mane omiyogi .
19099008	Yaye Jehova Nyasachwa , ne iduokogi ; ne in Nyasaye ma weyo richo ne jo Israel , kata obedo ni ne ikumo timbegi mobam .
19099009	Dhialuru Jehova Nyasachwa kendo lamuru e gode maler , nimar Jehova Nyasachwa ler .
19100001	Gouru koko gi mor ne Jehova , un piny duto .
19100002	Lamuru Jehova ka umor ; biuru e nyime kuwero wende mamor .
19100003	Ng’euru ni Jehova en Nyasaye . En ema nochueyowa , kendo wan mage ; wan jog e , kendo wan rombeg e mokuayo .
19100004	Donjuru e rangeyene kugoyo erokamano kod laru mage kupake . Goneuru erokamano kendo pakuru nyinge .
19100005	Nimar Jehova ber kendo herane osiko nyaka chieng’ ; adierane ochwere e tienge duto .
19101001	Abiro wer nikech herani gi berni ; in ema abiro weroni wend pak , Yaye Jehova .
19101002	Abiro neno ni aritora mondo ngimana obed malong’o chuth-ibiro biro ira karang’o ? Abiro dak e oda gi chuny malong’o chuth .
19101003	Ok abi yie neno gimoro amora mochido gi wengena .
19101004	Achayo timbe joma chunygi richo ; gik maricho ok adwar winjo kata gi ita .
19101005	Ng’ato ang’ata makuodho nyawadgi ling’ling’ abiro kwero mi ling’ ; ng’ato ang’ata ma wang’e tek kendo ma sungore gie chunye , ok anyal betgo aming’a .
19101006	Joma beyo ema abiro keto wengena kuomgi ; gin ema abiro yie dak kodgi ; ng’at ma wuodhe oriere tir ema biro tiyona .
19101007	Ok abi yiene ng’ama ohero miriambo mondo odag e oda ; ng’at moro amora mawacho miriambo ok nochung’ e nyima .
19101008	Okinyi kokinyi abiro tieko joma timbegi richo modak e piny . Abiro nego ng’ato ang’ata matimo richo ka agologi e dala mar Jehova .
19102001	Winj lamona , Yaye Jehova ; yie irwak lamona ma akwayigo kony .
19102002	
19102003	Kik ipandna wang’i sama chunya lit . Chikna iti ; ka aluongi to duoka mapiyo .
19102004	Nimar ndalona rumo piyo ka iro ; chokena rewni ka kit kendo maliet .
19102005	Chunya orewore kendo oner ka lum ; wiya wil kodaka gi chamo chiemba .
19102006	Chur ma achurgo matek omiyo adhero alokora choke lilo .
19102007	Achalo gi tula mar bungu , achalo gi tula modak e gunda .
19102008	Asiko aneno anena , achalo gi winyo man kende ewi osuri .
19102009	Odiechieng’ duto wasika kinya ka gijara ; joma dhawna konyore gi nyinga kaka gir kuong’ruok .
19102010	Nimar achamo buch kendo kaka chiemba kendo ariwo mathna gi pi wang’a
19102011	nikech mirimbi maduong’ , nimar isekawa mi iwita gichien .
19102012	Ndalona chalo gi tipo modhiambo ; aner adwa two ka lum .
19102013	Into ibetekomlochni nyaka chieng’ , Yaye Jehova ; humbi osiko e tienge duto .
19102014	Ibiro aa malo mi ikech Sayun , nimar saa osechopo monego ong’wonnee ; saa mochanne osechopo .
19102015	Nimar kitege beyo gilala ne jotichni , kata mana buru madum kuome miyo ji keche .
19102016	Ogendini biro luoro nying Jehova , ruodhi duto mag piny biro luoro duong’ni .
19102017	Nimar Jehova biro gero Sayun kendo kendo obiro thinyore e lela e duong’ne .
19102018	Obiro dwoko lamo mar ng’ama ok nyal kendo ok obi chayo lamogi .
19102019	Wachni mondo ondik piny ne tieng’ mabiro , mondo joma pok onyuol opak Jehova :
19102020	" Jehova nong’iyo piny gie kar dakne maler man malo , nong’iyo piny gie polo ,
19102021	mondo owinj ywak joma otwe kendo ogony joma ong’adnegi buch tho . "
19102022	Kuom mano nying Jehova ibiro hul e Sayun , ibiro pake e Jerusalem
19102023	ka joma odak e pinje ruodhi ochokore mondo olam Jehova .
19102024	Ka noyudo ngimana dhi maber to nomiyo tekona odok chien kendo nong’ado ngimana odoko machiek .
19102025	Omiyo ne awacho ni ;  " Kik ikaw ngimana , Yaye Nyasacha , kapod an e chuny ngima ; to into isiko ingima nyaka tienge duto .
19102026	Ne iketo mise mag piny kar chakruok , kendo polo bende gin tij lweti .
19102027	Gin gibiro lal nono to into isiko nyaka chieng’ ; gibiro ti ka nanga . Ibiro lokogi kaka iloko law kendo ibiro witgi .
19102028	Into isiko ichalri , kendo hiki ok rum .
19102029	Nyithind jotichni biro dak buti machiegni ; nyikwagi nodhi maber e nyimi . ’
19103001	Pak Jehova , Yaye chunya ; dhanda maiye duto mondo opak nyinge maler .
19103002	Pak Jehova , Yaye chunya , kendo kik wiyi wil gi konyruok mochiwo -
19103003	en ema oweyoni richoni duto kendo ochango tuocheni duto ,
19103004	oreso ngimani kogolo e bur matut kendo osidhi gi hera kod kech ,
19103005	oromo chunyi gi gik mabeyo momiyo tinni osiko nyien ka mar ongo .
19103006	Jehova timo gik makare kendo otimo maber ne joma isando duto .
19103007	Nonyiso Musa yorene , noyango ne jo Israel timbene .
19103008	Jehova kecho ji kendo ong’uon , iye ok wang’ piyo kendo opong’ gi ng’uono .
19103009	Ok osik komanyo ketho kuom ji , bende ok okan mirimbe nyaka chieng’ ;
19103010	ok otimnwa mowinjore gi richowa bende ok ochulwa kaluwore gi kethowa .
19103011	Nimar mana kaka polo ni malo moyombo piny e kaka herane duong’ ne joma oluore ;
19103012	mana kaka wuok chieng’ bor gi podho chieng’ , e kaka osep ogow a mabor gi kethowa .
19103013	Mana kaka wuoro kecho nyithinde e kaka Jehova kecho joma oluore ;
19103014	nimar ong’eyo kaka ochue w a , ong’eyo e pache ni wan mana buch lo .
19103015	Dhano to ndalone chalo gi lum , oloth piyo ka mafua mopidhi ;
19103016	to ka yamo okudhe matin nono to kare orumo kendo ok chak pare .
19103017	Hera ma Jehova oherogo joma oluore to osiko nyaka chieng’ manyaka chieng’ kendo osiko otimo maber ne nyithind nyithindgi -
19103018	ma gin joma orito singruokne kendo jogo maparo mondo orit chikene .
19103019	Jehova osechungo lochne e polo kendo lochne orito ji duto .
19103020	Pakuru Jehova , un malaikege , un joge maroteke matimo kaka odwaro kendo matimo kaka owacho .
19103021	Pakuru Jehova , un oganda ne maduong’ manie polo , un jotichne matimo dwarone .
19103022	Pakuru Jehova , un gik moko duto mochueyo , manie bwo lochne kuonde duto . Pak Jehova , Yaye chunya .
19104001	Pak Jehova , Yaye chunya . Yaye Jehova Nyasacha , mano kaka iduong’ , irwakori gi luor kod duong’ .
19104002	Oumore gi ler mana kaka nanga ; oyaro polo mana kaka hema
19104003	kendo ogero ode moluore aluora e wi pi . Oidho boche polo kaka gache mar lweny kendo yamo e ndike moriembo .
19104004	Ooro yamo kaka jootene , kendo mach maliel mager e jotichne .
19104005	Iseguro piny e mise mage ; maok onyal yiengni kata matin
19104006	Ne iume gi kut mana kaka nanga mi pige obiwore moyombo gode .
19104007	To kane ikwero pigego to ne gileny nono , kane giwinji kimor to ne giwalore gia ;
19104008	ne gimol ewi gode , ka giridore gidhi e holni , kuonde mane ochan negi .
19104009	Ne iketonegi tong’ maok ginyal kadho ; mondo kik gichak giim piny kendo .
19104010	Jehova miyo sokni olo pi e bugni ka gimol e kind gode .
19104011	Gichiwo pi ne le mag bungu duto ; kanyna mag bungu tieko riyo ma gingo .
