19104012	Winy mahuyo e kor polo ogero utegi e bath pigego , kendo giwer e wi yiende .
19104013	Omiyo koth chue e wi gode koa e dalane manie polo ; piny nyago olembe moromo nikech tijene .
19104014	Omiyo lum loth ne jamni , kod cham ma dhano doyo mamiyo chiemo bet e piny ;
19104015	kaachiel gi divai mamoro chuny dhano , gi mo mamiyo lenda wang’e leny kod makati molerogo chunye .
19104016	Yiende Jehova yudo pi moromogi , yiendego gin sida mag Lebanon mane opidho .
19104017	Winy gero utegi e bedegi , winj nyamnaha nigi ode ewi yiende mag obudo .
19104018	Diek mag bungu odake go d e mab oyo , to lwendni morokore gin kuonde buok mag apwoche .
19104019	Dwe pogo kinde mag chwiri gi kinde mag opon kendo wang’ chieng’ ong’eyo saa monego opodhie .
19104020	Ikelo mudho mi piny lolkre otieno , kendo le mag bungu duto lak oko .
19104021	Sibuoche ruto ka gimanyo chiemo ; gimanyo chiembgi kuom Jehova .
19104022	To ka chieng’ wuok to gidok e bungu ; gidok kendo ginindo e gondegi .
19104023	Eka dhano wuok oko chako tijene , kendo nyagore gi tich nyaka odhiambo .
19104024	Mano kaka gik michueyo ng’eny , Yaye Jehova ! Ne ichueyogi duto gi rieko miwuoro ; piny opong’ gi gik michueyo .
19104025	Isechueyo nam maduong’ kendo malach’ mopong’ gi le mamol mathoth mokalo akwana-gik mangima madongo gi matindo .
19104026	Kuno ema mende kwang’ie koni gi koni , kendo ondieg nam mane ichueyo miluongo ni Leviathan tuge .
19104027	In ema gigo duto ng’iyi mondo imigi chiembgi e kinde mowinjore .
19104028	Ka imiyogi chiemo , to gichamo ; ka iyawonegi lweti , to giyieng’ gi gik mabeyo ;
19104029	ka ipando wang’i , to githagore ; ka igolo muchi kuomgi , to githo kendo gidok e lowo .
19104030	Ka ioro Roho mari , to gibedo mangima ; kendo imiyo piny bedo gi ngima manyien .
19104031	Mad duong’ mar Jehova sik nyaka chieng’ ; mad Jehova bed mamor gi gik mane ochueyo -
19104032	En ma kong’iyo piny to piny yiengni , kendo komulo gode to gode dhuolo iro .
19104033	Abiro wer ne Jehova e ngimana duto , adier , abiro wero wende pak ne Nyasacha e kinde duto mapod angima .
19104034	Mad gik ma aparo e chunya omiye mor , seche duto ma amor kuom Jehova .
19104035	Joricho to owinjore orum e piny ; joma timbegi richo ok onego obedie piny kata achiel . Pak Jehova , Yaye chunya . Haleluya !
19105001	Gouru erokamano ne Jehova , lameuru kuluongo nyinge ; miuru ogendini ong’e gik mosetimo .
19105002	Werneuru , werneuru wende pak ; nyisuru kuom tijene duto miwuoro .
19105003	Nyinge maler nigi duong’ ; chunje joma manyo Jehova mondo obed moil .
19105004	Ranguru Jehova kod tekre ; manyuru wang’e kinde duto .
19105005	Paruru gik miwuoro mosetimo , honni mage kod buche moseng’ado ,
19105006	Yaye koth Ibrahim jatichne , Yaye yawuot Jakobo joge moyiero .
19105007	En e Jehova Nyasachwa ; buchene nie piny duto .
19105008	Oparo winjruokne motimo gi joge nyaka chieng’ , kod wach mane ochiko e tienge tara ,
19105009	winjruok mane otimo gi Ibrahim , gi Muma mane okuong’orego gi Isaka .
19105010	Ne ogure ne Jakobo kaka gima ok kethre , ee , ne Israel kaka winjru ok mosiko , kowacho ni ,
19105011	" Anamiyi piny Kanan kaka girkeni ma kori . "
19105012	Kane pod gin ji matin nono , ee , kane pod ginok ruok kendo ne pod gin welo e iye ,
19105013	ne gibayo e piny ka piny , e pinyruoth ka pinyruoth .
19105014	To ne ok oyie mondo ng’ato ochandgi ; nikech gin , nokwero ruodhi , kowacho ni ,
19105015	" Kik umul joga ma awiro ; kik utim gimoro amora marach ne jonabi maga .
19105016	Ne okelo kech e piny kendo noketho yore duto mane giyudogo chiemo ;
19105017	kendo nooro ng’ato otelone g i , ng’atno ne en Joseph mane oloki kaka misumba .
19105018	Ne giridho tiendene gi arungu mochuoye chuma , kendo ne giridho ng’ute gi chumbe ,
19105019	nyaka nochopo kinde ma gik mane okoro notimoree , nyaka wach Jehova nochopo kare .
19105020	Ruodh Misri nooro wach mi nogonye , jatend ji nogonye thuolo .
19105021	Nokete ruodh ode , ma norito gik moko duto mane en-go ,
19105022	mondo en ema ne otieg jotende kaka ohero kendo opuonj jodonge rieko .
19105023	Bang’e Israel duto nobiro Misri ; Jakobo nodoko jadak e piny Ham .
19105024	Jehova nomiyo joge onya ahinya ; nomiyo gibedo mathoth ma wasikgi ne ok nyal nyalogi ,
19105025	wasikgi ma noloko chunygi mondo ocha joge , kendo mondo oram mar timone jotichne marach .
19105026	Nooro Musa jatichne , gi Harun , jal mane oseyiero .
19105027	Ne gitimo ranyisi mag honni e diergi , ee , ne gitimo timbene miwuoro e piny Ham .
19105028	Nooro mudho mi nomiyo piny olil ti-nimar donge ne giseng’anyo ne wechene ?
19105029	Noloko pigegi remo , mi nomiyo rechgi otho .
19105030	Ogwende nosieko mopong’o pinygi , kendo ne gidonjo nyaka ei ute nindo mag ruodhigi .
19105031	Nowuoyo , mi pumbi mag lwang’ni nosieko , kendo kikun nopong’o pinygi .
19105032	Nomiyo kodhgi olokore pe kendo mil polo nokwako pinygi ;
19105033	nogoyo yiendegi mag mzabibu gi ng’owu piny kendo nolwero yiende mane nie pinygi .
19105034	Nowuoyo , mi bonyo nosieko , det bonyo mokalo akwana ;
19105035	ne gichamo gimoro amora mane loth e pinygi koda ka chambgi mane gipidho e puothegi .
19105036	Bang’e nonego nyithindo makayo duto mane nie pinygi , kodhi mokuongo duto mane gihango nyuolo .
19105037	Nogolo Israel , kogangore gi fedha kod dhahabu , kendo onge ng’ama nodong’ chien kuom dhout Israel duto .
19105038	Misri ne mor kane giwuok nikech mbi mar jo Israel nosegore kuomgi .
19105039	Noumogi gi boche polo kaka raum , kendo mach nochiwonegi ler gotieno .
19105040	Kane gikwaye , to nokelonegi awendo kendo noyieng’ogi gi makati mar polo .
19105041	Noyawo lwanda , mi pi nowuok gi teko ; kendo pigno nomol ka aora mamol e piny motwo .
19105042	Nimar noparo singruokne maler mane omiyo Ibrahim jatichne .
19105043	Nogolo joge gi ilo , adier , nomiyo joge moyier owuok ka kok gi mor ;
19105044	nomiyogi pinje mag ogendini , kendo gik ma jomoko nono nochandore ka loso nodoko girkeni magi -
19105045	mondo gilu yorene kendo girit chikene . Haleluya !
19106001	Haleluya ! Gouru erokamano ne Jehova , nimar ober ; herane osiko nyaka chieng’ .
19106002	En ng’a manyalo hulo gik madongo ma Jehova osetimo kata manyalo nyiso pakne duto ?
19106003	Ogwedh joma osiko koluwo adiera , joma osiko katimo gima kare .
19106004	An bende parae , Yaye Jehova , parae ka itimo ng’wono ne jogi , bi ikonya ka iresogi ,
19106005	mondo an bende awinjie maber gi mwandu mimiyo jogi miyiero , mondo ayudie mor mar ogandani kendo amiyi duong’ kaachiel gi girkeni mari .
19106006	Wasetimo richo mana kaka kwerewa bende notimo ; wasetimo marach kendo wasetimo gik mamono .
19106007	Kane kwe r ewa ni Misri , ne ok giparo matut kuom honni magi ; bende ne wigi owil gi kechni mathoth , ne ging’anyoni e dho nam , ma en Nam Makwar .
19106008	Kata kamano noresogi nikech nyinge , mondo omi tekone maduong’ ong’ere .
19106009	Nokwero Nam Makwar , mi Nam Makwar notwo ; kendo nomiyo gikalo kama tut mana kagima ne giwuotho kama otwo .
19106010	Noresogi e lwet joma ne kedo kodgi , adier , nowarogi e lwet wasigu .
19106011	Pi noimo wasikgi ; ma kata achiel kuomgi ne ok otony .
19106012	Eka ne giyie gi singruok mag e kendo ne gipake gi wer .
19106013	To maok odeko wigi nowil gi gik mane osetimo kendo ne ok girite mondo ong’adnegi rieko .
19106014	Wuoro mokalo tong’ nomakogi e thim , kendo ne gitemo Nyasaye e piny motwo .
19106015	Omiyo ne omiyogi gima ne gidwaro , to kata kamano nooronegi tuo machiyo del .
19106016	Nyiego nomakogi gi Musa e kambi , kendo gi Harun , jatich mowal ne Jehova .
19106017	Piny ne oyawore mi nomuonyo Dothan ; piny noiko oganda joka Abiram .
19106018	Mach nomuoch kuom joma ne luwogi mach maliel mager nowang’o joma timbegi richogo motiekogi pep .
19106019	Ne giloso nyaroya Horeb , mi ne gilamo kido molos gi chuma .
19106020	Ne giwilo Duong’ margi gi kido mar ruath machamo lum .
19106021	Wigi nowil gi Nyasaye mane oresogi , Nyasaye mane osetimo gik madongo e piny Misri ,
19106022	Nyasaye mane osetimo honni e piny Ham kod timbe miwuoro e dho Nam Makwar .
19106023	Emomiyo nowacho ni nobiro tiekogi-ka dine Musa , ng’ate moyiero , we chung’ ka ywagore e nyime mondo ogeng’ mirimbe kik otiekgi .
19106024	Bang’e ne gichayo pinye ma jabber ; nikech ne ok giyie singruokne ni en adier .
19106025	Ne ging’ur ei hembegi kendo ne ok gitimo gik ma Jehova nochikogi .
19106026	Emomiyo ne osingo renegi kosiemogi gi lwete ni ne obiro miyo gipodhi e thim ,
19106027	nonyisogi ni ne obiro miyo nyikwagi podhi e kind ogendini , kendo ni ne obiro keyogi e pinje duto .
19106028	Ne giriwore kaachiel e lamo Baal mar jo Peor , kendo ne gichamo chiemo michiwo ne nyiseche motho ;
19106029	omiyo ne giwang’o i Jehova gi timb egi marichogo , mi tuo marach manego ji mang’eny dichiel nogore kuomgi .
19106030	Kata kamano Finehas nochung’ kargi kendo noywagore ne Nyasaye , mi tuo marachno ne ok otiekogi .
19106031	Nyasaye nokwane kaka ng’ama kare nikech timneno , kendo ibiro kwane kamano nyaka tienge mabiro .
19106032	Ne giwang’o i Jehova , e dho sokni mag Meriba , mi timgino nokelone Musa chandruok ;
19106033	nimar ne giketho chunye mi weche maricho nowuok e dhoge .
19106034	Ne ok gitieko ogendini chuth kaka Jehova nosechikogi ,
19106035	to ne giriwore kodgi kendo ne giluwo timbegi .
19106036	Ne gilamo kido mag nyisechegi , ma bang’e nolokorenegi obadho .
19106037	Ne gichiwo yawuotgi gi nyigi kaka misango , kendo ne gichiwogi ne jochiende .
19106038	Ne gichuero remo maonge ketho , remb yawuotgi gi nyigi , mane gichiwo kaka misango ne kido mag nyiseche mag Kanan , mi piny nogak nikech rembgi .
19106039	Ne gidoko mogak nikech gik mane gitimo ; ne gibedo joma odwanyore nikech timbegigo .
19106040	Emomiyo Jehova nokecho gi joge kendo chunye noa kuom girkeni mare .
19106041	Nochiwogi e lwet ogendini , mi ne gibet e bwo loch joma ne mon kodgi .
19106042	Wasikgi nothirogi kendo ne giketogi e bwo tekogi .
19106043	Ne oresogi dimang’eny to kata kamano joge noketo chunygi ne ng’anyo mi richogi nochiwogi mi girumo .
19106044	Kata kamano nokechogi e chandruokgi kane owinjo ywakgi ;
19106045	nikech noparo mumbe mane otimo kodgi kendo noloko chunye nikech herane maduong’ .
19106046	Nochuno ji duto mane oketogi wasumbni mondo okechgi .
19106047	Re swa , Yaye Jehova Nyasachwa , kendo chokwa igolwa e dier ogendni , mondo wago erokamano ne nyingi maler kendo wabed mamor ka wapaki .
19106048	Pakuru Jehova , ma Nyasach Israel , nyaka chieng’ kendo nyaka chieng’ . Ji duto mondo owach ni , " Amin ! " Haleluya .
19107001	Gouru erokamano ne Jehova , nimar ober ; herane osiko nyaka chieng’ .
19107002	Joma owar mag Jehova mondo owach kama-joma ne owaro e lwet jasigu ,
19107003	mane ochoko kogolo e pinje , kochakore wuok chieng’ gi podho chieng’ , nyaka nyandwat gi milambo .
19107004	Joge moko nobayo ab aya e thim motwo nikech ne gionge yo mar chopo e dala mane ginyalo dakie gi kuwe .
19107005	Ne gidenyo kendo riyo noloyogi , mi chunygi noa .
19107006	Eka ne giywak ne Jehova mondo okonygi e chandruokgino mi nogologi e pekgino .
19107007	Ne otelonegi e yo moriere tir , nyaka ne gichopo e dala , mane ginyalo dakie .
19107008	Onego gigo ne Jehova erokamano kuom herane maok rem kendo kuom timbene miwuoro , motimo ne ji ,
19107009	nimar otieko riyo mar joma riyo oloyo kendo omiyo joma odenyo yieng’ gi gik mabeyo .
19107010	Moko kuomgi nobet e mudho , kendo e tipo mar tho , ne gin joma thagore motue gi nyoroche mag chuma ,
19107011	nimar ne ging’anyo giweyo weche Nyasaye kendo ne gichayo rieko mar Jal Man Malo Mogik .
19107012	Omiyo noketogi gi tich matek mohewogi mi ne gigore piny kendo onge ng’ama ne nyalo konyogi .
19107013	Eka ne giywak ne Jehova mondo okonygi e chandruokgino , mi noresogi e pekgino .
19107014	Nogologi e mudho kendo e tipo mar tho kendo noturo nyoroche mane otuegigo .
19107015	Onego gigo ne Jehova erokamano kuom herane maok rem , kendo kuom timbene miwuoro motimo ne ji ,
19107016	nimar omuko rangeye mag mula , kendo ong’ado lodi mag nyinyo .
19107017	Moko kuomgi nobedo joma ofuwo nikech yoregi mobam kendo ne gineno thagruok nikech timbegi mamono .
19107018	Dhogi ne rach maok ginyal chamo chiemo moro amora , kendo ne gichiegni tho .
19107019	Eka ne giywak ne Jehova mondo okonygi e chandruokgino mi noresogi e pekgino .
19107020	Ne ooro wachne mi nochangogi kendo noresogi e lak tho .
19107021	Onego gigo ne Jehova erokamano kuom herane maok rem kendo kuom timbene miwuoro motimo ne ji .
19107022	Onego gichiwne misango mar goyo erokamano kendo ginyis kuom gik mosetimo ka giwer gi mor .
19107023	Moko kuomgi nodhi kwang’ e nam gi mende ; ne gin jo ohala ma yoro nembe madongo-dongo .
19107024	Ne gineno tije Jehova , ne gineno tijene malich miwuoro manie kude .
19107025	Nimar ne owuoyo , mi notugo ahiti mang’ongo ma nomiyo apaka ogingore .
19107026	Apaka nodirogi malo e kor yamo , kendo nonyumogi kuonde matut mogik ; mi chir mane gin-go noleny nono kane ginie masira ma kamano .
19107027	Ne gipuore kendo gitagore ka joma omer ; kendo pachgi nolalnegi .
19107028	Eka ne giywak ne Jehova mondo okonygi e chandruokgino mi noresogi e pekgino ;
19107029	ne okueyo ahiti mobet mos ; kendo apaka noling’ thi .
19107030	Ne gidoko mamor ka nam nokuwe , kendo notelonegi nyaka ne gitundo e dho wath maber , kama ne gidwaro tunde .
19107031	Onego gigo ne Jehova erokamano kuom herane maok rem kendo kuom timbene miwuoro motimo ne ji .
19107032	Onego giting’ nyinge malo e chokruok mar joge kendo gidende e buch jodongo .
19107033	Ne omiyo aoche olokore kuonde motwo , sokni mamol nolokore ongoro ,
19107034	kendo lowo manyak maber nodoko lowo motimo chumbi , maonge tich nikech timbe mamono mag joma nodak kuondego .
19107035	To bende nomiyo piny ongo r o odoko yewni mag pi , kendo lowo motwo nolokore sokni mamol ;
19107036	nokelo joma odenyo mondo odag kuondego , kendo ne gigero dala kama ne ginyalo dakie .
19107037	Ne gipuro puothe kendo ne gipidho puothe mzabibu mane ochiego cham maber ;
19107038	ne ogwedhogi , kendo ne gidoko ji mang’eny ahinya , bende ne ok oyie mondo jambgi odog piny .
19107039	Bang’e achien kwan-gi nodok matin kendo ne odwokgi piny nikech sand gi masiche kod kuyo ;
19107040	Jal ma olo mirimbe kuom ruodhi nomiyo gibayo koni gi koni e thim tangalare .
19107041	To jochan to noreso e thagruokgi kendo nomiyo utegi onya ka dhok .
19107042	Ka gima kamano otiore , to jomakare doko mamor ; joma timbegi richo duto to dhogi moko .
19107043	Ng’ama riek mondo omak wechegi maber , kendo opar matut kuom hera maduong’ mar Jehova .
19108001	Chunya ochung’ mongirore , Yaye Nyasaye ; abiro paki ka awerni mamit gi chunya duto .
19108002	
19108003	Chiewuru , un nyatiti gi thum lwedo ! An bende abiro romone ru piny gi wer .
19108004	Abiro paki e dier ogendini , Yaye Jehova , abiro werni e dier jopiny .
19108005	Nimar herani duong’ kendo bor moyombo polo ; kendo adierani ochopo nyaka e kor polo .
19108006	Yud duong’ , Yaye Nyasaye , yud duong’ moyombo polo , kendo mi duong’ni okwak piny duto .
19108007	Reswa kendo konywa gi lweti makorachwich , mondo joma ihero oyud konyruok .
19108008	Nyasaye osewuoyo gie kar dakne maler , osewuoyo kowacho ni , " Abiro pogo Shekem ne joga , ka alocho , kendo abiro pimonegi Holo mar Sukoth .
19108009	Giliad en mara , Manase bende mara , Efraim en oguta mar lweny , to Juda en oguta mar loch .
19108010	Moab en besenda mar luok , to Edom en kama amoe wuochena ; Filistia to agoe siboi bang’ loyo lweny .
19108011	En ng’a mabiro tera e dala mochiel motegno ? En ng’a mabiro telona nyaka Edom ?
19108012	Donge en in , Yaye Nyasaye , donge isedagiwa kendo tinde ok idhi gi jolwenjwa mondo okednwa ?
19108013	Yie imiwa kony mar kedo gi wasikwa , nimar kony mar dhano ok nyal gimoro .
19108014	Wabiro loyo lweny ka Nyasaye nikodwa , kendo obiro nyononwa wasikwa piny .
19109001	Yaye Nyasaye ma apako , kik iling’ ,
19109002	nimar joma timbegi richo gi jo miriambo osemonja gi dhogi ; gisewuoyo kuomwa marach gi lewgi mopiagi ne miriambo .
19109003	Gilwora koni gi koni gi weche mag achaya ; gibuka maonge gima omiyo .
19109004	An aherogi to gin to gimon koda . Gitimona kamano kata obedo ni an to alemonegi .
19109005	Gichula rach kar ber , kod achaya kar osiep .
19109006	Giwacho ni , " Ket ng’at marach mondo oked kode ; we jadonj ne ji mondo ochung’ kode e bura .
19109007	Kiyale to mi mondo oyude gi ketho , kendo kata lemo molamo onego onyis kethone .
19109008	Mad ng’ad ndalone dok manok ; kendo mad ng’at machielo kaw tende .
19109009	Mad nyithinde dong’ kiye kendo chiege dong’ chi liel .
19109010	Mad nyithinde lokre jokwecho mabayo abaya ; mad riembgi gia koda ka e miechgi mosekethore .
19109011	Mad jagope moro mak gige duto ma en-go kendo mad jomawelo oyak mwandu duto moseloso .
19109012	Onego ng’ato kik timne ng’wono kata kecho nyithinde modong’ kiye .
19109013	Kothe duto mondo kargi olal nono , kendo nying-gi oruchi kik bedi e tieng’ mabiro .
19109014	Mad Jehova sik kaparo richo mane wuonegi otimo ; kendo mad richo min kik ruchi .
19109015	Richogi mondo osiki e nyim Jehova , eka mondo ong’ad kargi oko chuth e piny .
19109016	Nimar kane ongima to ne ok odewo timo ng’wono , kar timo kamano to nosando jodhier , kaachiel gi joma ochando gi joma chunygi lit ; nosandogi malit nyaka ne githo .
19109017	Nohero kuong’o ji-to koro mad kuong’neno dogne ; ne ok ohero gwedho ji-omiyo koro mad gweth bed mabor kode .
19109018	Ne orwako kuong’ ka nangane ; mad kuong’no koro donji e dende ka pi , mad gibud chokene ka mo .
19109019	Mad ochal nanga moumogo dende duto , kata kamba motweyego nyaka chieng’ .
19109020	Mano ema mondo obed chudo , ma Jehova chulo joma donjona ; mano e kaka onego otim ne joma wuoyo marach kuoma . "
19109021	To in , Yaye Ruoth Nyasaye , timna maber nikech nyingi ; konya nikech ber mar herani .
19109022	Nimar adhier kendo achando , kendo chunya winjo marach e iya .
19109023	Ndalona rumo mos mos ka tipo mar odhiambo kendo yamo uka ka det bonyo .
19109024	Chongena onyosore nikech onge gima acham , kendo adhero aloko ra choke lilo .
19109025	Alokora gima ijaro ne joma donjona ; ka ginena to gitwenyona umgi ka gigoyona siboi .
19109026	Konya , Yaye Jehova Nyasacha , resa kaluwore gi herani .
19109027	Mi mondo ging’e ni achal kama nikech lweti , mi ging’e ni lweti ema osetime , Yaye Jehova .
19109028	Gin ginyalo kuong’a to ang’eyo ni in ibiro gwedha ; ka gimonja to ibiro kuodo wigi , to jatichni to biro bedo mamor .
19109029	Wichkuot maduong’ biro mako joma donjona kendo gibiro rwako wichkuot ka kandho .
19109030	Abiro dhialo Jehova malich gi dhoga ; abiro pake e dier oganda maduong’ .
19109031	Nimar ochung’ e bat korachwich mar ng’at mochando , mondo ores ngimane kuom joma ng’adone buch tho .
19110001	Jehova nowacho ne Ruodha kama : " Bed e bada korachwich nyaka chop aket wasiki obed situl miyieye tiendeni . "
19110002	Jehova biro yaro lochni chakre Sayun ; ibiro bedo gi loch e dier wasiki .
19110003	Jo kedo magi biro bedo gi chuny moikore ; gibiro riedo gokinyi kogwen gi duong’ mamalo , kendo tekri nomedre odiechieng’ kodiechieng’ mana ka tho momoko e lum gokinyi .
19110004	Jehova osesingore kendo ok obi loko pache : osesingore ni , " In jadolo nyaka chieng’ , e kit dolo mar Melkizedek . "
19110005	Jehova nie badi makorachwich obiro ng’inyo ruodhi chieng’ ma mirimbe otuk .
19110006	Obiro ng’ado bura ne ogendini , mi opiel joma otho achana-achana kong’inyo jotelo duto mag piny .
19110007	Obiro modho e aora matin manie bath yo , emomiyo noyud teko mi oting’ wiye .
19111001	Haleluya ! Abiro miyo Jehova duong’ gi chunya duto , abiro miye duong’ e buch joma kare , kendo e dier chokruok .
19111002	Tije Jehova dongo adier ; joma mor kodgi osiko ka paro kuomgi .
19111003	Timbene nigi duong’ kod luor , kendo timne makare osiko nyaka chieng’ .
19111004	Omiyo waparo kuom honni mage ; nikech Jehova ng’won kendo okecho ji .
19111005	Ochiwo chiemo ne joma oluore , kendo oparo singruok mare nyaka chieng’ .
19111006	Osenyiso joge tekre kuom gik motimo komiyogi lope mag ogendini moko .
19111007	Tije motimo gi lwetene nikare kendo beyo kendo buchene duto inyalo geno .
19111008	Gingirore kendo ok gilokre nyaka chieng’ manyaka chieng’ , nikech osetimgi gi adiera kendo moriere .
19111009	Ne ochiwo warruok ne joge , kendo ne oguro singruokne mosiko ; nyinge ler kendo lich miwuoro .
19111010	Luoro Jehova e chakruok mar rieko ; ji duto moluwo buchene nigi winjo maber . En kende ema owinjore yudo pak manyaka chieng’ .
19112001	Haleluya ! Ogwedh ng’ama oluoro Jehova , Ogwedh ng’ama chikene miyo mor .
19112002	Nyithinde nobed joma roteke e piny ; ee , koth joma ngimagi oriere ibiro gwedhi .
19112003	Pith gi mwandu yudore e ode , kendo timne makare osiko nyaka chieng’ .
19112004	Ng’ama ngimane oriere ler rienyne kata gotieno-ng’at ma ng’uon , ma kecho ji kendo makare .
19112005	Ng’ama ng’uon ma holo ji gige gi chuny maler biro neno ber-ng’at ma tiyo tijene gi adiera .
19112006	Adier , onge gima nyalo yiengeng’at makare ibiro par nyaka chieng’ .
19112007	Ok oluoro weche makelo kuyo nikech chunye otegno kendo ogeno kuom Jehova .
19112008	Chunye ok chandre kendo oonge gi luoro moro amora ; ong’eyo ni obiro neno ka olo wasike ka ento olocho .
19112009	Opogo gige ne joma odhier , berne osiko nyaka chieng’ ; duong’ne gi luor ma ji oluorego biro siko nyaka chieng’ .
19112010	Ng’ama timbene richo biro nene mi iye wang’ , obiro muodo lekene kendo obiro chiyore morum ; gik ma ng’ama timbene richo gombo ni otimrene ok bi timorene ngang’ .
19113001	Haleluya ! Pakuru Jehova , Yaye un jotichne , pakuru nying Jehova .
19113002	Nying Jehova mondo opaki , sani kendo nyaka chieng’ .
19113003	Nying Jehova onego opaki , chakre kuma chieng’ wuokie nyaka kuma opodhoe .
19113004	Jehova nigi duong’ moyombo ogendini duto , kendo duong’ne maler oyombo polo .
19113005	En ng’a machalo gi Jehova Nyasachwa , Jal mobetekom loch kuma bor ,
19113006	kendo ma kulore piny mondo orang polo gi piny ?
19113007	Oting’o joma odhier malo kogolo piny e lowo ; adier , ogolo joma ochando e pidh buru ,
19113008	kendo oketogi gibet kaachiel gi ruodhi , mi kwan-gi kaachiel gi jotend jogi .
19113009	Omiyo dhako ma migumba bedo gi ode mi obed miyo mamor man-gi nyithinde . Haleluya !
19114001	Kane jo Israel owuok Misri , ee , kane Joka Jakobo owuok e kind joma wacho dhok mayore ,
19114002	Juda nodoko kama ler mar Nyasaye , kendo Israel nobedo mwandune owuon .
19114003	Nam nonenogi mi oa gi ng’wech , kendo Jordan ne odar oweyonegi piny ,
19114004	gode noleng’ore ka imbe , to thuche to nochikore ka nyirombe .
19114005	Ang’o momiyo ne ia gi ng’wech , Yaye nam ? Yaye Jordan , ne idar iweyonegi piny nang’o ?
19114006	to un gode to ne uleng’oru ka imbe nang’o ? Koso thuche to nochikore ka nyirombe nikech ang’o ?
19114007	Yaye piny , yiengni ka Ruoth ni machiegni kodi , yiengni e nyim Nyasach Jakobo ,
19114008	Nyasaye mane omiyo lwanda olokore pi mogudore , kendo mane omiyo lwanda matek olokore sokni mag pi .
19115001	Ok wan , ok wan , Yaye Jehova-to In ema nyingi oyud duong’ , nikech herani kod adierani .
19115002	Ang’o momiyo ogendini penjo ni , " Nyasachgino ere ? "
19115003	Nyasachwa nie polo ; otimo gimoro amora mohero .
19115004	To kido mag nyisechegi to gin fedha gi dhahabu , ma lwet dhano ema oloso .
19115005	Gin-gi dhogi to kata kamano ok ginyal wuoyo , gin-gi wenge to ok ginyal neno ;
19115006	gin-gi itegi to ok ginyal winjo wach , kendo gin-gi umgi to ok ginyal ng’wecho ;
19115007	gin-gi lwetegi to ok ginyal mulo , kendo gin-gi tiende to ok ginyal wuotho bende ok ginyal kata temo loso gi duondgi .
19115008	Joma losogi biro chalo kodgi , kendo joma ogenogi bende biro chalo kodgi .
19115009	Yaye dhood jo Israel , genuru kuom Jehova-En e konyruokgi kendo okumbagi .
19115010	Yaye dhood joka Harun , genuru kuom Jehova-En e konyruokgi kendo okumbagi .
19115011	Un joma oluore , genuru kuom Jehova-En e konyruokgi kendo okumbagi .
19115012	Jehova parowa kendo obiro gwedh owa ; obiro gwedho dhood Isreal , obiro gwedho dhood joka Harun ,
19115013	obiro gwedho joma oluoro Jehovaji ajia kod joma igeno .
19115014	Mad Jehova mi imedri , in kaachiel gi nyithindi .
19115015	Mad iyud gweth moa kuom Jehova , jachwech polo gi piny .
19115016	Polo malo mogik en mar Jehova , to piny to osechiwo ne dhano .
19115017	Joma osetho ok ema pak Jehova , joma oseiki moling’ thi e bur ok pake ;
19115018	en wan ema wadendo Jehova sani kendo nyaka chieng’ . Haleluya !
19116001	Ahero Jehova nikech nowinjo duon-da ; nowinjo ywakna kane adwaro kech .
19116002	Nikech ne ochikona ite , abiro luonge kinde duto ma angima .
19116003	Tonde mag tho norida , lit mar liel nochopona , kendo chandruok gi chuny lit noloya .
19116004	Eka naluongo nying Jehova , ne aywakne ni , " Resa , Yaye Jehova ! "
19116005	Jehova ng’won kendo timo maber ; Nyasachwa opong’ gi kech .
19116006	Jehova rito joma chunygi obolore ; kane an-gi chando maduong’ to ne oresa .
19116007	Bed abeda mos , Yaye chunya , nimar Jehova osebedo ka timoni maber ndalo duto .
19116008	Nimar in ema isegolo chunya e tho , Yaye Jehova , wengena bende isereso e ywak , kendo tiendena isegeng’o mondo kik okier ,
19116009	isetimo kamano mondo awuothi e nyim Jehova , e piny joma ngima .
19116010	Ne ayie ; emomiyo ne awacho ni , " Sand oromo chunya . "
19116011	Kendo kane achiedhnade omaka , to ne awacho ni , " Dhano duto riambo . "
19116012	Ere kaka dachul Jehova kuom berne duto mosetimona ?
19116013	Abiro ting’o okumba mar warruok malo kendo abiro luongo nying Ruoth .
19116014	Abiro chopo singruokga ma asetimo ne Jehova e nyim ji duto .
19116015	Tho mar joge maler en gimaber miwuoro e nyim Jehova .
19116016	Yaye Jehova , an jatichni adier ; an jatichni , ma wuod jatichni manyako ; isegonya mi igola e nyorochega .
19116017	Abiro timoni misango mar erokamano kendo abiro luongo nying Jehova .
19116018	Abiro chopo singruokga ma asetimo ne Jehova e nyim ji duto ,
19116019	abiro chopogi e lache mag od Jehova abiro timogi e iyi , Yaye Jerusalem . Haleluya !
19117001	Pakuru Jehova , un ogendini duto ; dendeuru , un ji duto manie piny .
19117002	Nimar hera moherow ago duong’ , kendo adierane osiko nyaka chieng’ . Haleluya .
19118001	Gouru erokamano ne Jehova , nimar ober ; kendo herane osiko nyaka chieng’ .
19118002	Jo Israel mondo owach ni , " Herane osiko nyaka chieng’ . "
19118003	Jo dhood Harun mondo owach ni , " Herane osiko nyaka chieng’ . "
19118004	Joma oluoro Jehova mondo owach ni , " Herane osiko nyaka chieng’ . "
19118005	Ne aywak ne Jehova kane chunya lit , kendo ne oduoka mine ogonya thuolo .
19118006	Jehova nikoda , omiyo ok analuor . En ang’o ma dhano ditimna ?
19118007	Jehova nikoda ; en e Jakonyna . Abiro neno gi wang’a ka olo wasika .
19118008	Ber pondo kuom Jehova moloyo geno kuom dhano .
19118009	Ber pondo kuom Jehova moloyo geno kuom ruodhi .
19118010	Ogendini duto nolw o ra koni gi koni , to ne atiekogi e nying Jehova .
19118011	Ne gilw o ra koni gi koni , to ne atiekogi e nying Jehova
19118012	Ne ginur kuoma ka kich , to ne githo ka kudho maliel ; ne atiekogi e nying Jehova .
19118013	Ne gidhira gichien kendo ne achiegni podho , to Jehova nokonya .
19118014	Jehova e tekra kendo en e wenda ; osedoko warruok mara .
19118015	Koko mag mor gi mag loch winjore ei hembe mag joma kare kama : " Lwet Jehova mako rachwich osetimo gik madongo !
19118016	Lwet Jehova makorachwich oting’ malo ; lwet Jehova makorachwich osetimo gik madongo ! "
19118017	Ok abi tho , abiro bedo mangima ; abiro bedo mangima modo ahul gik ma Jehova osetimo .
19118018	Jehova osegoya modwa nega , to kata kamano pok oweyo tho onega .
19118019	Yawna rangeye mag tim makare ; mondo adonji kendo ago erokamano ne Jehova .
19118020	Mano e dhoranga Jehova ma joma kare nyalo donjogo .
19118021	Abiro goyoni erokamano , nikech ne iduoka ; mi idoko warruokna .
19118022	Kidi mane jogedo odagi koro odoko kidi moriwo kor ot ;
19118023	Ruoth ema osetimo mano kendo en gima lichnwa miwuoro .
19118024	Ma en odiechieng’ ma Jehova oseloso ; wamoruru kendo wail e iye .
19118025	Yaye Jehova , reswa Yaye Jehova , mi walochi .
19118026	Ogwedh ng’at mabiro gi nying Jehova . Wagwedhi gie od Jehova .
19118027	Jehova en ber , kendo osemiyo lerne mondo orieny kuomwa . Riwreuru gi oganda moruowo ka timo nyasi , kuting’o bede yien wuothuru kodgi nyaka uchopi e tunge mag kendo mar misango .
19118028	In Nyasacha , omiyo abiro goyoni erokamano ; in Nyasacha omiyo abiro miyi duong’ .
19118029	Gouru erokamano ne Jehova , nimar ober ; herane osiko nyaka chieng’ .
19119001	Ogwedh joma yoregi ler , ma wuotho koluwore gi chik Jehova .
19119002	Ogwedh joma orito chikene kendo ma manye gi chunygi duto .
19119003	Gin joma ok tim gimoro amora marach , to gisiko ka giwuotho e yorene .
19119004	Iseguro chikeni mochuno ni nyaka lu kaka gin .
19119005	Yaye , mad ne bed ni yorena ogurore e luwo chikeni !
19119006	Dine ok aneno wichkuot nikech aketo chunya e chikeni duto .
19119007	Kaka amedo puonjora chikeni makare e kaka abiro dhi nyime gi paki gi chuny moriere .
19119008	Abiro rito chikeni ; omiyo kik ijwang’a chuth .
19119009	Ere kaka ng’ama pod tin nyalo rito ngimane mondo osik kaler ? Onyalo rito mana kodak moluwore gi wachni .
19119010	Amanyi gi chunya duto ; omiyo kik iwe abar awe chikeni .
19119011	Asekano wachni ei chunya mondo kik akethi e nyimi .
19119012	Yaye Jehova , mad iyud pak ; yie ipuonja chikeni .
19119013	Aolo gi dhoga chike duto mowuok e dhogi .
19119014	Luwo chikeni mora mana kaka ng’ato bedo mamor kuom mwandu duto .
19119015	Abiro paro matut kuom chikeni kendo abiro tego wengena e yoreni .
19119016	Amor ahinya gi chikeni ; ok abi jwang’o wachni .
19119017	Tim maber ne jatichni , eka abiro bedo mangima kendo abiro rito chikeni .
19119018	Yaw wengena mondo eka ane gik mabeyo miwuoro manie chikeni .
19119019	An mana wendo e piny omiyo kik ipandna chikeni .
19119020	Chunya opong’ kod siso mar chikeni kinde duto .
19119021	Ikwero joma ochayo joma okuong’ kendo joma osebaro oweyo chikeni .
19119022	Gol kuoma ajara gi achaya nimar arito chikeni .
19119023	Kata obedo ni jotelo chokorena kendo giyanya , to jatichni pod biro mana paro matut kuom chikeni .
19119024	Chikeni e morna ; gin e jong’ad rieko maga .
19119025	Osepiela ei lowo piny ; omiyo rit ngimama kaluwore gi wachni .
19119026	Kane ahulo yorena to ne idwoka ; puonja chikeni .
19119027	Mi awinj tiend gik ma chikeg i puonjo ; eka abiro paro matut kuom timbegi miwuoro .
19119028	Kuyo onyoso chunya , omiyo meda teko kaluwore gi wachni .
19119029	Geng’a kik adonji e yore mag miria mbo , kendo ng’wonna ka ipuonja chikni .
19119030	Aseyiero yor adiera ; kendo aseketo chunya e chikeni .
19119031	Amako chikeni matek , Yaye Jehova , omiyo kik iwe ane wichkuot .
19119032	Yor chikeni ema aringe , nimar isegonyo chunya .
19119033	Puonja mondo alu yoreni , Yaye Jehova , eka abiro ritogi nyaka giko .
19119034	Miya rieko mondo eka arit chikeni kendo atim kaka owacho gi chunya duto .
19119035	Taya e yo mar chikeni , nimar kanyo ema ayudoe mor .
19119036	Ket chunya mondo oher chikeni , to ok dwaro maga mag wuoro .
19119037	Gol wang’a oko kuom gik manono ; rit ngimana kaluwore gi wachni .
19119038	Chop singruok mari ne jatichni , mondo ji oluori .
19119039	Golna achaya ma aluoro , nimar chikeni beyo .
19119040	Mano kaka ahero yoreni ! Rit ngimana e timni makare .
19119041	Mad herani maok rem bina , Yaye Jehova , mad warruokni bina kaluwore gi singruokni .
19119042	Eka abiro dwokora gi ng’at ma timona anyali , nimar ageno kuom wachni .
19119043	Kik igol wach mar adiera e dhoga chuth , nimar aseketo genona e chikeni .
19119044	Abiro rito chikeni ndalo duto , manyaka chieng’ .
19119045	Abiro wuotho ka an thuolo , nimar chikeni ema asebedo ka amanyo .
19119046	Abiro wuoyo kuom chikeni e nyim ruodhi kendo wiya ok bi kuot ,
19119047	nimar amor gi chikeni nikech aherogi .
19119048	Ating’o bedena malo ne chikeni ma ahero kendo asiko aparo matut kuom yoreni .
19119049	Par wachni mane iwacho ne jatichni , nimar isemiya geno .
19119050	Gima hoya e chandruokna en ma : ni singruokni rito ngimana .
19119051	Joma ochayo ji jara maok obadhogi to kata kamano ok alokra awe chikeni .
19119052	Asiko aparo chikeni mosebedo ka nitie nyaka nene , Yaye Jehova , kendo ayudo hoch kuomgi .
19119053	Mirima mager omaka nikech joma timbegi richo , mosejwang’o chikeni .
19119054	Chikeni e thorro mar wenda , kamoro amora ma abwore .
19119055	Aparo nyingi gotieno , Yaye Jehova , kendo abiro rito chikni .
19119056	Ma osebedo timna , nimar asebedo ka arito yoreni .
19119057	In e pokna , Yaye Jehova ; asesingora ni abiro rito chikeni .
19119058	Asemanyo wang’i gi chunya duto ; ng’won-na kaluwore gi singruok mari .
19119059	Asenono yorena kendo asechiko okangega mondo olu yoreni .
19119060	Abiro reto kendo ok abi deko mar rito chikeni .
19119061	Kata obedo ni joma timbegi richo orida gi tonde , to wiya ok bi wil gi chikeni .
19119062	Achiewo dier otieno mondo agoni erokamano kuom chikegi makare .
19119063	An osiep ji duto moluori , jogo duto moluwo yoreni .
19119064	Piny opong’ gi herani , Yaye Jehova ; yie ipuonja chikeni .
19119065	Tim maber ne jatichni kaluwore gi wachni , Yaye Jehova .
19119066	Puonja ng’eyo gi paro maber , nimar ayie kuom chikeni .
19119067	Kane pok ayudo masira to ne abayo yo , to sani koro atimo gima wachni owacho .
19119068	Iber , kendo gima itimo ber ; omiyo puonja chikeni .
19119069	Kata obedo ni joma ochayo ji osemiena gi miriambo , to pod arito yoreni gi chunya duto .
19119070	Chunygi tek kendo ok dew gimoro amora ; to an to chikni miya mor .
19119071	Ne en gima ber mondo ayud chandruok mondo eka apuonjra chikeni .
19119072	Chik moa e dhogi berna moloyo ng’injo gana gi gana mag fedha gi dhahabu .
19119073	Lweteni ema nolosa kendo ochueya ; miya ng’eyo mondo apuonjra chikeni .
19119074	Mad joma oluori bed mamor ka ginena , nimar aseketo genona e wachni .
19119075	Ang’eyo , Yaye Jehova , ni chikeni nikare , kendo ang’eyo ni chwat misechwadago nikare .
19119076	Mad ihoya gi herani maok rem , kaluwore gi singruok mane imiyo jatichni .
19119077	Orna kechni mondo abed mangima , nimar chikni e morna .
19119078	Mad joma ochayo ji ne wichkuot kuom kwinya maonge gima omiyo , an to abiro paro matut kuom yoreni .
19119079	Mad joma oluori dog joko ra , kaachiel gi joma ong’eyo bucheni .
19119080	Mad chunya bed maonge ketho , kuom rito chikeni , mondo kik ane wichkuot .
19119081	Riyo mar dwaro warruokni oloyo chunya , kata kamano aseketo genona e wachni .
19119082	Wengena ool kamanyo singruokni ; apuonjora ni , " Ibiro hoya karang’o ? "
19119083	Kata obedo ni achalo pien ting’o divai molier e iro , to wiya pok owil gi chikeni .
19119084	Jatichni biro rito nyaka karang’o ? Ibiro kumo joma sanda karang’o ?
19119085	Joma ochayo ji osekunyona buche mondo apodhie , gitimo gima chikni okwedo .
19119086	Chikeni duto inyalo geno ; omiyo yie ikonya , nikech ji sanda maonge gima omiyo .
19119087	Ne gichiegni yweya oko e piny , to kata kamano pok aweyo chikeni .
19119088	Rit ngimana kaluwore gi herani , mondo alu chike mowuok e dhogi .
19119089	Wachni ochwere , Yaye Jehova ; ochung’ mogurore e polo .
19119090	Adiera mari ochwere e tienge duto ; mana kaka ne iguro piny mi piny osiko .
19119091	Chikeni osiko nyaka kawuono , nimar gik moko duto tiyoni .
19119092	Ka dine bed ni chikeni ok ema miya mor , to dikoro aselal nono nikech masichega .
19119093	Wiya ok bi wil gi bucheni , nimar gin ema iseritogo ngimana .
19119094	Resa nimar an mari ; nikech asiko amanyo chikeni ndalo duto .
19119095	Joma timbegi richo obutona mondo gitieka , to abiro bet mos ka aparo kuom chikeni .
19119096	Ang’eyo ni koda ka gik malong’o chuth nigi gikogi , to chikeni onge gikogi .
19119097	Yaye , mano kaka ahero chikni ! Aparo kuome odiechieng’ duto .
19119098	Chikeni miyo abedo mariek moloyo wasika , nimar gisiko gin koda seche duto .
19119099	An gi winjo moloyo jopuonjna duto , nimar arito chikeni .
19119100	Wach donjona moloyo jodongo machon nimar arito chikeni .
19119101	Asetamo tiendena ni kik wuothi e yore maricho , mondo eka atim gima wachni ochiko .
19119102	Pok abaro aweyo chikeni , nimar in iwuon ema isepuonja .
19119103	Mano kaka wechegi mit ka abilogi , gimit e dhoga moloyo mor kich !
19119104	Chikeni miyo abedo gi winjo ; e momiyo achayo yo moro amora marach .
19119105	Wachni e taya mar tienda kendo en ler mamenyona yo .
19119106	Asekuong’ora mi aketo sei ni abiro siko kaluwo chikeni makare .
19119107	Asechandora moloyo ; omiyo rit ngimana , Yaye Jehova , kaluwore gi wachni .
19119108	Rwak pak ma achiwoni gi dhoga ka ahero , Yaye Nyasaye , kendo puonja chikeni .
19119109	Kata obedo ni ating’o ngimana e lweta kinde duto , to wiya ok bi wil gi chikeni .
19119110	Joma timbegi richo osechikona obadho ; to kata kamano pok abaro aweyo bucheni .
19119111	Chikeni e girkeni mara manyaka chieng’ ; gin e mor mar chunya .
19119112	Aketo chunya kuom rito chikeni maok aweyo nyaka giko .
19119113	Achayo joma pachgi ariyo , to ahero chikni .
19119114	In e ohingana kendo okumbana ; omiyo aseketo genona e wachni .
19119115	Ayiuru buta , un joma timo richogi , mondo arit chike mag Nyasacha !
19119116	Maka motegno kaluwore gi singruokni , eka anabed mangima ; kik iwe geno ma an-go lalna .
19119117	Sira eka ananwang’ konyruok ; abiro siko ka ahero chikeni .
19119118	Idagi ji duto mabaro weyo chikeni , nimar wuondruok ma giwuondorego en kayiem .
19119119	Joma timbegi richo duto modak e piny ipuko oko ka yugi ; emomiyo ahero chikeni .
19119120	Denda tetni nikech oluori , kihondhko omaka nikech chikeni .
19119121	Asetimo gima kare kendo madier , omiyo kik iweya e lwet joma sanda .
19119122	Ne ni jatichni dhi maber , kendo kik iyie joma ochayo ji osanda .
19119123	Wengena ool karango resruok mikelo , kendo kamanyo gima kare mane isingona .
19119124	Timne jatichni kaluwore gi herani , kendo puonja chikeni .
19119125	An jatichni , omiyo yie imiya nyalo mar ng’eyo gik mopondo eka awinj tiend chikeni .
19119126	Saa oromo mondo koro itim gimoro , Yaye Jehova , nikech iketho chikni .
19119127	Nikech ahero chikeni moloyo dhah abu , kendo moloyo dhahabu maler mogik ,
19119128	kendo nikech akawo bucheni duto ni nikare , omiyo achayo yo moro amora marach .
19119129	Chikeni lich miwuoro ; emomiyo aritogi .
19119130	Wachni koler tiende to kelo ler , omiyo joma ok riek bedo gi winjo .
19119131	Ayawo dhoga kendo agamo yueyo , ka agombo chikeni .
19119132	Lokri iranga mondo ikecha , kaka ijatimo ndalo duto ne joma ohero nyingi .
19119133	Ta okangega mondo gilure gi wachni ; kik iwe richo moro amora loya .
19119134	Gola e dicho ma ji diyogo jowetegi , mondo eka arit bucheni .
19119135	Ng’i jatichni gi wang’ maber kendo puonja chikeni .
19119136	Pi wang’ bubni kawuok e wengena , nimar chikni ok ji orito .
19119137	In ng’at makare , Yaye Jehova , kendo chikeni nikare .
19119138	Chike mise ndiko piny nikare , inyalo genogi chuth .
19119139	Hera ma aherogo wachni tieka , nimar wasika ok dew wachni .
19119140	Singruok magi osetem maber chuth , omiyo jatichni oherogi .
19119141	Kata obedo ni an chien kendo ji ochaya , to wiya ok nyal wil gi bucheni .
19119142	Timni makare osiko kendo chikni en adier ,
19119143	Chandruok kod malit osebirona , kata kamano chikeni e morna .
19119144	Chikeni nikare nyaka chieng’ , omiyo miya ng’eyo mondo eka abed mangima .
19119145	Yie iduoka , Yaye Jehova , nikech aywakni gi chunya duto kendo abiro timo kaka chikni dwaro .
19119146	Aywakni , yie ikonya , eka abiro rito chikeni .
19119147	Achiewo kogwen ka piny pok oya-wore kendo aywagora mondo ayud kony ; aseketo genona e wachni .
19119148	Wengena neno otieno duto , mondo omi apar matut kuom sing ruok magi .
19119149	Winj duonda kaluwore gi herani ; rit ngimana , Yaye Jehova , kaluwore gi chikeni .
19119150	Joma chanona gik maricho ni koda machiegni , kata kamano gin mabor gi chikni .
19119151	In to in machiegni , Yaye Jehova , kendo chikeni duto gin adier .
19119152	Ne apuonjora kuom chikeni chon gilala , ni ne igurogi mondo gisik nyaka chieng’ .
19119153	Ne chandruokna mondo ikonya , nimar pok wiya owil gi chikni .
19119154	Dog jakora mondo iresa , rit ngimana kaluwore gi singruokni .
19119155	Warruok ni mabor gi joma timbegi richo , nimar ok giket chunygi kuom dwaro chikeni .
19119156	Ng’wononi duong’ , Yaye Jehova ; rit ngimana kaluwore gi chikeni .
19119157	Wasigu masanda thoth adier , to kata kamano pok abaro aweyo chikeni .
19119158	Arango joma onge yie ka chunya ochido kodgi , nimar ok girit chikni .
19119159	Neye kaka ahero bucheni ; omiyo rit ngimana , Yaye Jehova , kaluwore gi herani .
19119160	Wechegi duto gin adier ; kendo chikegi makare duto ochwere .
19119161	Jotelo sanda maonge gima omiyo , to kata kamano chunya oluoro wachni .
19119162	Singruokni mora , mana ka ng’ama oyudo mwandu maduong’ ma wasigu oringo oweyo .
19119163	Asin kendo ajok gi miriambo , to ahero chikni .
19119164	Apaki ndalo abiriyo e odiechieng’ achiel kuom chikegi makare .
19119165	Joma ohero chikeni nigi kuwe maduong’ kendo onge gima nyalo miyo gichwanyre .
19119166	Arito warruokni , Yaye Jehova , kendo aluwo chikeni .
19119167	Atimo gima chikeni dwaro , nimar aherogi gi hera maduong’ .
19119168	Arito bucheni gi chikeni , nimar yorega duto ong’ereni maber .
19119169	Mad ywakna chopi e nyimi , Yaye Jehova ; mi abed gi winjo kaluwore gi wachni .
19119170	Mad kwayona chopi e nyimi , resa kaluwore gi singruokni .
19119171	Mad dhoga pong’ gi pak , nimar isepuonja chikeni .
19119172	Mad lewa wer kuom wachni , nimar chikegi duto nikare .
19119173	Mad lweti ikre mar konya , nimar aseyiero bucheni .
19119174	Asedwaro resruok mari matek , Yaye Jehova ; kendo chikni e morna .
19119175	We amed bedo mangima mondo apaki , kendo mad chikeni okonya .
19119176	Aseruenyo ka rombo molal , omiyo yie imany jatichni , nimar wiya pok owil gi chikeni .
19120001	Ka an e chandruok to aluongo Jehova , kendo oduoka ,
19120002	Resa , Yaya Jehova , kuom dho joma riambo kendo kuom lew joma wuondore .
19120003	Be ing’eyo gima Nyasaye biro timo-ni , be ing’eyo gik mochomi adier , Yaye lep mawuondore ?
19120004	Obiro kumi gi aserni mabitho mag jakedo , ee , obiro wang’i gi maka maliel mager , mowang’ gi yiend adugo .
19120005	Malit ochoma adier nikech adak Mesek , hapa rach nikech adak e dier hembe mag Kedar !
19120006	Asedak aming’a ahinya , e dier joma ok dwar kuwe .
19120007	An an ng’at kuwe ; to ka awuoyo , to giikore ne lweny .
19121001	Ating’o wengena ka arango godeere kuma konyruokna biro aye ?
19121002	Konyruokna aa kuom Jehova , Jachuech polo gi piny .
19121003	Ok obi weyo tiendi kier-Jal ma riti ok bi nur ;
19121004	adier , Jal marito Israel ok nur kendo ok nindi .
19121005	Jehova riti-Jehova e tipo moumi manie badi korachwich ;
19121006	omiyo chieng’ ok nochomi godiechieng’ kendo dwe ok notimi gimoro gotieno .
19121007	Jehova biro riti mondo gimoro amora kik ohinyi -
19121008	Jehova biro riti kidonjo kendo kiwuok , obiro timo kamano sani kendo nyaka chieng’ .
19122001	Ne amor gi joma nowachona ni , " Wadhiuru e od Jehova . "
19122002	Tiendewa ochung’ e dhorangeyeni , Yaye Jerusalem .
19122003	Jerusalem oger ka dala ma ji odakie machiegni-machiegni .
19122004	Kanyo e kama ogendini idho dhiye , ogendini mag Jehova dhi kuno mondo opak nying Jehova ka giluwo chike mane omi Israel .
19122005	Kanyo ema kombe loch mag ng’ado bura nitie kombe loch mag jood Daudi .
19122006	Lamuru mondo Jerusalem obed gi kuwe . Lamuru ni : " Mad joma oheri bed gi kuwe .
19122007	Mad kuwe yudre ei alworani , adier kuwe mondo obedi ei ohinga mochieli . "
19122008	Nikech owetena gi osiepena modak e iyi , awacho ni , " Jerusalem mondo obed gi kuwe . "
19122009	Nikech wach od Jehova Nyasachwa , adwaro ni idhi maber .
19123001	In ema arangi , in ma kom lochni nie polo ema arangi .
19123002	Mana kaka wenge wasumbni rango lwet ruodhgi , kendo kaka wenge jatich manyako mar ot rango lwet min-odgi , e kaka we n g ewa rango Jehova Nyasachwa nyaka chop okechwa .
19123003	Yie ikechwa Yaye Jehova , yie ikechwa , nikech osechawa gikinda .
19123004	Josunga osejarowa moromo kendo acheje osechayowa moromo .
19124001	Ka dine bed ni Jehova ok jakorwa-jo Israel mondo owach kamano -
19124002	ka dine bed ni Jehova ok jakorwa kane ji omonjowa ,
19124003	e kinde mane mirima mabebni ka mach omakogi kodwa , to dine gimwonyowa ngili ;
19124004	ataro dine odinonwa , ee , kodh yamo dine oywerowa ,
19124005	kendo pi maringo matek dine odhi kodwa .
19124006	To pak odog ne Jehova maok oseyie mondo lekegi okidhwa .
19124007	Wasetony mana ka winyo mowuok e wino mar jachik winy ; wino osechodi , to wan wasetony .
19124008	Ko n y ruokwa nie nying Jehova Jachuech polo gi piny .
19125001	Joma ogeno kuom Jehova chalo gi Got Sayun , maok nyal yiengi to osiko nyaka chieng’ .
19125002	Mana kaka gode olworo Jerusalem , e kaka Jehova olworo joge chakre sani kendo nyaka chieng’ .
19125003	Ludh loch mar joma timbegi richo ok bi siko korito piny mopog ne joma kare , nimar ka mano otimore to joma kare nyalo tiyo gi lwetgi kuom timo marach .
19125004	Tim maber , Yaye Jehova , tim maber ne joma beyo , tim maber ne joma ngimagi oriere gie chunygi .
19125005	To joma lokore luwo yore mobam Jehova biro kumo kaachiel gi joma timo timbe maricho . Israel mondo obed gi kuwe !
19126001	Kane Jehova oduogo joma otue Sayun , to ne ochalonwa mana lek .
19126002	Ne wathung’ gi nyiero kendo dhowa nopong’ gi wende mor . Eka nowachore e dier ogendini ni , " Jehova osetimonegi gik madongo . "
19126003	Adier , Jehova osetimonwa gik madongo , omiyo wamor mokalo .
19126004	Duognwa gigewa , Yaye Jehova , mondo wachal gi aoche man Negev .
19126005	Joma komo kodhi ka pi wengegi chuer biro keyo ka wero wende mor .
19126006	Ng’at madhi oko ka ywak , koting’o kodhi mikomo , biro duogo ka wero wende mor , koting’o cham mosechiek .
19127001	Ka Jehova ok ema ger ot , to joma gere nyagore gi tich matek kayiem . Ka Jehova ok ema orito dala , to jorito ochung’ karito kayiem .
19127002	In be imondo chiew chon kendo ineno nyaka saa molewo , kinyagori gi tich matek mondo iyud chiemo minyalo chamo ; nimar Nyasaye miyo joge mohero nindo mokuwe .
19127003	Yaw u owi gin gweth moa kuom Jehova , adier , nyithindo gin mich moa kuome .
19127004	Yawuowi ma ng’ato onyuolo kapod otin , chalo gi asere manie lwet jakedo .
19127005	Ng’at ma ofukune opong’ kodgi en ng’ama ogwedhi . Ok ginine wichkuot ka gikedo gi wasikgi e dhorangach .
19128001	Ji duto moluoro Jehova , kendo mawuotho e yorene gin joma ogwedhi .
19128002	Ibiro chamo olemb luchi ; iniyud gweth kendo inidhi maber .
19128003	Chiegi nochal gi yiend mzabibu manyak maber e odi ; yawuoti nochal gi chuny mzabibu maloth sama giluoro mesa ka gichiemo .
19128004	Kamano e kaka ng’ama oluoro Jehova ogwedhi .
19128005	Jehova mondo ogwedhi gie Sayun , ndalo duto mag ngimani ; mad ineye gi wang’i ka Jerusalem dhi maber ,
19128006	kendo mad idag aming’a nyaka ine nyithind nyithindi Israel mondo obed gi kuwe !
19129001	Jogi osesanda malit nyaka aa e tinna-Israel mondo owach ni :
19129002	gisesanda malit nyaka aa e tinna , to kata kamano pok gibedo gi loch kuoma .
19129003	Jopur osepuro dieng’eya kendo gisegore para maroboche ,
19129004	to kata kamano Jehova en ng’ama kare ; osechoda oko mi adong’ thuolo e tonde joma richo .
19129005	Ji duto mochayo Sayun lo mi dog chien gi wichkuot .
19129006	Mad gichal gi lum moti ewi tado ma ner kata kapok odongo maber .
19129007	Ok onyal nyago gimoro mapong’o lwet jakeyo , kata ma jachoko nyalo ting’o e bade .
19129008	Mad joma kalo bute kik wachnegi ni , " Jehova mondo ogwedhi , kata ni , wagwedhi e nying Jehova . "
19130001	Aywakni ka an e chuny bur matut , Yaye Jehova ,
19130002	Yaye Jehova , yie iwinj dwonda . Chik iti ne ywakna ma aywaknigo mondo ikecha .
19130003	Yaye Ruoth Nyasaye , ka dine bed ni isiko iparo richo , ma ji timo , Yaye Ruoth Nyasaye to en ng’a ma dichung’ e nyimi ka ok bura oloyo ?
19130004	To kata kamano kuomi nitiere weyo richo ; emomiyo ji oluori .
19130005	Arito Jehova , chunya rite kendo aketo genona kuom wachne .
19130006	Chunya rito Ruoth Nyasaye , moloyo kaka jorito rito ru piny .
19130007	Yaye jo-Israel , keturu genou kuom Jehova , nimar Jehova ema nigi hera maok rem kendo en ema owaro ji chuth .
19130008	En owuon ema obiro waro jo Israel kuom richogi duto .
19131001	Ng’ayi onge e chunya , Yaye Jehova , wang’a bende ok tek ; chunya ok chandre gi gik madongo , kata gi weche matek modhiera ng’eyo .
19131002	To abet mos kendo chunya okuwe ; mana ka nyathi mapod dhoth moling’ mos e bad min , ee , kaka nyathi ma kamano ling’ mos , e kaka chunya bende oling’ mos e iya .
19131003	Yaye jo Israel , keturu genou kuom Jehova chakre sani kendo nyaka chieng’ .
19132001	Parie Daudi , Yaye Jehova , parie Daudi gi chandruok duto moseneno .
19132002	Ne okuong’ore kane osingore ne Jehova , kendo ne okuong’ore ne Jal Maratego mar Jakobo kama :
19132003	" Ok anadonji e oda , kata dhi e kitandana -
19132004	Ok anayie nindo tera , kata ayula wang’ lo wengena ,
19132005	kapok aloso ne Jehova kare , kapok ayudo ne Jal Maratego mar Jakobo kar dak . "
19132006	Ne wawinjo wachno Efratha , ee , ne wayude e puothe mag Jaar :
19132007	" Wadhiuru kare modake ; wadhiuru mondo walame e nyim komduong’ne -
19132008	aa malo , Yaye Jehova , aa malo ibi kari mar yweyo , in kaachiel gi Sandug Muma ma en kido mar tekoni .
19132009	Mad jodolo magi rwakre gi tim makare , kendo mad jogi maler wer gi mor . "
19132010	Nikech Daudi jatichni , kik idag i ng’ati miseyiero .
19132011	Jehova nokuong’ore kendo osingore ne Daudi , kendo ne en kuong’ruok maok enoloki ngang’ ; nokuong’orene ni , " Abiro keto achiel kuom kothi e lochni -
19132012	ka yawuoti orito singruokna kod chike ma apuonjogi , eka yawuotgi nobedi e lochni nyaka chieng’ kendo nyaka chieng’ . "
19132013	Nimar Jehova oseyiero Sayun , osehere kaka kar dakne , osewacho ni ,
19132014	" Ma e kar yweyona nyaka chieng’ ma nyaka chieng’ , kae ema abiro betie kom lochna , nimar asehere -
19132015	abiro gwedhe gi gik moko mogundho , kendo joge modhier abiro romo gi chiemo .
19132016	Abiro rwako jodolo mage gi warruok kendo joma ler modak e iye biro siko ka wero wende mor .
19132017	" Ka eni ema abiro miyo tung moro donge ne Daudi kendo abiro chungo taya ne ng’ata mowir .
19132018	Abiro bako wasike gi wichkuot , to en osimbo manie wiye biro medo rieny .
19133001	Mano kaka en gima ber kendo malong’o , ka jowete odak kanyakla gi kuwe !
19133002	Dak ma kamano chalo gi mo manengone tek mool e wich kendo mamol piny nyaka e tik , ma mol piny koluwo tik Harun ka mol piny mosmos nyaka e ng’ut kandhoge .
19133003	Ochalo bende gi thoo momoko e Got Hermon maridore e wi Got Sayun . Nimar kanyo ema Jehova chiwe gwethne , ma en ngima manyaka chieng’ .
19134001	Pakuru Jehova , un jotichne duto , matiyo gotieno e od Jehova .
19134002	Ting’uru bedeu malo e kare maler kendo upak Jehova .
19134003	Mad Jehova ma jachwech polo gi piny , ogwedhu gie Sayun .
19135001	Haleluya ! Pakuru nying Jehova ; pakeuru , un jotich Jehova ,
19135002	Un mutiyo e od Jehova , e laru mag od Nyasachwa .
19135003	Pakuru Jehova , nimar Jehova ber ; pakuru nyinge gi wende pak nimar timo kamano en gima ber .
19135004	Nimar Jehova oseyiero Jakobo , mondo obed gire owuon ; oseyiero Israel , mondo obed mwandune mogeno .
19135005	Ang’eyo ni Nyasaye duong’ , ang’eyo adier ni Ruodhwa duong’ moloyo nyiseche duto .
19135006	Jehova timo gimoro amora mohero , e polo kendo e piny ei nembe kendo e kudegi .
19135007	Omiyo boche wuok koa e tung’ piny koni gi koni , kendo ooro milpolo ka koth chue bende okelo yamo kogolo e utege mokanogie .
19135008	Ne ogoyo nyithindo makayo mag Misri , nyithindo makayo mag dhano kod le .
19135009	Ne ooro ranyisi gi honni mage e dieru , Yaye Misri , noorogi kuom Farao kaachiel gi jotichne duto .
19135010	Ne ogoyo pinje mang’eny piny , kendo ne onego ruodhi ma roteke -
19135011	kaka Sihon ruodh jo Amor , gi Og ruodh Basan kod ruodhi duto mag Kanan -
19135012	kendo nomiyogi piny jogo kaka girkeni , kaka girkeni ne joge ma gin jo Israel .
19135013	Yaye Jehova , nyingi osiko nyaka chieng’ , Yaye Jehova , humbi ochwere e tienge duto .
19135014	Nimar Jehova biro chwako joge , kendo obiro kecho jotichne .
19135015	Nyiseche mopa mag ogendini gin fedha gi dhahabu , molos gi lwet dhano .
19135016	Gin-gi dhok , to ok ginyal wuoyo , kendo gin-gi wenge to ok ginyal neno .
19135017	Bende gin-gi it , to ok ginyal winjo wach , kendo kata mana muya onge e dhogi .
19135018	Joma losogi nobed machal kodgi , kendo ji duto mogenogi be biro chalo kodgi .
19135019	Yaye dhood jo Israel , pakuru Jehova ; Yaye dhood joka Harun , pakuru Jehova ;
19135020	Yaye dhood joka Lawi , pakuru Jehova ; pakuru Jehova , un ji duto moluore .
19135021	Jehova mondo opaki gie Sayun , Jal modak Jerusalem mondo opaki . Haleluya !
19136001	Gouru erokamano ne Jehova , nimar ober . Herane osiko nyaka chieng’ .
19136002	Gouru erokamano ne Nyasach nyiseche : Herane osiko nyaka chieng’ .
19136003	Gouru erokamano ne Ruodh ruodhi : Herane osiko nyaka chieng’ .
19136004	ne En kendo ma timo honni madongo , Herane osiko nyaka chieng’ .
19136005	Jal mane oloso polo gi riekone , Herane osiko nyaka chieng’ .
19136006	Jal mane oyaro piny ewi pige , Herane osiko nyaka chieng’ .
19136007	Jal mane oloso rameny madongodongo-Herane osiko nyaka chieng’ .
19136008	nochweyo wang’ chieng’ mondo orit odiechieng’ , Herane osiko nyaka chieng’ .
19136009	kod dwe gi sulwe mondo orit otieno ; Herane osiko nyaka chieng’ .
19136010	ne En mane onego nyithindo makayo mag Misri , Herane osiko nyaka chieng’ .
19136011	kendo mane ogolo jo Israel oko kuomgi , Herane osiko nyaka chieng’ .
19136012	nogologi gi lwedo motegno kod bat morie ; Herane osiko nyaka chieng’ .
19136013	ne En mane obaro Nam Makwar diere ariyo ; Herane osiko nyaka chieng’ .
19136014	mi nogolo jo Israel koluwo diere tir , Herane osiko nyaka chieng’ .
19136015	to Farao gi jolwenje to nomiyo Nam Makwar oywero ; Herane osiko nyaka chieng’ .
19136016	ne En mane otelone joge e thim , Herane osiko nyaka chieng’ .
19136017	ne En mane ogoyo ruodhi madongo piny , Herane osiko nyaka chieng’ .
19136018	kendo mane onego ruodhi ma roteke Herane osiko nyaka chieng’ .
19136019	Kaka Sihon ruodh jo Amor-Herane osiko nyaka chieng’ .
19136020	gi Og ruodh Basan-Herane osiko nyaka chieng’ .
19136021	mi nochiwo pinygi kaka girkeni , Herane osiko nyaka chieng’ .
19136022	Kaka girkeni ne Israel jatichne ; Herane osiko nyaka chieng’ .
19136023	ne En mane oparowa ka piny ochamowa , Herane osiko nyaka chieng’ .
19136024	kendo mane o gonyowa e lwet wasikwa , Herane osiko nyaka chieng’ .
19136025	machiwo chiemo ne chwech duto , Herane osiko nyaka chieng’ .
19136026	Gouru erokamano ne Nyasach polo , Herane osiko nyaka chieng’ .
19137001	E bath aoche mag Babulon ne wabet piny kendo ne waywak kane waparo Sayun .
19137002	Ne wang’awo thumbewa ewi yiend onera mane nikanyo ,
19137003	nimar joma ne omakowa nokwayowa wende kane wan kanyo , josandwa nochunowa ni wawernegi wende mor ; ne giwachonwa ni , " Wernwae uru achiel kuom wende Sayun ! "
19137004	Ere kaka di wawer wende Jehova kapod wan e piny mawendo ?
19137005	Ka dipo ni wiya owil kodi , Yaye Jerusalem , to mad lweta makorachwich wiye wil gi tichne .
19137006	Mad lewa moki e danda ka dipo ni ok apari , ka dipo ni ok aketo chunya kuomi , Yaye Jerusalem morna maduong’ mogik .
19137007	Parie gima ne jo Edom otimo , Yaye Jehova , parie gimane gitimo chieng’ mane Jerusalem opodho . Ne gikok matek ni , " Muke u ru ogoye piny . Mukeuru ogore piny gi mise mare duto ! "
19137008	Yaye nyar Babulon , in mochanni kethruok , ng’ama nochuli kuom gima isetimonwa en jahawi -
19137009	ng’at ma nomak nyithindi mayom mi chudgi piny e lwendni en jahawi .
19138001	Abiro paki gi chunya duto , Yaye Jehova ; abiro paki gi wer e nyim nyiseche .
19138002	Abiro kulora piny ka achomo Hekalu mari maler kendo abiro pako nyingi nikech herani kod adierani , nimar iseting’o nyingi kod Wachni malo moyombo gik moko duto .
19138003	Kane aluongo to ne iduoka , kendo ne imiyo abedo gi chir kod chuny motegno .
19138004	Mad ruodhi duto mag piny paki , Yaye Jehova , e sama giwinjo weche mowuok e dhogi .
19138005	Mad giwer kuom yore mag Jehova , nimar duong’ mar Jehova ng’ongo .
19138006	Jehova rango joma obolore kata obedo ni en malo to josunga to ong’eyo kata kapod gin gichien .
19138007	Kata obedo ni awuotho e dier chandruok , to irito ngimana ; irieyo lweti kuom mirimb joma kedo koda , kendo iresa gi lweti makorachwich .
19138008	Jehova biro chopona chenroge ; Yaye Jehova , herani osiko nyaka chieng’-kik ijwang’ tije ma iloso gi lweteni .
19139001	Yaye Jehova , isenona kendo ing’eya .
19139002	Ing’eya sama abet piny nyaka sama aa malo ; adier , ing’eyo parona gi kuma bor .
19139003	Bende ing’eyo yorega ma aluwo kod kuonde ma ayweyoe ; yorena duto oyangoreni maber .
19139004	Kata kapok wach moro owuok e dhoga to ing’eye malong’o , Yaye Jehova .
19139005	Ilwora koni gi koni mi iketa diere ; adier , iseuma duto gi lweti .
19139006	Ng’ech ma kamano lichna miwuoro , kendo otutna moyombo pacha .
19139007	Dadhi kure eka apond ne Roho mari ? Koso kanye ma daring adhiye mondo apondni ?
19139008	Ka aidho e polo , to in kuno ; ka aloso otandana e bur matut , to in kuno .
19139009	Ka aidho yamb kogwen mondo otera e tok nam komachielo ,
19139010	to kata kuno bende lweti biro telona e , kendo lweti mako rachwich biro maka motegno .
19139011	Ka awacho ni , " Mudho biro ima adier kendo ler biro lokorena otieno , "
19139012	to in mudho ok timni mudho kendo otieno rienyni ka odiechieng’ , nimar mudho chaloni ler .
19139013	In ema ne ichweyo dhanda maiye , adier , ne ing’ina maber gie i mama .
19139014	Apaki nikech ne ichweya mong’ith kendo malich miwuoro ; tijeno misetimo lich , kendo ang’eyo mano maber .
19139015	Fuonde mag ringra ne ok opondoni , chieng’ mane ilosa kama opondo . Chieng’ mane iriwo fuondega kaachiel e chuny piny ,
19139016	wengeni ne oneno ringra kane pok olosore maber . Ndalo mane ochanna duto ne ondiki chon gilala e bugi kane pok kata achiel kuomgi obetie .
19139017	Mano kaka pachi tutna , Yaye Nyasaye ! Mano kaka ging’eny mokalo akwana kargi duto !
19139018	Ka da bed ni anyalo kwanogi , to da giloyo kuoyo gi ng’eny . Sama achiew to ayudo ni pod an mana kodi .
19139019	Yaye Jehova , mad iyie ineg joma timbegi richo ! Ayiuru buta , un joma rich chwero remb ji omakogi !
19139020	Giwuoyo kuomi gi paro marach ; adier , wasiki tiyo gi nyingi e yo marach .
19139021	Donge amon gi joma mon kodi , Yaye Jehova , koso donge ok awinjra gi joma chung’ mondo oked kodi ?
19139022	Achayogi kendo aonge kodgi gi tich adier akwanogi kaka wasika .
19139023	Nona , Yaye Jehova , mondo ing’e chunya ; tema , mondo ing’e pacha .
19139024	Tim kamano mondo ine ane ka nitie gimoro marach kuoma , mondo itera e yor ngima manyaka chieng’ .
19140001	Resa , Yaye Jehova , kuom joma richo , konya e lwet jomahundu ,
19140002	
19140003	joma chano chenro maricho e chunygi kendo gitugo lweny pilepile .
19140004	Gipiago lewgi mabith ka lew thuol kendo kwiri mar thuond fu nie lewgi . Sela
19140005	Rita , Yaye Jehova , rita e lwet joma timbegi richo ; konya e lwet jomahundu machano gajo tiendena .
19140006	Josunga chikona obadho ; giseyarona gogo mondo amokie kendo gisechikona otego e yorega ma aluwo . Sela
19140007	Yaye Jehova , Sela awachoni ni , " In Nyasacha . " omiyo yie iwinja , Yaye Jehova , winj ywak ma aywaknigo mondo ikecha .
19140008	Yaye Ruoth Nyasaye , ma jakonyna motegno , in migeng’ona wiya sama lweny ger -
19140009	Kik iyie mondo joma timbegi richo oyud gik ma chunygi go mbo , Yaye Jehova ; kik iyie mondo chenrogi otimre . Sela
19140010	Mi mondo chandruok ma joma olwora buogago , odog e wiyegi .
19140011	Mi mondo makaa maliel mager oolre kuomgi , ee , ne ni odirgi e mach , kata e thidhya ma nimo ji , maok ginyal wuokie kendo .
19140012	Mi mondo joma ketho nying jowetegi kik dhi maber e piny , ee , ne ni masira olawo jomahundu mi ojukogi .
19140013	Ang’eyo ni Jehova miyo jodhier yudo adieragi , kendo oneno ni ong’ad bura kare ne joma ochando .
19140014	Joma kare biro pako nyingi adier kendo joma ngimagi oriere tir biro dak ka ngima e nyimi .
19141001	Aluongi , Yaye Jehova , yie ibi ira piyo . Yie iwinj dwonda ka aluongi .
19141002	Mad lamona osiki e nyimi mana ka ubani miwang’o , kendo bedena osik koriere kochomo malo mana ka misango mitimoni godhiambo .
19141003	Yaye Nyasaye , ket jarit e dhoga ; ketna jarit mondo okonya umo dhoga .
19141004	Kik iyie gimoro amora marach ywa chunya , ma dimi an be atim timbe maricho kaachiel gi joma timbegi richo ; rita mondo kik acham chiembgi mabeyonegi .
19141005	Onego ng’at makare ema ogoya , nikech mano chalo tim ng’wono motimona ; onego en ema okwera , nikech mano chalo mo mool e wiya ; ok anyal dagi mondo ng’ama kare otimna kamano . To kata kamano obiro kwedo timbe joma richo e lemona ;
19141006	chieng’ ma nowit ruodhigi piny koa e wi got mabor , eka joma timbegi richo nong’e ni kare wechega ne gin adier .
19141007	Giniwach ni , " Mana kaka ng’ato puro kendo toyo lo , e kaka chokewa osekere e dho bur liel . "
19141008	Anto at ego wang’a kuomi , Yaye Jehova ; In e kar pondona , omiyo kik iwe atho .
19141009	Rita kuom obadho ma gisechikona , ee , rita kuom otego ma joma timbegi richo ochikona .
19141010	Mad joma timbegi richogo moki e gokegi giwegi ka anto akadho maber mak gimoro otima .
19142001	Aywak matek ne Jehova ; ating’o duonda ne Jehova mondo okecha .
19142002	
19142003	Ahulone gik mathaga duto ; anyise chandruokna duto ka abet e nyime .
19142004	Sama chunya chandore e iya , to in ema ing’eyo yor konyruokna .
19142005	Rang batha korachwich mondo ineonge ng’ama dewa . Aonge ng’ama rito ngimana .
19142006	Aywakni , Yaye Jehova ; akoni ni , " In e kar pondona , kendo in e pokna e piny joma ngima . "
19142007	Yie iwinj ywakna , nimar an-gi chandruok maduong’ ; resa e lwet joma lawa nimar gitek moloya mabor .
19142008	Gonya e twech ma antie , mondo apak nyingi . Eka joma kare biro chokore buta nikech ber misetimona .
19143001	Winj lamona , Yaye Jehova , chik iti ne ywakna mar kech ; bi mondo ikonya nikech in jaadiera kendo itimo maber .
19143002	Kik imi jatichni yud kum nimar onge kata ng’ato achiel ma timo maber e nyimi .
19143003	Jasigu lawa matek , oserodha piny nyaka e lo ; ochuna ni nyaka adag kama otimo mudho mana ka joma notho chon gilala .
19143004	Omiyo chunya chandore e iya , ee , chunya obuok .
19143005	Aparo higni machon mosekalo ; a keto pacha mos kuom tijeni duto kendo ageno gik ma lweti osetimo .
19143006	Ayaroni lwetena ; chunya gombi mana kaka lowo motwo gombo koth . Sela
19143007	Dwoka piyo , Yaye Jehova , nimar chunya ool . Kik ipandna wang’i nono to dipoka achalo gi joma ridore e bur matut .
19143008	Mi mondo okinyi oromna gi herani maok rem , nimar aketo genona kuomi . Nyisa yo monego alu nimar aketo chunya duto kuomi .
19143009	Resa e lwet wasika , Yaye Jehova , nimar in e jaritna .
19143010	Puonja timo dwaroni , nimar in e Nyasacha ; mi mondo Roho mari maber , otelna e yo mopie .
19143011	Yaye Jehova , kony ngimana nikech nyingi iwuon ; gola oko e chandruok nikech timni maber .
19143012	Mi wasika oling’ thi , nikech herani maok rem ; tiek joma kedo koda duto nimar an jatichni .
19144001	Pakne Jehova ma en lwandana , pakeuru en motiego lwetena ne lweny , kendo en momiyo lith lwetena bedo mong’ith e kedo .
19144002	En Nyasacha ma jahera kendo en ohingana , bende en kar pondona kendo en jakonyna . En okumbana ma ageng’orago , kendo en ema oloyona joma nie bwoya .
19144003	Dhano to en ang’o , Yaye Jehova , momiyo iketo chunyi kuome , koso wuod dhano to en ang’o , momiyo isiko ipare ?
19144004	Dhano chalo gi muya nono kendo ndalone chalo gi tipo makadho piyo .
19144005	Wuogi e polo , Yaye Jehova , wuogi mondo ilor piny ; lor piny imul gode , mondo gidhuol iro .
19144006	Or mil polo , mondo ike wasigu ; dir aserni magi , mondo itiekgi .
19144007	Rie lweti koa e polo nyaka piny , mondo ikonya , kendo igola , e pige ma tekregi ng’eny , kendo e lwet jo pinje mamoko ,
19144008	ma dhogi opong’ gi miriambo kendo ma lwetgi mako rachwich opong’ gi wuondruok .
19144009	Abiro weroni wer manyien , Yaye Nyasaye ; abiro weroni wer mamit ka agoyoni thum man-gi tonde apar ,
19144010	abiro werne Jal mamiyo ruodhi locho , kendo ma konyo Daudi jatichne e dho ligangla mager .
19144011	Konya kendo gola e lwet jo pinje mamoko ma dhogi opong’ gi miriambo kendo ma lwetgi makorachwich opong’ gi wuondruok .
19144012	Eka yawuotwa biro chalo gi yiende mayudo pi maber , kendo nyiwa biro chalo gi sirni modol maber mondo olich dala ruoth .
19144013	Dechewa biro pong’ gi kit mwandu duto . Rombewa biro medore gana gi gana , ee , gibiro bedo gana mathoth e lek magwa ,
19144014	kendo ruedhi magwa biro ywayo misike mapek . Jokuoge ok nodonj e kundewa , bende ok noterwa e twech kendo ‘ yore yore ’ ok nogo e gweng’wa .
19144015	Ogwedh joma gigi gin adier kuomgi ; kendo ogwedh jogo ma Nyasachgi en Jehova .
19145001	Abiro ting’o nyingi malo , Yaye Nyasacha ma Ruoth ; abiro pako nyingi nyaka chieng’ kendo nyaka chieng’ .
19145002	Abiro paki pile ka pile kendo abiro ting’o nyingi malo nyaka chieng’ ma nyaka chieng’ .
19145003	Jehova duong’ miwuoro kendo owinjore gi pak , onge ng’ama nyalo yango duong’ne .
19145004	Tieng’ achiel biro pako tijeni ne tieng’ machielo ; ee , gibiro nyiso ji kuom tijeni madongo .
19145005	Gibiro wuoyo kuom duong’ni mang’ongo kendo marieny , to an abiro paro mos kuom tijeni miwuoro .
19145006	Gibiro nyiso kuom tekoni mitimogo gik malich miwuoro , to an abiro hulo kuom tijeni madongo .
19145007	Gibiro loso nyasi mar berni mogundho kendo gibiro wer gi mor kuom timbeni makare .
19145008	Jehova ng’won kendo kecho ji , iye ok wang’ piyo kendo en gi hera mang’eny .
19145009	Jehova timo maber ne ji duto ; okecho ji duto mosechweyo .
19145010	Ji duto ma isechweyo biro paki , Yaye Jehova ; jogi maler duto biro dhiali .
19145011	Gibiro nyiso ji kuom duong’ mar pinyruodhi kendo gibiro wuoyo kuom nyaloni ,
19145012	mondo ji duto ong’e gik madongo mitimo kod duong’ mang’ongo mar pinyruodhi .
19145013	Pinyruodhi en pinyruoth mochwere , kendo lochni osiko nyaka tienge duto . Jehova chopo singruok mage duto kendo ohero ji duto mosechweyo .
19145014	Jehova chungo ji duto mopodho kendo omiyo joma piny otaro aa malo .
19145015	In ema wenge ji duto ng’iyi , kendo imiyogi chiembgi e kinde mowinjore .
19145016	Ka iyawo lweti to gik mangima duto yudo konyruokgi duto .
19145017	Jehova nikare e yorege duto kendo ohero ji duto mosechweyo .
19145018	Jehova ni machiegni gi ji duto maluongo nyinge , to mana joma luongo nyinge e adiera .
19145019	Ochopo dwaro mag joma oluore ; adier , owinjo ywakgi kendo oresogi .
19145020	Jehova rito maber ji duto mohere , to ji duto ma timbegi richo obiro tieko .
19145021	Dhoga biro wacho pak ne Jehova . Gik mangima duto mondo opak nyinge maler nyaka chieng’ kendo nyaka chieng’ .
19146001	Haleluya ! Pak Jehova , Yaye chunya .
19146002	Abiro pako Jehova e ngimana duto ; abiro wero wende pak ne Nyasacha kinde duto ma angima .
19146003	Kik iket genoni kuom ruodhi mag piny , kata kuom dhano matho maok nyal waro ng’ato ,
19146004	nikech ka chunygi ochot to gidok e lowo ; kendo chieng’ onogono chenrogi ogik gikanyono .
19146005	Ogwedh ng’at ma konyruokne en Nyasach Jakobo , ng’at ma genone nikuom Jehova Nyasache ,
19146006	ma jachwech polo gi piny , gi nam kod gik moko duto manie igi-Jehova mosiko ka en ja adiera nyaka chieng’ .
19146007	Ochwako ng’at misando kendo ochiwo chiemo ne joma odenyo . Jehova gonyo joma otue mi gibed thuolo ,
19146008	kendo omiyo muofni neno . Jehova miyo joma piny otaro aa malo , kendo ohero joma kare .
19146009	Jehova rito jadak kendo okonyo nyathi kich gi chi liel , to yore mag ng’ama timbene richo to orocho .
19146010	Jehova olocho nyaka chieng’ Yaye Sayun , Nyasachi olocho nyaka tienge duto mabiro . Haleluya !
19147001	Haleluya ! Mano kaka en gima ber wero wende pak ne Nyasachwa , mano kaka en gima long’o kendo mowinjore mondo ji opake !
19147002	Jehova gero Jerusalem kendo ; ochoko jo Israel mane otue .
19147003	Ochango joma chunygi tuo kendo othiedho adhondegi .
19147004	Osekwano kendo ong’eyo kar romb sulwe duto kendo oluongo moro ka moro kuomgi gi nyinge .
19147005	Ruodhwa duong’ kendo en gi teko kendo nyalo ; ng’eyone onge gikone .
19147006	Jehova ting’o joma obolore malo to joma timbegi richo to ochwado piny e lowo .
19147007	Weruru ne Jehova kugoyone erokamano , weruru wer mamit ne Nyasachwa kugoyo nyatiti .
19147008	Oumo kor polo gi boche polo , kendo oromo piny gi koth bende omiyo lum twi ewi thuche .
19147009	Ochiwo chiemo ne dhok kendo ne agege ka giywakne .
19147010	Morne ok nikuom teko farase kata kuom ogwand dhano ;
19147011	to Jehova mor gi joma oluore ; joma oketo genogi kuom herane ma ok rem .
19147012	Dhial Jehova , Yaye Jerusalem ; pak Nyasachi , Yaye Sayun ,
19147013	nimar omedo sirni manie dho rangeyeni teko , kendo ogwedho jogi modak e iyi .
19147014	Omiyo kuwe bedo e tong’ pinyu kendo oromou gi ngano mabeyo e mogik .
19147015	Ooro chike e piny , kendo wachne ringo matek ka diemo wang’ .
19147016	Oyaro pe ka yie rombo kendo okeyo ong’weng’o ka buru .
19147017	Odiro pe mage e piny ka kit ombo . En ng’a manyalo ngino sama odiro pe kamano ?
19147018	Ooro wachne kendo pego leny nono ; ee , otugo yembene mi pego lokre pi mamol .
19147019	Osenyiso Jakobo wachne , ee , osenyiso Israel chikene gi buchene .
19147020	Onge oganda moro machielo mosetimone kamano kendo gin ok ging’eyo chikene . Haleluya !
19148001	Haleluya ! Pakuru Jehova gie polo , ee , pakeuru malo kuma bor .
19148002	Pakeuru , un malaikege duto , pakeuru , un ogandane mag lweny duto manie polo .
19148003	Wang’ chieng’ gi dwe bende mondo opake , kaachiel gi sulwe duto marieny .
19148004	Un polo man malo mogik , pakeuru , kaachiel gi un , pige manie bwo polo .
19148005	Onego gipak nying Jehova kargi duto nimar nogolo chik mine gibetie .
19148006	Ne ogurogi kuondegi nyaka chieng’ kendo nyaka chieng’ kaluwore gi chikne mochwere .
19148007	Pakuru Jehova gie piny , un chwech marodonge manie nam kod kude matut duto mag ataro ,
19148008	kaachiel gi mil polo gi pe gi theluji gi boche , kod yembe maringo matek mawinjo wachne ;
19148009	kod un gode gi thuche gi yiende manyago olembe gi yiende mag sida duto ;
19148010	kod le mager gi jamni duto gi le matindo gi winy mahuyo ,
19148011	kod ruodhi mag piny gi ogendini duto ; kod un jotelo gi joloch duto mag piny ,
19148012	kod un yawuowi matindo gi nyiri matindo , gi jodongo kod nyithindo .
19148013	Onego gipak nying Jehova gin duto , nimar nyinge kende ema nigi duong’ ; kendo duong’ne maler oyombo piny gi polo .
19148014	O sechungo tung ne joge-tung mosekelo pak ne joge maler duto , joge ma jo Israel , ma gin joma nimachiegni gi chunye . Haleluya !
19149001	Haleluya ! Werneuru Jehova wer manyien , kendo dendeuru e chokruok mar joma ler .
19149002	Jo Israel mondo obed mamor gi jachwechgi ; ee , jo Sayun mondo obed mamor gi Ruodhgi .
19149003	Onego gi pak nyinge gi miel kendo gi werne mamit ka gigoyo oyieke gi nyatiti .
19149004	Nimar chuny Jehova mor gi joge kendo osidho joma obolore gi warruok .
19149005	Jomaler mondo oil ka miye duong’ kendo giwer gimor ka gibet e otandagi .
19149006	Onego pak mar Nyasaye obed e dhogi kendo giting’ ligangla ma dhoge ariyo e lwetgi ,
19149007	mondo gichulgo kuor ne ogendini ,
19149008	kendo gitue ruodhigi gi nyoroche , kod jotendgi gi opingo mag chuma ,
19149009	ka gichopo kum mane ondik kuomgi chon . Ma e duong’ mar joge maler duto . Haleluya !
19150001	Haleluya ! Pakuru Nyasaye e kare maler ; pakeuru ei polo mare mar nyalo .
19150002	Pakeuru nikech tijene mosetimo kuom tekone maduong’ ; kendo nikech duong’ne moyombo duto .
19150003	Pakeuru kugoyo turumbete , kendo kugoyo nyatiti gi asili ,
19150004	pakeuru kugoyo oyieke kendo umiel , ee , pakeuru gi gita kod oporo ,
19150005	pakeuru kudiemo ongeng’o gi nyawadgi , ee , pakeuru ka ongeng’o gore .
19150006	Gimoro amora ma yweyo mondo opak Jehova . Haleluya . The New Testament of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
40001001	Ma e kaka anywola mar Yesu Kristo ma wuod Daudi kendo wuod Ibrahim chalo :
40001002	Ibrahim ne en wuon Isaka , Isaka ne en wuon Jakobo , to Jakobo ne en wuon Juda gi owetene .
40001003	Juda ne en wuon Perez gi Zera , ma min-gi ne en Tamar , Perez ne en wuon Hezron , Hezron ne en wuon Ram ,
40001004	to Ram ne en wuon Aminadab . Aminadab ne en wuon Nashon , Nashon ne en wuon Salmon ,
40001005	Salmon ne en wuon Boaz , ma min-gi ne Rahab . Boaz ne en wuon Obed ma min-gi ne Ruth , Obed , ne en wuon Jese ,
40001006	to Jese ne en wuon Ruoth Daudi . Daudi ne en wuon Solomon , ma min-gi , kane pok Daudi okawe , ne en chi Uria ,
40001007	Solomon ne en wuon Rehoboam , Rehoboam ne en wuon Abija , to Abija ne ne wuon Asa .
40001008	Asa ne en wuon Jehoshafat , Jehoshafat ne en wuon Jehoram , Jehoram ne en wuon Uzia ,
40001009	to Uzia ne en wuon Jotham , Jotham ne en wuon Ahaz , Ahaz ne en wuon Hezekia
40001010	to Hezekia ne en wuon Manase . Manase ne en wuon Amon , Amon ne en wuon Josia ,
40001011	to Josia ne en wuon Jekonia gi owetene , e kinde mag twech e piny Bablon .
40001012	Bang’ twech e Bablon : Jekonia ne en wuon Seltiel , Seltiel ne en wuon Zerubabel ,
40001013	Zerubabel ne en wuon Abiud to Abiud ne en wuon Eliakim . Eliakim ne en wuon Azor ,
40001014	Azor ne en wuon Zadok , Zadok ne en wuon Akim , to Akim ne en wuon Eliud .
40001015	Eliud ne en wuon Eleazar , Eleazar ne en wuon Mathan , Mathan ne en wuon Jakobo ,
40001016	to Jakobo ne en wuon Josef mane en chwor Maria mane onywolo Yesu , miluongo ni Kristo .
40001017	Kamano tienge duto mane nitie chakre Ibrahim nyaka Daudi gin apar gang’wen ; chakre Daudi nyaka ndalo twech e Bablon , tienge apar gang’wen , kendo chakre ndalo twech nyaka kinde mag Kristo bende tienge apar gang’wen .
40001018	Kama e kaka nywol mar Yesu Kristo notimore : Noyudo min mare ma Maria osesingi ne Josef mondo ofende , to kane pok gibedo kaachiel , noyude ka en gi nyathi kuom Roho Maler .
40001019	Nikech Josef chwore ne en ng’ama kare , kendo ne ok odwar miyo ji kuod wiye , nochano e pache mar weyo kende ling’ ling’ .
40001020	To bang’ paro mar timo kamano , Malaika mar Ruoth nofwenyorene e lek mowacho ni , " Josef wuod Daudi , kik iluor dhi gi Maria dala kaka chiegi , nikech gima oting’o e iye oa kuom Roho Maler .
40001021	Obiro nywolo wuowi , kendo nyaka imiye nying ni Yesu , nikech obiro ' waro joge kogolo e richogi .
40001022	Magi duto notimore mondo ochop gimane Ruoth owacho gi dho janabi ni ,
40001023	" Nyako ngili , nomak ich mi nonywol wuowi , kendo giniluonge ni Imanuel-ma tiende ni , " Nyasaye kodwa . "
40001024	Kane Josef ochiew , notimo gima malaika mar Ruoth nochike mondo otim , kendo nokawo Maria odhigo dala mobedo chiege .
40001025	To ne ok oriwore kode nyaka bang’ kane osenyuolo nyathi ma wuowi kendo nomiye nying ni Yesu .
40002001	Bang’ kane osenywol Yesu Bethlehem e piny Judea , e ndalo mag Ruoth Herode , Joma Riek moa Yo wuokchieng’ nobiro Jerusalem ,
40002002	mi openjo ni , " Ere jal mosenywol mondo obed Ruodh jo-Yahudi ? Ne waneno sulwe mare yo wuokchieng’ kendo wasebiro mondo walame . "
40002003	Kane Ruoth Herode owinjo wachno , chunye nochandore , en kaachiel gi ji duto modak Jerusalem .
40002004	Kane oseluongo jodolo madongo gi jopuonj chik duto mane otelo ne ji , nopenjogi kama nowinjore nywolie Kristo .
40002005	To gin ne gidwoke ni , " E Bethlehem manie piny Judea , nikech janabi nondiko kama :
40002006	" To in , Bethlehem , manie piny Judea , ok itin ngang’ e dier joloch mag Juda ; nikech kuomi ema jaloch biro ae , mabiro kwayo joga majo-Israel "
40002007	Eka Herode noluongo joma riekgo ling’ling’ , kendo ne ononogi , mi neginyise saa nogono mane sulwe onenoree .
40002008	Ne oorogi Bethlehem , kowacho ni , " Dhiuru kendo umany nyathino maber . E sama uyudeno to duognauru wach mondo an bende adhi alame . "
40002009	Kane gisewinjo wach ruoth , ne gimako wuodhgi gidhi , kendo sulwe mane oyudo giseneno yo wuok cheing’ notelo nigi nyaka nochopo mi ochung’ e wi kamane nyathi nitie .
40002010	Kane gineno sulweno , ne gibedo moil mokalo .
40002011	To kane gichopo ei ot , ne gineno nyathino kod Maria min mare , kendo ne gikulore piny ka gilame . Bang’e ne giyawo mwandugi kendo ne gimiye mich mag dhahabu , gi ubani gi manemane .
40002012	To kaka nosesiem-gi e lek ni kik gidog ir Herode , ne gidok thurgi gi yo machielo .
40002013	Bang’ kane gisedhi , malaika mar Ruoth nofwenyore ne Josef e lek . Nowachone ni , " A malo ikaw nyathi gi min mare mondo itony idhi Misiri . Dag kuno nyaka aduogni wach , nikech Herode biro manyo nyathini mondo onege . "
40002014	Omiyo noa malo gotieno mi okawo nyathi gi min mare kendo nowuok modhi Misri ,
40002015	kuma nodakie nyaka chop tho mar Herode . Kamano gima Ruoth nowacho chon gidho janabi ni , " Ne aluongo wuoda ka agolo Misri , " nochopo kare .
40002016	Ka Herode nofwenyo ni joma Riekgo nosewuonde , iye nowang’ asasa , kendo nogolo chik mondo onegi nyithindo ma yawuowi duto modak Jerusalem gi mier molwore , mane hikgi ariyo kadok chien , kaluwore gi saa mane Joma Riek onyise .
40002017	Eka gima Nyasaye nomiyo janabi Jeremia owacho nochopo kare :
40002018	" Duol winjore Rama , en ywak gi nduru maduong’ Rael ywago nyithinde kendo odagi ni ok hoye , nikech gisetho . "
40002019	Bang’ ka Herode nosetho , malaika mar Ruoth nofwenyore ne Josef e lek ka en Misri kuno ,
40002020	kendo nowachone ni , ' Aa malo ikaw nyathi kod min mare mondo idhi e piny Israel , nikech joma netemo kawo ngima nyathi osedhi . "
40002021	Omiyo noa malo , mokawo nyathi gi min mare , kendo nodhi e piny Israel .
40002022	To kane owinjo ni Arkelao nobet e loch e piny Judea kar wuon-gi ma Herode , noluoro dhi kuno . Kaka nosesieme e lek , noloko wuoth modhi e gweng’ mar Galili ,
40002023	endo nodhi modak e taon miluongo ni Nazareth . Kamano gima nowachi gi dho janabi ni , " Enoluonge ni ja Nazareth , " nochopo kare .
40003001	E ndalogo Johana ja Batiso nobiro , koyalo e Thim mar Judea ,
40003002	kendo owacho ni , " Lokreuru , nikech Loch polo ni machiegni . "
40003003	Ma e jalo mane owuo kuome gidho janabi Isaya ni : " Dwond ng’at makok e thim ni , ' Losuru yo ne Ruoth , losneuru yore moriere tir . ' "
40003004	Lep Johana nochwe gi yie ngamia , kendo notweyo kamba mar pien e nungone . Chiembe ne gin bonyo gi mor kich mag bungu .
40003005	Ji nowuok odhine koa Jerusalem gi Judea duto koda ka gweng’ Jordan duto .
40003006	Kane gihulo richogi , ne obatisogi e Aora Jordan .
40003007	To kane oneno jo Farisai gi jo Sadukai ka biro kama ne obatise ji , nowacho negi ni : " Un koth thuondegi ! En ng’a mane osiemou mondo uring utony ne mirima mager mabiro ?
40003008	Nyaguru olemo manyiso ni uselokoru adier .
40003009	Kendo kik upar ni unyalo wacho ne un uwegi ni , Wan-gi Ibrahim kaka wuonwa . ' Anyisou ratiro ni Nyasaye nyalo loso ne Ibrahim nyithindo kogolo e kitegi .
40003010	Le koro oseketi e tie yiende , kendo yien ka yien ma ok nyag olemo ibiro tong’ mi go piny kendo witi e mach .
40003011	An abatisou gi pi mar lokruok . To ng’ato biro biro bang’a ma tekre ng’eny moloya , ma kata akande ok awinjora tingo . En obiro batisou gi Roho Maler kod mach .
40003012	Odheche mar pietho nie lwete , kendo obiro yweyo kare mar dino cham , lochoko ngano mage okano e dero , to mihudhi to owang’o gi mach maok nyal negi . "
40003013	Eka Yesu nobiro koa Galili nyaka Jordan mondo Johana obatise .
40003014	To Johana notemo tame , kawacho ni , " Ikelo biro ira nade to an ema adwaro mondo ibatisa ? "
40003015	Yesu nodwoko ni , " We otimre kamano sani ; en gima ber ne wan kodi mondo watim ma , eka wachop tim makare duto . " Eka Johana noyie .
40003016	Kane osebatis Yesu nii to nowuok oa ei pi . To sanosano polo noyawore kendo noneno Roho mar Nyasaye , ka lor kaka akuru , kendo piyo kuome .
40003017	To duol moro moa e polo nowacho ni , " Ma en wuoda , ma ahero , kendo chunya mor kode . "
40004001	Eka Roho notelone Yesu nyaka e thim mondo Jachien oteme .
40004002	Bang’ tweyo chiemo kuom odiechienge piero ang’wen gi otieno piero ang’wen , kech nochako kaye .
40004003	Jatem nobiro ire kendo owacho ni , " Ka in Wuod Nyasaye to nyis kitegi mondo gilokre kuon . "
40004004	Yesu nodwoko ni , " Ondiki ni : ' Dhano ok bed mangima nikech kuon kende , to nikech wach ka wach moa e dho Nyasaye . ' "
