40022001	Yesu nowuoyo kodgi kendo gi ngeche , kowacho ni ,
40022002	" Pinyruodh polo chalo gi ruoth moro mane oloso nyasi mar arus ne wuode .
40022003	Eka nooro jotichne ir joma ne oluongi e nyasi mondo odhi oluonggi gibi . To ne gidagi biro .
40022004	" Nochako ooro jotich mamoko , kowacho ni , " Dhiuru unyis joma noluongi ni aseiko chiemba : rwetha gi jamba machwe osenegi , kendo gik moko duto oikore . Omiyo biuru e nyasi mar arus . '
40022005	" To ne ok gidewe , kendo moro ka moro kuomgi nowuok oweye odhi , moro e puothe , to machielo e ohande .
40022006	Mamoko modong’ to nomako jotichne mi osandogi kendo onegogi .
40022007	Ruoth ne mirima omako matek . Nooro jolweny mage mi ne gidhi gitieko jotich ma jonekgo kendo giwang’o taondgi .
40022008	" Eka nowacho ne jotije ni , " Nyasi mar arus koro oikore , to joma naluongo ne ok owinjore gi luong mane aluongogi-go .
40022009	Kuom Mano dhiuru e yore madongo mag dala uluong ng’ato ang’ata muyudo mondo obi e nyasina .
40022010	Omiyo jotich nowuok odhi e yore madongo mag dala mi ne gichoko ji duto mane ginyalo yudo , joma beyo gi joma richo , mi joma nobiro e arus nopong’o od budho
40022011	" To kane ruoth obiro mondo one welo , wang’e norado gi ng’at moro kanyo mane ok orwako lep arus .
40022012	Nopenje ni , ' Osiepna , ne idonjo e iye ka nade kionge gi lep arus ? ' To dho ng’atno nomoko .
40022013	" Eka ruoth nonyiso joma ne rite ni , ' Tweuru bedene mondo udire oko ei mudho mandiwa , kama ywagruok gi muodo lak biro betie . '
40022014	" Nimar joma iluongo ng’eny , to joma iyiero to tin . "
40022015	Eka jo Farisai nowuok odhi mondo gilos wach kaka ginyalo gaje gi wechene owuon .
40022016	Ne gioro jopuonjregi ire , kaachiel gi jolup Herode , mi negipenje ni , ' Japuonj , wang’eyo ni in ng’ama ja ratiro kendo ni ipuonjo yor Nyasaye koluwore gi adiera . Dhano odhana ok obadhi , nikech ok idew wang’ ng’ato , bed ni en ng’ama nade .
40022017	Koro nyiswa ane , iparo nade ? Be en gima kare mondo ochiw osuru ne Kaisar , koso ok owinjore ? "
40022018	To kaka Yesu nong’eyo chenro marach mane gin-go , nowacho ni , " Un joma wuondoregi , ang’o momiyo utema ?
40022019	Nyisae uru pesa ma mingli mitiyogo kuom golo osuru . " Ne gikelone dinari ,
40022020	eka nomedo penjogi ni , " Man kuomeni en picha ng’a , koso kidoni en mar ng’a ? "
40022021	Ne gidwoke ni , " En mar Kaisar . " Eka nowachonegi ni , " Miuru Kaisar gig Kaisar , to Nyasaye miuru gig Nyasaye "
40022022	Ka negiwinjo mano , to ne giwuoro . Omiyo ne giweye mi gia gidhi .
40022023	Odiechieng’ onogono jo Sadukai , ma wacho ni chier onge , nobirone gi penjo moro .
40022024	Ne gipenje ni , " Japuonj , Musa nonyisowa ni ka ng’ato otho ka oonge gi nyithindo to owadgi nyaka kaw chiege moweyono , kendo onywolnegi nyithindo .
40022025	Koro ne nitie owete abiriyo e dierwa . Mokwongo kuomgi nokendo to bang’e notho , to kaka ne oonge gi nyithindo , noweyo chiege ne owadgi .
40022026	Gima chai kamano notimore ne owadgi mar ariyo gi mar adek , kendo nomakogi duto nyaka mar abiriyo .
40022027	Achien mogik dhakono be notho .
40022028	Koro , chieng’ chier dhakono nobed chi ng’a kuom ji abiriyogi , nikech ne gibet kode giduto ? "
40022029	Yesu nodwoko gi ka wacho ni , " Uketho nikech ukia ndiko kata teko Nyasaye .
40022030	Chieng’ chier ji ok nokendi , kendo ok nokendgi . Ginichal gi malaike manie polo .
40022031	To kuom chier mar joma otho , donge usesomo gima Nyasaye nowachonu , ni ,
40022032	' An Nyasach Ibrahim , Nyasach Isaka kendo Nyasach Jakobo . ' ? Nyasaye ok en Nyasach joma otho , to en Nyasach joma ngima . "
40022033	Ka oganda nowinjo wachneno , ne gihum gi puonjne .
40022034	Kane jo Farisai owinjo ni Yesu osen-g’eng’o jo Sadukai , ne gichokorene kaachiel .
40022035	Achiel kuomgi , mane en jabura molony ahinya , noteme gi penjoni :
40022036	" Japuonj , chik maduong’ mogik kuom chikewa en mane ? "
40022037	Yesu nowachone ni , " ' Her Ruoth Nyasachi gi chunyi duto , kendo gi tekri duto kendo gi pachi duto .
40022038	Ma e chik mokwongo kendo maduong’ mogik .
40022039	To mar ariyo be chai kode kamano , ni ' Her nyawadu kaka iherori iwuon . '
40022040	Kitepe chik duto kod Jonabi omoko e chike ariyogi "
40022041	Ka noyudo jo Farisai ochokore kaachiel , Yesu nopenjogi ni ,
40022042	" Uparo nade kuom Kristo ? En Wuod ng’a ? Ne giduoke ni , " En Wuod Daudi . "
40022043	Nowachonegi ni , " Ka en kamano to ang’o momiyo ka Daudi wuoyo ka en ei Roho to oluonge ni ' Ruoth ' ? Nimar owacho ni ,
40022044	" ' Ruoth nowacho ne Ruodha ni , " bed e bada lorachwich nyaka chop aket wasiki e bwo tiendeni . "
40022045	Koro ka Daudi ema luonge ni , ' Ruoth ' to ere kaka onyalo bedo Wuode ? "
40022046	To onge ng’ato kata achiel mane nyalo dwoke kata wach achiel , kendo chakre chieng’no kadhi nyime , onge ng’ama nohedhore medo penje penjo mamoko .
40023001	Eka Yesu nowachone oganda kod jopuonjrene ni ,
40023002	" Jopuonj chik gi jo Farisai bet e kom Musa .
40023003	Omiyo nyaka uwinjgi kendo utim gik moko duto ma ginyisou . Kata kamano kik utim gik ma giyalo nikech ok gitim gik ma giyalo .
40023004	Gitweyo misigo mapek kendo giyieyo e goke ji , to gin giwegi to ok giikore kata mar mulo misigogo gi lith lwetgi .
40023005	" Gimoro amora ma gitimo gitimo mondo ji one . Kuom ranyisi , giloso boksi maggi moting’o kwan mag ndiko mimako gi wich madongo dongo , kendo gikado riak lepgi maboyo boyo .
40023006	Bende gihero bet e mesni mamolo kuonde chiemo kendo e kombe moyiedhi e sunagoke .
40023007	Gihero bende mondo omosgi e chirni , kendo mondo ji oluonggi ni , ' Rabi . '
40023008	" To un kik uyie oluongu ni , ' Rabi , ' nimar un gi Ruoth achiel kende , to un duto un owete .
40023009	Be kik uluong ng’ato ang’ata e pinyka ni ' Baba , ' nimar un gi Wuoro achiel kende , kendo en e polo .
40023010	Kik luongu kata ni , ' Japuonj , ' nimar un gi Japuonj achiel , ma en Kristo .
40023011	Ng’ama duong’ mogik e dieru nobed jatichu .
40023012	Nimar ng’ato ang’ata mating’ore malo kende noduok piny , to ng’ama duokore piny noting’ malo .
40023013	" Malit ochomou , un jopuonj chik gi jo Farisai mawuondoregi ! Uloro pinyruodh polo ka ji neno gi wang’gi kama . Un uwegi ok udonj i , to joma temo mondo odonji be ugeng’onegi .
40023014	Malit ochomou , un jopuonj Chik gi jo Farisai , un muwuondorugi ! Uyako ute mond liete , kendo ulamo lemo moyware , nikech udwaro mondo ji oneu . Emomiyo ibiro kumou malit moloyo .
40023015	" Malit ochomou , un jopuonj chik gi jo Farisai mawuondoregi ! Uwuotho alan-da , kung’ado piny gi nembe mondo ulok-ie kata ng’ato achiel , to koselokore to umiyo obedo koth Gehena moloyou nyadiriyo .
40023016	" Malit ochomou , jotecho ma muofnigi ! Uwacho ni , ' Ka ng’ato okuong’ore gi nying Hekalu to onge wach , to ni ka ng’ato okuong’ore gi nying dhahabu mar Hekalu to kuong’ruokneno otweye . '
40023017	Un muofni mofuwogi ! Mane maduong ? Dhahabu koso Hekalu mamiyo dhahabu bedo gima owal ?
40023018	Bende uwacho ni , ' Ka ng’ato okuong’ore gi nying kama ler to onge wach , to ni ka ng’ato okuong’ore gi chiwo moket kuome to ni kuong’ruokneno otweye . '
40023019	Un joma muofnigi ! Mane maduong’ ? Chiwo loso kama ler mamiyo chiwo bedo gima owal ?
40023020	Kuom mano , ng’ama kuong’ore gi nying kama ler ok kuong’re mana gi kama ler kende , to okuong’ore koda ka gi gik moko duto manie iye .
40023021	Kendo ng’ama kuong’ore gi nying Hekalu kuong’ore kode kaachiel gi Jal modak e iye .
40023022	Kamano bende , ng’ama okuong’ore gi nying polo okuong’ore bende gi kom loch mar Nyasaye , kaachiel gi Ng’ama obet e komno .
40023023	" Malit ochomou , un jopuonj chik gi jo Farisai mawuondoregi ! Uchiwo achiel kuom apar mar gik ma mili mili kaka kado gi apoth kod onyulo . To ok usedewo gik madongo moloyo ma chik dwaro , kaka adiera gi kech kod yie . Ok onego uwe timo mutimogo , to magi bende nyaka utim .
40023024	Un jotecho ma muofnigi ! Ung’udho kikun to ngamia to umuonyo !
40023025	" Malit ochomou , un jopuonj chik gi jo Farisai mawuondoregi ! Uluoko kang’e agwata gi dis , to e igi to gipong’ gi wuoro kod mer .
40023026	Jo Farisai ma muofnigi ! Kuong uluok i agwata gi dis , eka ng’egi oko be biro bedo maler .
40023027	" Malit ochomou , un jopuonj chik gi jo Farisai mawuondoregi ! Uchalo liete mowir marachar , manenore maber gi oko , to gie iyegi to gipong’ gi choke joma otho kod gimoro amora mogak .
40023028	Kamano e kaka un bende unenoru ne ji ni un joma beyo gioko , to gie iu to upong’ gi wuondruok kod timbe maricho .
40023029	" Malit ochomou , un jopuonj chik gi jo Farisai mawuondoregi ! Ugero liete jonabi kendo ogoro maber liete joma kare .
40023030	Bende uwacho ni , ' Ka dine bed ni wangima e ndalo mag kwerewa , dine ok wachwero remb jonabi . '
40023031	Kuom mano ung’ado buchu uwegi ni un nyikwa joma nonego jonabi .
40023032	Kara koro dhiuru mana nyime gi chopo okang’ mar richo mane kwereu ochako !
40023033	" Thuondegi ! Kothe thuondfu-gi ! Ubiro tony nade mak ong’adnu buch Gehena ?
40023034	Emomiyo eri koro aoronu jonabi gi joma riek kod jopuonj . Moko kuomgi ubiro nego kendo ubiro guro ; moko ubiro rodho e sunagokeu kendo ubiro lawogi e taon .
40023035	Kuom mano , remo makare duto mosebedo kichwero e piny , chakre remb Abel nyaka remb Zakaria wuod Berakia , mane unego marach e kind Hekalu gi kama ler , ibiro keti e wiu .
40023036	Awachonu ni adier magi duto biro timore ne tieng’ni .
40023037	" Yaye Jerusalem-Jerusalem , in minego jonabi kendo ichielo joma oorni gi kite ! Mano kaka asegombo aming’a mondo achok nyithindi kaachiel , kaka gweno choko nyithinde e bwo buombene , to isetamori .
40023038	To koro , ne , odi oweni kodong’ gunda .
40023039	Nimar awachoni ni , ok ibi ichak inena kendo nyaka chop chieng’ ma iniwachie ni , ' Ogwedh ng’at mabiro e nying Ruoth . "
40024001	Yesu noa e Hekalu kendo ka noyudo owuotho odhi , jopuonjrene nobiro ire mondo onyise kaka gedo mag Hekalu lich .
40024002	To nopenjogi ni , " Be uneno gigi duto ? Anyisou adier ni kata kidi achiel kuom munenogi ok nodong’ ewi wadgi , to moro ka moro kuomgi nodir piny . "
40024003	Ka noyudo Yesu obet ewi Got Zeituni Jopuonjre nobiro ire kar kende mowachone ni , " Nyiswae . gigi biro timore karang’o , kendo ang’o mabiro bedo ranyisi mar bironi kod mar giko mar ndalo ? "
40024004	Yesu nodwokogi ni , " Beduru motang’ mondo ng’ato kik wuondu .
40024005	Nimar ji mang’eny nobi e nyinga ka hedhore ni , ' An e Kristo , ' kendo giniwuond ji mang’eny
40024006	Unuwinj kuom lwenje ma gore koni gi koni kod humbe mag lwenje , to neuru ni ok ubuok . Gik ma kamago nyaka timre , to giko to pod nobed nyime .
40024007	Oganda nowuog ne oganda machielo , kendo pinyruoth gi pinyruoth wadgi . Kech nobedi kuonde mang’eny kendo piny noyiengni kuonde mopogore opogore .
40024008	Magi duto nobed mana chakruok mar muoch makecho .
40024009	" Eka nochiwu mondo osandu kendo onegu , kendo ogendini duto nochau nikech an .
40024010	E kindeno ji mang’eny nolokre miwe yie kendo ginindhogre kendo gichare kendgi ,
40024011	bende joma wuondore ni gin jonabi to ok gin nobi mang’eny kendo giniwuond ji mang’eny .
40024012	Nikech timbe maricho nomedre , hera marji mang’eny nodok mang’ich ,
40024013	to ng’ama ochung’ motegno nyaka giko noresi .
40024014	Kendo Injili ni mar pinyruoth noyal e piny duto mondo ong’ad bura ne ogendini duto , eka giko nobi .
40024015	" Omiyo ka uneno ' gima kwero makelo kethruok , ' mane owuo kuome gi dho Daniel , kochung’ kama ler ( dwarore ni jasomo owinj tiend wachni maber )
40024016	to eka joma ni Judea odar odhi ewi gode .
40024017	To ng’at manie wi ode kik lor piny mondo okaw gimoro amora manie ot mondo oago .
40024018	Ng’at manie puodho bende kik dog dala mondo okaw kode .
40024019	Mano kaka mon ma yach kod mago madhodho nyithindo none malit e ndalogo !
40024020	Lamuru Nyasaye mondo dar maru kik timre ndalo chwiri kata chieng’ Sabato .
40024021	Nimar kindego chandruok maduong’ nobedi maonge machielo minyalo pimogo aa chakruok piny nyaka sani , kendo onge moro mabiro romo kode kata ndalo mabiro .
40024022	Ka dine bed ni ok ong’ad ndalogo machiek to ok ng’ato dotony to nikech wach joma oluongi , ndalogo ibiro ng’ado machiek .
40024023	E kindeno ka ng’ato owachonu ni , ' Ne , Kristo ni ka ! ' kata ni , ' Echago cha ! ' to kik uyie wachno .
40024024	Nimar joma wuondore ni gin Kristo to ok gin kod joma wuondore ni gin jonabi to ok gin nothinyre kendo ginitim ranyisi gi honni madongo mondo giwuondgo koda ka joma oyier , ka dipo mano ditimre .
40024025	Ero , asenyisou chon kapok kindeno ochopo .
40024026	" Omiyo ka ng’ato nowachnu kindego ni , ' Echago cha en e thim ' , to kik uwuogi udhi ; kata ni , ' Erigo en ei ot maiye , ' to kik uyie wachno .
40024027	Nimar mana kaka mil polo ji duto neno chakre wuok chieng’ nyaka podho cheing’ Dhano be nobedi .
40024028	Kama gimoro othoe ema achudhe nochokree .
40024029	" Gikanyono bang’ chandruok maduong’ mag ndalono " Wang’ chieng’ noimre , kendo dwe ok norieny : Sulwe nolwar piny koa e polo , kendo chwech mag polo noyiengni ,
40024030	" Eka ranyisi mar Wuod Dhano nothinyre e kor polo , kendo ogendini duto mag piny noywagi . Ginine Wuod Dhano ka lor biro e boche polo , ka en gi teko kod duong’ mang’ongo .
40024031	Kendo enoor malaikege , koluongogi matek gi tarum-bete , kendo ginichok joge moyier koa kuonde duto e piny , chakre giko polo konchiel nyaka komachielo .
40024032	" To puonjreuru wachni kuom yiend ng’owo : Ka bedene chako mich kendo pote chot lwar , to ung’eyo ni oro chiegni .
40024033	Kamano bende , ka unune gigi duto , to unung’e ni kindeno chiegni , kendo osechopo mana e dhoot .
40024034	Akonu adier ni tieng’ni ok norum ngang’ kapok gigi duto otimore .
40024035	Polo gi piny norum , to Wechena ok norum ngang’ .
40024036	" Onge ng’ato ang’ata mong’eyo odiechieng no kata sano , obed malaike manie polo kata Wuowi , mak mana Wuoro kende .
40024037	Mana kaka notimore e ndalo Noa e kaka nobedi chieng’ ma Wuod Dhano nobi .
40024038	Nimar e ndalo mane pok pi opongo piny , ji ne chiemo kendo metho , bende negi kendo kendo ikendogi , nyaka nochopo odiechieng’ mane Noa odonjo e meli ,
40024039	kendo onge gima ne ging’eyo kuom gima ne biro timore nyaka pi nobiro moywerogi duto te . Kamano e kaka nobedi e biro Wuod Dhano .
40024040	Chwo ariyo nobedi e puodho , achiel nokaw to machielo nowe .
40024041	Mon ariyo noyudi ka rego e pong’ lwedo ; achiel nokaw to machielo nowe .
40024042	" Emomiyo nenuru nikech ukia chieng’ ma Ruodhu nobie .
40024043	To winjuru tiend wachni : Ka dine bed ni wuon ot nong’eyo ni saa adi mar otieno ma jakuo biroe , dine osiko korito , kendo dogeng’o jokuoge turo dhode mi donji e ode .
40024044	Kamano bende e kaka un bende onego ubed moitore , nikech Wuod Dhano biro biro e sama ok upar ni dobie .
40024045	" Kare jatich ma jaadiera kendo mariek en ng’a , ma ruodhe oseketo nya-para mar jotichne morito ode , mondo omigi chiembgi e saa mowinjore ?
40024046	Ogwedh jatich ma kamano , ma ka ruodhe oduogo to noyude kotimo gima noweye notim .
40024047	Anyisou adier ni , obiro kete jarit gige duto .
40024048	To ka po ni jatijno timbene richo , mit owacho e chunye ni , ' Ruodha odeko oko ahinya , '
40024049	kaeto obukre gi goyo jotich wetene , kendo owere ne chiemo gi metho kaachiel gi jomer ,
40024050	to ruodh jatijno nobi e odiechieng’ ma ok ogen ni dobie , kendo e saa mokia .
40024051	Enong’ade matindo tindo mi okete kaachiel gi joma wuondore , kama ywagruok gi muodo lak nobedie .
40025001	E kindeno pinyruodh polo nopim gi nyiri apar ma nokawo techegi kaeto owuok odhi romo ne wuon kisera .
40025002	Abich kuomgi nofuwo , to abich ne riek .
40025003	Mago mofuwo nokawo techegi to ne ok giting’o mafuta kata matin gidhigo .
40025004	To mago mariek to noting’o mafuta e kubni kaachiel gi techegi .
40025005	Wuon Kisera nokawo saa mathoth kapok obiro , omiyo wengegi nobedo mapek kargi duto mi nindo noterogi .
40025006	" To e chuny otieno koko moro nogore matek ni , Wuon kisera eri odonjo ! Wuoguru oko mondo uromne ! '
40025007	" Eka nyiri duto nochiew kendo ne giiko techegi .
40025008	Nyiri mofuwo nowacho ne mago mariek ni , Tognwauru mafuta matin , nikech techewa dwa tho . '
40025009	" To ne gikwerogi ni , ' Ooyo , ' samoro mafuta ma wango ok nyal romowa kaachiel kodu . Gima ber en ni dhiuru ir joma uso mafuta mondo ung’iew maru kuomgi . '
40025010	" To ka noyudo gin e yo gidhi ng’iewo mafuta , wuon kisera nochopo . Nyiri mane oikore nodonjo kode e nyasi mar arus ; kendo nolor dhoot .
40025011	" Bang’e achien nyiri mamokoka be nobiro . Ne gidwong’o ka giwacho ni , ' Jaduong’ ! Jaduong’ ! Yawnwa dhoot ! '
40025012	" To noduokogi ni , ' Anyisou adier ni akiau . '
40025013	" Emomiyo nenuru , nikech ok ung’eyo odiechieng’ kata saa
40025014	" Enochal bende gi ng’at moro ma ka ne owuok odhi e wuoth to nolwongo jotichne mi oketo mwandune e lwetgi .
40025015	Achiel kuomgi nomiyo pesa moromo talanta abich , to machielo nomiyo talanta ariyo , kendo machielo talanta achiel ; komiyo moro ka moro kuomgi pesa maromre gi nyalone . Eka nodhi e wuodhe .
40025016	Ng’ama nomi talanta abich nodhi sano sano moketo pesane e tich , kendo noyudo talanta abich mamoko kaka ohande .
40025017	Kamano bende , ng’at mane omi talanta ariyo noyudo ariyo ewi mane omiye .
40025018	To ng’at mane oyudo talanta achiel nowuok odhi mokunyo bur ei lo , kendo oiko pesa ruodhe kanyo .
40025019	" Bang’ kinde marabora ruodh jotij-go noduogo kendo nogoyo kodgi kwano .
40025020	Ng’at ma noyudo talanta abich nokelo talanta abich mamoko ewi mane omiye , kendo nowacho ne ruodhe ni , ' Ruoth , ne imiya talanta abich , to neye , aseloso abich mamoko e wiye . '
40025021	" Ruodhe nodwoke ni , ' Isetimo maber ahinya . In jatich maber kendo ma jaadiera ! Isebedo jaadiera gi gik matin nono omiyo koro abiro keti jarit gik mang’eny Bi idonji e mor mar ruodhi ! '
40025022	" Ng’at manenigi talanta ariyo bende nobiro , mowacho ni , ' Ruodha , ne imiya talanta ariyo , to neye , aseloso ariyo mamoko . '
40025023	" Ruodhe nodwoke ni , ' Isetimo maber ahinya . In jatich maber kendo maja adiera ! Isebedo ja adiera gi gik matin nono , omiyo koro abiro keti jarit gik mang’eny Bi idonji e mor mar ruodhi ! '
40025024	" Eka ng’at ma noyudo talanta achiel nobiro , mowacho ni , ' Ruoth , Ne ang’eyo ni in ng’ama tiyogo tek , ma keyo kama ne ok ikome , kendo ma choko kama ne ok aludoe kodhi .
40025025	Omiyo ne aluor mi ne adhi kendo ne apando talantani ei lo . Girino eri kawe . '
40025026	To ruodhe nodwoke ni , ' In jatich ma kite rach kendo ma jasamuoyoni . ' Kare ne ing’eyo ni akeyo kama ne ok akome kendo ni achoko kama ne ok aludoe kodhi ?
40025027	Ka kamano to mad ne iket pesana gijo bengi kama nonyalo medoree kende , mondo ka ne aduogo to ayude gi ohande .
40025028	" Omiyo mayeuru talantano mondo umi ng’at ma nigi talanta apar .
40025029	Nimar ng’at ma nigo ema nomedi , mi nobed gi gik mogundho ; to ng’at ma ongego ibiro ma koda ka gima en-go .
40025030	Koro kawuru jatich manonono udhir oko e mudho , kama ywagruok gi muodo lak nobedie . '
40025031	" Ka Wuod Dhano nobi e duong’ne , kaachiel gi malaike duto , enobed e kom lochne , man gi duong’ mar polo .
40025032	Ogendini duto nochokre e nyime , kendo enopog ji , kopogo ng’ato ka ng’ato gi wadgi , mana kaka jakwath pogo rombe kogolo e dier diek .
40025033	Enoket rombe e bade korachwich , to diek e bade koracham .
40025034	" Eka Ruoth nowachne joma nie bade lorachich ni , ' Biuru , un joma ogwedhi mag Wuora ; Kawuru girkeni maru , pinyruoth mane oiknu nyaka aa chwech piny .
40025035	Nimar ne adenyo kendo numiya gimoro achamo ; riyo noloya , kendo numiya gimoro amodho ; ne an wendo ; kendo nurwaka ei ot ;
40025036	ne achando lewni , kendo nurwaka ; ne atuo kendo nurita ; ne an e jela , kendo nubiro lima . '
40025037	" Eka jomakarego nodwoke ni , ' Ruoth , karang’o mane wanenie kidenyo mi wamiyi chiemo , kata ka riyo oloyi , mi wamiyi gimoro imodho ?
40025038	Karang’o mane wanenie ka in wendo mi warwaki ei ot , kata kichando lewni mi warwaki ?
40025039	Ne waneni karang’o kituo kata ka in jela mi walimi ? '
40025040	" To Ruoth nodwokgi ni , Anyisou adier ni , gimoro amora mane utimo ne achiel kuom owetenagi matinie mogik , ne utimona . '
40025041	" Eka enowach ne joma nie bade koracham ni , " Ayiuru buta , un joma okuong’gi , mondo udonj i ei mach mosiko mane olosi ne Jachien gi malaikege .
40025042	Nimar ne adenyo , to onge gima numiya mondo acham ; riyo noloya , to onge gima numiya mondo amodhi ;
40025043	ne an wendo , to ne ok urwaka ei ot ; ne achando lewni , to ne ok urwaka ; ne atuo kendo ne an e jela , to ne ok ulima ? '
40025044	" To gin bende ginidwok ni , ' Ruoth , ne waneni karang’o kidenyo , kata ka riyo oloyi , kata ka in wendo , kata kichando lewni , kata kituo , kata ka in e jela , to ne ok wakonyi ? '
40025045	" To enodwokgi ni , ' Anyisou adier ni , gimoro amora mane ok utimo ne achiel kuom joma tindogi , ne ok utimo ne an . '
40025046	" Eka gini aa kanyo mi gidonji e kum mochwere , to joma kare e ngima mochwere . "
40026001	Ka Yesu nosetieko wacho wechegi duto , nowacho ne jopuonjrene ni ,
40026002	" Kaka ung’eyo , odong’ ndalo ariyo kende mondo chieng’ Pasaka ochopi , kendo Wuod Dhano ibiro chiwo mondo ogur . "
40026003	Eka jodolo madongo gi jodong oganda nochokore e dala jadolo maduong’ , mane nyinge Kaifa ,
40026004	kendo ne gichano mondo gimak Yesu e yo mobam ginege .
40026005	To ne giwacho ni , " Kik watim kamano kinde nyasi , nono to ji ogomo . "
40026006	Kane Yesu ni Bethani e dala ng’at moro miluongo ni Simon ja dhoho ,
40026007	dhako moro nobiro ire gi chupa mar alabasta , mopong’ gi mo madung’ mamit kendo ma nengone tek , kendo noole duto e wiye sama nobet kochiemo e mesa .
40026008	Ka jopuonjre noneno mano , ne gisin , mi giwacho ni , " Morni iketho malit kama nang’o ?
40026009	Donge morni ne inyalo uso e nengo mamalo mondo omi jodhier pesago . "
40026010	To kaka Yesu nong’eyo pachgino , nowacho negi ni , " Uchando dhakoni nang’o ? Osetimona gima jaber .
40026011	Jodhier ubiro siko ka ungo ndalo duto to an ok ubi siko ka un koda ndalo duto .
40026012	Ka dhani noolo mo madung’ mamitni e denda , notimo kamano mondo oikago ne ik .
40026013	Anyisou adier ni kamoro amora ma noyalie Injilini e piny duto to gima osetimoni bende nohul , kiparego . "
40026014	Eka achiel kuom ji apar gariyogo , mano mane iluongo ni Judas Iskariot , nodhi ir jodolo madongo ,
40026015	mopenjogi ni , " Ang’o mubiro miya ka achiwe e lwetu ? " Omiyo ne gikwanone pesa mamingli mag fedha piero adek .
40026016	Chakre chieng’no kadhi nyime Judas nochako manyo thuolo mar chiwenegi .
40026017	Odiechieng’ mokwongo mar nyasi mar makati maonge thowi , jopuonjre nobiro ir Yesu mopenje ni , " Kanye midwaro ni waikni mondo ichamie Pasaka ? "
40026018	Nodwoko ni , " Dhiuru nyaka ei dala ir ng’at moro kendo uwachne ni , ' Japuonj wacho kama : sana mane ochanna chiegni chopo , omiyo abiro timo nyasi mar Pasaka gi jopuonjrena e odi . '
40026019	Omiyo jopuonjre notimo kaka Yesu nochikogi kendo ne giiko Pasaka .
40026020	Ka odhiambo nochopo , Yesu nobet kachiemo e mesa kaachiel gi ji apar gariyogo .
40026021	To ka noyudo gichiemo , nowacho ni , " Anyisou adier ni achiel kuomu biro ndhoga . "
40026022	Chunygi nodoko malit ahinya , kendo ne gichako wachone moro ka moro ni , " Ruoth , dobed an koso ? "
40026023	Yesu nodwoko ni , " Ng’at ma oa luto lwete koda e bakul biro ndhoga .
40026024	Wuod Dhano biro dhi mana kaka nondiki kuome . To chandruok ochomo ng’at mandhogo Wuod Dhano ! Dine ok onywole dobedone maber moloyo .
40026025	Eka Judas , jal mane biro ndhoge nowacho ni , " Japuonj , dobed an koso ? Yesu nodwoko ni , " Ee , en in . "
40026026	Ka noyudo gichiemo , Yesu nokawo makati kendo nogwedhe kendo opoge , kaeto omiyo jopuonjrene , kowacho ni , " Kawuru , chamuru ; ma en ringra . "
40026027	Eka nokawo okombe kendo nogwedhe kaeto omiyogi kowacho ni , " Madhuru gima nie iye , un duto .
40026028	Ma en remba mar winjruok , ma ool oko ne ji mang’eny mondo okel werruok mar richo .
40026029	Anyisou ni ok anachak amadh olemb msabibuni kendo , chakre kawuono nyaka chop odiechiengno ma anamadhe manyien , kaachiel kodu , e pinyruoth mar Wuora . "
40026030	Kane gisewero wer moro , ne giwuok gidhi nyaka Got Zeituni .
40026031	Eka Yesu nonyisogi ni , " Otienoni un duto wang’ unupodhi nikech an , nimar ondiki ni , " ' Abiro goyo jakwath , kendo kweth mag rombe biro ke . '
40026032	To bang’ ka asechier anadhi ka atelo nyimu nyaka Galili . "
40026033	Petro nodwoko ni , " Kata ka ji duto opodho nikech in to an ok anapodhi ngang’ . "
40026034	Yesu nodwoko ni , " Awachoni adier ni otienoni , kapok thuon gweno okok , wang’ inikweda nyadidek "
40026035	To Petro nowacho koramo ni , " Kata ka ochuno ni nyaka atho kodi , to ok abi kwedi ng’ang’ , kendo jopuonjre mamoko duto bende nowacho machalre kamano .
40026036	Eka Yesu nodhi gi jopuonjrene nyaka kama iluongo ni Gethsemane , kendo nowachonegi ni , " Beduru ka kapod adhi nyime kucho mondo alam . "
40026037	Nokawo Petro kod yawuot Zebedi ariyo odhigo , kendo kuyo gi chuny lit nochako make .
40026038	Eka nowachonegi ni , " Kuyo ohewo chunya kendo chiegni nega . Beduru ka kendo nenuru kaachiel koda . "
40026039	Ne ochwalore nyime matin kaeto opodho piny gi yoka lenda wang’e eka olemo ni , " Wuora , kanyalore to yie mondo kikombeni ogol kuoma . To ok kaka an ema adwaro to mana kaka in ema id waro . "
40026040	Nodok ir jopuonjrene moyudo ka ginindo . Nopenjo Petro ni , " Joka ma , ne ok unyal rito koda kata kuom saa achiel kende ?
40026041	Nenuru kendo lamuru mondo kik upodhi e tem . Chuny oikore to ringruok to nyap . "
40026042	Ne owuok odhi kendo , mar ariyo , kendo nolamo ni , " Wuora , ka ok nyalre mondo ogol okombeni makmana ka amadhe to dwaroni otimre . "
40026043	Kane oduogo , nochako oyudogi ka ginindo , nikech wengegi ne pek .
40026044	Omiyo ne oweyogi , kendo nochako owuok modok mi olemo mar adek , kowacho gima chaire .
40026045	Eka noduogo ir jopuonjrene mowacho negi ni , " Pod unindo aninda kendo uyweyo ? Neuru , saa osechopo , kendo wuod dhano koro indhogo e lwet joricho .
40026046	Chunguru wadhiuru . Jandhokna eri biro e ! "
40026047	Ka noyudo pod owuoyo , Judas , mane en achiel kuom ji apar gariyo , nochopo . Ne en gi oganda maduong’ momanore gi ligangla gi arunge , mane oor koa ir jodolo madongo gij odong oganda .
40026048	To noyudo jandhok osechano kodgi motelo ranyisi mane obiro tiyogo : " Ng’at ma wang’ ananyodhi e en ; makeuru . "
40026049	Judas nopusore piyo piyo nyaka ir Yesu , kaeto owacho ni , " Misawa Rabi ! " kendo ne onyodhe .
40026050	To Yesu nodwoko ni " Osiepna , tim gima nokeli . Eka jogo nochorore nyime mi ond-hiyo Yesu , kendo ne gimake .
40026051	Gikanyono achiel kuom joma ne nigi Yesu nowuodho liganglane oko , kendo notong’o jatij jadolo maduong’ , mi ochodo ite oko .
40026052	Yesu nowachone ni , " Dwok liganglani e ode , nimar ji duto ma wuodho ligangla notho gi ligangla .
40026053	Iparo ni ok anyal kwayo Wuora mi oketna tenge kidienje apar gariyo mag malaike mondo okedna sanisani ?
40026054	To ka otimo kamano to Ndiko dichop kare nade mawacho ni gik moko nyaka timre kaka gitimore sani-ni ? "
40026055	E sechego Yesu nowacho ne ogandano ni , " Uwuokna oko gi ligengni kod arunge kagima akelo tulu kamano nang’o ? Pilepile asebedo ka abet kodu piny e agolni mag Hekalu ka apuonjo , to ne ok umaka .
40026056	To gima timoreni osetimore kama mondo Ndiko mag jonabi ochopi . " Eka jopuonjre duto nong’wel moringo oweye .
40026057	Joma nomako Yesugo nokawe motere nyaka ir Kaifas jadolo maduong’ , kuma jopuonj chik kod jodongo noyudo osechokoree .
40026058	To Petro noluwe gichien , nyaka notundo e laro mar jadolo maduong’ . Nodonjo kendo nobet piny kod jorito mondo one ane gima nebiro timore .
40026059	Jodolo madongo gi jo Sanhedrin duto ne manyo nend miriambo moro mane ginyalo donjonego Yesu mondo eka ginege .
40026060	To ne ok giyudo moro amora , kata obedo ni jonend miriambo mang’eny nosuosore nyime . Achien mogik , ariyo nobiro nyime ,
40026061	kendo ne giwacho ka giramo ni , " Ng’atni nowacho ni , Anyalo muko Hekalu mar Nyasayeni mi achak agere kendo bang’ ndalo adek . ' "
40026062	Eka jadolo maduong’ noa malo mowacho ne Yesu ni , " Dak iduok wachno ? Neno ma jogi timo kuomini manade ? "
40026063	To Yesu noling’ aling’a thi . Jadolo maduong’ nowachone ni , " Achiki ka akuong’ore gi nying Nyasaye Mangima : Nyiswa ka in e Kristo ma Wuod Nyasaye . "
40026064	Yesu nodwoke ni , " E en kaka iwachono . To awachonu un duto ni e ndalo mabiro unune Wuod Dhano kobet e bat korachwich mar Jal Maratego kendo kobiro kobet e boche polo . "
40026065	Eka jadolo maduong’ noyiecho lepe , kowacho ni , " Oseyenyo ! Ere gimomiyo pod wadwaro joneno mamoko ? Neuru , koro wasewinjo gi itwa ayanjeno .
40026066	Unu paro nade ? " Ne gidwoko ni , " Owinjore gi tho . "
40026067	Eka ne ging’ulo olawo e lenda wang’e , kendo ne gigoye ngum . Jomoko to nopame ,
40026068	ka giwacho ni , " Kornwae wach ane , Kristo , En ng’a mopadi ? "
40026069	Sama noyudo Petro obet oko e laro , jatich manyako moro nobiro ire mowachone ni , " In bende ne in gi Yesu ja Galili . "
40026070	To nodagi wachno e nyimgi duto , kowacho ni , ' Akiya gima iwachono . "
40026071	Eka nong’wel odhi e dho rangach , to kuno bende nyako machielo nonene mi owachone joma ne nikanyo ni , " Ng’atni ne jonigi Yesu ja Nazareth . "
40026072	To nodagi wachno kendo nokuong’ore kowacho ni , ' Akiya ng’atno ! "
40026073	Bang’ saa matin , joma nochung’ kanyo nodhi nyaka but Petro mowachone ni , " Ka iwacho adier , to in achiel kuomgi , nikech yo miwuoyogo huli e iro . "
40026074	Eka nochako luongo kuong’ kuome owuon loramo ni , ' Akiya ng’atno adier ! " Sanosano thuon gweno moro nokok .
40026075	Eka Petro noparo wach ma Yesu noyudo osewachone ni , " Kapok thuon gweno okok , to wang’ inikweda ndalo adek . " Kendo nowuok odhi oko mi oywak malit .
40027001	Okinyi kogwen , jodolo madongo duto gi jodong oganda noporo wach ni mondo gineg Yesu .
40027002	Ne gitweye kendo ne giwuok kode mi gikete e lwet Pilato , mane en ruoth .
40027003	Ka Judas , jal mane ondhoge oneno kose ng’adne Yesu buch tho , achiedhnade nomake mi nodwoko pesa mamingli mag fedha piero adek ne jodolo madongo gi jodongo ,
40027004	kowacho ni , " Aseketho , nimar asendhogo remo maonge ketho . " To ne gidwoke ni , " Mano obadhowa e ang’o ? Mano en wachni iwuon . "
40027005	Omiyo Judas nowito pesago ei Hekalu kaeto oa odhi . Eka nodhi modere .
40027006	Jodolo madongo nokwanyo ng’injo mag fedha go kendo giwacho ni , " Chik ok oyie mondo okan gini kar keno , nikech en pesa remo . "
40027007	Omiyo ne giporo wach mondo giti gi pesago kuom ng’iewo puoth jachwe agulini mondo obed kama iike jodak .
40027008	Mano emomiyo osebedo kiluongo kanyo ni puoth remo nyaka kawuono .
40027009	Eka gima Jeremia janabi nowacho ni , " Ne gikawo pesa mamingli mag fedha , mane en nengo mane jo Israel oketone ,
40027010	kendo ne gitiyo kodgi kuom ng’iewo puoth jachwe agulni , kaka Ruoth nochika , " nochopo kare .
40027011	E thuolono Yesu nochung’ e nyim ruoth , kendo ruoth nopenje ni , " In e ruodh jo Yahudi koso ? " Yesu nodwoke ni , " Ee , en kaka iwachono . "
40027012	Kane jodolo madongo gi jodongo odonjone , ne ok odwoko gimoro amora .
40027013	Eka Pilato nopenje ni , " Donge iwinjo neno ma jogi donjonigogi ? "
40027014	To Yesu ne ok odwoko kata wach achiel mane odonjnego , kendo mano nomiyo ruoth owuoro ahinya .
40027015	To ruoth noheroga gonyo ne oganda ng’at achiel motwe e kinde mag sawo .
40027016	E ndalono ne gin gi ng’at motwe ma achach mane iluongo ni Barabas .
40027017	Omiyo ka oganda nosechokore kaachiel , Pilato nopenjogi ni , " En ng’awa mudwaro mondo agonynu : Barabas koso Yesu miluongo ni Kristo ? "
40027018	Nimar nong’eyo ni ich lit ema nomiyo giketo Yesu e lwete .
40027019	Ka noyudo Pilato obet e kom jong’ad bura , chiege nokowone wach ni , " Walri iayi e wach ng’at maonge kethono , nimar wachne nochanda ahinya kawuono e lek mane aleko kuome . "
40027020	To jodolo madongo gi jodongo nowako oganda mondo Barabas ema gikwa ogonynegi to Yesu to mondo onegi .
40027021	Ruoth nopenjogi ni , " Kuom ji ariyogi , en ng’a mudwaro mondo agonynu ? " Ne gidwoke ni , " Barabas . "
40027022	Pilato nopenjogi ni , " To Yesu miluongo ni Kristoni to atimgo ang’o ? " Ne giduoke riat ni , " Gure ! "
40027023	Pilato nopenjo ni , " Nang’o ? En ang’o marach mosetimo ? " To gin ne gimedo goyo koko matek moloyo ni , " Gure ! "
40027024	Ka Pilato noneno ni onge gima nonyalo timo , to ni mahu ema koro ne chali ore , nokawo pi mi ologo e nyim ogandano , kowacho ni , An aler kuom remb ng’atni , en wachu ! "
40027025	To ji duto nodwoko riat ni , " Rembe mondo obed e wiwa gi nyithindwa ! "
40027026	Eka nogonyonegi Barabas , to Yesu to nokwongo orodho , eka oketo e lwetgi mondo ogur .
40027027	Eka askeche ruoth nokawo Yesu motere nyaka ei od chokruok , kendo ne gichokone oganda askeche duto mi gilwore gikete diere .
40027028	Ne gilonyo lepe kendo ne girwakone kandho makwar ,
40027029	eka ne gikado ligisa mar kudho kendo gisidho e wiye . Ne giketo odundu e lwete kor achich , eka gigoyo chonggi piny e nyime , kendo ne ginyiere ka giwacho ni , " Misawa , ruodh jo-Yahudi ! "
40027030	Ne ging’ulo olawo kuome kendo ne gikawo odundu gigoyogo wiye anuoya anuoya .
40027031	Bang’ ka negisejare kamano , ne gilonyo kandho no oko kaeto girwakone lepe owuon . Eka ne giwuok gidhi kode mondo gidhi gigure .
40027032	Kane gin e yo gidhi , ne giromo gi ja-Kurene moro miluongo ni Simon , kendo ne gichune mondo oting’ msalaba .
40027033	Eka ne gichopo kama iluongo ni Golgotha ( ma tiende en kar Hanga Wich ) .
40027034	Kanyo ne gimiyo Yesu divai moru gi kedhno mondo omadhi , to bang’ bile , nodagi madhe .
40027035	Ka negise-gure , ne gipogore lepe ka gigoyo ombulu .
40027036	Bang’e ne gibet piny kanyo ka girite .
40027037	Gimalo yoka wiye , ne giguroe ndiko mar weche mane odonjnego , mane wacho kama : MA EN YESU , RUODH JO YAHUDI .
40027038	Jomecho ariyo be nogur kode , moro e bathe korachwich to machielo koracham .
40027039	Joma ne kadho machiegni nodirone ayenje , ka gikino wiyegi ,
40027040	kendo giwacho ni , " In ma yande iwacho ni inyalo ketho Hekalu mi ichak igere bang’ ndalo adekni , koro resri kendi ane ! Ka in wuod Nyasaye to wuog ane e msalaba ilor piny ! "
40027041	Machalre kamano bende , jodolo madongo gi jopuonj chik kod jodongo bende noyanye , ka giwacho ni ,
40027042	" Ne oreso jomoko , to en to ok onyal resore owuon ! Donge en ruodh Israel ? Dak koro oa e wi msalaba olor piny ka sani mondo wayie kuome .
40027043	Ogeno kuom Nyasaye ; Nyasaye koro okonye ane sani ka odware adier , nimar ne owachcga ni , An Wuod Nyasaye , ' "
40027044	Kamano bende e kaka jomecho mane ogur kode bende nodirone ayenje .
40027045	Chakre saa auchiel nyaka saa ochiko , mudho noimo piny duto .
40027046	To kar saa ochiko , Yesu noywak gi duol maduong’ ni " Eloi , Eloi , lama sabak-thani ? — ma tiende en ni , " Nyasacha , Nyasacha , ang’o momiyo iseweya kenda ? "
40027047	Kane moko kuom joma nochung’ kanyo owinjo mano , ne giwacho ni , " Oluongo Elija . "
40027048	Gikanyono achiel kuomgi noringo okawo siponj . Nonyume e kong’o makech , kendo nochome ewi odundu mabor , kaeto omiye Yesu mondo omadhi .
40027049	Joma moko nowacho ni , " Koro warit wane ane ka Elija biro mondo orese . "
40027050	To bang’ ka Yesu noseywak kendo matek gi duol maduong’ , nogonyo chunye mondo oa .
40027051	Sanosano katen mar Hekalu noyiech e diere tir , chakre malo nyaka piny . Piny noyiengni kendo lwendni nobarore .
40027052	Liete nomuoch moyawore kendo ringre jomaler mang’eny mane osetho nochier modoko mangima .
40027053	Ne giwuok e liete , kendo bang’ chier mar Yesu , ne gidonjo ei Dala Maler kendo ne gifwenyore ne ji mang’eny .
40027054	Ka ja-Kenturo gi joma ne nikode mane rito Yesu noneno yiengni mar piny kod gik moko duto mane oyudo osetimore , luoro nomakogi matek , kendo ne giwacho ka giwuoro ni , " Adier , ng’ani ne en Wuod Nyasaye ! "
40027055	Mon mang’eny bende ne nikanyo :
40027056	Moko kuomgi ne gin , Maria Magdala , Maria min Jakobo gi Josef , kod min yawuot Zebedi .
40027057	Ka nochopo odhiambo , jamwandu moro maja Arimathea , ma nyinge Josef nobiro . En bende nosedoko japuonjre Yesu .
40027058	Nodhi nyaka ir Pilato mi okwaye ringre Yesu , kendo Pilato nogolo chik mondo omiyego .
40027059	Josef nokawo ringre Yesu moume gi nanga maler mareprep ,
40027060	kendo nokete e liende owuon manyien mane oseroko ei lwanda , eka nong’ielo kidi maduong’ mi olorogo dho liendno kaeto owuok odhi .
40027061	Maria Magdala gi Maria machielo to noweyo kobet piny kama omanyore kod liel .
40027062	Kinyne , mane en odiechieng’ maluwo Chieng’Ikruok , jodolo madongo gi jo Farisai nodhi ir Pilato .
40027063	Ne giwachone ni , " Jaduong’ , wanyalo paro ni ka ja miriamboni ne pod ngima to nowacho ni , ' Bang’ ndalo adek to abiro chier kendo . '
40027064	Omiyo gol chik mondo orit liel nyaka chieng’ mar adek . Nono to jopuonjrene nyalo biro mi kwal ringre mi giwach ne ji ni osechier oa kuom joma otho . Miriambo machien-ni dibed marach moloyo mokwongo . "
40027065	Pilato nodwokogi ni , " Kawuru jarito mondo udhi urit liel kaka un ema ung’eyo uwegi . "
40027066	Omiyo ne gidhi mi ne girito liel ka giketo kido e kidi kendo ne giketo jarito mondo orite .
40028001	Bang’ Sabato , kogwen mar chieng’ mokwongo mar juma , Maria Magdala gi Maria machielo nodhi limo liel .
40028002	To piny noyiengni matek , nimar malaika mar Ruoth nolor piny koa e polo , mi nodhi nyaka e liel mong’ielo kidi kendo obetie .
40028003	Kite ne chalo gi mil polo , kendo lepe ne tar ka pe .
40028004	Jorito ne luoro omako ahinya konene , mi ne gikirni , kendo ne gidoko machal gi joma otho .
40028005	Malaika nowachone mon-go ni , ' Weuru luor , nikech ang’eyo ni umanyo Yesu mane ogur .
40028006	Oonge ka ; osechier , mana kaka nowacho . Biuru une kama noninde .
40028007	Eka mondo udhi mapiyo unyis jopuonjrene ni , ' Osechier oa kuom joma otho kendo otelo e nyimu odhi Galili . Kuno ema ubiro nenee . ' Ero koro asenyisou . "
40028008	Omiyo mon-go noa e liel ka gireto , ka giluor to bende ka gipong’ gi mor , kendo ne giringo gidhi mondo ginyis jopuonjrene .
40028009	To apoya nono Yesu norado kodgi , mowachonegi ni , " Misawauru . " Kendo ne gisudo bute mi gimoko e tiendene , kendo gilame .
40028010	Eka Yesu nowachonegi ni , " Weuru luor . Dhiuru unyis owetena mondo gidhi Galili ; kuno ema gibiro nenae . "
40028011	Ka noyudo mon-go nie wuodhgi dhi , moko kuom jorito nodhi e dala monyiso jodolo madongo gik moko duto mane osetimore .
40028012	Ka jodolo madongo noseromo gi jodongo mi gichano gima ne gidwa timo , ne gimiyo askeche pesa mang’eny ,
40028013	ka giwachonegi ni , " Wachuru ni , ' Jopuonjrene nobiro gotieno mi okwale saa mane wanindo . '
40028014	Kapo ni wachni ochopo e it ruoth , to wang’eyo gima wabiro timone , mondo kik uyud chandruok moro amora . "
40028015	Omiyo askeche nokawo pesago , kendo ne gitimo kaka nonyisgi . Kendo wachni koro oselandore kuonde mathoth e dier jo-Yahudi nyaka odiechiengni .
40028016	Eka jopuonjre apar gachielgo nodhi Galili , e wi got kama Yesu nonyisogi ni gidhiye .
40028017	Kane ginene to ne gilame ; to moko kuomgi noriwo gi kiawa .
40028018	Eka Yesu nobiro irgi mowachonegi ni , " Teko duto manie polo kod manie piny osemiya .
40028019	Kuom mano , dhiuru ulos jopuonjre e ogendini duto , kubatisogi e nying Wuoro gi nying Wuowi kod nying Roho Maler ,
40028020	kendo kupuonjogi mondo gitim gik moko duto ma asechikou . To akonu adier ni abiro bedo ka an kodu seche te , nyaka giko mar ndalo . "
41001001	Ma e chakruok mar Wach Maber Mar Yesu Kristo Wuod Nyasaye .
41001002	En mana kaka ondiki e kitap Janabi Isaya niya , " Abiro oro jaotena notel nyimi mondo olosni yo . "
41001003	" Duond ng’at moro kok e thim ni , ' Ikuru ne Ruoth yore , losneuru yo moriere tir . "
41001004	Kamano e kaka Johana ne owuok e thim kopuonjo ji ni nyaka gilok chunygi eka obatisgi kaka ranyisi ni Nyasaye ose weyo nigi richogi .
41001005	Kuom mano jo piny Judea duto kod ji duto moa Jerusalem nowuok odhi ire . Ne gihulo richogi mi Johana nobatisogi e aora Jordan .
41001006	Johana norwakore gi lewni molos gi yie ngamia kendo notweyo kamba mar pien e nungone . Nochamo bonyo kod mor kich manie thim .
41001007	Wach mane Johana yalo ne chai kama : " Ng’at moro biro bang’a moloya gi duong’ . Oduong’ maok awinjora gonyo kata mana tond wuochene .
41001008	An abatisou gi pi , to en obiro tisou gi Roho Maler . "
41001009	E kindeno Yesu nobiro koa Nazareth , e piny Galilie mi Johana nobatise e aora Jordan .
41001010	Ka noyudo Yesu wuok aa e pi , noneno polo kayawore kendo ka Roho Maler lor mondo opi kuome e kido mar akuru .
41001011	To dwol maduong’ noa e polo kawacho niya , " In e Wuoda mahero . Chunya mor kodi . "
41001012	Gikanyono Roho Maler nokaso Yesu motere e thim ,
41001013	kendo nodak e thim kuno ndalo piero ang’wen , ka Satan teme . E thim kuno Yesu nodak e kind le mag thim , to malaike ne tiyone .
41001014	Ka nosetwe Johana e od twech , Yesu nodhiyo Galili , koyalo Wach Maber mar Nyasaye .
41001015	Noyalo niya , " Saa osechopo kendo Pinyruodh Nyasaye osekayo machiegni . Lokreuru kendo yieuru Wach Maber . "
41001016	Ka noyudo Yesu wuotho e bath Nam Galili , noneno Simon gi owadgi ma Andrea ka jobolo gokgi e nam , nikech ne gin jolupo .
41001017	Yesu nowachonigi ni , " Biuru mondo uluwa , mondo kar ywayo rech to aketu ubed joywa ji . "
41001018	Ne giweyo gokegi sanosano mi giluwe .
41001019	Yesu nomedo chwalore nyime matin mi noneno Jakobo wuod Zebedi gi omin mare ma Johana ka jobet e yie kendo loso gokegi .
41001020	Maok odeko Yesu nolwongogi , kendo ne giweyo wuon-gi ma Zebedi e yie , kaachiel gi jotich mondiki mane konyogi , mi giluwoe .
41001021	Ne gidhi Kapernaum , to kane Sabato ochopo , Yesu nodonjo e od lemo mi ochako puonjo .
41001022	Ji nowuoro puonjne , nikech nopuonjo ka ng’at man gi teko , to ok ka Jopuonj Chik .
41001023	To kanyono ei od lemo ne nitie ng’at moro mane nigi jachien marach . Ng’atni noywak matek kawacho ni ,
41001024	" Idwaro ang’o irwa ka , Yesu ja Nazareth ? Ibiro mondo itiekwa koso ? Ang’eyo ng’ama in , in Ng’ama Ler mar Nyasaye ! "
41001025	To Yesu nokwere gi duol matek ni , " Ling’ thi ! Aa kuome ! "
41001026	Jachien marachno noyuko ng’atno mi ogoyo koko gi dwol maliyore , bang’e oa oweye .
41001027	Jogo duto nowuoro ahinya , magipenjore ni , " Ma to ang’oni ? Puonj manyien kendo mangi teko ! Ng’atni chiko koda ka jochiende kendo giwinje "
41001028	Humb Yesu nolandore piyopiyo e gwenge molworo Galili .
41001029	Mapiyo piyo bang’ ka gia e od lemo ne gidhi kaachiel gi Jakobo kod Johana e dalagi Simon gi Andrea .
41001030	To maar Petro nonindo e kitanda , ka midhusi onure . Jomane nikanyo nonyiso Yesu wachno piyopiyo .
41001031	Omiyo Yesu nodhi ire , momako lwete kokonye mondo oa malo . Midhusi noweyo dhakono mi otiyonigi .
41001032	Odhiambono , ka piny noseyuso , ji nokelo ni Yesu jotuo duto kaachiel gi joma nigi jochiende .
41001033	Jodalano duto nochokore e dhoot kama ne Yesu nitie ,
41001034	to Yesu nochango ji mathoth mane nigi kit tuoche mayoreyore . Bende noriembo jochiende oa kuom ji , to ne ok oyiene jochiendego mondo owuo nikech ne ging’eyo ni En ng’a .
41001035	Kinyne kogwen ka piny pod olil , Yesu noa malo moweyo ot kama noninde . Nowuok modhi kama ochwalore mopondo , mi nolemo kuno .
41001036	Simon gi joge ne jodhi manye ,
41001037	Kendo kane giyude to ne giwachone ni , " Ji duto manyi . "
41001038	To Yesu nodwokogi kawacho ni , " Wadhiuru kamachielo e gwenge man machiegni , mondo kuno bende ayalie . " Mano emomiyo asebiro .
41001039	Omiyo nowuotho e Galili duto , koyalo e utegi mag lemo kendo koriembo jochiende kuom ji .
41001040	Jadhoho moro nobiro mogoyo chonge piny e nyim Yesu kosaye ni , " Kiyie to inyalo puodha . "
41001041	Yesu nokecho ng’atno morieyo bade omule , kowacho ni , " Ayie , puodhri ! "
41001042	Gikanyono dhoho norumo kuom ng’atno mochango
41001043	Yesu nogonyo ng’atno piyopiyo mondo odhi kochike matek ni ,
41001044	" Ne ni ok inyiso ng’ato wachni . To dhiyo mondo ikuong inyisri e nyim jadolo kendo ichiw misengini mane Musa ochiko joma opuodhi mondo otim , eka ji ong’e ni koro iler . "
41001045	Kar timo kamano to ng’atni nochako lando wachno e saa nogo mane oa ir Yesu . Kuom mano Yesu koro ne ok nyal donjo ayanga e dala moro amora , to nodak mana oko kuonde ma ji ongee . To kata kamano ji ne pod biro ire koa kuonde duto .
41002001	Bang’ ndalo manok Yesu nochako oduogo e dala mar Kapernaum , kendo ji nowinjo ni osebiro dala .
41002002	Kuom mano ji mang’eny nochokore mopong’o ot mane entie thich maonge kama odong’ , koda ka dhoot oko , to Yesu nopuonjogi Wach .
41002003	Jomoko nobiro mi gikelone ja athany ka ji ang’wen oting’e .
41002004	To kane jogo oyudo ka chopo ir Yesu tek nikech oganda makwar mane nikode , ne gitucho wi tat ot mochomore gi kama Yesu ne nitie tir mi giloro ja athanyno konindo e par nyaka nochopo e nyim Yesu ,
41002005	
41002006	To jopuonj Chik moko ma noyudo obet ei ot kanyo nochako penjore e chunygi ni ,
41002007	" Ng’atni wuoyo nadi ? Oyanyo Nyasaye ! Ere kaka onyalo nyiso jali ni richone owene to wang’eyo ni Nyasaye kende ema weyo niji richogi ?
41002008	Sano sano Yesu nong’eyo e chunye gima jopuonj Chik neparo e chunygi , omiyo nowachonigi niya , " Ang’o momiyo uparo gik muparogo ?

41002017	Ka Yesu nowinjo wachno to nowachonigi ni , " Joma ngima ok dwar jathieth mak mana joma tuo . Ok ne abiro mondo aluong joma kare , to nobiro mondo aluong joricho . "

41002020	To ndalo biro ma wuon kisera nogol e kindgi , kendo ndalono ema ginitwe chiemo .
41002021	Ng’ato ok nyal twang’o karaka mar law manyien kuom law moti . Kotimo kamano to karaka mar law manyienno nyalo jowo law machonno mi omed yiech moloyo .
41002022	Bende ng’ato ok nyal olo divai manyien e piend divai machon . Kotimo kamano to divai nyalo baro piend divaino mi divaino kethre . Ooyo , divai manyien nyaka ol mana e piende divai manyien . "
41002023	Chieng’ Sabato moro Yesu noyudo kadho e kind puothe mag ngano mochiek , to jopuonjrene nochako jako wi ngano mondo gicham .

41003001	Chieng’ moro Yesu nochako odonjo e od lemo , to ne nitie ng’ato kanyo ma lwete notal .
41003002	Ji moko ne jokiyo Yesu kanyo ka gidwaro yo ma ginyalo donjonego kaka jaketho . Kuom mano ne gichomo wang’gi kuome mondo gine ane ka mit dochang ng’atno chieng’ Sabato .
41003003	Yesu nowachone ng’at ma lwete otalno niya , " Chungi ane e nyim ji duto ka . "
41003004	Bang’e Yesu nopenjo jogo ni , " Ere gima chikwa oyie mondo otim chieng’ Sabato ? Timo maber koso timo marach , reso ngima koso nek ) ? " To jogo noling’ thi .
41003005	Yesu nogawo jogo gi mirima kendo ka chunye lit ahinya nikech chunygi ne tek . Nowacho ni jal ma lwete otalno ni , " Rie lweti " , mi ng’atno norieyo lwete kendo lwete nochango chuth .
41003006	Bang’eno jo Farisai nowuok oko mochako chano kaachiel gi jo Herode kaka diginege .
41003007	Yesu kaachiel gi jopuonjrene nowuok oa kanyo mi gidhi e dho nam , to oganda maduong’ moa Galili noluwo bang’e .
41003008	Ji mamoko mane osewinjo humbe kuom gik madongo mane otimo bende nobiro ire moa kuonde mopogore opogore kaka : Judea , Jerusalem , Idumea , kod gwenge molworo Turo gi Sidon .
41003009	To nikech oganda ne opoto but Yesu maok onyal yweyo , nonyiso jopuonjrene mondo oikne yie moro matin mondo okonyrego maok ji othung’e .
41003010	Dhano nodiyo Yesu kamano nikech nosechango ji mathoth kendo mani nomiyo joma tuo mamoko bende ne riyore nyime mondo gimul Yesu .
41003011	E saa asaya mane jochiende oneno Yesu , ne gipodho piny e nyime ka giywagore ni , " In e Wuod Nyasaye . "
41003012	To Yesu nochikogi matek ni kik gihul gima En .

41003015	kendo gibed gi teko mar golo jochiende kuom ji .

41003017	Jakobo wuod Zebedi , kod owadgi miluongo ni Johana ( owetegi Yesu neluongo ni Boanerges , tiende ni yawuot Mor Polo ) ;

41003020	Bang’e Yesu nodonjo e ot moro to oganda maduong’ nochokore kanyo kendo makata mana thuolo mar chiemo gi jopuonjrene ne ok onyal yudo .
41003021	To ka joodgi Yesu nowinjo wachni , ne gidhi ire mondo gigole kanyo githuon , ka giwacho niya , " Wiye obiro marach " .
41003022	Jopuonj Chik mane obiro kanyo koa Jerusalem to nowacho kuom Yesu ni , " Opong’ gi teko mar Belzebub ! Ogolo jochiende gi teko mar ruodh jochiende . "
41003023	To Yesu nolwongogi ire mowuoyo kodgi gi ngeche kowacho niya , " Ere kaka Satan digol Satan ?
41003024	Ka pinyruoth moro opogore kendo joge gore kendgi to pinyruodhno ok nyal chung’ .
41003025	Bende ka joot achiel opogore to odno nyaka podhi .
41003026	E kaka ka Satan diked gi pinyruodhe owuon , kata ka dopogre owuon to ok dochung’ , to mano ema dibed giko lochne .
41003027	Chutho onge ng’at manyalo monjo od ng’at moloye mi maye gige ka ok otweyo ng’atno mokwongo eka bang’e omaye gige .
41003028	Anyisou adier ni richo ma dhano osetimo gi ayany ma giseyanyogo Nyasaye nowenegi .

41003030	Nowacho kamano nikech jogi ne wuoyo kawacho ni , " En gi jachien marach . "
41003031	Bang’eno min Yesu gi owetene nobiro ire . Ne gioro ng’ato mondo oluong nigi Yesu ka gin to gidong’ gioko .

41004001	Kendo Yesu nochako puojo e dho nam . To oganda mane olwore ne duong’ omiyo nodonjo ei yie mi obetie ka ji duto to ochung’ oko e dho nam .
41004002	Yesu nopuonjogi gik mang’eny kokonyore gi ngeche . E puonjne nowacho niya ,
41004003	" Winjauru ! Japur moro nowuok modhi chwoyo kodhi ,
41004004	to ka noyudo ochwoyo , kodhi moko nolwar e dir yo , mi winy nobiro mochamogi tee .
41004005	To kodhi moko nolwar kuonde motimo lwendni , ma lo operoree . Kodhigo notwi piyo piyo , nikech lowo ne ok tut .
41004006	To ka chieng’ nowuok , chamgo nowang’ , kendo nikech ne gionge tiendegi , ne gitwo .
41004007	Kodhi moko nolwar e kind kudho , to ka kud-hogo nodongo , ne githung’o chamgo mi gimonogi nyak .
41004008	To moko nolwar e lowo maber , mi ne gitwi kendo gidongo . Ne ginyago cham , moko nyadi piero adek , moko nyadi piero auchiel , kendo moko nyadi mia achiel . "
41004009	Bang’e Yesu nomedo wacho niya , " Ng’at man gi it mar winjo wach mondo owinji . "
41004010	Ka odong’ kende , jopuonjrene apar gariyo gi jomoko mane nibute nopenje tiend ngechego .

41004013	Yesu nomedo loso kodgi kowacho ni , " Ere kaka ok unyal winjo tiend ngeroni ? Ka kamano to be ubiro winjo tiend ngero moro amora .
41004014	Japur chwoyo Wach .
41004015	Jomoko chalo gi kodhi mol war e dier yo , kama ichwoyoe Wach . E saa nogo ma jogi owinjoe Wach to Satan biro mi magi Wach ma giwinjono .

41004017	To nikech gionge tiendegi Wach ok bedi e igi aming’a . Ka chandruok kata sand obiro nigi nikech Wach Nyasaye to gipodho piyopiyo nono .
41004018	Moko kaka kodhi molwar e kind kudho .
41004019	To achien parruok mag ngima pinyni gi wuond ma mwandu kelo kaachiel gi gombo ma gigombogo gik mathoth , kendo thung’o Wach mi obed maonge konyruok .
41004020	Moko to chai mana gi kodhi mochuo e lowo maber . giwinjo Wach mi girwaki . Kendo ginyak maber mana ka kodhi manyak nyadi piero adek , nyadi piero auchiel , nyaka nyadi mia achiel . "

41004027	Kata bed otieno kata odiechieng’ , ka ng’atno nindo kata oneno , to kodhigo twi atwiya mi dongi , ka jachuoyo ok ong’eyo kaka mano timore .

41006002	To ka Sabato nochopo nochako puonjo ei od lemo . Ji mang’eny mane owinje nohum nono , ka gipenjore ni , " Ng’atni ogolo gigi kure , koso rieko manade mosemiyeni , momiyo otimo koda ka honni !

41006004	To Yesu nowachonigi niya , " Janabi imiyo duong’ kuonde moko , makmana jogweng’gi gi wedene kod joode ema ochave . "
