42005023	Ere mayot wacho , ' Richoni oweni , koso wacho ni , ' Chung kendo iwuothi ?
42005024	To mondo omi ung’e ni Wuod Dhano ni gi teko e piny mar weyo richo . . . Nowacho ni jathany ni , " Awacho ni , chung , kaw pari kendo idhi dala . "
42005025	Gikanyono nochungo nodhiyo dala kopako Nyasaye .
42005026	Ji duto nowuoro kendo negichiwo pak ni Nyasaye . Negiwuoro ahinya kendo negiwacho ni , " Waseneno gik malich kawuono . "
42005027	Bang’ mani , Yesu nowuok odhi oko kendo noneno jasol osuru ma nyinge Lawi kobedo kar choko Osuru . Yesu nowachone ni , " Luwa " .
42005028	To Lawi noa malo , moweyo gik moko duto kendo noluwe .
42005029	Eka Lawi noloso nyasi mar rwak ni Yesu e ode , oganda maduong’ mar josol osuru kaachiel gi ji mamoko nechiemo kodgi .
42005030	To Jofarisai gi Jopuonj mag Chik mag dini margi neng’ur ni jopuonjrene ni , " Ang’o momiyo uchiemo kendo metho gi josol osuru kod joricho ?
42005031	Yesu nodwokogi ni , " Ok jomangima ema dwaro jathieth , to jomatuo .
42005032	Ok asebiro mondo aluong jomakare , to mana joricho mondo gilokre . "
42005033	Negiwachone ni , " Jopuonjre Johana ne thoro tueyo chiemo kendo lamo , to bende jopuonjre mag Jofarisai timo kamano , to magi dhiyo mana nyime gi chiemo kendo metho . "
42005034	Yesu nodwoko ni , " Bende inyalo miyo wend wuon kisera otwe chiemo ka en kodgi ? "
42005035	To ndalo biro biro ma wuon kisera nogol kuomgi , e ndalogo gibiro tueyo chiemo .
42005036	Eka nogoyonigi ngeroni ni ; " Onge ng’ama nyalo yiecho dir law manyien kendo otwang’e kuom mano moti . Ka otimo kamano , obiro bedo ni oyiecho law manyien , to dir law matin mar law manyien ok bi winjore kod machon .
42005037	Bende onge ng’ama olo divai manyien e ndede moti . Ka otimo kamano , divai manyien biro yiecho ndede go , divai biro pukore kendo ndede biro kethore .
42005038	Ooyo , divai manyien nyaka oliee ndede manyien .
42005039	To onge ng’ama bang’ madho divai machon dwaro divai manyien , owacho ni " machon ber moloyo . "
42006001	Chieng’ Sabato moro , Yesu nowoutho e puothe mag ngano , kendo jopuonjrene nochako jako wi ngano , negidunyogi e lwetegi mi , gi chamo ngano .
42006002	Jofarisai moko nopenjo ni , " Ang’o momiyo utimo gima chik okwero chieng’ Sabato " ?
42006003	Yesu nodwokogi niya , " Pok ne usomo gima Daudi notimo kaachiel gi jogo mane nikode ka kech nekayogi ?
42006004	Nodonjo e od Nyasaye , kendo nokawo makati miketo e nyim Nyasaye , nochamo gima chik oyie ni jodolo kende ema chamo . Kendo nochiwo moko ne jogo mane ni kode . "
42006005	Eka Yesu nowachonigi niya , " Wuod Dhano en Ruodh Sabato . "
42006006	Chieng’ Sabato machielo nodhiyo ei sunagogi kendo nopwonjo , to ng’ato neni kanyo ma lwete korachwich notal .
42006007	Jofarisai kod Jopuonj mag Chik ne dwaro gimoro ma dimi gidonjnego Yesu , omiyo ne ging’iyogo machiegni , mondo gine ka dochang’ chieng’ Sabato .
42006008	To Yesu nong’eyo gima negiparo eka nowacho ni ng’atno mane lwete otal ni , " Aa malo kendo chungi e nyim ji duto . " Kamano noa malo mi ochungo kanyono .
42006009	Eka Yesu nowachonigi niya , " Apenjou , ere gima owinjore gi chik chieng’ Sabato , timo maber koso timo marach , reso ngima koso kethe " ?
42006010	Norangogi duto , to eka nowachoni ng’atno niya , Rie lweti oko . " Notimo kamano , to lwete nochango chutho .
42006011	To negikecho kendo negichako wuoyo ng’ato gi ng’ato kuom gino ma digitim ni Yesu .
42006012	Chieng’ moro achiel Yesu nowuok modhi mo kare gi got mondo olem kendo nobedo otieno mangima kolamo Nyasaye .
42006013	Kane okinyi ochopo , noluongo jopuonjre ire kendo noyiero apar gariyo kuomgi , mane owalo obedo joote .
42006014	Simon ( mane omiyo nying ni Petro ) ; gi owadgi Andrea , Jakobo , Johana , Filipo , Bathlomayo ,
42006015	Mathayo , Thoma , Jakobo wuod Alfayo , Simon mane iluongo ni Jakedo ni piny ,
42006016	Juda wuod Jakobo , gi Juda Ja Iskariot , mane obedo jandhok .
42006017	Nolor kodgi piny kendo nochungo kama opie . Oganda maduong’ mar jopuonjrene ne nikanyo to kod ji mang’eny moa kuonde duto mag Judea , moa Jerusalem , kendo moa e dho nam mar Turo gi Sidon ,
42006018	mano biro mondo giwinje kendo ochang midekregi . Jogo mane jochiende thago nochangi ,
42006019	To ji duto notemo mondo omule , nikech teko ne aa kuome kendo changogi duto ,
42006020	Kong’iyo jopuonjrene , nowacho niya , " Un Joma ogwedh jogo modhier , nimar piny Ruoth Nyasaye en maru .
42006021	Un joma ogwedhi joma kech kayo koroni , nimar ubiro yieng’ .
42006022	Un jogo mogwedhi ka ji himou , ka gik-wedou kendo jarou kendo gidagi nyingu ka rach , nikech Wuod Dhano .
42006023	" Beduru mamor e ndalono kendo chikreuru ka uil , nikech poku duong’ e polo . Nimar mano e kaka kweregi notimo ni jonabi .
42006024	" To okuong’u un jomwandu nimar useyudo poku
42006025	" Okuong’u un jomayieng’ maber e kindeni , nimar ubiro bedo modenyo , Okuong’u un jogo manyiero koroni , nimar ubiro kuyo kendo ywak .
42006026	Okuong’u ka ji duto wuoyo maber kuomu , nimar mano e kaka kweregi notimoni jonabi ma jomiriambo .
42006027	To owachonu un joma mawinja ni : Heruru wasiku , timuru maber ni joma mamon kodu .
42006028	Guedhuru joma kuong’ou lamuru ni joma sandou .
42006029	Ka ng’ato othalo lembi konchiel , to lokne komachielo bende . Ka ng’ato okawo koti-ni , kik itame kawo sadi .
42006030	Miuru ji duto makwayou , to ka ng’ato okawo gimoro mari , kik idwar ni mondo oduoknigo .
42006031	Timuru niji mamoko mana kaka duher mondo gin bende gitimnu .
42006032	Ka uhero joma oherou , en ohala manadi kuomu ? Mana , kaka joricho ohero mana joma oherogi .
42006033	To ka utimo maber ni joma timonu maber , en ohala manadi kuomu ? Kata mana joricho ' timo kamano .
42006034	To ka uholo mana joma un gi adier ni biro dwokonu , en ohala manadi kuomu ? Kata mana joricho ' holo mana joricho ' kagigeno ni ibiro chulogi duto .
42006035	To heruru wasiku , tim negiuru maber , kendo holgiuru ka ok ugeno ni ubiro yudo gimoro bang’e . Eka poku biro bedo maduong’ kendo ubiro bedo yawuot Ng’ama Malo moloyo , nikech ong’won ni jogo ma ok go erokamano kendo jomaricho .
42006036	Beduru mang’won , mana kaka Wuoru ng’won
42006037	Kik ung’ad , bura kendo bi ok ng’adnu bura . Kik ukuong’ ji , to ok bi kuong’u . Weuru ni ji richogi , to ibiro weyonu richou .
42006038	Chiwuru , to ibiro chiwonu . Ubiro yudo rapim maber , moiki kendo motiel mapong’ thich , kendo oo oko . Nimar rapim ma utiyogo , mano bende ema nopimnugo . "
42006039	Nogoyo nigi ngeroni bende ni : " Ng’at mamuofu bende nyalo telo ni ng’ama muofu " ? Donge gi duto ji ariyogo dil-ing’re ei bugo ?
42006040	Japuonjre ok duong’ moloyo japuonjne , to ng’ato ka ng’ato motiegi chuth biro bedo machal gi japuonjne .
42006041	En ang’o momiyo ineno mana pilni yath mamie wang’ owadu . To yath mane wang’i iwuon to ok idewo ?
42006042	Ere kaka diwach ni owadu ni ; owadwa , yie mondo agol pil yath manie wang’i , ka in iwuon ok inyal neno yath manie wang’i iwuon ? In jawuondre , mokwongo gol yadhono oko manie wang’i , to eka ibiro neno maler mondo igol pil yadhno manie wang’ owadu .
42006043	" Onge yath maber manyago olemo maricho , kata yath marach manyago olemo maber .
42006044	Yath ka yath ing’eyo kod olembe owuon , Ji ok pon ng’ou kuom yiende mag kudho , kata mzabibu bende ok pon kuom otonglo .
42006045	Ng’at maber golo gik mabeyo mawuok e keno maber ei chunye , to ng’at marach golo gik maricho mawuok e keno marach manie chunye . Nimar gik mopong’o chunye dhoge wacho .
42006046	Ang’o momiyo uluonga ni , Ruoth , Ruoth , to ok utim gima awacho ?
42006047	Abiro nyisou kaka ng’atno chalo jamo mabiro ira kendo winjo wachna , kendo otimogi .
42006048	Ochalo gi ng’at magero ot , manokunyo bur matut nyaka e lwanda kendo noketoe mise , kane koth ochue ma pi opongo piny , apaka mogingore nogoyo odno to ne ok onyal yienge , nikech nogere maber .
42006049	To jal mawinjo wechena to ok otimgi chalo gi ng’at manogero ot e wi lowo maonge gi mise . E kindeno ma apaka mogingore nogoyo odno , nogore piny kendo nokethore chuth . "
42007001	Kane Yesu nosetieko wacho magi duto ka ji winjo , nodhiyo odonjo Kapernaum .
42007002	Kanyo ne nitie jatich jaduong’ lweny , mane ruodhe ogeno ahinya , netuo kendo nochiegni gi tho .
42007003	Jaduong’ lweny nowinjo humb Yesu , momiyo nooro jodongo mag Joyahudi ire , mondo gikwaye obi ochang jatichne .
42007004	Kane gibiro ir Yesu negisaye chutho ni , " Ng’atni owinjore mondo itimne mani ,
42007005	Nikech ohero pinywa kendo osegeronwa sunagogi . "
42007006	Kuom mano , Yesu nodhiyo kodgi . Ne ok en mabor gi ot kane jadoung’ lweny nooro osiepene mondo owachne ni : " Ruoth , kik ichandri , nikech ok awinjora ibi idonji e bwo tat oda .
42007007	Mani e momiyo ok asekwanora ni awinjora biro iri . To wach wach to jatichna biro chango .
42007008	Nimar awuon an ng’at manie bwo loch kod askache manie bwoya . Ka awacho ni moro ni , ' Dhi ' to odhiyo , kendo machielo ni ' Bi ' to obiro . Awacho ni jatichna ni , Tim ma , to otime . "
42007009	Kane Yesu owinjo ma nowuore , kendo kane olokore ir oganda maluwe , nowacho ni " Awachonu , pok ayudo yie maduong’ kama kata e Israel .
42007010	Eka jogo maneoro nodok e ot to negiyudo jatich kangima .
42007011	Mapiyo bang’ mano , Yesu nodhiyo e taon miluongo ni Nain , to jopuonjrene gi oganda maduong’ bende nodhi kode .
42007012	Kaka nosudo machiegni gi dhoranga taon ng’at motho noting’ igolo oko-wuowi achiel kende wuod min , to en dhako ma chi liel . To oganda maduong’ moa e taon neni kode .
42007013	Kane Ruoth onene , chunye nokeche kendo nowacho ni , " Kik iywagi . "
42007014	Eka nodhiyo machiegni kendo nomulo sanduku mane oting’e wuowi manotho , to jogo mane oting’e nochungo . Nowacho ni , " Wuowi matin , awachoni , chungi aa malo ! "
42007015	Ng’at mothono nobedo piny kendo nochako wuoyo , to Yesu nodwoke momiye min .
42007016	Gin duto luoro nomakogi kendo negipako Nyasaye . Negiwachoni , " Janabi maduong’ osewuok e dierwa . " Kendo ni , " Nyasaye osebiro konyo joge . "
42007017	Wach maber ni mar Yesu nolandore e Judea mangima kod piny molwore .
42007018	Jopuonjre Johana nonyise gigi duto . Noluongo ji ariyo kuomgi ,
42007019	ne oorogi ir Ruoth mondo gipenje ni , " In e jamo mane biro koso onego wagen ng’at moro machielo " ?
42007020	Ka jogo nobiro ir Yesu , negiwachoni , " Johana Jabatiso noorowa iri mondo wapenj ni , " In e jal mane biro , koso wagen ng’ato moro machielo ? "
42007021	E saa nogono Yesu nochango ji mang’eny manenigi tuoche , midekre kod chunje maricho , kendo nomiyo muofni mang’eny mondo onen .
42007022	Kamano nowacho ni jogo manoor ni , " Doguru kendo unyis Johana gik mauseneno kendo winjo : muofni neno , rong’onde wuotho , jogo man gi dhoho ichango , joma itgi odinore winjo , jomatho ichiero , kendo wach maber iyalo ni jochan .
42007023	En ng’at mogwedhi jal maok chwanyre mabar nitech an , "
42007024	Bang’e ka jopuonjre Johana nosea odhi , Yesu nochako wuoyo ni oganda kuom Johana ni : " Ang’o mane udhiyo e thim mondo une ? Odundu ma yamo yiengo ?
42007025	Ka ok mano , en ang’o mane udhi mondo une ? Ng’at morwakore gi lewni mabeyo ? Ooyo , jogo marwako lewni manengogi tek kendo madhialore gi gik mabeyo nie ute ruodhi .
42007026	To un nudhi mondo une ang’o ? Janabi ? Ee , Awachonu , kendo mana moloyo janabi .
42007027	Mani e jal mane ondik kuome ni : " Abiro oro jaotena motelo nyimi , mabiro loso yori motelo ni .
42007028	Awachonu , kuom jogo ma mon onyuolo onge ng’ato maduong’ moloyo Johana ; kata kamano jalo matinie moloyo e piny Ruoth Nyasaye doung’ moloye .
42007029	Ji duto , kata mana jasol osuru , kane giwinjo weche Yesu , negiyie ni yor Nyasaye ni kare , nikech nosebatisgi gi Johana .
42007030	To Jofarisai kod jogo molonye chik nodagi dwaro mar Nyasaye kuomgi giwegi , nikech nepok obatisgi gi Johana .
42007031	" Koro ere gima dapimgo ji mar tieng’ ma kawuononi Gichalo gi ang’o ?
42007032	Gi chalo nyithindo mobedo e chiro kendo luongore kendgi moro ka moro ni : " Nende wagoyonu thum , to ok ne umiel ; bende ka wagoyonu nduru , to ne ok uywak . "
42007033	Nimar Johana Jabatiso ne obiro maok ocham makati kata madho divai , to uwacho ni , " En gi jachien .
42007034	Wuod Dhano nobiro kachiemo kendo metho , to uwacho ni , Ma eri jawuoro kendo jamer , osiep josol osuru duto kendo joricho .
42007035	To rieko ofweny adimba gi nyithindo .
42007036	Koroni Jafarisai achiel , moro noluongo Yesu mondo ochiem kode nodhiyo e od Jafarisai mobedo but mesa .
42007037	Kane dhako mane osedak e ngima mar richo e taondno ( dalano ) nowinjo ni Yesu ne chiemo e od Jafarisai , nokelo chupa mar alabasta mar mo mangue ng’ar ,
42007038	kendo nochungo e toke , but tiende , pi wang’e nolwar e tiendege ma gitimo pi eka noyueyogi gi yie wiye , monyodhogi kendo noolo mo kuomgi .
42007039	Kane Jafarisai mane oluonge oneno ma , nowacho owuon ni , " Ka da ng’atni en janabi , da ong’eyo jal ma muleni kendo ni en dhako machalo nadi-ni en jaricho . "
42007040	Yesu nodwoke ni , " Simon , an-gi gima adwaro wachoni , " Nowachone ni , wachna , Japuonj . "
42007041	" Ji ariyo ne nigi gop jahol pesa , moro . Achiel negigope mar siling’ mia abich , to machielo piero abich .
42007042	Giduto ji ariyogi ne gionge gi pesa magichulego , omiyo noweyonigi gopegi . Koro en mane kuomgi mabiro here moloyoe ? "
42007043	Simon nodwokoni , " Aparo ni jamo mane nigi gowi maduong’ mowene . " Yesu nowacho ni , " Isedwoko kare . "
42007044	Eka nolokore mong’iyo dhakono mowacho ni Simon , niya , " Ineno dhakoni ? Nabiro odi . Ne ok imiya pi moro amora mondo alwok go tiendena , to nol-woko tiendena gi pi wang’e kendo noyueyogi gi yie wiye .
42007045	To in ne ok iny-odha , to dhakoni chakre saa mane adonjo , ne ok oweyo nyodho tiendena .
42007046	Ne ok iolo mo e wiya , to oseolo mo mang’ue ng’ar e tiendena .
42007047	Emomiyo , awachoni , richone mathoth owene-nikech nohero mathoth . To jal mowene manok , ohero matin . "
42007048	Eka Yesu nowachone , " richoni oweni . "
42007049	Welo mamoko nochako wacho kendgi giwegi ni , " Mani en ng’a ma weyo niji richogi ? "
42007050	Yesu nowacho ni dhakono ni , " Yieni oseresi ; dhi gi kuwe . "
42008001	Bang’ ma , Yesu newuotho koa e taon ka taon kod gweng’ ka gweng’ ka olando wach maber mar Piny Ruoth Nyasaye . Jopuonjrene apar gariyo ne ni kode ,
42008002	kaachiel gi mine moko mane osegol kuomgi jochiende kendo ochang tuochegi kaka Mariam ( mane iluongoni Magdala ) mane jochiende abiriyo osewuok kuome ;
42008003	Joana chi Chuza , mane jatelo e od Herode gi Susana kod mon mamoko mathoth . Mon-gi nekonyogi kagichiwonegi gigegi giwegi .
42008004	Ka noyudo oganda maduong’ chokore kendo ji ne biro ir Yesu moa e taon ka taon nogoyo negi ngeroni :
42008005	" Japur nodhiyo chuoyo kothe . Ka noyudo nokiro kothe , moko nolwar e yo mi nonyon-gi kendo winy nochamogi .
42008006	Moko nolwar ewi lwanda mine giti kendo neginer nikech negi onge kod ng’ich .
42008007	Kothe moko nolwar e dier kudho , mane odongo kode kendo nothung’ cham .
42008008	Bende lodhi moro nolwar e lowo maber . No ti kendo nonyago cham , nyadi mia moloyo kaka nochuoye . Ka nowacho ma , nogoyo koko ni , " Ng’at mangi ite mawinjo , mondo owinji . "
42008009	Jopuonj re nopenje gima ngerono nyiso .
42008010	Nowacho ni , " Ng’eyo mar gik mopondo mag Piny ruoth Nyasaye osemiu , to ji ma moko awuoyo nigi gi ngerini , omiyo , " kata ging’icho , to ok ginyal neno , kata giwinjo , to ok nyal donjonigi . "
42008011	Ma e gima ngeroni nyiso : Kodhi en wach Nyasaye .
42008012	Molwar e yo gin jogo mawinjo , to jachien biro kendo golo wach ei chunygi , mondo kik giyie ma wargi .
42008013	Molwar e lwanda gin jogo ma rwako wach gi mor ka giwinje , to gionge gi tiende . Giyie kuom kinde moromo , to e kinde mag tem gipodho giaa .
42008014	Kodhi molwar e dier kudho ochungo kar jogo mawinjo , to ka gidhiyo e yoregi , to parruok mar ngima , mwandu kod mor mar piny thungogi , ma ok gidong motegno .
42008015	To kodhi manie low maber , ochungo kar jogo man gi chuny malongo ' kendo maber , mawinjo wach , okane , kendo bedo modhil onyago cham .
42008016	" Onge ng’ato mamoko taya kendo pande ei sufuria kata kete e bwo otanda . Kar timo kamano , to okete ewi rachungi taya , mondo jogo madonjo one ler .
42008017	Nimar onge gimoro mopandi maok bi elore , kendo onge gima oum maok nong’ere kata bedo e lela .
42008018	Emomiyo paruru ahinya maber kaka uwinjo . Ng’at mango nomedne moko ; ng’at maongego , kata mano moparo ni en-go ibiro maye . "
42008019	Koro min Yesu gi owetene nobiro mondo ginene , to ne ok ginyal sudo machiegni kode nikech oganda .
42008020	Ng’at moro nowachone ni , " Meru gi oweteni ochungo oko , gidwaro neni . "
42008021	Nodwoko ni , " Mamana kod owetena gin jogo mawinjo wach Nyasaye kendo timo . "
42008022	Chieng’ moro Yesu nowacho ni jopuonjrene ni , " Wadhiuru loka nam kocha . " Omiyo negidonjo ei yie kendo giwuok gidhi .
42008023	Kane gikwang’ , nindo notere . Eka ahiti mangongo notugore e nam , koro yieno ne pong gi pi kendo ne gin e chandruok maduong’ .
42008024	Jopuonjre nodhiyo ire mochiewe , ka giwacho ni , " Ruoth , Ruoth , wabiro nimo ! " Nochungo oa malo kendo nokwero yamo gi apaka mager mi ahiti nopie kendo gik moko duto nokuwe .
42008025	Nopenjo jopuojrene ni , " Ere yieu ? " Luoro nomakogi kendo negiwuoro mine gipenjore giwegi ni , " Ma en ng’a ? Ochiko yamo koda pi , to giwenje . "
42008026	Ne gikwang’ gichopo e piny jo-Gerasani , man loka nam Galili .
42008027	Kane Yesu owuok oko e dho wath , ng’at moro mangi jochiende moa e taondno , noromo kode , kuom kinde mang’eny ng’at ni ne pok orwako law kata dak ei ot , to nodak e dier liete .
42008028	Kane oneno Yesu , noywak matek kendo nopodho e tiende , kogoyo koko gi duol mamalo niya , " Ang’o midwaro timo koda , Yesu , Wuod Nyasaye Ma Malo Moloyo ? Asayi , kik isanda ! "
42008029	Nimar noyudo Yesu osechiko jachien marachno mondo owuog oa kuom ng’atno . Kuom kinde mang’eny nomake , to kata nosetwe lwete , tiende gi nyororo , kendo okete e bwo jarit , nosebedo kocho-do nyororo kendo jochiende ne riembe nyaka e thim .
42008030	Yesu nopenje ni , " Nyingi ng’a ? Nodwoko ni " Oganda " , nikech jochiende mang’eny nosedonjo kuome .
42008031	To ne gikwaye monuore mondo kik ochikgi gidhiyo e Bur Matut Maonge Gikone .
42008032	To kueth maduong’ mar ngurue ne kwayo e bath got kanyo . Jochiende nosayo Yesu mondo gidonji e igi , mi nomiyogi thuolono .
42008033	Kane jochiende nowuok oa ei ng’atno , ne gidhiyo gidonjo ei ngurue , to kueth noringo kamuomore kalor mwalo kama ne giridore nyaka nam .
42008034	Kane jogo makwayo ngurue oneno gima nosetimore , negiringo gidhiyo gitero wach e taon kendo e gweng’ duto .
42008035	Mi ji nowuok mondo gine gino mosetimore . Kane gichopo ir Yesu , negiyudo ng’atno ma jochiende nosewuok kuome , kobedo piny e tiend Yesu , korwakore kendo ka parone ni kare ; luoro nomakogi .
42008036	Jogo mane oneno gima notimore nonyiso ji kaka ng’at mane nigi jochiende nochangi
42008037	Eka ji duto manie gweng’ Gersani duto nokwayo Yesu mondo odar odhi owegi , nikech luoro maduong’ nomakogi . Omiyo nodonjo ei yie kendo noa kanyo
42008038	Ng’at mane jochiende owuok kuome , nosaye mondo odhi kode , to Yesu notame , ka wachone ni
42008039	" Dogi dala kendo inyis ji gik mang’eny ma Nyasaye osetimoni . Omiyo ng’at no nowuok odhi kendo monyiso taon duto mang’eny ma Yesu nosetimone .
42008040	Koro ka Yesu oduogo , oganda norwake nimar negirite giduto .
42008041	Eka ng’ato moro miluongo ni Jairo , jatich Sunagogi , nobiro nopodho e tiend Yesu , kosaye mondo odhi ode ,
42008042	nikech nyare achiel kende , nyako madirom ja higni apar gariyo , ne tho . Ka Yesu ne nie yo , oganda nothunge madihinye .
42008043	To dhako moro ne ni kanyo mane osebedo ka iye chuer kuom higni apar gariyo to onge ng’at ma ne nyalo change .
42008044	Nobiro gi yo ka dier ng’eye kendo nomulo riak nangane , kendo iye machuer nochok gikanyono .
42008045	Yesu nopenjo ni , " Ng’ano momula ? " kane gi duto gikwer , Petro nowacho ni , " Ruoth , ok neye kaka olwuori kendo oth-ungi .
42008046	To Yesu nowachoni , " Ngato moro nomula ; Ang’eyo nikech teko oswuok kuoma "
42008047	Eka kane dhakono oneno ni ok onyal dhi ma ok onene , nobiro ka otetni kendo nopodho e tiende . Nohulo e nyim ji duto gimomiyo nomule kendo kaka nochango sano sano .
42008048	Eko nowachone ni , " Nyara , yieni ochangi . Dhi gi kue . "
42008049	Kane Yesu pod wuoyo ngato moro nobiro moa eod Jairo , jatelo mar Sunagogi , nowachoni , " Nyari osetho . " omiyo " kik ichand japounj kendo . "
42008050	Kanowinjo ma , Yesu nowacho ne Jairo ni " kik iluor , yie ayieya kendo obiro chango . "
42008051	Kane ochopo e od Jairo , ne ok oyie ni ng’ato moro amora mondo odonj kode mak man Petro , Johana gi Jakobo kod woun nyathi gi min mare .
42008052	Gie kendino , ji duto ne goyo nduru kendo Yesu nowachonigi ni , " Weuru ywak " nimar " ok otho to onindo . "
42008053	Negi nyiere , nikech ne ging’eyo ni osetho .
42008054	To nomake gi lwete kendo nowacho ni , " Nyathina , chungi ia malo .
42008055	Chunye nodwogo , kendo nochung’ oa malo sanosano . Eka Yesu nowachonigi mondo gimiye gimoro ocham .
42008056	Jonyuolne nohum , to nomiyo gi chik ni kik ginyis ng’ato moro amora gima nosetimore .
42009001	Kane Yesu noseluongo ji apar gariyogo kaachiel , nomiyogi teko kod nyalo mar golo jochiende duto kendo chango tuoche ,
42009002	kendo noorogi oko mondo giyal Piny ruoth Nyasaye kendo chango jomatuo .
42009003	Nowachonegi ni , " Kik uting’ gimoro ka udhi e wuoth : luth kata dende kata chiemo , kata pesa , kata sede moko
42009004	Ot mor amoro mudonje , ubed kanyono nyaka ua e taondno .
42009005	Ka ji ok orwakou , uteng’ buch tiendeu sama uwuok e taondgi kaka siem ne gin . "
42009006	Kamano ne giwuok magi dhiyo e gweng’ ka gweng’ , ka giyalo injili kendo gichango ji kuonde duto .
42009007	Koro Herode ma ruoth nowinjo gik moko duto matimore , to noparore , nikech ji moko ne wacho ni Johana osechier oa kuom jomotho .
42009008	Jomoko to ni Elija osefwenyore , to bende moko to ni achiel kuom jonabi machon osebedo mangima kendo .
42009009	To Herode nowacho niya , " Johana ne aseng’ado wiye , koro ma , to nga ma awinjo gik maka magi kuome ? Kendo notemo mondo onene
42009010	Kane joote oduogo ne ginyiso Yesu gima ne gisetimo . Eka nokawogi modhi kodgi kaachiel kar kendgi e taon miluongo ni Bethsaida ,
42009011	to oganda nowinjo mano kendo ne giluwe . Norwakogi kendo nowuoyo kodgi kuom loch mar Piny ruoth Nyasaye , kendo nochango jogo mane dwaro chang .
42009012	Kar seche moko mag odhiambo Jopuonjre apar gariyo nobiro ire kendo negiwacho ni " We oganda ji odogi mondo gidhi e mier machieigni kod gwenge mondo giyud chiemo kod kwonde nindo , nikech wan oko kuma bor .
42009013	Nodwoko ni , " Un , migiuru gima di gi cham . " Negidwoko niya , " Wan mana gi makati abich gi rech ariyo kende-makmana ka wadhi wangiewo chiemo ne ogandani duto , "
42009014	Ne nitie ji ma chwo kanyo ma dirom alufu abich . To nowacho ni jopuonjrene niya , " Nyisgiuru gibed piny e girube mag ji madirom piero abich , moro ka moro .
42009015	Jopuonjre notimo kamano kendo giduto negibedo piny .
42009016	Nokawo makati abich kod rech ariyogo eka nong’i yo malo , mogoyo erokamano kendo nong’ingogi . Eka nomiyogi jopuonjre mondo giketgi e nyim ji .
42009017	Gi duto negichiemo mi giyieng’ , to jopuonjre nochoko ng’injo mag chiemo mane ji ochamo oweyo aditi-ni apar gariyo mopong’ .
42009018	Chieng’ moro kane Yesu lemo kama opondo , to jopuonjre neni kode , nopenjogi ni , " Oganda wacho ni an ng’a ? "
42009019	Negidwoko ni , " Jomoko wacho ni Johana Jabitiso , to mamoko wacho ni Elija to bende jomamoko , ni achiel kuom jonabi machon osebedo mangima kendo . "
42009020	Nopenjogi ni , " Un to uwacho ni an ng’a ? " Petro nodwoko ni , " Kristo mar Nyasaye . "
42009021	Yesu nokwerogi matek mondo kik ginyis , ng’ato ang’ata wachni .
42009022	Kendo nowacho ni , " Wuod Dhano nyaka yud sand malit mang’eny , kendo okwede gi jodongo , madongo kod jopuonj chik , bende nyaka nonege kendo chieng’ mar adek nochiere . '
42009023	Eka nowachonigi duto ni , " Ka ng’ato moro dwaro luwa , nyaka okwedre owuon kendo oting’ msalape ndalo duto eka oluwa .
42009024	Nimar ng’atno madwaro reso ngimane ngimane nolane , to ng’at mowito , ngimane ne an abiro rese .
42009025	Ere ber ma ng’ato nyalo yudo ka onuang’o piny duto , to oialo kata owiti ngimane .
42009026	Ka ng’ato wiye kuot koda kod wechena , Wuod Dhano bende wiye biro kuot kode ka obiro duogo gi duong’ne kendo e duong’ mar Wuoro kod mar malaike maler .
42009027	Awachonu adier ni ntie jomoko mochungo ka maok nobil tho kapok gineno Piny ruoth Nyasaye .
42009028	Kar ndalo ma dirom aboro bang’ ka Yesu nosewacho mani , nokawo Petro , Johana gi Jakobo kaachiel kode kendo negidhiyo malo e wi got mondo gilam .
42009029	To kane olamo , kit wang’e nolokore , kendo lepe nolokore marieny ka ler mar mil polo .
42009030	Ji ariyo , Musa gi Elija ,
42009031	nofwenyore e duong’ maler , ka giwuoyo gi Yesu negiwuoyo kuom thone , mane koro ochiegni miyo ochopi e Jerusalem .
42009032	Petro kaachiel gi jowadgi ne nindo oingo ahinya , to kane gichiewo maber , ne gineno duong’ne kod ji ariyo kochungo kode .
42009033	Kane jogo weyo Yesu , Petro nowachone niya , " Jaduong’ en gima ber mondo wabed ka eri . We mondo wager kiche achiel mari , achiel mar Musa to machielo mar Elija . " Ne ok ong’eyo gino mane owacho .
42009034	Kane pod owuoyo , bor polo nobiro apoya moimogi , kendo ne giluor kane bor polono noumogi .
42009035	Eka duol moro noa e bor polo , kawacho niya . " Ma e Wuoda , maseyiero ; winjeuru . "
42009036	Kane duol osewuoyo , ne giyudo ni Yesu ni kende . Jopuonjre nokano wachni e kindgi gie kindeno kuom gino mane giseneno .
42009037	Kinyne , kane gibiro gilor gia got , oganda maduong noromone
42009038	Ngat moro e dier oganda noluongo matek niya . " Japounj akwayoi , rang e wuodani , nikech en nyathina achiel kende .
42009039	Ndalo duto jachien make kendo ogoyo koko koyuak , ogoye piny koguecho oriere , kendo dhoge wuok buoyo .
42009040	Nende akwayo jopuonjre magi mondo giriembe oko , to ne ok ginyal .
42009041	Yesu nodwoko ni . " Yaye , tieng’ maonge yie kendo mobam to , nyaka karang’o ma dabed kodu kendo chandra kodu . " Kel ane wuodi ka .
42009042	Kata e kindeno mane wuowino ne biro , jachien nogoye piny mi noguecho marach . To Yesu nokwero jachien marachno mi nochango wuowino , kendo no chiwene wuon mare .
42009043	Kendo gi duto ne giwuoro duong’ mar Nyasaye , kane ji duto wuoro kuom gigo duto ma Yesu notimo , nowacho ni jopuonjrene ni .
42009044	" Chikuru itu maber ni gino madwaro nyisou : Wuod Dhano ibiro ndhogo e lwet ji . "
42009045	To ne ok giwinjo tiend wachni . Ne opandorenegi , momiyo ne ok ging’eyo tiende , kendo ne giluor penje kuom wachno .
42009046	Mbaka nowuok e kind jopuonjre ni en ng’ano kuomgi mane duong moloyo .
42009047	Kaka Yesu nong’e yo parogi , nokawo nyathi matin kendo nokete ochungo bute .
42009048	Eka nowachonegi niya , " Ng’ato ang’ata morwako nyathi matinni e nyinga orwaka to ng’ama orwakoa , orwako jal man oora . Nimar ng’at matin mogik kuomu duto en ng’ama duong’ moloyo . "
42009049	Johana nowacho niya , " Jaduong’ , ne waneno ng’ato kariembo jochiende e nyingi kendo ne watemo tame , nikech ok en achiel kodwa , "
42009050	Yesu nowacho ni . " Kik utame to " nimar ng’at maok mon kodu en jakoru . "
42009051	Kane kinde ochopo monego terego malo e polo , Yesu noketo chunye motegno mondo odhi Jerusalem .
42009052	Eka nooro joote mondo otel nyime odhi e dala jo-Samaria mondo oikne gik moko .
42009053	To ji man kanyo ne ok orwake , nikech nodhiyo Jerusalem .
42009054	Kane jopuonjre , Jakobo gi Johana ne oneno mani , ne gipenjo ni , " Ruoth idwaro ni mondo waluong mach oa e-polo obi otiekgi koso ?
42009055	To Yesu nolokore , mokwerogi ,
42009056	eka ne gidhi e dala machielo .
42009057	Kane oyudo giwuotho e yo , ng’at moro nowachone niya , " Abiro luwi kamoro amora mi idhiye . "
42009058	Yesu nodwoko niya , " Bwe nigi buchegi kendo winy map polo nigi utegi , to Wuod Dhano onge gi kama oketie wiye . "
42009059	Nowacho ni ng’at machielo ni , " Luwa . " To ng’atno nodwoko niya , " Ruoth , mokwongo yiena mondo adog ayik wuora . "
42009060	Yesu nowacho ni , " We joma otho oyik jogi motho , to in dhiyo kendo iland wach Loch Nyasaye . "
42009061	To pod ng’at machielo moro nowacho ni , " Abiro luwi , Ruoth , to mokwongo , yiena adogi mondo adhi goyo oriti ni joodwa . "
42009062	Yesu nodwoko ni , " Ng’ama osemako kwer dhok to pod ng’iyo chien ok owinjore ni tich mar Loch Nyasaye .
42010001	Bang’ mani , Ruoth noyiero ji piero abiriyo gariyo ma moko , kendo noorogi ariyo , ariyo mondo otel nyime e taonde duto kod kamoro amora mane obiro dhipe .
42010002	Nowachonegi ni , " Cham ochiek mathoth , to jotich nok kuom mano kwauru Ruodh keyo mondo oor jotich odhi e puothe mar keyo .
42010003	Dhiuru ! Aorou oko mana ka rombe e dier ondiegi .
42010004	Kik uting’ ofuk pesa , kata sandug wuoth , kata mana opato , kendo kik umos ng’ato e yo .
42010005	Ka udonjo e ot to wachuru mokuongo ni , kuwe obedi e odni . "
42010006	Ka ng’at kuwe ni kanyo to kuwe maru nobed kuome ; to ka ok kamano , to kuweuno noduognu .
42010007	Beduru e odno , ka uchamo kendo umadho gimoro amora ma gimiyou , nimar jatich owinjore gi pokne . Kik uring ka ua e ot ka ot .
42010008	Ka udonjo e taon mi orwaku to chamuru gino ma oket e nyimu .
42010009	Changuru jomatuo man kanyo kendo wachnegiuru ni , " Loch Nyasaye chiegni kodu , "
42010010	To ka udonjo e taon moro to ok orwaku , dhiuru e yoregi matindo kendo uwach ni ,
42010011	" Kata mana buch taondu momoko e tiendewa wateng’o kuomu . To beduru kung’eyo maler ni , ' Loch Piny ruoth Nyasaye chiengini . "
42010012	Awachonu ni , nobed maber berie ni Sodom maloyo taondno .
42010013	" Yaye mano kaka unune malit un jo Korazin ! Yaye , mano kaka unune malit un jo Bethsaida ! Nimar ka dine honni mutimnugi dinetim ni Turo gi Sidon to dine giselokre chon ka giruakore gi lep gugru , kendo gibet e buru .
42010014	To enobed maber berie ne Turo gi Sidon e ndalo mar ng’ado bura moloyo ne un .
42010015	To in Kapernaun bende ibiro ting’oi malo nyaka polo koso ? Ooyo , ibiro boloi piny nyaka piny joma otho .
42010016	" Ng’at ma winjou , winja , ng’at modagiu odaga , kendo ng’at modaga odagi Jal ma noora . "
42010017	Ji piero abiriyogo noduogo kod ilo mi giwacho ni , " Ruoth koda ka jochiende be winjowa e nyingi , "
42010018	Nodwoko niya ; " Ne oneno Satan kalor aa e polo mana kamil polo .
42010019	Asemiyou loch mondo unyon thuonde gi thomoni kendo ulo teko duto mag jasigu bende onge gima nohinyu .
42010020	To kik uil ni jochiende winjou , to iluru ni nyingu ondiki e polo .
42010021	E saa nogo , ka Roho Maler nomiyo Yesu opong’ gi ilo , nowacho niya , " Apakoi , Wuoro , Ruodh polo gi piny , nikech isepando gigi ne joma riek gi joma osomo , to ise fwenyogi ne nyithindo matindo . Ee , Wuoro , nimar mano e gima ne berni timo .
42010022	" Wuora osemiya gik moko duto , onge ng’ama ong’eyo Wuowi makmana Wuoro , kendo one ng’ama ong’eyo Wuoro mak mana Wuoi kaachiel gi joma wuowi oyiero mondo ofwenynegi . "
42010023	Eka nolokore ir jopuonjrene kendo nowachonegi kar kendgi ni , " Ogwedhi wenge maneno gik munenogi .
42010024	Nimar awachonu ni jonabi mang’eny kod ruodhi negombo neno gik muneno to ne ok gineno kendo winjo gik muwinjo gi to ne ok giwinjo , "
42010025	Chieng’ moro achiel , ng’at moro molony e chik nochung mondo otem Yesu nopenjo ni , " Japuonj , ang’o ma nyaka atim eka acham ngima mochwere ? "
42010026	Nodwoko ni , " ' Ang’o mondiki e chik ? Isome nade ? "
42010027	Nomedo dwoke ni , " Her Ruoth Nyasachi gi chunyi duto gi dhandi duto , gi tekoni duto kendo gi pachi duto , bende her nyawadu kaka iherori iwuon , "
42010028	Yesu nodwoke ni , " Isedwoko kare , tim kamano , eka inibed mangima . "
42010029	To kaka nodwaro pwoyore kendo nomedo penjo Yesu ni , " Nyawadwa to en ng’a ?
42010030	Koro Yesu nodwoke niya , Ng’at moro nolor koa Jerusalem kadhi Jeriko kendo nopo kopodho e lwet jomecho . Ne gi lonyo lepe , gigoye , kendo , giweye kochiegni tho .
42010031	To noyudo Jadolo moro lor loluwo , yorno , to kane oneno ng’atno , nobaro moluwo bath yo komachielo .
42010032	Kamano bende , ja-Lawi moro kane ochopo kanyo monene nokadho gi koma chielo .
42010033	To ja-Samaria moro kane ni e wuoth nochopo kama ne ng’atno nitie , kendo ka nonene , nokeche .
42010034	Nodhiyo ire motweyo adhondene kooloe mo kod divai . Eka noketo ng’atno e ng’e pundane owuon kendo notere e od buoro kendo norite maber .
42010035	Kinyne nogolo pesa mamingli mag fedha ariyo nomiyo jarit odno . Nowacho ne niya " Rite ' to ka aduogo abiro chuli nengo ma imedo ritego !
42010036	" Kuom ji adekgi ere miparo ni ne en wadgi ng’at mane opodho e lwet jome-chogo ?
42010037	Ng’at molony gi chik nodwoko ni en " Jal mane okeche . " Eka Yesu nowachone ni , " Dhi kendo itim kamano . "
42010038	Kanoyudo Yesu gi jopuonjrene nie yo , nochopo gweng’ kama dhako miluongo ni Maritha norwake e ode .
42010039	Ne en gi nyamin mane iluongo ni Mariam , mane obet piny , e tiend Ruoth kowinjo gima owacho .
42010040	To Maritha nodich gi tich mang’eny mane nyaka tim . Nodhiyo ire mopenjo ni , " Ruoth , ok idewo ni nyamera oweya atiyo mana kenda nyise mondo okonya ! "
42010041	Ruoth nodowoke ni , " Maritha , Maritha , iparori kendo ithagori kuom gik mang’eny kayiem ,
42010042	to gimoro achiel kende ema dwarore . Mariam oseyiero gima ber moloyo kendo ok nomaye ngang’ .
42011001	Chieng’ moro Yesu ne lamo kamoro . Kane otieko , achiel kuom jopuonjrene nowachone ni , " Ruoth , puonj a lamo , kaka Johana bende nopuonjo jopuonjrene . "
42011002	Nowachone " Ka ulamo to wachuru ni , " Wuonwa , nyingi mondo omi luor , pinyruok man obi .
42011003	Miwa odiechieng’ kodiechieng’ chiembwa mapile .
42011004	Wenwa richowa nimar wan bende waweyo niji duto mati-monwa marach . Kendo kik iterwa e tem . "
42011005	Eka nowachonegi ni , " Ka dipo ng’ato kuomu nigi osiepene to odhi dier otieno mi owachone ni , " Osiepna holae makati adek ,
42011006	nikech osiepna moro mane , nie wuoth osebiro lima to aonge gimoro ma anyalo keto e nyime .
42011007	Eka jal mane nie ot nodwoke ni , " We chanda . Dhoot oselor , kendo nyithinda ni koda e otande . Ok anyal chungo kendo miyi gimora amora .
42011008	Akonu ni kata obedi ni ok onyal aa malo mondo omiye makati kaka osiepne , to nikech kinde ma ng’atno obiro oa malo mi miye moromo kaka odwaro .
42011009	" Omiyo awachonu ni , " Kwauru to nomiu ; dwaruru to unuyudi kendo duong’uru to noyawnu .
42011010	Nimar ng’ato ka ng’ato makwayo imiyo , ng’ato madwaro nwang’o . kendo ng’ama duong’o , noyawne dhoot .
42011011	En ng’a kuomu , wuone , ma ka wuodi okwai rech , to imiye mana thuol ?
42011012	Kata kokwayoi tong’ gweno , imiye mana okela ?
42011013	Ka un , ma un joricho kamano , ung’eyo kaka duchiw mich mabeyo ne nyithindu , koro Wuoro manie polo biro chiwo Roho Maler maromo nade ni joma nokwaye .
42011014	Chieng’ moro Yesu neriembo jachien ma momo . Kane jachien oa , ng’atno ma momo no wuoyo , kendo oganda nohum nono .
42011015	To moko kuomgi nowacho ni , " Beelezebub ruodh jochiende , ema ogologo jochiende oko . "
42011016	Jomoko to noteme ka kwaye ranyisi moa e polo .
42011017	Yesu nong’eyo parogi mi nowacho negi ni , " Pinyruoth mora amora mopogore owuon nyaka kethre , to ot mopogore kende biro gore piny .
42011018	Ka Satan opogore owuon , ere kaka pinyruodhe nyalo chungo ? Awacho mani nikech uwacho ni ariembo jochiende oko gi teko Beelzebub .
42011019	Koro ka ariembo jochiende oko gi teko Beelzebub joma luwou to kara gologi gi teko mar ng’a ? Emomiyo , ginibed jong’adnu bura .
42011020	To ka ariembo jochiende oko gi lwet Nyasaye to kare loch Nyasaye osebironu .
42011021	Ka ng’at maratego , momanore gii lweny orito ode owuon to gige duto ritore maber .
42011022	To ka ng’at maratego moloye omonje mi oloye to omayo ng’atno gii lweny mane okete e genone , kendo oyako gige odhigo .
42011023	" Ng’at maok ni koda mon koda , kendo maok chok koda , keyo giga
42011024	" Ka jachien marach osewuok oa kuom ng’ato odhiyo kuonde motwo komanyo kar yweyo to ok oyudi . Eka owacho niya , ' Abiro dok e oda mane aweyo . '
42011025	Ka ochopo , to oyudo ka ot oywe maler kendo ochan maber .
42011026	Eka odhiyo kendo oomo jochiende abiriyo moko maricho moloyo , kendo gibiro gidak kanyo . To giko enni ngima ng’atno bedo marach moloyo , kaka nochalo mokwongo . "
42011027	Ka noyudo Yesu wacho wechegi dhako moro maneni ei ogandano nowacho matek ni , " Miyo mane onyuoli kendo odhodhi oguedhi , "
42011028	Nodwoko niya , " Jogo moguedhi gin mana joma winjo wach Nyasaye kendo time . "
42011029	Ka noyudo oganda medore , Yesu nowacho ni " Ma en tieng’ marach . Okwayo ranyisi mar honni , to onge ma ibiro miye makmana ranyisi mar Jona .
42011030	To mana kaka Jona ne en ranyisi ne jo-Nineye e kaka Wuod Dhano biro bedo ni tieng’ni .
42011031	Ruoth ma dhako mar piny milambo nochung’ chieng’ bura kaachiel gi tieng’ni kendo enong’adnegi bura , ni mar noa e tung’ piny mondo owinj rieko Solomon , to koro nitie ng’ato ka maduong’ moloyo Solomon .
42011032	Jo Nineve biro chung’ e bura kaachiel tieng’ni kendo nongadnegi bura ; nikech ka Jona ne oyalonegi to ne gilokore , to koro nitie ng’ato ka maduong’ maloyo Jona .
42011033	" Onge ng’ato mamoko taya to okete kama obiro pondoe , kata e bwo sufuria . Kar timo kamano to okete ewi rachungi taya mondo jogo madonjo one ler .
42011034	Wang’i e taya mar ringri , ka wengegi ber , ringri duto opong’ gi ler . To ka gi richo , ringri bende mudho opong’o .
42011035	Omiyo , neuru , ni ler manie iu ok en mudho .
42011036	Emomiyo , ka ringri duto opong’ gi ler , kendo ka onge mudho kuome kamora amora to obedo maler chutho , mana ka gima ler mar taya rieny kuomi , "
42011037	Kane Yesu osetieko wuoyo , Jafarisai moro norwake mondo gichiem kode , omiyo nodonjo iye kendo nobedo kodgi e mesa .
42011038	To jafarisai kanoneno ni Yesu ne ok okuongo ologo motelo ni chiemo , nowuoro .
42011039	Eka Ruoth nowachone niya , " Koro un Jafarisi ulwoko ng’e kikombe gidis to , gie chunyu to upong’ gi wuoro kod timbe maricho .
42011040	Un joma ofuwo gi ! Donge Jal mane ochueyo ng’e gik moko , ema nochueyo koda igi bende ?
42011041	To chiwuru gima nie idis ne joma odhier , eka gik moko duto biro bedunu maler .
42011042	Chandruok ochomou un Jo-Farisai , nikech uchiwo ni Nyasaye mich mar achiel kuom apar mar apoth gi odielo , kod alode mamoko mag puodho , to ujwang’o ng’ado bura kare kod hero Nyasaye . Owinjore utim gik machien-go , ka ok uweyo mak utimo mokwongogo .
42011043	" Chandruok ochomou un Jo-Farisai , nikech uhero kombe madongo moloyo e sunagoke kod mos e chirni .
42011044	" Chandruok ochomou nikech uchalo gi liete moumore ma ji wuotho kuomgi ka ok ging’eyo .
42011045	Achiel kuom jal molony e chik nodwoke ni , " Japuonj , ka iwuoyo kamano wan bende iyanyowa .
42011046	Yesu nodwoko ni " Un joma olony e chik , bende chandruok ochomou nikech umiyoji ting’ mapek maok ting’o yot ngang’ , to un uwegi ok unyal konyogi ting’ogi kata mana gi lith lwetu .
42011047	" Chandruok ochomou , nikech ugero , kendo umwono liete jonabi , to kwereu ema nonegogi .
42011048	Omiyo ka utimo kamano to koro unyiso ni uyie gi gima kwereu notimo , ma neginegogo jonabi , to un to koro umwono lietegi .
42011049	Kuom mano Nyasaye e riekone nowacho ni , " Abiro oronegi jonabi gi joote , kendo moko kuomgi negi to moko ginisandi !
42011050	Emomiyo ibiro keto remb jonabi mosechuer duto e wi tieng’ni nyaka aa remb jonabi mosechwer aa chakruok piny .
42011051	Chakre remb Habil nyaka remb Zakaria , mane onegi e kind kendo mar misango kod kama ler . Ee awachonu ni tieng’ni ibiro kumo nikech mago duto .
42011052	" Chandruok ochomou un joma olony e chik , nikech usemayo ji kifungu mar rieko . Un uwegi pok udonjo kendo joma donjo be usegeng’onegi .
42011053	Ka Yesu noa kanyo , jo-Farisai gi Jopuonj Chik nochako kwede gi gero kendo ne gichande gi penjo mang’eny .
42011054	Ka girito mondo gimake gimoro amora mane onyalo wacho .
42012001	E kindeno , kane oganda mar ji w mang’eny moromo alufe ne osechokore , makoro ginyonore giwegi Yesu nochako wuoyo mokwongo , gi jopuonjrene kowacho niya , " Ritreuru ka utang’ ni thowi mar jo-Farisai , ma en wuondruok .
42012002	Onge gimoro mopandi maok bi fwenyore , kata maling’ling’ ma ok nong’ere .
42012003	Gima usewacho e mudho biro winjore e odichieng’ e lela , kendo gima usekwodho eitu ei ot maiye nolandi e wi tat ot .
42012004	Awachonu osiepna , kik uluor jogo manego ringruok to bang’e ok ginyal timo gimoro moloyo .
42012005	To abiro nyisou jalo monego uluor : Luoruru jalno ma , bang’ nego ringruok , to en gi teko mar witou e ataro mar mach . Ee , awachonu , luoreuru .
42012006	Oyundi abich donge ing’iewo otonglo ariyo kende ? To kata acheiel kuomgi wi Nyasaye ok wilgo .
42012007	Chutho , kata mana yie wiu duto okwan . Kik uluor , nikech uloyo oyundi mang’eny .
42012008	" Awachonu , ng’ato ang’ata mahula e nyim ji , Wuod Dhano biro hule e nyim malaike mag Nyasaye .
42012009	To ng’ato ang’ata mokweda e nyim ji en bende nokwede e nyim malaike mag Nyasaye .
42012010	Kendo ng’at ang’ata mowacho wach marach kuom Wuoud Dhano nowene , to ng’at mowach wach mar achaye kuom Roho Maler ok nowene .
42012011	" Kokelu e sunagogi , e nyim jodongo gi jotelo , to kik uparru kuom kaka dud-wok weche ma odonjnugo , kata gima duwachi ,
42012012	nikech Roho Maler biro puonjou e sano gima onego uwach .
42012013	Ng’at moro mane ni ei oganda nowachone ni , " Japuonj nyis owadwa mondo opogna gikeniwa .
42012014	Yesu noduoko ni , " Omera ng’ama oketa jang’ad bura kata jathek e kindu ? "
42012015	Eka nowacho nigi ni , " Ritreuru ! Beduru motang’ ni kit wuoro duto ; ngima mar dhano ok bedi ni mwandu mathoth ma en-go .
42012016	Kendo nowachonigi ngero ni : puodh ng’at moro ma jamoko nochiek maber .
42012017	Noparo e chunye ni , ' Ang’o monego atim ? Aonge kama dakanie chamba . '
42012018	" Mi nowacho , ' Ma e gima abiro timo . Abiro muko dechena kendo gero moko madongo , kendo abiro kano chamba duto gi gigega kanyo .
42012019	Eka anawach gie chunya ni " In-gi gigi mang’eny maber misekano moromi kuom higni mang’eny . Koro ywe , chiem , methi kendo bed mamor .
42012020	" To Nyasaye nowachone ni , ' In ng’ama ofuwoni ! Kawuono gotieno ni ang’ nokaw ngimani . Eka ng’ano mabiro kawo mago mise loso ni in iwuon ? '
42012021	" Mano e kaka nobed gi ng’ato ang’ata mokano gik moko ni en owuon to ok omew e yor Nyasaye .
42012022	Eka Yesu nowacho ni Jopuonjrene , " Emomiyo awachonu ni kik uparru kuom ngimau , kuom gima ubiro chamo , kata kuom dendu , kuom gima durwak .
42012023	Ngima duong’ moloyo chiemo , dendi bende loyo lewni .
42012024	Paruru ane winy : Maok chwo bende ok gi kee , gionge gi kuonde keno kata dere ; to Nyasaye pidhogi . To un donge uber moloyo winy .
42012025	To ng’ano kuomu manyalo medo saa achiel e ngimane nikech oparorore ?
42012026	To kaka ok unyal timo mani matinni ang’o momiyo uparori kuom gik mamoko ?
42012027	Paruru ane kaka odanyo dongo . Ok giti kata chwecho . To kata kamano awachonu ni kata mana Solomon e rwakruokne malich ok rom kodgi .
42012028	Ka kamano e kaka Nyasaye rwako lum man e pap , ma kawuono en tie to kiny iwite e mach , to koro un dorwaku , machal nade , yaye un mangi yie matin .
42012029	Kendo kik uket chunyu kuom gima dicham kata madi madhi , kik uparru kuom mago .
42012030	Nikech joma ok oyie man e piny ringo kalawo gik ma kamago , Wuonu ong’eyo ni uchando gigo .
42012031	To dwaruru piny ruodhe , eka magi bende biro medorenu .
42012032	Kik uluor un kweth matin , nikech Wuonu mor mar miyou piny ruoth .
42012033	Lok gigi iyudgo pesa mondo imi joma odhier . Dwaruru okepe maok yiechi , mwandu manie polo maok rum kuma jakuo ok chopie kata olwende ok keth .
42012034	Nikech kama mwanduni nitie ema chunyi bende nitie . Rito
42012035	" Rwakreuru kendo ikreuru ni tich bende techeu obed ka liel ,
42012036	ka joma rito ruodhgi maduogo koa e nyasi mar arus , mondo kobiro kendo oduong’o to giya-wone dhoot piyo .
42012037	Nobed maber ni jotich ma ruodhgi noyud karito e kinde moduogo . Awachonu adiera ni norwakre gi lawe mondo omigi chiemo , nomi gibed e mesa mi nobi mopognigi chiemo .
42012038	Nobed maber ni jotije ma ruodhgi noyud ka oikore kata ka obiro e arita mar ariyo kata mar adek gotieno .
42012039	To ng’euru ma maber ni kadine wuon ot ng’e saa ma jakuo biroe to dine ok oweyo ode otur gi jakuo .
42012040	Omiyo nyaka uikru , nikech Wuod Dhano biro biro saa ma ok ung’eyo . "
42012041	Petro nopenje , " Ruoth iwacho ngeroni ni wan koso niji duto ? "
42012042	To Ruoth noduoko , " En ng’a maja adier kendo maj atelo mariek ma ruodhe miyo tich mar rito jotije miyogi chiembgi e saa mowinjore ?
42012043	Jatrjno none ber ka ruodhe oduogo moyude ka otimo kamano .
42012044	Awachonu adieri ni nokete mondo orit mwandune duto .
42012045	To ka jatich owacho e chunye owuon ni , ' Ruodha , okawo ndalo mathoth kapok oduogo ' , mi ochako goyo jotich machuo gi mon kendo ochako chiemo kendo gi metho , kod mer .
42012046	Ruodh jatijno nobi e odiechieng’ maok opar ni dobie kendo e saa maok ong’eyo , obiro ng’ade matindo tindo mi nokete gi joma ok oyie .
42012047	Jatijno mong’eyo dwaro mar ruodhe to ok otem timo gima ruodhe dwaro nochwad mang’eny .
42012048	To mano maok ong’eyo to otimo gik mowinjore gi kum , to nochwad manok . Ng’ato ka ng’ato mose mi mang’eny nodwar kuome gik mang’eny , to jal mose mi mang’eny mondo oriti , enopenje mang’eny moloyo .
42012049	" Asebiro mondo amok mach e-piny to mano kaka agombo ni mad ne bed ni osemoke !
42012050	Nitie batiso monego ayudi . To mano kaka chunya chandore nyaka chop otimre !
42012051	Uparo ni ne abiro mondo akel kuwe e piny ? Ooyo to awachonu ni ne akelo mana pogruok .
42012052	Chakre kawuono kadhi nyime ji abich ma joot achiel biro pogore , ji adek odok kon achiel to ji ariyo bende ni koma chielo .
42012053	Gibiro pogore , wuoro pogore gi wuode kendo wuowi bende pogore gi wuon , miyo nopogre gi nyare to nyako bende nopogre gi min , dayo nopogre gi chi wuode , chi wuowi bende nopogre gi damare .
42012054	Nowacho ni oganda ni " Kuneno ka boche polo chokore yo podho chieng’ to piyo piyo uwacho ni koth biro chwe , to timore kamano !
42012055	Kendo ka yamb milambo kudho to uwacho ni oro biro to kamano e kaka timore .
42012056	Andhokegi ! Ka ulony kuom rango chai mar piny gi polo to ang’o momiyo ok unyal ng’eyo gik matimore ndalogi ?
42012057	Nikech ang’o ok unyal ng’eyo ngima kare ?
42012058	Ka idhi gi ng’ama odonjoni e nyim jang’ad bura , tem matek mondo iwuo kode kendo uwinjru kapod un eyo , ka ok kamano to obiro ywayi koteri ir jang’ad bura , to jang’ad bura biro keti e lwet askari to askari biro boli e jela .
42012059	Awachoni ni ok niwuog oko nyaka ichul pesa duto .
42013001	Koro ne nitie jomoko mane nitie e kindeno mane owacho ni Yesu wach kuom Jo-Galili ma rembgi Pilato noruwo gi misenginigi .
42013002	Yesu nodwoko ni , " Uparo ni Jo Galili-gi ne joricho moloyo Jo-Galili mamoko nikech negisandore kamano ?
42013003	Awachonu ni , " Ooyo ! To ka ok ulokoru uweyo richou , un bende duto unu tho kamano .
42013004	Kata japar gaboro ka manotho kane ohinga e Silaom nopodho kuomgi-uparo ni negin joketho moloyo ji mamoko duto madak e Jerusalem ?
42013005	Awachonu ni , Ooyo ! To ka ok ulokoru uweyo richou un bende ubiro manatho . "
42013006	Eka nogoyo ngeroni ni , " Ng’at moro ne nigi yadh ng’owo mopidho e puothe , to nodhiyo mondo orang olemo kuome , to ok noyudo mora amora .
42013007	Omiyo nowacho ni ng’at mane rito puodho ni , " Kuom higni adek asebedo kabiro kae kadwaro olemo e ng’owoni to ok aseyudo moro amora . Ng’ole igoye piny . Ere gima dimi ocham lowo ? "
42013008	Ng’atno nodwoke ni , " Jaduong’ , yie iweye higani kende bang’e to abiro pure kendo medo ketone owuoyo .
42013009	Ka onyago olemo higa mabiro , manober , to , ka ok onyago , to nong’ole oko . "
42013010	Chieng’ Sabato moro Yesu ne puonjo e achiel kuom sunagoke ,
42013011	to dhako moro ne nikanyo mane jachien osemiyo obedo mongol kuom higini apar gaboro . Midekre nodole maok nonyal riere tir kata matin .
42013012	Kane Yesu onene , noluonge obi nyime kendo nowachone ni , " Dhako ogonyi ibed thuolo ichangi e midekreni . "
42013013	Eka noketo lwetene kuome , to gikanyono noriere tir kendo nopako Nyasaye .
42013014	Jaduong’ od lemo , mirima nomako nikech Yesu nochango dhakono chieng’ Sabato , nowacho niji niya , " Nitie ndalo auchiel mitiyoe . Omiyo biuru mondo ochangu e ndalogo , to ok chieng’ Sabato . "
42013015	Ruoth nodwoke ni , " Un joma wuondore ! Donge ng’ato ka ng’ato kuomu gonyo rwadhe kata pundane e kul kotere oko mondo omiye pi ?
42013016	Koro dhakoni , ma nyakwar Ibrahim , ma Satan oseketo kotweyo higini apar gaborogi mabor kama donge ber kogmye obed thuolo chieng’ Sabato oa e gima notweye ? "
42013017	Kane owacho mani , jogo duto mane pinge wigi nokuot . To ji mamoko nomor kod gik moko duto miwuoro mane otimo .
42013018	Eka Yesu nopenjo , niya , " Ere kaka loch pinyruodh Nyasaye chalo ? Ang’o madapimego ?
42013019	Ochalo kod koth karadali , ma ng’ato nokawo kendo opidho e puothe . Nodongo mobed yien , to winy mag polo nogedo e bedene . "
42013020	Nopenjo kendo ni , " Ang’o ma dapimgo loch pinyruodh polo mar Nyasaye ? Ochalo thowi ma dhako
42013021	kawo kendo oruwo ei mogo mang’eny , mi bang’e okuot .
42013022	Eka Yesu nodhiyo e taonde kod gwenge kopuonjo ji ka odhiyo Jerusalem .
42013023	Ng’ato moro nopenjo niya , " Ruoth , en mana ji manok emabiro kwo ? " Nowacho nigi
42013024	" niya Temuru matek mondo udonj e dhoot madiny , nikech awachonu ni , ji mang’eny biro temo mondo odonj to ok gibi nyalo ngang’ .
42013025	Ka wuon ot nochung’ kendo lor dhoot ubiro chungo oko ka uduong’o kendo sayo ni , ' Jaduong’ , yawnwa dhoot . " To obiro dwokou ni , ' Ok ang’eyou kata kuma uae akia ! '
42013026	" Eka ubiro wacho ni , " Ne wachiemo kendo metho kodi , bende ne ipuonjoe yorewa matindo . '
42013027	" To obiro dwoko ni , ' Ok ang’eyou , kata kuma uae akia . Ayeuru kuoma un jomatimo maricho ! "
42013028	" Ywagruok biro bedo kanyono , kod muodo lak , ka uneno Ibrahim , Isaka gi Jakobo gi jonabi duto manie Pinyruoth Nyasaye to un uwegi nowitu oko .
42013029	Ji , biro biro koa yo wuok chieng’ kod yo podho chieng’ , gi nyadwat kod milambo , kendo gi bed e keregi e kar nyasi mar chiemo e Pinyruoth Nyasaye .
42013030	Adiera chutho nitie jomoko makoro nichien mabiro telo , to jomotelo mabiro dong’ chien . "
42013031	Gi e kindeno Jofarisai moko nobiro ir Yesu kendo nowachone ni , " Ai ka kendo dhiyo kamachielo nikech Herode dwaro negoi . "
42013032	Nodwoko ni , " Dhiuru uwachne kib-weno , ' Abiro golo jochiende kendo chango ji kawuononi gi kiny , to chieng’ mar adek abiro chopo dwarona .
42013033	To kata kamano nyaka adhi nyime kawuononi , gi kiny kod orucha nikech adiera onge , janabi ma nyalo tho oko mar Jerusalem !
42013034	" Yaye , Jerusalem , Jerusalem , biro nego jonabi kendo chielo gi kite jogo moor iri , didi , masedwaroe mondo achok nyithindi kaachiel , mana kaka gweno choko nyithinde e bwombe , to ok useyie .
42013035	Ne , odi odong’ gunda . Awachoni , ok ini-nena kendo nyaka iniwach ni , " Ogwedh ng’ama biro e nying Ruoth . ' "
42014001	a Chieng’ Sabato moro , kane Yssu JO odhiyo chiemo e od Jafarisai marahuma moro , nobedo ka ne ing’iye ahinya .
42014002	To e nyime kanyo netie ng’ato mane mbunda ohingo .
42014003	Yesu nopenjo Ja-Farsai kod jomolony e chik ni , " En gima owinjore gi chik mondo ochang ng’ato chieng’ Sabato koso ?
42014004	To ne giling’ thi . Eka nokawo ng’atno , nochange kendo noweye odhi .
42014005	Eka nopenjogi ni , " Ka ng’ato kuomu nigi wuode kata rwadhe mopodho e soko chieng’ Sabato , donge diywaye igole oko mana gikanyono ?
42014006	To negionge gima digiwachi .
42014007	Kane oneno kaka welo yiero kuondegi mag bet moyiedhi , e kar mesa , nogoyo nigi ngeroni ni ,
42014008	" Ka ng’ato oluongou e nyasi mar kisera to kik ibed e kom moyiedhi , nimar dipo ka ng’ato moro mogen moloyoi oluongi bende .
42014009	Eka ka ng’ama oluongou ji ariyogi ka obiro mowachoni ni , ' Mi jali komi . ' Kamano eka wiyi nokuodi nyaka inidhi ikaw kom kar bet man chien moloyo .
42014010	To ka oluongi e nyasi moro mar kisera kamoro to bed mana e kom man chien moloyo , mondo ka ng’at moluongino obiro to obiro wachoni ni , ' Osiepa , sudi malo nyime kama berni ! Kamano iniyud luor e nyim welo weti-ni duto . "
42014011	Nimar ng’ato ang’ata mating’ore malo nodwok piny , to jalo madwokore piny noting’ malo . "
42014012	Eka Yesu nowacho ni ng’at mane oluongeno ni , " Ka ichiwo chiemb odiechieng’ kata chiemb otieno , kik iluong mana osiepeni , oweteni kata wedeni , kata jogweng’u momew , nimar ka itimo kamano , kamoro giniluongi chieng’ moro , mi gichuli kar luong mane iluongigmo .
42014013	To ka iloso nyasi , iluong joma odhier , rang’onde gi pudhe kod muofni ,
42014014	eka ibiro gwedhoi kata obedo ni ok ginyal chuloi , to nochuli chieng’ chier mar jomakare . "
42014015	Ka achiel kuom jogo mane ni kode e mesa nowinjo ma , nowacho ni Yesu ni , " Ogwedhi ng’atono mabiro chiemo e nyasi mar Pinyruoth Nyasaye . "
42014016	Yesu nodwoke ni , " Ng’at moro ne oloso nyasi maduong’ kendo noluongo welo mang’eny .
42014017	Gi e kindeno mar nyasi nooro jotichne mondo onyisi jogo mane oluongi , ' Biuru , nikech gik moko duto koro oseikore .
42014018	" To giduto machalre ne gichako wacho weche ma ginyisogo wuon nyasi gimomiyo ok ginyal biro . Jal mokwongo nowacho ni , ' Koro eka aseng’iewo puodho moro , to nyaka adhi mondo anene . Yie ing’wonna .
42014019	Jal machielo nowacho ni , " Koro eka ang’iewo joge abich mag rweth pur , to adhiyo mondo atemgi , yie mondo ing’wonna .
42014020	Jal machielo pod nowacho bende ni , ' Eka aa fendo , omiyo ok anyal biro . '
42014021	" Jatich nodwogo kendo nowacho kamano ni ruodhe . Eka wuon ot nobedo mager kendo nowacho ni jatichne niya , Wuogi idhi mapiyo e yore matindo kod e kuonde mopondo mag taon mondo ikel joma odhier gi rang’onde , muofni kod pudhe . '
42014022	Jatich nowacho ni , ' Jaduong’ gima nende ichokowa osetim , to pod thuolo nitie . '
42014023	" Eka jaduong’ nowacho ni jatichne ni , ' Wuogi idhiyo oko e yore madongo kod yore mag gweng’ kendo ikel gibi gidonji , mondo oda opong’ .
42014024	Awachonu ni , onge kata ng’ato achiel kuom jogo mane oluongi manobil chiemba . ' "
42014025	Ka ji mang’eny ne wuotho kod Yesu , eka nolokore irgi mowachonigi niya :
42014026	" Ka ng’ato obiro ira , to ok okwedo wuon gi min kod chiege gi nyithinde , owete gi nyiminene ee , kata ngimane owuon-ok onyal bedo japuonjrena .
42014027	To ng’ato maok oting’o msalape owuon mi oluwa ok onyal bedo japuonj rena .
42014028	" Ka dibed ni achiel kuomu dwaro gero ohinga . Donge obiro bedo piny mokwongo mondo okwan nengone mondo one ka en gi pesa moromo mar tieke ?
42014029	Nimar ka oketo mise to ok onyal tieke , ji duto manene biro nyiere ,
42014030	ka giwacho ni , " Jali nochako gedo to ok onyal tieko . "
42014031	" Kata ka dibed ni ruoth moro dwaro dhiyo e lweny e kinde gi ruoth machielo . Donge mokwongo dobed piny mondo opar anena ka ji alufu apar ma en-go bende onyalo kedogo gi jal mabiro monje mangi ji alufu piero ariyo ?
42014032	Ka ok donyal , to obiro oro joote ka pod jal machielo pod ni kuma bor , mondo onyise ni odwaro mondo giwinjre e yor kuwe .
42014033	Machalre kamano bende , ng’ato kuomu maok oweyo gige duto ok onyal bedo japuonj rena .
42014034	" Chumbi ber , to ka ndhathe orumo , ere kaka dimiye obed gi ndhadhu kendo ?
42014035	Ok owinjore ne tich lowo kata mana pidh owuoyo , omiyo ipuke oko . " Ng’at man gi it mar winjo , mondo owinji . "
42015001	Koro josol osuru gi " joricho " nochokore machiegni mondo giwinje .
42015002	To jo-Farisai gi Jopuonj Chik neng’ur kawacho ni , " Ng’atni rwako joricho kendo ochiemo kodgi . "
42015003	Eka Yesu nogoyo nigi ngero ni :
42015004	" Ka ng’ato kuomu dibedi ni nigi rombe mia achiel , to oialo achiel kuomgi . Donge dowe piero ochiko gochiko e pap kama ler kendo odhi omany rombo molal nyaka oyude ?
42015005	To ka oyude , okete e goke lomor .
42015006	kendo odhiyo dala . Eka oluongo osiepene gi jogweng’gi kaachiel , kowacho ni , " Moruru koda , Aseyudo nyarombona mayandi olal .
42015007	Awachonu ni kamano e kaka mor nobedi e polo kuom jaricho achiel mololore , moloyo mor kuom ji piero ochiko gochiko mabeyo maok dwar lokruok .
42015008	" Kata ka dibed ni nitie dhako mangi silinge mamingli apar , to achiel olalne . Donge domok taya , kendo yweyo ot to omany maber ahinya mondo oyude ?
42015009	To ka oyude , oluongo osiepene gi jogweng’gi kaachiel , kowacho ni , ' Moruru koda , aseyudo pesana manolal . '
42015010	Mana kamano , awachonu e kaka mor e nyim malaika mag Nyasaye nobedie kuom jaricho achiel molokore . "
42015011	Yesu nomedo wacho niya , " Ne nitie ng’ato moro mane nigi yawuowi ariyo .
42015012	Wuowi machogo nowacho ni wuon mare ni , ' Wuora , pogna mwanduna ma mara , kuom mano nopogo yawuote ariyogo mwandune .
42015013	" Bang’ ndalo manok ne mano , wuowi machogo nokawo gige duto , eka nowuok modhiyo e piny mabor to kuro notiyo gi mwandune e yor dak e ngima mar anjawo .
42015014	Kane osetieko gik moko duto , kech mager nowuok e pinyno duto , eka nochako bedo gi chando .
42015015	Eka nodhiyo kochiwore owuon mondo oti ni japinyno , mane oore e lawe mondo opidh ne ngurue .
42015016	Nogombo mondo ocham opong’go iye opokla ma ngurue chamo , to bende onge ng’ato mane omiye gimoro .
42015017	" Kane parone oduogme , nowacho niya , ' Gin ji adi mondiki mag wuora mangi chiemo moromogi , madong’ . To an ka eri kech chama mar tho !
42015018	Abiro wuok kendo adog ir wuora mi anawache ni : Wuora , asetimo richo e nyim polo kendo e nyimi .
42015019	Ok awinjora koro oluonga ni wuodi ; keta abed kaka achiel kuom jotichni .
42015020	Omiyo noa malo kendo nodhiyo ir wuon mare . " To kane pod en kuma bor , wuon mare nonene kendo kopong’ gi kech kuome , noringo kodhiyo ir wuode , nokwake gi bade kendo nonyodhe .
42015021	" Wuowino nowachone niya , Wuora , asetimo richo e nyim polo kendo e nyimi . Ok awinjora koro mondo oluonga ni wuodi . '
42015022	" To wuon mare nowacho ni jotichne niya , ' Piyo piyo , keluru law maberie moloyo mondo urwakne . Ketneuru tere e lith lwete kendo wuoche mondo urwakne e tiendene .
42015023	Keluru nyarwath machwe uyang’ . Wachamuru wabed mamor .
42015024	Nikech wuodani yande otho , to koro onwang’e . ' Kamano negichako timo nyasi ka gimor .
42015025	" E kindeno , noyudo ka wuowi maduong’ nie puodho . Kane obiro machiegni gi ot nowinjo wer gi miel .
42015026	Omiyo noluongo achiel kuom jotich kendo nopenje ni en ang’o matimore .
42015027	Nodwoke ni , ' Owadu oseduogo , to wuoru osenego nyarwath machwe nikech oseduogo kongima kendo maber . '
42015028	" To wuowi maduong’ mirima nomako , kendo notamore donjo e ot . Omiyo wuon mare nowuok oko odhiyo ire kendo nosaye mondo odonji .
42015029	To nodwoko wuon mare niya , ' Neye , higini gi duto asebedo katiyoni ka misumba kendo aserito katimo chikeni . To eka pok imiyoa kata mana nyadiel mondo ayang’ , abedgo mamor kod osiepena . '
42015030	To ka wuodi ni , moseketho gigegi gi mon ma jochode ka obiro dala , to inegone nyarwath machwe ! '
42015031	" Wuon mare nowacho niya , ' Wuoda , in koda ndalo duto , kendo gik moko duto ma ango ' gin magi .
42015032	To nyaka ne wabed mamor kendo bed moil , nikech owaduni yande otho to koro ongima , kendo yande olal to koro oyude ! '
42016001	Yesu nowacho ne Jopuonjrene D niya . " Ne nitie jamoko moro , ma ng’at mane rito mwandune ne odonjne ni ketho gige .
42016002	Omiyo noluonge ire kendo nopenje ni , ' En ang’o mawinjo kuomi ni ? Chiw ane kwan kuom gigo duto mirito , nikech ok inyal bedo jarit giga kendo ngang’ ! '
42016003	" Jarit nowachone en owuon ni , Abiro timo ang’o koro ? Ruodha koro maya tija . Ok an ratego moromo ma dapur , to wiya kuot mondo akwechi .
42016004	Ang’eyo gima abiro timo , ma ka aweyo tich ka to ji biro rwakae utegi '
42016005	" Omiyo noluongo jogope ruodhe achiel achiel . Nopenjo mokwongo ni , ' In-gi gop ruodha maromo nadi ?
42016006	" Nodwoke ni , ' Galande mia aboro mag mo . Jarit tich nowachone ni , ' Bed piny piyo piyo , ikaw kitapi indikie ni , mia ang’wen . '
42016007	" Eka nopenjo jal mar ariyo ni , ' In to , gopi oromo adi ? ' Nodwoke ni , ' Gunde alufu mag ngano . ' " Nowachone ni , ' Kaw kitapini , indike ni mia aboro . '
42016008	" Ruoth nopako Jarit gige maok kareno nikech notiyo gi rieke . Nimar jopinyni ong’eyo tiyo mariek gi jowadgi moloyo jogo mag chieng’ .
42016009	Awachonu ni , tiuru gi mwandu mag piny mondo umak-go osiepe ne un uwegi , mondo ka orumo , norwaku e kar dak manyaka chieng’ .
42016010	" Ng’at minyalo geno gima tin inyal gene bende gi gik mang’eny ma to ngat ma ok jadiera gi gima tin bende ok nyal gadiera gi gik mang’eny .
42016011	Emomiyo ka ok usebedo joadiera e tiyo gi mwandu mar pinyni , ngano mabiro genou gi mwandu madier ?
42016012	To ka ok usebedo joadiera gi mwandu ng’at machielo , ng’ano madimiu mwandu ma maru-uwegi ?
42016013	" Onge jatich manyalo tiyo ni ruodhi ariyo . Nimar obiro sin gi achiel to ohero machielo , kata obiro chiwore ni achiel to ochayo machielo . Ok inyal tiyo ni Nyasaye kendo ni Pesa . "
42016014	Jo-Farisai mane ohero pesa nowinjo magi duto kendo neginyiero kagijaro Yesu .
42016015	Nowachonigi ni , " Un ema uke-toru kare uwegi e wang’ ji , to Nyasaye ong’eyo chunyu . Gima okaw ni ber ahinya gi ji , kuom Nyasaye en gima ichayo .
42016016	" Chik kod Jonabi nolandi nyaka chop ndalo mar Johana . Chakre kanyo , wach maber mar Pinyruodh Nyasaye osebedo kilando , kendo ng’ato ka ng’ato riyore mondo odonjie .
42016017	To yot mondo polo gi piny orum , moloyo ka nukta achiel matinie moloyo mar chik ok lal .
42016018	" Ng’ato moriembo chiege kendo okendo dhako machielo , otimo tim chode , to ng’at mokendo dhako ma chwore oriembo , to en bende otimo tim chode .
42016019	" Ne nitie jamoko moro mane rwako lewni mokikore kendo mareprep mabeyo ma nengogi tek , kendo nodak e ngima mamalo mar mor ndalo duto .
42016020	E dho-rangaye noketie jakwecho miluongmi Lazaro , ma adhonde nopong’o dende
42016021	kendo nogombo chamo ng’injo molwar e bwo mesa jamolono . Kata mana guogi bende nobiro minang’ adhondege .
42016022	" Saa nochopo ma jakwecho notho kendo malaika noting’e , otere e bath Ibrahim . Jamoko bende notho kendo noike .
42016023	Kane en e Piny Joma otho kisande malit , nong’yo malo to noneno Ibrahim gi kuma mabor kod Lazaro e bathe .
42016024	Omiyo noluonge kowacho niya , Wuora Ibrahim kecha kendo or Lazaro olut lith lwete e pi mondo okwena lewa , nikech an-gi rem malit e ligegani . '
42016025	" To Ibrahim nodwwoke ni , Wuoda , parie ni e ndalo mar ngimani ne iyudo gik mabeyo , ka Lazaro to ne yudo gik maricho , to koroni oneno maber ka eri , to in inie rem malit .
42016026	To bende moloyo ne mano duto , e kindwa kodi nitie hoho mang’ongo moseketi , mondo otam jogo madwaro aa ka obi iru kata ng’ato ok nyal ng’ado oa koru obi irwa koni .
42016027	" Nodwoko ni , ' Koro akwayoi , wuora , or Lazaro odhi od wuora ,
42016028	nimar an-gi owetena abich . Odhiyo osiemgi , mondo kik gin bende gibi e kar sand malitni . '
42016029	" Ibrahim nodwoke ni , ' Gin kod Musa gi Jonabi , owinjore gi winjgi . '
42016030	" Nowacho ni , ' Ooyo wuonwa Ibrahim , to ka ng’ato oa kuom joma otho modhi ir gi , ginyalo lokore . '
42016031	" Nowachone ni , ' Ka ok ginyal winjo Musa gi Jonabi , ok ginyal yie winjo kata ng’ato chier aa kuom joma otho . ' "
42017001	Yesu nowacho ni jopuonjrene niya , " Gik mamiyo ji timo richo ochunore ni nyaka bedie , to okuong’ jalo makelo gigo .
42017002	Da obedo maber ka otwene pong’ e ng’ute , mi onyumego e nam moloyo komiyo achiel kuom jomatindogi otim richo .
42017003	Omiyo ritreuru uwegi , " Ka owadu otimo richo , kwere , to ka olokore , wene .
42017004	Ka otimoni richo nyadibiriyo odiechieng’ achiel to obiro iri nyadibiriyo kendo owacho ni , ' Alokora , wene . '
42017005	Joote nowacho ni Ruoth niya , " Med yiewa . "
42017006	Nodwoko ni , " Ka un gi yie matinie kaka koth karadali , unyalo wacho ni yadh ng’owoni ni pudhri i mondo ipithri e nam ' to da owinjou motimo kamano .
42017007	" Ka dibed ni nitie achiel kuomu mangi jatich mapurone kata makwayo rombe . Dowachne jatichne koa e puodho ni , " Bi koroni kendo ibed piny mondo ichiem ?
42017008	Donge dowachne mana ni , losna chiemba mar otieno , ikri mondo imiya acham kendo madho , eka bang’e inyalo chiemo kendo metho ?
42017009	Dogo ni jatichneno erokamano nikech notimo gima nowachone notim ?
42017010	Omiyo un bende , ka usetimo gik moko duto maneonyisu mondo utim , onego uwach ni , wan mana jotich aticha ma ok owinjore wasetimo mana tichwa . "
42017011	Koro e yo kane odhiyo Jerusalem , Yesu nowuotho e kind Samaria gi Galili .
42017012	Ka noyudo odonjo e dala moro , ji apar mangi dhoho noromo kode . Negichungo mabor
42017013	kendo negiluongo gi duol maduong’ ni , " Yesu , Ruoth ! Kechwa ! "
42017014	Ka nonenogi , nowacho niya , " Dhiuru , unyisru uwegi ni jodolo . " To kane gidhi , negipuodhore .
42017015	Achiel kuomgi , kane oneno ni osechange , nodok ir Yesu , kopako Nyasaye gi duol maduong’ .
42017016	Nogore piny e tiend Yesu kendo nogoyone erokamano-to ne en ja Samaria .
42017017	Yesu nopenjo ni , " Donge ji apar duto nopuodhi ? Ere ji ochiko mamoko ?
42017018	Onge ng’ato madineyudre kuomgi monego duogi mondo omi Nyasaye pak , mana japiny moro nononi kendo ema oduogo ?
42017019	Eka nowachone niya , " Chungi kendo idhi , yieni osemiyo ibedo mangima . "
42017020	Chieng’ moro , kane openje gi jo-Farisai kinde ma pinyruodh Nyasaye nobiye , Yesu nodwokogi ni , " Pinyruodh Nyasaye ok bi mana kaka uparoe ka uneno ,
42017021	kata ji ok no wach ni , Eri go , kata ni , Ee cha go cha , nikech pinyruodh Nyasaye nie eiu . "
42017022	Eka nowacho ni jopuonjre ni , " Ndalo biro ma unugomb nenoe chieng’ achiel kuom ndalo mag Wuod Dhano , to ok ununene .
42017023	Ji biro wachonu ni , En kucha ! Kata ni , En ka , kik uring udhi bang’gi .
42017024	Nikech ndalo mar Wuod Dhano nobed machalo ka mil polo ma piatore e kor polo koa konchiel nyaka komacheilo .
42017025	To mokwongo nyaka one masiche mang’eny , kendo tieng’ni nodage .
42017026	" Mana kaka ne en e ndalo mag Nowa , e kaka biro bedo bende e ndalo mag Wuod Dhano .
42017027	Ji ne chiemo kendo metho , chwo ne kendo bende nyiri ne ikendo nyaka nochopo chieng’ ma Nowa nodonjo e yie . Eka pi mar ataro nobiro motieko ji duto .
42017028	" Kamano e kaka nechalre e ndalo mag Lut , ji ne chiemo , kendo metho , ne gingiewo kendo negiloko ohala , bende negipitho kendo gedo .
42017029	To chieng’ mane Lut oa Sodom , mach kod kite maliel mager nolwar koa e polo kendo notiekogi duto .
42017030	" Kamano kaka obiro bedo e ndalo ma Wuod Dhano nofwenyre .
42017031	Odiechieng’no onge ng’ato manobedie e wi tat ot , mangi gige ei ot , manolor mondo ogolgi . Machalre gi mano , onge ng’ato manie puodho man-odog dala ne gi moro amora .
42017032	Paruru chi Lut !
42017033	Ng’ato materno reso ngimane , ngimane biro lame , to ng’atno ma ojwang’o ngimane , nores ngimane .
42017034	Awachonu ni , otienono ji ariyo nobed e otanda achiel : achiel ibiro kawo to machielo nowe .
42017035	Mon ariyo biro bedo karego cham kaachiel , achiel nokaw , to machielo nowe .
42017036	Chwo ariyo nobed e puodho , achiel ibiro kawo , to machielo nowe . "
42017037	Eka negipenje niya , " Mano notimre kanye , Ruoth ? " Nodwokogi ni , " Kama ringruok motho nitie , ema achudhe chokore . "
42018001	Eka Yesu nogoyo ngero ni jopuonjrene mondo onyisgi gibed ka gilamo kinde duto kendo kik chuny gi aa .
42018002	Nowachonigi niya , " E taon moro ne nitie jang’ad bura mane ok oluoro Nyasaye kata ok odewo ji .
42018003	To ne nitie chi liel moro e taondno mano bedo kadhiyo ire pile gi ywakne kakwaye ni , ' Yie ing’adna bura e kinda gi jal mahinyani !
42018004	Kuom kinde moko moromo nodagi , to bang’e mogik nowacho kende owuon ni , kata obedo ni ok aluoro Nyasaye kendo ok adewo ji kamano
42018005	to nikech chi lielni osiko chanda , abiro neno ni ang’adone bura kare , mondo kik ojoga oola gi birone ira pile ! "
42018006	To Ruoth nowacho niya , " Winjeuru gima ne jang’ad bura maok kareno owacho !
42018007	To donge Nyasaye biro ng’ado bura kare ni joge moyier , maywakne odiechieng’ gi otieno ? Obiro tamore maok owinj gi koso ?
42018008	Awachonu ni , obiro neno ni ong’adnigi bura kare kendo mapiyo . Kata kamano , ka Wuod Dhano biro , bende obiro yudo yie e piny ?
42018009	Ni joma nogenore giwegi ni gin jomakare kendo mane ochayo ji mamoko duto , Yesu nogoyo nigi ngeroni ni :
42018010	" Ji ariyo nodhiyo lemo ei hekalu , achiel ne en ja-Farisai to machielo ne jasol osuru .
42018011	Ja Farisai nochungo kendo lamo kuome owuon niya : " Nyasaye , agoyoni erokamano ni ok an kaka ji mamoko-ma jomecho , jomatimo maricho , jochode-kata mana kaka jasol osuruni .
42018012	Ariyo kech maok achiem diriyo e juma ka juma , kendo achiwo achiel kuom apar mar gigo duto manwang’o .
42018013	To jasol osuru nochungo mabor . Ne ok onyal kata mana ng’iyo polo malo , to nogoyo kore kendo nowachoni , Nyasaye , kecha an jaricho .
42018014	Awachonu ni ng’atni , maok ng’at machielono , nodhiyo dala ka en kare e nyim Nyasaye . Nikech ng’ato ka ng’ato mating’ore malo owuon nodwoke piny , to ng’at madwokore piny noting’ malo .
42018015	Ji nekelo nyithindo matindo ir Yesu , mondo omulgi . Kane jopuonjrene noneno mano negikwerogi .
42018016	To Yesu noluongo nyithindo ire kendo nowacho ni , " Weuru nyithindo matindo obi ira , to kik utamgi , nikech pinyruodh Nyasaye en mar jo-machal ka magi .
42018017	Awachonu adiera ni , ng’ato ma ok orwako pinyruodh Nyasaye kaka nyathi matin ok onyal donjoe . "
42018018	Ruoth moro nopenje ni , " Japuonj maber , en ang’o manyaka atim mondo acham ngima manyaka chieng’ ? "
42018019	Yesu nodwoke ni , " Ang’o momiyo iluonga ni ng’ama ber ? Onge ng’ama ber-makmana Nyasaye fende .
42018020	Ing’eyo chike ni , ' Kik iterri , kik ineki , kik ikwal , kik ihang wach kendo ni luor wuoru gi meru . "
42018021	Nodwoke ni , " Magi duto ne aserito nyaka aa rawera . "
42018022	Ka Yesu nowinjo ma , nowachone ni , " Pod irem gimoro achiel . Lok gigi duto ma in-go pesa , mondo ipog joma odhier , eka inibed gi mwandu e polo . Eka iduog iluwa . "
42018023	Kane owinjo ma , nobedo mokuyo ahinya , nikech ne en ng’at ma jamoko maduong’ .
42018024	Yesu nong’iye kendo nowachone ni , " Mano kaka tek ni joma nigi mwandu donjo e pinyruoth Nyasaye .
42018025	Chutho , yot ni ngamia kadho e wang’ sandan , moloyo jamoko donjo e pinyruoth Nyasaye .
42018026	Jogo manowinjo mani nopenjo ni , " En ng’ano kare manyalo kwo ?
42018027	Yesu nodwokogi ni , " Gino maok nyalre gi dhano , nyalore gi Nyasaye .
42018028	Petro nowachone ni , " Waseweyo gik moko duto , ni nyaka waluwi ! "
42018029	Yesu nowachonigi ni , " Awachonu adier ni , onge ng’ato moseweyo dalane kata jaode gi owetene , kata jonyuolne , kata nyithinde nikech piny ruoth Nyasaye
42018030	ok norem mak oyudo nyadi mang’eny marome e tieng’ni kendo e tieng’ mabiro , noyud ngima manyaka chieng’ .
42018031	Yesu nokawo Jiapar gariyo tenge kendo nowachonigi niya , " Wadhiyouru nyaka Jerusalem , to gigo duto maneondi-ki gi jonabi kuom Wuod Dhano ibiro timogi .
42018032	Ibiro chiwe ni joma ok jo-Yahudi . Gibiro jare , giniyanye , ka ging’ulo olaw kuome , kendo ginichwade ma gininege .
42018033	To enochier kendo chieng’ mar adek , "
42018034	Jopuonjre ne ok owinjo tiend wechegi moro amora . Tiende nopandnigi , kendo ok ne ging’eyo gima ne owuoyo kuome .
42018035	Ka Yesu nesudo machiegni gi Jeriko , ng’at moro mamwofu nobedo piny e bath yo ka okwecho .
42018036	Kane owinjo ka oganda kadho , nopenjo ni en ang’o matimore .
42018037	Negidwoke ni , " Yesu ja-Nazareth ema kadho . "
42018038	Noluongo matek ni , " Yesu , Wuod Daudi , kecha ! "
42018039	To jogo manotelo e yo nokwere kendo nowachone ni ling’ thi , to nomedo goyo koko ni , " Wuod Daudi , kecha ! "
42018040	Yesu nochungo kendo nochiko mondo okel ng’atno ire . Kane obiro machiegni , Yesu nopenje ni ,
42018041	" Ang’o midwaroa mondo atimni ? " Nodwoko ni , " Ruoth , adwaro mondo anen . "
42018042	Yesu nowachone ni , " Nen ! Yieni ema ochangi . "
42018043	Gikanyono wang’e noyepo moneno kendo noluwo Yesu , kopako Nyasaye . Ka ji duto noneno mano , ne gipako Nyasaye .
42019001	Yesu nodonjo Jeriko kendo nowuotho kokadho .
42019002	Ng’ato ne nitie kanyo ma nyinge Zakayo ; ne en jasol osuru maduong’ kendo ne en jamwandu
42019003	Ne odwaro neno ni Yesu en ng’a , to nikech ne en nyadundo ne ok onyal , nikech oganda .
42019004	Omiyo noringo dhiyo motelo kendo noidho yadh ng’owu mondo onene , nikech Yesu ne biro kuro .
42019005	Ka Yesu nochopo kanyono , nongiyo malo kendo nowachone ni , " Zakayo , lor piny piyo . Tinendeni nyaka abed e odi . "
42019006	Omiyo Zakayo nolor mapiyo kendo norwake gi mor .
42019007	Ji duto noneno ma to kendo negichako ng’ur , kagiwacho ni , " Osedhi bedo wendo jaricho ! "
42019008	To Zakayo nochungo malo kendo nowacho ni Ruoth niya , " Ne Ruoth ! Sani kendo koroni nus mar giga ni jochan , to kapo ne asewuondo ng’ato e gimoro amora , abiro chule kaduokone maromo nyadi ng’wen . "
42019009	Yesu nowachone niya , " Kawuono warruok osebiro e odni , nikech jali bende en nyakwar Ibrahim .
42019010	Nikech Wuod Dhano nobiro mondo omany kendo owar mano manolal . "
42019011	Kane pod giwinjo mani , nodhiyo nyime kogoyonigi ngero , nikech nochiegini gi Jerusalem , kendo ji neparo ni pinyruoth Nyasaye biro betie mapiyo .
42019012	Nowacho niya , " Ng’at moro marahuma nodhiyo e piny maber mondo oyiere ruoth kendo eka oduogi .
42019013	Omiyo noluongo jotichge moko apar kendo ne omiyogi siling’ alufu achiel , achiel . Nowachonigi niya , " Keturu pesagi e tich , nyaka aduogi . "
42019014	To joge nosin kode kendo negioro joote modhiyo ire mondo giwach ni , " Ok wadwar ng’atni mondo obed ruodhwa .
42019015	Kata kamano , ne okete ruoth , kendo nodok dala . Kendo noluongo jotichne mane omiyo pesa , mondo oyud ni en ohala manade magise yudo .
42019016	Ng’at mokwongo nobiro kendo nowacho niya , " Jaduong siling’ alufu achiel , osenywolo silinge alufu apar moko .
42019017	Ruoth nodwoko niya , " Otimore maber , jatichna maber ! ' Nikech isebedo ng’at mogen e gima matin ahinya , koro bed ruodh mier madongo apar .
42019018	" Ng’at mar ariyo nobiro kendo nowacho niya , ' Jaduong’ , siling’ alufu achiel osenywolo silinge alufu abich moko .
42019019	Ruodhe nodwoke niya , ' Bed ruodh mier madongo abich .
42019020	Eka jatich machielo nobiro kendo wacho niya , ' Jaduong’ , siling’ alufu achiel eri , nasekane kapande aboyogo gi nanga .
42019021	Ne aluori , nikech in ng’at makoch . In ikawo gino mane ok ikano , kendo ikayo mano mane ok ichwoyo .
42019022	" Ruodhe nodwoke niya , ' Abiro ng’adoni bura koluwore kod wachni , in jatich marach ! Kara in ne ing’eyo ni an ng’at makoch , kendo ni akawo gima ne ok akano , bende akayo gima ne ok achwoyo !
42019023	Marang’o ne ok iketo pesanano e bengi , mondo kane aduogo , to ne anyalo kawe kod ohala .
42019024	" Eka nowacho ni jogo manochungo kanyo niya , " Kawuru silinge alufu achiel ugol kuome kendo umi jamo mangi siling’ alufu apar . "
42019025	" Negiwacho niya , ' Jaduong’ donge en-gi siling’ alufu apar . '
42019026	" Nodwoko niya , " Awachonu ni ng’ato ka ng’ato mango , ibiro medo mathoth , to jalo ma onge go , kata mano ma en-go nomaye .
42019027	To wasikago mane ok dwar mondo abed ruodhi gi-kelgiuru ka kendo neggiuru e nyima . ' "
42019028	Bang’ ka Yesu nosewacho mani , nodhiyo nyime , kodhiyo malo e Jerusalem .
42019029	Ka nosudo machiegini gi Bethfage kod Bethania e got miluongo ni Got Zeituni , nooro Jopuonjrene ariyo , nowachonigi niya ,
42019030	" Dhiuru e dala man nyimu cha , to kaka udonjo e iye , ubiro yudo nyathi kanyna motue . Gonyeuru kendo ukele ka .
42019031	Ka ng’ato moro openjou ni , ' Ang’o momiyo ugonye ? Uwachne ni , Ruoth dware . "
42019032	Jogo maneoor motelo nodhiyo kendo negiyude mana kaka nosenyisogi
42019033	Kane oyudo gigonyo nyathi kanynano , wuon nopenjogi , " Ang’o momiyo ugonyo nyathi kanyna ? "
42019034	To jopuonjre noduoke mayot ni , ' Ruoth dware , "
42019035	Negikele ir Yesu , negipedho lepgi e dieng’e nyathi kanyna kendo negiketo Yesu kuome .
42019036	Kane owuotho odhi , ji nopedho lepgi e yo .
42019037	Kane ochopo machiegni gi kama yo lorgo piny dhi Got Zeituni , oganda mangima mar jopuonjre nochako pako Nyasaye gi ilo kod duonde man malo kuom honni duto mane giseneno niya :
42019038	" Ogwedh Ruoth mabiro e nying Ruoth Nyasaye ! Kuwe obedi e polo . kendo duong obedi malo chutho . "
42019039	Jofarisai moko ei oganda nowacho ni Yesu ni , " Japuonj , kwer jopuonjreni . "
42019040	Nodwoko niya , " Awachonu ni ; kata ka di giling’ , to kitegi biro goyo koko . "
42019041	To kane osudo machiegni gi Jerusalem kendo noneno dalano maduong’ noywage ,
42019042	to nowacho niya , " Ka da in iwuon bed mana ni ing’eyo tinendeni gima nyalo kelo ni kuwe-to koro ogeng’ore ne wang’i .
42019043	Ndalo biro bironi ma wasiki biro chielo ohinga mogeng’oi kendo moluoroi , kendo okun-yoni bur koni gi koni
42019044	Ginigoyi piny , in gi nyithindi ei ohingani ok giniwe kidi moro e wi wadgi , nikech ne ok ing’eyo kinde ma Nyasaye biroe iri . "
42019045	Eka nodonjo e hekalu kendo nochako riembo oko jogo mane loko ohala .
42019046	Nowachonigi niya , " Ondiki ni , " Oda nobed od lamo ; to un to useloke od jomecho .

42019048	To ne ok ginyal yudo yo mar timo kamano , nikech ji duto norwako wachne .
42020001	Chieng’ moro achiel kane opuonjo ji ei agoch hekalu , kendo noyalo injili , jodolo madongo gi jopuonj chik , kaachiel kod jodongo nobiro ire .

42021010	Eka nowachonigi niya , " Oganda noked gi oganda machielo , kendo loch ruoth noked gi loch ruoth machielo .
42021011	Yiengni piny biro bedoe matek , kech kod tuoche nobedie kuonde mopogore opogore , kendo gik malich mabwogo ji gi honni madongo notimre maa e polo .
42021012	" To kapok magi duto , gibiro makou kendo sandou . Giniteru e sunagoge kod jende , kendo nokelu e nyim ruodhi gi joloch , to mago duto notim nikech nyinga .
42021013	Mano biro bedo thuolo mondo ubed nigi joneno .
42021014	To beduru gi paro maok yiengini mondo kik uparru motelo ni ere kaka ubiro dwoko wach .
42021015	Nimar abiro miyou weche gi rieko maonge wasiku kata achiel manyalo tamo kata kwero .

42021018	To kata man yie wiu achiel onge ma nolal .
42021019	Ka uchungo motegno to ubiro reso ngimau .
42021020	Ka uneno Jerusalem oluor kod ogend lweny ubiro ng’eyo ni kindene mar kethruok chiegni .
42021021	Koro eka joma ni Judea nyaka ring dhi e gode , kendo joma nie dala maduong’ nyaka wuog oko , to jogo man oko ei piny kik donjie dala maduong’ .
42021022	Nimar ma e kinde ma kum bedoe mar gigo duto mane ondiki .
42021023	Mano kaka obiro bedo malit e ndalogo ni mon mayach gi mine madhodho ! Chandruok malit maduong’ biro bedoe e piny gi mirima kuom jogi .
42021024	Ibiro negogi gi ligangla kendo notergi kaka jomotue e pinje duto . Jerusalem ibiro nyono piny gi Ogendini nyaka chop kinde mar Ogendini orom .
42021025	" Ranyisi biro bedo e chieng’ gi dwe kod sulweche . E piny , ogendini nobed kodhier kendo kong’eng , nikech nam mawuo kendo apaka magore .
42021026	Ji biro podho nikech gik malich matimore , gi luoro mar gima biro e piny , nimar gik manie polo biro yiengni .
42021027	To gie kindeno gibiro neno Wuod Dhano kabiro oa e boche polo kod teko gi duong’ malich .
42021028	Ka gigi chako timore , chunguru kendo ting’uru wiwu malo , nikech resruoku sudo machiegni . "
42021029	Nogoyo nigi ngeroni ni : Neuru yadh ng’owu kod yien duto ;
42021030	Ka gichako lodho itegi , unyalo neno uwegi kendo ng’eyo ni ndalo koth chiegini .
42021031	Kamano bende , ka uneno gigi timore , ung’eyo ni loch mar Nyasaye ni machiegni .
42021032	Awachonu adiera ni , tieng’ni ok nokadh adiera ngang’ nyaka gigi duto timre .
42021033	Polo gi Piny nokadhi , to wechena ok nolal ngang’ .

42022032	To aselamoni , Simon , ni mondo yieni kik olal . To ka iselokori ma idwogo , ijiw joweteni .
42022033	To nodwoke niya , " Ruoth , aikora dhiyo kodi e jela kendo e tho . "

42022035	Eka Yesu nopenjogi ni , " Kane aorou maonge ofuko mar pesa , kata sanduk lewni kod wuoche , ne uchando gimoro koso ? Negidwoko ni , " Onge . "

42022038	Jopuonjre nowacho niya , " Ne , Ruoth , ligengni ariyo eki ni ka . " Nodwokoni , " Mano oromo . "
