46005012	Koso uparo ni nitie gima datim kuom ng’ado bura ni joma pok obedo jo kanisa ? Donge joma osedonjo e kanisa ema onego ung’adnigi bura ?
46005013	Nyasaye biro ng’ado bura ni joma ni oko " Riemburu jarichono oa e dieru . "
46006001	Ka ng’ato moro kuomu nigi wach moro gi wadgi , ere kaka doter wachno e nyim joma okia Nyasaye mondo oyal bucheno , kar kelo wachno e nyim jomaler ?
46006002	Donge ung’eyo ni jo Maler ema biro yalo piny ? Ka un ema onego uyal piny to donge mano nyiso ni unyalo ng’ado bura kuom weche matindo man e kind ji ?
46006003	Donge ung’eyo ni wan ema wanayal malaike ? Koro gii pinyni to donge wanyalo yalo moloyo !
46006004	Ka kamano to ang’o momiyo ka un-gi wach e dieru to uyiero jong’ad bura ma jopiny ma kwan-gi onge ei kanisa .
46006005	Awacho mano mondo akuodgo wiu . Be dibed ni onge ng’ato e dieru kata achiel mariek manyalo yalo weche man e kind joma oyie ?
46006006	Kar timo kamano to yudore ni ja Kristo donjo ni ja Kristo wadgi e od bura kendo utimo mano e buch jopiny !
46006007	Kaka un-gi buche e kindu kamano nyiso ni un joma oserem chuth . Kar donjo ne wadu e buch jopiny to ok iyie otimni atima marach ? Ok iweye owuondi awuon-da ?
46006008	Kar timo kamano to un ema uwuon-do joweteu kendo utimonigi marach , kendo utimo kamano mana ni joweteu kuom yie .
46006009	Donge ung’eyo ni joma timo timbe maricho ok noyud gweth mar loch Nyasaye ? Kik ng’ato wuondu ! Ng’euru ni jochode kata joma lamo nyiseche manono , kata joma terore , kata ochode machwo , kata chwo materore gi chwo wetegi ,
46006010	kata jokuoge , kata jowuoro , katajomer , katajoketh nying ji , kata jomecho , ok noyud gikeni mar Loch Nyasaye .
46006011	Kamano e kakajomoko kuomu ne chalo . To ne olwoku mi opwodhu , mi oketu udoko joma kare e nying Ruoth Yesu Kristo , kendo kuom Roho mar Nyasachwa .
46006012	" Oyiena timo gimoro amora madwaro . " To gik moko duto ok kelnwa konyruok . Inyalo wacho ni " Oyiena timo gimora amora madwaro " , to kik awe gimoro loka misumbane .
46006013	" Chiemo en mar ich , to ich en mar chiemo . " To Nyasaye biro kethogi duto . Ringruok ok en mar timo chode , to en mar miyo Ruoth duong’ , mana kaka Ruoth bende en mar ringruok .
46006014	Nyasaye nochiero Ruoth oa kuom joma otho kendo bende obiro chierowa .
46006015	Donge ung’eyo ni ringreu gin fuonde Kristo owuon ? Be dakaw fuonde Kristo mondo ariwi gi ochot ? Mano ok nyal timore ngang’ !
46006016	Koso ukia ni ng’at moriwore gi ochot bedo kode e achiel e ringruok ? Nikech owach ni , " Ji ariyogo nodok ringruok achiel . "
46006017	To ng’at moriwore gi Ruoth bedo kode e achiel e chun
46006018	Ringuru utony ni chode . Richo duto ma ng’ato timo otimo oko mar ringre , to ng’at machodo timo richo ni ringre owuon .
46006019	Donge ung’eyo ni ringreu en hekalu mar Roho Maler modak e iu kendo ma Nyasaye osechiwonu ? Ok un mau uwegi ;
46006020	nong’iewu gi nengo . Omiyo miuru Nyasaye duong’ gi ringreu .
46007001	Koro kuom weche mane upenja e barupu , anyalo wacho ni ber mondo ng’ato kik okendi .
46007002	To nikech chode ng’eny , ng’ato ka ng’ato nyaka bed gi chiege owuon kendo dhako ka dhako obed gi chwore owuon .
46007003	Dichwo nyaka chop dwach chiege kaka joma okendore , kendo dhako bende nyaka tim kamano ni chwore .
46007004	Nikech dhako mokendi onge gi teko kuom ringre owuon , to en mar chwore . Kamano bende , dichwo mokendo onge gi teko kuom ringre owuon , to en mar chiege bende .
46007005	Kik utuonru mak mana ka uwinjoru e kindu mar timo mano kuom kinde machwok mondo uchiwru ni lamo . To bang’ chiwruok ni lamo , to uchak uriwru kendo mondo kik Satan temu , nikech ok unyal ritoru .
46007006	Awacho wachni kaka pacha awuon , to ok kaka chik .
46007007	Dibed maberna moloyo ka ji duto obedo kaka an . To ng’ato ka ng’ato nigi michne ma Nyasaye omiye , ng’at moro ni gi michni , to ng’at machielo bende nigi michne mopogore .
46007008	To joma pok okendi gi joma pok okendo , kod mond liete to awachonigi kama . En gima ber moloyo ka gisiko maok gikendo kata okendgi , mana kaka an .
46007009	To ka ok ginyal ritore giwegi , to onego gikendi , kata kendni nikech kend ber moloyo ka gombo wang’o ng’ato ka mach .
46007010	To ni joma osekendo kendo osekendi to achiwonigi chikni ( chutho ok an , to Ruoth ) : Dhako kik were gi chwore .
46007011	To kapo otimo kamano to ochune ni nyaka osik maonge dichwo , to ka ok kamano to odog ir chwore , kendo . Dichwo bende kik riemb chiege .
46007012	Ji mamoko duto to akonigi kama ( an ema a wacho , ok Ruoth ) : Ni ka owadwa moro maja Kristo nigi dhako maok oyie , to oyie dak kode , to kik oriembe .
46007013	Bende ka dhako nigi dichwo maok oyie to dich-wono oyie dak kode kaka chiege , to kik oweye .
46007014	Nikech dichwo mapok oyie inyalo pwodho nikech chiege , to dhako mapok oyie bende inyalo pwodho nikech chwore moyie . Ka ok kamano to nyithindu dibed mogak , to kaka ong’ere sani , giler .
46007015	To ka ng’at ma ok oyie ojok noa , to weye aweya odhi . Dichwo moyie kata dhako moyie ok otwe e weche makamago , nikech Nyasaye oseluongowa mondo wadag gi kuwe .
46007016	Ing’eyo nadi , in dhako , kata inyalo waro chwori ? Koso , ing’eyo nadi , in dichwo , ni chiegi inyalo waro nikech in ?
46007017	Kuom mano , ng’ato ka ng’ato kuomu mondo odag ngimano kendo orit gima Ruoth osemiye mane Nyasaye oluongene .
46007018	Dibed ni ng’ato noluongi koseter nyangu ? Kik ogomb ni ne ok otere nyangu . Dibed ni ng’ato noluongi kapok oter nyangu ? Ng’at ma kamano kik ter nyangu .
46007019	Bedo ni ng’ato oter nyangu kata ok oter nyangu ok en gimoro . Gimaduong’ en rito Chike Nyasaye .
46007020	Omiyo ng’ato ka ng’ato mondo obed mana kaka ne en kane Nyasaye oluonge .
46007021	Mit ki ne in misumba kane Nyasaye oluongi ? Kik mano chandi , makmana ni kapo inyalo yudo yor bedo thuolo to tim kamano moloyo . — Nikech ng’at mane Ruoth oluongo ka misumba koro bedo ng’at man thuolo kuom Ruoth , to bende ng’at mane ni thuolo kane Ruoth oluongo doko misumba Kristo .
46007022	
46007023	Nong’iewu gi nengo , omiyo kik ubed wasumbini mag ji .
46007024	Jowetena , ng’ato ka ng’ato nigi ting’ e nyim Nyasaye mondo osik mana kaka Nyasaye noluongeno .
46007025	Kuom wach nyiri maok okendi to awacho kama : Aonge gi Chik moa kuomRuoth , to achiwo pacha kaka ng’at ma wechene inyalo geno kuom ng’wono mar Ruoth .
46007026	Nikech chandruok mantie sani , aparo ni ber mondo usik kaka uchal .
46007027	Mitki ng’ato osekendi ? Ka kamano to kik idwar mondo uweru gi chwori . Mitki pok ikendo ? Kichal kamano to kik imany dhako mondo ikendi .
46007028	To ka ikendo to ok itimo richo ; kata ka nyako okendi bende ok otimo richo . To jok mokendo gi mokendi biro neno chandruok mathoth e ngimani , to adwa ni akonyu mondo kik une chandruokni .
46007029	Gima awacho , Jowetena , en ni saa odong’ matin . Chakre sani koro joma nigi mon onego odag kagima giongego ;
46007030	joma ywak onego bedi kagima ok giy-wagi ; joma mor onego odag kagima ok gimor ; joma ng’iewo gimoro onego odag ka gima gik ma ging’iewogo ok maggi ,
46007031	joma lonyore gi gipiny be kik yie chunygi gedi e gigo . Nikech kaka kit piny obedo sani , okadho piyo .
46007032	Adwaro ni mondo ubed maonge gi kit parruok duto . Dichwo maok okendo , weche Ruoth ema omako , kaka onyalo siko kotimo gik mamoro Ruoth ,
46007033	to ng’ama osekendo to pache omoko e weche pinyni , kaka onyalo timo gik mamiyo chiege mor .
46007034	Kendo dwarone bende opogore diriyo . Dhako maok okendi , kata nyako ngili , paro kuom weche Ruoth : Thorrogi maduong’ en mondo gibed maler e ringregi gi chunygi . To dhako mokendi to pache ni kuom gipiny , kaka onyalo miyo chwore mor .
46007035	Awacho wechegi mondo uyud konyruok kuomgi , to ok mondo aketnu chik manyaka ulu . Adwaro ni udagi e yo maber , ka chi-wruoku ni Ruoth ok opogore .
46007036	Ka ng’ato paro ni ok otimne osiepne manyako mosemakogo keny maber , kendo ka nyako no hike kalo ndalo kendo ka odwaro ni mondo okende , to onego otim gima ohero . Ok otimo richo kotimo kamano . Onego gikendre .
46007037	To dichwo moseng’ado wach e pache owuon , maonge gima ochuno , kendo manyalo chiko dwache , koseng’ado wach chuth ni ok odwa kendo nyakono , en bende otimo maber .
46007038	Kuom mano , ng’at mokendo nyako mangilino timo maber , to ng’at maok okende otimo maber moloyo .
46007039	Chik otweyo dhako gi chwore ndalo duto ma chwore ngima . To ka chwore otho to en thuolo mondo okende gi dichwo moro amora mohero , makmana ni nyaka kende kuom Ruoth .
46007040	An to pacha neno ni dhako ma chwore otho nyalo neno maber moloyo ka ok ochak okende kendo , kendo awacho mano ka aparo ni an-gi Roho mar Nyasaye .
46008001	Kuom wach chiemo motimgo misango ni nyiseche manono to awachoe kama : Wang’eyo ni " waduto wan gi rieko . Rieko miyo dhano kawore , to hera to gero ji .
46008002	Ng’at ma kawore ni ong’eyo gimoro kik par ni oseng’eyo moromo kaka dwarore .
46008003	To ng’at mohero Nyasaye to Nyasaye ong’eyo ng’atno .
46008004	Koro korka wach chamo chiemo motimgo misango ni nyiseche manono to awachoe kama : Wang’eyo ni nyasaye manono en gima nono e pinyka , kendo wang’eyo ni onge Nyasaye moro makmana achiel .
46008005	Nikech kata bed ni gik miluongo ni nyisechego nitie , kata gibed e polo kata e piny ( mana kaka nitie nyiseche ' kod ruodhi ' mang’eny ) ,
46008006	wan to wang’eyo ni nitie Nyasaye achiel kende , ma en Wuoro . En ema gik moko duto oa kuome , kendo momiyo wangima . Bende nitie Ruoth achiel kende ma en Yesu Kristo . En ema nomiyo gik moko duto obetie kendo en ema omiyo wangima .
46008007	To ji duto ok ong’eyo wachni . Jomoko pod ong’iyo gi nyiseche manono ma kagichamo chiemo makamano to giparo mana ni en motimnigo nyasaye manono misango ; to nikech chunygi mar ng’eyo ber gi rach yomyom , gidoko mochido .
46008008	To chiemo ok kelwa machiegni gi Nyasaye . Ok wan marach kwachiemo to bende ok wabed maber kwachamogi .
46008009	Kata kamano , bed motang’ mondo thuolo ma in-go mar chiemo kata mar weyo chiemo kik lokre kidi mar chwanyruok ni joma yomyom .
46008010	Nikech ka ng’at ma chunye nyap oneni , in miwacho ni in gi riekono , kichiemo e hekalu mar nyiseche manono , donge mano nyalo ywaye mi ocham chiemo motimgo misango ni nyiseche manono ?
46008011	Kuom mano owadwani mapmyom ma Kristo notho-neno koro kethore mana nikech rieko miwachogo ni iriek .
46008012	Sama itimo richo ni Joweteni e yo makama , kihinyo chunygi mayomyom , ng’eni itimo richo ni Kristo .
46008013	Kuom mano ka gima achamo miyo owadwa donjo e richo , to abiro weyo chamo ring’o chuth mondo kik ami opodhi .
46009001	To donge an thuolo ? Donge an jaote ? Donge ne aneno Yesu Ruodhwa ? Koso donge un olemo mar tichna kuom Ruoth ?
46009002	Kata ka jomoko ok okawa kaka jaote , to un owinjore ukawa kamano , nikech un e ranyisi mar bedona jaote kuom Ruoth .
46009003	Ma e kaka apwodhora ka ji koro obedo ng’adona bura kama :
46009004	Donge wan gi ratiro mondo omiwa chiemo gi math ?
46009005	Donge wan gi ratiro mar wuotho gi nyimine majoutewa e wuodhewa mag Injili kaka joote mamoko , kendo kaka Jowete Ruoth kod Petro johero timo ?
46009006	Koso an kod Barnaba ema nyaka wati eka wachiem ?
46009007	En jalueny mane machulo msache kende ka en e lweny ? En japur mane ma ok cham olemo mowuok e puothe ? Koso jakwath mane makwayo jamni to ok omadhi cha jamnigo ?
46009008	Koso awuoyo awuoya ka dhano ? Donge Chik bende jiwo wachni ?
46009009	Nikech ondiki e chik Musa ni " Kik itue dho rwath kodiemo cham . " Uparoni wach rwedhi ema ne chando chuny Nyasaye koso ?
46009010	Donge wan ema ne owuoyo kuomwa kowacho wachni ? Ee , wachni ne ondiknwa , nikech ka japur puro kendo ka jakeyo keyo , to gitimo kamano ka gigeno ni ibiro pognigi cham moko .
46009011	Ka wasepidho kodhi mar chuny e dieru , to ere rachne ka wakayo kuomu gik mwakonyorego .
46009012	Ka joma moko to nigi ratironi mar yudo konyruokgi koa kuomu , donge wan onego wabed gi ratiro makamano moloyogi ? Wan ok wasekmyore gi ratironi . Kar timo kamano to wasetuonore yuto mawa mondo kik waket obadho moro amora manyalo geng’o Injili mar Kristo .
46009013	Donge ung’eyo ni joma tiyo e hekalu yudo chiembgi koa e hekalu , kendo ni joma chiwo misango e wi altari ipogonigi misango-go ?
46009014	Kamano bende e kaka Nyasaye nochiko mondo joma lando Injili oyud konyruok duto mag ngimagi koa kuom Injili ma giyalo .
46009015	An to pok akonyora gi ratiro mawangogi kata achiel , kendo kata sani ok andiknu baruani mondo akwau kony monego ayudi koa kuomu . Diberna ka atho moloyo ka ayiene ng’ato oketho sunganani :
46009016	Kata kamano , ka ayalo Injili to ok onego asungra , nikech ochuna ni nyaka ayal . Mano kaka dibed malitna kaok ayalo Injili !
46009017	Ka ayalo kuom dwarona to ayudo mich , to ka ok kuom dwarona to mano nyiso ni achopo ote mano mane omiya .
46009018	To kara michna en ang’o ? En ma , ni mondo ayal Injili maonge msara , mondo kik akonyra gi ratiro maga e tij yalo Injili .
46009019	Nikech kata obedo ni an thuolo kendo ok an misumba ng’ato , to aselokora misumba ji duto mondo eka alok ji mang’eny kuomgi .
46009020	Ka atiyo e dier jo-Yahudi , to adoko machal kodgi mondo alokgi . Ka atiyo e dier joma luwo chik , to achalo ng’ama luwo chik ( Kata obedo ni an awuon ok an e bwo chik ) , mondo eka alok joma luwo chik .
46009021	Ka atiyo e dier joma onge chik , ne adoko machal kodgi , ( Kata obedo ni chik Nyasaye ok oweya oko nikech an e bwo chik Kristo ) , mondo eka alok Joma onge chik .
46009022	Joma nyap ne adokonigi manyap mondo eka alokgi . Asetimora gimoro amora ni ji duto mondo atem reso moko kuomgi e yomoro amora manyalore .
46009023	Magi duto atimo nikech wach Injili , mondo an bende ayud gweth kuom Injili nogo .
46009024	Donge ung’eyo ni e piem mar ng’wech jong’wech duto ringo , to ng’ato achiel kende ema yudo mich ? Omiyo ringuru , e yoo madimi uyud mich .
46009025	Jang’wech ka jang’wech madhi e piem ritore e yore duto . Gitimo kamano mondo giyud osimbo ma ok siki ; wanto waritore mondo wayud osimbo mabiro siko nyaka chieng’ .
46009026	Emomiyo an ok aringi ka ng’ama okia kuma itieke ng’wech , bende ok ago ngum ka gima agoyo yamo nono .
46009027	Ooyo , aboyo ringra gi goch mondo owinj wachna , mondo kik yud ni an awuon ok ayudo osimb loch , bang’ yalo ni ji mamoko .
46010001	Jowetena , ok adwar ni mondo kJ ukia kaka kwerewa nowuotho e bwo bor polo to kendo giduto ne ging’ado Nam .
46010002	Ne giyudo batiso mar Musa gi duto e bor polo kendo ei Nam .
46010003	Kendo giduto ne gichamo chiemb chuny machalre
46010004	Bende giduto ne gimadho math mar chuny ma chaire . Nikech ne gimetho koa e lwanda mar chuny mane luwo gi ; to lwandano ne en Kristo .
46010005	To kata kamano , Nyasaye ne ok mor kod thothgi , kendo ringregi motho nodong’ e thim .
46010006	Gigi duto notimore mondo obednwa ranyisi masiemowa mondo kik wagomb gik maricho kaka ne gigombo ,
46010007	Kik ulam nyiseche manono kaka moko kuomgi notimo , mana kaka ondiki ni , " Ji nobet piny mondo ochiem kendo omethi , kendo ne gia malo mondo gimiel . "
46010008	Kik waterre kaka moko kuomgi notimo , mi ji alufu piero oriyo gadek kuomgi notho odiechieng’ achiel .
46010009	Kik watem Ruoth , kaka moko kuomgi notimo , mi thuonde nonegogi .
46010010	Bende kik wang’ur , kaka moko kuomgi notimo , mi malaika mar tho nonegogi .
46010011	Gigi duto notimore nigi kaka ranyisi ni joma moko , kendo nondiknwagi mondo gibednwa siem : wan mwadak e ndalo ma giko piny chiegnini .
46010012	Omiyo , ka iparo ni ichung’ motegno to bed motang ; nono to ipodho !
46010013	Onge tem museneno mopogore gi ma ji duto neno . Nyasaye rito singruokne , ok obi yie mondo otemu mohingo tekreu . To es ama itemoueno , o biro miyou yo munyalo tonygo mondo ubed gi teko mar timo sinani .
46010014	Kuom mano , osiepena mageno ringuru ua kuom nyiseche manono .
46010015	Awuoyo kodu kaka joma parogi nikare omiyo paruru matut tiend wach ma awachonuno .
46010016	Donge okombe mar gweth mwagoye erokamano ketowa e lalruok achiel e remb Kristo ? Koso makati ma wang’injo donge ketowa e lalruok achiel , e ringre Kristo ?
46010017	Nikech nitie makati achiel , koro wan ringruok achiel , kata obedo ni wang’eny , nikech wan duto wachamo makati achielno .
46010018	Ka wakawo jo Israel kaka ranyisi : Donge joma chamo gii misango bet e lalruok achiel gi kendo mar misango ?
46010019	Diponi awacho ni misango mochiwne nyiseche manono en gimoro kata ni nyasaye manono nigi tiende ?
46010020	Ooyo ! Awacho ni misango majoma kia Nyasaye timo , gitimo ni jochiende , to ok ni Nyasaye . To ok adwar mondo ubedi e lalruok achiel gi jochiende
46010021	Ok unyal madho kikombe Ruoth kaachiel gi kikombe jochiende bende ; ok unyal chiemo e mesa Ruoth ka uchiemo e mesa jochiende bende .
46010022	Koso watemo nyiego mar Ruoth ? Waparoni watek moloye ?
46010023	" Wan thuolo timo gimoro amora mwahero " to ng’euru ni gik moko duto mwatimo ok kelnwa konyruok . " Wan thuolo timo gimoro amora " , to gik moko duto ok kelnwa dongruok
46010024	Kik ng’ato dwar mana gik makonye en owuon , to ng’ato mondo odwar gima konyo jowadgi
46010025	Un thuolo mar chamo ring’o mong’iew e chiro maok ubedo gi penjo mathoth e chunyu
46010026	nikech , " Piny kaachiel , gi gik moko duto manie iye , gin mag Ruoth . "
46010027	Ka japiny mokia Nyasaye ogweli e chiemo , midwaro dhiye , to cham gimoro amora moketi e nyimi maok ichich gi penjo mathoth e chunyi .
46010028	To ka ng’ato onyisi ni , " Chiemoni ne olosi mondo otimgo misango ne nyiseche manono , " to kik icham chiemono , nikech wach ng’at monyisi wachno , kendo nikech wach chich .
46010029	Tim kamano mar konyo chuny jagono to ok nikech konyruokni . Ang’o ma dimi thuolo mara ding’ad ne bura nikech chich mar ng’ama chielo .
46010030	Ka achamo chiemo gi erokaman , to ang’o momiyo ikwana ka jaketho ne gima agoyonee Nyasaye erokamano ?
46010031	Omiya , gimoro amora mutimo , bed ni uchiemo kata umetho , to timgiuru duto mondo Nyasaye oyud duong’
46010032	Kik ubed rachwany ni jo-Yahudi kata Ogendini kata ni jo-kanisa Nyasaye ,
46010033	mana kaka an awuon atemo moro ji duto e gik moko duto matimo , ka ok amany mana gik makonya an awuon , to atimo gik makonyo ji mangeny , mondo kanyalore to giyud warruok .
46011001	Luwuru kit ngimana , mana kaka an bende aluwo kit ngima Kristo .
46011002	Apwoyou nikech usiko upara e yore duto , kendo nikech umako puonj duto mana kaka amiyou .
46011003	To adwaro mondo unge ni Kristo e wi dichwo ka dichwo , kendo ni dichwo ewi dhako , kendo ni Nyasaye e wi Kristo .
46011004	Kuom mano dichwo malemo kata makoro e chokruok koumo wiye ochayo Kristo .
46011005	Kamano bende dhako malemo kata makoro e chokruok , ka ok otweyo kitamba okuodo wi chwore ( onge pogruok e kinde gi dhako moliel yie wiye ) .
46011006	Ka dhako ok dwar tweyo kitamba to kata ber oliel yie wiye . To kaka en wichkuot ka dhako olielo yie wiye mapoth to ber otwe kitamba .
46011007	Dichwo to ok owinjore oum wiye nikech en e kit Nyasaye gi duong’ne ; dhako to en duong’ mar dichwo .
46011008	Dichwo ne ok oa kuom dhako to dhako emane oa kuom dichwo .
46011009	To bende dichwo ne ok ochwe ne dhako to dhako ema ne ochwe ne dichwo .
46011010	Nikech wachni kendo nikech malaike , dhako mondo oum wiye kaka ranyisi ni en e bwo loch .
46011011	Kata kamano , kuom Ruoth , dhako ok nyal dak maonge dichwo mana kaka dichwo bende ok nyal dak maonge dhako .
46011012	Nimar , mana kaka dhako nochwe koa kuom dichwo , e kaka dichwo bende iny-wolo gi dhako , to gik moko duto aa kuom Nyasaye .
46011013	Penjreuru un uwegi ni : Bende en gima kare mondo dhako olam Nyasaye ka wiye ninono ?
46011014	Donge kit chwech puonjou ni yie wich maboyo en wichkuot ni dichwo ?
46011015	To ka ng’ama dhako yie wiye boyo to en duong’ mare , nikech yie wich maboyo omiye kaka raum .
46011016	Ka ng’ato kuomu dwaro kwedo maa , to ong’e ni waongegi tim mopogore gi mwapuonjoni , kendo kata kanise duto mag Nyasaye ongego .
46011017	Puonj makoro amiyou sani to ok anyal pakoue , nikech kinde duto ma uchokoru kaachiel to chokruoku kelo mana rach kar kelo ber .
46011018	Mokuongo awinjo ni ka uchokoru kaachiel kaka kanisa , to nitie pogruok e kindu , kendo anyalo yie ni wachno en adier .
46011019	Kare emomiyo nitiere pogruok e kindu mondo joma Nyasaye oyiego ong’ere maler .
46011020	Ka uchokoru kanyakla to nenore ni ok ucham Sap Ruoth ;
46011021	nikech ka uchiemo to ng’ato ka ng’ato rikni gi chamo chiembe owuon , ma ok orito Jowetene . Kuom mano , ng’ato denyo , to ng’at machielo to mer .
46011022	Donge un gi miechu munyalo chiemoe kendo methoe ? Koso uchayo kanisa Nyasaye , momiyo ukuodo wi joma ochando ? Dawachnu ango ' ? Uparo ni dapaku kuom wachni ? Ok kamano ngang !
46011023	Nikech puonj mane ayudo kuom Ruoth mi amiyou en ma : Ni Ruoth Yesu nokawo makati e otienonogo mane ond-hogee ,
46011024	kendo bang’ goyo erokamano nong’inje , kowacho ni , " ma en ringra mochiwnu . Timuru ma ka uparago . "
46011025	Kamano bende nokawo kikombe bang’ chiemo , mi owacho ni , " Kikombeni en singruok manyien motim gi remba ; timuru ma , kinde duto mumadhee , mondo uparago . "
46011026	Nikech ka usiko uchamo makatini kendo umadho kikombeni , to unyiso tho mar Ruoth nyaka chieng’ ma enoduogie .
46011027	Emomiyo ng’ama ochamo makatini kata ometho e kikombeni e yo maok owinjore , bura biro loyo kodoko jaketho kuom ringre Ruoth gi rembe .
46011028	ng’ato ka ng’ato nyaka nonre mokuongo , kapok ochamo makati kata ometho e kilombe .
46011029	Nikech ng’ato ang’ata mochiemo kendo ometho , ma ok odewo ringre Ruoth , kelo bura kuome owuon .
46011030	Mano emomiyo ji mathoth kuomu ool kendo tuo ; kendo moko kuomu osetho .
46011031	To kadewanonore wawegi mokuongo , to bura ok dilowa .
46011032	To ka Ruoth ng’adonwa bura to oriey-owa mondo kik bura lowa gi jopiny .
46011033	Kuom mano , Jowetena , ka uchokoru kaachiel mondo uchiem , to ng’ato ka ng’ato mondo orit nyawadgi .
46011034	To ka ng’ato odenyo , to ber mondo ochiem dala , mondo kik chokruok ma ubedogo kelnu kum . Weche mamoko nalos kodu ka abiro .
46012001	Jowetena , daher mondo ung’e adiera kuom mich mag Roho mondo kik ubed maonge ng’eyo .
46012002	Ung’eyo ni kane pod un jopiny , mokia Nyasaye nechalo ne oywau gi nyiseche manono maok wuo mi ulal .
46012003	Omiyo , adwaro mondo ung’eni ng’ama Roho mar Nyasaye otelone ok nyal wacho ni , " Okuong’ Yesu " , to bende onge ng’ama nyalo wacho ni , " Yesu en Ruoth " , ka Roho maler ok otelone .
46012004	Nitie mich mag Roho mopogore , to Roho achiel ema chiwogi .
46012005	Nitie tije mopogore opogore , to Ruoth en achiel .
46012006	Nitie yore mathoth mitiyogo tich to Nyasaye achiel ema chiwone ng’ato ka ng’ato teko mar tiyogi .
46012007	Roho nyisore e ngima ng’ato ka ng’ato e yo mopogore opogore , mondo okel konyruok ni ji duto .
46012008	Ng’at moro Roho omiyo nyalo mar wuoyo gi rieko , ng’at machielo Rohonogo omiyo tiend ng’eyo matut .
46012009	ng’ato Rohonogo miyo yie , to ng’at machielo omiyo mich mar chango ji ;
46012010	Ng’at moro omiyo teko mar timo honni , moro omiyo teko mar hulo weche moa kuom Nyasaye , moro omiyo rieko mar fwenyo maling’ ling’ mag chunje mopogore opogore , moro omiyo nyalo mar wuoyo gi dhok mayore , eka ng’at moro to omiyo mich mar loko dhok mayore .
46012011	Magi duto gin tij Roho achiel kendo ma chaire , kendo ochiwogi ni ng’ato ka ng ato kaka ohero .
46012012	Kata obedo ni ringre dhano en achiel to en gi fuonde mathoth , to bende kata obedo ni en gi fuonde mathoh pod en mana ringruok achiel . Ma e kaka Kristo bende obedo .
46012013	Kamano bende e kaka wan duto , bed ni wan jo-Yahudi kata jo-Grik , kata wasumbini , kata joma nithuolo , nobatiswa kuom Roho achielnogo mi wadoko ringruok achiel , kendo osemiwa Roho achielno mondo wamodhi waduto .
46012014	Nikech ringruok ok oios gi fuon achiel , to olose gi fuonde mang’eny .
46012015	Ka tielo nyalo wacho ni , " Kaka ok an lwedo , ok an achiel kuom fuonde ringruok , " to mano ok nyal mone bedo achiel kuom fuonde ringruok .
46012016	Kata , ka it nyalo wacho ni , " Kaka ok an wang’ ok an achiel kuom fuonde ringruok , " to mano ok nyal mone bedo achiel kuom fuonde ringruok .
46012017	Da bed ni ringruok duto en mana wang’ kende , dowinj wach nadi ? Kata ka da ringruok duto bed mana it kende , dwang’wech nadi ?
46012018	To kata kamano , Nyasaye noketo fuon ka fuon e ringruok mana kaka nodwaro ni mondo gibedi .
46012019	Kane bed ni gin fuon achiel to ringruok dibed nadi ?
46012020	E kaka ubedo ni nitie fuonde mang’eny , to ringruok en achiel .
46012021	Kuom mano wang’ ok nyal wachone lwedo ni , " Ok adwari ! " kata wich bende ok nyal wachone tielo ni , " Ok adwari . "
46012022	To adier en ni ok wanyal bedo maonge gi fuonde ringruok manenorenwa ni nyap .
46012023	Fuonde matindo wamiyo rit mamalo moloyo , kendo fuonde ma wakawo ni richo warwako maber moloyo .
46012024	Fuonde mabeyo moloyo to ok dwar rit ma kamano . Nyasaye owuon oseriwo fuonde mopogore opogore moloso ringruok , kendo osemiyo fuonde mwachayo duong’
46012025	mondo kik winjruok bed maonge e ringruok ; to mondo fuon ka fuon orit nyawadgi kaka dwarore .
46012026	Ka fuon achiel mar ringruok winjo lit , to fuonde ringruok mamoko duto winjo kode ; ka fuon moro yudo pak , to mamoko duto bedo mamor kaachiel kode .
46012027	E kaka un duto un ringre Kristo , fendo ng’ato ka ng’ato kuomu en fuond ringruo-kno .
46012028	To ei kanisa , Nyasaye oseketo ji man gi mich mopogore opogore e tichne : Mokwongo , joote , mar ariyo jokor wach to mar adek jopuonj , eka joma timo honni , ka aye to joma omi teko mar chango joma tuo , kod jokonyji , kod jochik tich , to mogik , joma wuoyo gi dhok mayoreyore .
46012029	Be ji duto gin joote ? Be ji duto jokoro ? Beji duto gin jopuonj ? Be ji duto timo honni ?
46012030	Be ji duto nigi mich mar chango joma tuo ? Beji duto wuoyo gi dhok mayore ? Beji dutojolok dhok mayore yore midhumo ?
46012031	Owinjore uket chunyu kuom mich madongo . Koro abiro nyisou yoo maberie moloyo .
46013001	Kata bed ni awuoyo gi dho dhano , kata gi dho malaike , to aonge hera to achalo mana ongeng’o maywak kata olang’ migoyo .
46013002	Ka an gi mich mar koro , kendo ka ang’eyo tiend weche matek duto modhiero ji ng’eyo , kendo an gi rieko duto kata ka an gi yie maduong’ manyalo golo godekuonde magin tie , — to ka aonge hera to ok an gimoro .
46013003	Kata bed ni achiwo giga duto ma ango ne jodhier , mi achiw ringra mondo owang’-to ka aonge hera to onge ohala mayudo .
46013004	Hera timo kinda to bende ong’won . Oonge nyiego gi gir ng’ato , kendo ok osungre kata opakre .
46013005	Wiye ok tek , bende ok odwar gik makonye en kende , iye ok wang’ piyo kendo ok okan gik maricho motimne .
46013006	Hera ok mor gi gik maricho , to omor gi adiera .
46013007	Hera umo weche duto , osiko oyie ayieya , osiko ogeno agena , kendo osiko odhil adhila
46013008	Hera ok rum . To kama nitiere weche mikoro , weche mikoro norum ; kama nitiere wuoyo gi dhok mayoreyore , dhok mayoreyore norum ; kama nitiere ng’eyo ; ng’eyo bende nokadhi .
46013009	E thuoloni weche mwang’eyotin to bende wakoro bath wach ma mago mabiro chopo kare tin ,
46013010	to ka weche duto nochop kare to mago morem nogiki .
46013011	Kane an nyathi , naloso ka nyathi , ne aparo ka nyathi , kendo naneno ka nyathi , to kaka koro an ng’ama duong’ , yore mag nyithindo aseweyo katoka .
46013012	Gima waneno sani chai mana gi kido matiptip mineno e rang’i , to chieng’ono wananene wang’ gi wang’ . Gima ang’eyo sani en mana bath adiera , to chieng’no anang’e malong’o chuth , mana kaka ong’eya chuth .
46013013	To nitie gik moko adek mosiko , ma gin : yie , geno , kod hera , to maduong’ moloyo kuomgi en hera .
46014001	a Luwuru hera , kendo dwaruru mondo ubed gi mich mag chuny , to moloyo mondo ubed johul wach .
46014002	Nikech ng’at ma wuoyo gi dhok mayore ok wuo gi ji , to owuoyo gi Nyasaye , nikech onge ng’ama winjo tiend gima owacho . Owacho weche mopondo modhiero ng’eyo gi teko mar Roho .
46014003	To ng’at ma hulo wach , loso gi ji mondo ogergi , ojiw-gi kendo ohoogi .
46014004	Ng’at ma wuoyo gi dhok ma yoreyore gerore kende owuon , to ng’at ma hulo wach moa kuom Nyasaye gero kanisa duto .
46014005	Daher mondo uwuo gi dhok mayore yore uduto , to moloyo mano , ni mondo uhul wach . Ng’at ma hulo wach duong’ moloyo ng’at ma wuoyo gi dhok mayoreyore makmana ka nitie ng’at manyalo loko tiend wach modhumono , mondo kanisa duto oyud konyruok .
46014006	Paruru ane , Jowetena , uparo ni ka abiro iru mit awuoyonu gi dhok mayore , en konyruok mane ma duyudi , ka ok akelonu fweny moro kata ng’eyo , kata wach mihulo kata puonj ?
46014007	Kata mana gik maonge ngima kuomgi magoyo thum , kaka asili kata nyatiti ding’e ywakgi nadi ka ok ipogo dwondgi ?
46014008	To bende , ka turumbete ogo gi duol mong’ere , ng’ama diikre ni lweny ?
46014009	Chal kamano kuomu bende : Ka ok ukonyoru gi weche maliw ma ji duto winjo to ng’ama biro ng’eyo tiend gima uwacho ? Wecheu biro lal nono mana e yamo !
46014010	Ong’ere ni nitie duol mopogore opogore e piny , to onge kata achiel kuomgi maonge gi tiendgi .
46014011	To ka ok apogo duond ng’ato to adokone jamwa , kendo en bende odokona jamwa .
46014012	Emomiyo un bende kaka udwaro mondo ubed gi mich mag Roho , temuru matek moloyo mondo unwang’ mich mago magero kanisa .
46014013	Kuom mano , ng’at ma wuoyo gi dhok moro amora ma ji okia olem mondo obed gi nyalo mar loko tiend gik mowacho .
46014014	Nikech ka alamo gi dhok mayoreyore to chunya ema alamogo to pacha ok ti .
46014015	To koro kara atim ang’o ? Abiro lamo gi chunya , to bende abiro lamo gi pacha , abiro wer gi chunya , to bende abiro wer gi pacha .
46014016	Ka upako Nyasaye gi chunyu , to ere kaka ng’ato manie dieru maok winji dhougo digo ni , " Amin " ne erokamano mugoyo , nikech okia gima uwacho ?
46014017	Nyalo bet ni igoyo erokamano maber chuth , to ng’at machielo ok gerre .
46014018	Adwokone Nyasaye erokamano nikech awuoyo gi dhok mayoreyore moloyo un duto .
46014019	To ei kanisa to daher wacho weche kata abich kende gi dhok ma ji winjo mondo apuonj moloyo weche alufu apar gi dhok mayoreyore ma ji ok winji .
46014020	Jowetena , kik ubed nyithindo e pachu , to chaluru nyithindo mayom mana kuom gima rach kende , to e pachu beduru joma dongo .
46014021	Ondiki e kitap chik ni , " Anakonyra gi joma wacho dhok mayoreyore kendo gi dho joma welo , abiro wuoyo gi jogi to kata kamano ok giniwin-ja , " Ruoth Owacho .
46014022	Kuom mano mich mar wuoyo gi dhok mayoreyore en ranyisi miywayogo joma pok oyie , to ok joma oseyie . Mich mar hulo wach to en mar joma oseyie ok joma pok oyie .
46014023	Omiyo ka kanisa duto ochokore kaachiel , to ji duto wuoyo gi dhok mayoreyore to ka nitie jomoko maok winj dhogino , kata ka joma ok oyie moko odonjo e chokruogno , donge digiwach ni wiu okethore ?
46014024	To ka ng’at maok oyie , kata ng’at moro ma jaoko moro odonjo e chokruoku , to oyudo ka ji duto hulo wach , weche mowinjo nyalo loye gi bura , mi olokre ,
46014025	kendo paro maling’ling’ mopondo e chunye elore e lela , enopodh auma kolamo Nyasaye , kowacho " Yawa , Nyasaye nie dieru ka adier ! "
46014026	Jowetena , koro dwawach ang’o ? Ka uchokoru e lemo to yudore ni ng’at moro nigi wer , to ng’at machielo nigi puonj , to moro nigi fweny , to machielo dwaro dhum gi dhok mayoreyore kata loko tiend wach midhumono . To gigi duto nyaka tim e yo mochanore kendo ma diger kanisa
46014027	Ka nitie joma dhum gi dhok mayoreyore to ji ariyo kata adek ka ng’eny kende ema mondo owuo to mana e yo mochanore maber , ka moro ka moro loso bang’ , wadgi , kendo ng’ato nyaka lok tiend weche ma gidhumo .
46014028	To ka onge ng’ato manyalo loko tiend wechego , to ng’at madhum gi dhok mayoreyore mondo oling’ e kanisa . Wuoyo to owuo mana gi Nyasaye e chunye maiye .
46014029	Joma hulo wach kik kadh ariyo kata adek , kendo ka giwuoyo to ji mamoko onon mos ka bende weche magiwacho owinjore .
46014030	To ka ng’ato moro manie chokruokno omi wach moro mopondo mondo owachi , ng’at mane oyudo dhi nyime gi loso nyaka ling’ mondi , eka owuo .
46014031	Nikech un duto unyalo hulo wach , ka ng’ato ka ng’ato koro bang’ nyawadgi , mondo ji duto oyud puonj kod jip .
46014032	Jahul wach nigi nyalo mar geng’o wach mabirone ,
46014033	nikech Nyasaye ok en Nyasach loko , to En Nyasach kuwe . To mana kaka timore ei kanyakla mar joma oyie duto ,
46014034	joma mon onego oling’ e kanise . Ok oyienigi loso , nyaka giwinj wach ka giling’ kaka chik owacho .
46014035	Ka gidwaro mondo olernigi tiend wach moro , to gipenj chwogi giwegi dala , nikech en wichkuot ka ng’ama dhako wuoyo e kanisa .
46014036	Mit kuparo ni un emane wach Nyasaye ochakore kuomu ? Koso ugalo ni un kendu ema wach osechoponu ?
46014037	Ka ng’ato okawore ni en jahul wach kata ni en ng’at chuny , to nyaka oyie ni wach mandikonuni en chik Ruoth .
46014038	Ka ng’ato ok orwako puonjnani to en bende ok norwake .
46014039	Kuom mano , Jowetena , gomburu bedo johul wach , to kik utam ji dhum gi dhok mayoreyore .
46014040	Timuru gik moko duto e yo mowinjore kendo mochanore .
46015001	Koro Jowetena , adwaro paronu wach Injili mane ayalonu , mi urwako kendo koro uchungoe motegno .
46015002	Injilini ema kelonu warruok , ka umako matek wach mane ayalonu mokwongo . Ka ok kamano to kara ne uyie kayiem nono .
46015003	Nikech puonj maduong’ mogik mane ayudo kuom Ruoth mi amiyou en ma : ni Kristo notho nikech richowa kaluwore gi Ndiko ,
46015004	kendo ni ne oyike , kendo ni ne ochiere oa kuom joma otho chieng’ mar adek kaluwore gi Ndiko , kendo ni ne ofwenyore mokwongo ni Petro , eka bang’e nofwenyore ni joote apar gariyo .
46015005	
46015006	Bang’ mano nofwenyore ni Jowete moloyo mia abich , ka gin kanyachiel , kendo thothgi pod ngima nyaka sani , kata obedo ni moko osenindo .
46015007	Achien nofwenyore ni Jakobo ; bang’e nofwenyore ni Joote duto ,
46015008	eka achien mogik , nine ofwenyore ni an bende , kata obedoni achal gi ng’at mane onyuol bogno .
46015009	Nikech an e jaote matinie mogik to bende ok awinjora mondo oluonga ni jaote , nikech ne asando kanisa Nyasaye .
46015010	To koro , kuom ng’wono mar Nyasaye , an gima an , kendo ng’wono mane omiya ne ok orem mak ochopo tichne . Kar bedo kamano to asetiyo matek moloyo joote mamoko duto , to ok asetimo mago duto gi tekra awuon , to kuom ng’wono mar Nyasaye matiyo koda .
46015011	Omiyo kata bed ni an ema ne ayalonu Injili kata gin emane giyalonu , to ma e gima wayalo kendo ma e gima neuketoe yieu .
46015012	To ka iyalo ni Kristo osechier oa kuom joma otho , to ang’o momiyo jomoko kuomu wacho ni joma otho ok bi chier ?
46015013	Ka en adier ni joma otho ok chier to mano nyiso ni kata Kristo bende pok ochier .
46015014	To ka Kristo pok ochier to wayalo kayiem , kendo yie maru bende onge tiende .
46015015	To moloyo mano , wadoko joneno mariambo kuom Nyasaye nikech wasebedo ka wanyiso ji ni Nyasaye ema osechiero Kristo oa kuom joma otho . To kara ne ok ochiere ka en adier ni joma otho ok chier .
46015016	Nikech ka joma otho ok chier to kata Kristo bende pok ochier .
46015017	To ka Kristo pok ochier , to yie maru en nono ; kendo pod ulal alala e richou .
46015018	Mano nyiso bende ni jo Kristo mos-enindo bende olal .
46015019	Ka genowa kuom Kristo nigi tiende mana e ngimani kende , to wan joma odhierie moloyo ji duto .
46015020	To adiera en ni Kristo osechier oa kuom joma otho . Chierneno en kaka gir singo manyiso ni joma onindo e liel bende ibiro chiero .
46015021	Nikech kaka tho noa kuom ng’at achiel e kaka chier mar joma otho bende osebiro koa kuom ng’at achiel .
46015022	Nikech mana kaka ji duto tho nikech Adam , ji duto nobed mangima nikech Kristo .
46015023	To gigi nyaka timre e yo mochanore : Kristo ema kwongo chier kaka olemo mokwongo chiek , eka bang’e joma ni kuome bende nochier chieng’ ma enobi .
46015024	Eka giko nochopi , mi Kristo nolo joloch duto , nolo teko duto kendo nolo nyalo duto , eka nodwok pinyruoth ni Nyasaye Wuoro .
46015025	Nikech Kristo nyaka bed gi loch nyaka chop Nyasaye lo wasigu duto , mi oketgi e bwo pat tiende .
46015026	Jasigu manotieki achien mogik en tho .
46015027	Nikech Ndiko wacho ni , " Nyasaye , oseketo gik moko duto e bwo tiende " . To ka ndiko wuoyo kuom " gik moko duto " , to ong’ere ni mano ok oriwo Nyasaye owuon nikech Nyasaye ema keto gik moko duto e bwo loch Kristo .
46015028	To ka gik moko duto oseketi e bwo loch Kristo , eka Wuowi owuon noketi e bwo loch Nyasaye , ma bende noketo gik moko duto e bwoye eka Nyasaye nobed gi loch ewi gik moko duto
46015029	To ka poni chier onge , to ere tiende batiso ji ewi joma osetho ? Ka joma otho ok chier , to ibatiso ji e wigi nango ?
46015030	To kata mana wan , ang’o ma dimi wachom masira seche duto ?
46015031	Jowetena , kaka un e sungana kuom Yesu Kristo Ruodhwa awachonu ka aramo , ni tho ochoma pile !
46015032	Ka dipo ni ne akedo gi le makwiny e dala Efeso mana nikech dwach dhano to ohala mane ma ayudo ? Ka joma otho ok chier to kara " Wadhi adhiya nyime gi chiemo kendo gi metho , nikech kiny wanatho . "
46015033	Kik ng’ato wuondu , " Bedo e lalruok kod joma richo ketho timbe mabeyo . "
46015034	Duoguru e pachu maliw , daguru ngima makare kendo weuru timo richo , nikech nitie jomoko kuomu mokia Nyasaye . Awacho kamano mondo akuodgo wiu .
46015035	To ng’ato nyalo penjo ni , " Joma otho ichiero nadi ? Ginibed gi ringruok machalo nadi ? "
46015036	To mano penjo mofuwo manadi ! Ka ukomo kodhi to nyaka okwong otho eka bang’e otwi .
46015037	Ka ukomo , to ukomo mana kodhi kende . Onyalo bedo koth ngano kata koth gimachielo .
46015038	To Nyasaye miye kido mana kaka en ema osechano , kendo kodhi ka kodhi omiyo kite owuon .
46015039	Ringruok duto ok chaire : Dhano nigi kit ringruok mamargi , le nigi machielo , winy nigi machielo , kendo rech bende nigi machielo .
46015040	Nitie bende chwech mag polo gi chwech mag piny , kendo kit duong mar chwech mag polo opogore gi kit duong’ mar chwech mag piny
46015041	Wang’ chieng’ nigi kit ler ma mare owuon , to dwe be nigi machielo , kendo sulwe bende nigi mare . Sulwe ka sulwe chiwo ler mopogore gi nyawadgi .
46015042	Kamano bende e kaka chier mar joma otho biro chalo . Ringruok ma iyiko en gimatow , to ichiere ka en gima ok tow .
46015043	Ka iyike to oonge gi duong’ to ichiere ka en gi duong , to bende iyike ka oonge teko , to ichiere ka en gi teko ,
46015044	kendo iyike kaka ringruok mar pinyni , to ichiere kaka ringruok mar polo . Ka nitiere ringruok mar piny to nitiere bende ringruok mar polo .
46015045	Emomiyo ondiki ni , " Adam maen dhano mokuongo , nodoko gima ngima " to Adam mogik nodoko chuny machiwo ngima .
46015046	To mano mar chuny ok ema kuongi , to mar ringruok ema kuongo , eka bang’e mar chuny ,
46015047	Dhano mokuongo nochwe gi lop piny , to dhano mar ariyo noa e polo .
46015048	Jal mane ochwe gi lowo ema ji duto oa kuome , to kamano bende jopolo duto oa kuom Jal mane oa e polo .
46015049	Mana kaka warwakore gi kit dhand lowo e kaka wabiro rwakore gi kit dhand polo .
46015050	Jowetena , tiend gima awacho en ma : Ringruok gi remo ok nyal chamo girkeni mar pinyruodh Nyasaye kendo gima tow ok nyal rwakore gi gima ok tow ,
46015051	Winjuru anena midhieroni : Ok wanatho waduto to nolokwa wan duto kadiemo wang’
46015052	apoya nono , kadiemo wang’ ka tung’ mogik noywagi . Nikech ka tung’ noywagi to jomane osetho nochier gi ringruok maok tow to wan nolokwa .
46015053	Nikech ringruok matow nyaka ruakre gi gima ok tow , kendo ringruok mathoni nyaka ruakre gi gima ok tho .
46015054	Eka bang’e ka ringruok matop oserwakore gi mano ma ok tow , kendo mano matho oserwakore gi mano ma ok tho , eka wach mondiki nochop kare , ni , " Tho oselo motiek chuth . "
46015055	" In tho , koro ere lochni ? In tho , lit mikelo ni kanye ?
46015056	Lit mar tho en richo , to teko mar richo en chik
46015057	To Nyasaye mondo opaki , nikech osemiyowa loch kuom Ruodhwa Yesu Kristo !
46015058	Emomiyo , Jowetena mageno , chunguru motegno . Kik uyie gimoro oyiengu . Chiwreuru chuth kinde duto ni tich Ruoth , nikech ung’eyo ni tich mutiyo matek ni Ruoth ok obedo kayiem nono .
46016001	Koro kuom wach choko chiwo ni jo-Nyasaye : Timuru gima ne akone jo-kanisa ma Galatia mondo otim .
46016002	ng’ato ka ng’ato kuomu nyaka ket mich moko tenge Juma Pil ka Juma Pil , kaluwore gi yuto mare mondo ka abiro to onge mich mibiro chok kendo .
46016003	Ka achopo , to anaor joma upwodho , gi barupe manyiso chalgi mondo giter michugo Jerusalem .
46016004	Ka ber mondo an bende adhi , to ginidhi koda .
46016005	Abiro biro iru bang’ kadho Makedonia , nikech abiro luwo kuno .
46016006	Samoro anyalo bedo kodu kuom ndalo mogwarore to samoro anyalo tieko mana ndalo koyo duto , mondo ukonya e wuodha kamoro amora ma abiro dhiye .
46016007	Ok adwar mondo aneu mana ayuka ka akadho , to ageno mar bedo kodu aming’a , ka Ruoth oyie .
46016008	To pod abiro dak Efeso ka nyaka chieng’ Pentekost ,
46016009	nikech dhoot oyaworena malach mar tiyo tich manyago olemo to wasigu makedo koda bende ng’eny .
46016010	Ka Timotheo obiro iru , neuru ni onge gima oluoro ka en e dieru , nikech otiyo ne Ruoth , mana kaka an .
46016011	Kuom mano , kik ng’ato ang’ato otamre maok orwake to konyeuru mondo odhi nyime e wuodhe gi kuwe , mondo oyud yo mar duogo ira nikech arite en kaachiel gi Jowete mamoko .
46016012	Koro kuom owadwa Apolo . Ne ajiwe matek mondo olimu kod Jowete mamoko , to pok oyie chuth ni onego obi iru sani ka oyudo thuolo to obiro biro achien .
46016013	Ritreuru , kendo chunguru motegno e yie maru , beduru jochir kendo beduru motegno .
46016014	Timuru gik moko duto gi hera .
46016015	Ung’eyo ni jood Stefano e joma nokwongo yie kuom Kristo e piny Akaya , kendo gisechiwore mar tiyo ni jo Maler . Ajiwou , Jowetena ,
46016016	mondo uyie bet e bwo joma kamago , kendo ebwo jomatiyo kaachiel kodgi .
46016017	Ne adoko mamor kane Stefano , gi Fortunato kod Akaiko ne jobiro ira , nikech ne gichopona rem mane onego uchopi tone ok uchopo .
46016018	Ne gikonyo chunya , kaachiel gi maru bende . Joma kamago onego omi duong’
46016019	Kanise manie gweng’ mar Asia ooronu mos . Akula gi Priska , kaachiel gi kanisa machokore e odgi , jomosou gimor kuom Ruoth .
46016020	Jowete duto man ka ooronu mos . Mosreuru duto ng’ato gi ng’ato gi yogruok maler .
46016021	An Paulo awuon ema andikonu mosni gi lweta awuon .
46016022	Ka ng’ato ok ohero Ruoth to mondo okuong’e ! Bi , Yaye Ruoth .
46016023	Ng’wono mar Ruoth Yesu obed kodu .
46016024	Herana obed kodu un duto ei Kristo Yesu . Amin .
47001001	An Paulo , jaote mar Kristo Yesu kuom dwaro mar Nyasaye ; kod owadwa Timotheo , Ne kanisa mar Nyasaye man Korintho , kaachiel gi jomaler duto man Akaya :
47001002	Mad Ng’wono gi kuwe moa kuom Nyasaye Wuonwa gi Ruoth Yesu Kristo obed kodu .
47001003	Pak ni Nyasaye ma Wuon Ruodhwa Yesu Kristo , kendo ma Wuon ng’wono kendo Nyasach Loch duto ,
47001004	en moloyowa e chandruok duto rnarnakowa , mondo wabed gi nyalo mar hoyo jomamoko manie chandruok , ka wahoyogi gi hoch ma Nyasaye osehoyowago wan wawegi .
47001005	Nikech , mana kaka wan e achiel gi Kristo e chandruokge duto mane oneno , e kaka wan kode e hoch mochiwo .
47001006	Ka waneno malit , to mano timorenwa nikech hoch kod warruok maru ; to ka wayudo hoch , to en mondo un bende uyud hoch . Hoch makamano miyou kinda kod dhil e chandruok ma wan bende wayudo .
47001007	Emomiyo geno ma wan go kuomu ok yiengni , nikech wang’eyo ni kaka un kodwa e achiel e chandruok mwaneno , e kaka un e achiel bende e hoch machal gi mano mihoyowago .
47001008	Ok wadwar mondo ubed ka ukia , Jowete , kaka ne waneno masiche mapek e piny Asia . Ne oyie kuomwa masiche madongo kendo mapek moingowa ting’o mi ne wajok gi bedo mangima .
47001009	Chutho , ne wawinjo e chunywa kagima nosen-g’adnwa buch tho . To magi notimorenwa mondo waket genowa kuom Nyasaye ma chiero joma otho , to ok kuomwa wawegi .
47001010	En mane oseresowa e dho tho malich kamano kendo obiro resowa . Kuome waseketoe genowa ni pod obiro resowa ,
47001011	ka umedo konyowa gi lemo maru . Mano nomi ji mang’eny nodwokone Nyasaye erokamano kuom gweth momiyowa , kodwoko lamo mar ji mang’eny .
47001012	Koro ma e sunga marwa : chunywa miyowa ratiro ni wasedak e pinyni , to moloyo e winjruok marwa kodu , ka waluoro Nyasaye kendo ka wawuotho e ler mar adier . Ok wasedak kamano nikech waluwo rieko mar pinyni , to nikech ng’wono mar Nyasaye .
47001013	Nikech ok wandiknu gik matek maok unyal somo mi uwinj tiendgi . Omiyo ageno ni ,
47001014	mana kaka koro useng’eyowa moromo , e kaka ubiro medo ng’eyowa chuth , mondo uchop e okang’ munyalo sungoru nikech wan , mana kaka wan bende wabiro sungore nikech un e odiechieng Ruoth Yesu .
47001015	Nikech ne an-gi ratiro kuom wachni , ne achano mar limou mokwongo mondo ne uyudi gweth manyadiriyo .
47001016	Ne achano mondo alimu kane anie wuodha adhi Makedonia , kendo ne achano rawo iru ka aa kuno , mondo ayud kony kuomu e wuodha madhi Judea .
47001017	Kane achano kamano , uparo nine atimo kamano ka atugo ? Koso uparo ni aloso chenroga ka japiny ma anyalo kiko wach ka ayie ni , " Eee , Eee " kendo achako akwer ni " Ooyo , Ooyo ? "
47001018	Kaka Nyasachwa en jaadiera , wach ma wesebedo ka wawacho kodu ok en " Eee " gi " Ooyo . "
47001019	Nikech Yesu Kristo , Wuod Nyasaye , mane wayalonu wachne , wan gi Sila gi Timotheo , ne ok en " ee " gi " ooyo " , to osebedo " ee " kinde duto .
47001020	Nikech singruok ma Nyasaye o setimo kodwa duto kar rombgi gin " Ee kuom Kristo . " Mano emomiyo kwalamo e nying Kristo to wagoyo ni " Amin " , kwamiyo Nyasaye duong’ .
47001021	To Nyasaye owuon ema osemiyo un kod wan wachung’ motegno kuom Kristo . En ema osewirowa ,
47001022	mi oketo kido kuomwa manyiso ni wan joge bende oseketo Roho mare e chunywa kaka singo mar gima biro .
47001023	Aluongo Nyasaye mondo obed janeno mara , ka anyisou ni ne ok aduogo Korintho mana mondo kik akelnu kuyo .
47001024	Ok wawach kamano nikech watemo bedo gi teko kuom yie maru , to watiyo kodu kaachiel mondo uchung’ motegno e yie maru ka umor .
47002001	Omiyo ne ang’ado e pacha kuom wachni , ni ok nachak alimu kendo ka limbena dikelnu kuyo .
47002002	Nikech ka an ema amiyo ubedo mokuyo , to en ng’awa ma dimiya mor , ka ok mana un ma amiyou chuny lit ?
47002003	Mano emomiyo ne andikonu kamano , mondo kane abiro iru to kik umiya kuyo un monego umiya mor . Nikech ang’eyo malong’o chuth ni ka amor to eka un duto bende umor .
47002004	Ne andikonu ka chunya chandore kendo lit ; kendo pi wang’a ne chwer mang’eny , nikech ne ok adwar mondo ami ubed mokuyo , to ne adwaro mondo ung’e kaka aherou , un duto , gi hera matut .
47002005	Ponono ng’ato osekelo chuny lit , an ok ema osekelona chuny litno , to osekele mana ni un , ka ok adwar jimbo wachno .
47002006	To kum ma osemi ng’atni gi ji mathoth kuomu koro oromo .
47002007	Sani koro nyaka uwene richone kendo uhoye , mondo kik kuyo mare dhiere nono .
47002008	Omiyo akwayou mondo unyise ni koro eka uhere moloyo .
47002009	Gimomiyo ne andikonu ne en mondo atemu ane kendo ang’e ka bende un joma nigi luor e gik moko duto .
47002010	Ng’ato ang’ata muweyone richone an bende aweyone . Nikech ka aweyone ng’ato richone ( ka dipo an bende onego awene ng’ato e wach moro amora ) to atimo kamano kuom Kristo , nikech un ,
47002011	mondo kik satan lowa gi riekone , nikech wang’eyo chenro mage .
47002012	Kane abiro Troa mondo ayal Injili mar Kristo kendo nayudo ka Ruoth noseyawona dhoot ,
47002013	to ne pod aonge gi kuwe e chunya nikech ne ok ayudo owadwa Tito kuno . Omiyo ne agoyo oriti ne jogo , mi adhi Makedonia .
47002014	To erokamano ni Nyasaye , ma kinde duto telonwa kaka joma oselocho kuom Kristo , kendo ma konyore kodwa kuom keyo tik mamit mar ng’eyo Kristo .
47002015	Nikech Nyasaye tiyo kodwa kaka tik mamit mar Kristo e kind joma iwaro kod joma lal .
47002016	Ni joma lal wadum tik tho to ni joma iwaro to wadum negi tik ngima . Koro en ng’a mowinjore gi tich machal kamano ?
47002017	Nikech wan ok wachal gi ji mathoth mamoko , magajo wach Nyasaye mondo giyudie ohala . Wanto wan joma Nyasaye oseoro kendo wawacho adiera e nyime kuom Kristo .
47003001	Dibed ni wachako pwoyorenu kendo ? Koso wachako dwaro bar upe mag pwoch moa kuomu , kata mwabirogo iru , kaka jomoko ohero timo ?
47003002	Un e barupewa , mondiki e chunywa , kendo ma ji duto ong’eyo , kendo somo .
47003003	Unyiso ni un barupe moa kuom Kristo , matijwa okelo , ma ok ondiki gi wino , to mondiki gi Roho Maler mar Nyasaye mangima , bende ok ma ondiki e kite mopa , to mondiki e chunje mag dhano .
47003004	Mano e chir ma wan go kuom Nyasaye nikech Kristo .
47003005	Ok ni wan-gi nyalo moro kuomwa wawegi mar tiyo tijni , to nyalo wa aa kuom Nyasaye .
47003006	Osemiyowa nyalo mar bedo jotich mag singruok manyien , ma ok otenore kuom chik mondiki , to motenore kuom chuny , nikech chik mondiki neko , to Roho chiwo ngima .
47003007	Koro ka tich mane okelo tho , mane ondike kite mopa , mane obiro gi duong’ mondo omi jo-Israel kik ng’i wang’ Musa tir nikech duong’ne kata obedo ni duong’no nedhi ka rumo ,
47003008	to donge dibed ni tich mar Roho biro bedo gi duong’ mang’ongo moloyo ?
47003009	Ka tich ma ing’adonego ji bura nigi duong’ kamano , to tich , ma keto ji kare , nyaka bed gi duong’ moloyo !
47003010	Nikech gimane nigi duong’ kindecha koro onge gi duong’ minyalo pimo gi mano maduong’ moloye .
47003011	To ka mano marumo nobiro gi duong’ kamano to kare koro mano masiko nyaka bed gi duong’ mang’ongo moloyo !
47003012	Emomiyo ka koro wan-gi geno machal kama , wawuoyo gi chir mathoth .
47003013	Ok wachal gi Musa mane umo wang’e mondo kik jo-Israel ne ka ler manie pat wang’e rumo .
47003014	To pachgi nosiko kodi-nore , nikech nyaka koroni raumno pod oumo chunjegi ka isomo singrouk machon . Pod ok ogole nikech raumno igolo mana ka ng’ato ni kuom Kristo .
47003015	Kata mana sani kisomo chik Musa to raum geng’o chunygi .
47003016	To saa asaya ma ng’ato olokore odhi ir Ruoth to raumno igolo oko .
47003017	Koro Ruoth e Rohonogo ; kendo kama Roho mar Ruoth nitie , thuolo nitie .
47003018	Koro wan duto mwanyiso picha mar duong’ Ruoth , ka ok waumo wengewa , imedo lokowa mondo wamed bedo machal lode , ka duong’ mawango medo medore ma wuok kuom Ruoth , ma en Roho .
47004001	Emomiyo , ka koro Nyasaye oseke-chowa momiyo wa tijni mondo watim , chunywa ok nyosre .
47004002	Wasekwedo timbe maling’ling’ mag miriambo ma kuodo wich , ok wakonyre gi wuond , bende ok wagaj wach Nyasaye , to wawuotho e ler mar adiera kendo wachi-wore ni ji duto , mondo chunygi orwakwa e nyim Nyasaye .
47004003	Nikech ka poni Injili mwayalo ogeng’ore , to ogeng’ore mana ni joma lal .
47004004	Joma kamago otamore yie nikech nyasach pinyni osedino pachgi mondo kik gine ler mar Injili manyiso duong’ mar Kristo , ma en e kido mar Nyasaye .
47004005	Nikech ok wayal wach kuomwa wawegi , to wayalo Yesu Kristo kaka Ruoth , to wan wawegi wan jotichu kuom Yesu .
47004006	Nikech Nyasaye mane owacho ni , " Ler mondo orieny koa e mudho " ema osemiyo lerne omenyo chunywa , momiyowa ler mar ng’eyo duong’ Nyasaye mineno e lenda wang’ Yesu Kristo .
47004007	To mwandu mawangoni wating’o e agulni mag lowo , mondo oyangre ni teko maduong’ mawangoni oa kuom Nyasaye , to ok oa kuomwa wawegi .
47004008	Pile idiyowa matek e yore duto , to ok dinwa ; wadhier nono , to ok wajogi ;
47004009	isandowa , to ok jwang’wa ; igoyowa piny , to ok tiekwa .
47004010	Kinde duto wawuotho ka wating’o tho mar Yesu e ringrewa , mondo eka ngima mar Yesu onere e ringrewa .
47004011	Nikech wan mwangima ochomwa gi tho kinde duto nikech wach Yesu , mondo ngima mar Yesu onere e ringrewa matho .
47004012	Omiyo koro wan tho tiyo kuomwa , to un , ngima tiyo kuomu .
47004013	Ondik ni : " Ne ayie emomiyo ne awuoyo " . Gi chuny mar yie machalre , wan bende wayie kendo wawuoyo ,
47004014	nikech wang’eyo ni Jal mane ochiero Ruoth Yesu oa kuom joma otho biro chierowa wan bende gi Yesu , kendo obiro kelowa kaachiel gi un , e nyime .
47004015	Magi duto timore mondo okonyu , mondo kaka ng’wono medo chopo ni ji mang’eny moloyo , ji odwok erokamano ni Nyasaye , mondo Nyasaye oyud duong’ .
47004016	Emomiyo chunywa ok nyosre . Kata obedo ni ringrewa maoko rumo kamano , to chunywa iloko manyien odiechieng’ kodiechieng’ .
47004017	Nikech chandruok mwayudo matindo kendo makadho piyo biro kelonwa duong’ mosiko kendo moloyo chandruokgo duto .
47004018	Omiyo ok wachom wengewa kuom gik mineno , to kuom gik maok ne . Nikech gik mineno gi wang’ rumo , to gik maok ne siko nyaka chieng’ .
47005001	Nikech wang’eyo ni ka kiru mwadakieni okethi , to wan gi ot ma Nyasaye osegeronwa e polo , ma en ot mosiko , ma lwet dhano ok ogero .
47005002	Kapod wan e kiruni to wachur ka wagombo mondo orwakwa gi odwa mar polo
47005003	nikech ka waserwakore kode , to ok bi yudwa duk .
47005004	Nikech kapod wadak e kiruni , to wachur gi pek modiyowa , to mano ok onyiso ni wadwaro weyo ringruok mawangoni , to wagombo rwakore gi ringruok manyien mar polo , mondo gima ok tho omwony mano matho .
47005005	Nyasaye ema oseikonwa chenro machalo kama , kendo osemiyowa Roho kaka singo , ma singo gima biro .
47005006	Kuom mano , wan-gi chir pile , kendo wang’eyo ni ka pod wadak e ringr uokni to wan mabor gi Ruoth .
47005007	Wadak kuom yie to ok kuom gik mwaneno .
47005008	Wawacho ni wan-gi chir kendo dwaher moloyo weyo dak e ringruokni mondo wadag kanyachiel gi Ruoth .
47005009	Omiyo thorro marwa maduong’ en mondo watim dwarone , bed ni pod wadak e ringruokni kata ka wase aa .
47005010	Nikech nyaka wan duto wabi wachung’ e nyim kom bura mar Kristo , mondo ng’ato ka ng’ato oyud gima owinjore gi gik mane otimo kapod en ringruok kata gin gik mabeyo , kata maricho .
47005011	nikech koro wang’eyo gima luoro Ruoth en , watemo ywayo ji . Wan to Nyasaye ong’eyowa malong’o , kendo ageno ni un bende ung’eyowa malong’o chuth e chunyu maiye .
47005012	Ok watem pwoyorenu kendo , to wamiyou gima unyalo sungorugo kuomwa , mondo uyud gima unyalo dwokogo joma sungore nikech timbegi maoko mineno to ok nikech gima ni e chunygi .
47005013	Kapo mano nyalo miyo wachal joneko , to obedo nikech Nyasaye ; to ka pachwa ni kare , to en kamano nikech un .
47005014	Nikech hera mar Kristo chunowa mondo watim gik mwatimo , nikech wan-gi ratiro ni ng’ato achiel notho ne ji duto ; omiyo ji duto notho .
47005015	To notho ni ji duto mondo joma ngima koro kik bed mangima mana ni gin giwegi , to mondo gibed mangima ni Jal ma notho mochako ochier nikech gin .
47005016	Omiyo chakre sani koro ok wang’e ng’ato e yo mapiny ng’eyogo ji . Kata obedo ni kinde moko ne wang’eyo Kristo e yo makamano , tinde ok watim kamano kendo .
47005017	Emomiyo ka ng’ato ni kuom Kristo to en chwech manyien ; gik machon osekadho , neuru , gik manyien osechopo !
47005018	Magi duto oa kuom Nyasaye , mane ogolo sigu mane nie kindwa kode kotimowa osiepene kuom Kristo , kendo omiyowa tich mar loko wasike osiepene :
47005019	tiende ni Nyasaye ne timo winjruok gi piny kuom Kristo , ka ok okwano richo ji e wigi . To wan ema osemiyowa wach manyiso ji kaka digibed e winjruok gi Nyasaye .
47005020	Kuom mano , wan e jombetre mag Kristo , wachalo kagima Nyasaye konyore kodwa kuom ywayo ji ire . Wahombou ka wachung’ kar Kristo , mondo uwinjru kod Nyasaye .
47005021	Nyasaye noketo Jal mane onge richo obedo richo mondo kuome wabed joma kare mag Nyasaye .
47006001	Kaka Jotich kaachiel gi Nyasaye wakwayou mondo kik ukaw ng’wono Nyasaye museyudo ka gir tugo .
47006002	Nikech owacho ni , " Ne awinji e saa mowinjore ; chutho ne akonyi e odiechieng’ mar warruok . Awachonu ni , ma e saa mar Nyasaye mowinjore , ma e odiechieng warruok .
47006003	Ok wadwar ni ng’ato oyud ketho moro amora e tichwa , omiyo watemo mondo kik wachwany ng’ato .
47006004	Wan kaka jotich Nyasaye wanyisore e yore mang’eny kaka : dhil maduong’ , sandruok , chandruok kod e masiche ;
47006005	e goch , e tuech , e koko , e tich matek , e fuwo nindo otieno mang’eny , gi riyo kech ;
47006006	kuom ritruok maler , kuom ng’eyo , kuom kinda , kuom ng’wono , kuom Roho Maler gi hera mar adier ;
47006007	kuom wacho adier , kendo kuom teko mar Nyasaye . Watimo gigi duto ka wating’o gilweny mag ngima makare e lwetwa korachwich gi koracham ;
47006008	ka imiyowa duong’ kendo ichayowa ; iletho nyingwa kendo ipwoyowa , joma odim-bore to ikawowa ka joma ketore ;
47006009	joma ong’ere to wachal joma ok ong’e , kendo wachalo joma chiegni tho , to pod ineno mana ka wangima angima , igoyowa to ok negwa ;
47006010	wakuyo , to wasiko wamor amora , wadhier , to wamiyo ji mathoth doko jo mwandu , wanenore ka gima waonge gimoro , to kare wan ema wan gi gik moko duto tee .
47006011	Yaye jo Korintho , wawuoyonu ka wan kodu thuolo kendo ka chunywa oya-worenu malach .
47006012	Wan ok wapandonu herawa , to un ema upandonwa .
47006013	Ka anyalo wuoyonu kaka nyithinda , to awachonu ni , un bende yawnwauru chunyu malach !
47006014	" Kik uriwru gi jopiny . Nimar en winjruok mane ma ber gi rach dibedgo e achiel ? Koso ere kaka ler gi mudho didag kanyachiel ?
47006015	Winjruok mane ma Kristo nigo gi O bel ? En ang’o madiriw ng’ama oyie gi ng’ama pok oyie ?
47006016	Winjruok mane ma Hekalu mar Nyasaye nigo gi nyiseche manono ? Nikech wan e Hekalu mar Nyasaye mangima ! Mana kaka Nyasaye owuon osewacho ni : " Abiro dak e igi kendo abiro wuotho e diergi kendo abiro bedo Nyasachgi to ginibed joga . "
47006017	" Emomiyo auru kuomgi kendo pogreuru kodgi , Ruoth owacho . Kik umul gima ochido , eka narwaku . "
47006018	Anabed Wuonu to unubed yawuota gi nyiga , Ruoth Manyalo Gik Moko Duto owacho . "
47007001	Koro osiepena mageno kaka wan-gi singruokgi , wapwodhreuru kuom gik moko duto machido ringruok gi chuny mondo wadok jomaler chuth nikech waluoro Nyasaye .
47007002	Yawnwauru chunyu . Pok watimo ni ng’ato marach kendo pok waketho ne ng’ato , bende pok wamayo ng’ato gire kwakonyore gi wuond .
47007003	Ok awach wechegi mondo ang’adnu bura kaka joketho , nikech , kaka nasewachonu motelo , wagenou gi genruok maduong’ e chunywa , kendo waikore tho kodu kendo bedo mangima kodu .
47007004	An gi chir maduong’ kuomu ; asungora matek nikech un ! Kaparou to chunya yudo jip mathoth kendo e chandruokwa duto , chunya opong’ gi mor motiak .
47007005	Nikech , kata kane wabiro Makedonia , ringrewa ne ok oyweyo mak oneno sand mak rum ; dhawo nolworowa gi oko to chunywa nopong’ gi luoro .
47007006	To Nyasaye , majiwo joma chunygi onyosore , nojiwowa kane Tito obiro irwa ,
47007007	to ok birone kende ema nojiwowa , to hoch mane uhoyego bende nojiwowa . Nonyisowa kaka un-gi siso mar nena , kendo kaka chunyu otur , kendo kaka uikoru mar chwaka ma mago duto nomiya amor moloyo .
47007008	Nikech kata ka barupa mane andikonu nomiyo ukuyo , to ok anyal timonu mos . Kata kamano ne atimo mos , nikech aneno ni barupano nomiyou chuny lit , to mana matin nono .
47007009	To koro amor , ok nikech ne uyudo chuny lit , to nikech chuny litno nokelonu lokruok . Nikech nubedo gi chuny lit mar Nyasaye , kendo ne ok uhinyoru e yo moro amora nikech wan .
47007010	Nikech kuyo mar Nyasaye kelo lokruok , makelo warruok kendo ok mi waywag ang’e , to kuyo mar piny kelo tho .
47007011	Neuru gima kit kuyo mar Nyasaye osenyago e ngimau : osemiyo udoko joma otang’ mak badhre ni loso weche manie dieru . Koro usin gi timbe mamono ; uluoro donjo e richo kendo ; uhera kendo ugombo mondo amed konyou e wachno kendo uikoru kumo joma oketho . Koro usepwodhoru udoko maler e wach mane otimore e dieru .
47007012	Omiyo kata kane andikonu to ne ok en nikech wach ng’at mane otimo marach , kata nikech joma notimnigi marach , to ne andikonu mondo , e nyim Nyasaye , uneye kaka ugenowa .
47007013	Magi duto osejiwowa . Kaachiel gi jip mane wayudo koa kuomwa wawegi , moloyo to ne wamor kane waneno mor mane Tito nigo , nikech dhial mane umiye .
47007014	Noyudo asesungorene nikech un , kendo koro ok usekuo-do wiya . To mana gik moko duto mwasebedo ka wawachonu gin adiera e kaka sunga mane wasungorego ni Tito kuomu bende osedoko gima adier .
47007015	Omiyo koro hera moherougo osemedore moloyo , koparo kaka un duto ne uwinjo wachwa , kendo kaka ne urwake gi luoro kod kibaji .
47007016	Amor sidang’ ni anyalo bedo gi geno kuomu chuth .
47008001	To koro Jowetewa wadwaro ni ung’e gima ng’wono mar Nyasaye osetimo ni kanise man Makedonia .
47008002	Kata obedo ni giseneno malit mokalo pimo , kendo gidhier ahinya kamano , to mago osemiyo gimedo bedo mamor moloyo , kendo chiwogi mar ng’wono osemedore mokalo pimo .
47008003	Anyisou adier ni ne gichiwore mar chiwo kaka ginyalo , kendo moloyo nyalo-gi . Ka onge ng’ama ochunogi ,
47008004	ne gisay-owa ka giramo ni gin bende nyaka gichiw makorgi kuom konyo jo Nyasaye .
47008005	Ne gichiwo mathoth moloyo kaka ne waparo ! Mokuongo ne gichiwore ni Ruoth ; eka bang’e gichiwore ni wan bende , kaka Nyasaye dwaro .
47008006	Omiyo ne wajiwo Tito , kaka en ema nochako tijni e dieru , mondo odhi kode nyime nyaka chop otiek tij ng’wonono .
47008007	To ka umewo mokalo e gik moko duto ma ungo , kaka : yie maru , gi losou , gi ng’eyou , gi ikruok maru mar konyo , kod hera muherowago wadwaro ni tij ng’wononi mar chiwo bende utimie maber moloyo .
47008008	Ok amiu chik kuom wachni , to anyisou kaka joma oikore konyo tich Nyasaye mondo atemgo herau ka bende en hera madier .
47008009	Nikech ung’eyo ng’wono mar Ruodhwa Yesu Kristo kaka chai , ni kata obedo ni ne en gi mwandu , to nodoko modhier , nikech un , mondo un ubed jomwandu nikech dhierneno .
47008010	Koro ma e pacha kuom wachni : Sani koro ber mondo utiek tich mane uchako higa mokalo . Un emane uchako tijni mokuongo , ok nukuongo chako choko kende , to nukuongo bedo gi dwaro mar chiwo giu bende .
47008011	Omiyo koro dhiuru nyime gi tijno nyaka utieke ! Beduru gi ikruok mar tieke mana kaka nubedo gi chenro mar chake , to timuru kamano mana gi giu maungo .
47008012	Nikech un gidwaro mar chiwo , to Nyasaye biro rwako chiwono kaluwore gi gik maungo munyalo chiwo , to ok gik muongego .
47008013	Dwarowa ok en mondo jomoko odong’ gi ting’ mayot to un wamiu ting’ mapek , to dwarowa en ni ji duto ochiw maromre .
47008014	To sani ma ungo mogundho biro konyo dwaro ma gin-go , mondo un bende achien ma gin-go mogudho biro konyo dwaro ma ungo . Kamano otimore to ubiro bedo gi konyruok maromre ,
47008015	mana kaka ondiki ni , " Ng’at mane ochoko mang’eny ne ok obedo gi mathoth ahinya kendo ng’at mane ochoko manok , ne ok obedo gi matin mohingo " .
47008016	Adwoko erokamano ni Nyasaye moseketo , e chuny Tito , dwaro mar konyou , mana kaka an bende ango .
47008017	Ne ok orwako mana kwayowa kende , to ne ochiwore kende en owuon mar konyou , mi koro ero obiro iru kuom dwarone owuon .
47008018	To bende waoro owadwa moro kode , mong’ere e kanise duto ne tije mar Injili .
47008019	To ok mano kende , kanise ne oyiere mondo odhi kodwa e wuodhwa mar tero chiwo . Tijno watimo mondo wami Ruoth owuon duong’ kendo mondo ji ong’e ni waikore konyo .
47008020	Wadwaro mondo ji kik ne rach moro e yo mwatiye tij mich mar ng’wononi .
47008021	nikech watemo matek mondo watim maber , ok e wang’ Ruoth kende , to e wang’ dhano bende .
47008022	Jal machielo mwaoro kodgi en owadwa mwasetemo mwaneno ni en ng’ama ochiwore ni tije mangeny , to sani koro ochiwore moloyo nikech gen mogenou .
47008023	Tito to anyalo loso kuome kaka nyi-wuodha kendo jatich mwatiyogo kaachiel e dieru , to jowetewa mamokogo to gin joma kanise Ooro , mondo omi Kristo duong .
47008024	Omiyo nyisuru jootewago ni un joma ohero ji , mondo kanise duto oyie ni sungawa kuomu ok en mar oyuma .
47009001	Onge tiende mondo andiknu kendo kuom kony monego oor ni joma ler ,
47009002	Ang’eyo ni uikoru konyo , kendo asesungou ni jo Makedonia , ka anyisogi ni owete man Akaya osebedo moikore konyo chakre higa mokalo kendo ramo maru osejiwo thothgi .
47009003	Koro ee aoro owetegi mondo sungawa kuomu kuom wachni kik lokre mana weche manono ; to mondo giyudu kuikoru mana kaka ne asewachonigi .
47009004	Nono to , ka jo Makedoniagi obiro koda moyudo ka ok uikoru , wiwa dikuodi , ( ka ok aloso e wichkuot ma un bende duyudi ) nikech geno maduong’ mwaseketo kuomu .
47009005	Kuom mano ne aneno ni ber mondo ajiw owetegi mondo olimu chon mondo utiek chenro duto mag chip ng’wono mane usesingoru mar chiwo . Kamano , ka abiro to anayud ka chiwo maru mar ng’wono oikore , kendo mano nonyis ni uchiwe gi ng’wono , to ok kuom achuna .
47009006	Paruru wachni : Ng’at mokomo kodhi manok kayo cham manok , to ng’at mokomo kothe mang’eny kayo cham mang’eny .
47009007	Ng’ato ka ng’ato mondo ochiw kaka chunye oyiero , ma ok oywago ang’e , kata nikech ochune , nimar Nyasaye ohero ng’at ma chiwone ka mor .
47009008	To Nyasaye nyalo miyo ubed gi gweth mogundho , mondo kinde duto ubed gi gik moko duto munyalo konyorugo un uwegi , kod mamoko malang’ munyalo konyogo jomamoko .
47009009	Kaka ondiki ni , " Ochiwo gige ni joma odhier gi ng’wono , ber mare osiko nyaka chieng’ . "
47009010	Koro Jal machiwo kodhi ni jalomo , kendo mamiyo jachiemo makati biro chiwonu kendo medonu dimang’eny kodhi mikomo kendo obiro miyo timu makare medore .
47009011	Obiro miyo udok jomwandu e yore duto , mondo ubed mang’won kinde duto , kendo mondo ji mang’eny odwok erokamano ni Nyasaye kuom mich mane wateronigi koa kuomu .
47009012	Nikech tich mutimoni ok chop mana dwaro jomaler fende , to bende omiyo ji dwoko erokamano ni Nyasaye nikech kony ma giyudo .
47009013	Kuom nyiso ni uchung’ kodwa e tijni , umiyo Nyasaye duong’ nikech mano nyiso ni umako chik mar Injili mwahulo , kuom ng’wono mane omiyo uyie pogo kodgi giu , kaachiel gi jomoko bende .
47009014	Omiyo gibiro lamonu Nyasaye , ka chunygi otwere kodu , kuom ng’wono mogundho ma Nyasaye osemiyou .
47009015	Wagouru erokamano ni Nyasaye kuom michne maduong’ mokalo apima !
47010001	Koro an Paulo awuon akwayou kuom muolo kod ng’wono mar Kristo-ma ji wacho ni amuol ka aloso kodu wang’ gi wang’ to ni akwiny ka an mabor kodu !
47010002	Asayou ni kik umi abi iru ka ager , kaka ajabedoga ni jomoko maparo ni wadak e pinyni kwaluwo dwaro jopiny .
47010003	Nikech kata obedo ni wadak e pinyni , to ok wakedi kaka jopiny kedo .
47010004	Nikech gilweny mwafedogo ok gin mag pinyni , to gin gilweny mager mag Nyasaye , mwakonyorego kuom muko kuonde mochiel motegno .
47010005	Waketho mbekni kod riekni mag wuondruok duto mag sunga dhano , ma dino ni ji yor ng’eyo Nyasaye , kendo watweyo paro ka paro mobam , mi wami owinj Kristo .
47010006	Adier , wabiro kumo kit ng’anjo moro amora e dieru , nyaka chop un duto ubed joma obolore chuth .
47010007	Ung’iyo gik moko mana mothanyore gi oko . Ka ng’ato ang’ata paro ni en ng’at Kristo , to kik gimoro wuonde ni en ng’at Kristo moloyo wa !
47010008	Nikech kata ka dipo ni asesungora mokalo kare kuom teko ma wango ma Ruoth osemiyowa mar gerou , to ok mar kethou , to wiya ok kuodi kata matin .
47010009	Ok adwar mondo anenra kagima abwogou gi barupena .
47010010	Nikech jomoko kuomu wacho ni , " Barupege pek kendo kwiny ka en kodwa e ringruok to onenore ng’ama yomyom , kendo koyalo to wechene onge tich . "
47010011	Joma wuoyo kamano nyaka ng’e ni weche mwawachonu e barupewa mwandikonu ka waonge , ema bende watimo ka wan kodu .
47010012	Chutho , ok dwahedhre mar ketore , kata pimore gi jogogo mating’ore malo , kaka joma lich mokalo . Joma kamago ofuwo , kuom pimore gi rapim magin giwegi ema giketo , kendo kuom ng’ado buchgi kendgi , kaka joma lich .
47010013	Wan to ok dwasungre mokalo kiewo moketnwa , to wabiro keto sungawa kama onego ogikie , kaluwore gi kar tich ma Nyasaye osechanonwa , ma okwako nyaka koru kono .
47010014	Omiyo ka wasungore ni tendwa okwako nyaka koru kono , to ok wakal tong’wa nikech wan emane wakuongo chopo iru gi Injili mar Kristo bang’ wuotho wuoth marabora .
47010015	To bende , ok dwasungre mokalo tong’wa kuom tich ma jomoko nono ema timo . To genowa en ni , kaka yie maru medo gerore , e kaka tong’wa mar Injili biro medo yarore ,
47010016	mondo eka wayal Injili e pinje mabor moyombou . Nikech ok wadwar sungore kuom tich ma ng’at machielo ema otimo e kare mar tich .
47010017	To " Ng’at madwaro sungore , mondo osungre kuom Ruoth . "
47010018	Nikech ng’at mapwoyore kende ok ema ji yiego , to mana ng’at ma Ruoth pwoyo .
47011001	Ageno ni ubiro bedo mang’won koda kuom fupa madundoni , ma bende usebedo ka uyiego .
47011002	Nyiego omaka kodu machalo gi nyiek Nyasaye . Ne asin-gou ne dichwo achiel kende , ma en Kristo mondo omi achiwu kaka nyako masili ni en .
47011003	To aluor ni dipo ka pachu okethore , mi uwe hera matut kendo maler muhero-go Kristo , mana kaka Hawa ne thuol owuondo gi miriambone mariek .
47011004	Nikech ka ng’ato obiro e dieru ka yalonu Yesu mopogore gi mano mane wayalonu , kendo kata uyudo Roho machielo gi mano mane uyudo , kendo uyie gi Injili moro amora mopogore gi mane uyudo , kendo uchikone itu gimor .
47011005	To ok apar ni an piny ahinya moloyo " joote " mamoko mukwano ni dongo malichgo !
47011006	Nyalo bedo ni ok ang’ith e wuoyona , kata kamano , an gi ng’eyo kuom gik ma apuonjo . Wasebedo ka waleronu wechegi kinde ka kinde .
47011007	Mitka ukwana jaketho nikech ne adwokora piny , mondo eka ating’u malo , kane ayalonu Injili mar Nyasaye maok adwaro chudo koa kuomu ?
47011008	Ne amayo kanise moko e yor yudo kony eka mondo atinu .
47011009	Kendo kane atiyo e dieru , to ne ok amiyo ng’ato ang’ata ting’ mapek e kinde mane an gi dwaro moro amora , nikech owete moa Makedonia nokelona gik moko duto mag konyruok . Asetemo matek mondo kik abednu misigo e yo moro amora , kendo pod abiro medo timo kamano .
47011010	Chutho , ka pod adiera mar Kristo nikuoma , onge ng’ama biro chungo sunganani e gwenge mag Akaya .
47011011	Nang’o ? Nikech ok aherou koso ? Ngang’ . Nyasaye ong’eyo ni aherou .
47011012	To abiro dhi nyime katimo gima atimoni mondo ageng’ " joote " mamoko masungore kendo wacho ni gitiyo tich machalre gi marwa .
47011013	Josungago ok gin joote madier . Gin joote mag miriambo , kendo giriambo kuom tich magitimo , ka giketore mondo gichal gi joote madier mag Kristo .
47011014	To maok nyal kawowa gi wuoro nikech kata Satan bende wuondore koke-tore kaka malaika mar ler .
47011015	Kuom mano wachni ok wendo kuomwa , ka jotich satan bende oriedo mondo okwan kaka jotich mag tim makare . To e giko gibiro yudo kum mowinjore gi timbegi .
47011016	Anuoyo : Kik ng’ato kawa ni afuwo . To ka uhero , to kawauru kaka ng’at mofuwo , mondo an bende asungrae matin .
47011017	Gima koro adwaro wachoni ok Ruoth ema oyiena mondo awachi , to awache e yor fuwo .
47011018	Nikech ji mathoth sungore kaka jopiny sungore , an bende weuru asungrae matin .
47011019	Un uwegi ukaworu niuriek , to pod urwako joma ofuwo gi riekougo tee !
47011020	Chutho urwako koda ka joma lokou wasumbini maggi , kata ma kawo giu e yor mecho , kata ma gajou , kata ma tiyou githuon , kata ma diyou piny kendo thalo lembu !
47011021	Ayie kawo wichkuot muketo kuomano ; nikech wan ne ok wanyal timo gik majogo timo , nikech wanyap ! To ka ng’ato nyalo hedhore mar sungore kuom gimoro amora — awuoyo kaka ng’ama ofuwo — to an bende anyalo sungora mana kaka gin .
47011022	Di gibed jo Hibrania ? An bende an . Di gibed jo Israel ? An bende an . Digibed nyikwa Ibrahim ? An bende an .
47011023	Di gibed jotich Kristo ? ( Ka awuoyo kama to achalo janeko ) An awuon an jatich maber moloyo ! Asetiyo matek moloyo ; osetweya e od twech kinde mang’eny moloyo ; oserodha gi del kinde mang’eny moloyo ; kendo asebedo machiegni gi tho kinde mang’eny moloyo .
47011024	Jo-Yahudi ne ochwa-da del piero adek gochiko nyadibich .
47011025	Bende jo-rumi norodha nyadidek gi ludhe , kendo ne ochiela gi kite dichiel . Yie ne obarore koda e nam nyadidek , kendo chieng’ moro ne ariyo e dier nam otieno kod odiechieng
47011026	E wuodhega mathoth , aseneno masiche e aore mopong ; asethagora e lwet jomecho , e dier jo Yahudi wetena kod joma ok jo-Yahudi . Masiche ne olwora e mier madongo , e thimbe , e ataro , kendo e dier ' Jowete ' ma wuondore .
47011027	Asetiyo matek gi lwetena , kendo asechandora malit , ka afuwo nindo n dalo mang’eny . Kech osechama , kendo riyo oseloya ; kinde mathoth asebedo ka aonge gi chiemo moromo , asewuotho duk .
47011028	To ewi mago duto , an gi ting’ machielo modiya mar paro kuom kanise duto .
47011029	Ka ng’ato nyap , to donge an bende adoko manyap kode ? Koso ka ng’ato odonjo e richo , to donge litna ?
47011030	Ka ochuna ni nyaka asungra , to abiro sungora , kuom gik manyiso nyawona .
47011031	Nyasaye ma Wuon Ruoth Yesu ma ipako nyaka chieng’ , ong’eyo ni ok ariambi .
47011032	Ka an Damaski , jatelo manie bwo ruoth Areta noketo jorit e ranga dala mar jo-Damaski mondo omaka .
47011033	To ne atony kane oketa ei okapu , mi olora piny kakadho e otuchi manie kor ohinga .
47012001	Nyaka asungra kata obedo ni w sunga masungorago ok kony gimoro . To koro awuoyo kuom lek gi fweny mane Ruoth omiya .
47012002	Ang’eyo ja Kristo moro mane oyudhi moter e polo mar adek , higni apar gang’wen mokalo ( Akia kata notere kuno e ringruok kata nodhi gi chunye-Nyasaye ema ong’eyo )
47012003	Kendo ang’eyo ni ng’atni kata e ringruok kata ok e ringrouk nodhiyo kuro , ( ok ang’eyo-Nyasaye ema ong’eyo )
47012004	motere nyaka e paradiso . Kuno nowinjoe weche malich ma ok oyiene dhano losoe .
47012005	Abiro mana sungora kuom ng’at machalo kamano , to ok anyal sungora kuoma awuon-makmana ka asungora kuom gigo manyiso nyawona
47012006	To kata ka daher mar sungora , to ok dikawa ni afuwo , nikech gik ma dimi asungra gin adier . To ok abi sungora , nikech ok adwar ni ng’ato okawa ni an ng’ama lich moloyo gik mosene ka atimo , kendo mosewinj ka awacho .
47012007	To mondo geng’a kik asungra kuom gik malich miwuoro mane aneno e fweny , ne omiya kudho machwoyo ringra . Kudhono ne en jaote mar Satan , ma noor mondo osanda eka otama kik asungra .
47012008	Ne alamo Ruoth nyadidek kuom wachni , ka asaye mondo ogolna kudhono ;
47012009	to ne odwoka ni , " Ng’wonona mamiyi oromi , nikech kama nyawo nitie ema tekona tiyoe moloyo " Emomiyo , abiro medo sungora gi ilo kuom nyawoga , mondo eka teko mar Kristo osik kuoma .
47012010	Mano omiyo nikech Kristo awinjo maber e nyawo maga , kata ayany , kata chandruok , kata sand , kata midhiero , nikech ka anyap koreka atek .
47012011	Un ema umiyo atimora kaka ng’ama ofuwo . To joma onego opwoya gin un , nikech kata ka achalo ng’ama nono kamano , to ' joote ' mudhialo ni lichgo ok oloya kata matin .
47012012	Gik manyiso ni ng’ato jaote mar adier , magin ranyisi gi honni kod gik madong-dongo miwuoro , ne atimo e dieru ka ahora mos ahinya .
47012013	En ang’o mane atimo ni kanisa mamoko ma un ne ok atimonu , makmana ni un ne ok amiyou ting’ mapek mar konya ? Kapo mano ne rachnu to mondo uwena !
47012014	Koro ailora biro limou e limbena mar adek . Ka abiro to ok abi miyou ting’ mapek , nikech un ema adwarou , to ok gigeu . Mano en gima ong’ere , nikech nyithindo ok ema onego okan mwandu ni jonyuolgi , to jonyuol ema onego oken ni nyithindgi .
47012015	Emomiyo ailora mar miyou gik moko duto ma an go , koda ka ngimana bende , mondo eka akonyu . Ka an aherou malach kamano , koro un onego uhera matin adier ?
47012016	Koro unyalo yie koda nine ok abedonu ting’ mapek . To pod unyalo wacho ni ne akonyora gi rieka maricho mondo amau ling’ling’ .
47012017	To be dine amayoue giru moro kuom joma ne aoro iru ?
47012018	Ne ajiwo Tito mondo obi iru , kendo ne aoro owadwa machielo mondo obi kode . Mitki Tito owuon nomayou giu ? Donge en kod an ne watiyo e dieru ka wan gi chuny machalre kendo ka waluwo yo machalre ?
47012019	Samoro nyalo bet ni uparo ni watemo pwoyorenu kuom wuoyonu kama . Ngang’ ! Wawuoyo e nyim Nyasaye mana kaka jo Kristo . Osiepewa mwageno , ng’euru ni gik moko duto mwatimo watimo mondo wageru .
47012020	Aluor ni ka abiro iru kuno to anyalo yudou ka ok uchal kaka adwaro ni uchal , kendo un bende unyalo yudo ka apoya gi kaka udwaro ni abedi . Aluor ni anyalo yudo ka nitie dhawo gi nyiego , gi mirima , gi ichlit , gi ajara , gi kuoth , gi sunga kod koko e dieru .
47012021	Aluor bende ni ka achako alimou kendo to timbeu nyalo miyo Nyasacha kuod wiya e nyimu , mi aywagi nikech ji mathoth kuomu o setimo richo kendo pok olokore oweyo dwanyruok , terruok kod anjawo magisetimo .
47013001	Ma koro dhi bedo limbena mar adek malimo ugo . To mana kaka Ndiko wacho , " Adiera mar wach nyaka losi e nyim joneno ariyo kata adek . "
47013002	Kaka ne asiemou e limbena mar ariyo , e kaka amedo siemou sani ka aonge kodu ni ka abiro to ok nawe mak akumo jogo mane otimo richo motelo kod joricho mamoko duto
47013003	nikech uwacho ni udwaro mondo ubed gi ratiro ka Kristo ema miya teko mar wuoyo adier . En ok onyap kotiyo kodu , to otiyo gi teko e dieru .
47013004	Nikech , kuom adier , ne oyie doko manyap kane igure , to koro ongima kuom teko Nyasaye . Mano e kaka wan bende wanyap ka wan kuome , to kuom teko Nyasaye wan roteke kwatiyo kodu .
47013005	Nonreuru mondo une ane ka bende un gi yie . Adier , temreuru ane ! Be un gi ratiro adier ni Kristo nie iu , makmana ka userem chuth ?
47013006	Ageno ni ubiro yudo ni pok warem e penj .
47013007	Koro walamo Nyasaye ni ok ubi timo gimoro amora marach , ok mondo eka ji onewa kaka joma oselocho , to mondo un utim timbe mabeyo , kata kapo ni wanto wanenorenu kaka joma oserem .
47013008	Nikech ok wanyal timo gimoro amora makedo gi adiera , to mana ma adiera .
47013009	Nikech wan wamor ka wanyap , to un utek . Omiyo walamonu mondo udok malong’o chuth .
47013010	Ma e gima omiyo andikonu gigi ka aonge kodu , mondo ka achopo iru to kik akonyra gi gero etekona-teko ma Ruoth omiya en mar gerou to ok mar kethou .
47013011	Koro mogik Jowetena , oritiuru , losu-ru yoreu mobam , winjuru wechena , beduru gi winjruok e kindu , kendo daguru gi kuwe . Eka Nyasach hera kod kuwe nobed kodu .
47013012	Mosreuru un duto ng’ato gi ng’ato gi yogruok maler .
47013013	Joma ler duto omosou .
47013014	Mad ng’wono mar Ruoth Yesu Kristo , gi hera mar Nyasaye , gi lalruok mar Roho Maler obed kodu un duto .
48001001	An Paulo , ma jaote , maok oor gi dhano kata gi lwet dhano to noor gi Yesu Kristo kod Nyasaye Wuoro , ma nochiere oa kuom joma otho
48001002	kaachiel gi jowete duto man koda , Ne kanise man Galatia :
48001003	Ng’wono kod kuwe mondo obednu koa kuom Nyasaye Wuonwa , kod Ruoth Yesu Kristo ,
48001004	ma nochiwore nikech richowa mondo ogonywa waa e kethruok mag ndalogi , kaluwore gi dwaro Nyasachwa kendo Wuonwa ,
48001005	en ema mondo oyud duong’ mochwere nyaka chieng’ . Amin .
48001006	Awuoro ahinya ka uselokoru piyopiyo nono , mi uweyo Jal mane oluongou kuom ng’wono mar Kristo , kendo koro uluwo Injili mopogore gi mane opuonju ,
48001007	ma chutho ok en Injili kata matin . Kuom adiera nitie jomoko marundo pachu ka gitemo mondo gilok Injili mar Kristo obed magalagala .
48001008	To ka ng’ato dipuonju Wach Maber machielo mopogore gi mano mane wapuonjou , bed ni en wan , kata malaika moro moa e polo , to mondo okuong’e nyaka chieng’ .
48001009	Mana kaka wasewacho e kaka achako awacho kendo : ka ng’ato koro yalonu Injili ma opogore gi mane urwako to Nyasaye mondo okuong’e nyaka chieng’ !
48001010	Uparo ni koro adwaro puoch mar dhano ? Ooyo , adwaro puoch mar Nyasaye . Koso uparo ni atemo moro dhano ? Kane bed ni pod ne adwaro moro dhano , to dine ok abedo jatich Kristo .
48001011	Jowetena , adwaro ni mondo ung’e ni Injili mane ayalonu ok en gimoro ma dhano ema ochuogo .
48001012	Ne ok ayude kuom dhano moro amora , to bende ne ok opuonjago . Yesu Kristo owuon ema nofwenyona wachno .
48001013	Nimar usewinjo kaka ne achal ka ne pod aluwo kit lemo mar jo-Yahudi , kaka ne asando kanisa mar Nyasaye gi gero mokalo apima , kendo ne atemo mondo akethe chuth .
48001014	Jo-Yahudi mang’eny ma mbesena ne aloyo kuom lony e kit lemo marwa , kendo ne aketo chunya mar rito chike duto mag kwerena .
48001015	To ka Nyasaye , mane owala mi oketa tenge kaka gir tichne kane pok onyuola , kendo mane oluonga kuom ng’wonone , nohero
48001016	mondo oiwenyna Wuode , mondo ayal kuome e kind joma ok jo-Israel to ne ok apenjo ng’ato ang’ata ,
48001017	kendo ne ok adhi Jerusalem mondo ane jogo mane okuong-ona bedo joote , to ne adhi moriere tir nyaka e piny Arabia eka bang’e naduogo Damaski .
48001018	To bang’ higini adek ne adhi nyaka Jerusalem mondo ang’era gi Petro , kendo ne adak kode kuom ndalo apar gabich .
48001019	Ne ok aneno kata achiel kuom joote mamoko , makmana Jakobo ma owadgi Ruoth .
48001020	Akuong’ora e nyim Nyasaye ni gima andikonuni ok en miriambo .
48001021	Bang’e achien ne adhi Siria kod Silisia .
48001022	E kindeno kanise Kristo man Judea ne pok oyanga malong’o ni an ng’a .
