54002013	nikech Adam ema nokuong chwe eka bang’e Hawa .
54002014	To bende Adam ok emane owuondi , to dhako emane owuondi , mi odoko jaketho .
54002015	Kata kamano mon ibiro reso e saa nyuolo nyithindo , ka gisiko e yie kod hera gi ngima maler kendo modimbore .
54003001	Ma en wach madiera : Ka ng’ato ang’ata oketo chunye mondo obed jakwadh kanisa to odwaro tich mogen .
54003002	Jatend kanyakla mar jo-Kristo nyaka bed ng’at ma wach moro amora marach onge kuome chwor dhako achiel kende , ng’at mobidhore , moritore , kendo modimbore , ng’at moluor , mohero rwako welo kendo japuonj molony ,
54003003	ng’at maok ohero kong’o , ng’at maok ger , to owinjore obed ng’at mamuol , ma ok ohero dhawo kendo ma ok ohero pesa .
54003004	Nyaka obed ng’at morito ode maber kendo nyaka one ni nyithinde winjo wachne gi luor mowinjore .
54003005	( Ka ng’ato ok nyal rito ode to ere kaka dorit kanisa Nyasaye ? )
54003006	Kik obed ng’at molokore machiegni nono to sunga nyalo make mi opodhi kendo bura loye kaka noloyo jachien .
54003007	Bende nyaka obed ng’at majoma ok oyie loso kuome maber , mondo kik obadho mar jachien gaje mi opodhi kendo one wichkuot .
54003008	Kamano bende Jokony kanisa bende nyaka bed joma imiyo luor , joma odim-bore ma ok jomath kongo ' kendo joma ok oore gi yudo ohala e yo maok nikare .
54003009	Nyaka gimak adiera matut mar yie gi chuny maler maonge richo moro amora .
54003010	Nyaka temgi mokuongo , to ka oyudni onge wach moro marach kuomgi eka mondo yienigi bedo jokony
54003011	Kamano bende , mondegi nyaka bed joma inyalo miyo luor , kik gibed joma wuoyo marach kuom ji , to owinjore gibed mon moritore kendo majo adiera e weche duto .
54003012	Jokony kanisa nyaka bed chwor dhako achiel kende kendo nyaka orit nyithinde gi ode maber .
54003013	Joma osetiyo maber yudo nying maber kendo gibedo gi chir e yie margi kuom Kristo Yesu .
54003014	Kata obedo ni ageno biro iri mapiyo to andikoni wechegi mag puonj ' mondo ;
54003015	kaponi adeko to ing’e kaka ji onego owuothi e dier kanyakla mar jo Nyasaye , ma en Kanisa mar Nyasaye mangima , ma en e siro kendo mise mar adiera .
54003016	Chutho , mano kaka gii Nyasaye odhiero ng’eyo kendo nigi duong’ miwuoro . Nobiro e ringruok , Roho nonyiso ratiro ni oonge ketho , ne onene gi malaike ne oyal wachne e kind ogendini ji ne oyie kuome e piny ngima kendo ne otere malo e duong’ .
54004001	Roho Maler wacho maler ni jomoko nowe yie e ndalo giko mi ginilu chunje mawuondo ji kod puonj mayoreyore mag jochiende .
54004002	Puonj ma kamago aa kuom jomiriambo ma ketore ni gin joma beyo to ok gin , jogo ma chunygi manyiso ni gin joketho osetho , mana ka gima owang’ gi nyinyo maliet .
54004003	Gitamo ji ni kik okendi kendo gichiko ni ji kik cham chiemo moko , ma Nyasaye nochweyo mondo joma oyie kendo ong’eyo adiera okaw gi erokamano .
54004004	Nikech gik moko duto mane Nyasaye ochweyo beyo , kendo ok owinjore wakwer chiemo moro amora ka wakawe gi erokamano ,
54004005	nikech osepuodhe maler giwach Nyasaye gi lamo .
54004006	Ka ilero ni Jowete wechegi to ibiro bedo jatich maber mar Kristo Yesu , ka idongori e adiera mar yie gi puonj mabeyo miseluwo .
54004007	Bed mabor chuth gi sigendni manono mag piny maonge tich kod sigend mon motii ; to moloyo tiegri ibed molony e luoro Nyasaye .
54004008	Nikech kata obedo ni tuke mag rieyo ringruok nigi tiendgi , to luoro Nyasaye nigi gweth mathoth moloyo , e ngima masani kendo e ngima mabiro bende .
54004009	Ma en wach madiera mowinjore orua-ki chuth ,
54004010	Nikech mano emomiyo wanyagore gi tich matek kendo waledo , mondo waket genowa kuom Nyasaye mangima , ma en Jawar mar ji duto , to moloyo ni joma oyie .
54004011	Chik kendo puonj gigi .
54004012	Kik iyie ng’ato ang’ata chayi nikech pod itin , to bed ranyisi ni joma oyie kuom weche miwacho , gi gik mitimo , kod hera kendo kuom yie kod ngima maler .
54004013	Ket chunyi kuom somo ni ji Ndiko , kendo kuom jiwo ji kendo puonjo ji nyaka chopi abi .
54004014	Kik ijwang’ michni mane omiyi kaka nokor kuomi chieng’ mane jodongo oketo lwetgi kuomi .
54004015	Tim gigi gi chunyi duto , kichiwori chuth mar neno ni gitimore mondo ji duto one kaka imedo dhiyo nyime e yore duto .
54004016	Rit ngimani gi puonj ni maber . Tim sinani kodgi mak iweyo , nikech ka itimo kamano eka inires ngimani iwuon kaachiel gi joma winji .
54005001	Kik ikwer ng’ama duong’ gi dwol makwiny , to wuo kode mamuol giluor mana kaka wuonu monywoli . Kaw yawuowi matindo kaka omineni ,
54005002	to mon madongo kaw kaka mineni , kendo mon matindo kaw kaka nyimineni , e yo maler chutho .
54005003	Nyaka ipar mond liete modong’ kendgi ma adiera dwaro tony .
54005004	To ka chi liel nigi nyithindo kata nyikwayo to mondo gipuonjre keto lemogi e tich kuom rito joodgi ka gikonyo jonyuolgi gi kweregi kod deyegi , nikech timo kamano long’o ni Nyasaye .
54005005	Chi liel madwaro kony adier kendo man kende keto genone duto kuom Nyasaye , kendo osiko olamo odiechieng’ gotieno kokwayo Nyasaye mondo okonye .
54005006	To chi liel mohero raha , osetho kata obedo ni pod ongima .
54005007	Puonj ji puonjgi bende , mondo kik ng’ato obed gi achaya .
54005008	Ka ng’ato ok orito wedene , to moloyo ka ok orito joode owuon , to osekwedo yie marwa , kendo orach moloyo japiny .
54005009	Chi liel moro amora ok nyal ndik nyinge kama indike nying mond liete ka hike ok oloyo higini piero auchiel , to bende nyaka obed nine osekende gi dichwo achiel kende ,
54005010	kendo ong’eye kuom timbege mabeyo kaka oserito nyithindo e yo mowinjore kendo osebedo kohero rwako welo e ode , kendo osebedo ka olwoko tiend jomaler kendo ka okonyo joma nie chandrouk , kochiwore chuth ni timo gik mabeyo duto .
54005011	Mond liete mapod tindo kik indik nyinggi e kwenono . Nikech ka ringregi oewogi gi gombo to giweyo Kristo ka gimanyo chwo mondo okendgi .
54005012	Kuom mano gikelo kum kuomgi giwegi , nikech giseketho singruokgi mokuongo .
54005013	To bende , githoro bedo gi ngima mar samuoyo , ka gibayo abaya e ute ji koni gi koni . Ok gibed mana jo samuoyo kende , to jokuoth bende kagi chuogore e weche ji mamoko kendo ka giwuoyo e weche maok onego giwuoye .
54005014	Kuom mano daher mondo mond liete matindo okendi , mondo ginywol nyithindo , kendo mondo girit utegi mondo kik gimii jasigu thuolo mar ketho nying joma oyie .
54005015	Chutho , moko odok chien mi koro giluwo Satan .
54005016	To ka dhako moyie nigi mond liete e ode , onego okonygi en owuon mondo kik kanisa bed gi ting’ mapek mar ritogi , mondo omi kanisa okony mond liete mamoko man kendgi chuth maonge ng’ama nyalo konyogi .
54005017	Jodong kanisa morito weche mag kanisa onego par nyadiriyo , moloyo to mago ma tichgi en yalo kod puonjo .
54005018	Nikech Ndiko owacho ni , " Kik itwe dho dhiang’ kayuayo lodi ma idinogo cham , " kendo ni , " Jatich ber gi misache . "
54005019	Kik iyie gi ketho modonjnego jaduong’ kanisa ka onge joneno ariyo kata adek .
54005020	Joma osiko timo richo nyaka kwer ratiro e nyim ji mondo eka jomamoko obed maluor .
54005021	Achiki e nyim Nyasaye kendo e nyim Kristo Yesu , kaachiel gi malaika moyier , ni mondo ilu puonjgi adimba ma ok idewo wang’ ng’ato kendo ma ok idok kor ng’ato kayiem .
54005022	Kik irikni yieyo lwedo kuom ji , kendo kik iriwri e richo ji mamoko . Ritri mondo ngimani osik kaler .
54005023	We modho pi kende , to konyri gi divai matin nikech iyi kod tuochegi mosiko .
54005024	Richo mag jomoko ong’ong’ore kendo otelo nyimgi ka terogi e bura to richo jomoko to opondo kendo luwo bang’gi .
54005025	Mano bende e kaka tim ng’ato makare bende ong’ong’ore , kendo kata mana mago motimo mopondo ok nyal pondo .
54006001	Jogo duto manie bwo loch mar misumba onego omi jotendgi luor mowinjore kodgi mondo eka nying Nyasaye kod puonj mwapuonjo kik yany .
54006002	Jogo man gi ruodhi moyie bende kik nyisgi kit achaya moro amora nikech gin jowete kuom Kristo . Kar timo kamano to owinjore giti nigi maber moloyo , nikech jogo ma yudo ohala e tichgi gin owete kuom Kristo ma gihero . Magi e gik manyaka ipuonj ji kijiwogi matek .
54006003	Ka ng’ato ang’ata opuonjou gima opogore kendo ok winjre gi puonj matir mag Ruodhwa Yesu Kristo kendo mamiyo ji luoro Nyasaye ,
54006004	to ng’euru ni ng’at ma kamano wuondore kende owuon kendo onge gima ong’eyo . Ng’at ma kamano oore gi mino wach kendo gi goyo mbaka manono makelo nyiego , gi dhawo , gi kuoth , kod chich maricho ; kod miero ma ok rum e kind joma pachgi osekethore kendo ma adiera oselalnigi . Giparo ni lamo Nyasaye kata bedo jadin en yor yudo mwandu .
54006005	
54006006	To geno Nyasaye gi chuny modhil en ohala maduong’ .
54006007	Nimar onge gima ne wakelo e pinyni kendo onge gima wabiro kawo waago .
54006008	Omiyo ka wan-gi chiemo kod lewni to mago mondo oromwa .
54006009	Joma gombo mondo obed gi mwandu thoro nwango ' tem kendo gimoko e obadho kuom gik mofuwo mang’eny kod gombo mathoth mahinyo kendo tieko dhano chuth .
54006010	Nikech hero pesa e chakruok mar kit richo duto . Jomoko ma chunygi osegedo e yore mag yudo pesa oseweyo yie mi gichwowo chunygi giwegi gi masiche mathoth .
54006011	To in , ng’at Nyasaye , pogri gi mago duto kendo tim kinda kiwuotho e ngima makare kendo moluoro Nyasaye , e yie kod hera kendo kitimo kinda gi bedo mamuol .
54006012	Ked lweny maber mar yie , kendo mak matek wach ngima mochwere mane oluongine chieng’ mane itimo neno maber e nyim joneno mathoth .
54006013	E nyim Nyasaye ma miyo gik moko duto ngima , kendo e nyim Kristo Yesu ma notimo neno maber ka ne owuoyo e nyim Pontio Pilato , achiki ni
54006014	mondo irit Chik ni ma ok iketho kata rem nyaka chop Ruodhwa Yesu Kristo fwenyre
54006015	ma Nyasaye nokel e kinde mochano owuon ; Nyasaye mipako , ma en wuon Loch makende , kendo ma en Jaloch mar joloch kendo Ruoth mar ruodhi ;
54006016	Jal ma ok tho kendo modak e ler ma dhano ok nyal ng’iyo tir ; kendo Jal ma onge ng’ama oseneno kata manyalo neno . Duong’ gi loch duto odogne nyaka chieng’ . Amin .
54006017	Nyis joma nigi mwandu e pinyni mondo kik gibed jong’ayi kendo mondo kik giket genogi kuom mwandu mabiro leny nono to mondo giket genogi kuom Nyasaye mamiyowa gik moko duto mabup mondo wabedgo mamor .
54006018	Chikgi mondo gitim maber , ka gipong’ gi timbe mabeyo kendo mondo gibed mang’won ka giikore pogo ni ji mochando gik ma gin-go .
54006019	Ka gitimo kamano to gibiro kano mwandu ni gin giwegi , kendo mano nodoknigi mise motegno e ndalo mabiro , mondo eka gibed gi ngima madiera man gi tiende .
54006020	Timotheo , rit maber gima oseketi e lweti mondo iriti . Pogri gi mbekni manono mag piny gi gwenyo wach ma ji okawo ni rieko to ok gin rieko .
54006021	jomoko osekaworego ni gin gi rieko kendo kuom timo mano gise bayo gia kuom yie . Ng’wono obed kodu .
55001001	An Paulo jaote mar Kristo Yesu kuom dwaro mar Nyasaye , kaluwore gi singo mar ngima man kuom Kristo Yesu ,
55001002	ni Timotheo nyathina mahero , Ng’wono gi kech kod kuwe moa kuom Nyasaye Wuoro kod Kristo Yesu Ruodhwa .
55001003	Agoyo erokamano ni Nyasaye ma atiyone gi chuny maler maonge bura , mana kaka kwerena bende notiyone , ka apari odiechieng’ gotieno e lemona mapile .
55001004	An ka aparo kaka pi wang’i ne chwer to agombo neni ahinya mondo abed gi mor mogundho .
55001005	Oseparna kuom yieni maratiro , mane okuongo ne ni ei Lois dani gi Yunis minu . Ang’eyo kendo aonge kiawa ni in bende yieno ni e iyi bende .
55001006	Mano emomiyo ajiwi mondo ichier mich main-go mane Nyasaye omiyi chieng’ mane aketo lweta kuomi .
55001007	Nikech Nyasaye ne ok omiyowa chuny mar bedo ngoche to nomiyowa chuny mar bedo gi teko , gi hera kod ritruok .
55001008	Kuom mano kik wiyi kuodi kuom timo nend Ruodhwa kata nenda an ng’ate motue . Kar timo kamano to yie mondo osandi koda nikech Wach Maber , kuom teko mar Nyasaye ,
55001009	ma nowarowa kendo noluongowa mondo wadag e ngima maler . Mani ok nikech wasetimone gimoro maber to nikech dwarone owuon kendo kuom ng’wonone . Ne omiyowa ng’wononi kuom Kristo Yesu kane piny pok obetie ,
55001010	to sani koro ose-fwenynwago kuom biro mar Jawarwa , Kristo Yesu . En ema osetieko tho mi okelo ngima kod ngima mak rum e ler kuom wach maber .
55001011	Ne oyiera mondo abed jalendo kendo jaote gi japuonj mar Wach Maberni .
55001012	Mano emomiyo isanda kama . To wiya ok kuodi , nikech ang’eyo Jal ma aseyie kuome , kendo ang’eyo chutho ni onyalo rito ngimana gi chunya ma asechiwone nyaka ndalo nogono .
55001013	Mano mane i winjo kuoma , ritgi kaka ranyisi mar puonj maber , kod yie gi hera manie Kristo Yesu .
55001014	Rit mwandu maber mosemiyi , kirite gi teko mar Roho Maler modak e iwa .
55001015	Ing’eyo ni ji duto ma noa e piny Asia oseweya , koda ka Fugelo gi Hermogene .
55001016	Mad Nyasaye kech jood Onesiforo nikech nosiko kokonyo chunya kendo wiye ne ok okuot kod nyoroche-ga .
55001017	To ne omanya matek nyaka onwang’a kane obiro Rumi ka .
55001018	Alamo mondo Ruoth okeche e odiechieng’no mar Ruoth . Ing’eyo maber kaka nokonya e yore mang’eny e Efeso kuno .
55002001	To in , Wuoda , bed motegno kuom ng’wono manie Kristo Yesu .
55002002	Gigo mane iwinjo ka apuonjo e nyim joneno mathoth keti e lwet joma inyalo geno , manyalo puonjo jomamoko bende .
55002003	Bed modhil e chandruok kaachiel kodwa kaka jalweny maber mar Kristo Yesu .
55002004	Onge jalweny ma duodore gi weche mag dala nimar odwaro mondo obed malong’o kowinjo jatende ma chike .
55002005	Kamano bende e kaka jang’wech mapiem e ng’wech ok nyal yudo mich mar jaloch ka ok oringo kaluwore gi chike moketi .
55002006	Japur matiyo matek bende ema owinjore okuong obil nyak mar cham .
55002007	Par matut kuom gima awacho . Ruoth biro miyi rieko mar winjo tiend weche duto .
55002008	Par Yesu Kristo mane ochier oa kuom joma otho kendo mane oa e anyuola mar Daudi . Ma e wach Maber mayalo ,
55002009	momiyo isanda kendo momiyo orida gi nyororo ka gima an jamahundu . To wach Nyasaye ok otwe gi nyororo .
55002010	Omiyo adhil kuom duto nikech adwaro ni joma Nyasaye oyiero bende oyudie warruok miyudo kuom Kristo Yesu , kendo makelo duong’ mochwere .
55002011	Ma eri e wach madier ka wasetho kode , to wanabed mangima kode bende ;
55002012	ka watimo kinda , to wana loch kode bende , ka wakwede , to nokwedwa en bende ;
55002013	ka waonge gi yie to pod en mana jaadiera nikech ok onyal kwedore owuon .
55002014	Med paro nigi kisiemogi e nyim Nyasaye ni giwe dhawo kuom weche maonge ohala ma ketho mana chuny joma winjogi .
55002015	Tem matek kaka inyalo mondo , ichiwri ni Nyasaye kaka jal miyiego kaka jatich ma wiye ok kuodi , ma puonjo kare Wach mar adiera .
55002016	Pogri kod mbekni mag oyuma manono mag piny nikech jok moketo chunygi e gik makamago medo bedo mabor moloyo gi Nyasaye .
55002017	Puonj jogo biro landore ka adhola ma landore . Achiel kuomgi gin Humenayo gi Fileto ,
55002018	ma osebayo yoo moweyo adiera . Giseweyo adiera ka gipuonjo ni chier osetimore , kendo giketho yie mar ji moko .
55002019	Kata kamano mise mongirore mar Nyasaye ochung’ motegno kendo ondikie ndiko ma ok ruchre mawacho ni , " Ruoth ong’eyo joge " , kendo ni , " Ng’ato ka ng’ato maluongo nying Ruoth nyaka pogre gi timbe maricho . "
55002020	E ot maduong’ ok nitie gige tedo molos gi dhahabu kata kende , to moko bende olosi gi bao kata lowo . Moko itiyogo tije mogen , to moko itiyogo tije atija .
55002021	Ka ng’ato opwodhore oa e puonj mochido to enobed kaka gir tich mitiyogo tije mogen .
55002022	Enodok ng’at maler ma Ruoth oyiego kaka jatichne makare kendo moikore tiyo tich moro amora maber . — Ring iwe gombo maricho mag jomatindo . Ket chunyi mar luwo ngima maler , gi yie , gi hera , kod kwe , ka achiel gi joma lamo Nyasaye gi chuny maler .
55002023	Pogri chuth gi mino wach mofuwo maonge rieko , king’eyo ni gikelo dhawo .
55002024	To jatich Ruoth ok owinjore bed jad-haw , to onego obed mang’won gi ji duto kendo onego obed japuonj molony mahore mos .
55002025	Joma dagi puonjne nyaka orie gi muolo , ka en gi geno ni Nyasaye nyalo miyogi thuolo mar lokruok mi ging’e adiera ,
55002026	kendo kogeno ni pachgi nyalo yawore mi gitony gia e obadho mar Jachien moseketogi e twech mar timo dwarone .
55003001	To ng’e malong’o ni kinde mag chandruok nobedie e ndalo giko .
55003002	Ji nobed koherore kendgi kendo kohero pesa . Ginibed josunga , jong’ayi , jomayanyo ji , joma ok winj jonywolgi , joma ok go erokamano , kendo joma ok ler ,
55003003	jogi nobed joma onge hera maok we ni ji richogi , ma ketho nying ji ; maok ritre , jomahundu , kendo joma ok ohero ber ,
55003004	ginibed andhoke , joma mwomore , joma okuot gi sunga , joma ohero mor moloyo Nyasaye ,
55003005	gi nenore ka joma oluoro Nyasaye to ngimagi kwedo teko mare . Pogri chuth gi joma kamago .
55003006	Joma kamago ema thurore e miech ji kendo gihoyo mon ma pachgi yomyom mogangore gi kit richo mayoreyore kendo ma gombo maricho rundo pachgi koni gi koni ,
55003007	mon makamagi oikore mar winjo puonj to kata kamano ok ginyal chopo e okang’ mar rwako adiera .
55003008	Mana kaka Janes gi Jambres nokedo gi Musa e kaka jogi bende kedo gi adiera , joma pachgi osekethore kendo jogo ma osek-wedi kaluwore gi yie .
55003009	To ok ginidhi mabor nikech fupgi biro nenore ni ji duto mana kaka notimore ni jogo .
55003010	In , to kata kamano ing’eyo puonj na duto , gi kit ngimana , kod gik machano timo e ngimana ; gi yie mara , gi kindana , kod herana , gi dhilna ,
55003011	kod sand gi chandruok mara , gik moko duto mane otimorena Antiokia gi Ikonio kod Lustra , kaka ne adhil e sand mager ! To Ruoth noresa kuom sandgo duto .
55003012	Chutho , ochunore ni ng’ato ang’ata madwaro dak e ngima maler moluoro Nyasaye ka en e achiel gi Kristo Yesu , nyaka ne sand ,
55003013	kata kamano , joma richo kod joma keto korgi to biro medo bedo joma richo moloyo , ka gidhi nyime gi wuondo ji kendo ji bende wuondogi .
55003014	In to nyaka idhi nyime kimako gik misepuonjori kendo ming’eyo ni adier chuth , nikech ing’eyo kit ngima joma nopuonji ,
55003015	bende nikech nyaka a e tinni isebedo king’eyo weche manie Muma Maler ma nyalo miyo ibed mariek e warruok kuom yie kuom Kristo Yesu .
55003016	Weche duto manie Muma oa kuom much Nyasaye kendo konyo kuom puonjo ji , kendo kuom kwero gik maricho , kendo kuom rieyo ji , kendo kuom tiego ji mondo obed joma kare ,
55003017	mondo ng’at Nyasaye obed molony chuth ni tich moro amora maber .
55004001	E nyim Nyasaye kendo e nyim Kristo Yesu mabiro ng’ado bura ni joma ngima gi joma otho , kendo nikech obiro duogo , gi Pinyruodhe , amiyi chik ni :
55004002	Yal Wach . Ikri mar timo mano kinde duto , kata piny rach kata piny ber , kuom rieyo ji , kuom kwero ji , kendo kuom jiwo ji gi kinda duto , kilero ni ji tiend weche adimba .
55004003	Nikech ndalo biro chopo ma ji ok nodwar chiko itgi ni puonj madier . Makmana giniluw puonj mamit mar dwachgi giwegi kendo ginichok to jopuonj mathoth mondo onyisgi gik ma itgi masakni gombo winjo .
55004004	Ginitamre winjo adiera ka gi chiko itgi ni sigendini manono .
55004005	In to nyaka ine ni iritori kinde duto ; kidhil e chandruok kendo kitimo tiji kaka jaland wach . Tim tijegi duto monego itim kaka jatich Nyasaye .
55004006	An to sana osechopo michiwae kaka misango miolo oko , sana mar ae pinyni osechopo .
55004007	Asekedo lweny maber , aseringo mi atieko ng’wech , aserito yie
55004008	Sani koro okanna osimbo mar ngima makare , ma Ruoth , ma en jang’ad bura makare , biro sidhona e odiechieng’no . Ok an kenda ema nomiyago , to nomi ji duto mosebedo ka geno duoke .
55004009	Tem matek mondo ibi ira piyo ,
55004010	nikech Demas oseringo oweya kenda , nikech nohero piny masani , modhi Thesalonika . Kreske to osedhi Galatia , kendo Tito osedhi Dalmatia .
55004011	Luka kende ema nikoda ka . Many Mariko mondo ibi kode ira , nikech okonya e tija mar Wach Maber .
55004012	Tukiko to aseoro Efeso .
55004013	Ka ibiro to ikelna koda mane aweyo ir Karpo e dala mar Troa , kod kitepega , to moloyo mago molos gi pien .
55004014	Aleksanda ma jatheth muia noti-mona malit ndi . Ruoth owuon nochule kuom gik mosetimo .
55004015	In bende tang’ne , nikech okwedo puonjwa gi tekre duto .
55004016	Kane oyala mokuongo , onge ng’ama nodok jakora , to ji duto noweya . Mad Nyasaye kik ket richoni e wigi !
55004017	To Ruoth nochung’ batha momiya teko , mi ne ayudo teko mar dhi nyime gi lando wach nyaka chop ogendini duto winje . Noresa bende e dho sibuor .
55004018	Omiyo ang’eyo ni Ruoth pod biro resa kuom gimoro amora marach madwaro hinya nyaka chop atundi e Pinyruodhe mar polo . En ema mondo oyud duong’ mosiko nyaka chieng’ . Amin .
55004019	Mosna Priskila gi Akula , kod jood Onesiforo .
55004020	Erasto nodong’ Korintho to Trofimo to naweyo ka tuo Mileto .
55004021	Tem matek mondo ichop ira ku kapok ndalo ng’ich ochopo . Yubulo omosi . Pude gi Lino kod Klaudia , kaachiel gi jowete duto bende jomosi .
55004022	Mad Ruoth rit chunyi . Ng’wono mondo obed kodi .
56001001	An Paulo ma jatich Nyasaye kendo ma jaote Yesu Kristo nikech yie mar joma Nyasaye oyiero kod ng’eyo mar adieri makelo luoro Nyasaye ,
56001002	yie kod ng’eyo ma otenore kuom geno mar yudo ngima mochwere , ma Nyasaye maok riambi nosingo kapok ndalo obetie ,
56001003	bende ka kinde mane ochano ochopo nomiyo wachne ofwenyore e ler kuom tij lando wach mane oket e lwete kuom chik mane Nyasaye ma Jawarwa ogolo .
56001004	Ne Tito wuoda maradier kuom yie moriwowa e achiel , ng’wono gi kuwe moa kuom Nyasaye Wuoro kod Kristo Yesu Jawarwa obed kodi
56001005	Gimomiyo ne aweyi Krete ne en ni mondo irie gik moko mane odong’ kapok atieko , kendo mondo iyier jodong kanisa e dala ka dala , kaka ne achiki ni itim .
56001006	Jaduong’ kanisa nyaka bed ng’at ma wach moro amora marach onge kuome , kendo ma jadhako achiel , kendo ma nyithinde oyie kendo maok nyal kwan kaka nyithindo ma achach kendo ma wigi tek .
56001007	Nikech Jatend Kanyakla mar jo-Kristo en jarit tich Nyasaye , nyaka obed ng’at ma wach moro amora marach onge kuome . Kik obed ng’at ma ochayo ji kata ma mirimbe liet , kata ma ohero kong’o , kata ma ohero goruok , kata ma yudo mwandu e yor miriambo .
56001008	To nyaka obed ng’at mohero rwako welo kendo mohero gigo mabeyo , nyaka obed ng’at ma pache ler , mohero adiera kendo moluoro Nyasaye ; kendo moritore .
56001009	Nyaka omak motegno puonj migeno , mana kaka osepuonje e kinde motelo , mondo eka jiw joma moko gi puonj madier kendo okwer joma kwedo puonjno .
56001010	Nikech nitie ji mang’eny ma jong’anyo , ma gin mana jothor wach kendo jo wuond ji , to moloyo jogo moter nyangu ma gin jo-Yahudi moyie .
56001011	Jogi nyaka kwer mondo oling’ , nikech giketho mier mang’eny ka gipuonjo gik maok owinjore gipuonji ; kendo gitimo kamano mana mondo giyudie ohala maok nikare .
56001012	Kata mana janabi moro ma margi owuon osewacho niya , jo-krete riambo kinde duto , ondiegi malich ma timbegi richo kendo gin jowuoro mabudho abudha . "
56001013	Wach janabigini en adier . Omiyo kwergi matek mondo eka gibed gi yie maradier ,
56001014	kendo mondo kik gichik itgi ni sigendni mag jo-Yahudi kata ni chike mag joma odagi adiera .
56001015	Gik moko duto ler mana ni joma ler , to kuom joma okethore maok oyie to onge gima ler . Chutho , pachgi kaachiel gi chunygi monego onyisgi kethogi osetho .
56001016	Giwacho ni ging’eyo Nyasaye to gikwedo Nyasaye nogo gi timbegi manono . Gin acheje ma wigi tek kendo ok ginyal timo gimoro amora maber .
56002001	Nyaka ipuonj weche mowinjore gi puonj ma adiera .
56002002	Puonj joma chwo madongo mondo obed joma obidhore , maok ohero oyuma , kendo moritore , bende mangi yie madier kendo gi hera kod kinda .
56002003	Kamano bende puonj mon madongo mondo odag e ngima mar luor to ok joma ketho nying ji , kata joma madho kong’o orundo , to nyaka gipuonj gik mabeyo .
56002004	Bang’e eka ginyalo tiego mon matindo kaka onego giher chwogi gi nyithindgi ; kendo eka ginyalo ritore ka gidak e ngima maler kendo ka gidich e utegi . Nyaka gibed mon mang’won kendo ka gin e bwo loch mar chwogi , mondo eka ng’ato kik yud thuolo mar chayo wach Nyasaye .
56002005	
56002006	Kamano bende onego ijiw yawuowi bende mondo oritre .
56002007	Bednigi ranyisi e yore duto kitimo gik mabeyo . Kipuonjo to nyis ni in ng’ama ngimane oriere tir kendo ma ok dwar oyuma ,
56002008	wecheni obed weche mowinjore ma ng’ato ok nyal chayo , mondo joma ok oyie kodi wigi okuodi nikech gionge gimoro amora marach ma ginyalo wacho kuomwa .
56002009	Puonj wasumbini mondo owinj ruodhi maggi e weche duto , kendo gitem tim-onigi mana gik malong’o maok gid-wokere kodgi ,
56002010	kata kik gikwal gigegi , to ginyisre ni gin joma inyalo geno e weche duto mondo omi e yore duto ginimi puonj mar Nyasaye Jawarwa oywa ji .
56002011	Nikech ng’wono mar Nyasaye makelo warruok osefwenyore ni ji duto .
56002012	Ng’wonono puonjowa mondo wawach ni " Wadagi " ne timbe maricho kod gombo maricho mag piny , kendo mondo wadagi e ngima moritore , e ngima makare kendo mamiyo Nyasaye duong’ e kindeni ,
56002013	kapod warito geno mogwedhi ma en fwenyruok man gi duong’ mar Nyasacha maduong’ kod Jawarwa , Yesu Kristo ,
56002014	mane ochiworenwa mondo oreswa wawe timbe maricho kendo mondo opwodh ni en owuon joma owinjore bedo joge , moikore timo gik mabeyo .
56002015	Koro magi e gik monego ipuonji . Jiw ji kendo ikwergi gi teko duto . Kik iwene ng’ato thuolo mondo ochayi .
56003001	Par niji mondo obed moboch e bwo joma nigi loch kod joma nigi teko . Nyisgi mondo giwinj chik kendo mondo gibed moikore ni timo gimoro amora maber ,
56003002	kik giketh nying ng’ato ang’ata , gibed joma ohero kuwe , kendo ma paro mar konyo jowetegi , ka ginyiso muolo madier niji duto .
56003003	Nikech kata wan bende chon ne wan joma ofuwo maok winj wach kendo ne wan joma owuondi mane nie twech mar kit gombo gi mor ma yoreyore mag ringruok . Ngimawa mapile nopong’ gi ichlit gi nyiego ; ne gimon kodwa to wan bende wamon e kindwa .
56003004	To ka kech kod hera mar Nyasaye ma Jawarwa nofwenyore to nowarowa ,
56003005	ok nikech tim moro makare mane wasetimo , to nikech kechne . Nowarowa kane olwokowa gi lwok mar nyuol manyien , kendo kane Roho Maler olokowa joma nyien ,
56003006	Roho manoolonwa mogundho , kuom Yesu Kristo ma Jawarwa ,
56003007	mondo ka oseketwa kare kuom ng’wonone to wabed jocham mwandune , ka wan gi geno mar yudo ngima mochwere .
56003008	Ma en wach madiera . Kendo adwaro ni ijiw wechegi mondo joma oseketo genogi kuom Nyasaye otang’ mondo gichiwre mar timo gik mabeyo . Gigi gin gik malong’o chuth , kendo kelo konyruok niji duto .
56003009	To pogri gi mbekni mofuwo gi sigendni mag nonro anywola , gi mino wach kod dhawo kuom weche mag chike , nikech gik ma kamago ok kel konyruok kendo gionge tich .
56003010	Siem ng’at makelo pogruok dichiel , kendo tim kamano mar ariyo . Bang’ sieme diriyo to pogri kode chuth .
56003011	Bed king’eyo gadiera ni ng’ama kamano en Jaricho ma pache okethore . En ng’ama ketho kong’eyo .
56003012	Kaka aseoro Artema kata Tukiko iri , to item matek mondo ibi ira piyo Nikopoli , nikech asechano mar bet kuno kinde koyo .
56003013	Tim duto minyalo mondo ikony Zena ma okil kod Apolo e wuodhgi , kendo ne ni giyudo gik moko duto ma girdwaro .
56003014	Jowa nyaka puonj re keto chunygi kuom timo gik mabeyo , mondo eka giyud gik ma gikonyorego e ngimagi mapile kendo kik gidag ngima maok kel konyruok .
56003015	Ji duto man koda ooroni mos . Mosnwa joma oherowa kuom yie . Ng’wono obed kodu uduto .
57001001	An Paulo ng’at rnotuc nikech Kristo Yesu kod Timotheo owadwa , ne in osiepwa ma wageno kendo jatich wadwa Filemon ,
57001002	kaachiel gi nyaminwa Ana gi Arkipo jalweny wadwa , kod Kanisa malemo e odi .
57001003	Ng’wono kod kuwe moa kuom Nyasaye Wuonwa kod Ruoth Yesu Kristo obed kodu .
57001004	Agoyo ni Nyasacha erokamano pile ka aluongo nyingi e lemona ,
57001005	nikech awinjo kuom yie ma in-go kuom Ruoth Yesu , kendo kuom hera miherogo jomaler duto .
57001006	Alemoni ni mondo iland yie ma in-go motegno , mondo eka ibed gi ng’eyo matut kuom gik mabeyo duto ma wango ei Kristo .
57001007	Hera ma in-go osemiya mor maduong’ kendo osejiwa , nikech in , owadwa mahero , iseduogo chunje jomaler .
57001008	Kuom mano , kata obedo ni kuom Kristo ne anyalo bedo gi chir mar chiki mondo itim gima onego itim ,
57001009	to koro asayi mondo itim kamano nikech hera . Koro an Paulo awuon , jaduong’ moti , kendo motue nikech wach Kristo Yesu ,
57001010	akwayi kuom wach wuoda Onesimo mane odoko wuoda ka an e twech .
57001011	Onesimo yandi chon onge ohala kuomi to sani koro okelo konyruok maduong’ ne in kaachiel kod an bende .
57001012	Aduoge iri kendo , kata obedo ni chunya ogene ahinya .
57001013	Dahero bedo kode ka mondo okonya kari ka pod otueya gi nyororo nikech Wach Maber .
57001014	To ne ok adwar timo kode gimoro amora ka ok in ema iyie , mondo tim ng’wono moro amora mitimo kik bed gima ochun , to obed gima itimo nikech ihero .
57001015	Nyalo bet ni Onesimo nowuok iri kuom kinde machwok mondo eka iyud thuolo mar kawe chuth bang’e ,
57001016	ok kaka misumba to kaka owadu migeno ma en ng’at moloyo misumba . En ohala ne an , to ang’eyo ni en ohala moloyo ne in bende , ok mana kaka ng’ato ang’ata , to kaka owadu kuom Ruoth .
57001017	Omiyo ka inyalo kwana kaka ng’ama ni kodi e achiel to rwake mana kaka dirwaka .
57001018	Kapo ni osetimoni marach , kata ka en-gi gopi moro to kwan-gi e wiya .
57001019	Andikoni baruani gi lweta awuon an Paulo , ka anyisi ni abiro chuli , kata ka ok aparoni in kod gopa ma en ngimani owuon .
57001020	Gima agombo maduong’ , owadwa , en ni mondo iyie itimna ng’wono kuom Ruoth , kiduogo chunya kuom Kristo .
57001021	Nikech ang’eyo maber ni iwinjo wach , andikoni ka an gadiera ni ibiro timona maber moloyo kaka akwayi .
57001022	Kwayo machielo ma ango en ni mondo ilosna kar nindo , nikech an-gi geno ni ibiro gonya mana kaka usebedo kulamo .
57001023	Epafras motue koda kaachiel nikech wach Kristo Yesu ooronu mos .
57001024	Mariko bende omosou kaachiel gi Aristako gi Demas kod Luka , ma gin jotich wetena .
57001025	Ng’wono mar Ruoth Yesu Kristo mondo obed kod chunyi .
58001001	Kinde machon Nyasaye nowuoyo gi kwerewa e yore mang’eny kendo mopogore opogDre , kokonyore gi jonabi ,
58001002	to e ndalo mogikgi osewuoyo kodwa kokonyore gi Wuode owuon . Wuodeno ema oseketo mwandune duto e lwete , kendo en ema nochweyo gik moko duto kuome .
58001003	Wuowi ema rieny gi duong’ maler mar Nyasaye , kendo en e kit Nyasaye hie , momako gik moko duto gi wachne man gi teko . Kane oseloso yor pwodhruok e richo to nobet piny e polo , e bat korachwich mar Nyasaye Maduong’ , moloyo duto .
58001004	Kuom mano , nobedo gi duong’ moloyo malaike mana kaka nying mane omiye bende nigi duong’ moloyo margi .
58001005	Koso gin malaike mage mane Nyasaye onyiso ni , " In Wuoda ; kawuono asedoko Wuoru ? Kata ni , " Anabed Wuon-gi to en nobed Wuoda ?
58001006	To bende , ka Nyasaye kelo Wuode makayo e piny to owacho ni , " Malaike duto mag Nyasaye mondo oiame . "
58001007	Kowuoyo kuom malaike to owacho ni , " Oloko malaikene doko yembe , jotichne oloko ligek mach . "
58001008	To kuom Wuowi to owuoye ni , " Lochni nosik nyaka chieng’ , Aa Nyasaye , kendo tim makare ema noting’ malo e Pinyruodhi .
58001009	Isehero tim makare to imon gi timbe maricho ; emomiyo Nyasaye ma Nyasachi oseting’i malo moyombo jowadu duto nikech osewiri gi mo mamiyi mor .
58001010	Kamachielo bende owachoe ni , " Aa Ruoth , in ema nichweyo piny kar chakruok kendo polo bende en tij lweteni .
58001011	Gin ginilal , to In isiko , giduto giniti kaka law ti .
58001012	Iniban-gi giduto kaka ibano kandho , kendo nolokgi mana kaka iloko nanga . In to isiko ichalri mana kaka in . Kendo hiki ok norum . "
58001013	Koso gin malaike mage ma Nyasaye nonyiso ni , " Bed e bada ma korachwich , nyaka chop aket wasiki duto obed e raten tiendi ? "
58001014	Donge malaike duto gin chunje ma Nyasaye oketo mondo oti ne joma Nyasaye biro reso ?
58002001	Mano emomiyo nyaka wamak matek adiera duto mwasewinjo mondo kik waba yo .
58002002	Nikech ka weche mane malaike owuoyoe ne gin weche migeno , kendo ng’ato ang’ata mane ok oluwo kata orito-gi noyudo kum mowinjore gi timne ,
58002003	koro wan to dwatony nade ka wajwang’o warruok maduong’ kama ? Wach warruokni Ruoth owuon ema nokuongo olando eka bang’e joma nowinjo wach warruokno nosironwa wechego ni gin adier .
58002004	Nyasaye bende notimo nende kuom wachno kotimo ranyisi gi timbe miwuro kod honni mopogore opogore , kendo kuom chiwo mich mag Roho Maler mane opogo ne ji kaka en owuon odwaro .
58002005	Malaike ok ema Nyasaye osemiyo teko mar bedo gi loch e piny mabiro .
58002006	To en mana kaka ng’ato ose wuoyo kamoro ni : " Dhano to en ang’o momiyo iketo pachi kuome , koso wuod dhano to en ng’a momiyo isiko idewe ?
58002007	" Ne idwoke piny moloyo malaike to koro isesidhone osimbo mar duong’ kod luor ;
58002008	kendo iseketo gik moko duto e bwo tiende . " Ka Nyasaye noketo gik moko duto e bwo lochne to onge gima noweyo oko . To kata kamano sani pod ok wane ka gik moko duto nie bwo lochne .
58002009	To waneno mana Yesu mane odwok piny moloyo malaike , ma koro sani osidhne osimbo mar duong’ kod luor , nikech noneno lit mar tho . Yesu nobilo tho ne wan duto kuom ng’wono mar Nyasaye .
58002010	Ne en gima kare mondo Nyasaye ma nochweyo kendo morito gik moko duto oket jachak warruok margi kare chuth e yor sandruok , mondo eka okel nyithi Nyasaye duto oyud pok mar duong’ne .
58002011	Jal mamiyo ji bedo maler , kaachiel giji duto moseloki odoko joma ler , gin joot achiel . Kuom mano Yesu ok oluor mar luongogi ni jowetene ,
58002012	owacho ni , " Abiro hulo nyingi ne owetena ; abiro paki gi wer e dier chokruok .
58002013	Owacho kendo ni , " Abiro keto genona kuome . " To bende owacho ni , " Eri an ka , kaachiel gi nyithindo ma Nyasaye osemiya . "
58002014	To kaka nyithindo nigi ringruok gi remo e kaka en bende nokawo kidono , mondo kuom thone oketh teko marjal mangi teko mar tho , ma en Jachien ,
58002015	eka mondo ogony ji duto ma luoro mar tho oloko wasumbini .
58002016	Nikech , ka kuom adier , ok okony malaike , to nyikwa Ibrahim ema okonyo .
58002017	Mano emomiyo ne nyaka kete ochal gij owetene e yore duto , mondo eka obed jadolo maduong’ ma jakech kendo ma jaadiera matiyo e nyim Nyasaye , kotimo misango migologo richo mag ji .
58002018	Kaka en owuon nosande kendo nokadho e bwo tembe , en gi teko mar lonyo joma itemo .
58003001	Emomiyo , owetena maler kendo ma oseluongi gi luong mar polo , keturu pachu duto kuom Yesu , ma en Jaote kendo jadolo Maduong’ mar yie mwahulo .
58003002	Notiyo tich mane okete mondo otim gadiera , mana kaka Musa bende notiyo tichne gadiera e od Nyasaye duto .
58003003	To mana kaka jager ot nigi duong’ moloyo duong’ mar ot mogero , e kaka Yesu onego omi duong’ moloyo Musa .
58003004	Nikech ot ka ot nigi ng’at mogere , to Nyasaye ema ogero gik moko duto .
58003005	Musa notiyo gi adiera e od Nyasaye duto , kobedoj aneno kuom gik mane ibiro ler tiendgi achien .
58003006	To Kristo en jaadiera kaka jatend od Wuon mare . To wan e jood Nyasaye , ka wamako matek chir kod geno ma wango .
58003007	Kuom mano , mana kaka Roho Maler wacho ni , " Kuwinjo dwonde kawuono ,
58003008	to kik chunyu bed matek kaka nutimo e ndalo ma nung’anyone e kinde mag tem e thim ,
58003009	kuma kwereu notemae mi ne gineno gima natimonegi kuom higini piero ang’wen .
58003010	Mano emomiyo iya nowang’ gi tieng’no mi nasingora ni , " Chuny jogi osiko koruenyo , kendo pok ging’eyo yore-na . '
58003011	Omiyo mirima nomaka , mi nasingora ka akuong’ora ni , ' Ok ginidonji e yweyona ngang’ .
58003012	Owetena beduru motang’ mondo kik ng’ato kuomu bed gi chuny marach motamore yie ma miyo oweyo Nyasaye mangima .
58003013	To ng’ato ka ng’ato mondo ojiw nyawadgi pile pile kapod wan gi kinde miluongo ni Kawuono , mondo kik richo gal ng’ato kuomu mi chunye bed matek .
58003014	Nikech ka wamako geno mane wachakogo matek nyaka giko to eka wariwore e achiel gi Kristo e tichne .
58003015	Mano emomiyo owachi ni , " Kuwinjo duonde kawuono , to kik chunyu bed matek kaka nutimo e ndalo ma nung’anyoe . "
58003016	To gin jomage ma nowinjo mi ong’anyone ? Donge ne gin ji duto mane Musa otelonegi kogolo Misri ?
58003017	Koso gin jomage mane okechogo kuom higni piero ang’wen ? Donge nokecho gi joma notimo richo ma ringregi nolwar e thim kosetho ?
58003018	Gin jomage ma nokuong’orenegi ni ok ginidonji e yweyo mare , ka ok gin joma notamore winjo wachne ?
58003019	Omiyo waneno ni ne ok ginyal donjo nikech ne gitamore yie .
58004001	Kuom mano , kaka singruok mar donjo e yweyone pod nitie , wabeduru motang’ mondo kik yud ng’ato kuomu ma nigi rem moro ma dimone donjo e yweyono .
58004002	Nikech wan bende oseyalnwa Injili mana kaka gin bende noyalnegi , to kata kamano wach mane giwinjo ne ok okelonegi konyruok , nikech ne ok girwake kuom yie .
58004003	Koro wan mwaseyie wadonjo e yweyono , mana kaka Nyasaye osewacho ni , " omiyo mirima nomaka , mi nasingora ka akuong’ora ni , vOk ginidonji e yweyona ngang’ . " Nyasaye nowuoyo kama kata obedo ni nosetieko tije chon chakre kinde ma nochweyo piny .
58004004	Nikech owuoyo kuom odiechieng’ mar abiriyo kamachielo kowacho ni , " To e odiechieng’ mar abiriyo Nyasaye noyweyo kuom tijene duto . "
58004005	To waseneno bende e Ndiko motelo ka Nyasaye wacho ni , " Ok ginidonji e yweyona ngang’ . "
58004006	Kata obedo ni joma noyalnegi Injili mokwongo ne ok odonjo e yweyo mar Nyasaye nikech tok teko , thuolo pod nitie mondo jomoko odonji e yweyono .
58004007	Omiyo osechano thuolo machielo moluongo ni v Kawuono , ma en e odiechien-gono mane owuoyo kuome bang’e achien gi dho Daudi , mana kaka waseneno motelo , ni : " Kuwinjo dwonde kawuono to kik chunyu bed matek . "
58004008	Nikech ka dinebed ni Joshua ne nyalo miyogi yweyo , to Nyasaye ok dine owuoyo bang’e kuom odiechieng’ machielo .
58004009	Kuom mano , odiechieng ywero mar Sabato pod nitie ne jo Nyasaye ;
58004010	nikech ng’ato ang’ata madonjo e yweyo mar Nyasaye nyaka ywe e tijene , mana kaka Nyasaye bende noyweyo e tijege .
58004011	Nimar wach Nyasaye ngima kendo tiyo . Obith moloyo ligangla ma dhoge ariyo , kendo opowo chuny dhano nyaka iye mogik , nyaka kuma pach dhano gi chunye jorome , kaachiel gi fuon gi ond-hudho . Kuno ema oketoe bura ne paro kod dwaro maling’ling’ manie chuny dhano .
58004012	
58004013	Onge gimoro kata achiel , kuom gik moko duto mane Nyasaye ochweyo , mopondone . Gik moko duto oyawore kendo oelore e nyim tong wang’ Jal ma wan duto , ng’ato ka ng’ato , nyaka wabi wachung’ e nyime kwahulo gik moko duto mwasetimo .
58004014	Kaka koro wan gi Jadolo Maduong’ Moloyo mosedhi nyaka e polo , ma en Yesu Wuod Nyasaye , wamakuru yie mwahulo matek .
58004015	Nikech ok wan gi jadolo maduong’ maok nyal kechowa e nyawowa , to wan-gi mano manyalo kechowa , to nikech en bende noteme gi kit tembe duto mwayudo , makmana ni en noonge gi richo .
58004016	Kuom mano , wasuduru but kom duong’ mar ng’wono ka wan gi chir , mondo eka wayud kech gi ng’wono e saa mwadware kony .
58005001	Jadolo maduong’ moro amora iyiero e dier ji kendo iwale obedo jachung’ mar ji kuom weche mawuoyo kuom Nyasaye , mondo ochiw mich gi misengini migologo richo .
58005002	Onyalo dembo joma kia gi joma obayo yo , nikech en owuon bende nyawo obembe .
58005003	Mano emomiyo en bende ochune ni nyaka otim misango ni richone owuon , kaachiel gi richo mag ji bende .
58005004	Ng’ato ok ketre e duong’ mar bedo jadolo kende owuon , to Nyasaye ema nyaka luonge mana kaka noluongo Harun bende .
58005005	Omiyo Kristo bende ne ok okawo duong’ mar bedo jadolo maduong’ kende owuon . To Nyasaye nonyise ni , " In Wuoda , kendo kawuono asebedo Wuoru . "
58005006	Owacho bende kamachielo ni , " In Jadolo nyaka chieng’ , e kit dolo mar Melkizedek . "
58005007	E ndalo mane Yesu ngima e piny , nolamo losayo Nyasaye mane nyalo rese e tho , koywak matek kendo ka pi wang’e chwer , mi Nyasaye nowinjo ywakne nikech dembruokne .
58005008	Kata obedo ni ne en Wuod Nyasaye to nopuonjore winjo chik Nyasaye nikech sandruok ma noneno ,
58005009	kendo bang’ ka nosekete kare chuth to nodoko wuon warruok mochwere ma ji duto mawinjo wachne yudo .
58005010	Bende Nyasaye nokete Jadolo maduong’ , moluwo kit dolo mar Melkizedek .
58005011	Wan gi weche mathoth mwanyalo wacho kuom wach ma tiende tekni , to winjo maru ni chien .
58005012	Chutho , kata obedo ni sani koro onego bed ni un jopuonj , to pod udwaro ng’at machielo mondo ochak opuonju nonro michako ng’eyogo adiera mar wach Nyasaye . Pod unyalo mana madho chak kende ok unyal chamo chiemo motegno !
58005013	To ng’ato ang’ata ma madho chak kende pod en nyathi mayom , omiyo oonge gi lony kuom puonj mar tim makare .
58005014	Joma otegno to nyalo chamo chiemo motegno , nikech gisetiyo kodgi gaming’a mi gibedo gi lony mar ng’eyo pogruok man e kind ber gi rach .
58006001	Kuom mano koro waweuru puonj michakogo ng’eyo wach Kristo , to wadhiuru nyime mondo wadok joma otegno . Ok owinjore mondo wachak puonjou manyien weche michakogo bedo ja-Kristo , kaka lokruok weyo timbe matero ji e tho to gi yie kuom Nyasaye ;
58006002	kod puonj kuom kit batiso mopogDre opogore , kata kuom keto lwedo e wi ji , kata kuom wach chier aa kuom joma otho , kata Bura mabiro .
58006003	To wabiro timo kamano , ka Nyasaye oyie .
58006004	Nikech joma ler mar Nyasaye ose-rienynegi mi obilo mich mar polo fendo obedo e lalruok achiel gi Roho Maler ;
58006005	joma osebilo ber mar Wach Nyasaye , mi ong’eyo teko mar piny mabiro ,
58006006	kopodho oweyo yie margi , to ok nyal konygi mi gilokre kendo , nikech gikelo chandruok kuomgi giwegi kuom guro Wuod Nyasaye e msalaba nyadiriyo , ka gimiyo ji chaye ratiro .
58006007	Lowo ma mwonyo pi koth mochwe kuome , mi chwe chieg cham manyalo konyo joma opure , ema yudo gweth Nyasaye .
58006008	To ka bang’ yudo koth maber to ochiego mana kuthe gi buya to oonge tich , kendo ochiegni yudo kuong’ . Giko ibiro wang’e e mach .
58006009	Kata wawuoyo kama , osiepewa mwageno , kuomu to wan gi ratiro kuom gik mabeyo moloyo , ma gin olembe mabeyo ma warruok nyago .
58006010	Nyasaye ok kite rach , omiyo wiye ok nyal wil gi tich maru kaachiel gi hera musenyiso kukonyo Joge , kendo ma pod udhi nyime kutimo .
58006011	Wadwaro ni ng’ato ka ng’ato kuomu odhi nyime katimo maber nyaka giko , mondo eka ubed gi ratiro mar yudo gik mugeno yudo .
58006012	Ok wadwar ni ubed jo samuoyo to wadwaro ni ulu kit joma yudo gik mosingi nikech giyie kendo gitimo kinda .
58006013	Ka Nyasaye notimo singruok gi Ibrahim to nokuong’ore gi nyinge owuon , nikech ne onge ng’at maduong’ mohinge monyalo kuong’ore gi nyinge ,
58006014	nowacho ni , " Abiro gwedhi adier , kendo abiro miyi nyikwayo mang’eny . "
58006015	Omiyo bang’e achien Ibrahim noyudo gima Nyasaye nosingore ni nomiye bang’ rito gi kinda .
58006016	Joma timo singruok thoro kuong’ore gi nying joma oloyogi gi duong’ , kendo kuong’ruok ma gitimo golo kiawa moro amora e kind joma otimo winjruokgo .
58006017	Emomiyo ka Nyasaye ne dwa lero tiend chenroge maok lokre ne joma yudo gweth mag singruok mage , noguro singruokneno gi kuong’ruok .
58006018	Notimo kamano mondo , kuom gik moko ariyo , ( tiende ni singruok gi kuong’ruok ) , maok nyal lokore kendo maok nyal miyo Nyasaye bet jamriambo , wayud gweth mogundho , wan mwasetony mi wamako matek geno ma wango .
58006019	Genowano osiro chunywa ka loch mogur motegno maok yiengni kendo ma gimoro ok nyal donje mi kethi . Odonjo nyaka ei Hekalu iye iye , ei kama Ler moloyo tok pasia ,
58006020	kuma Yesu ma mosetelonwa , osedonje karwa . Osedoko jadolo maduong’ manyaka chieng’ , moluwo kit dolo mar Melkizedek .
58007001	Melkizedek mwawuoyo kuomeni ne en ruodh Salem kendo ne en jadolo mar Nyasaye Mamalo Mogik . Noromo gi Ibrahim ka Ibrahim noa e lweny mane oseloyoe ruodhi , mi nogwedhe .
58007002	Ibrahim nomiye achiel kuom apar mar gik moko duto . Mokwongo tiend nyingeno en " ruoth makare , " eka kendo " ruodh Salem " tiende ni " ruodh kuwe . "
58007003	Kaka Melkizedek ne onge gi wuon kata min , kata chakruokne kata gikone , ochalo Wuod Nyasaye , kendo tij dolo mare osiko nyaka chieng’
58007004	Inyalo neno kaka noduong’ ahinya . Kata mana Ibrahim ne nyalo miye achiel kuom apar mar gik ma nopeyo !
58007005	Wang’eyo ni chik dwaro ni mondo nyikwa Lawi mokawo tich dolo ema ochoki achiel kuom apar kuom ji , ma gin owetegi , kata obedo ni owetegigo bende gin nyikwa Ibrahim .
58007006	Ng’atni to wayudo ni ne ok en nyakwar Lawi , to kata kamano nochoko achiel kuom apar kuom Ibrahim , jal mane Nyasaye omiyo singruok , kendo nogwedhe .
58007007	En gima ong’ere ni ng’at matin igwedho gi ng’at maduong’ .
58007008	Korka jodolo mag jo Lawi wayudo ni achiel kuom apar ichoko gi dhano matho ; to kuom Melkizedek to wayudo ni achiel kuom apar nochoki gi jal ma ikwano ni ngima , mana kaka Ndiko wacho .
58007009	Omiyo wanyalo wacho ni ka Ibrahim nochiwo achiel kuom apar to mano nyiso ni Lawi ( ma nyikwaye choko achiel kuom apar ) bende nochiwe .
58007010	Nikech kindeno noyudo ka Lawi pok onyuol , to kata kamano wanyalo wacho ni ne en ei ringre Ibrahim kane Melkizedek oromo kode .
58007011	Kapo ni tich dolo mar Jo Lawi ( nikech chik mane omi jo Israel notenore kuome ) ne nyalo miyo dhano doko makare chuth , to koro ere gimomiyo ne pod nitie dwaro mondo oyud jadolo machielo machalo gi Melkizedek ? Ang’o momiyo ne nyaka jadolo mopogore gi Harun yudre ?
58007012	Nikech wang’eyo ni ka olok tich dolo to chik bende nyaka loki .
58007013	To ng’at miwacho wechegi kuomeni to noa e dhoot machielo ma ng’ato ne pok otiyo e nyim kendo mar misango koa e dhoodno nyaka nene .
58007014	Nikech ong’ere malong’o ni Ruodhwa noa e dhood Juda , ma en dhoot ma Musa ne ok owacho gimoro kuom jodolo .
58007015	Gima wasewacho medo winjore ka jadolo machielo machal gi Melkizedek ochako obiro ,
58007016	en ne ok okete Jadolo kaluwore gi chike dhano kata anyuolane , to nokete nikech teko mar ngima maok nyal rumo .
58007017	Nikech Ndiko timo neno kuome ni , " In Jadolo nyaka chieng’ mana kaka Melkizedek . "
58007018	Chik machonno koro osegol oko nikech onyap kendo oonge tich
58007019	( nikech Chik ne ok nyal keto gimoro kare chuth ) . Koro osekelnwa geno manyien maber moloyo chik machonno , kendo kuom genono wanyalo sudo but Nyasaye .
58007020	To ne ok otim kamano maonge kuong’ruok ! Jomoko nobedo jodolo maonge kuong’ruok ,
58007021	to en to nobedo Jadolo gi kuong’ruok ka Nyasaye nowachone ni : " Ruoth osekuong’ore kendo ok nolok pache ; In Jadolo nyaka chieng’ . "
58007022	Nikech kuong’ruokni , Yesu koro osedoko kido mar winjruok manyien gi Nyasaye , ma en winjruok maber moloyo machon .
58007023	Pogruok machielo mwaneno en ni e kit dolo machon , jodolo ne thoth nikech tho nomonogi dhi nyime gi tich dolo ;
58007024	to nikech Yesu ngima nyaka chieng’ dolo mare osiko .
58007025	Kuom mano onyalo waro chuth joma kadho kuome kasudo ir Nyasaye , nikech ongima nyaka chieng’ mondo okwanegi Nyasaye .
58007026	Jadolo maduong’ ma kamano ema nyalo konyowa nikech oler , oonge ketho , kendo chilo moro onge kuome . Bende Nyasaye oseting’e mokete kar kende kopoge gi joricho , kendo osekete malo kuma bor moyombo polo .
58007027	En ok ochune ni nyaka otim misango pile pile kaka jodolo mamoko timo , kokuongo gi mare eka otimo mar jomamoko . Notimo misango ni richogi dichiel kendo mogik , kane ochiwo ringre owuon .
58007028	Nikech chik keto joma nyap mondo obed jodolo madongo , to kuong’ruok mane obiro bang’ chik , noketo Wuowi makoro oseket kare chuth nyaka chieng’ .
58008001	Gima wasebedo ka watemo wacho en ma : Wan gi Jadolo Maduong’ mobet piny e bat korachwich mar Kom Duong’ manie polo ,
58008002	en ema otiyo kaka Jadolo Maduong’ Kama Ler Moloyo , ma en hema ma Ruoth ema oguro , to ok dhano .
58008003	Jadolo Maduong’ moro ka moro iyiero mondo ochiw mich kaachiel gi misango , omiyo kata jadolowani bende ne nyaka chiw gimoro .
58008004	Ka dibed ni pod en e piny , to dine ok obedo jadolo , nikech nitie jodolo moromo machiwo mich duto kaka chik dwaro .
58008005	Tich ma jodologo tiyo en mana kido gi tipo mar tij dolo manie polo . Mano emomiyo ka Musa ne dwa chako gero Hemb Romo to Nyasaye nosieme kawachone ni , " Ne ni igero gik moko duto machal gi kit hema mane onyisi e got " .
58008006	To tich mar Yesu oseyudo duong’ moyombo margino mana kaka winjruok mokelo , ma en e jagachne , bende oyombo winjruok machon , nikech otenore kuom singruok mabeyo moloyo .
58008007	Nikech ka dine bed ni onge gima orem kuom winjruok machon , to winjruok manyien ok dokawo kare .
58008008	To Nyasaye noyudo ketho kuomgi mi owacho ni : " Ruoth Nyasaye owacho ni ndalo biro ma anatimie singruok manyien gi dhood jo Israel kendo gi dhood Juda .
58008009	Singruokno ok nochal gi mano mane atimo gi kweregi kane akawogi gi lweta mi atelonegi kagologi Misri , nikech ne ok giluwo singruokna ma natimo kodgi omiyo an bende ne alokora aweyogi Ruoth owacho .
58008010	Ma e singruok mabiro timo gi dhood Israel bang’ ndalogo , Ruoth owacho . Anaket Chikena e pachgi kendo anadikgi e chunygi . Anabed Nyasachgi , kendo ginibed joga .
58008011	Koro ng’ato ok nochak opuonj jag-weng’gi kata owadgi , kowacho ni , vNg’e Nyasaye ' , nikech giduto gining’eya kochakore gi ji ajia nyaka joma ogen .
58008012	Nimar anawenegi kuom timbegi maricho , kendo ok anachak apar richogi kendo . "
58008013	Ka Nyasaye luongo singruokni ni " manyien " to mano nyiso ni osemiyo singruok machon odoko maonge tich ; to kaka oonge tich kendo oti , obiro lal nono machiegni .
58009001	Singruok mokwongo ne nigi chike matayo lemo kaachiel gi kar lemo e pinyka .
58009002	Ne oios hema ma ong’ad iye ariyo . Kama ikwongo donjoe ne iluongo ni Kama Ler , kendo kanyo noketie rachung taya gi mesa moketie makati miketo e nyim Nyasaye pile .
58009003	E tok nanga mar rageng’ mar ariyo ne nitie hema miluongo ni Kama Ler Moloyo ,
58009004	kendo kanyo noketie kendo mar misango molos gi dhahabu miwang’oe ubani , kod Sandug Muma mowir gi dhahabu gi Ludh Harun ma nechako loth , kod kite mopa mondikie singruok .
58009005	Ewi Sandug Muma ne nitie kido mag malaika miluongo ni Kerubi mar Duong’ , kendo buombegi noumo kama igoloe richo . To sani ok wanyal wuoyo matut kuom gigo duto .
58009006	Ka gik moko duto nosechan kamano , jodolo ne donjoga e hema maoko pile mondo giti tichgi mar lemo .
58009007	To jadolo maduong’ kende ema noyiene donjo e hema maiye dichiel kende e higa , to nochune ni nyaka odonj iye kuno gi remo mane otimogo misango ne richone mokwongo eka bang’e otimonego ji duto bende , mondo owenegi richo mane gitimo ka gikia .
58009008	Roho Maler ne nyiso , kuom kit dolo makama , ni yo midonjogo Kama Ler Moloyo ne pok ofwenyore , e kinde duto ma hema machon ne pod ochung’ !
58009009	Ma en ngero manyiso kinde ma wadakieni , kendo ginyiso ni mich kod misango mane ichiwo ne ok nyal lwoko chuny joma ne lemo e hemano mi gidok joma kare .
58009010	Gin mana chiemo gi math kod tim lwok mopogore opogore-to magi gin mana tim maoko matiyo mana nyaka ndalo ma chik manyien nochak tich . Ne itiyo kodgi mana ka Nyasaye ne pok oloko gik moko odoko manyien .
58009011	To ka Kristo nobiro kaka Jadolo maduong’ mar gik mabeyo moloyo makoro wango sani , nodonjo e hema maduong’ kendo malong’o chuth . En hema ma lwet dhano ok oloso ma tiende en ni ok en chwech mar pinyni .
58009012	Nodonjo iye nyaka Kama Ler Moloyo , to ne ok odhi gi remb diek gi nyiruedhi . Notimo misango dichiel kendo mogik gi rembe owuon ma nokelonwago warruok mosiko .
58009013	Nikech ka remb diek gi ruedhi gi buch nyiroye mane ikiro ne nyalo pwodho joma ogak , migibed maler gi oko ,
58009014	koro remb Kristo to nyalo pwodho ji e yo malich machal nade ! Nochiwore ne Nyasaye kuom Roho mosiko kaka misango maonge mbala , omiyo rembe biro lwoko chunywa maiye mi wawe timbe motho , mondo eka wati ne Nyasaye mangima !
58009015	Kuom mano , Kristo e jagach mar singruok manyien , mamiyo joma oluongi yudo girkeni mosiko mosesingnegi , nikech koro osetho kargi kaka misango mamiyo gibedo thuolo kuom kethogi e bwo singruok mokuongo .
58009016	Ka ng’at motho oweyo ne ng’ato gige e yor singruok to dwarore ni nyaka ng’at mowene gik mokono nyis malong’o ni ng’at mane oweyone gik mokogo notho adier ,
58009017	nikech singruok ma kamano tiyo mana ka ng’ato osetho , to ok ka ng’at ma notime pod ngima .
58009018	Mano emomiyo kata mana singruok mokuongo ne ok nyal ket e tich ka onge remo .
58009019	Ka Musa noseny-iso weche mag chik duto mi ji duto owinjo , nokawo remb nyiroye gi diek , kaachiel gi pi , mi okiro e Kitap Chik , kendo okiro kuom ji duto , kokirogi gi yie rombo malando gi obino .
58009020	Nowacho ni , " Ma e remo mar singruok ma Nyasaye osechik-ou mondo uriti . "
58009021	Nokiro remono kuom Hemb Romo kendo kuom gimoro amora mane itiyogo e lemo machalore kamano .
58009022	Chutho , chik dwaro ni gik moko duto opwodh gi remo , kendo ka remo ok ochw-er to golo richo onge .
58009023	Emomiyo ne dwarore mondo kido mag gig polo opwodhi gi misengini machalo kamago , to kata kamano gig polo hie to dwaro misengini mabeyo moloyo magi .
58009024	Nikech Kristo ne ok odonjo kama ler ma lwet dhano ema oloso , ma en mana kido mar Kama Ler hie , to nodonjo e polo wuon , kama koro ochung’nwa e nyim Nyasaye .
58009025	To bende ne ok odonjo e polo mondo ochiwre kaka misango higa ka higa , kaka jadolo maduong’ donjo Kama Ler higa ka higa mondo otim misango gi remo maok mare owuon .
58009026	Ka Kristo ne nyalo timo kamano , to mano ne nyalo chune ni otho di mang’eny nyaka a chakruok piny . To koro osefwenyore dichiel kendo mogik e ndalo mogikni mondo ochiw ringre owuon kaka misango ma golo richo .
58009027	Mana kaka ochano ni dhano nyaka tho dichiel kendo bang’ mano yale ,
58009028	e kaka Kristo bende notimgo misango dichiel kende mondo ogol richo mag ji mang’eny . To obiro thiny-ore kendo mar ariyo , ok mondo ochak oting’ richo ji kendo , to mondo okel warruok ne joma rite gi geno .
58010001	Chik en mana tipo mar gik mabeyo mabiro to ok en gigo hie . Kuom mano ok nyalre , mondo misengini machalre minuoyo higa ka higa omi joma sudo ir Nyasaye mondo oiame obed makare chuth .
58010002	Ka dine bed ni ginyalo miyo ji doko makare , donge dine oseweti-mogi chon ? Nikech jolemogo dine osepuodhi dichiel kende , kendo mogik , mi ok gibedo joketho ma bura oloyo kendo .
58010003	To misengini gin mana gik maparo ne ji richogi higa ka higa ,
58010004	nikech remb ruedhi gi diek ok nyal golo richo kata matin .
58010005	Emomiyo ka Kristo nobiro e piny to nowacho ni : " Misengini kod chiwo ok ema idwar , to ringruok ema iseikona ;
58010006	Misengini miwang’o pep gi chiwo mag golo richo ne ok imorgo .
58010007	Eka nawacho ni , vEra e , Yaye Nyasaye , asebiro timo dwaroni , mana kaka ondiki kuoma e bug Chik ' . "
58010008	Mokwongo nowacho ni , " Misengini kod chiwo , kata misengini miwang’o pep kod chiwo migologo richo ne ok idwar kendo ne ok imor kodgi . " ( Kata obedo ni chik ne dwaro ni otimgi kamano )
58010009	To eka nowacho kendo ni , " Era e , asebiro mondo atim dwaroni . " Omiyo waneno kaka oketho yo machon mar chiwo chiayo ka misango to okelo yo manyien ma ng’ato chiwoe ngimane owuon .
58010010	Nikech Yesu notimo gima Nyasaye ne dwaro ni otim , koro osepwodhwa e richo kuom ringre mane ochiwo kaka misango dichiel kendo mogik .
58010011	Jodolo mag jo Yahudi duto chung’ odiechieng’ kodiechieng’ mondo otim tich dolo , ka ginuoyo mana misango machalre maok nyal golo richo .
58010012	Kristo to notimo misango mar golo richo dichiel kende , mi obet piny e bat korachwich mar Nyasaye .
58010013	Chakre chieng’ mane obetie piny , orito odiechieng’ mibiro ket jowasike duto raten tiende
58010014	nikech kuom misango achiel kende , oseketo joma iloko doko jomaler mi gibedo makare chuth .
58010015	Roho Maler bende wuoyonwa kuom wechegi . Mokwongo owacho ni :
58010016	" Ma e singruok ma anatim kodgi bang’ ndalogo , Ruoth owacho . Anaket chikena e chunygi , mi andikgi e pachgi . "
58010017	Omedo wacho bende ni , " Richogi kod timbegi mamono ok anachak apar kendo . "
58010018	To kama oseweye richo , koro misango mar golo richo onge .
58010019	Kuom mano , owetena , koro wan gi chir mar donjo Kama Ler Moloyo kuom remb Yesu ,
58010020	noyawonwa yo manyien kendo mangima madonjo makadhi nanga mar rageng’ , ( ma en ringre owuon )
58010021	ka koro wan-gi Jadolo mang’ongo morito od Nyasaye kamano ,
58010022	wasuduru but Nyasaye gi chuny ma nikare , ka wan gi yie maok wariwo gi kiawa , kendo ka chunywa osekwoe pi mondo opwodhwa kik wabed gi chuny ma bura oloyo , kendo ringrewa olwoki gi pi maliw .
58010023	Wamakuru motegno geno ma wango maok wamindni , nikech Jal mosemiyowa singruok en jaadier .
58010024	Ng’ato ka ng’ato mondo opar kaka dojiw nyawadgi omed bedo gi hera kod timbe mabeyo .
58010025	Kik wawe mak wachokore kaachiel , kaka jomoko ose weyo timo , to wajiwreuru ng’ato gi ng’ato , kendo umed timo kamano kaka uneno ka Chieng’ Ruoth medo sudo machiegni .
58010026	Ka wadhi nyime gi timo richo mana mar ayiem bang’ ng’eyo adiera to onge misango moro mapod odong’
58010027	gima odong’ en mana kibaji , kwang’eyo ni wachomo kum gi mirima mar mach , mabiro tieko chuth joma kedo gi Nyasaye .
58010028	Ng’ato ang’ata ma otamore rito Chik Musa inego maok okechi e nyim joneno ariyo kata adek .
58010029	Koro iparo ni ng’at monyono Wuod Nyasaye piny gi tiende , ma kawo remo mar singruok mane opwodhego ka gima nono , kendo ma yanyo Roho mar ng’wono , to biro yudo kum malich machal nade ?
58010030	Nikech wang’eyo Jal ma nowacho ni , " An awuon ema nachul kuor . Adier abiro chulo kuor maonge kiawa , " kendo ni , " Ruoth biro yalo joge . "
58010031	En gima lich miwuoro ka ng’ato olwar e lwet Nyasaye mangima !
58010032	Parieuru ndalo mokwongo mane uyudo ler mar Nyasaye . E kindeno nuny-ono piny motegno kukedo matek e dier sand mathoth .
58010033	Seche moko ne iyanyou kendo isandou ang’ienga e dier ji , to seche moko nuchung’ kaachiel kod joma ne iti-monegi kamano .
58010034	Chunyu ne sandore kaachiel gi joma otue nikech Kristo , kendo numor kimayou giu githwon nikech nung’eyo ni un uwegi un gi mwandu mabeyo moloyo kendo mosiko .
58010035	Kuom mano , kik koro uyie chir mane ungo lalnu . Obiro kelonu pok maduong’ .
58010036	Dwarore ni umed timo kinda kuom timo dwaro Nyasaye , mondo eka unun-wang’ gik mosesingore .
58010037	Nikech odong’ mana kinde matin kende eka " Jal mabiro nobi kendo maok olewo .
58010038	To ng’ata makare nobed mangima kuom yie . To kodok chien , to ok nabed mamor kode . "
58010039	To wan ok wan jogo madok chien kendo lal , to wan jogo moyie kendo ma ireso .
58011001	Yie en bedo gi adiera kuom gima wageno yudo kendo en bedo gi ratiro kuom gik maok wane .
58011002	Kwerewa ne nigi yie machal kamano omiyo Nyasaye noyie kodgi .
58011003	Yie ema miyo wayango ni Wach Nyasaye ema nochweyo gik moko duto manie polo gi piny , mi nomiyo gik mantie mineno gi wang’ owuok kuom gik maok ne .
58011004	Yie ema nomiyo Habil otimo misango maber ne Nyasaye moloyo misango mar Kain . Yieneno nomiyo Nyasaye oyie kode kaka ng’ama kare , nikech Nyasaye owuon norwako michneno . Habil pod wuoyo nyaka sani nikech yie mane en-gono , kata obedo ni nosetho .
58011005	Kuom yie Enoka nokaw ka ngima omiyo ne ok oneno tho , nolal nono e wang’ ji nikech Nyasaye nosekawe . Nyasaye nopake kaka ng’at mamiye mor kane pok okawe .
58011006	Onge ng’at ma Nyasaye nyalo yiego ka onge gi yie , nikech ng’ato ang’ata madwaro sudo but Nyasaye nyaka yie ni entie kendo ni en-gi mich momiyo joma oketo chunygi kadware .
58011007	Yie ema nomiyo Noa owinjo siem mane Nyasaye osiemego kanyise gik mane biro timore mane pok oneno gi wang’e . Noa nowinjo wach Nyasaye , kopong’ gi luor , mi nohondho yie mondo otony kaachiel gi joode . Kuom yieneno , nong’ado ne piny bura , kendo nodoko achiel kuom joma Nyasaye oketo kare kuom yie .
58011008	Yie ema nomiyo Ibrahim owinjo luong Nyasaye mi owuok odhi e piny mokia , mane biro bedo mare bang’e achien . Nowuok awuoka modhi kata obedo ni nokia kuma nodhiye kamano .
58011009	Yie mane en-gono ema nomiyo odhi odak e piny mawendo , mane osingne . Nodak e hema mana kaka Isaka kod Jakobo bende ne jodak , mi gidoko weg singruok kaachiel kode .
58011010	Nikech nong’iyo nyime kogeno dala machielo man gi mise motegno , ma jachenone gi jagedone en Nyasaye owuon .
58011011	Yie ema nomiyo Ibrahim obedo wuoro , kata obedo ni noseti ahinya , kendo chiege ma Sara bende ne migumba nomiye teko mar bedo wuoro nikech nogeno ni ng’at mane omiye singruok ne en jaadiera .
58011012	Kata obedo ni Ibrahim ne chalo ng’ama osetho kamano , to kothe nodoko magalamoro mana ka sulwe manie polo kendo mana ka kwoyo mang’eny mak kwanre manie dho nam .
58011013	Jogi duto notho ka nigi yie . Ne ok giyudo gik mane Nyasaye osingore ni nomigi , to ne ginenogi kendo girwakogi mana gichien , kendo ne gikwanore kaka welo gi jo wuoth makadho akadha e pinyni .
58011014	Joma wacho weche ma kamagi nyiso malong’o ni gigeno yudo pinygi giwegi .
58011015	Ka dine bed ni pod giketo pachgi kuom piny mane giseweyo , to dine giyudo thuolo mar dok chien kuma ne giaye .
58011016	To kar timo kamano , ne gigombo piny maber moloyo mano mane giseweyo . Ne gigombo polo . Emomiyo Nyasaye wiye ok kuodi kiluonge ni Nyasachgi , nikech oseikonegi dala .
58011017	Yie ema nomiyo Ibrahim ochiwo wuode ma Isaka kaka misango kane Nyasaye oteme mondo otim kamano . Jal mane oyudo singruokno noikore mar chiwo wuode achiel makende ,
58011018	kata obedo ni Nyasaye nosewachone motelo ni , " Isaka ema kothi duto nochakre kuome . "
58011019	Ibrahim nong’eyo e chunye ni Nyasaye ne nyalo chiero joma otho , omiyo kangero norwako Isaka mana ka ng’a mochier oa kuom joma otho .
58011020	Yie ema nomiyo Isaka ogwedho Jakobo gi Esau konyiso kaka ngimagi mabiro ne biro chalo .
58011021	Yie ema nomiyo Jakobo ogwedho yawuot Josef , moro ka moro , sama nochiegni tho . Nolamonegi gweth koyiengore e mikwache mar wuoth .
58011022	Yie ema nomiyo Josef , ka koro nochiegni tho , nowuoyo kuom wuok mar jo Israel ka gia Misri , mi nochano gima nonego otim gi chokene .
58011023	Yie ema nomiyo jonyuol Musa opande kuom dweche adek bang’ nywolne , nikech ne gineno ka kite ber moloyo kit nyithindo minyuolo pile ; kendo ne gitimo kamano ka ok giluoro siem mar ruodh Misri .
58011024	Yie ema nomiyo ka Musa nosedoko ng’ama duong’ to nodagi ni kik luonge ni wuod nyar Farao .
58011025	Noyiero mondo osandre gi jo Nyasaye moloyo dak e mor mar richo marumo piyo nono .
58011026	Nokwano achaya miyudo nikech Kristo kaka gima nigi tiende moloyo mwandu mag Misri , nikech nogeno yudo pokne achien .
58011027	Nodar Misri kuom yie , ka ok oluoro mirimb ruoth , kendo nodhi nyime gichir nikech noneno Jal maok ne .
58011028	Yie bende ema nomiyo oloso Sap Ruoth , mi okiro remo e dhout jo Israel mondo Malaika mane nego nyithindo makayo e Misri kik mui nyithi jo Israel , makayo .
58011029	Yie ema nomiyo jo Israel okalo Nam Makwar mana kagima gikalo lowo motwo . Jo Misri to ka notemo timo kamano to ne ginimo .
58011030	Yie ema nomiyo ohinga mag Jeriko oruombore piny , bang’ ka jo Israel nosewuotho ka lworogi kuom ndalo abiriyo .
58011031	Yie ema nomiyo jachode ma Rahab , nikech norwako jo mbetre mag Israel gi ng’wono , ok nonegi ka ne inego joma ok winj wach Nyasaye .
58011032	Ang’o kendo ma damed wacho ? Thuolo ditama mar wuoyo kuom Gidion , gi Barak , gi Samson , gi Jeftha , gi Daudi , gi Samuel , kod jonabi mamoko ,
58011033	yie nomiyo jogi omako pinje ruodhi kendo girito ji gi bura makare , mi giyudo gik ma Nyasaye nosingo . Ne giumo dho sibuoche ,
58011034	kendo ne ginego gero mar mach ; bende ne gitony e lak lingangla . Nyawo margi nolokore teko mi gidoko joma ger e lweny , ka gikeyo mel jolwenj pinje mamoko duto mane kedo kodgi .
58011035	Mon mane nigi yie nochier negi jogi ma nosetho mi gikawo kangima . Jomoko kuomgi kata ne isando malich to nodagi ni kik wegi thuolo , nikech ne gigeno ni nochiergi e ngima maber moloyo .
58011036	Moko ne ojar kendo orodhi gi del , to moko bende notwe gi nyororo mi oketi e jela .
58011037	Nogogi gi kite , nong’adgi gi musmeno nyadiriyo noneggi gi ligangla . Ne giwuotho ka gi kacha , ka girwako piende rombe gi piende diek , kagidhier kisando-gi kendo kichandogi malit
58011038	jogi ne joma beyo gilala mane ok giwinjore dak e pinyni , Ne gibayo abaya e thimbe gi gode ka gidak e bwo lwendni gi buche .
58011039	Giduto Nyasaye noyie kodgi nikech yie mane gin-go . Kata kamano onge ng’ato kata achiel kuomgi ma noyudo gima Nyasaye nose singo negi .
58011040	Nikech Nyasaye nochanonwa gima ber moloy ) ; mondo oketwa kare mana ka wan kaachiel kodgi .
58012001	Nikech oganda maduong’ mar w joneno opie molworowa ka ng’iy-owa , wawituru gimoro amora mwating’o manyalo duodowae wuoth , kod richo mora amora e ngimawa manyalo gajowa , kendo waringuru matek maok waol e ng’wech moketwae .
58012002	Wachomuru wang’wa kuom Yesu , ma en jachak kendo jachop yie marwa . Nikech nogeno yudo mor mane oikne ni nonwang’ achien , nochayo tho malit mar msalaba ka ok odewo wichkuot ma tho ma kamano kelo , kendo koro obet piny e bat korachwich mar kom duong’ mar Nyasaye .
58012003	Paruru kuome , en ma notimo kinda ka joricho kedo kode , mondo kik ujogi mi chunyu aa .
58012004	E lweny mukedoe mondo ulo richo , pok ukedo mi rembu ool oko .
58012005	Koso wiu osewil gi weche mag jip ma Nyasaye loso-go kodu kaka wuoda ni : " Nyathina kik ikaw kum ma Ruoth kumigo kagima nono , kendo kik chunyi jogi kokweri ,
58012006	nikech joma Ruoth ohero ema okumo , kendo nyathine mohero ema ochwado . "
58012007	Ka uyudo chandruok to beduru modhil nikech mano e yo ma Nyasaye puonjougo kaka nyithinde . Be nitie nyathi ma wuon ok nyal kumo ?
58012008	Kapo ni un ok wuonu kumu kaka okumo nyithinde mamoko duto to mano nyiso ni un kimirwa kendo ok un nyithinde ma hie .
58012009	Waduto wan-gi wuonewa e piny ka ma kumowa to eka pod wamiyogi mana luor . Koro donge onego wawinj Wuon chunjewa moloyo , mondo eka wabed mangima ?
58012010	Wuonewa mag pinyka ne kumowa mana kuom kinde matin e sama gihero , to Nyasaye to kumowa mondo okonywa , kodwaro ni mondo wadok maler kaka oler .
58012011	Sama ng’ato yudo kum to ok onyal winjo maber nikech owinjo rem . To bang’ kosekum ng’ato to opuonjore mi ngimane nyag olemo mar tim makare kod kuwe .
58012012	Kuom mano jing’uru bedeu mobengore gi chongeu monyosore .
58012013	" Losuru yore muluwo mondo oriere tir , " mondo omi joma tiendegi ong’ol kik wil to mondo gichangi .
58012014	Temuru matek mondo udag gi ji duto gi kuwe , kendo mondo ngimau obed maler , nikech ka ng’ato onge gi ngima maler to ok none Ruoth .
58012015	Neuru mondo une ni onge ng’ato kuomu ma ng’wono mar Nyasaye obayo , kendo kik uwe mondo sigu moro onyagi e kindu manyalo ketho ji mang’eny .
58012016	Neuru ni onge ng’ato kuomu ma jachode , kata ng’ama ochayo Nyasaye ka Esau ma wach chiemo michamo dichiel nomiyo owilo duong’ne kaka wuoyi makayo .
58012017	Ung’eyo ni bang’e achien ka nodwaro mondo wuon mare ogwedhe to ne okwede . Noyuak malit gi pi wang’e mondo oyud gwethni to mano ok nyal loko paro kata matin .
58012018	Ng’euru ni uchung’ kama opogore gi kama jo-Israel nochung’ie . Ok uchung’ e tie got minyalo mulo ; kata kama mach kaknie kendo ma mudho mandiwa oumo , gi ong’ueng’o ,
58012019	ooyo , karu ok en kama iwinjoe koko mar turumbete maywak , kod dwol ma wuoyo to ok ne , ma joma nowinjo wechene noywagore ni kik ochak owuo kodgi kendo ,
58012020	nikech ne ok ginyal winjo chik mane Nyasaye omiyogi ni , " Ka chiayo moro oreree e godni to nyaka chiele gi kite mi nege . "
58012021	Gima ne Jo Israel oneno ne lich mokadho mi Musa nowacho ni , " Luoro teta . "
58012022	Un usebiro e Got Sayun , e Jerusalem manie polo , ma en dala Nyasaye mangima . Useriworu gi malaike gana gi gana mochokore e nyasi mar mor
58012023	e kanisa mar kayo , ma nyingegi ondik e polo . Usebiro ir Nyasaye , ma en jang’ad bura ne ji duto ; kendo ir chunje mag joma kare , makoro ok osedoko malong’o chutho ,
58012024	usebiro ir Yesu ma en jagach mar singruok manyien , gi remo mokir ma wuoyo kuom gik mabeyo moloyo remb Habil .
58012025	Neuru ni ok utamoru winjo Jal mawuoyo kodu . Nikech ka gin bende ne ok gitony kane gidagi winjo jal mane osiemogi e pinyka , wan to koro dwatony nade ka wadagi winjo Jal masiemowa gie polo ?
58012026	E kindeno duonde noyiengo piny , to sani to en mana kaka osesingore ni , " Abiro chako ayiengo piny kendo . To ok anayieng piny kende , to polo bende . "
58012027	Wach mar " kendo " nyiso ni Nyasaye biro golo oko gik mayiengni manyalo wuok , ma gin gik mochwe mondo gik maok nyal yiengni ema odong’ osiki .
58012028	Emomiyo wagouru erokamano ne Nyasaye nikech wasenwang’o piny manyien maok nyal yiengi . Chunywa mondo omi Nyasaye duong’ kod luor , kendo walame e yo modwaro , ka wapong’ gi kibaji ,
58012029	nikech " Nyasachwa en mach matieko chuth gik mowang’o . "
58013001	Sikuru kuheroru kaka owete .
58013002	Kik uwe mak uruako welo e uteu , nikech jomoko kuom timo kamano oseruako koda ka malaike ka ok ging’eyo .
58013003	Paruru joma otwe e jela mana kagima un bende otweu kodgi kuno . Joma isando bende paruru mana kagima un bende isandou kodgi .
58013004	Ji duto nyaka kaw kend kaka gima duong’ , kendo joma okendore kik dwany otandagi mar kendruok . Nikech Nyasaye biro kumo ng’ato ang’ata ma jachode , gi joma timo timbe dwanyruok duto .
58013005	Kik ubed joma ohero pesa , to gik ma ungo mondo oromu , nikech Nyasaye osewacho ni , " Ok anaweu kata jwang’ ok ana-jwang’u "
58013006	Omiyo wanyalo wacho gi chir ni , " Ruoth Nyasaye e jakonyna ; omiyo ok analuor ; dhano adhana to ditima nade ? "
58013007	Paruru jotendu ma nokwongo yalonu Wach Nyasaye . Paruru kaka kit ngimagi ne chalo mondo ulu kit yie margi .
58013008	Yesu Kristo chaire nyoro , gi kawuono kendo nyaka chieng’ .
58013009	Kik ulu kit puonj moro amora magalagala manyalo golou e yor adiera , nikech ng’wono Nyasaye ema onego ojiw chunywa to ok puonj motenore kuom weche mag chiemo maok kel kony moro amora ni joma chamogi .
58013010	Wan gi kendo mar misango ma jodolo ma pod tiyo e Hema Maler ok oyienegi chamo misengini motimie .
58013011	Jadolo maduong’ tero remb jamni nyaka Kama Ler Moloyo mondo ochiw kaka misango mar golo richo , ka ringre mag jamnigo to iwang’o oko mar kambi .
58013012	Mano emomiyo Yesu bende nonegi oko mar dala mondo opwodh joge odok maler gi rembe owuon .
58013013	Omiyo wan bende wawuoguru wadhi ire oko mar kambi mondo wane achaya ma en bende noneno .
58013014	Nikech e pinyni waonge gi dala mosiko , to warito dala machielo mwabiro nwang’o achien .
58013015	Kuom mano , watimuru ne Nyasaye misango mar pak ndalo duto ka wan kuom Yesu . Pak makamano en olemo mawuok e dhowa ka hulo nyinge .
58013016	To bende wiu kik wil gi timo timbe mabeyo kendo gi pogo ne ji giu , nikech mago e kit misango ma Nyasaye morgo .
58013017	Winjuru weche jotendu kendo beduru e bwo lochgi . Girito chunyu odiechieng’ gotieno kaka joma nyaka nyis Nyasaye kaka uchal . Wmjgiuru , eka tich ma gitiyo okelnigi mor to ok pek , nikech ka umiyo tich obedonegi mapek to un ema uhinyoru .
58013018	Lemnwauru . Wang’eyo malong’o ni waonge wach gi ng’ato kendo wadwaro ni ngimawa obed mobidhore e yore duto .
58013019	Moloyo an awuon , akwayou mondo ulamna mondo aduog iru mapiyo .
58013020	Mad Nyasach kuwe ma nochiero Ruodhwa Yesu , ma en Jakwath Maduong’ mar rombe , kuom remo mar singruok mosiko ,
58013021	olosu udok kare chuth , kutimo timbe mabeyo duto mondo eka utim dwarone . Mad oloswa mi wachal kaka odwaro , kuom Yesu Kristo , monego oyud duong’ nyaka chieng’ ! Amin .
58013022	Jowetena , akwayou mondo uyie gi wach ma ajiwougoni nikech andilonu mana barua machwok kende .
58013023	Adwaro ni mondo ung’e ni owadwa Timotheo osegony , kendo ka ochopo piyo to anabi kode mondo waneu .
58013024	Mosuru jotendu duto kaachiel gi jo Nyasaye duto . Owete moa Italia ooronu mosgi .
58013025	Ng’wono mondo obed kodu uduto .
59001001	An Jakobo , ma jatich Nyasaye kendo jatich Ruoth Yesu Kristo , Andikonu , un dhoudi apar gariyo mokere e pinje mamoko .
59001002	Jowetena , kaweuru gi mor mar adier , ka uneno tembe mopogore opogore ,
59001003	nikech ung’eyo ni ka yie maru otem to okelo kinda .
59001004	To kinda nyaka chop kare chuth eka unyalo doko motegno chuth maok uremo gimoro .
59001005	Ka ng’ato kuomu ochando rieko to okwa Nyasaye , ma jachiwo maber ne ji duto kendo nomiye maonge geruok .
59001006	To ka okwayo to nyaka obed gi yie maok oriwo gi kiawa , nikech ng’at ma riwo gi kiawa chalo gi apaka mar nam ma yamo riembo kendo tago .
59001007	Ng’at ma kamano kik par ni onyalo kwayo Ruoth gimoro mi oyudi ,
59001008	nikech en ng’at ma pache nyadiriyo kendo ma timbege duto yom yom .
59001009	Owadwa modhier onego obed mamor ka oting’e malo .
59001010	To ng’at man gi mwandu onego obed mamor ka odwoke piny , nikech obiro lal nono , mana ka mafua moti e thim .
59001011	Nikech ka chieng’ owuok gi liet marewni , to yien no two , maupe ge lwar piny kendo berne rumo . Kamano bende e kaka jamwandu biro lal nono , kata mana kodich e ohande mapile .
59001012	Ng’at ma nano kiteme en jahawi nikech kochung’ motegno mi oloyo temno , to obiro oyudo osimbo mar ngima , ma Nyasaye osesingore ni nomi joma ohere .
59001013	To ka itemo ng’ato to kik o wach ni , " Nyasaye tema . " Nikech Nyasaye ok nyal tem gi gik maricho , to en bende owuon ok otem ji
59001014	makmana ng’ato ka ng’ato itemo mana ka gombone owuon maricho oywaye mogaje .
59001015	Bang’e ka gombo maricho osemako ich to onyuolo richo ; to richo kosedoko motegno to onyuolo tho .
59001016	Kik ng’ato wuondu , jowetena mageno .
59001017	Mich moro amora maber kendo malong’o aa malo e polo , koa kuom Wuoro ma nochweyo ler marieny e polo , kendo maok lokre ka tipo ma osiko kalokore .
59001018	En ema noyiero owuon mondo onyuolwa kokonyore gi wach mar adiera , mondo wabed kaka olemo mokuongo chiek e kind chwechne duto .
59001019	Jowetena mageno , winjuru wachni malong’o ni : Ji duto onego bed mapiyo e winjo wach , kik urikni e wuoyo kendo kik ubed joma igi wang’ piyo ,
59001020	nikech ich wang’ ok mi wabed joma kare kaka Nyasaye dwaro ni wabedi .
59001021	Kuom mano , lonyuru oko kit kethruok gi richo duto , ma kindegi opong’o piny kendo bolreuru kurwako wach mopidhi e chunyu , manyalo konyo u .
59001022	To kik uchik mana itu ni winjo wach , kende nono to uwuondoru kendu uwegi . Timuru gima Wach puonjo .
59001023	Ng’ato ang’ata ma winjo awinja wach to ok tim gima wach owacho , chalo gi ng’ama ng’iyo lenda wang’e e rang’i ,
59001024	to bang’ koseng’iyore maber to owuok odhi adhiya mi wiye wil gi kite sanosano .
59001025	To ng’at manono adimba Chik malong’o mar Nyasaye mamiyo dhano bedo thuolo , komedo timo kamano kinde ka kinde , maok wiye owil gi gima osewinjo , to osiko otimo gima Chik owacho , ibiro gwedhe e gimoro amora motimo .
59001026	Ka ng’ato ang’ata okawore ni en jalenlo , to ok orito lewe motegno to owuondore kende , kendo lemone onge tiende .
59001027	Kit lemo ma Nyasaye Wuonwa oyiego ni ler kendo onge ketho en mondo wakony nyithi kiye gi mond liete e chan-druokgi , kendo mondo ng’ato ka ng’ato oritre kik timbe maricho mag piny duwe .
59002001	Jowetena , kaka un joma oyie kuom Ruodhwa Yesu Kristo ma en Ruodh duong’ , kik udew wang’ji .
59002002	Wakaw ni ng’ato odonjo e chokruok maru korwako bangli mar dhahabu gi lewni mabeyo , to ng’at moro modhier morwako lewni mokidhore okidhore bende odonjo kode .
59002003	Kapo ni ng’at morwakore gi lewni mabeyo ema umiyo luor , kuwachone ni , " Eri , kaw kom maberni ema ibedie , " to ng’at modhier to unyiso ni , " In chung’ chien kucha , " kata ni , " Bedi piny e lowo e tienda ka , "
59002004	donge mano nyiso ni useketo kiewo e dieru un uwegi , ka ubedo jong’ad bura ma pachgi richo ?
59002005	Winjuru wachni jowetena mageno : Donge Nyasaye oseyiero joma piny kwano ni odhier mondo obed joma omew e yie margi kendo mondo ocham mwandu mag Pinyruoth mosesingo ni joma ohere ?
59002006	Un to usechayo joma odhier ! Donge gin jomwandu ema mayou giu kendo materou e ute mag ng’ado bura mondo okumu ?
59002007	Donge gin ema gijaro Nying moluor mar Jal muyie kuome ?
59002008	Ka en adier ni umako Chik mar Pinyruoth Polo mawacho ni , " Her owadu kaka iherori iwuon , " to utimo maber .
59002009	To ka udewo wang’j i to utimo richo kendo bura oseloyou kaka joketh Chik .
59002010	Nikech ka ng’ato orito Chik duto to opodho e Chik moro achiel kende to odoko jaketho mana kagima oketho Chik duto .
59002011	Nikech Jal mane owacho ni , " Kik iterri , " ema nowacho bende ni , " Kik ineki . Kapo ni ok iterri to nek to ineko to isedoko jaketh Chik .
59002012	Wuouru kendo timuru gik mutimo kaka joma ibiro ng’adnigi bura gi Chik achielno mamiyo ji bedo thuolo ,
59002013	nikech nong’ad bura maonge kech ni ng’ato ang’ata maonge kech . To kech loyo ng’ado bura .
59002014	Jowetena , ere konyruok ma ng’ato yudo ka owacho ni en gi yie to oonge gi tim ? Be yie machal kamano nyalo rese
59002015	Wakaw ane kaka ranyisi ni owadwa kata nyaminwa kuom Kristo moro wuotho duk kendo oonge gi chiemo monyalo chamo .
59002016	Ka ng’ato achiel kuomu nyalo wachone ni , " Dhi gi kuwe , Nyasaye mondo ogwedhi , kendo koyo kik chami , kendo ichiem maber , " to ok otimo gimoro mokonyo ringruokne , to ere berne ?
59002017	Mano e kaka yie bende chalo : ka oonge gi tim to en yie motho .
59002018	To ng’ato nyalo wacho ni , " In to in-gi yie , to an to an-gi tim . " Ng’at ma wuoyo kamano mondo onyisa ane yie ma en-go maonge tim , mondo eka anyise yie ma ango kuom timbe ma atimo .
59002019	Iyie ni nitiere Nyasaye achiel . Mano ber ahinya ! To ng’e ni kata jochiende bende oyie mano ,
59002020	In ng’at mofuwoni idwaro mondo omed nyisi kaka yie maonge tim en gima nono ?
59002021	Donge Ibrahim kwarwa ne Nyasaye okwano kaka ng’ama kare kuom gima notimo kane ochiwo wuode ma Isaka e wi kendo mar Misango .
59002022	Inyalo neno kaka yie mane en-go kod timne ne tiyo kaachiel , mi yiene nobedo kare chuth kuom gima notimo .
59002023	Omiyo Ndiko nochopo kare , mawacho ni , " Ibrahim noyie Nyasaye , kendo yieneno nomiyo Nyasaye orwake kaka ng’at makare " Kuom mano Ibrahim ne iluongo ni osiep Nyasaye .
59002024	Koro nenore malong’o ni ng’ato doko ng’at makare kuom gima otimo , to ok kuom yie kende .
59002025	Kamano bende donge Rahab ma jarit kar rwako welo nokwan kaka ng’ama kare kuom gima notimo kane orwako okwach kich ka kendo mi nokonyogi tony gi yo machielo .
59002026	Mana kaka ringruok maonge chuny otho , e kaka yie maonge tim bende otho .
59003001	Jowetena , kik joma thoth kuomu hedhre mar bedo jopuonj , nikech ung’eyo ni wan mwapuonjo nong’adnwa bura malit moloyo ji mamoko .
59003002	Wan duto wachwanyore e yore mang’eny . Ka weche ma ng’ato wacho ok mi obed jaketho to en ng’at malong’o kendo onyalo chiko ringre duto mondo owinje .
59003003	Ka waketo ratege e dho farase mondo omi giwinjwa , to wanyalo chiko ringregi kamoro amora ma wadwaro .
59003004	Kata wanyalo kawo yiedhi madongo kaka ranyisi . Kata obedo ni gidongo miwuoro ; kendo iriembogi gi yembe man gi teko madongo , to pod ichikogi mana gi ngayi matin nono mi gichom kamoro amora ma jakwang’ yie dwaro ni gidhiye .
59003005	E kaka lep bende en fuon matin nono e dend dhano , to onyalo sungore miwuoro . Parie kaka pilni mach matin nono nyalo moko mach mi wang’ bungu maduong’ !
59003006	Lep bende en mach kendo piny mopong’ gi richo e kind fuonde duto mag ringruok . Oketho ringruok duto , ka ochinyo mach mawang’o ngima dhano duto mi chop en owuon bende wang’e e Gehena .
59003007	Kit le duto gi winy mahuyo , gi gik mamol kaachiel gi chwech Nyasaye duto manie nam , dhano nyalo boyo kendo ose-boyo ,
59003008	to onge ng’ama nyalo boyo lep . En gima rach maok yue , mopong’ gi kwiri marach .
59003009	Lep achielni ema wapakogo Ruodhwa kendo Wuonwa , en bende ema wak-wong’o kode ji mochwe e kit Nyasaye .
59003010	Pak kod kuong’ wuok e dhok achielno ! Jowetena , gima kamano ok onego otimre .
59003011	Bende pi mamit gi pi makech nyalo wuok e soko achiel ?
59003012	Jowetena , bende yiend ng’owu nyalo nyago zeituni ? Koso mzabibu be nyalo nyago ng’owu ? Kamano bende e kaka pi makech ok nyal lokore pi mamit .
59003013	En ng’a e dieru mikwano ni riek kendo ni winjo tiend weche ? Ng’at ma kamano mondo onyis riekone kuom kit ngimane maber kendo kuom timbe motimo gi muolo mawuok kuom rieko ma en-go .
59003014	To kapo ni upando nyiego mopong’ gi mirima , gi gombo maricho mag chopo ichlit ma ungo e chunyu , to kik usungru kuom dwarou marichogo kukwedo adiera .
59003015	" Rieko " machal kamano ok oa e polo , to en mar piny kendo ok okony chuny dhano . En rieko Jachien .
