59003016	Nikech kama nyiego gi piem nitie e kama njawni gi kit richo duto yudoree .
59003017	To rieko moa e polo ok chai kamano . Mokuongo oler , kendo ohero kuwe , odembore , owinj o wach , opong’ gi kech kod olembe mabeyo ; ok odew wang’ , kendo oonge miganga .
59003018	Jokel kuwe machuoyo koth kuwe kayo tim makare .
59004001	Ang’o makelo goruok gi dhawo e kindu ? Donge gia kuom gombou makedo matek e chunyu ?
59004002	Udwaro ni ubed gi gik moko , to ok uyudgi . Uneko kendo ugombo gige ji , to ok unyal yudo gik mudwarogo . Udhawo kendo ugoru e kindu ng’ato gi ng’ato . Ok uyud gik mudwaro nikech ok ukwa Nyasaye .
59004003	To kata ka ukwayo Nyasaye , to ok uyud gik mukwayo nikech ukwayo gi paro maricho mondo utimgo dwarou uwegi .
59004004	Un jomaterore ! Donge ung’eyo ni hero piny en chayo Nyasaye ? Ng’ato ang’ata moyiero e chunye mondo obed osiep piny doko jasik Nyasaye .
59004005	Koso uparo ni Ndiko wacho kayiem , ni chuny moketo mondo odag e iwa nigi nyiego mager .
59004006	Makmana omiyowa ng’wono maduong’ moloyo , mano emomiyo Ndiko wacho ni , " Nyasaye odagi josunga , to ochiwo ng’wonone ni joma muol . "
59004007	Omiyo bolreuru e bwo Loch Nyasaye . Kweduru Jachien , eka noringu .
59004008	Suduru but Nyasaye , eka nosud butu . Lwokuru lweteu , un jorichogi , kendo pwodhuru chunyu , un joma nigi paro ariyogi .
59004009	Owinjore ubed mokuyo , kendo uywagi , kendo ugo nduru . Nyiero munyierogo onego olokre ywak , kendo mor mumorgo onego olokre kuyo .
59004010	Beduru mamuol e nyim Nyasaye , mondo eka obi oting’u malo .
59004011	Jowetena , kik uketh nying joweteu . Ng’ato ang’ata ma wuoyo marach kuom ng’at machielo , kata ma ng’ado ni ng’at machielo bura nyaka ng’e ni Chik ema owuoyo kuome marach kendo ong’adone bura . To ng’at ma ng’ado ni Chik bura ok orito Chik nogo nikech osedoko ng’ama ng’adone bura .
59004012	Wuon Chik ma bende en Jang’ad bura en achiel kende . En ema onyalo reso kata nego ng’ato . In to in ng’a mondo ing’ad ni nyawadu bura ?
59004013	Chikuru itu uwinja , un mu wacho ni , " Kawuono kata kiny wanadhi e dala ni , kata e dala cha , mondo wadag kuno higa achiel , mondo walok ohala kuno eka walos pesa . "
59004014	Ere kaka uloso kamano to ukiya gima kiny notimre . Uparo ni ngimau en ang’o ? Ngimau chalo mana ong’weng’o mineno saa matin kende to bang’e lal nono .
59004015	Kar wacho kamano to onego uwach mana ni , " Ka Ruoth oyie to wabiro medo bedo mangima mi watim ma kata macha . "
59004016	Un to usungoru kendo upakoru ! Ng’euru ni sunga ma kamano en richo .
59004017	Kuom mano , ng’ato ang’ata mong’eyo gima ber monego otim , to ok otimo , timo richo .
59005001	Chik uru itu uwinja , un jomwandu ! Ywaguru kendo gouru nduru nikech masiche mathoth ochomou .
59005002	Mwandu ma ungo osetop , kendo olwenda osechamo lepu otieko .
59005003	Dhahabu gi fedha ma ungo nyal osechamo , kendo nyal mochamogigo ema biro bedo joneno makwedou kaka joketho , kendo gibiro chamo ringreu ka mach . Usechoko mwandu e ndalo giko .
59005004	Neuru ! Misach jotich mane otiyonu e puotheu ma utwerue ywagorenu . Kendo ywak mar jokeyo mane okayo chambu bende osechopo e it Ruoth Manyalo Gik Moko Duto .
59005005	Usedak e piny e ngima mamalo kuchamo raha . Usebedo machwe e odiechieng’ mar nyasi .
59005006	Useng’ado bura mi unego joma kare , mane ok ked kodu e yo moro amora .
59005007	Emomiyo horeuru mos , jowetena , nyaka chop Ruoth duogi . Parieuru kaka japur rito puothe mondo onyagne cham mokonyorego , kendo kaka ohore mos korito kodh komo gi kodh Chwiri .
59005008	Un bende horeuru mos , kendo jiwuru chunyu , nikech Ruoth chiegni duogo .
59005009	Kik ng’ato kuomu ng’ur gi nyawadgi , jowetena , nono to ibiro ng’adnu bura kaka joketho . Neuru ni Jang’ad bura ochung’ e dhoot !
59005010	Jowetena , kawuru Jonabi mane owuoyo e nying Ruoth kaka ranyisi mar bedo jokinda e kinde chandruok .
59005011	Kaka ung’eyo maber ni joma otimo kinda e chandruok ema ikwano ni ogwedhi . Usewinjo bende kuom kinda mar Ayub , kendo ung’eyo gima Ruoth notimone achien . Ruoth nigi kech kod ng’wono mathoth .
59005012	To moloyo mago duto , jowetena , kik ukuong’ru . Kik ukuong’ru gi polo kata gi piny kata gi gimoro amora machielo . Kar timo kamano to " Ee " maru mondo obed mana ee , kendo " Ooyo " maru bende obed mana ooyo , nono to bura biro oloyou .
59005013	Mit ki ng’ato kuomu nigi chandruok ? Onego olem . Mit ka ng’ato mor ? Onego ower wende pak .
59005014	Mit ka ng’ato kuomu tuo ? Onego oluong jodong kanisa mondo olamne kendo owire gi mo e nying Ruoth .
59005015	Nikech lamo molam kuom yie biro kelo chango ni jatuo , mi Ruoth mi oa malo . Kapo dipo ni osetimo richo to nowene .
59005016	Emomiyo ng’ato ka ng’ato mondo ohul richone kendo olam ni nyawadgi , mondo eka uyud chang . Lamo mar ng’ama kare nigi teko kendo timo tich .
59005017	Elija ne en dhano mana kaka wan . Nolemo koketo chunye mondo kik koth chue , mi koth ne ok ochue e piny kuom higni adek gi dweche auchiel .
59005018	Eka bang’e nolemo kendo , mi polo noyawore mi koth ochue kendo mi piny nochiego cham .
59005019	Jowetena , ka ng’ato kuomu obaro oweyo adiera , mi ng’ato oduoge e yo ,
59005020	to ng’euru ni ng’at moduogo jaricho e yo biro reso chunye kuom tho , kendo noum richone mathoth .
60001001	Petro , ma jaote Yesu Kristo , Ne joma Nyasaye oyiero ma gin welo e piny Peter , kendo mokere kuonde duto mag Ponto , gi Galatia .
60001002	Moseyier , chon kaluwore gi dwaro mar Nyasaye Wuoro , kuom tich mar pwoth mar Roho , winjo chik mar Yesu Kristo gi lwok kuom chwer mar rembe : Ng’wono kod kuwe obednu mogundho .
60001003	Pak ni Nyasachwa ma en Wuon Ruodhwa Yesu Kristo ! Kuom kechne maduong’ , osenyuolwa manyien mi wayudo geno mangima kuom chier mane Yesu Kristo ochiergo oa kuom joma otho ,
60001004	kendo e mwandu mosiko ma okanonu e polo maok nyal lal bende ok nyal kethore kata lolore .
60001005	Jogo morit kuom yie gi teko mar Nyasaye nyaka chop warruok moseiki mondo oel e chieng’ giko .
60001006	Umor mathoth kuom wachni , kata obedo ni sani pod uneno sand mopogore opogore kuom kinde matin .
60001007	Magi osetimorenu mondo yie maru man gi nengo moloyo dhahabu ma kethore kata obedo ni ipuodhe e mach mondo ong’e ka un-gi yie maradier mondo mi okel pak gi duong’ kod luor chieng’ ma Yesu Kristo ofwenyore .
60001008	Kata obedo ni pok unene to pod uhere ahera ; kendo kata obedo ni ok unene kata sani to pod uyie ayiea kuome kendo upong’ gi mor maduong’ mokadho wacho .
60001009	Nikech koro uyudo thorro mar yie maru , ma en warruok mar chunjeu .
60001010	Kuom wach warruokni jonabi mane owuoyo kuom wach ng’wono mane biro bironu ne jonono matut kendo manyo matek .
60001011	Ka gidwaro mondo ging’e kinde kod gigo manotimore mane Roho mar Kristo mane nikuomgi ne nyiso kanokoro kuom masiche mane Kristo biro yudo kod duong’ mane biro luwo masichego .
60001012	Nofweny nigi ni tich mane gitiyo ne ok giti nigin giwegi , tone gitiyo mana neun kane giwuoyo kuom gik ma koro oseny-isu gi joma oseyalonu Wach Maber kuom teko mar Roho Maler moa e polo . Koda ka Malaike bende gombo mondo onee .
60001013	Emomiyo ikuru pachu ni tich . Ritreuru , kendo keturu genou duto kuom ng’wono mibiro miu ka Yesu Kristo ofwenyore .
60001014	Kaka nyithindo mawinjo wach , kik ulu kit gombo maricho mane uluwo chon kane pod udak e kia .
60001015	To mana kaka Jal moluongou ler , beduru maler e gimoro amora mutimo .
60001016	nikech ondiki ni , " Beduru maler nikech aler . "
60001017	Kaka uluongo nying Wuoro ma ng’ado bura ne tich ng’ato ka ng’ato machalre ka ok odew wang’ ng’ato , daguru ngimau kaka welo e pinyka , kod luor mowinjore .
60001018	Nikech ung’eyo ni ne ok owaru gi gik ma kethore , kaka fedha kata dhahabu , mondo uwe kit ngimau manono mane kwereu machon oweyonu mondo ulu ,
60001019	to gi remo ma nengone tek mar Kristo , ma en Nyarombo maonge mbala kata songa .
60001020	Ne oyiere kapok ochwe piny , to ne ofwenynwago e ndalo gi mogik nikech un .
60001021	Nikech En , koro uyie kuom Nyasaye , mane ochiere oa kuom joma otho mi omiye duong’ mondo yie maru kod geno maru obed kuom Nyasaye .
60001022	Kaka koro usepwodhuru uwegi kuom luwo adiera , mondo eka uher joweteu , koro herreuru ng’ato gi ng’ato gi hera matut , kendo timuru kamano gi chunyu duto .
60001023	Nikech osenyuolu nyuol manyien , ok gi kodhi ma top , to gi kodhi ma ok tow , gi wach Nyasaye mangima kendo mochwere .
60001024	Nikech Ndiko wacho ni , " Dhano duto chalo gi lum kendo duong’ ma gin-go chalo mana gi mafua mar bungu . Lum ner kendo mafua two mi lwar piny ,
60001025	to wach Ruoth osiko nyaka chieng’ " . To mae e Wach Maber mane oyalnu .
60002001	Emomiyo weuru timbe maricho duto kod wuondruok duto , kod ndogruok , gi nyiego kod kuoth eyo moro amora .
60002002	Mana kaka nyithindo mayom , beduru gi siso gi chak mayom mar chuny mondo kumadhe to omi udongi e yor warruok ,
60002003	nikech koro usebilo Ruoth mi uyudo ni ober .
60002004	Kaka ubiro ire , Kidi mangima mane ji odagi to ma Nyasaye oseyiero mangi ohala kuome .
60002005	Un bende kaka kite mangima , igerou e ot mar chuny mondo ubed jodolo maler machiwo misango mag chuny ma Nyasaye oyiego kuom Yesu Kristo .
60002006	Kaka e Ndiko owacho , ni , " Neuru , achungo kidi e Zayun , en kidi moyier kendo ma nengone tek moriwo kor ot , to ng’at moyie kuome ok none wichkuot . "
60002007	Kidini nigi nengo matek mana ni un joma oyie . To kuom joma ok oyie to , " Kidi mane jogedo odagi koro osedoko kidi moriwo kor ot "
60002008	kendo , " En kidi machwanyo ji kendo en lwanda mamiyo gipodho . " Gichwanyore nikech gitamore winjo wach , mabende mano ema ne oiknegi .
60002009	Un to un oganda moyier . Un jodolo ma joka Ruoth kendo un oganda maler mar Nyasaye mane oyiero mondo ohul tijege miwuoro , kane oluongou mi ua e mudho kendo udonjo e lerne miwuoro .
60002010	Chon ne ok un ji , to koro unjo Nyasaye , chon ne pok okechu , to koro osekechu .
60002011	Joherana , ajiwou , kaka jowuoth kendo kaka welo e pinyni , mondo uwe gombo maricho mag ringruok makedo gi chunyu .
60002012	Daguru ngima mabeyo e kind jopiny makia Nyasaye mondo kata ka gihangou ni un joketho to gine mana timbeu mabeyo mi gimi Nyasaye duong’ chieng’ ma enolimwae .
60002013	Ng’ato ka ng’ato kuomu nyaka winji joloch duto moketi mondo orit ji , nikech Ruoth ema dwaro ni utim kamano , kata en ker mangi teko e wi ji duto ,
60002014	kata en jatelo ma ker oketo mondo okum joketho to opwo joma timo maber .
60002015	Nikech en dwaro Nyasaye mondo utam weche manono mag joma ofuwo gi timbeu mabeyo mutimo .
60002016	Daguru ka joma ni thuolo , to kik ukonyru gi thuolo ma ungo kaka rageng’ mar timo richo , daguru kaka jotich Nyasaye .
60002017	Chiwuru luor mowinjore ni ji duto . Heruru jowete duto mowar . Luoruru Nyasaye . Miuru ker mar piny luor .
60002018	Wasumbini winjuru ruodhiu gi luor duto . Kik uluor mana ruodhi mabeyo kendo maok kwiny kodu , to luoruru koda mago makwiny kodu .
60002019	Nikech en gima ber ka dhano oyie ting’o rem mar chandruok moyudo kayiem nikech ong’eyo ni Nyasaye nilode .
60002020	Ere kaka ng’ato diyud pak ka oyudo goch mikumego nikech ojaketho ? To ka isandi nikech tim maber mitimo , kendo ka inano e bwo sand ma kamano , to Nyasaye pwoyi .
60002021	Mano e kit ngima mane oluongu nikech Kristo nosandi nikech un , mi ne oweyonu ranyisi mondo un bende uluw ndache .
60002022	Ne ok otimo richo kata achiel , kendo onge ng’ama no winjo miriambo manowuok e dhoge .
60002023	Kane oyanye to ne ok oduoko jomane yanye gi ayany , kane osandore to ne ok okuong’o joma ne sande . Kar timo kamano to noketo genone kuom jal ma jang’ad bura ma kare .
60002024	En owuon noting’o richowa e ringre kane otho e yath mondo eka wan wadok joma otho ne richo , to wabed mangima ni timbe makare ; gi adhondene ema osechangu .
60002025	Ne uchalo mana rombe moruenyo , to koro oseduogu e yo mondo ulu Jakwath kendo Jarit mar chunjeu .
60003001	Kamano bende un mon luoruru chwou , mondo kaponi moko kuomgi pok oyie wach to gilokre , ok nikech weche to nikech timbe mondegi ,
60003002	kagineno bidhruok gi luor e ngimau .
60003003	Ber maru ok onego onenre mana kuom gik mulichogo dendu maoko : kaka wich mokadi gi ruako bangli mag dhahabu kod lewni mabeyo .
60003004	Chutho moloyo , ber maru onego obed mano maiye , e chunyu ber madier mar chuny mamuol kendo mokuwe ma en gima duong’ moloyo e wang’ Nyasaye .
60003005	Nikech kamano e kaka mon maler machon mane oketo genogi kuom Nyasaye ne loso bergi maiye . Ne giwinjo wach chwogi giwegi ,
60003006	mana kaka Sara , mane winjo Ibrahim kendo luonge ni ruodhe . Un udoko nyige ka utimo gik mabeyo gi chir maok uluoro gimoro .
60003007	Un chwo bende nyaka udag gi mondu kuweyonigi korgi . Migiuru luor kaka chwech mang’aw kendo kaka jouteu muchamogo mich mar ngima momiu kuom ng’wono . Kutimo kamano to onge gima biro mono lemou chopo e nyim Nyasaye .
60003008	Mogik , neuru ni un duto un gi chuny achiel . Beduru gi miwafu e kindu kuheroru kaka owete , kendo kukechoru , ng’ato gi ng’ato , kubedo joma muol .
60003009	Kik uchul richo kar richo , kata ayany kar ayany . To gi gweth , nikech mano ema omi noluongu , mondo uyud gweth un bende .
60003010	Nikech " Ng’ama diher ngima maber kendo neno ndalo maber nyaka geng’ lewe kuom richo kendo dhoge , kuom wacho miriambo .
60003011	Nyaka olokre owe richone mi otim maber ; nyaka omany kuwe kendo oluwe .
60003012	Nikech wenge Ruoth osiko kang’iyo joma timbegi beyo kendo ochiko ite mar winjo lamogi , to wang’ Ruoth mon gi joma timo richo "
60003013	Ere ng’ama dihinyi ka iikori mar timo gima ber ?
60003014	To kata ka ochuno ni nyaka ine sand kuom gima kare mitimo , to in ng’ama ogwedhi . Kik uluor gik ma giluoro , kendo kata bwok kik gibuogu .
60003015	To miuru Kristo duong’ ei chunyu kaka Ruoth Maler . Beduru moikore kinde duto mar duoko ng’ato mopenjou gimomiyo un gi geno ma ungono . To timuru kamano gi muolo kod luor .
60003016	Rituru chunyu maler maonge bura , mondo joma wuoyo kuomu marach kuom timbeu mabeyo kuom Kristo , ong’eng’ kendo one wichkuot .
60003017	En gima ber ka en dwaro Nyasaye , mondo osand ng’ato kuom timo maber moloyo ka ng’ato yudo sand kuom timo richo .
60003018	Nikech Kristo notho ni richo dichiel mogik , Ng’at makare notho kar joma richo mondo okelu ir Nyasaye . Ne oneg ringre , to kata kamano nomiye bedo mangima e chuny .
60003019	Kuom chuny nogo bende ema notere moyalo ni chunje manie tuech ,
60003020	mane otamore winjo Nyasaye chon gilala kane Nyasaye orito aming’a e kinde mane Noa hondhoe yie . E yieno ji manok kende maromo ji aboro , ema ne okwo kakalo e pi .
60003021	Pigni ochung’ kar batiso makoro warou un bende , ok kuom golo chilo e del , to kuom keto ranyisi mar paro molokore odok kor Nyasaye . Owarou kuom chier mar Yesu Kristo ,
60003022	moseidho e polo kendo koro obet a bat korachwich mar Nyasaye , ka malaike duto gi loch kod teko duto winjo chikne .
60004001	Emomiyo , kaka Kristo noneno sand e ringruok , un bende nyaka umanru gi paro machal gi mare , nikech ng’at mane oneno sand e dende koro oseloyo richo .
60004002	Kuom mano , un koro ok udak e ngima maru mar pinyni mondo uchop gombo maricho mag dhano , to odak mar timo dwaro Nyasaye .
60004003	Nikech usekawo thuolo malach kinde mokalo kutimo gik ma jopiny ohero timo , kaka : dwanyruok , gombo , mer , tugo e thum , metho mar anjawo kod lamo nyiseche manono .
60004004	Jopiny tinde wuoro niok urip kodgi e timbe mag anjawo makamago omiyo koro giyanyou .
60004005	To ochunore ni ginihul wach man kuomgi giwegi ni Jal moikore mar ng’ado bura ni joma ngima gi joma otho .
60004006	Nikech mano emomiyo ne oyal Wach Maber koda ka ni joma koro osetho , mondo eka obi ong’adnegi bura , kaka nong’ad ni ji duto manie ringruok , to chunygi mondo obed mangima kaluwore gi dwaro Nyasaye .
60004007	Giko gik moko duto chiegni . Emomiyo beduru gi paro maler kendo ritreuru mondo ulam .
60004008	To moloyo mago duto , herreuru gi hera matut ng’ato gi ng’ato , nikech hera umo richo mang’eny .
60004009	Ruakuru joweteu maok ung’ur .
60004010	Ng’ato ka ng’ato mondo oti kod mich moro amora mosemiye mondo okonygo jomoko . Ka utiyo gi kinda kaka jorit mag ng’wono mopogore opogore ma Nyasaye omiyo kuom lonyo ji .
60004011	Ka ng’ato wuoyo to mondo owuo mana ka ng’ama hulo weche mowuok e dho Nyasaye owuon . Ka ng’ato tiyo ni ji , to onego otim kamano gi teko ma Nyasaye chiwo , mondo kuom gik moko duto ji opak Nyasaye kuom Yesu Kristo . Duong’ gi teko mondo obed mare chieng’ manyaka chieng’ . Amin .
60004012	Osiepena mahero , kik ubuogi ka uyudo sand mawang’ou ka mach kuparo ni gimoro magalagala ema timorenu .
60004013	To beduru mamor nikech oriwu kod Kristo e sandne , mondo unudok moil chuth chieng’ ma duong’ne nofwenyre .
60004014	Ka iyanyou nikech nying Kristo to un joma ogwedhi , nikech Roho mar duong’ kendo mar Nyasaye ni kuomu .
60004015	Ka ng’ato kuomu neno sand to kik bed nikech ojanek kata ojakuo , kata jamahundu , kata jaketre e weche ji .
60004016	To ka ineno sand nikech in ja Kristo to kik wiyi kuodi , to gone Nyasaye erokamano nikech iluongi gi nyingno .
60004017	Nikech saa koro osechopo ming’adoe bura ni jood Nyasaye . To ka wan ema ochakore kodwa kamano to uparo ni joma ok luw Wach Maber mar Nyasaye to biro neno malit machal nadi ?
60004018	To " Ka en gima tek mondo owar joma timbegi beyo , koro joma kia Nyasaye gi joricho to nobed machalo nadi ? "
60004019	Kuom mano joma neno sand kaluwore gi dwaro Nyasaye onego ochiw chunygi e lwet Jachuech ma jaadiera kendo onego gidhi nyime gi timo timbe mabeyo .
60005001	Akwayo jodong kanisa man e dieru , kaka jaduong’ wadu mane oneno gi wang’e kaka Kristo sandore , kendo kaka achiel kuom joma biro yudo duong’ mabiro fwenyore achien :
60005002	Beduru jokwath mag romb Nyasaye moseketo e lwetu mondo urit . Tiuru nigi kaka jorit , ok nikech ng’ato ochunou , to nikech chunyu ohero , kaka Nyasaye dwaro ni utim . Kik ubed jokwath nikech wuoch pesa omakou , to timuru kamano nikech tij konyo ji bernu .
60005003	Kik utimru ruodhi ewi joma oketi elwetu mondo uriti , to bed ne giuru ranyisi .
60005004	Eka ka Jakwath Maduong’ nofwenyre to unuyudi osimbo mar duong’ ma nosik ka rieny nyaka chieng’ .
60005005	Un jomatindo bende winjuru joma dongo . Ruakreuru gi muolo e kindu ng’ato gi ng’ato , nikech Ndiko wacho ni , " Nyasaye osin gi josunga to ochiwo ng’wono ni joma muol . "
60005006	Emomiyo belreuru e bwo bad Nyasaye maratego , mondo eka oting’u malo e kinde mowinjore .
60005007	Keturu dwachu duto kuome nikech oherou .
60005008	Bed kuritoru kendo motang’ . Jasiku , ma en Jachien , bayo ka gi kacha mana ka sibuor maruto , komanyo ng’ama dongam .
60005009	Chunguru motegno e yie maru kendo tameuru , nikech ung’eyo ni joweteu moyie piny ngima bende neno chandruok machalre kodu .
60005010	Ka useneno chandruok kuom kinde moromo , Nyasach ng’wono duto , mane oluongou e duong’ne mochwere kuom Kristo , nomi ubed maler chuth , kogurou udoko motegno kendo mojing’ ; e misingi maok yiengni .
60005011	Teko obedne chieng’ ma nyaka chieng’ . " Amin .
60005012	Andikonu barua machwokni ka Silfano , ma akwano kaka owadwa madier kuom Kristo , konya . Ajiwou kendo atimo neno ni ma e kaka ng’wono madier mar Nyasaye chalo , omiyo chunguru motegno kuom ng’wonono .
60005013	Kanisa man Babulon , ma Nyasaye oyiero kaachiel kodu , okowonu mos . Wuoda Mariko bende omosou .
60005014	Mosreuru ng’ato gi ng’ato gi yogruok mar hera . Kuwe mondo obednu un duto ma un kuom Kristo .
61001001	An Simon Petro , jatich kendo jaote mar Yesu Kristo , Andikonu un joma oseyudo yie ma nengone tek kaka marwa , kuom tim makare mar Nyasachwa kod Jawarwa Yesu Kristo .
61001002	Ng’wono kod kuwe mogundho obed kodu kumedo ng’eyo Nyasaye kod Yesu Ruodhwa .
61001003	Tekone maduong’ osemiyowa gik moko duto ma wadwaro mar ngima , kendo luoro Nyasaye , kuom ng’eyowa mar Jal mane oluongowa kuom duong’ne owuon kod berne .
61001004	Kuom magi osemiyowa singruokge madongo kendo ma nengogi tek , mondo e kuom gigi unyalo kawo kit Nyasaye kendo mondo utony ua e kethruok ma gombo maricho mag pinyni Mo .
61001005	Kuom mano , temuru matek kaka unyalo mondo umed yieu gi ber , ber to meduru gi ng’eyo ;
61001006	ng’eyo to meduru gi ritruok , to ritruok meduru gi kinda , kinda meduru gi luoro Nyasaye ,
61001007	luoro Nyasaye meduru gi ng’wono mar owete ; to ng’wono mar owete to meduru gi hera .
61001008	Nikech ka un-gi kit timbego mogundho , to gibiro geng’ou mondo kik ubed joma nono maok nyag olemo e ng’eyo ma ungo kuom Ruodhwa Yesu Kristo .
61001009	To ka ng’ato onge gi kidogi e ngimane to en ng’ama neno machiegni kendo ma muofu nimar wiye osewil ni ne osepuodhe oweyo richoge machon .
61001010	Emomiyo , jowetena , meduru bedo gi siso mar loso luongu kod yiero maru kare . Nikech ka utimo gigi to ok unupodhi ,
61001011	kendo unuyud rwak maratipo ei Pinyruoth mochwere mar Ruodhwa kendo Jawarwa Yesu Kristo .
61001012	Omiyo pod abiro mana medo paronu wechegi , kata obedo ni ung’eyo kendo uguroru motegno e adiera ma koro ungo .
61001013	Aparo ni en gima ber mondo achiew pachu ka pod anie kiru mar ringruokni ,
61001014	nikech ang’eyo ni achiegni weyo kiruni mana kaka Ruodhwa Yesu Kristo osenyisa maler .
61001015	Kendo abiro temo matek mondo ane ni ka aseweyou to ubiro siko kuparo gigi .
61001016	Ne ok waluwo sigendini ma dhano oloso gi riekone kane wanyisou kuom teko kod biro mar Ruodhwa Yesu Kristo , to wawegi ne wan joneno mar duong’ne .
61001017	Nikech ne oyudo luor kod duong’ kuom Nyasaye Wuoro kane duol obirone moa e Duong’ Mamalo Moloyo , ni , " Ma e Wuoda mahero ma chunya morgo ! "
61001018	Wan wawegi ne wawinjo duolni mane oa e poloni , kane wan kode ewi got maler .
61001019	Omiyo wan-gi weche jonabi ma osel-ernwa tiendgi . Ka uchiko itu ne wechegi to ubiro konyoru , nikech gichalo gi ler marieny ka aa e mudho , nyaka chop odiechieng’no yawre mi ler mar sulwe mokinyi meny chunjeu .
61001020	To moloyo mago duto , nyaka ung’e ni onge wach mokor mag Muma ma janabi nyalo loko tiendgi gi pache owuon .
61001021	Nikech weche mokor manie muma ne ok owuok e pach dhano , to Nyasaye ema nomiyo ji owuoyo , ka gin e bwo teko mar Roho Maler .
61002001	To jonabi mag miriambo bende ne nitie e kind ji kinde machon , mana kaka jopuonj mag miriambo bende biro bedo e dieru . Gibiro kelo akwala puonj mag miriambo maketho ji , kagikwedo nyaka Ruoth mane ochweyogi ( to mano nomi gitiekre kendgi piyo piyo nono ! )
61002002	Ji mathoth nolu kit ngimagi mobam makelo wichkuot , kendo ginimi ji nocha yo mar adiera .
61002003	Nikech wuochgi mar dwaro gik malang’jopuonj gi nopiag dhogi gi sigendini magiseloso miriambo malombo ji ; mondo gimau mwandu . To kum margi mane oiknegi chakre chon oliero e wigi , kendo lethruokgi ok nindi .
61002004	Ka Nyasaye ne ok oweyo kata mana malaike mane otimo richo , to ne owitogi e gehena , koketogi e mudho mandiwa ka girito kumgi ; ka nokumo koda ka piny machon , e kinde mane omiyo pi oyueyo joma ochayo Nyasaye , to Noa mane yalo mondo ji otim timbe makare kaachiel gi ji abiriyo mamoko , to ne oreso ;
61002005	
61002006	ka Nyasaye nong’ado bura ni Sodom gi Gomora mine owang’o joma odakie miergo molokore buru , kendo mi oketogi ranyisi mar gima biro timore ni joma ochayo Nyasaye ;
61002007	ka Nyasaye noreso Lut , ng’at makare , mane chunye chandore malit nikech ngima mochido mar joma ne ochayo chik ,
61002008	( nikech ne en ng’at makare , chunye ne chande malit kane oneno kendo owinjo timbe maricho ma tieng’ mane odakgo timo pile ka pile ) ;
61002009	ka en kamano , to kare Ruoth ong’eyo kaka dores joma oluore kuom tembe ma giyudo kendo ong’eyo kaka okano joma richo ni kum chieng’ Bura , ka gidhi nyime kod kumgi .
61002010	Mani en adiera kuom jogo machopo dwaro mochido mag ringregi kendo mochayo loch .
61002011	Jogi wengegi tek kendo opong’ gi achaya , kendo ok giluoro kata mana wuoyo marach kuom joloch mag polo , nma kata mana malaike mangi teko gi duong’ moloyogi ok nyal wuoyo marach kuom chwechgo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye .
61002012	To jogi wuoyo marach ka gi yanyo nyaka gik maok giwinj tiendgi . Gichalo le maonge rieko , mager , maonge paro , mane ochwe mana mondo omaki onegi . Jogi biro lal nono mana ka le mag bungu .
61002013	Ibiro chulgi chandruok kar chandruok ma gisekelo . Giwinjo maber ka gichopo gombo duto mag ringregi ratiro e nyim ji . Ka gidwanyore kendo gichopo gombogi maricho e chokruogeu mag sawo to gichalo mbelni kod gik motop .
61002014	Wengegi ochiek ni terruok kendo richo mitnegi maok giwe . Giywayo mon mayomyom mondo gitimgo richo , kendo gilony e wuoro . Jogi okuong’ adier !
61002015	Gisebaro giweyo yo matir mi girwenyo ka giluwo yor Balaam wuod Beor , mane ohero misach richo .
61002016	To pundane ne okwere kuom timne marachno , ( kata obedo ni en le maok wuo kamano , to ne owuoyo gi dwond dhano mi ogeng’o neko janabino ) .
61002017	Jogi gin sokni ma pi ongee kendo gin ong’weng’o ma yamo tero . Okan nigi mudho mandiwa molil ti .
61002018	Nikech dhcgi golo weche manono mag sunga mopong’ gi gombo maricho mag kit dhano mohero richo , mondo gimi joma tinde eka tony aa kuom joma olal tim richo .
61002019	Gisingo ni jogi thuolo to gin giwegi gin wasumbini mag richo makelo kethruok ( nikech dhano en misumba gimoro amora moloyo ngimane ) .
61002020	Nikech ka ji osetony oweyo kethruok mar piny , kuom ng’eyo Ruodhwa kendo Jawarwa Yesu Kristo , eka bang’e gichako gidok e piny mi giga-jore kode kendo oloyogi , to achien gidoko maricho moloyo kaka ne gichalo mokuongo .
61002021	Dine obedo maber moloyo mondo kik ging’e yor ngima makare moloyo ng’eye eka bang’e achien giloko ng’egi ni chike mopwodhi mane omigi .
61002022	Gima osetimorenigi chopo adiera mar ngero mawacho ni , " Guok odok nang’o ng’okne moseng’ogo " , kendo ni , " Nguruwe moselwoki ochako odok dwanyore e chuodho . "
61003001	Osiepena mageno , maa koro en barupa mar ariyo ma asendikonu . Asendikonugi giduto kargi ariyo mondo aparnu kendo achiew pachu obed moyawore .
61003002	Adwaro ni mondo upar weche mane jonabi maler okoro chon kod chik mane omiu koa kuom Ruodhwa kendo Jawarwa kokadho kuom joote magu .
61003003	Mokuongo tik tik , nyaka ung’e ni e ndalo mogik jomoko ma charo ji nobi ka gicharou kendo ka giluwo gombogi maricho .
61003004	Ka gipenjou ni " Ruodhu mane onego oduogino to ere ? Donge nyaka ne kwerewa tho gik moko osebedo mana machalre nyaka aa chakruok piny ! "
61003005	To jogi wigi wil mar oyiem ni chon gilala wach Nyasaye nomiyo polo obedo kendo piny ne ochwe koa kuom pi kendo ei pi .
61003006	Kendo pi nogo bende ema Nyasaye nopong’ogo piny machon mokethego .
61003007	Kuom wach nogo ema omiyo polo gi piny masani nitie , kendo okan ni mach . Okan-gi nyaka chop odiechieng’no ma joma ochayo Nyasaye nong’adnigi bura mi notiekgi chuth .
61003008	To wiu kik wil gi gimoro achielni osiepena mageno : Ni kuom Ruoth odiechieng’ achiel chaire gi higini alufu achiel , kendo higini alufu achiel chaire gi odiechieng’ achiel .
61003009	Ruoth ok dhi mos kuom chopo singruokne , kaka jomoko paro . Un ema oweyonu thuolo mondo ulokru , nikech ok odwar ni ng’ato olal kata achiel , to odwaro mondo ji duto olokre owe richogi .
61003010	To odiechieng Ruoth nobi ka jakuo . E odiechieng’no polo noleny nono gi mor ma dino it , kendo gik mochue manie kor polo nowang’ mi keth chuth , to piny gi gik moko duto manie iye nolal nono .
61003011	Ka gigi duto ibiro kethi kama , loro onego ubed joma chalo nadi ? Onego udag ngima maler kendo moluoro Nyasaye ,
61003012	ka urito odiechieng’ mar Nyasaye , kendo ka utemo beru mondo ochop piyo . Odiechieng’no polo nowang’ kendo nokethe kendo chuech mag polo noleny kawang’ .
61003013	Wan to warito gik ma Nyasaye osesingonwa , ma gin polo manyien gi piny manyien , kama timbe makare lilo ema noyudre .
61003014	Emomiyo , osiepena mageno , ka pod urito odiechieng’no to temuru matek kaka unyalo mondo ubed joma ler maonge ketho e nyim Nyasaye , kendo beduru gi kuwe kode .
61003015	Beduru kung’eyo ni deko mar Ruodhwa oweyo mana thuolo mar yudo warruok , mana kaka Paulo owadwa mwageno be osendikonu gi rieko mane Nyasaye omiye .
61003016	Barupege duto ondiko machalre , kowuoyo e igi kuom wechegi . Barupege oting’o weche moko ma tiendgi tek ma joma kia gi jo hubagabaga gwenyo , mana kaka gig-wenyo Ndiko mamoko bende , to timgino biro kelo nigi chandruok .
61003017	Emomiyo , osiepena mageno , kaka koro useng’eyo wachni , ritreuru mondo kik ywau gi kethruok mag jomaricho mi uluar ua kama ber muchung’ie .
61003018	To dhiuru nyime kudongo e ng’wono kod ng’eyo ma ungo kuom Ruodhwa kendo Jawarwa Yesu Kristo . En ema oyud duong’ sani kendo nyaka chieng’ ! Amin .
62001001	Wandikonu kuom Wach mar ngima , mane nitie nyaka aa chakruok , ma wasewinjo kendo waseneno gi wengewa , kendo waserange maber mi wamule gi lwetewa .
62001002	Ngimani nofwenyore mi ne wanene omiyo wawuoyo kuome , kendo wanyisou wach ngima mochwere mane nigi Wuoro kendo mane onyiswa .
62001003	Wahulonu gima waseneno kendo winjo , mondo un bende ubed e achiel kodwa e lalruok . To lalruok marwa nie kindwa gi Wuoro kod Wuode , Yesu Kristo .
62001004	Wandikonu wachni mondo morwa obed mogundho kendo moromo chuth .
62001005	Puonj mane wayudo kuom Kristo kendo koro wanyisou ema : Nyasaye en ler , kendo mudho onge kuome chutho .
62001006	Omiyo ka wawacho ni wan e lalruok kode to pod wawuotho e mudho to wariambo kendo ok wawuothi e adiera .
62001007	To ka wawuotho e ler , kaka en bende enie ler to wan e lalruok ng’ato gi ng’ato , kendo remb Yesu Wuode pwodhowa e richo duto .
62001008	Ka wawacho ni waonge richo , to wawoundore kendwa , kendo adiera onge e iwa .
62001009	To ka wahulo richowa , en jaadiera kendo ng’ama kare kendo obiro weyonwa richowa mi opuodhwa kuom timbe duto maok odhi kare .
62001010	Ka wawacho ni pok watimo richo to wamiyo odoko ja miriambo kendo wachne onge gi thuolo e ngimawa .
62002001	Nyithinda mahero , andikonu wachni mondo kik utim richo . To kapo ng’ato otimo richo , to wan gi Jabura maloson-wa kendo kwayonwa Wuoro ; Jali en Yesu Kristo , Ng’at Makare .
62002002	En e misango magolo richowa , to ok marwa kende , to nyaka richo mar piny ngima .
62002003	Ka wamako kendo watimo chike Nyasaye eka wabedo gi ratiro ni wang’-eye .
62002004	To ng’at mawacho ni " Ang’eye " to ok tim gima ochiko en jamiriambo kendo adiera onge e iye .
62002005	To ka ng’ato ang’ata momako kendo orito chik Nyasaye to hera mar Nyasaye nenore kuome ratiro . Yo mwanyalo bedogo gadiera ni wan ei Nyasaye ema :
62002006	Ng’at mawacho ni en ei Nyasaye nyaka kit ngimane mapile chai gi mar Yesu .
62002007	Joherana , chik ma andikonuni ok nyien . En chik onogono machon musebedogo nyaka chakruok . Chik machonno en e wach ma usewinjo .
62002008	To kata kamano , andikonu chik manyien kendo adierane nenore kuom Kristo kendo e ngimau , nikech mudho aa to ler maradier koro rieny .
62002009	Ng’ato ang’ata ma wacho ni wuotho e ler to osin gi owadgi pod osiko e mudho .
62002010	Ng’at mohero owadgi to odak e ler , kendo ng’ama kamano onge obadho kuome manyalo miyo ochwanyre .
62002011	Ng’at mosin gi owadgi to nie mudho , kendo mudho nogo ema owuothoe , kokia kuma odhiye , nikech mudho odino wang’e .
62002012	Andikonu un nyithinda mageno nikech osewenu richou , kuom nyinge .
62002013	Andikonu un wuone nikech ung’eyo Jalo mane nitie nyaka aa chakruok . Andikonu , joma tindo , nikech useloyo ng’ama rach . Andikonu un nyithindo mageno nikech ung’eyo Wuoro .
62002014	Andikonu un wuone , nikech ung’eyo Jalo mane nitie nyaka aa chakruok . Andikonu un yawuowi ma tindo , nikech utegno , kendo wach Nyasaye odak e iwu kendo useloyo ng’ama rach .
62002015	Kik uher piny kata gimoro amora manie pinyni . Ka ng’ato ang’ata ohero piny , to hera mar Wuoro onge e iye .
62002016	Nimar gik moko duto manie piny , kaka gik maricho ma waneno kendo wagombo kod sunga ma ji sungorego kuom gik ma gin go , ok aa kuom Wuoro , to gia e piny .
62002017	Piny gi gombo duto mag piny nokadhi , to ng’at ma timo dwach Nyasaye nobed mangima nyaka chieng’ .
62002018	Nyithinda mageno , giko chiegni kendo kaka usewinjo ni jasik Kristo biro , koro wasik Kristo mathoth osefwenyore : Ma e kaka wang’eyo ni giko chiegni .
62002019	Chutho , jogi ne oa irwa to ne ok gin jowa . Nikech ka dine gin jowa to dine gisiko kodwa , nimar dhigino nyiso ayanga maler ni onge kata ng’ata achiel kuomgi mane ng’atwa .
62002020	Unto Roho Maler owirou omiyo ung’eyo adiera .
62002021	Omiyo koro andikonu ok nikech ukia adiera , to nikech ung’eye , kendo nikech ung’eyo ni onge miriambo mawuok e adiera .
62002022	Ja miriambo to kara en ng’a ? En ng’ama wacho ni Yesu ok en Kristo . Jalno e Jasik Kristo , nikech odagi Wuoro kaachiel gi Wuowi .
62002023	Ng’ama odagi Wuowi odagi Wuoro bende , to ng’ama orwake nigi Wuoro bende .
62002024	Kuom mano , neuru ni urito gima ne ukuongo winjo e chunyu . Ka usiko ukano gimane uwinjo mokwongo e chunyu , to ubiro siko e winjruok gi Wuowi kod Wuoro .
62002025	To ma e gima Kristo owuon nosingore ni nomiwa , ma en ngima mochwere .
62002026	Andikonu wechegi kuom jogo materno mondo owuondu .
62002027	To ne un , ma Roho Maler owirou kendo odak e iwu , ng’ato ok onego puonju . To kaka Roho museyudono puonjou kuom gik moko duto , kendo dak ma Roho odak godo e iwu en adiera maok miriambo mana kaka osepuonjouno , sikuru kuome .
62002028	Omiyo koro nyithinda mageno , sikuru kuome mondo ka ofwenyore to wabed gi chir kendo maonge wichkuot e nyime ka obiro .
62002029	Ka ung’eyo ni Kristo en ng’ama kare to onego ung’e bende ni ng’ato ka ng’ato matimo gima kare en nyathi Nyasaye .
62003001	Mano kaka hera ma Wuoro oherowago duong’ mondo oluongwa ni nyithind Nyasaye . Kendo mano e gima wan ! Gimomiyo piny , ok ong’eyowa en nikech piny ne ok ong’eye .
62003002	Osiepena mageno koro wan nythind Nyasaye , to kaka wabiro bedo achien pok onyiswa . To wang’eyo ni ka Kristo nofwenyre , to wanabed machal kode , nikech wananene kaka ochal .
62003003	Ng’ato ang’ata mangi genoni pwodhore owuon mondo osik koler mana kaka en bende oler .
62003004	Ji matimo richo ketho chik ; chutho , richo en ketho chik
62003005	To ung’eyo ni Kristo nofwenyore mondo ogol richowa . Ung’eyo bende ni richo onge kuome .
62003006	Ng’at man kuom Kristo ok sik katimo richo . Ng’at mosiko timo richo pok onene kendo okiaye .
62003007	Nyithinda mageno , kik uyie ng’ato owitu . Ng’at matimo gima kare en ng’ama kare , mana kaka En bende en Ng’ama kare .
62003008	Ng’at mosiko timo richo en ng’at Jachien , nikech Jachien osebedo ka timo richo nyaka a chakruok . Gimomiyo Wuod Nyasaye nobiro ne en ni mondo oketh tich Jachien .
62003009	Ng’ama Nyasaye onyuolo ok nyal dhi nyime katimo richo , nikech kit Nyasaye osiko kuome . Ok onyal timo richo nikech Nyasaye ema onyuole .
62003010	Kaka wanyalo ng’eyo pogruok manie kind nyithind Nyasaye gi nyithind Jachien e magi : Ng’at ma ok tim gima kare ok en nyathi Nyasaye , kata ng’ama ok ohero owadgi .
62003011	Wach mane uwinjo nyaka aa mokuongo ema : Nyaka waherre ng’ato gi ng’ato .
62003012	Kik wachal gi Kain mane en koth Ng’ama Rach , omiyo nonego owadgi ma hie . To nonego owadgi nang’o ? Nikech timbene ne richo , to timbe owadgi ne kare .
62003013	Kuom mano , owetena kik ubwogi ka jopiny sin kodu .
62003014	Wang’eyo ni wasekalo waa e tho mi wadonjo e ngima , nikech wahero owetewa . Ng’ama ok ohero owadgi osiko e tho .
62003015	Ng’ama osin gi owadgi en janek , to ung’eyo ni janek onge gi ngima mochwere
62003016	Ma e kaka wang’eyo gima hera en ; Kristo nochiwonwa ngimane . Wan bende onego wachiw ngimawa ni owetewa .
62003017	Ka ng’ato jamoko to oneno owadgi kochando to ok okeche , ere kaka ng’ama kamano nyalo wacho ni en gi hera mar Nyasaye ?
62003018	Nyithinda mageno kik wawach mana gi dhowa ni wahero j i , to waher ji gi tim kendo gi adiera .
62003019	Mano e yo mwa ng’eyogo ni wachung’ e adiera , kendo mabiro miyo chunywa bed gi chir e nyim Nyasaye
62003020	saa moro amor a ma chunywa ng’adonwa bura . Nimar Nyasaye duong’ moloyo chunywa , kendo ong’eyo gik moko duto .
62003021	Omiyo , osiepega mageno , ka chunywa ok ng’adnwa bura to wan gi chir e nyim Nyasaye .
62003022	To wayudo koa kuome , gimoro amora mwakwaye nikech wamako chikene kendo watimo gik mamore .
62003023	To ma e chikne : ni mondo wayie e nying Wuode Yesu Kristo kendo mondo waherre ng’ato gi ng’ato , mana kaka Kristo nochikowa .
62003024	Joma omako kendo orito chike Nyasaye ni kuome to en bende en kuomgi . To ma e kaka wang’eyo ni Nyasaye odak e iwa : Wang’eyo nikech Roho ma osemiyowa .
62004001	Osiepega mageno kik uyie roho duto , to temgiuru mondo ufweny ka bende gia kuom Nyasaye nikech jonabi mag miriambo mathoth osetuch e piny koni gi koni .
62004002	Ma e kaka unyalo ng’eyo Roho mar Nyasaye : Roho ma hulo ni Yesu Kristo nobiro e ringruok en roho moa kuom Nyasaye .
62004003	to roho moro amor a makwedo Yesu ok en roho mar Nyasaye . Chuny ma kama en mar Jasik Kristo ma usewinjo ni biro kendo makoro nie piny kata sani .
62004004	Ne un nyithinda mageno , unto un nyithind Nyasaye kendo useloyo jonabi mag miriambogo , nikech jal manie iu duong’ moloyo jal manie piny .
62004005	Gin jopiny , omiyo giwuoyo kuom gipinyni kendo piny winjogi .
62004006	Wan to wan jo Nyasaye omiyo joma ongeyo Nyasaye winjowa , to ng’at ma ok ng’at Nyasaye ok winjwa . Mani e yo mwang’eyogo Roho mar adier gi roho mar miriambo .
62004007	Osiepega mageno waherreuru ng’ato gi ng’ato nikech hera aa kuom Nyasaye . Ng’at mohero ji en nyathi Nyasaye kendo ong’eyo Nyasaye .
62004008	Ng’at ma ok ohero ji kia Nyasaye , nikech Nyasaye en hera .
62004009	Nyasaye nonyiso hera moherowago kama : Ne ooro Wuode ma miderma e piny mondo wabed mangima kuome .
62004010	Ma e gima hera en : ok ni wan ema ne wahero Nyasaye , to ni Nyasaye ema noherowa mi nooro Wuode kaka misango mar richowa .
62004011	Osiepega mageno , ka Nyasaye noherowa matut kamano to wan bende waherre ng’ato gi ng’ato .
62004012	Onge ng’ama oseneno Nyasaye , to ka waherore ng’ato gi ng’ato to Nyasaye odak e iwa , kendo herane ipuodho chuth e iwa .
62004013	Wang’eeyo ni wadok ei Nyasaye kendo en bende en eiwa , nikech osemiyowa Rohone .
62004014	Waseneno kendo wanyiso ji ni Wuoro oseoro Wuode mondo obed Jawar mar piny .
62004015	Ka ng’ato ang’ata ohulo ni Yesu en wuod Nyasaye , to Nyasaye odak e iye kendo en bende odak ei Nyasaye .
62004016	Omiyo koro wang’eyo kendo wageno kuom hera ma Nyasaye oherowago . Nyasaye en hera . Kendo ng’ato ang’ata mosiko e hera osiko kuom Nyasaye , kendo Nyasaye bende odak kuome .
62004017	E yo maka ma herawa nyaka nyisre chuth e ngimawa mondo chieng’ ng’ado bura wabed gi chir nikech e ngima mar pinyni wachal kode .
62004018	Onge luoro e hera ; hera maradier riembo luoro oko nikech luoro ema kelo kum . Jal mangi luoro ok puodhre ei Hera .
62004019	Wahero nikech Nyasaye noherowa mokuongo .
62004020	Ka ng’ato wacho ni , " Ahero Nyasaye " , to osin gi wadgi to en jamiriambo ; nikech ng’ama ok ohero wadgi , moseneno gi wang’e , ok nyal hero Nyasaye mapok oneno .
62004021	Chik ma osemiyowa en ma : Ng’at mohero Nyasaye nyaka her wadgi bende .
62005001	Ng’ato ang’ata moyie ni Yesu e Kristo en nyathi Nyasaye , kendo ng’ama ohero Wuoro hero nyathine bende .
62005002	Ma e kaka wang’eyo ni wahero nyithind Nyasaye : Ka wahero Nyasaye kendo wamako chikene .
62005003	Ma e kaka ihero Nyasaye : luor chikene . To chikene ok gin ting’ mapek
62005004	nikech ng’at ma Nyasaye onyuolo loyo piny . Ma e locho ma waloyogo piny ma en yiewa .
62005005	En ng’a moloyo piny ? Mana jalo moyie ni Yesu en Wuod Nyasaye
62005006	Yesu Kristo e Jal manobiro gi pi kod remo . Nobiro , ok gipi kende , to nobiro gi pi kod remo . Nenoni Roho Maler ema timo , nikech Roho en e adiera .
62005007	Nimar nitie joneno adek , ma gin :
62005008	Roho , pi kod remo , kendo jonenogi winjore kuom wachni .
62005009	Wayie gi nend dhano , to nend Nyasaye ema duong’ moloyo nikech en neno ma Nyasaye owuon osewacho kuom Wuode .
62005010	Ng’at moyie kuom Wuod Nyasaye nigi nenoni e chunye , to ng’ama ok oyie kuom Nyasaye miye odoko jamiriambo , nikech odagi yie gima Nyasaye osewacho kaka janeno kuom Wuode .
62005011	To ma e neno nogo : Nyasaye osemiyowa ngima mochwere ; kendo ngimani nikuom wuode .
62005012	Ng’at man gi Wuowi nigi ngima ; to ng’at ma onge gi Wuod Nyasaye onge gi ngimani .
62005013	Andikonu wechegi , un joma oyie kuom nying wuod Nyasaye , mondo ung’e ni un-gi ngima mochwere .
62005014	Ma e chir ma wango kawadhi e nyim Nyasaye ni ka wakwaye gimoro amora mowinjore gi dwache to owinjowa .
62005015	To ka wang’eyo ni owinjowa kwakwaye gimoro amora , to wang’eyo ni waseyudo gima wakwayono .
62005016	Ka ng’ato oneno wadgi katimo richo maok tere e tho , to owinjore olamne mondo Nyasaye omi jalno ngima . Awuoyo kuom joma richogi ok tergi e tho . To nitie richo matero ji e tho ; ma ok awach ni olamie Nyasaye .
62005017	Ketho duto gin richo , to nitie richo maok ter ji e tho .
62005018	Wang’eyo ni ng’ama Nyasaye onyuolo ok sik katimo richo , nikech Wuod Nyasaye orite kendo Ng’ama Rach ok nyal mule .
62005019	Wang’eyo ni wan nyithind Nyasaye , kendo ni piny duto nie bwo loch mar Ng’ama Rach .
62005020	Wang’eyo bende ni Wuod Nyasaye osebiro kendo osemiyowa rieko mar winjo tiend wach , mondo wang’e Jalo ma jaadiera ; Jal makoro wanie iye , ma en wuode Yesu Kristo . En e Nyasaye madier kendo ngima mochwere .
62005021	Nyithinda mageno tang’uru ni nyiseche madhano oloso .
63001001	Ne miyo moyier kod nyithinde mahero gadiera , to ok an kenda , to bende ji duto mong’eyo adiera
63001002	nikech adiera manie iwa nosiki kodwa nyaka chieng’ .
63001003	Ng’wono gi kech kod kuwe , moa kuom Wuoro kod Yesu Kristo , ma Wuod Wuoro , biro bedo kodwa e adiera kod hera .
63001004	Asebedo mamor sidang’ kuom ng’eyo ni nyithindi moko oluwo adiera kaka Wuoro chikowa .
63001005	Koro miyo mahero , akwayi ni mondo waherre ng’ato gi ng’ato ; Chik ma andikonini ok nyien ; en mana chik nogo mwasebedogo nyaka aa chakruok . Akwayo ni mondo waherre ng’ato ka ng’ato .
63001006	To ma e hera : ni mondo wawuoth ka wamako chikene . Mana kaka nuse winjo nyaka aa chakruok , chikne en ni mondo uwuothie e hera .
63001007	Jomiriambo mathoth , modagi yie ni Yesu Kristo ne obiro e ringruok , osebiro e piny . Ng’at ma kamano en jawuond ji , kendo en e Jasik Kristo .
63001008	Omiyo ritreuru mondo gima usetiyone kik lalnu , eka unuyud mich magu duto .
63001009	Ng’ato ang’ata mokadho kare , maok sik e puonj Kristo , oonge gi Nyasaye , to ng’at mosiko gi puonj nigi Wuoro kaachiel gi Wuowi .
63001010	Omiyo ka ng’ato obironu mapuonjo gima opogore gi puonj ni to kik oyiene odonj e odi kata rwake .
63001011	Ng’ato ang’ata morwake doko jakore e timbene maricho .
63001012	An gi mang’eny monego andiknu , to ok daher timo kamano gi kalatas kod wino . Kar timo kamano to agombo mondo alimu kendo alos kodu wang’ gi wang’ mondo eka morwa norom chuth .
63001013	Nyithind nyaminu moyier okowonu mosgi .
64001001	Ne osiepna mahero Gaius kendo ma gadiera .
64001002	Jaherana alamo ni mondo ibed gi ngima maber , kendo ni mondo gik moko duto odhini maber , mana kaka chunyi dhi maber .
64001003	Ne abedo mamor ahinya ka jowete moko nobiro kendo mowachona kaka isiko kiwuotho e adieranogo .
64001004	Onge gima mora moloyo winjo ni nyithinda wuotho e adiera .
64001005	Jaherana in jaadiera kuom gik mitimo ni jowete kata obedo ni gin joma ikia kamano .
64001006	Gisenyiso kanisa hera ma in-go . Ini tim maber kikowogi e wuodhgi e yo mowinjore ni Nyasaye .
64001007	Nikech Nyingno ema nomiyo giwuok gidhi , ka ok giyie kawo mich moro amora kuom joma ok oyie .
64001008	Omiyo nyaka wakony joma kamago , mondo eka wati kaachiel kodgi e tij adiera .
64001009	Ne andiko ni kanisa , to Diotrefe , mohero ketore mondo obed jatelo , ok oyie kodwa .
64001010	Omiyo ka abiro to abiro nyiso ji e lela gik motimo ; kaka okidhowa gi weche maricho . To ewi mano otamore ruako jowete mobiro , kendo otamo joma dwaro timo kamano , kendo oriembo jogo mondo oa e kanisa .
64001011	Jaherana , kik iluw timbe maricho , to luw tim maber . Ng’at matimo gima ber en ng’at Nyasaye , to ng’at matimo gima rach pok oneno Nyasaye .
64001012	Ji duto wuoyo maber kuom Demetrio , kata adiera wuon wuoyo kuome maber . Wan bende wawuoyo kuome maber , kendo ung’eyoni nendwa en adier .
64001013	An kod gik mang’eny monego andikni , to ok adwar ndikonigi kakonyora gi kalam gi wino .
64001014	To ageno nenoi mapiyo , eka wanawuo wang’ gi wang . ' Kuwe mondo obedni . Osiepe man ka ooroni mos . Mosnwa osiepe man kuno gi nyingegi .
64001015	
65001001	An Juda ma jatich Yesu Kristo , kendo ma owadgi Jakobo , Ne joma oseluongi , ma Nyasaye Wuoro ohero , kendo ma Yesu Kristo orito .
65001002	Mad kech gi kuwe kod hera mogundho obed kodu .
65001003	Osiepena mageno , kata obedo ni ne aikora ahinya mondo andiknu kuom wach warruok ma wan duto wango , naneno ni ber koro andiknu mondo ajiwu uked matek kuom wach yie mane ochiwne jomaler dichiel kendo mogik mondo oriti .
65001004	Nikech jomoko mane osendik kuomgi chon ni bura oloyo osedonjo e dieru ling’ling’ . Gin joma kia Nyasaye , ma loko ng’wono mar Nyasachwa doko negi thuolo mar timo richo , kendo madagi Yesu Kristo , ma en kende e Ruodhwa mamalo chutho .
65001005	Kata obedo ni useng’eyo wechegi duto to pod nyaka aparnu ni Ruoth noreso joge mogologi Misiri , to bang’e achien nokumo joma ne ok oyie .
65001006	Kata mana malaike mane ok obedo kuondegi mag loch mane omigi , mago mane owuok oweyo keregi mane oketgie , gin bende osekanogi e mudho mandiwa , kotwegi gi nyoroche maok chodi nyaka chieng , ' ka girito kum e odiechieng’ maduong’ .
65001007	Kamano bende Sodom gi Gomora , kaachiel gi mier moluorogi nej ochiwore ne chode gi anjawo . Gin gibedo kaka ranyisi mar joma ikumo kiwang’o e mach manyaka chieng’ .
65001008	Kamano bende e kaka jolekogi bende duwo ringregi giwegi kendo kwedo loch kendo wuoyo marach kuom chwech man giduong’ e polo .
65001009	To kata mana Mikael malaika maduong’ kane gilaro gi Jachien ringre Musa , ne ok ohedhore wuoyo kuome marach ka hangone wach , to nowacho mana ni , " Ruoth mondo okw-eri ! "
65001010	Jogi to wuoyo marach gi ayany kuom gimoro amora kata mana gik ma gikia tiendgi , kendo gik ma giketore ni ging’eyo , ka le maonge rieko , magi e gik matiekogi .
65001011	Ginine malit ! Giseluwo tim Kain , kendo gisemwomore e ketho mar Balaam nikech gidwaro mich , omiyo osetiekgi kaachiel gi Kora nikech giseng’anyo kaka Kora nong’anyo .
65001012	Jogi gin mbelni e nyasi mau mag hera , ma gichiemo kodu ka wengegi tek , gin jokwath mapidhore kendgi ! Gichalo rumbi ma yamo tero to ok kel koth kendo gichalo olemo mopidhi kinde opon bende gichalo gi yien maok nyag olemo e ndalo molemo rumoe kendo mopudh gi tiendegi , gionge tich nyandiriyo .
65001013	Gin apaka mager mar nam , madhuolo buoch fupgi kendo gichalo sulwe mabayo mosekan negi kum mar mudho mandiwa mosiko .
65001014	Enoka , mane odak e tieng’ mar abiriyo bang’ Adam , nokoro wach kuom jogi ni , " Neuru Ruoth biro gi joge maler tara gi gana kuom tara gi gana
65001015	mondo oyal ji duto kendo mondo okum joma richo duto kuom timbegi maricho ma gisetimo e yo maok mi Nyasaye duong’ kendo kuom weche maricho duto ma joricho mochayo Nyasaye oseyanyego .
65001016	Jogi gin jong’ur kendo gin jomany ketho kuom ji ; giluwo dwachgi giwegi maricho , bende giwuoyo gi sunga mathoth kuomgi giwegi . Kendo giwuondo ji gi weche mamit mondo giyud gik magidwaro .
65001017	To un osiepena mageno , paruru gik mane joote mag Ruodhwa Yesu Kristo okoro chon .
65001018	Ne giwachonu ni , " E ndalo giko jo jar ji nobedie ma nolu gombogi giwegi maricho . "
65001019	Magi e joma kelo pogruok e kindu , kendo gombogi mag ringruok ema chikogi , gionge Roho .
65001020	To un , osiepena mageno , gerreuru e yie maru maler , kendo lemuru ka un ei Roho Maler .
65001021	Sikuru e hera Nyasaye ka urito kech mar Ruodhwa Yesu Kristo mondo okelu e ngima mochwere .
65001022	Kechuru joma riwogi kiawa ,
65001023	yud-huru jomoko kuomgi ugol e mach mondo ures ngimagi , to moko kuomgi to kechuru kutang’ kendo kuluor , ka usin koda ka gi lepgi ma ringregi motop osemieno .
65001024	Ne En manyalo ritou mondo kik upodhi e richo , kendo manyalo kelou e nyim duong’ne ka uonge ketho kendo ka un gimor maduong’
65001025	mad duong’ makende , gi loch gi teko , kod nyalo odogne Nyasaye Jawarwa kuom Yesu Kristo Ruodhwa , e tienge duto , sani kendo nyaka chieng ! Amin .
66001001	Fweny ma Nyasaye nomiyo Yesu Kristo mondo onyisgo jotichne gigo manyaka timre mapiyo . Kristo nomiyo fwenyni ong’ere ka nooro malaikane mondo onyis Johana jatichne ,
66001002	manyiso gik moko duto manoneno ma en wach Nyasaye kod weche duto mane Yesu Kristo owacho .
66001003	Ng’atno masomo weche mokorgi kendo gin johawi jogo mawinjo wachni kendo kano weche mondiki e chunye ; nikech kinde chiegni .
66001004	An Johana ni kanise abiriyo manie piny Asia , Ng’wono kod kuwe moa kuom jamo mantie , mane nitie kendo mabiro betie , kendo moa kuom Roho abiriyo manie nyim kom duong’ne ,
66001005	kendo moa kuom Yesu Kristo , ma janeno maradier maok lokre , jal mane okwongo chier oa kuom jomotho , jaloch mar ruodhi manie piny . Ne en moherowa kendo ogonyowa kuom richowa gi rembe ,
66001006	mi omiyo wadoko oganda ruodhi , matiyone kaka jodolo mag Nyasache kendo Wuon mare-Duong’ gi loch obedne manyaka chieng’ ! Amin .
66001007	Neuru , obiro gi boche polo , kendo wenge duto nonene koda jogo mane ogure kendo Ogendini duto manie piny noywagre nikech en . Mano e kaka enobed ! Amin .
66001008	Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya , " An e Chakruok kendo Giko , " " Jal mantie , Jal mane nitie kendo mabiro betie , Jal Manyalo Gik Moko Duto . "
66001009	An Johana ma owadu , kendo ma achiel kodu e sand gi Pinyruoth kod dhil e kinda marwa kuom Yesu , ne an e chula mar Fatimo nikech wach Nyasaye , kendo wuoyo katimo neno e lela kuom Yesu .
66001010	E odiechieng Ruoth , Roho nopong’a kendo ne awinjo duol maduong’ maywak ka tung’ e yo ka ng’eya .
66001011	" Ndik gik moko duto mineno e kitabu kendo orgi ne kanise abiriyogi : Efeso , gi Smurna , gi Pergamo , gi Thiatiro , Sarde gi Filadelfia kod Laodikia . "
66001012	Eka nalokora mondo ane ni en ng’ano mane loso koda : Kane alokora naneno Rachungi teyini abiriyo mag dhahabu ,
66001013	to e dier rachung teynigo ne nitie ng’ato machalo gi wuod dhano " morwakore gi kandhu mochopo nyakae tiende piny , Kendo kotueyo kore gi kamba mar dhahabu .
66001014	Wiye kod yie wiye ne rachar ka yie rombo , Kendo rachar ka pe , to wengene ne chalo gi mach makakni .
66001015	To tiendene ne pakni ka muia mopuodhi gi mach ; dwonde to ne mor ka pi mopong’ mawuo .
66001016	E lwete korachwich noting’o sulwe abiriyo , kendo ligangla mabith ma dhoge ariyo newuok e dhoge . To lend wang’e ne rieny ka chieng’ marieny mang’ang’ni .
66001017	Kane anene , napodho e tiende ka ng’at motho . Eka noyieyo lwete ma korachwich kuoma mowachona niya , " Kik iluor . An e Jal Mokuongo kendo Mogik .
66001018	An e Jal Mangima ; Ne atho , to koro angima nyaka chieng’ ! An-gi kifungu mag Tho kod mag piny joma otho .
66001019	Emomiyo , ndik gigo miseneno , gigo mantie kod gigo mabiro timore e kindego machien .
66001020	Tiend wach mopandi mar sulwe abiriyo mane ineno e lweta ma korachwich , kod rachung teyni abiriyogo mag dhahabu e mani : Sulwe abiriyogo e malaike mag kanise abiriyo , to rachung teyini abiriyo gin e kanise abiriyogo .
66002001	Ne malaika morito Efeso ndikne : Magi e weche jalo moting’o sulwe abiriyo e lwete korachwich kendo mawuotho e kind rachung teyni abiriyo mag dhahabu :
66002002	Ang’eyo timbegi , tij i matek , kod kindani . Ang’eyo ni isetiyo matek kendo isetimo kinda . Ang’eyo ni ok iwinjri gi joma richo . Ang’eyo ni isetemo joma luongore ni joote , to ok gin joote , ma iyudo ni gin jomiriambo .
66002003	Isetimo kinda kendo isebedo gi horuok e tembe nikech nyinga to ok iseol .
66002004	To kata kamano an kod wach achiel maok kare kuomi , iseweyo herani mokuongo .
66002005	Omiyo par kuma iae kipodho ! Lokri mondo itim gik mane itimo mokuongo . To ka ok ilokori to abiro biro mi agol rachung-tachi kare .
66002006	To kata kamano nitie tim maber mapuoyigo en ni isin gi timbe jo Nikolao ma an bende asin
66002007	Ng’at man gi it mondo owinj gima Roho wacho ni kanise . Ng’a molocho anami ratiro mar chamo olemb yadh ngima man e paradiso mar Nyasaye .
66002008	Ne malaika morito kanisa man Smurna ndikne : Magi e weche mag Jal Mokuongo kendo Mogik , Jal mane otho kendo ochako obet mangima .
66002009	Ang’eyo chandruok miyudo kod dhier mari-Chutho to in jamoko . Bende ang’eyo ayany majoma wuondore ni jo-Yahudi yanyigo to chutho mana oganda malamo Satan .
66002010	Kik iluor kuom sand ma ibiro yudo machiegni . Adier , anyisou ni Jachien biro tweyo jomoko kuomu e jela mondo otemugo kendo ubiro yudo sandruok kuom ndalo apar . Bed Jadiera nyaka kar tho to abiro miyi osimbo mar ngima .
66002011	Ng’at mangi it mondo owinj gima Roho wacho ni kanise . Ng’a molocho to tho mar ariyo ok notime gimoro kata matin .
66002012	Kuom malaika morito kanisa man Pergamo ndikne : Magi e weche Jalo mangi ligangla mabith ma dhoge ariyo :
66002013	Ang’eyo kama idakie , kama kom duong’ mar Satan nitie to kata kamano isebedo kirito nyinga . Bende ne ok ikwedo yie miyiego kuoma , kata mana e kinde mane Antipa janenona maradier mane onegi e dalau kama Satan odakie .
66002014	To kata kamano an kod weche matin kuomi : In kod jomoko kanyo maluwo puonj mar Balaam mane opuonjo Balak kaka onyalo ywayo jo-Israel mondo otim richo ka gichamo chiemo motimgo misango ni nyiseche manono kendo kuom richo mar chode .
66002015	To bende in kod jomoko maluwo puonj mag jo-Nikolao .
66002016	Emomiyo lok chunyi gi pachi ! Nikech ka ok ilokori to abiro biro mapiyo mondo aked kodgi gi ligangla mawuok e dhoga .
66002017	Ng’at mangi it mondo owinj gima Roho wacho ni kanise . Ng’a molocho abiro miyo manna moko mopandi . Bende abiro miye kidi marachar mondikie nying’ manyien maonge ng’ama ong’eyo makmana ng’at monwang’e .
66002018	Ne malaika morito kanisa man Thiatira ndikne : Magi e weche mag Wuod Nyasaye ma wengene chalo gi mach makakni to tiendene chai ka muia mapakni .
66002019	Ang’eyo timbeni , herani kod yie mari , tij i mar konyo ji , kod kindani . Kendo imedo tiyo maber moloyo kaka nitiyo mokuongo .
66002020	Kata kamano , an kodi gi wach moro maok ber kuomi , iyie gi dhako miluongo ni Jezebel maluongore ni janabi madhako . Owuondo jotichna kuom puonjne mondo otim chode kendo chamo chiemo motimgo misango ni nyiseche manono .
66002021	Ne amiye kinde mondo olokre owe timo richo kod chode to notamore .
66002022	Omiyo abiro bole e kitanda mar thagruok bende abiro miyo joma terore kode biro yudo thagruok malich ka ok giyie loko chunygi mi giweyo yorene .
66002023	Nyithinde bende abiro nego mi kanise biro ng’eyo ni An ema ang’eyo chunje gi paro mag ji kendo ni anapog ng’ato ka ng’ato kaka tichne chalo .
66002024	Koro awuoyo gi joma moko modong’ man Thiatira ne un maok umako puonjne kendo maok usepuonjoru puonj Satan miluongo ni maling’ ling’ maiye . Ok abi miyou ting’ moro amora
66002025	makmana anyisou ni makuru gima ungo nyaka abi .
66002026	To jal molocho kendo otimo dwarona nyaka giko , abiro miyo teko mar locho kuom ogendini .
66002027	Jal molochono noti tich loch gi odunga mar nyinyo , kendo noto ogendini matindo tindo ka ng’ama toyo agulu , ' mana kaka Wuora osemiya teko mar loch .
66002028	Abiro miye sulwe mar okinyi .
66002029	Ng’at mangi it mondo owinj gima Roho wacho ni kanise .
66003001	Ne malaika morito kanisa man Sarde ndikne : Magi e weche mag jalo moting’o Roho abiriyo mag Nyasaye kod sulwe abiriyo . Ang’eyo tichni ; kendo kaka igenoni in gi nying ni ingima to adiera isetho .
66003002	Omiyo chiew ! Jiw gima pod odong’no kendo chiegni tho , nimar timbeni ayudo korem e nyim Nyasaye .
66003003	Emomiyo par gik mane iseyudo kendo isewinjo , makgi , kendo lokri . Ka ok ichiew to abiro biro apoya ka-jakuo maok ibi ng’eyo saa ma anabiye iri .
66003004	Kata kamano nitie jomoko manok e Sarde maok osechido lepgi . Gin to gini wuothi koda ka girwakore gi lewni marachere nikech gin joma owinjore .
66003005	Ng’ama olocho bende norwakre gi lewni marachere kaka gin , bende ok naruch nyinge e kitap ngima , to abiro hulo nyinge e nyim Wuora gi malaikene .
66003006	Ng’at mangi it mondo owinj gima Roho wacho ni kanise .
66003007	Ne Malaika morito kanisa man Filadelfia ndikne : Magi e weche mag jamo maler kendo jaadier , moting’o kifungu mar Daudi . Gima oyawo to onge ng’ama nyalo loro ; kendo gima oloro to onge ng’ama nyalo yawo .
66003008	Ang’eyo timbeni . Omiyo ase yawoni dhoot kendo onge ng’ama nyalo lore . Ang’eyo ni in-gi teko matin to kata kamano iserito wachna kendo ok ise kweda .
66003009	Abiro miyo jogo malamo Satan , maluongore ni ok gin Jo-Yahudi kata obedo ni gin to giriambo ariamba . Abiro chunogi mondo gibi kendo gipodhi e tiendu mondo ging’e ni aherou .
66003010	Nikech iserito chikna ka ihoyori kuom tembe , abiro riti maber e kinde mar masira mabiro yudo piny ngima mondo otem ji modak e piny .
66003011	Abiro piyo . Omiyo mak gino main-go matek mondo kik ng’ato mayi osimboni .
66003012	Jal molocho anami obed siro e Hekalu mar Nyasacha . Ok nochak owuog kanyo nyaka chieng’ . Abiro ndiko kuome nying Nyasacha kod nying dala mar Nyasacha ma en Jerusalem manyien , mabiro aa e polo kuom Nyasacha kendo abiro ndiko kuome nyinga manyien .
66003013	Ng’at mangi it mondo owinj gima Roho wacho ni kanise .
66003014	Ne Malaika morito kanisa man Laudikia ndikne : Magi e weche moa kuom jal miluongo ni Amin ma jaadiera kendo janeno ma jaratiro , jalno ma jaloch kuom chuech duto mag Nyasaye .
66003015	Ang’eyo timbeni , ni ok ing’ich bende ok iliet . Dine berna kibedo kiliet kata ka ing’ich !
66003016	To nikech koro indhemndhem : ok iliet kata ok ing’ich , achiegni ng’ogi oko .
66003017	Iwacho ni , ' an jamoko , kendo aseyudo mwandu mathoth bende onge gima aremo to ok ing’eyo ni in ng’at mathagore mogik ; idhi-er , in ng’at monego okechi ; bende in muofu kendo in duk .
66003018	To ang’adoni rieko mondo ibi ing’iew kuoma dhahabu mopuodhi gi mach mondo ibed jamoko . Ng’iew lewni marachere kuoma mondo irwaki oumni dugi . Ng’iew yath kuoma mondo ithiedh go wang’i mondo inen .
66003019	Joma ahero ema akwero kendo akumo . Omiyo bed jadiera kendo ilok chunyi iwe timo richo .
66003020	Ne ! achung’ e dhoot kendo aduong’o , ka ng’ato ang’ata owinj o duonda mi oyawona dhoot to abiro donjo ire mi achiem kode to en bende ochiem koda .
66003021	Ng’ama olocho nami thuolo mar bedo koda e kom duong’na mana kaka an bende kane aselocho ne abedo gi wuora e kom duong’ne
66003022	Ng’at mangi it mondo owinj gima Roho wacho ni kanise .
66004001	Bang’e ne ang’icho mi aneno dhoot moyaw e polo . To duol machalo gi tung’ mane ase winjo mokuongo kawuoyo koda nowachoni , " Bi malo ka mondo anyisi gik mabiro timore bang’e " .
66004002	Gi e sano ne Roho Opong’a mi aneno kom duong’ e polo ka ng’ato obetie .
66004003	Ng’ama ne obetie komno ne kite nenore ka kite manengogi tek miluongo ni Jasper gi Sardus . Ndanya mar koth machalo Zumaridi ne oluoro kom duong’no koni gi koni .
66004004	Kom duong’no ne oluor gi kombe moko piero ariyo gi ang’wen ma jodongo piero ariyo gang’wen obedoe . Ne girwakore gi lewni marachere to e wigi ne girwake osimbo mar dhahabu .
66004005	Koa e kom duong’no , polo ne mil , kendo moor kendo riadore . E nyim kom duong’no ne nitie teyni abiriyo maliel . Magi e roho e abiriyo mag Nyasaye .
66004006	Bende e nyim komno ne nitie gimoro manenore ka nam ma rangine chalo gi glas to orieny ka pi . E dier komno tir kod alworane ne nitie gik moko ang’wen mangima mangi wenge mang’eny yo ka nyimgi kod yoka dier ng’egi .
66004007	Gima ngima mokuongo ne chalo gi sibuor , mar ariyo ne chalo gi ruadh bwoch , mar adek ne lend wang’e chalo gi mar dhano to mar ang’wen ne chalo gi ongo mafuyo .
66004008	Moro ka moro kuom gik mangimago ne nigi buombe auchiel kendo ne gin gi wenge mathoth moluoro dendgi nyaka e buo buombegi . Odiechieng’ gi otieno duto ne gi siko ka giwacho ni , " Maler , maler en Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto . En mane nitie to bende entie kawuono , to pod obiro betie . "
66004009	E seche duto ka gik mangimago ne chiwo pak , gi puoch kod erokamano ne Jal mane obedo e kom duong’ kendo mangima nyaka chieng’ ;
66004010	Jodongo piero ariyo gang’wen-go to ne podho e nyim ng’at mobet e kom duong’ ka gilamo jal mangima nyaka chieng’ . Ne gibolo osimbo maggi e nyim kom duong’ ka giwacho niya :
66004011	" Aa Ruodhwa kendo Nyasachwa iwinjori yudo duong’ gi pak kod teko , nimar ichweyo gik moko duto , kendo kuom dwaroni ne ochwe gi kendo gibedo mangima . "
66005001	Eka ne aneno kitabu majal mane obet oting’o e lwete ma korachwich , kitabuno ne ondiki koni gi koni kendo ne odine gi kido abiriyo motweye .
66005002	Eka ne aneno malaika maratego ka penjo gi duol maduong’ niya : " Ere ng’ama owinjore gonyo kidogi mondo kitabuni ? "
66005003	To ne ok oyudi ng’ato ang’ata e polo kata e piny mane nyalo elo kitabuno , kata mane nyalo rango iye .
66005004	Kuom mano ne aywak malit nikech ne onge ng’ama nyalo elo kitabuno mondo onyiswa gima ondiki e iye .
66005005	To achiel kuom Jodongogo nowachona ni , " We ywak ! Ne , Sibuor moa e dhood Juda ma Nyakwar Daudi oselocho kendo en ema , owinjore yawo kitabu modin gi kido abiriyogo . "
66005006	Eka ne aneno Nyarombo machalo ka gima ne osenegi kochungo e dier kom duong’ kolwore gi gik mangima ang’wen kod jodongo . Ne en gi tunge abiriyo gi wenge abiriyo mochung’ kar Roho abiriyo mag Nyasaye moseor e piny mangima .
66005007	Nobiro mi okawo kitabuno e lwedo korachwich mar jamo manobedo e kom duong’ .
66005008	E saa mane okawoe kitabuno gik mangima ang’wenka gi Jodongo Piero ariyo gang’wen-go ne opodho auma e nyim Nyarombo . Moro ka moro ne nigi thum kod tewni mag dhahabu ma ubani opong’o , magin lemo mag jomaler .
66005009	Kendo ne giwero wer manyien miwero ni : " In ema iwinjori kawo kitabuni , kendo gonyo kido molorego nikech in ema nonegi kendo rembi ne ing’iewogo ji ni Nyasaye , ji moa e dhoudi duto , kendo mawacho dhok duto gi ji duto kod pinje duto .
66005010	Isemiyo gibedo oganda joka ruoth kendo jodolo mondo gitine Nyasachwa , kendo ginibed joloch e piny . "
66005011	Eka ne ang’icho , kendo nawinjo dwond malaike mang’eny makwan-gi ne romo gana gi gana , tara gi gana kuom tara gi gana . Ne gilworo kom duong’ kaachiel gi gik mangimago kod Jodongo .
66005012	Ne giwer gi dwol maduong’ kama : " Duong’ odokne Nyarombo manonegi , mondo oyud loch gi mwandu , gi rieko gi luor gi duong’ kod pak . "
66005013	Eka nawinjo ka gik mangima duto manie polo kendo e piny kod e bwo piny kendo e nam , kendo gigo duto mochwe modak e igi , kawer niya : " Ne en mobet e kom duong’ to gi Nyarombo , Pak gi luor , duong’ kod loch obedne manyaka chieng’ ! "
66005014	Kendo gik mangima ang’wen-go nowacho niya " Amin " eka jodongogo nopodho piny mi gidende .
66006001	Eka naneno Nyarombo ka elo achiel kuom kido abiriyogo . Eka nawinjo duond achiel kuom gik mangima ang’wen-go kaluongo gi duol machalo ka mor polo , kawacho , " Bi ! "
66006002	Ne ang’icho mi aneno e nyima faras marachar . Ng’ama oidhe ne oting’o atung’ , kendo ne osidhne osimbo , ne owuok gi farase ka jaloch madhi mondo olochi .
66006003	Kane Nyarombo ne oyawo kido mar ariyo . Ne awinjo gima ng’ima mar ariyo kaluongo ni bi !
66006004	Eka faras machielo ma sifwal nobiro , ng’ama noidhe ne omi teko mondo ogol kwe e piny , mondo ji ochinjre kendgi . Ng’atno ne omi ligangla maduong !
66006005	Kane Nyarombo oyawo kido mar adek , ne awinjo gima ngima mar adek kawacho ni , bi . Ne ang’icho to e nyima kanyo ne nitiere faras marateng’ ! Ng’amo oidhe ne oting’o ratil e luete
66006006	Ne awinjo gima chalo gi duol e dier gik mangima angwen-go kawacho ni , " Koro gorogoro mar ngano ibiro ng’iew gi nengo maromre gi chudo michulo jatich e odiechieng’ achiel kendo nengo mar thowe gorogoro adek bende chai gi mar ngano , to nengo mo gi divai kik medi . "
66006007	Ka Nyarombo noyawo kido mar ang’wen , nawinjo duond gima ngima mar ang’wen kaluongo ni , " Bi ! "
66006008	Nang’icho to naneno faras ma rabuor e nyima ! Ng’at mane oidhe niluongoni Tho , to Kar Jo motho ne luwo bang’e machiegni . Ne omigi teko kuom bath piny moromo achiel kuom angwen mondo gineg gi ligangla kod kech gi dera kod le maricho mag bungu .
66006009	Kane oyawo kido mar abich , naneno e bwo kendo mar misango chunje jomoko mane osenegi nikech Wach Nyasaye , kendo nikech neno mane gisiko gihulo .
66006010	Eka negi ywak gi dwol maduong’ niya , " Nyaka karang’o , Yaye Ruoth Maratego , Maler kendo Maradier , ma ibiro ng’ado bura ni joma odak e piny . Ka ichulo kuor kuom rembwa ? "
66006011	To nomigi kandho marachar ng’ato ka ng’ato , kendo nowach-nigi ni mondo girit kuom kinde matin moromo , nyaka kwan mar jotich wetegi , kod jowetegi mibiro nego kaka gin , orom .
66006012	Ne ang’icho kane oyawo kido mar auchiel . Piny noyiengni matek . Mi chieng’ nolokore marateng’ ti , machal gi ogunia mirwako e kuyo molos gi yie diel , due bende nolokore makwar ka remo ;
66006013	kendo sulwe manie polo nolwar e piny mana kaka olemo machien mag ng’owu lwar koa kuom yadhe ka yamo mager kudho mauko yath .
66006014	Polo nolal nono ka kalatas mibano kendo gode duto gi chulni duto nogol oa kuonde mane gintie .
66006015	Eka ruodhi mag piny , gi ji madongo , kod jotelo mag lweny , gi jo mwandu , kod jomaroteke , kaachiel gi ji duto ma wasumbini , gi joma ni thuolo , giduto ne gipondo e rogo kendo e bwo lwendni mag gode .
66006016	Negilwongo kagiwacho ni gode gi lwendinigo ni , " Podhuru kuomwa mondo uumwa kupandowa ni wang’ Jal mobet e kom duong’no , kendo ne mirimb Nyarombo !
66006017	Nikech chieng’ maduong’ mitoyo negi mirima osechopo , to en ng’ama nyalo chung’ mondo osire .
66007001	Bang’e ne aneno malaike ang’wen kochung’ e tunge ang’wen mag piny , ka gimako yembe ang’wen mag piny , mondo gigeng’ yamo kik kudhi e piny kata e nam kata e yath moro amora .
66007002	Eka naneno malaika machielo kalor koa obiro piny kowuok e yor wuok chieng’ , koting’o kido mar Nyasaye mangima . Noluongo gi duol maduong’ malaike ang’wen mane osemi teko mondo ohiny piny kod nam .
66007003	Nowacho nigi , " Kik uhiny piny , kata nam , kata yiende nyaka chop waket kido e lend wang’jotich Nyasachwa . "
66007004	Bang’e nawinjo kar kwan joma ne oketnigi kido ne gin ji 144,000 mowuok e dhout Israel duto ,
66007005	Koa e dhood Juda nowal ji 12,000 , koa e dhood Ruben ji 12,000 , Koa e dhood Gad ji 12,000 ,
66007006	Koa e dhood Manase ji 12,000 , Koa dhood Naftali ji 12,000 , Koa dhood Manase ji 12,000 ,
66007007	Koa dhood Simeon ji 12,000 , Koa dhood Lawi ji 12,000 , Koa dhood Isakar ji 12,000 ,
66007008	Koa dhood Zebulunji 12,000 , Koa dhood Josef ji 12,000 , kendo dhood Benjamin ji 12,000 .
66007009	Bang’ mani ne ang’icho , mi naneno oganda mar ji mang’eny ma ok kwanre moa e pinje duto gi dhoudi kod ogendini kod dhok duto kochungo e nyim kom duong’ , kendo e nyim Nyarombo . Ne girwako kandhe marachere kendo giting’o othidhe e lwetgi .
66007010	Kendo negiywak giduol maduong’ ka giwacho niya : " Warruok en mar Nyasachwa mobedo e kom duong’ mar loch kendo ne Nyarombo . "
66007011	Malaike duto nochung’ kolworo lom duong’ kendo kolworo jodongo kod gik mangima ang’wen . Ne gikulore piny e nyim kom duong’ mi negi dendo Nyasaye .
66007012	Ka giwacho niya , " Amin ! Pak gi duong’ kod rieko gi erokamano gi luor kod teko gi nyalo obedni Nyasachwa , nyaka chieng’ . Amin !
66007013	Eka achiel kuom jodongogo nopenja niya , " Jogi morwakore gi lewni marachere gin ng’a gini , to bende gia kanye ? "
66007014	An to nadwoke ni , " Jaduong’ in e ma ing’eyo , an akiya . " Eka nowacho ni , " Jogi e joma owuok koa e sand mager ; giselwoko kandhe gi matar gi remb Nyarombo .
66007015	Ma , " emomiyo koro gin e nyim kom duong’ mar Nyasaye , ka gitiyone odiechieng’ gi otieno ei Hekalune ; to Jalno mobet e kom duong’ noumgi korieyo hema mare kuomgi .
66007016	Kech ok nokagi ngang’ kendo ; kata riyo ok nomak gi kendo . Chieng’ ok norieny kuomgi kata liet moro mager ok nowang’gi .
66007017	Nimar Nyarombo mobedo e kom loch mar Nyasaye nobed jakwadhgi ; notelnigi koterogi e sokni mag pi ngima . To Nyasaye noywe pi wang’ gi duto . "
66008001	Kane oyawo kido mar abiriyo , polo noling’ thi kuom kinde ma dirom nus saa .
66008002	Eka naneno malaike abiriyo mochungo e nyim Nyasaye , kendo nomigi tunge abiriyo .
66008003	Malaika moro machielo , nobiro mochungo but kendo mar misango , lot-ing’o tap ubani mar dhahabu . Nomiye ubani mang’eny mondo ochiw , magin jomaler duto e wi kendo mar misango molos gi dhahabu manie nyim kom duong’ .
66008004	Iro mar ubani moting’o lemo mag jomaler nodum kadhi malo e nyim Nyasaye koa e lwet malaika .
66008005	Bang’e malaika nokawo tap ubani , mi opong’e gi mach moa e kendo mar misango , eka nobole e piny . Bang’ mano polo noriadore matek , kendo omoor komil malich , kendo piny noyiengini .
66008006	Eka malaike abiriyo mane nigi turumbeta abiriyogo ne oikore goyo turumbeta-go .
66008007	Malaika mokwongo nogoyo turumbetane , to pe gi mach mokikore gi remo e manowuok , kendo nowitgi e piny . To bath piny moromo achiel kuom adek nowang’ , yien bende marom kamano nowang’ gi lum mang’ich duto nowang’ .
66008008	Malaika mar ariyo nogoyo turumbetane , mi gima chalo got maduong’ , ma liel gi mach , nowiti e nam . To bath nam moromo achiel kuom adek nolokore remo ,
66008009	momiyo achiel kuom adek mar gik mangima manie nam notho , kendo achiel kuom adek mar yiedhi manie nam nokethi .
66008010	Eka malaika mar adek nogoyo turumbetane mi sulwe maduong’ maliel ka toch nolwar oa e polo , nolwar kuom achiel mar adek mag aore , kendo kuom sokni duto .
66008011	Nying sulweno en , " Gima Kech , " kamano bende achiel kuom adek mar pi nolokore makech , kendo pige makechgo nomiyo ji mang’eny notho .
66008012	Kendo malaika mar ang’wen nogoyo turumbetane , mi achiel kuom adek mar chieng’ gi achiel kuom adek mar due , kod mar sulwe bende , notimo mudho , to achiel kuom adek mar odiechieng’ gi otieno notimo mudho .
66008013	Bang’e nang’icho mi awinjo ongo mahuyo e kor polo kaywak matek niya , " Lit ! Lit ! Lit ni joma odak e piny , nikech turumbeta modong’ ma malaike adek biro goyo .
66009001	Eka malaika mar abich nogoyo turumbeta , mi naneno sulwe moro mane oselwar e piny koa e polo . Sulweno ne omi kifungu mar Bur matut Maonge gikone .
66009002	Kane oyawo Burno , yiro nowuokie machalo gi ich mach maduong’ . Yirono moa e burno noimo chieng’ kod boche polo molokore marateng’ .
66009003	Kendo bonyo nowuok e yirono mopiyo e piny , to nomigi teko machalo gi teko thomoni manie piny .
66009004	To nokwergi ni kik giketh lum manie piny kata gimoro mang’ich kata yien , to ginyalo mana hinyo jogo maonge gi kido mar Nyasage e lenda wengegi .
66009005	Ne ok omigi teko mar negogi to nomigi thuolo mar sandogi kuom dweche abich . To rem mane jogo oyudo ne chalgi mano miyudo ka thomoni okayo dhano .
66009006	E ndalogo ji nodwar tho , to ok giniyude ; ginigomb mondo githo to tho noring-gi .
66009007	Bonyogo ne chalo gi farese moikore ni lweny E wigi negirwako gik machalo gi osimbo mag dhahabu , to lend wang’gi ne chalo gi lend wang’ dhano .
66009008	Yie wigi ne chalo gi yie wi mon , kendo lekegi ne chalo gi leke sibuoche .
66009009	Ne girwako gilweny mag akor machalo gi akor mar nyinyo , to buombegi ne goyo koko mana ka farese mang’eny kendo ka geche miywayo kadhiyo e lweny
66009010	Negin gi yiwgi makecho kaka thomoni kecho , to e yiwgigo negin gi teko mar sando kagikayogo ji kuom dueye abich .
66009011	Ruodhgi motelo nigi en malaika mar Bur Matut Maonge gikone manyinge miluongego gi dho Hibrania en Abadon , to gi dho Grik en Apolion .
66009012	Masira mokwongo osekadho , to masiche ariyo mamoko pod biro .
66009013	Bang’ mano malaika mar auchiel nogoyo turumbetane , mi nawinjo dwol moa e tunge mag kendo mar misango mar dhahabu manie nyim Nyasaye .
66009014	Eka duolno nowacho ni malaika mar auchiel man gi turumbeta niya , " Gony malaike ang’wen motue gibed thuolo gia e aora maduong’ mar Yufrate . "
66009015	To nogony malaike ang’wen-go mane oseiki ni saa-no gi odiechiengno kod dueno gi higano , mondo gineg achiel kuom adek mar ji duto .
66009016	Kwan mar jolweny moidho farese ne oromo tara mia ariyo . Ne awinjo kar kwan-gi .
66009017	To farese gi joithgi mane aneno e fwenynano ne chalo kama : joma noidhogi norwako akor mag nyinyo makwar kamach , kendo mambulu molil , kod ratong’ gweno . Wi faresego ne chalo gi wi sibuoche , to mach gi yiro kod pilni mach ne wuok e dhogi .
66009018	Masiche adekgo mag mach , yiro kod pilni mag mach manewuok e dho faresego nonego achiel kuom adek mar kwan ji duto .
66009019	Teko mane faresego nigo ne nie dhogi kendo e iwgi nikech iwgi ne chalo gi thuonde , man gi wiye ma gike-chogo ka gihinyogo ji .
66009020	To joma odong’ mane masichego ok onego , pod ne ok oloko chunygi oa kuom gik mane giloso kendo gichueyo gi lwetgi ; kendo ok giweyo lamo jochiende gi nyiseche manono molos gi dhahabu gi fedha kod muia gi kidi kod bao , ma gin gik maok nen kata winj wach , kata wuotho .
66009021	Bende ne ok giloko chunygi ka giweyo nek , kata timbe juok kata terruok kata kuo mane gibedo ka gitimo .
66010001	Eka naneno malaika machielo maratego , kabiro kolor oa e polo . Ne orwakore gi boch polo ka ndanya oumo wiye ; wang’e nechal gi chieng’ , kendo tiendene ne chalo gi sirni makakni ka mach .
66010002	Ne oting’o kitabu matin moel e lwete . Nonyono nam gitiende korachwich , to tiende ma koracham nonyonogo piny ,
66010003	kendo nokok gi dwol maduong’ machalo ka sibuor maruto . Bang’ losekok kamano to duonde mor polo abiriyo nowuoyo .
66010004	To kane mor polo abiriyogo osewuoyo kamano , ne adwaro ndiko gima giwacho , eka nawinjo dwol moro moa e polo mawa-chona niya , " Kik indik gima polo abiriyogo osewacho to ling’go ei chunyi . "
66010005	Eka malaika mane aneno konyono nam kod piny cha noting’o bade korachwich kochomo polo .
66010006	Kendo nokuong’ore gi nying’ Jal mangima nyaka chieng’ , jal manochueyo polo gi gigo duto manie iye , gi piny gi gik moko duto manie iye , kod nam gi gik moko duto manie iye kowacho niya , " Deko moro ok nochak obedie ngang’ !
66010007	To e ndalono , ma malaika mar abiriyono nogo turumbetane , eka wach mopondo mar Nyasaye nochopi , mana kaka nonyiso jotichne ma jonabi . "
66010008	Bang’ mano dwol mane awinjo ka wuoyo koa e polo cha ne ochako wuoyo koda kendo kowacho niya : " Dhiyo , ikaw kitabu moel manie lwet malaika monyono nam kod piny . "
66010009	Omiyo ne adhiyo ir malaikano , kendo makwaye mondo omiya kitabu matinno . To nowachona ni , " Kawe , mondo ichame . Obiro bedo makech e iyi , to e dhogi nobed mamit ka mor kich . "
66010010	Eka nakawo kitabu matinno manie lwet malaikano , mi achame , ne omit e dhoga ka mor kich to kane asechame nobedo makech e iya .
66010011	Bang’e ne owachna kendo niya , " Nyaka ichak ikor wach kuom ogendini mang’eny , gi pinje kod dhok ma ji wacho gi ruodhi . "
66011001	Eka nomiya modi machalo gi luth mar pimo ; kendo nowachna niya , " Aa malo idhiyo ipim Hekalu mar Nyasaye kod kendo mar misango , kendo ikwan joma lemo kanyono !
66011002	To iwe laru maoko manie nyim Hekalu kik ipime , nikech osemiye Ogendini , kendo gibiro nyone gi tiendegi kagiketho Dala Maler kuom dueye piero ang’wen gariyo .
66011003	To abiro miyo jonenona ariyo morwakore gi gunia teko , kendo ginihul wach Nyasaye kuom ndalo alufu achiel gi mia ariyo kod piero auchiel .
66011004	Magi gin e yiende ariyo mag Zeituni , kod rachung teyni ariyo mochung’ e nyim kom Ruodh piny .
66011005	Ka ng’ato moro amora dwaro hinyogi , to mach wuok e dhogi matieko wasikgi . Mano e kaka ng’ato moro amora madwaro hinyogi notho .
66011006	Jogi nigi teko mar loro polo mondo koth kik chue e ndalo ma gihuloe wach . To bende gin gi teko mar loko pi obed remo kendo kelo tuoche yembe mopogore opogore e piny e kinde mora amora magidwaro .
66011007	To ka gisetieko hulo wach gi , ondiek mawuok Bur Matut maonge gikone noked kodgi , mi nologi kendo negogi .
66011008	Ringregi noriere koriyo e yo mar dala maduong’no , ma iluongo gi ngero Sodom kod Misri , dalano e kama nogurie Ruodhgi .
66011009	To ji moa e ogendini duto gi dhoudi , kod dhok duto ma ji wacho gi pinje duto , norang ringregi kuom ndalo adek gi nus , kendo ok giniyie mondo oyik-gi .
66011010	Ji duto modak e piny nogo siboi kuom thogi , ka gimor kendo gimiyore chiwo , nikech jonabi ariyogo nosebedo kasando ji modak e piny .
66011011	To bang’ ndalo adek gi nus much ngima mar Nyasaye nodonjo e igi , mi ne gichung’ gi tiendegi , kendo luoro maduong’ nomako joma ne onenogi .
66011012	Bang’ mano negiwinjo dwol maduong’ koa e polo kawachonigi niya , " Biuru malo ka ! " Mi ne gidhiyo e polo malo ei bor polo moumogi , ka wasikgi nenogi .
66011013	Gi e saa nogo piny noyiengni matek , mi bath dalano achiel kuom apar nomukore mogore piny , kendo ji alufu abiriyo notho e yiengni mar pinyno to joma nodong’ nobwok malich , kendo negimiyo Nyasach Polo duong’ !
66011014	Masira mar ariyo osekadho , neuru , masirano mar adek biro biro piyo .
66011015	Eka malaika mar abiriyo nogoyo turumbetane , to dwonde moko nokok matek ei polo , kagiwacho niya : " Loch mar pinyni koro osedoko mar Ruodhwa kendo mar Kristo , kendo enolochi nyaka chieng’ . "
66011016	To jodongogo piero ariyo gang’wen mane obedo e kombegi mag duong’ e nyim Nyasaye , nokulore piny auma kendo ne gidendo Nyasaye ,
66011017	Ka giwacho niya : " Wagoyoni erokamano , aa Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto ! In Mantie , kendo mane nitie , nikech isekawo teko mari maduong’ , mi koro ichako locho .
66011018	Nyiego nomako pinje mag ogendini , to koro mirimbi osechopo . Kinde osechopo mar ng’ado bura neorno tho , kendo chiwo mich ni jotichni ma jonabi , gi jogi maler kod jogo moluoro nyingi , jomatindo gi jomadongo . Kendo tieko jogo maketho piny . "
66011019	Eka Hekalu mar Nyasaye noyaw e polo , kendo Sandug Muma nonenore ei Hekalu ; to mil polo marieny mager gi riadruok , koko kod mor polo gi yiengni mar piny nobetie kod pe nochue mang’eny .
66012001	Bang’ mano ranyisi malich nonenore ei polo : ne en dhako morwakore gi chieng’ , to due onyono e tiende , kendo wiye nosidhie osimb sulwe apar gariyo .
66012002	Ne en-gi ich , kendo noywak ka en girem nikech muoch ne kaye kodwaro nyuol .
66012003	Eka ranyisi machielo bende nonenore ei polo : ne en thuol mang’ongo , makwar mangi wiye abiriyo kod tunge apar gi osimbo iriyo mosidhi e wiyege
66012004	Iwe noyweyo achiel kuom adek mar sulwe manie polo mi opudho kendo owitogi e piny . Thuol malichno nochungo nyim dhakono mane chiegni nyuol , mondo ocham nyathine kosenywole .
66012005	Dhakono nonywolo nyathi ma wuowi , nyathi madichwo mabiro locho korito ogendni gi ludh nyinyo . To nyathineno noyudhi moter malo ir Nyasaye e kom duong’ne .
66012006	Dhakono noringo modhiyo e thim kuma ne Nyasaye oselosone kama nibiro ritee kuom ndalo alufu achiel gi mia ariyo kod piero auchiel .
66012007	Eka lweny nochakore e polo . Mikael gi malaike mage nokedo gi thuol malichno , to thuondno gi malaike mage bende nokedo kodgi .
66012008	To thuol ne onge teko moromo , mi nologi kendo ne oriembgi kargi e polo .
66012009	Eka thuol malichno nowit modire mwalo e piny , thuol mang’ongo machon miluongo ni Jachien kata Satan , mawuondo piny ngima . Nowite modire e piny , kaachiel kod malaike mage bende .
66012010	Eka ne awinjo duol maduong’ moa e polo , kawacho niya , " Koro warruok giteko kod pinyruodh Nyasachwa , gi loch mar Kristo osechopo . Nikech Jahang jowetewa , mahangonegi e nyim Nyasachwa odiechieng’ gi otieno , osewit modir e piny .
66012011	To ne giloye gi remb Nyarombo kendo gi Wach Nyasaye mane gihulo , bende ne ok gihero ngimagi ahinya mane nyalo miyo giluor tho .
66012012	Emomiyo moruru un polo , kod joma odak eiye ! To mano kaka nobed malit ne piny gi nam , nikech Jachien oselor obiro iru ! En gi mirima mager nikech ong’eyo ni odong’ne mana ndalo matin kende . "
66012013	To kane thuol malichno oneno ni ose-wite modire e piny , ne olawo dhako mane onywolo nyathi ma wuowi cha .
66012014	Dhakono nomi fcuombe ariyo mag ongo maduong’ mondo ohugo ochopgo kama nolosne thim , kuma ne idhi ritee kuom higni adek gi nus kama thuol ok nenyal chopoe ire .
66012015	Eka thuol nong’ogo pi moa e dhoge mamol ka aora mondo oyuogo dhakono gi apaka mamol .
66012016	To piny noyawo dhoge , momodho pi duto mane thuol ong’ogono , mi nokonyo dhakono .
