66012017	Eka thuol mang’ongono ne okecho gi dhakono , nodhiyo mondo oked gi nyithind dhalono modong’ , morito chike Nyasaye kendo osiko motegno kahulo wach Yesu . Kendo thuol nochung’ e dho nam .
66013001	Eka naneno ondiek moro magalagala kawuok aa e nam . Ne en gi tunge apar kod wiye abiriyo . To nosidho osimbo apar e tungegego , kendo wich ka wich nondikie nying marach mayanyo Nyasaye .
66013002	Ondiek mane aneno ne chalo gi kwach , to tiendege ne chalo tiende dubu , kendo dhoge ne chalo gi dho sibuor . To thuol mang’ongono nomiyo ondiegino tekone gi kome mar duong’ gi lochne duto .
66013003	Achiel kuom wiye ondiek magalagalano mar tho ne nenore ka gima ne nigi adhola malich to adholano malich mar tho nosechango . Jopiny mangima nohum nono , kendo negiluwo bang’ ondiegino .
66013004	To ji nolamo thuol mang’ongono nikech nosemiyo ondiek malichno tekone owuon kendo negilamo ondiek malichno ka gipenjo niya . " En ng’ano machal gi Ondiek malich ? " Ere ng’ato ma nyalo kedo kode ? "
66013005	Ondiegi malichno nomi dhok mar wacho weche mag sungruok kod ayany , kendo ne oyiene bedo gi loch kuom dueye piero ang’wen gariyo .
66013006	Eka nochako wuoyo koyanyo Nyasaye kendo koketho nyinge kod kar dakne , kaachiel gi joma odakie polo .
66013007	Bende nomiye teko mondo oked gi jomaler mag Nyasaye kendo ologi bende nomiye loch kuom dhoudi duto , gi ogendini kod dhok duto miwacho gi pinje duto .
66013008	Ji duto modak e piny biro lamo ondiek malichno , jogo ma nyinggi ok ondiki e kitabu mar ngima mar Nyarombo manoyang’ chakre chwech piny .
66013009	Ng’at mangi it , mondo owinji !
66013010	Ka ng’ato onego otue to tuejno ema nodhiye . Kendo ka ng’ato onego negi gi ligangla , liganglano ema nonegego . Ma dwaro bedo jakinda modhil kod yie motegno kuom jotich Nyasaye moyiedhi .
66013011	Eka naneno ondiek malich machielo kawuok ei piny . Ne en gi tunge ariyo machalo gi mar nyarombo , to nowuoyo kaka thuol mang’ongo .
66013012	Notiyo gi teko duto mar ondiek malich mokwongo ka en e nyim ondiegino . Eka nomiyo piny gi ji duto modak eiye olamo ondiek malich mok-wongono , ma wiye ne nigi adhola malich manogo lero mar tho nosechango .
66013013	Notimo honni madongo ma kata mana mach nomiyo lor a e polo , kabiro e piny ka ji duto neno .
66013014	To nowuondo ji modakie piny , nikech honni mane omiye teko mondo otim e nyim ondiek malich mokwongo . Ne ogolo chik mondo gilosi gima ket ma imiyogo duong’ ondiek malich mokuongo mane ohiny gi ligangla to ok otho .
66013015	Nomiye teko mondo omi gima ket mar ondiek malich mokwongo muya , mondo owuo kendo oneni jogo duto mane otamore lamo gima ketno onegi .
66013016	Bende nochuno ji duto , jomatindo gi jomadongo jomwandu kod jochan , wasumbini gi joma ni thoulo , mondo oket alama e rwetegi ma korachwich kata e lenda wengegi .
66013017	Mondo omi ng’ato ang’ata kik ng’iew kata uso gimoro amora , makmana ka en gi alamano ma en nying ondiek malichno kata kwan mar nyinge .
66013018	To ng’eyo tiend wachni dwaro rieko , Ng’at man gi ng’eyo matut , mondo okwan namba mar ondiek , nikech nambano en mar nying dhano . Nambano en mia auchiel gi piero auchiel gauchiel .
66014001	a Eka ne ang’icho kendo naneno Nyarombo kochung’ e wi Got Sayun . To ne en kod ji alufu mia achiel gi piero ang’wen gang’wen kendo nyinge owuon gi nying Wuon mare nondik e lenda wengegi .
66014002	Kendo ne awinjo dwol moro moa e polo ka mor ka mor pi aora maringo matek kendo ka mor mar polo . Dwolno mane awinjo ne chalo gi jo thumbe mag nyatiti magoyo nyatiti .
66014003	To ne giwero wer manyien ka gichungo e nyim kom duong’ , kendo e nyim gik mangima ang’wen kod jodongogo . Bende ne onge ng’ato mane nyalo puonj ore wero wendni makmana ji alufu mia achiel gi piero ang’wen gang’wen ( 144,000 ) mane gin joma nores koa e piny .
66014004	Jogi e joma ne ok odwanyore gi mon , to ne giritore maler . Giluwo bang’ Nyarombo kamoro amora modhiye . Nong’iewgi koa kuom ji kendo mobedo kaka olembe mokwongo chiek michiwo ni Nyasaye kod Nyarombo .
66014005	Miriambo ne ok owuok e dhogi , gionge gi ketho moro amora .
66014006	Eka ne aneno malaika moro ka huyo e kor polo . Ne en gi Wach Maber mochwere ma olando ni ji duto modak e piny ne pinje duto , gi dhoudi duto kod dhok duto gi ogendini duto .
66014007	Nokok gi dwol maduong’ kowacho niya , " Luoruru Nyasaye kendo miyeuru duong’ , nikech saa ma ong’adoe bura osechopo ! Lamuru Jal mane ochueyo polo gi piny , kod nam gi sokni mag pi . "
66014008	Eka malaika mar ariyo nobiro kowacho niya , " Yaye ! Babulon Dala Maduong’ osepodho piny ! Osepodho Piny ! En e dhako cha mane omiyo ogendini duto omadho divai mar mer mar terruokne .
66014009	Bang’ mano , malaika mar adek nobiro bang’gi kowacho gi duol maduong’ niya , " Ka ng’ato ang’ata olamo ondiek malich kod gima ket kode , kendo ondikne alama e lenda wang’e kata e lwete ,
66014010	ng’atno , bende , nyaka nomadh divai mar mirimb Nyasaye , moseol mopong’ thich giteko moo ei kikombe mar mirimbe . Noyud sand ei mach makakni e nyim malaika maler , kendo e nyim Nyarombo .
66014011	To yich mach mar sandgino dhi malo nyaka chieng’ . Jogo malamo ondiek malich kod gima ket kode , kata jogo mondiknegi alama mar nyinge , ok noyud yueyo odiechieng’ kata otieno .
66014012	Ka eri ema kinda kod dhil mar jomaler , mag Nyasaye dwarore , jogo marito chike mag Nyasaye , kendo osiko koyie kuom Yesu .
66014013	Eka nawinjo dwol moa e polo kawacho niya , " Ndik ni , Chakre kawuononi , jogo gin johawi matho ka gin ei Ruoth ! " Roho bende wacho ni , " Ee , gin johawi adier , nikech giniyue kuom tichgi matek , nimar timbegi noluwgi . "
66014014	To ne ang’icho , mi naneno e nyima bor polo marachar , to ewi bor polono ne nitie ng’ama obetie " machalo gi wuod dhano . " Nosidho osimbo mar dhahabu e wiye , kendo ne oting’o pala mabith mar keyo e lwete .
66014015	Eka malaika machielo nowuok oa e Hekalu kaluongo gi duol maduong’ jal mobedo e bor polono niya , " Kaw pandi mar keyo mondo ike , nikech saa mar keyo osechopo , nimar cham manie piny osechiek . "
66014016	Omiyo jal mane obet e bor polo notiyo gi pande mar keyo e piny , mi nokayo piny ka cham .
66014017	To malaika machielo nowuok oa e Hekalu manie polo , en bende ne en gi pala mabith mar keyo .
66014018	Eka malaika moro machielo , mane nigi teko kuom mach , nobiro kowuok e kar kendo mar misango kendo norwongo gi dwol maduong’ jamo mane nigi pala mabich mar keyo no wachone niya , " Kaw pandi mabithno mar keyo mondo ikago olemb mzabibu mag piny , nikech olembege ochiek ahinya ! "
66014019	Omiyo malaikano notiyo gi pande mar keyo e piny , ne okayo olembe mzabibu kendo noketogi kar biyo mzabibu maduong’ mar mirimb Nyasaye .
66014020	Olembego ne obi kinyonogi gi tielo e kar bichono e pap oko mar dala , to remo nochuer kamol kawuok kar bichono , mochopo mabor moromo kilomita mia adek koa e dala , to tut remono ne nyalo romo mita achiel gi nus .
66015001	Eka ne aneno ei polo ranyisi machielo malich ahinya : Ne aneno Malaike , abiriyo , moting’o masiche abiriyo mogik nikech kuomgi mirimb Nyasaye ochopo kare .
66015002	Ne aneno gima chalo nam mar glas moru gi mach to e bathe kanyo ne aneno joma oseloyo ondiek malichno kod kido machalo kode to gi namba mar nyinge kochung’ . Ne giting’o nyatiti mane omigi gi Nyasaye ,
66015003	ka giwero wend Musa jatich Nyasaye gi wend Nyarombo kama : " Yaye ; mano kaka tijeni dongo kendo lich aa Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto . Yoreni ni kare kendo gin adiera , Aa Ruodh ogendini manyaka nene .
66015004	En ng’a maok nyal luori aa Ruoth , maok nyal miyo nyingi duong ? Nikech in kendi ema iler , ogendini duto nobi nyimi mondo olami , nimar timbeni makare osefwenyore ratiro . "
66015005	Eka-ne ang’iyo mi aneno ka Hekalu mar Hemb Rapar oyawore e polo .
66015006	Malaike abiriyo moting’o masiche abiriyo nowuok e hekalu . Ne giruakore gi lewni maler mapakni kendo manyilni to ne gitweyo kamba mar dhahabu e korgi .
66015007	Achiel kuom gik mangima ang’wen ka ne omiyo malaike abiriyogo tewni abiriyo mag dhahabu mopong’ , gi mirimb Nyasaye , Nyasaye mosiko nyaka chieng’ .
66015008	Hekalu ne iye opong’ gi iro moa e duong’ maler mar Nyasaye kod tekone . To onge ng’ama ne nyalo donjo ei hekalu kapok masiche abiriyo mag malaike abiriyogo orumo .
66016001	Eka ne awinjo duol maduong’ kakok koa ei hekalu ka wuoyo gi malaike abiriyogo kawachonigi niya " Koro dhiuru , mondo upuk tewni abiriyo mopong’ gi mirimb Nyasaye e piny . "
66016002	Malaika mokuongo nodhi mopuko tape e piny , mi adhonde malich mang’ue marach ne omako ji duto mane nigi alama mar ondiek malich kendo mane lamo gima ket lode .
66016003	Malaika mar ariyo noolo tape e nembe mi pi nembegi nolokore machal remb ng’at motho , kendo gik mangima duto modak e nembego ne otho .
66016004	Malaika mar adek noolo tape e aore gi sokni mag pi kendo pigegi ne olokore remo .
66016005	Bang’e ne awinjo malaika mochung’ne pige kawacho niya : " In kare kuom kelo kumgi , Aa Ng’ama ler mantie bende mane nitie , nikech iseng’ado bura kare ;
66016006	nimar jogi ne osechwero remb jogi maler , gi jonabi , mane onegi to koro isemiyo gimadho remo mana kaka owinjore kodgi . "
66016007	Eka ne awinjo duol kawuok e kendo mar misango kawacho niya , " Ee Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto kumni nikare kendo gin adieri . "
66016008	Malaika mar ang’wen noolo tape e wang’ chieng’ mi chieng’ nomi teko mar wang’o ji gi mach mager .
66016009	Liet mager mar chieng’ nowang’ogi to ne gidhi nyime mana giyanyo nying Nyasaye man giteko mar geng’o masichego , kendo ne gitamore hulo richogi mondo gimiye duong’ .
66016010	Eka malaika mar abich noolo tape e wi kom duong’ mar ondiek malichno , to piny ruodhe nolokore mudho . Ji nokayo lewgi nikech rem malit mane gin-go
66016011	kendo ne giyanyo Nyasach polo nikech rem mane gin-go gi adhondegi ; to kata kamano ne gitamore lokore kuom richo mane gisetimo .
66016012	Bang’e malaika mar auchiel noolo tape e aora maduong’ mar Yufret , mi pige noduono mondo yo olosre ni ruodhi mane biro koa yo wuok chieng’ .
66016013	Eka naneno jochiende adek machalo ogwende , ne giwuok e dho Thuol maduong’ kendo e dho ondiek malich kendo e dho Janabi mar miriambo .
66016014	Gin chunje mag jochiende matimo timbe honni kendo gidhi ir ruodhi duto mag piny ngima mondo gichokgi ni lweny ma nobedie chieng’ maduong’
66016015	" Neuru ! Abiro ka jakuo ! Ng’atno en jahawi ma nonwang’ kaneno kendo ma orwako lepe mondo wiye kik kuodi ka oyude duk .
66016016	Bang’ mano chunjego nochoko ruod-higo kanyakla kama iluongo gi dho Hibrania ni Armagedon .
66016017	Kendo malaika mar abiriyo bende noolo tape e yamo ; eka duol maduong’ nowuok koa ei Hekalu e nyim kom maduong’ mar loch kawacho niya , " Osetimore ! "
66016018	Bang’ mano , ne nitie mil polo makakni , koriadore kod mor polo gi yiengni malich mar piny . Piny noyiengni matek mapok oyiengni kamano nyaka aa chuech dhano . Adiera chutho ne en yiengni mar piny marachie moloyo .
66016019	Dala maduong’ nobarore mopogore didek kendo mier madongo mag pinje ogendini nomukore mogore piny . Nyasaye noparo Babulon dala maduong’ , mi ne omiye kikombe mopong’ gi divai mar mirimbe mager .
66016020	Chula ka chula nolal nono kendo gode duto bende nolal kamano .
66016021	Pe madongo dongo ma pek moro ka moro dirom kilo piero abich , noa e polo mogoyo ji . To ne giyango Nyasaye nikech masich peno , nimar ne en masira marach , moloyo !
66017001	Eka achiel kuom malaike abiriyo mane nigi tewni abiriyo nobiro ira , mowachona niya ; " Bi mondo anyisi kum mar jachode maduong’ mobet ewi pige mang’eny .
66017002	En ema ruodhi mag piny noterore kode , kendo ji duto modak e piny bende osemadho divai mar terruokne mi omer . "
66017003	Bang’e malaika nokawa kapong’ gi Roho kendo otera e thim . Ekanyono naneno dhako moro koidho ondiek malich makwar , ma dende duto nochadhore gi nyinge mag ayany , kendo ne en gi wiye abiriyo kod tunge apar .
66017004	Dhakono norwakore gi lewni maralik gi makwar , kendo nolichore gi dhahabu kod kite mabeyo manengogi tek gi Mu . To noting’o e lwete kikombe mar dhahabu , mopong’ gi gik modwanyore kod timbe mochido mag terruokne .
66017005	Kendo nyingni nondik e lenda wang’e niya : " HONO , BABULON MADUOng’ MIN JOCHODE DUTO , KENDO MIN GIK MODWANYORE MAG PINY . "
66017006	Bende ne aneno dhakono komer gi remb jomaler mag Nyasaye , remb jogo mane ohulo ni Yesu e Ruoth . Kane Anene Ne Awuoro Ahinya .
66017007	Eka malaika cha nopenja ni , " Ere gima omiyo iwuoro kamano ? Abiro nyisi tiend wach mopondo mar dhakono kod mar ondiek malich moidho gi wiye abiriyo kod tunge apar .
66017008	Ondiek malich mane ineno , yande nitie , to tinde oonge kendo obiro wuok oa e Bur Matut Maonge Gikone ka odhiyo e kar tethruokne . Ji duto modak e piny , ma nyingegi ok ondiki e kitap ngima nyaka aa chakruok mar piny nowuor ka gineno ondiek malichno , nikech yande entie to tinde oonge , to nochak oduogi-kendo .
66017009	" Ng’eyo tiend wachni dwaro paro matut mangi rieko . Wiye abiriyogo gin gode abiriyo ma dhakono obetie .
66017010	To bende gin ruodhi abiriyo . Ma abich kuomgi osepodho , to achiel pod nitie , to machielo pod ok obiro ; to kapo ni obiro to nobedi kuom thuolo mabor matin .
66017011	Ondiek malichno ma yande nitie , to tinde oonge , en ruoth mar aboro . Bende en achiel kuom ruodhi abiriyogo , kendo odhiyo e kar kethruokne .
66017012	Tunge apargo mane ineno , gin ruodhi apar ma pok oyudo pinyruoth to ibiro miyogi teko mar locho kuom saa achiel kende , kaka ruodhi kaachiel gi ondiek malichno .
66017013	Gin duto gin gi paro achiel kendo ginichiw tekogi kod lochgi ni ondiek malichno .
66017014	Giniked gi Nyarombo , to Nyarombo nologi nikech en e Jaduong’ mar jodongo , kendo Ruodh ruodhi , to jogo manobed kode , gin joge moluongi , jomoyier gi jogo maluwe gadiera . "
66017015	Eka malaikano nowachona niya , " Pigego mane ineno ma dhako ma jachode obedoe , gin ji gi ogendini mang’eny kod dhout pinje gi joma wacho dhok mopogore opogore .
66017016	To ondiek malichno gi tunge apargo mane ineno biro bedo mager kod dhakono ma jachode . Ginihinye kagitieke kendo weye duk ; ginicham ringe , ma giniwang’e te gi mach .
66017017	Nimar Nyasaye oseketo e chunygi mondo gitim gima odwaro ka gimiyo ondiek lochgi mondo olochi , nyaka wach Nyasaye ochopi .
66017018	Dhakono mane ineno en e dala maduong’ man gi loch kuom ruodhi mag piny . "
66018001	Bang’ mani ne aneno malaika machielo kalor piny aa e polo . Ne en gi teko maduong’ , kendo lerne ne menyo piny .
66018002	Nokok gi dwol maduong’ kowacho niya , " Yaye ! Babulon dala maduong’ osepodho ! Osepodho ! Osedoko kar dak mar jochiende , kendo odoko gunda ma chuny duto mochido odakie , kaachiel gi winy duto makelo luoro gi mago maok ler makuero .
66018003	Mano osetimore nikech ogendini e pinje duto osemadho divai mar neko mag terruokne , Ruodhi mag piny oseterore kode , kendo jo-ohala mag piny bende osedoko jomwandu nikech ohala ma ngimane oyombore mane odhialorego . "
66018004	Eka nawinjo dwol moro machielo moa e polo kawacho niya : " Un joga , wuoguru ua kuome , mondo kik ubed achiel kode e richone , mondo omi kik un wang’ masichene ,
66018005	nikech richone osebi-wore mochopo e polo malo , kendo Nyasaye koro o separo timbene mamonogo .
66018006	Timneuru kaka oseti-mono ! Medneuru nyadiriyo kuom gik ma osetimo ! Losneuru mathne mane omiyo ji e kikombene nyadiriyo .
66018007	Miyeuru sand kod ywagruok mang’eny marom gi duong’ kod dhialruok mar ngima moyom-bore manodakie kendo manomiyore owuon . Nosungore kowacho e chunye niya , ' Abedo kaka ruoth madhako , ok an chie liel kendo ok ane gima dimi aywag ngang’ .
66018008	Emomiyo masichege chieng’ moro achiel noloye : masichego gin tho gi ywagruok kod kech . Mach nowang’e kendo tieke duto , nikech Ruoth Nyasaye mang’adone bura , nigi teko maduong’ moloyo ! '
66018009	" To ruodhi mag piny mane oterore kode , kendo bedo kode e ngima moyom-bore noywage kendo sedo kod nyinge ka gineno yiro madum ka owang’ .
66018010	Ginichung’ mabor ka giluoro sandne kendo ka giywak niya , " To mano kaka lit ! To mano kaka lit ! " Yaye dala maduong’ . Yaye Babulon ; dala maduong’ mangi teko ! Kethruokni osechoponi kuom saa achiel kende ! "
66018011	" Johala mag piny noywage ka giden-go , nikech onge ng’at ma nochak ong’iew mwandugi kendo .
66018012	Mwandugigo gin : dhahabu gi fedha kod kite mabeyo manengogi tek gi lulu kod lewni mabeyo , gi lewni maralik , lewni mareprep kod lewni makwar gi yien duto madum tik mamit , gi gik moko duto molos gi lak liech , gi yien ma neng’ogi tek kod molos gi nyinyo , kod muia kendo molos gi kite mabeyo ,
66018013	kod gik moko kaka dalasini gi gik mang’ue ng’ar ; kaka ubani gi mor wir madum tik mamit kod uvumba gi divai kod mor mzabibu gi mogo mayom gi ngano kod dhok gi rombe gi farese gi geche lweny kod ringruok gi chunje ji bende .
66018014	" Giniwach niya , ' Olembe ma yande igombo oserumoni . Mwandugi duto kod gik mabeyo malombo wang’ oselal chutho , ok nibed kodgi kendo ngang’ . '
66018015	Jo-ohala mane ouso gigegi kendo obedo momewo nikech gigege nochung’ mabor , ka giluor nikech sandruokne . Giniywagi kagidengo ,
66018016	kendo goyo nduru ka giwacho niya : " Mano kaka lit ! Mano kaka lit , Yaye dala maduong’ morwakore gi lewni mabeyo kod lewni mareprep gi makwar , mapakni gi dhahabu gi kite mabeyo manengogi tek kod lulu !
66018017	Mano kaka mwandu mathoth kama osekethi motieki kuom saa achiel kende ! ' " Jotend yiedhi duto , gi jowuoth duto mawuotho gi yiedhi kod jokwang’ yiedhi gi jogo duto ma loko ohala e nam , ginichung’ gichien .
66018018	Ka gineno yiche dum kowang’ gini wach niya : ' Bende ne nitie dala moro machalo gi dala maduong’ni ?
66018019	Giniket buru e wigi kendo goyo nduru ka giywak niya : " Mano kaka lit ! Mano kaka lit , Yaye dala maduong’ Kama ji duto mane nigi Yiedhi e nam , nobedo joma omewo nikech mwandune . Mano kaka osekethe kendo otieke chutho mana kuom saa achiel kende .
66018020	Yaye polo bed maraor kuom kethne . Un jomaler mag Nyasaye gi joote kod jonabi , beduru mamor ! Nyasaye oseng’adone bura kendo kume nikech timbe mane otimonu .
66018021	Eka malaika maratego nokawo kidi machalo gi pong’ rego maduong’ , noting’e kendo nobologo e nam , kowacho niya : " Mana gi gero malich kama , e kaka Babulon dala maduong’ nomuki kendo ok nonene ngang’ .
66018022	Wende jogo thum nyatiti gi jower , kod jogo asili gi jogo tung’ , ok nowinji e iyi kendo ngang’ . Kata johala moro amora ok noyud e iyi kendo ngang’ , bende dwond pong’ marego ok nowinj kendo e iyi ngang’ .
66018023	Ler mar taya ok norieny kendo e iyi chutho . Dwond wuon kisera gi dwond miaha bende ok nowinj eiyi kendo ngang’ . Jolok ohala magi ne gin ji madongo e piny . To pinje duto nobaro mokethore nikech wuondni kod timbeni mayore mag juok .
66018024	Ne oyud kuome remb jonabi gi remb jomaler , kod remb ji duto mane osene-giepiny .
66019001	Bang’ mani , nawinjo gima chalo kJ gi koko maduong’ mar oganda ei polo kawacho niya : " Haleluya ! Warruok gi duong’ kod teko odok ne Nyasachwa ,
66019002	nikech buchene gin adiera kendo kare . Oseng’ado bura ni jachodeno maduong’ mane oketho piny gi terruokne . Adier Nyasaye osekume nikech nonego jotich Nyasaye . '
66019003	Eka ne gigoyo koko kendo niya : " Haleluya ! Iro moa kuome kowang’ nodum mochuere manyaka chieng’ . "
66019004	To jodongo piero ariyo gang’wen gi gik mangima ang’wen kande , nopodho piny auma kendo ma gi dendo Nyasaye mane obedo e kom duong’ mar loch . Negiywak niya : Amin ! Haleluya ! "
66019005	Eka dwol noa e kom duong’ mar loch , kawacho niya : " Pakuru Nyasachwa , un jotichne duto , un joge moluore , jomatindo kod jo madongo ! "
66019006	Bang’e ne awinjo gima chalo gi koko oganda mang’eny machalo gi koko mar pige maringo matek , bende machalo gi polo mamor matek , kawacho niya : " Ruoth omi duong’ ! Haleluya ! Nimar Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto , olocho .
66019007	Wabed moil kendo mamor ahinya kendo wamiyeuru duong’ ! Nikech kinde mar arus mar Nyarombo osechopo , to miahane oseikore .
66019008	Osemiye law maber mareprep , mapichni kendo maler , mondo orwaki . ( Law maberno ochungo kar timbe makare mag jomaler . )
66019009	Eka malaikano nowachona ni , Ndik kama : Jogo gin johawi moluongi e chiemb arus mar Nyarombo ! ' Eka nomedo wacho niya , " Magi gin weche ma adier mag Nyasaye . "
66019010	Eka napodho piny e tiende mondo alame . To nowachona niya , " Ngang’ ! Kik itim kamano ! An bende an mana jatich wadu kaachiel gi joweteni mohulo gichir wach kuom Yesu . Nyasaye kende ema owinjore ilam ! Wach adierano mar Yesu e ma kelo koro wach mar jonabi . "
66019011	Eka naneno polo koyawore kendo naneno faras marachar kochungo e nyima ma jaithne iluongo ni Jaratiro , kendo Jaadiera . Ong’ado buchege e yo makare kendo okedo lwenjege gi ratiro .
66019012	Wengene chalo mach makakni to osimbe mang’eny ni e wiye . En gi nying’ mondik kuome , maonge ng’ama ong’eyo , makmana en owuon .
66019013	Kendo orwakore gi kandho moling’ e remo , to nyinge en Wach Nyasaye .
66019014	Ogend lweny mag polo neluwe , ka giidho farese marachere kendo ka girwakore gi lewni mabeyo mareprep marochere kendo maler .
66019015	To ligangla mabith wuok e dhoge ma ochwowogo ogendini manie pinje . Obiro locho korito-gi gi ludh nyinyo . To enonyon-gi ka jabi-cho mar divai kotoyo mirimb Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto kuomgi .
66019016	En gi nying mondik e kandhone kendo e bamne ni : RUODH RUODHI , KENDO JADUOng’ MAR JODONGO .
66019017	To bang’e ne aneno malaika moro kochung’e wang’ chieng’ ; nogoyo koko gi dwol maduong’ ne winy duto mane huyo e kor polo niya , " Biuru , uchokru kaachiel e kar chiemo maduong’ mar Nyasaye ,
66019018	mondo ucham ringre ruodhi , gi ringre jotend lweny kod ringre joma rateke , gi ringre farese kod joithgi kaachiel gi ringre ji duto , joma ni thuolo gi wasumbini , joma tindo gi joma dongo .
66019019	Eka naneno ondiek malichno gi ruodhi mag piny kod cgen-dinigi mag lweny kochokore kaachiel mondo giked gi Jalno moidho faras kod ogandane mar lweny .
66019020	To ne omak ondiek malichno kaachiel gi janabi mar miriambo , mane o setimo timbe honni e nyinge . Honnigo ema ne osewuondogo joma ne oketinigi alama mar ondiek malichno kendo negilamo gima ket kode . Kargi gik moko ariyogi ne owitgi kagingi-ma e ataro mar mach maliel mager .
66019021	To jogegi mane odong’ noneg gi ligangla mane owuok e dho jaidh faras , kendo winy duto nokidho ringregi .
66020001	Eka naneno malaika kalor oa e polo , koting’o e lwete kifungu mar Bur Matut Maonge gikone kod nyororo maduong’ .
66020002	Ne omako matek Thuol maduong’no , thuol machon cha , ma en Jachien kata Satan , kendo notueye kuom higni alufu achiel .
66020003	Ne owite e Bur Matut Maonge gikone , kendo nolorone modi-none e iye , mondo kik ochak owuond ogendini mag pinje ngang’ nyaka higni alufu achielgo rum . To bang’e nogonye mondo obed thuolo kuom kinde matin .
66020004	Bang’ mano , ne aneno kombe mag loch , majoma ne obet e kombego nosemi teko mar ng’ado bura . Bende ne aneno chunje joma ne ong’ad wiyegi nikech wach yie margi motegno mane gihulo kuom Yesu kendo wach Nyasaye mane guando . Jogi ne ok olamo ondiek malichno kata gima ket kode kendo alama mare ne ok oket e lenda wengegi kata lwetegi . Ne gidoko mangima kendo negilocho gi Kristo kuom higni alufu achiel .
66020005	Ma e chier mokwongo . ( To jo motho manodong’ mane ok ochier e chierni , ne ok odoko mangima nyaka higni alufu achielgo nommo . )
66020006	Gin johawi kendo mopuodhi jogo mochier e chier mokwongo . Tho mar ariyo onge gi teko kuomgi , to ginibed jodolo mag Nyasaye kendo mag Kristo kendo giniloch kode kuom higini alufu achiel .
66020007	To bang’ ka higni alufu achiel oserumo , Satan nogony mobed thuolo koa e bur mane otueye ,
66020008	kendo nowuog oko kodhiyo mondo owuond ogendini duto mag tunge ang’wen mag piny , ma gin Gog gi Magog , kendo nochokgi kaachiel mondo gidhi e lweny To kar kwan-gi romre gi kuoyo manie dho nam .
66020009	Ne giwuotho mi gik-wako piny te , kendo ne gilworo kar jot mar jo-Nyasaye , dala maduong’ ma ohero . To mach ne oa e polo mobiro e piny kendo nowang’ogi motiekogi .
66020010	To Jachien , mane owuondogi ne owit e ataro mar mach maliel mager , kama ondiek malichno gi janabi majawuondno nowitie . Kanyono nosandgie odiechieng’ gi otieno nyaka chieng’ .
66020011	Eka naneno kom mar loch maduong’ marachar kaachiel gi jal manobedo e komno . Piny gi polo noringo oa e nyime kendo ne gilal maok nonegi kendo .
66020012	To ne aneno jo motho , jotelo madongo gi jomatindo , ne gichungo e nyim kom maduong’ mar loch , kendo kitepe noyaw . Kitabu moro noyaw , ma en kitap ngima . Jomothogo nong’ad nigi bura koluwore kod gik mane gisetimo kaka ondiki e kite-pego .
66020013	Nam nogolo oko jomotho manie iye , to Tho gi Piny Joma otho nogolo oko jomotho manie igi , kendo ng’ato ka ng’ato nong’adne bura koluwore kod gik mane osetimo .
66020014	Eka tho gi Piny Joma otho nowiti e ataro mar mach . Ataro mar machno e tho mar ariyo .
66020015	Ng’ato ang’ata ma nyinge ne ok onwang’ kondiki e kitap ngima , nowit e ataro mar mach .
66021001	Eka ne aneno polo manyien gi piny manyien . Polo mokwongo gi piny mokwongo noselal , to nam bende noselal kamano .
66021002	Bang’e naneno Dalano Maler , ma en Jerusalem manyien kalor piny oa e polo ir Nyasaye , ka oikore ka miaha morwakore maber ni chuore .
66021003	To ne awinjo dwol maduong’ moa e kom duong’ mar loch mawacho niya , " Koro kar dak mar Nyasaye ni kod ji kendo enodag kodgi , ginibed joge , to Nyasaye owuon enobed kodgi kendo nobed Nyasachgi .
66021004	Enoywe pi wengegi duto . Tho kata ywak gi nduru kod rem ok nochak obedie kendo ngang’ , nikech gik machon oserumo ' .
66021005	Jal manobed e kom duong’ mar loch nowacho niya , ' Neuru ! Aloso gik moko duto bedo manyien ! " Eka nowacho kendo niya , " Ndik mani , nikech wechegi gin migeno kendo gin adiera . "
66021006	Bang’ mano nowachona niya : " Osetimore . An e Alfa gi Omega , Chakruok gi Giko , Ng’at ma riyo oloyo anami modho pi soko mar ngima , nono ma onge nengo .
66021007	Ng’at molocho noyud gigi duto kaka gir keni , kendo anabed Nyasache , to en obed wuoda .
66021008	To jomalu-or , gi joma ok oyie kod jokoko gi jonek kod jomaterore , gi jojuogi gi jomalamo nyiseche manono kod jomiriambo duto , kargi nobed mana ataro mar mach maliel mager , ma en tho mar ariyo !
66021009	Eka achiel kuom malaike abiriyogo mane nigi tewni abiriyo moting’o masiche abiriyo mogik nobiro ira mowachona niya , " Bi , mondo anyisi miaha ma en chi Nyarombo . "
66021010	To malaikano noting’a kapong’ gi roho motera malo e wi got maduong’ kendo mabor , mi nonyisa Jerusalem , Dala Maler , kalor piny aa e polo ir Nyasaye .
66021011	Ne orieny gi ler mar duong’ Nyasaye , to lerne ne rieny ka kidi ma nengone tek , kaka jaspa maler ahinya .
66021012	Ne en gi ohinga maduong’ kendo mabor man gi dhorangeye apar gariyo kendo man gi malaike apar-gariyo e dhorangeyego . E dhorangeyego nondikie nying ogendini apar gariyo mag Israel .
66021013	Dhorangeye adek ne ni yo wuok chieng’ , to adek yo nyandwat , kendo adek yo milambo gi adek mamoko yo podho chieng’ .
66021014	To ohinga mar dalano ne nigi misingi apar gariyo , mane ondikie nying joote apar gariyo mag Nyarombo .
66021015	Malaikano mane owuoyo koda , ne nigi luth mar rapim molos gi dhahabu mipimogo dalano , gi dhorangeyene kod ohingane .
66021016	Dalano noger ma bethene ang’wen romore , borne rom gi lachne . Nopimo dala gi luth kendo noyudo ni borne gi lachne kod kaka oidho malo ne romo kilomita alufu ariyo gi mia ariyo maromore .
66021017	Ne opimo ohingane bende , mi oyudo ni pek mar kore oromo bede mia achiel gi piero ang’wen gang’wen , kipimo gi bat mar dhano , ma en rapim mane malaika otiyogo .
66021018	Ohingano noger gi jaspa , to dala hie ne dhahabu lilo marieny ka glas maler .
66021019	Misingi mar ohinga mar dala nokedi gi kite mabeyo duto ma nengogi tek . Misingi mokwongo nolos gi jaspa , to mar ariyo ne safir , eka mar adek ne kalke-do kendo mar ang’wen ne zumaridi ,
66021020	to mar abich ne sardonikso , mar auchiel ne sardius , eka mar abiriyo ne krusolith , to mar aboro ne berul , mar ochiko ne topaz , to mar apar ne kruskopraso , kendo mar apar gachiel ne huakintho , to mar apar gariyo ne amethusto .
66021021	Dhorangeye apar gariyogo ne gin kite mag lulu ma nengogi tek , kendo dhorangach ka dhorangach nolos gi lulu achiel achiel moriwore . Yor dalano ne dhahabu lilo marieny maler ka glas .
66021022	To ne ok aneno Hekalu ie dalano , nikech Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto kod Nyarombo ema obedo Hekalu mare .
66021023	Dalano ok dwar chieng’ kata due mondo orienyne , nimar dwong’ Nyasaye ema miye ler , kendo Nyarombo e tache .
66021024	Ogendini mag pinje nowuothi e lerne , kendo ruodhi mag pinje nokel bergi e iye .
66021025	Dhorangeyene ok nolor odiechieng’ moro amora , to otieno bende ok nobedie ngang’ kuro .
66021026	Duong’ gi mwandu mag ogendini mag pinje nokel e iye .
66021027	To gimoro amora ma ok ler , kata ng’ato matimo gik mamono , kata mariambo , ok nodonjie , makmana jogo ma nyinggi ondiki e kitap Nyarombo mar ngima kende .
66022001	Bang’e eka malaika nonyisa aora mar pi mar ngima , marieny maler ahinya , kendo mamol kaa e kom duong’ mar loch mar Nyasaye gi mar Nyarombo ,
66022002	ne omol e dier yo maduong’ mar dalano . To bath aora koni gi koni ne nitie yath mar ngima konyago olembe apar gariyo kendo ne onyago olem-begego due ka due , bende ite yadhno ema ithiedhogo ogendini mag pinje .
66022003	Kuong’ moro amora ok nobedie kendo . Kom duong’ mar loch Nyasaye gi mar Nyarombo ema nobedie ei dalano , to jotichne notine .
66022004	Gininene wang’ gi wang’ kendo nyinge nobed e lenda wengegi .
66022005	Otieno ok nobedie kendo ngang’ . Ok ginidwar ler mar taya kata ler mar chieng’ , nikech Ruoth Nyasaye ema nomigi ler . To ginilochi nyaka chieng’ .
66022006	Eka malaikano nowachona niya , " Wechegi gin weche migeno kendo ma adiera . To Ruoth ma Nyasach chunje mag jonabi , nooro malaikane mondo onyis jotichne gik mabiro timore mapiyo . "
66022007	" Neuru abiro mapiyo ! Ng’atno en jahawi momako weche mokor manie kitabuni ! "
66022008	An , Johana ema nawinjo gigi kendo ne anenogi . To kane asewinjogi kendo nenogi , napodho piny e tiend malaikano mane nyisagi .
66022009	To nowachona niya , " Kik itim kamano . An bende an jatich wadu matiyo kodi kaachiel gi joweteni ma jonabi gi jogo duto morito weche manie kitabuni . Mi Nyasaye duong’ ! "
66022010	Bang’ mano nowachona niya , " Kik iling’ mak ihulo weche mokor manie kitabuni , nikech kindeno ma gigo onego timre chiegni .
66022011	We ng’at matimo richo odhi nyime kod timo richo ; kendo ng’at ma chunye ochido odhi nyime timo timbe mochido ; to ng’at matimo makare bende odhi nyime gi timo makare , to ng’at maler odhi nyime gi bedo maler . "
66022012	" Ne , abiro piyo ! Ating’o michna , to abiro miyo ng’ato ka ng’ato koluwore kod gima osetimo .
66022013	An Alfa gi Omega , Jal Mwokongo kendo Mogik kendo An e Chakruok gi Giko .
66022014	" Johawi gin jogo ma lwoko kand-hogi maler , mondo omi gibed gi ratiro mar chamo olemb yath mar ngimano kendo gikadh ka gidonjo e dhorangeye mag dalano .
66022015	To guogi , gi jojuogi , gi jomaterore kod jonek , gi joma lamo nyiseche manono kod ji duto ma ohero miriambo kendo matimo gik maok adiera , duto nobed oko . "
66022016	" An , Yesu aseoro malaikana mondo ohulni wechegi ilonygo kanise . An Tiend anyuola kendo Koth Daudi , to bende an Sulwe Maler mar Okinyi . "
66022017	Roho gi miaha wacho ni , " Bi ! " To ng’ato mawinjo , bende owach niya , " Bi ! " Ng’ama riyo oloyo , mondo obi , kendo ng’at mohero , mondo obi oyud pi ngima mochiw nono .
66022018	An Johana asiemo ng’ato ka ng’ato mawinjo wechegi mokor mag kitabuni kama : Ka ng’ato moro nomed gimoro amora e wechegi , Nyasaye nomedne ng’atno masiche mondik e kitabuni .
66022019	To bende ka ng’ato moro nogol oko weche manie kitabuni mar koro , Nyasaye nogol oko kamaye pokne manie yath mar ngima kendo manie dala maler , mondiki e kitabuni .
66022020	Jal mawacho wechegi wacho kendo niya , " Ee , Abiro mapiyo . " Amin ! Bi , Ruoth Yesu .
66022021	Ng’wono mar Ruodhwa Yesu obed gi jo-Nyasaye . Amin .
